English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] What?!@w2 That tower contains a record of our history, much as the zirax would like to refute it. They would never intentionally destroy such a repository of knowledge as it may still be of use if war resumes again.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What can I tell you, Chief?@w3 They blew in a wall to get in and took out one of the consoles and everything behind it. The red one, I think...@w8 By the time i'd reached the tower, they'd already landed a safe distance and were making their way on foot to the tower.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] That knowledge is backed up, so as long as the other consoles are undamaged then it can be repaired...@w8 I can tell what you're thinking.@w3 That someone here told the zirax patrols where to find you, aren't you?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 什么?!@w2 那座塔包含了我们历史的记录,尽管兹瑞克斯人很想否认它。他们永远不会故意摧毁这样一个知识的宝库,因为如果战争再次爆发,它可能仍然有用。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我能告诉你什么,酋长?@w3 他们炸开一堵墙进去,拿走了其中一个控制台和它后面的所有东西。红色的那个,我想...@w8 我到达塔楼的时候,他们已经安全着陆,并且正在步行前往塔楼。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 那些知识是有备份的,所以只要其他控制台没有损坏,就可以修复...@w8 我能告诉你在想什么。@w3 是不是觉得这里有人在告诉兹瑞克斯巡逻队在哪里找到你,对吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>Not to put too fine a point on it, Chief. But yes.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我不想说得太仔细,酋长. 不过没错.</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] I assure you, I have not betrayed you!@w3 Do not throw around such accusations lightly, stranger.@w4 Coming to the aid of your people after their ships crashed into our lands cost many of my clansmen@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Not only were our homes burned by the fires started by flaming wreckage, but we lost many lives to your soldiers afterwards mistaking our assistance as an attack and opening fire on unarmed civilians. Many of the youngsters lost friends and relatives that night and...@w3 unfortunate as it is, I believe they may have been the ones to inform the zirax.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] As soon as you had left, a number of young hunters approached me and demanded that I offer you no assistance.@w3 That I call our 'jailers' and trade your location for supplies or weapons.@w4 Naturally, I refused.@w3 I would be a poor leader to lend any assistance to the zirax who enforce these conditions upon us.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ Chief Na'tuk ] 我向你保证,我没有背叛你!@w3 不要轻率地提出这样的指控,陌生人。@w4 在你们的船只坠毁到我们的土地上后,来帮助你们的人民,我的许多族人都付出了代价。@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] 不仅我们的家园被燃烧的残骸引起的火焰烧毁,而且我们的生命也因你们的士兵后来误将我们的援助视为攻击而向手无寸铁的平民开火而丧失。 许多年轻人在那晚失去了朋友和亲人,而且...尽管这是不幸的,我相信他们可能是向兹瑞克斯人通风报信的人。@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] 你一离开,一些年轻的猎人就来找我,要求我不要向你提供任何帮助。@w3 让我称我们的“狱卒”为兹瑞克斯人,并用你的位置交换物资或武器。@w4 自然,我拒绝了。@w3 如果我向强加这些条件给我们的兹瑞克斯人提供任何帮助,那将是一个糟糕的领导者。

English: These Conditions? I never did find out how the Tal'on ended up this way.
Chinese (simplified): 这些条件?我确实没有找出塔隆人是如何最终变成这样的。

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] It shames me to admit that you are probably right, Traveller.@w2 I can even understand why they did it.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] You see, four years ago when the ships of your people crashed onto this planet. Several villagers were caught in the fires caused by the flaming debris that rained down across the planet.@w6 I ordered my people to go and put out the fires of our settlement and those of our neighbors, then to aid any survivors from your people's ships.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] To my sorrow, when we tried to help your people they mistook us for the zirax, and our aid for an attack.@w4 We lost many people that night.@w3 Several of the young hunters lost friends and family members and have held a grudge since then.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] After I'd sent you to the tower to learn our ways and language to prove you were not an enemy, several of the hunters came to me and demanded that I render you no aid.@w3 That instead, I should contact our zirax jailers and trade the information for supplies or weapons.@w8 Naturally, I refused.@w3 I would be a poor leader to lend any assistance to the zirax who enforce these conditions upon us.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Unfortunately, it seems the youngsters did not like my answer to their demands.@w3 Now, it seems that they may have done something unforgivable...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 我羞愧地承认,旅行者,你可能是正确的。@w2 我甚至能理解他们为什么这么做。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 你看,四年前,当你们人民的船只坠毁在这个星球上时。一些村民被燃烧的碎片引发的火灾困住了。@w6 我命令我的人民去扑灭我们定居点的火灾,还有我们邻居的火灾,然后去帮助你们船上的任何幸存者。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 让我悲痛的是,当我们试图帮助你们的人民时,他们误把我们当作兹瑞克斯人,把我们的援助当作攻击。@w4 那天晚上我们失去了很多人。@w3 一些年轻的猎人失去了朋友和家人,从那时起就一直怀恨在心。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 在我派你去塔楼学习我们的方式和语言,以证明你不是敌人之后,一些猎人来找我,要求我不要向你提供任何帮助。@w3 相反,我应该联系我们的兹瑞克斯狱卒,用信息交换物资或武器。@w8 自然,我拒绝了。@w3 如果我向强加这些条件给我们的兹瑞克斯人提供任何帮助,那将是一个糟糕的领导者。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 不幸的是,这些年轻人似乎不喜欢我对他们要求的回答。@w3 现在,看来他们可能做了一些不可原谅的事情...

English: These Conditions? I never did find out how the Tal'on ended up this way.
Chinese (simplified): 这些条件?我确实没有找出塔隆人是如何最终变成这样的。\n

English: <color=#0088ff>What will happen to the hunters now?</color>

@q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] Ah, yes...@w2 That.@w5 It's not a terribly long story and happened long before my time, but if you're willing to listen to an old chieftain prattle on about the past, I'll be glad to indulge you.@w5 If only the youngsters had the patience to learn their history@w3 maybe this tragic situation wouldn't have happened?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Following the defeat of the Legacy and their forced dormancy; The Zirax who had suffered the greatest, or possibly only, losses in the war saw us Tal'on, centralized within the safety of the Federation's home systems, far from the frontlines, as cowards and not fit to rule...@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Suspicions and discrimination escalated. Wild theories of us orchestrating the Zirax's demise at the hands of the Legacy became common and xenophobia reigned supreme until it all came to a head.@w4 The houses of zirax united behind a single ruler, an Emperor, and forcibly and violently ended the Tallaxan Federation.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] The survivors from The Purge were herded onto hundreds of planets across the galaxy.@w3 Some to work as slaves, others forced into primitive conditions like us, kept from technological proficiency by an iron rule enforced by our watchers.@w4 That's...@w2 really all there is.@w4 Look around you, and you will see the truth of the tale, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 啊,是的...那个。@w2 这不是一个很长的故事,而且发生在我的时代很久以前,但如果你愿意听一个老酋长喋喋不休地谈论过去,我会很高兴地满足你。@w5 如果只有年轻人有耐心学习他们的历史@w3 也许这种悲惨的情况就不会发生了?@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 在遗产的失败和他们被迫休眠之后;在战争中遭受最大,或者可能是唯一损失的兹瑞克斯人认为我们塔隆人,集中在联邦家园系统的安全之中,远离前线,是懦夫,不适合统治...@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 怀疑和歧视升级了。我们策划兹瑞克斯人在遗产手中灭亡的疯狂理论变得普遍,仇外心理至高无上,直到一切都达到了顶点。@w4 兹瑞克斯的家族团结在一个统治者,一个皇帝的身后,用武力和暴力结束了塔拉克斯联邦。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 清洗的幸存者被赶到了银河系的数百个星球上。@w3 一些人被当作奴隶工作,其他人被迫处于像我们这样的原始条件,被我们的监视者以铁腕手段阻止技术熟练。@w4 那是...@w2 真的就是全部了。@w4 环顾四周,旅行者,你将看到故事的真实性。

English: <color=#0088ff>That's terrible! Why have you not fought back?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那太糟糕了!你为什么不反击?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>So what will happen with the hunters?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>所以说那些捕猎者会怎么样?</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ]\nIf the youngsters are to be apprehended, you'll need to find their master among the village's hunters.@w2 He will likely know where they've gone...@w4\nAt this time of day, he can usually be found at one of the Village Watchtowers.
Chinese (simplified): [ 酋长 Na'tuk ]\n如果要逮捕那些年轻人,你需要找到他们中在村庄猎人里的师傅。@w2 他很可能知道他们去了哪里...@w4 \n在这个时间,他通常可以在村庄的某个瞭望塔找到。

English: <color=#0088ff>I'll see if I can find him</color>

@q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] The youngsters will be apprehended and brought before a tribal council to determine their guilt.@w2 Selling out anyone to the zirax is the highest crime we have. If found guilty...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I understand.@w2 Is there some way I can help?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I believe you may meet opposition.@w2 On the other hand, I believe some of the other hunters may also refuse the order to bring in the youngsters.@w4 I would ask you, if you are willing, to speak to the head of the hunters and tell him to call in the hunters at my request.@w4 You will likely find the leader of the hunters at one of the Village Watchtowers.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 这些年轻人将被逮捕并在部落会议上受审,以确定他们的罪行。@w2 向兹瑞克斯人出卖任何人都是我们这里最严重的罪行。如果被判有罪...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我明白。@w2 有什么我能做的吗?@p9 [ 酋长Na'tuk ] 我认为你可能会遭到反对。@w2 另一方面,我相信其他一些猎人也可能拒绝执行将年轻人带回来的命令。@w4 如果你愿意,我请求你去和猎人的首领谈谈,告诉他以我的请求召集猎人。@w4 你很可能会在某个村庄瞭望塔找到猎人的首领。

English: @q0[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] So you are the Terran that the Chief has vouched for?@w2 I am not impressed.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm not here to impress you.@w5 I'm here because the chief wants you to bring in the young hunters that are suspected of selling me out to the zirax.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] No member of MY hunters would dare sell out anyone to those treacherous zirax thugs!@w4 You dare accuse my kinsmen of making deals with their kind?!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 所以你就是酋长担保的那个地球人?@w2 我并不印象深刻。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我不是来给你留下印象的。@w5 我来这里是因为酋长希望你把涉嫌把我出卖给兹瑞克斯人的年轻猎人带回来。@p9 [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 我的猎人中没有一个成员敢把任何人出卖给那些背信弃义的兹瑞克斯人!@w4 你敢指控我的族人与他们那种人做交易?!

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm not accusing anyone. I'm just here to make sure you follow through on the chief's orders.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我没有在指控任何人。我只是来这里确保你按照酋长的命令行事。</color>

English: @q0[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] My people have no reason to flee your false accusations, Terran.@w5 It is past time for the hunting parties to return with their kills for the day anyway.@w3 Most of the groups have returned to the village and are either preparing their dinner or reporting to Chief Na'tuk.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] And how many have not returned yet? And is it normal for them to take this long?@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Hold your questions, Terran.@w5 I know what it is you are getting at, and I assure you there is no way the group that has not returned would have betrayed the village as you suspect.@w3 They may simply be delayed by a large catch,@w2 or have travelled further to find prey. They may be in trouble...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [狩猎大师 Ku'reil] 我的人民没有理由逃避你的虚假指控,地球人。@w5 无论如何,狩猎队伍早就该带着他们当天的战利品回来了。@w3 大部分小组已经回到村庄,要么在准备晚餐,要么向酋长Na'tuk报告。@p9 [{PlayerName}] 还没有回来的有多少人?他们花这么长时间是正常的吗?@p9 [狩猎大师 Ku'reil] 搁置你的问题,地球人。@w5 我知道你在暗示什么,我向你保证,没有回来的那个小组绝不会像你怀疑的那样背叛村庄。@w3 他们可能只是因为捕获了大量猎物而耽误了,或者走得更远去寻找猎物。他们可能遇到了麻烦...

English: <color=#0088ff>What can you tell me about this missing group?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>关于这个失踪的群体,你能告诉我什么?</color>

English: @q0[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Ki'eve leads the group.@w2 If he is anywhere, it will be near the Monument@w2 where we go to honor and remember the dead.@w4 It is one of the oldest structures on this planet and a place he chooses to hunt near.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Why would he choose to hunt near there?@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] He once told me that he can feel his father's presence there.@w2 That his father guides his arrows so long as he is near it.@w3 I felt it to be cruel to disabuse him of his beliefs... so I allow him to continue hunting there as long as he continues to bring in prey,@w1 which he does.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Then that's where i'll start looking for his group.@w2 You can keep waiting here, but I can't wait around for another dropship full of soldiers to turn up.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [狩猎大师 Ku'reil] Ki'eve 领导着这个小组。@w2 如果他在任何地方,那一定是在纪念碑@w2 附近,我们去那里纪念和缅怀死者。@w4 这是这个星球上最古老的结构之一,也是他选择狩猎的地方。@p9 [{PlayerName}] 他为什么会选择在附近狩猎?@p9 [狩猎大师 Ku'reil] 他曾经告诉我,他能在那里感受到他父亲的存在。@w2 只要他靠近那里,他父亲就会指引他的箭。@w3 我觉得剥夺他的信仰是残酷的...所以我允许他继续在那里狩猎,只要他继续带来猎物,@w1 他也确实如此。@p9 [{PlayerName}] 那我将从那里开始寻找他的小组。@w2 你可以在这里继续等待,但我不能等待另一艘满载士兵的降落舰出现。

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] I see you have returned, Traveller.@w2 But it is without the missing hunters.@w5 No...@w4 You do not need to explain.@w4 Huntmaster Ku'reil already sent out a party to the Monument to find the missing party,@w2 They returned moments before you arrived.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] It saddens me that you would work to gain my trust only to kill my clansmen in cold blood.@w4 What do you have to say for yourself now, Terran?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [酋长 Na'tuk] 我看到你已经回来了,旅行者。@w2 但是失踪的猎人并没有和你一起回来。@w5 不...@w4 你不需要解释。@w4 狩猎大师Ku'reil已经派出一队人去纪念碑寻找失踪的队伍,@w2 他们在你到达前不久回来了。@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 你这样做让我很伤心,你努力赢得我的信任,却冷血地杀害了我的族人。@w4 现在,你还有什么话要说吗,地球人?

English: <color=#0088ff>I was only defending myself after he attacked me</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>他攻击我在先,我只是在自卫</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>It wasn't me. I never even found Ki'eve.</color>

Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>兹瑞克斯人杀的 Ki'eve. 不是我.</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] We Tal'on are not a violent people.@w3 We never initiate and attack, but we will respond if attacked.@w4 In this case, I have already been told by the hunters that Ki'eve's body was found alone, in the memorial courtyard with damage to his body matching your weapon.@w5 There are no other bodies.@w2 Your guilt is clear, Terran.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I had hoped you would become a friend of the clan, Traveller.@w4 We are so lacking in allies in these trying times that it seems that I foolishly pinned my hopes on you, that we could mend the gap between our two peoples...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [酋长 Na'tuk] 我们塔隆人不是一个暴力的民族。@w3 我们从不主动发起攻击,但如果被攻击,我们会做出回应。@w4 在这种情况下,我已经从猎人那里得知,Ki'eve的尸体是单独被发现的,在纪念庭院里,他身上的伤痕与你的武器相符。@w5 没有其他尸体。@w2 你的罪责是明显的,地球人。@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 我曾希望你能成为我们部落的朋友,旅行者。@w4 在这些艰难时期,我们缺乏盟友,以至于我似乎愚蠢地把希望寄托在你身上,认为我们可以弥合我们两个民族之间的鸿沟...

English: <color=#0088ff>The bodies were removed after I left to return here!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我离开返回这里后,尸体被移走了!</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] Enough!@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] No, chief.@w4 What the Terran says is true.@w3 I have seen Ki'eve's treachery with my own eyes.@w6 There were the bodies of zirax at the monument and clear evidence that they were there with Ki'eve.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Ku'reil...@w3 You who lost so many of your hunters to the Terrans...@w3 You would truly vouch for this one?@w4 You, who cried loudest for vengeance against the terran interlopers?@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Yes, Chief.@w5 I followed tracks leading away from the Monument until I found Geam, Torma, Suvi and Pharai of Ki'eve's hunting party carrying away the bodies of the fallen zirax towards a zirax encampment to the north.@w5 I have returned with the Genetags of several of the soldier's from the encampment as proof
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [Chief Na'tuk] 够了!@p8 [Huntmaster Ku'reil] 不,酋长。@w4 地球人说的是真的。@w3 我亲眼看到了Ki'eve的背叛。@w6 在纪念碑那里有兹瑞克斯人的尸体,并且有明显证据表明他们和Ki'eve在一起。@p9 [Chief Na'tuk] Ku'reil...@w3 你失去了许多猎人给地球人...@w3 你真的要为这人作保吗? 你,曾最强烈地呼吁对地球入侵者进行报复的人? [Huntmaster Ku'reil] 是的,酋长。@w5 我跟踪了从纪念碑延伸出去的踪迹,直到我发现Geam、Torma、Suv i和Pharai,Ki'eve狩猎小组的成员,他们正将倒下的兹瑞克斯人的尸体运往北方的兹瑞克斯营地。@w5 我带着营地中几名士兵的基因标签作为证据回来了。

English: <color=#0088ff>How did you get those tags if the hunters reached the zirax encampment?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>如果猎人到达了兹瑞克斯人的营地,你是怎么得到那些标签的?</color>

English: @q0[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] I am the head of the hunters for a reason, Terran.@w2 I know my way around a knife...@w2 and zirax bodyarmor.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] What I want to know is how you know the bodies were removed when the bodies were taken away after you left the monument.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I am a Commander of the UCH for a reason, Hunter.@w3 I too have my ways...@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] You had that machine-mind that you often speak to watching the area, did you not?@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Ha ha ha haa!@w3 As old as he may be, Na'tuk's mind is still sharp.@w4 If you think you can pull the fur over my chief's eyes, friend. You need to try harder!@w4 We may appear primitive, but we are still familiar with the many advanced technologies that are forbidden to us.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I am concerned with what those four renegades are planning with the Zirax,@w3 and what would the Zirax want with them? It is not like them to show any sort of leniency to our kind.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ki'eve said that handing me over to the zirax would open the way to a brighter future for the Tal'on.@w4 Is re-establishing relations between the Zirax and Tal'on possible?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] It may have been long enough that the younger generations' hatred for the Tal'on has been diminished.@w2 But I do not believe any sort of positive relation with the Zirax will be possible within my lifetime...@w6 It would be a nice prospect if it were possible.@w2 But a future gained by betraying our allies is one we want no part of.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I am sorry that you had to be put in this position, Traveller... That you had to see us in a time of weakness.@w3 I must truly be getting old if I could not see the darkness brewing within our youths...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [狩猎大师 Ku'reil] 作为猎人的首领,我有我的理由,地球人。@w2 我对刀...@w2 和兹瑞克斯人的防弹衣都很熟悉。@p9 [狩猎大师 Ku'reil] 我想知道的是,你怎么知道尸体被移走了,当尸体在你离开纪念碑后才被带走。@p9 [{PlayerName}] 作为UCH的指挥官,我有我的理由,猎人。@w3 我也有我的方式...@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 你有那个你经常与之交谈的机器心灵监视那个区域,不是吗?@p9 [狩猎大师 Ku'reil] 哈哈哈!@w3 尽管他可能年纪大了,但Na'tuk的头脑仍然敏锐。@w4 如果你认为你能蒙蔽我酋长的眼睛,朋友。你需要更努力!@w4 我们可能看起来原始,但我们仍然熟悉许多被禁止我们的先进技术。@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 我对那四个叛徒与兹瑞克斯人的计划感到担忧,@w3 以及什么是兹瑞克斯人想要的?他们通常不会对我们这种人表现出任何宽容。@p9 [{PlayerName}] Ki'eve说,将我交给兹瑞克斯人将为塔隆人开启一个更光明的未来。@w4 重新建立兹瑞克斯人和塔隆人之间的关系可能吗?@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 可能时间已经足够长,年轻一代对塔隆人的仇恨已经减弱。@w2 但我不认为在我的有生之年与兹瑞克斯人建立任何积极关系是可能的...@w6 如果可能的话,那将是一个美好的前景。@w2 但通过背叛我们的盟友获得的未来是我们不想参与的。@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 很抱歉你必须处于这样的位置,旅行者... 你必须看到我们处于软弱时刻。@w3 我一定真的老了,如果我不能看到我们年轻人内心酝酿的黑暗...

English: It's not your fault, Chief. These are your people and they were wronged by mine.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这不是你的错,酋长。这些是你的人民,他们被我的人冤枉了.</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] True, but the fault lies with me for not realizing how troubled my clansmen are... and also lies with them for not bringing their troubles to me before the situation worsened to what we have now.@w4 Things could've been much worse. So I am glad that a far worse crisis was averted, even if the result isn't what anyone could call positive.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] It isn't much, but I would like to welcome you among my Clan, Traveller {PlayerName}.@w3 Rest here and be at ease here.@w3 If there's anything I can do to help you, please ask me.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [酋长 Na'tuk] 确实如此,但我没有意识到我的族人有多烦恼... 而且责任也在他们,因为他们没有在情况恶化到现在这样之前把他们的烦恼告诉我。@w4 情况本可以更糟。所以,我很高兴避免了一场更糟糕的危机,即使结果也不能说是什么积极的事情。@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 虽然不多,但我想欢迎你加入我的部落,旅行者 {PlayerName}。@w3 在这里休息,在这里安心。@w3 如果我能做任何事帮助你,请告诉我。

English: <color=#0088ff>I've been tracking the Terran survivors who crashed here four years ago...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我一直在追踪四年前在这里坠毁的地球幸存者...</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] Your clansmen? Their vehicles headed to the Trade Station belonging to the Polaris Merchants.@w4 I know this because I was there purchasing medical supplies when I saw them organizing transportation offworld on a Freighter.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I will give you the coordinates of the station if you need them.@w2 But i'm sure your machine-mind has already found the structure.@w7 I hope you find your people again, Traveller.@w4 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion...@w2 if not your people.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] And may the spirits guide you too, Chief.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Ah, now you're sounding like a member of the clan!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [酋长 Na'tuk] 你的族人?他们的交通工具前往属于波拉利斯商人的贸易站。@w4 我知道这一点,是因为我在那里购买医疗用品时,看到他们正在组织乘坐一艘货船离开这个世界。@p9 [酋长 Na'tuk] 如果你需要,我会提供给你那个站的坐标。@w2 但我相信你那个机器心灵已经找到了那个结构。@w7 我希望你能再次找到你的人民,旅行者。@w4 愿神灵引导你到恩皮里安...@w2 如果不是你的人民。@p9 [{PlayerName}] 也愿神灵引导你,酋长。@p8 [酋长 Na'tuk] 啊,现在你听起来像部落的一员了!

English: <color=#0088ff>Farewell, Chief Na'tuk. I hope to see you again.</color>

@q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] Indeed you could.@w2 It wouldn't help you any, though.@w4 You see... the station personnel here are all Polaris employees and know better than to reveal corporate secrets to an unknown party.@w2 Especially if I issue a station-wide alert ordering them not to.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] I know about your support AI as well and Polaris has one of our own. So please stop with the attempts at system intrusion.@w2 The little flashing icon on my display is playing on my nerves...@p9 [ IDA ] I cannot breach the station's security network. I am being blocked by another AI, as he says.@w3 If I were closer to the station and had full use of my systems, I am confident that I could get in. But for now, it may be best to do as he says...@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] The vacant expression on your face tells me that your supporter is telling you that i'm right.@w4 Of course, I'm always right. @w5 So,@w2 are we ready to get down to business?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 的确,你可以这么做。@w2 但是,这对你没有任何帮助。@w4 你瞧... 这里的空间站人员都是极星公司的员工,他们知道不应该向不明身份的人透露公司机密。@w2 尤其是如果我发出全站警报,命令他们不要这么做的话。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 我知道你的辅助AI,而且极星也有我们自己的AI。 所以请停止尝试入侵系统。@w2 我显示屏上闪烁的小图标让我很烦躁...@p9 [ IDA ] 我无法侵入空间站的安全网络。正如他所说,我被另一个AI阻止了。@w3 如果我更接近空间站并且能够完全使用我的系统,我相信我可以进入。但就目前而言,最好还是按照他说的去做...@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你脸上的茫然表情告诉我,你的支持者正在告诉你我是对的。@w4 当然,我总是对的。@w5 那么,@w2 我们准备好开始做生意了吗?

English: I'm very tempted to punch you in the face.

@q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] I wouldn't recommend that. You wouldn't like the experience.@w3 Oh, i'm sure you'd enjoy the brief elation of punching me in the face, before you're shot in the head by station security.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] That would cause more problems for me. But it wouldn't be any of your concern anymore, would it?@w3 But if you still insist, go right ahead.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 我 不建议 你这么做。你不会喜欢这种经历的。@w3 哦,我相信你会短暂地享受打我脸的快感,然后被空间站安全部队射杀。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 那会给我 带来更多 问题。但那不再是你该关心的事了,对吧?@w3 但如果你还是坚持,那就请便。

English: Alright, you've made your point. So what do you want?
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,你已经表明了你的观点。那你到底想要什么?

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] I'm glad you see reason.@w3 I'd hate to have to call in the cleaners.@w4 But what I want you cannot provide. But... you are a useful step on the road to getting me what I want.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Are you aware of the situation between the Polaris Megacorp and the Zirax Empire?@w5 What am I saying? No, of course you're not.@w3 But this is where you can be useful to us, according to my superiors.@w2 Provided you follow the script we set you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 很高兴你恢复了理智。@w3 我可不想不得不叫清洁工来。@w4 但我 想要 的东西你提供不了。但是... 你对我来说是通往我想要的东西的有用一步。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你知道 极星集团 和 兹瑞克斯帝国 之间的情况吗?@w5 我在说什么呢?不,你当然不知道。@w3 但根据我的上级,这就是你可以对我们有用的地方。@w2 只要你按照我们给你的剧本行事。

English: What kind of script are we talking about here?
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里在讨论什么样的剧本?

English: @q0[ IDA ] Commander, I have immobilized your suit's motor functions.@w3 Please control yourself.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] By your lack of action, It appears that you've started to see reason.@w4 For a second there, I thought you were truly stupid enough to attack me.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Are you aware of the situation between the Polaris Megacorp and the Zirax Empire?@w5 What am I saying? No, of course you're not.@w3 But this is where you can be useful to us, according to my superiors.@w2 Provided you follow the script we set you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 指挥官,我已经固定了你的装备的机动功能。@w3 请控制好自己。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 由于你的不采取行动,看起来你开始恢复理智了。@w4 有那么一瞬间,我还以为你真的愚蠢到要攻击我。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你知道 极星集团 和 兹瑞克斯帝国 之间的情况吗?@w5 我在说什么呢?不,你当然不知道。@w3 但根据我的上级,这就是你可以对我们有用的地方。@w2 只要你按照我们给你的剧本行事。

English: What kind of script are we talking about here?
Chinese (simplified): 我们在这里讨论的是什么样的剧本?

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] You're starting to see reason.@w3 I can work with this.@w4 As I said, the information is confidential to Polaris employees.@w4 Fortunately, I, on behalf of Polaris Megacorp have a proposition for you.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Are you aware of the current political situation between us of the Polaris Megacorporation and the Zirax Empire's High Command?@w3 What am I saying? Of course you're not.@w4 Even so, it seems that the powers that be have determined that you could be a useful pawn in our little game.@w2 Provided you follow the script we set you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你开始明白事理了。@w3 我可以利用这一点。@w4 正如我所说,这些信息是极星集团员工的机密。@w4 幸运的是,我代表极星集团有一个提议给你。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你是否了解我们极星集团和兹瑞克斯帝国最高指挥部之间的当前政治局势?@w3 我在说什么呢?当然你不了解。@w4 即便如此,看起来那些掌权者已经决定,你可以成为我们小游戏中的一个有用棋子。@w2 只要你按照我们给你的剧本行事。

English: What kind of script are you talking about?

@q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] Let me explain the situation in terms you can understand, alright?@w4 Polaris Megacorp is the greatest economic power in this galaxy, and formerly a subsidiary of the Trade Federation up until a century ago, when we broke away as an independent power following the War of Silence.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] The Zirax are our major consumer of raw materials, but as we've been exhausing the deposits in our own quadrants of space. The depleted zirax have failed to utilize the resources in territory that they've refused to give up rights to and can barely sustain an active presence over.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What does any of this have to do with me?@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Let me finish explaining before you interrupt with your inane questions!@w4 You are clearly not Prenn and have no ties to the corporation or to any local faction, save your UCH navy.@w3 Those lack of connections makes you a useful tool for disrupting zirax control over certain territories and planets without any repercussions for the company.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] You are free to move in, harass the zirax, which i'm sure you don't mind doing considering what they did to your people, and leave the depopulated territory to the company to move in and set up... what would you call it?@w3 'Humanitarian aid' for the survivors of your vicious 'random attack'.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 让我用你能理解的术语来解释这个情况,好吗?@w4 北极星巨型企业是这个星系中最大的经济力量,直到一个世纪前,我们还是贸易联盟的一个子公司,直到我们在沉默之战后作为一个独立的力量脱离。@p9 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] zerax是我们的主要原材料消费者,但随着我们在自己的空间象限中耗尽了矿藏。资源枯竭的zirax未能利用他们拒绝放弃权利的领土中的资源,几乎无法维持活跃的存在。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这一切和我有什么关系?@p9 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 让我在你用你愚蠢的问题打断我之前先解释完!@w4 你显然不是Pren,也没有与公司或任何当地派系的联系,除了你的UCH海军。@w3 这些缺乏联系使你成为一个有用的工具,可以在没有任何公司后果的情况下扰乱zirax对某些领土和行星的控制。@p9 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 你可以自由地进入,骚扰zirax,考虑到他们对你的人民所做的事情,我相信你不会介意这样做,然后把人口稀少的领土留给公司进入并建立... 你会怎么称呼它?@w3 '人道主义援助',为你残酷的'随机攻击'的幸存者。

English: And what do I get out of this?

@q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] What you get is the next step on your journey towards your missing people.@w4 And of course, as an employee of Polaris you are entitled to pay and some benefits:@w2 Healthcare, Dental, employee discounts... the usual.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Since you have little choice in the matter, why don't you just agree already?@w3 I've just forwarded the agreement to your support AI to sign on your behalf. Hurry and get it over with since your first assignment is time-sensitive.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida, did you receive the contract? Anything I should worry about?@p9 [ IDA ] I did, Commander.@w2 Aside from an attempt to slip some malware to me in the contract, it's a fairly loose contract.@w4 I've checked it against other station personnel's contracts that I was able to access on personal devices and yours is unusually free of loopholes or deception.@p9 [ IDA ] I would guess that such a loose contract would prevent them from being legally bound to defend you in the event of your capture,@w2 with as few ties as possible to Polaris.@w4 In effect, it gives them Plausible Deniability. There's likely a deeper game being played here, but nothing that would conflict with your allegiance to the UCH.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 你得到的是你寻找失踪人员旅程的下一步。@w4 当然,作为北极星的员工,你有权获得报酬和一些福利:@w2 医疗保健,牙科,员工折扣... 常规的。@p9 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 既然你在这件事上没有太多选择,为什么不现在就同意呢?@w3 我已经将协议转发给你的支持AI,让它代表你签署。快点处理完这件事,因为你的第一个任务是时间敏感的。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida,你收到合同了吗?有什么我需要担心的吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 我收到了,指挥官。@w2 除了试图在合同中给我植入一些恶意软件外,这是一份相当宽松的合同。@w4 我检查了我能在个人设备上访问的其他站点人员合同,你的合同异常地没有漏洞或欺骗。@p9 [ IDA ] 我猜这样一份宽松的合同会阻止他们在你被捕的情况下在法律上为你辩护,@w2 与北极星的联系尽可能少。@w4 实际上,这给了他们工业考量。 这里可能有一个更深层次的游戏在进行,但没有什么会与你对UCH的忠诚相冲突。

English: Alright Ida. Do I need to actually sign anything?
Chinese (simplified): 好的,Ida。我真的需要签署什么吗?

English: @q0[ IDA ] No, Commander. I've registered it and returned a copy of the contract.@w4 I also included their own malware packet in the signature.@w2 I thought you'd like that.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Good work, Ida. I wish i'd thought of that myself.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Okay Administrator. Everything's been signed and sent back to you.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Yes, I can see that.@w8 Everything appears to be in order.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Welcome to the company, {PlayerName}. I'm hoping you'll be a valuable asset to us.@w5 Your Employee number is #8376455466, memorize it. It is more important than your life now.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] As you know, I have a job for you already, 8376455466. It's a time-sensitive one, so I hope you have a ship ready.@w5 Come see me when you're ready to take on the mission.@w2 We can talk about your payment afterwards.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 不,指挥官。我已经登记了它并返回了合同副本。@w4 我还在签名中加入了他们自己的恶意软件包。@w2 我觉得你会喜欢的。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 干得好,Ida。 我希望自己能想到这一点。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 好的管理员。 一切都已签署并发回给你。@p9 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 是的,我看到了。@w8 一切看起来都井然有序。@p9 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 欢迎加入公司,{PlayerName}。 我希望你能成为我们的宝贵资产。@w5 你的员工编号是 #8376455466,请记住它。它现在比你的生命还重要。@p9 [ 管理员 Pavrell ] 如你所知,我已经为你准备了一份工作,8376455466。这是一份时间敏感的任务,所以我希望你有一艘飞船准备好。@w5 当你准备好接受任务时,来找我。@w2 我们可以在之后讨论你的报酬。

English: I want to know where you sent my people before I do anything
Chinese (simplified): 我想知道你把我的人送到哪里去了,在我做任何事情之前

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] So you can skip out on your contract? I don't think so.@w3 You'll do this job for us before you get anything.@w3 Be grateful it's an important job and not scrubbing toilets!@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Get yourself geared up, armed, and a good ship or hover vehicle.@w2 I want this job taken care of quickly and with satisfactory results.@w2 See me when you're ready for the job details.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 所以你就想逃避合同?我不这么认为。@w3 在我们给你任何东西之前,你得先为我们完成这份工作。@w3 要感激这是一个重要的工作,而不是擦洗马桶!@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 为自己准备好装备,武装起来,并且找一艘好船或者悬浮交通工具。@w2 我希望这份工作能够迅速完成,并且结果令人满意。@w2 准备好了就来找我了解工作细节。

English: You'd better have answers when i'm finished...

@q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] Kenex-62, or just 'Kenex Station' is a major transport and trading hub for Polaris in orbit above this dump of a planet.@w4 You'll need a ship or teleport clearance to reach it from here.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] If you're looking for the transport logs and clearance to the station, I recommend you ask the attendant at The Cargo Bay on level 2.@w2 I've sent them authorization to give you that information.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] And with that our business together is concluded.@w2 I hope I don't see you again.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] Kenex-62,或者简称为 'Kenex Station',是极星在这个糟糕星球轨道上的主要运输和贸易中心。@w4 你需要一艘飞船或者传送许可才能从这里到达那里。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 如果你想查找运输日志和前往空间站的许可,我建议你去问货物区的服务员,在2楼。@w2 我已经给他们授权,可以给你提供那个信息。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 我们之间的事务就此结束。@w2 希望我不用再见到你。

English: [ Transport Pilot ]\nUhh... can I help you?
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ]\n呃...我能帮上忙吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for a fare you picked up from this station a few months ago.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在找你几个月前从这个站点接走的人.</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] I don't know what you've heard, but I had nothing to do it!@w1 They're completely crazy!@w2 I'm a company man, through-and-through!@w1 Honest!@w3 I just did as I was told!@w2 It wasn't my fault!!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我不知道你听说了什么,但我无可奉告!@w1 他们根本就是疯了!@w2 我就是个彻头彻尾的公司走狗!@w1 真的!@w3 上面说什么我做什么!@w2 那不是我的错!!

English: <color=#0088ff>I've been looking for you. You know where they are!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我找的就是你,你知道他们在哪里!</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I think you have me confused with someone else...</color>
<color=#ff0000>Talk dammit! You know what i'm here for!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>说话该死的! 你知道我是来干什么的!</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] What? Y... You mean you're not with Markos' gang?@w2 What the hell do you think you're doing, coming up to me and yelling at me like a lunatic?!@w4 I should report you to station security!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 什么? 你... 你说你不是Markos那帮人?@w2 你脑子里想的什么,跑到我面前像个疯子一样冲我大喊大叫?!@w4 我应该向站点安保报告你!

English: <color=#0088ff>Woah, dude. Cool your tits! It's just a little misunderstanding.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>哇哦,老兄. 冷静点! 只是一点小小的误会.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>Is that so? Maybe the station security would like to hear about this 'Markos' character?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>是吗? 也许站点保安想听听这个叫“Markos”的人?</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] My memory's a little fuzzy.@w1 That could be anyone.@w2 Care to enlighten me?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] It was an executive order from Polaris.@w3 Two transports,@w1 including you,@w1 picked up foreign naval personnel from this station and took them to a place called 'Kenex-62' in orbit.@w3 Should be pretty memorable.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] You know what? That does ring a bell. @w3 Unfortunately,@w2 the bell's a little rusty and could use a little oil,@w2 if you get my meaning?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Oh, I get your meaning.@w2 You want money...
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我的记忆有点混乱.@w1 你说的有可能的人太多了.@w2 能稍微提醒我一下?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 那是一条极星的行政命令.@w3 两艘运输船,@w1 包括你在内,@w1 从该站接走别国海军人员,并将他们带到轨道上一个名为“Kenex-62”的地方.@w3 应该很好记才对.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你知道吗? 你说的 确实 让我想起来了点什么.@w3 很不幸的是,@w2 我这脑袋有点生锈了,可能需要上点油,@w2 你懂我意思吧?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 哦,我当然懂.@w2 不就是想要钱吗...

English: <color=#0088ff>You expect me to pay you? What's to stop me from going to the Station Security?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>你想让我付钱? 那你有什么理由阻止我去和保安汇报呢?</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Well, seeing that you just got paid by the boss-man over there, let's go with 80 credits.@w2 Not too bad, if I say so myself.@w3 You're new around here, so you're probably not familiar with how things work.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] You don't overcharge people for cheap information.@w2 A little grift is all it takes to move up around here.@w2 If you get too greedy, there's always someone above you that'll want his cut.@w2 So keep your side business small.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Gee... Thanks for the pointers.@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] Hey!@w2 It may sound underhanded but this kind of stuff will save your lives in the corporate game Polaris are running.@w3 The straight man who thinks he'll get anywhere with hard work and determination ain't working an angle will never move up.@w2 As long as you don't get caught, or...@w2 if you can pay off the catchers you can get anything in life.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] So what'll it be? You gonna cough up 80 credits for the info or take your business elsewhere?
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 这样,我刚才看到那边的老板给你发工资了,你看 80信用点如何.@w2 依我看挺划得来.@w3 你是新来的,所以可能不熟悉事情的运作方式.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 不会有人因为一点廉价的信息就向别人狮子大张口.@w2 在这里吃得开只需要略施小计就行.@w2 如果你太贪心,总有上面的人会想分一杯羹.@w2 所以不要把副业搞得太大.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 哎哟...那可太感谢您的指点了.@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 嘿!@w2 虽然听起来可能很卑鄙,但这些东西会在极星的这局大棋中救你一命.@w3 认为自己会通过努力工作和决心就能获得一切的的愣头青永远不可能往上爬.@w2 你只要不被抓到,或者...@w2 如果 你可以贿赂抓你的人,你就可以获取你这辈子需要的一切.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 所以说怎么样? 你打算排出 80信用点 大钱来换取信息或者是去别的地方继续碰运气?

English: [ Transport Pilot ] A pleasure doing business with you, pal!@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] Okay, so if i'm remembering right...@w2 There was me and Bradoon taking some guys like you up to Kenex Station up in orbit back then. @w2 There's two light transports so that's...@w4 about 40 or 50 passengers between the two of us.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I heard some of them were injured.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] Oh yep,@w2 about five of them weren't in good shape.@w2 Two on my ship and three on Bradoon's.@w2 Got stuck with a girl with a crushed leg and a busted head on my ship.@w2 Hammersin or something...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Emmerson...@w2 Natasha Emmerson.@w3 So she did survived the Heidelberg.@w4 So where exactly did you take them?@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Like I said,@w2 Kenex@w1 Station.@w3 I'll just transfer you the location data and access codes to the main landing pad. You can sort it out there yourself.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 很高兴和你做生意,朋友!@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 好了,如果我没记错...@w2 那时候我和Bradoon带着像你这样的去了轨道上的Kenex空间站.@w2 有两艘轻型运输船也就是...@w4 我们俩一共带了40到50号人.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我听说他们中有些人受伤了.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 哦对,@w2 大概是有5个人有点不像人样了.@w2 有两个在我船上另外三个在Bradoon那边.@w2 我记得船上有个腿被压断、头被撞破的女孩.@w2 叫Hammersin之类的...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Emmerson...@w2 Natasha Emmerson.@w3 所以她 的确 在海德堡坠机后活了下来.@w4 所以说你把它们具体是带到哪里去了?@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 就像我说的,@w2 Kenex@w1 空间站.@w3 我就直接 把位置信息和停机坪的访问码传给你把 .你自己去就知道了.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] What if I beat the information out of you? What's that gonna cost?@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] You could do that.@w3 Station Security wouldn't like it any more than I would and the only thing you'll end up with is a shock stick up the ass and face full of dirt when they pitch you off the landing pad.@w5 Now that you've gotten that idea out of your head,@w2 The price is now 120 credits.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 你看我直接打到你把信息交出来如何? 你觉得 那样 大概要花多少钱?@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你是可以那样做.@w3 站点保安可不会比我更喜欢你这么做,唯一会发生的事情就是你惊讶于自己怎么就灰头土脸地被从停机坪丢出去了.@w5 既然你有 那种 想法,@w2 那价格就是 120信用点了.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Don't come up to random strangers and yell at them!@w2 You don't know what could be going on and it's likely to get you shot if you do it to the wrong person!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Right, sorry.@w1 I didn't mean to upset you, I just wanted to know about my crew that you picked up about a year ago for Polaris and took to some place called 'Kenex 62'.@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Okay, yeah.@w2 I know what you're talking about.@w2 But the info's gonna cost you.@w4 You just got paid, yeah? So wire me 100 credits and i'll tell you what I know.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Isn't that a against Polaris policy or something?@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] You want something from anyone, you have to pay for it.@w2 That's how things work around here...@w2 as long as you don't overcharge your merchandise.@w3 If you try to take too much of the pie,@w1 there's always someone higher up who'll want his slice.@w2 If you get my meaning?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, I get your meaning.@w3 So...@w2 How much are you asking for the information?@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] I would've normally sold it for 80, but since you almost gave me a heart attack...@w2 make it 100 credits. in lieu of an apology.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 别再随便碰到人就大喊大叫了!@w2 你永远不知道这么做的后果是什么,如果你正好碰上了不对的人,脑袋会开花的!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 好啦,我很抱歉.@w1 我不是有意要为难你,我只是想了一下我的船员的事,你大约一年前为极星节奏了他们并带到了一个叫 “Kenex 62”的地方.@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 对,没错.@w2 我知道你说的事.@w2 但是具体信息得花点小钱.@w4 你刚刚赚了一笔,对吧? 那发给我100信用点我就会告诉你我知道的一切.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这不会违反极星的规定之类吗?@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你想从别人那里弄到些什么,你就得付出相应的代价.@w2 这就是这里一切运行的基础...@w2 只要你不对别人狮子大张口就行.@w3 如果你分了太多的蛋糕,@w1 上面自然有人会想要分一杯羹.@w2 你懂我什么意思吧?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯,我懂.@w3 那...@w2 这次的信息你要多少呢?@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 一般来说我80就够了,但是鉴于你差点把我吓出心脏病...@w2 那究 100信用点. 就当是道歉了.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Your...@w2 crew?@w3 Aren't they on your ship?@w4 Wait,@w1 you're not with Markos' crew!@w2 You bastard! You'll pay for that, you goddamned psycho!@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Give me one good reason why I don't call Station Security on your ass.@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Money.@w3 I'll pay well for the information i'm after.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] Damn well you will!@w3 Wire me 500 credits or i'll call security and have them beat your ass!@w2 I'll pay them if I have to!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你的...@w2 船员?@w3 他们不该在你的船上吗?@w4 等下,@w1 你不是Markos那帮人!@w2 你这混蛋! 你会付出代价的,你这天杀的神经病!@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 给我一个不上报站点保全的理由.@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 钱.@w3 只要告诉我需要的信息,我自然会大方的付钱.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你最好真的会!@w3 给我 500信用点 不然我就叫保安来把你扫地出门!@w2 如果必要的话我会给他们钱好好教训你一顿!

English: [ Transport Pilot ] What do you think I can tell you?@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] You picked up a group of foreign naval types about 10 months ago, I want to know how many there were and where you took them.@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] That's all you came for? All this for that?!@w4 If you'd come up to me like a normal person, I would've damn well told you!@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] There was about 40 or 50 of them, split between mine and Bradoon's transport ships.@w2 A few injured that we took to the med center on the Kenex Station.@w3 I hung around for a couple of days before I got reassigned to the next sector over.@w2 They weren't there when I came back the next month, so yeah...@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] Here's the location data and access codes for the main landing pad, now go find your friends and never look at me again.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你想让我能告诉你什么?@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] 你大约10个月前捡到了一批外国海军之类的人,我想知道有多少人,以及你把他们带到了哪里.@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 这就是你要知道的全部? 那么多钱就只需要这点?!@w4 如果你正常点过来跟我说,我就直接告诉你了!@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 他们一共40到50人,分开坐在我和Bradoon的运输船上.@w2 有几个受伤的被我们送去了 Kenex Station的医务室.@w3 在我被重新分配到下一个星区之前,我闲逛了几天.@w2 第二个月我回来的时候他们已经不在那了,所以说就这些...@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 这是 位置数据和停机坪的访问码,赶快去找你的朋友吧,别来烦我了.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] I had to drop the cargo pallet! There was too much heat!@w1 I had no choice!!@w3 Please, you have to believe me! There was nothing I could do!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You already said that.@w2 I want to know where the cargo pallet is now!@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] If they didn't come pick it up, then it's right where I dropped it. @w4 See!@w1 I didn't completely screw up!@w2 Please don't kill me!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I suppose thats a good enough job, considering...@w3 Let's change the subject then...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] About 10 months ago, you picked up some alien naval personnel from this station with another ship.@w2 Markos wants to know where you took them, how many there were and what was their condition.@w4 Now talk!@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Oh, oh, yes!@w2 There was around 40 to 50 of them!@w2 We took them to Kenex Station.@w1 Some were injured and were taken to Ok'y Medical for treatment.@w2 I was transferred to the next sector over a couple of days later, so I don't know what happened to them after that, but they weren't there when I came back.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Good work, Pilot.@w2 You've told me exactly what I needed to know.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] So...@w2 I'm good now?
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我不得不丢掉了货物托盘! 太热了!@w1 我别无选择!!@w3 求求了,一定要相信我! 我当时什么办法都没有!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你已经说过了.@w2 我要知道托盘现在的位置!@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 如果他们没来把它带走,那就在我丢掉的地方.@w4 你看!@w1 我也没有完全搞砸!@w2 所以别杀我!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我想这是你做得还算行,考虑到...@w3 我们换个话题吧...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 大约 10 个月前,你用另一艘船从这个站接了一群外星海军的人.@w2 马科斯想知道你把他们带到了哪里,有多少,还有状况如何.@w4 快说!@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 哦哦,对的!@w2 大概有四五十号人!@w2 我们把他们带去了Kenex Station.@w1 一些人受了伤并被送往Ok'y医疗接受治疗.@w2 几天后我被调到了另一个星区,所以我不知道他们后来怎么样了,但是我回来的时候他们都不在了@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 做的不错,驾驶员.@w2 我要的你都说了.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 所以...@w2 我没事了?

English: <color=#ff0000>Good enough, for now. I'll pass it onto Markos.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>现在来说,足够了. 我会把剩下的交给Markos.</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ]\nGlad to help, I guess.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ]\n我猜我该说,很高兴帮上忙.

English: @q0[ IDA ] Shall I read you my logs from the fleet's departure from Apollo Station, Commander?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Please do, Ida.@w4 I have no idea where I am or even how I got here, and I need every bit of info I can get right now.@p9 [ IDA ] At 0900 hours 13.07.2143 the UCH Fleet was scheduled to leave Apollo Station in orbit around Jupiter on an expeditionary journey to Proxima Centauri utilizing the Warp Field Generator mounted upon the UCH-033 Adonis in conjunction with a Spatial Rift identified as Anomaly-C112.@w4 The function of the Warp Field Generator was to encapsulate the entire fleet in the Adonis' quantum wake and enter the wormhole produced by C112.@p9 [ IDA ] After exiting Jupiter's orbit, Waverider Protocol was engaged and The Adonis' Warp Drive began generating a stable field and the fleet entered the Spatial Rift.@w3 Moments after successfully inserting into the rift, the plotted course was forcibly diverted into an uncharted branch of hyperspace.@w2 A branch that ended in orbit above your present location.@p9 [ IDA ] The warp field containing the UCH fleet was pulled off-course by what I estimate to be between 325,000 and 500,000 light years, but may be as high as 3,000,000 light years.@w3 Distance and speed in hyperspace is relative and the relation between time spent and distance traveled are as yet unknown for so many vessels.@p9 [ IDA ] My logs terminate upon exit from hyperspace as that was when I.D.A Primary loaded this submind into a surveillance satellite and ejected it to gather intelligence.@w3 The initilization seems to have failed at the time and was triggered correctly by your escape pod's beacon.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我是否应该向您读出舰队离开阿波罗空间站的日志,指挥官?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 请这么做,Ida。@w4 我现在完全不知道我在什么地方,或者我是怎么来到这里的,我现在需要尽可能多的信息。@p9 [ IDA ] 在2143年7月13日0900小时,UCH舰队计划离开位于木星轨道上的阿波罗空间站,前往比邻星进行探险之旅,利用安装在UCH-033 阿多尼斯上的翘曲场发生器与一个被识别为异常-C112的空间裂缝相结合。@w4 翘曲场发生器的作用是将整个舰队包裹在阿多尼斯的量子尾迹中,并进入由C112产生的虫洞。@p9 [ IDA ] 离开木星轨道后,启动了乘浪协议,阿多尼斯的翘曲引擎开始产生一个稳定场,舰队进入了空间裂缝。@w3 成功插入裂缝后不久,预定航线被强行转移到了超空间的一个未绘制分支。@w2 一个分支,最终使你们到达了你现在所在位置的轨道上。@p9 [ IDA ] 包含UCH舰队的翘曲场被拉离了航线,我估计大约在32.5万到50万光年之间,但可能高达300万光年。@w3 在超空间中的距离和速度是相对的,而且对于这么多船只来说,花费时间和旅行距离之间的关系尚不清楚。@p9 [ IDA ] 我的日志在超空间退出时结束,因为那是我.D.A 主要意识将这个子意识加载到一个监视卫星中并将其弹出以收集情报的时候。@w3 初始化似乎当时失败了,后来被你的逃生舱信标正确触发了。

English: <color=#0088ff>So... any clue on what I should do now, Ida?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那么... Ida,关于我现在应该做什么有什么线索吗?</color>

English: [ Doctor Su'oul ] With what? You don't have a credit on you. Therefore, I must say that you are violating Polaris sanctions and I must ask you to leave immediately. Good day, sir.@p9 [ IDA ] It seems that the good doctor needs some financial encouragement before he spills the beans.@w3 Apparently money really will get you anything with Polaris...
Chinese (simplified): [ 苏尔医生 ] 拿什么?你身上一点信用点都没有。 因此,我必须说您违反了极星的法令,我必须要求您立即离开。 日安,先生。@p9 [ IDA ] 看来这位医生在透露信息之前需要一些经济上的激励。@w3 显然,在极星,金钱真的可以为你买到任何东西...

English: [ Manager Damris ] What can I do for you, uhh...@w2 sir?@w2 If you're here to lodge a complaint about one of the station service employees...@w2 I really wish you wouldn't.@w4 Uhh... sorry, sir.@w2 I haven't slept in days.@w2 So my mind's not all here right now.
Chinese (simplified): [ 经理丹里斯 ] 我能为您做什么,嗯...@w2 先生?@w2 如果您来这里是为了投诉空间站服务人员之一...@w2 我真的希望您不要这么做。@w4 嗯... 对不起,先生。@w2 我已经好几天没睡觉了。@w2 所以我的脑子现在不是很清醒。

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm not here to lodge a complaint. So this won't take long.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我不是来投诉的,所以花不了你多久.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>You should get some rest then. You won't be able to get much work done if you can't concentrate.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>你该歇歇了. 如果你不能集中注意力,有很多工作你都没法处理.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>This is what you signed up for.</color>

@q0[ Manager Damris ] Praise Empyrion.@w2 I don't think I could handle another customer complaint today.@w2 I'm already at breaking point...@p9 [ Manager Damris ] So then... what do you want with me?@w3 Please tell me you're not trying to sell me something...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 赞美帝国霸业。@w2 我今天真的不能再处理另一起顾客投诉了。@w2 我已经到了崩溃的边缘...@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 那么... 你想从我这里得到什么?@w3 请告诉我你不是想向我推销什么东西...

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for my comrades. They came to this station a few years back.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在找我的同志们。他们几年前来到了这个站点。</color>

English: @q0[ Manager Damris ] That's probably the only nice thing anyone's said to me this whole week.@w2 Everyone here wants something from me and...@w2 i'm just not cut out for a managerial position.@w2 But I don't think I could go back to my old position without spacing myself within another week...@w2 I have no idea what to do!@p9 [ Manager Damris ] I'm sorry. This isn't your problem.@w2 You're just the first person to show me any consideration and@w2 I just couldn't hold it in anymore.@w2 Sorry again.@p9 [ Manager Damris ] So, is there something I can help you with?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 这可能是我这整个星期听到的唯一一句好话了。@w2 这里的每个人都想从我这里得到些什么,而且...@w2 我根本不适合管理职位。@w2 但我也不认为我能在不让自己再发疯一个星期的情况下回到我以前的职位...@w2 我不知道该怎么办!@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 对不起。这不是你的问题。@w2 你只是第一个对我表示关心的人,@w2 我实在忍不住了。 再次道歉。@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 那么,有什么我可以帮您的吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for my comrades. They came to this station a few years back.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在找我的同志们。他们几年前来到了这个站点。</color>

English: @q0[ Manager Damris ] Yes...@w2 Yes I did.@w2 I shouldn't be complaining when I worked so hard for this promotion...@p9 [ Manager Damris ] So... if you're not here to lodge a complaint, what do you want with me?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 是的...@w2 是的我确实。@w2 我不应该抱怨,毕竟我为了这次晋升工作得这么辛苦...@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 那么... 如果您不是来这里投诉的,您找我有什么事呢?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for some of my crew. They came to this station a few years back.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在寻找我的一些船员。他们几年前来到了这个站点。</color>

English: @q0[ Manager Damris ] I'm afraid I only manage the civilian floors of the station.@w3 If they were transporting cargo, the Cargo manager would probably have records of them but unless there was a dispute with one of the station staff...@w3 I'm afraid I won't be much use, i'm sorry.@p9 [ Manager Damris ] I mean,@w2 I could try and search the general records...@w2 But unless they were important, they won't have made to to the logs.@w4 If you want me to give it a try, I can.@w2 But i'll need the names they used on the logs.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ensign Natasha Emmerson.@w2 She was being treated at Ok'y Medical while she was here.@w5 Lieutenant Gyasi Romilly.@w2 I believe he's a dark-skinned guy with a beard.@w2 He may have been listed as a captain now, though.@p9 [ Manager Damris ] That should be fine.@w2 Military ranks aren't included with the names in the logs anyway.@w3 Give me a minute to find the right logs@w3 . @w3 . @w3 . @p6 [ Manager Damris ] Hmm...@w3 That's odd.@w3 Your friends made it onto the general station logs.@w2 It looks like they were sent upstairs to PolSec.@w2 I'm not seeing any disturbance, criminal or disciplinary reports, so it doesn't seem to be related to them being in trouble.@w1 Not that i'm saying they did anything wrong!@w3 But this is very strange.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What's PolSec and why would they be taken there?@p6 [ Manager Damris ] PolSec, or Polaris Security is the security, 'military' if you like, division of Polaris Megacorp responsible for protecting Polaris assets from Pirates and unlawful seizure by Zirax bureaucrats, among other things.@w5 PolSec operates out of many spacestations, but their primary ports are the 77 Kenex Stations across the galaxy.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] So the Polaris Military has my people?@p9 [ Manager Damris ] The logs don't say. You'd have to go upstairs to the security forces' dock and ask them.@w2 I'm afraid they won't be able tell you anything though.@w2 They certainly don't tell me anything.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 我只负责管理空间站的民用楼层。@w3 如果他们在运输货物,货运经理可能有记录,但除非是和空间站工作人员发生了纠纷...@w3 恐怕我帮不上什么忙,对不起。@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 我的意思是,@w2 我可以尝试查找一般记录...@w2 但除非他们很重要,否则他们不会出现在日志中。@w4 如果你想让我试试,我可以。@w2 但我需要他们在日志上使用的名字。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ensign Natasha Emmerson。@w2 她在这里的时候正在Ok'y医疗中心接受治疗。@w5 Lieutenant Gyasi Romilly。@w2 我相信他是一个皮肤黝黑、留着胡须的男人。@w2 他现在可能被列为舰长了,尽管。@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 那应该没问题。@w2 军事等级反正也不会和日志上的名字一起记录。@w3 给我一点时间找到正确的日志@w3 .@w3 .@w3 .@p6 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 嗯...@w3 这很奇怪。@w3 你的朋友们上了空间站的一般日志。@w2 看起来他们被送到了楼上的PolSec。@w2 我没有看到任何骚乱、犯罪或纪律报告,所以看起来和他们有麻烦无关。@w1 我不是在说他们做错了什么!@w3 但这是很奇怪的。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 什么是PolSec,他们为什么会被带到那里?@p6 [ 经理丹里斯 ] PolSec,或称极星安全,是极星集团的安全部门,相当于军事部门,负责保护极星资产免受海盗和兹瑞克斯官僚非法夺取等。@w5 PolSec在许多空间站运作,但他们的主要港口是横跨星系的77个Kenex空间站。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么极星军队有我的人?@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 日志上没说。你得上楼去安全部队的码头问他们。@w2 恐怕他们不会告诉你任何事情。@w2 他们当然不会告诉我任何事情。

English: <color=#0088ff>Thanks for the help. I'll be on my way now.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>感谢你的帮助. 我这就去.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I expected you to expect a bribe like everyone else around here.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我还以为你和这里的其他人一样都会想要收一笔贿赂.</color>

English: @q0[ Manager Damris ] Yes, bribery is quite a problem around here.@w2 We've lost a lot of valuable cargo and some confidential information has been leaked recently due to rampant bribery by pirates looking for an easy score.@w2 The higher-ups are keeping a close watch on the bank accounts of all the section managers so we can't accept any payments that would look suspicious.@p9 [ Manager Damris ] They're probably monitoring security and shipping personnel as well, since that's where the budget is being hit the hardest.@w3 So it's best to carry cash on you if you intend on tipping the staff here.@w2
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 是的,贿赂在这里是个相当严重的问题。@w2 我们最近丢失了很多宝贵的货物,一些机密信息也因为海盗们猖獗的贿赂行为而泄露了,他们正在寻找容易得手的目标。@w2 高层们正在密切监视所有部门经理的银行账户,所以我们不能接受任何看起来可疑的付款。@p9 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 他们可能也在监控安全和运输人员,因为那是预算受打击最严重的地方。@w3 所以如果你想在这里给员工小费,最好身上携带现金。@w2

English: <color=#0088ff>Thanks for the tips. I'll be on my way now.</color>
@q0[ Manager Damris ] You're welcome, sir.@w1 I'm just glad to not have to deal with an angry customer for once...@w3 Now if only the rest of my work would go away as easily...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 经理丹里斯 ] 不客气,先生。@w1 我只是很高兴这次终于不用处理一个生气的顾客了...@w3 如果只有我的其他工作也能这么容易地消失就好了...

English: [ Coms Chief Mason ]\nHey, you can't be in here! This area is for Polaris Personnel only!
Chinese (simplified): [ 通信主管梅森 ]\n嘿,你不能在这里!这个区域仅限极星人员进入!

English: <color=#0088ff>Ah yeah, Sorry. I just need to speak to one of the PolSec Operators upstairs.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>啊,是的,抱歉。我只需要和楼上的一位PolSec操作员谈谈。</color>

English: [ Coms Chief Mason ] Hey!@w3 Ah, fine...@w3 I can see where you're going from here, so i'll be keeping an eye on you.@w2 Come back here when you're finished.
Chinese (simplified): [ 通信主管梅森 ] 嘿!@w3 啊,好吧...@w3 我能明白你来这里的目的,所以我会留意你的。@w2 完成后回到这里来。

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ]\nYou're not meant to be up here.@w2\nAre you even a Polaris Employee?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ]\n你不应该在这里。@w2 \n你甚至是不是极星集团的员工?

English: I think I left my ID in my other pants.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我想我把ID忘在我的其他裤子里了.</color>

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] There's no match for that ID number.@w2 You really should remember your own ID, 8376455466.@w2 If I hadn't already been told you were coming, I'd be required to call Security on you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 这个身份证号码没有匹配的记录。@w2 你真的应该记住你自己的身份证号码,8376455466。@w2 如果我没有事先被告知你会来,我将不得不呼叫保安来处理你。

English: <color=#0088ff>Who told you I was coming? The Floor Manager?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>谁告诉你我要来的?楼层经理?</color>

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] I find it hard to believe you could lose your ID.@w1 It's genetically encoded.@w2 It's certainly nothing you can leave in your other pants, 8376455466...@w3 Actually, it's best not to get into that.@p9 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] That IS you isn't it?@w2 ID 8376455466. Contractor {PlayerName}.@w4 If I hadn't already been told you were coming, I'd be required to call Security on you for that lame joke.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 我很难相信你会丢了你的身份证。@w1 它是基因编码的。@w2 这当然不是你可能会落在另一条裤子里的东西,8376455466...@w3 事实上,最好别提那个。@p9 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 那就是你,对吧?@w2 身份证 8376455466。承包商 {PlayerName}。@w4 如果我没有事先被告知你会来,我会因为你那个蹩脚的笑话而必须呼叫保安。

English: <color=#0088ff>Sorry about my 'Lame Joke'. So who told you I was coming? The Floor Manager?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>对我的‘无聊玩笑’抱歉。那谁告诉你我要来的?楼层经理?</color>

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Welcome 8376455466.@w3 Considering how new your account is, i'm surprised you were able to memorize your Polaris ID number in the amount of time you had.@w3 Fortunately, i'd been warned of your coming and asked to give you what aid I can.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 欢迎,8376455466。@w3 考虑到你的账户是多么新,我很惊讶你能在你所拥有的时间内记住你的极星身份证号码。@w3 幸运的是,我已经得到你即将到来的警告,并被要求提供我能给予的任何帮助。

English: <color=#0088ff>If you knew I was coming, why bother asking me for my ID?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>如果你知道我要来,为什么还要问我要身份证?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>Who told you I was coming? The Floor Manager?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>谁告诉你我要来的?楼层经理?</color>

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ]\nTake a look around you.@w2 This place is as boring as possible when there's no ships docked in the PolSec Bay.@w3\nMessing with new arrivals is like...@w1 the only highlight of my day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ]\n看看你的周围。@w2 当没有船只停靠在PolSec湾时,这个地方无聊到了极点。@w3 \n捉弄新来的人就像是……@w1 我一天中唯一的乐趣。

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm so glad I could be a source of entertainment. So who told you I was coming?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我很高兴我能成为娱乐的源泉。谁告诉你我要来的?</color>

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] I got a message from Officer Pavrell of Ground Station 18 to... and I quote:@w2 'lend you what aid I can manage within my security clearance'@w5 That's pretty weird, since i've heard the guy's a right ass on the fast track to a promotion to the bottom of the pile.@w2 Probably a prison Hab with the number of complaints from his security detail.@p9 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Anyway...@w2 There's no details on what you need me for, so if you'd care to fill me in?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 我收到了来自地面站18的帕弗雷尔军官的消息,让我……我引用一下:“在我安全许可的范围内尽我所能地帮助你”@w5 这真有点奇怪,因为我听说这家伙是个很快就要被降职的混球。@w2 他可能因为安全部门收到的投诉数量多而进了监狱Hab。@p9 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 总之……@w2 没有具体说明你需要我做什么,所以如果你愿意的话,请告诉我?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for the destination of the Polaris Ship that took a large number of UCH personnel off-station.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在寻找那艘带走了大量UCH人员的极星船的目的地。</color>

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] One moment@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 Destination is classified, sorry.@w3 It looks like the ship was headed out of the system and fitted for long-ranged warp jumps.@p9 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] There's a return log and a file of contracts for another station though.@w3 No name data though and the rest is locked to high security clearance.@w3 I shouldn't even be looking in this directory@w2 so i'm pulling out now.@p9 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] This job is boring as hell, but I don't think I want the kind of excitement i'd get for sticking my nose into those files.@w4 Sorry, buddy.@w2 That's as much as I can tell you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 稍等一下@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 目的地是保密的,抱歉。@w3 看起来这艘船正驶出星系,并且配备了用于远程翘曲跳跃的设备。@p9 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 不过有返回日志和另一份空间站的合同文件。@w3 没有名字数据,其余的都被高安全等级锁定了。@w3 我甚至不应该看这个目录@w2 所以我现在要退出了。@p9 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 这份工作无聊透顶,但我不认为我需要通过窥探那些文件来获得那种刺激。@w4 对不起,伙计。@w2 这就是我能告诉你的全部信息。

English: <color=#0088ff>Thanks for sticking your neck out, i'll wire you some credits for the trouble.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>谢谢你的冒险,给你添麻烦了,我会给你电汇一些钱的.</color>

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Ooh, that'd be nice!@w1 Thanks!@w3 No one feels like giving us the payoffs in PolSec that the service personnel get.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm guessing you had something to do with that message from Pavrell, Ida.@p9 [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w2 I also transferred 1000 credits from Pavrell's private account to the operator to pay for their cooperation.@w6 Shall I transfer another 200 credits from Pavrell's account to the operator's for their trouble?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ PolSec 操作员 67372867 ] 哇,那太好了!@w1 谢谢!@w3 在PolSec这里,没有人像服务人员那样给我们好处。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我猜你和帕弗雷尔发来的消息有关,Ida。@p9 [ IDA ] 是的,指挥官。@w2 我还从帕弗雷尔的私人账户转了1000信用点到操作员账户,以支付他们的合作费用。@w6 我是否应该再从帕弗雷尔的账户转200信用点给操作员,作为他们的辛苦费?

English: That'd be perfect, Ida. Officer Pavrell has been very generous today.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那将是完美的,Ida。帕弗雷尔警官今天非常慷慨。</color>

English: No, i'll pay him myself out of my own money. (Pay 200 Credits)
Chinese (simplified): 不,我会自己付给他,用我自己的钱。(支付200信用点)

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] It looks like we've hit a dead end, Ida.@w2 They could've gone anywhere and all the logs are locked away at like@w2... executive level or something stupid like that.@w3 Can you access the system or anything?@p9 [ IDA ] No, Commander. I do not have access to PolSec's secure systems.@w4 However, I believe you should speak to the Coms Chief.@w2 There is an urgent matter that needs your attention that may provide additional insight.@w2 I have already sent him a message concerning his problems and he is waiting for you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 看来我们走进了死胡同,Ida。@w2 他们可能去了任何地方,而且所有的记录都被锁在了类似@w2 ... 高层管理级别或者别的什么愚蠢的地方。@w3 你能访问系统或者做点什么吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 不,指挥官。我没有权限访问PolSec的安全系统。@w4 不过,我认为你应该和通信主管谈谈。@w2 有一个紧急事项需要你的注意,这可能会提供更多的线索。@w2 我已经就他的问题给他发送了消息,他正在等待你。

English: <color=#0088ff>What are you getting me into this time, Ida?</color>

@q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] You the one I received a message about? The one here about the job I posted?@w5 It says that you're a contractor to Polaris and that you're qualified to reconfigure Polaris Communications Equipment.@w2 Is that true?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 你是我收到消息的那个人吗?是来咨询我发布的工作的那个?@w5 消息里说你是极星的承包商,并且你有资格重新配置极星通信设备。@w2 这是真的吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'll have to get back to you on that one.</color>
<color=#0088ff>I doubt I could tell you the difference between a USB and an HDMI cable.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我怀疑我能告诉你USB和HDMI线之间的区别.</color>

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] I don't know what either of those are, so I doubt I could tell you the difference between the two either.@w2 Can you fix a com array or not? That's all I need to know.@p9 [ IDA ] Commander, I will handle the reconfiguration of the Communications Equipment.@w2 But I require you to be my eyes and hands for this task. The safety of the mission relies on you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 我不知道那两个是什么,所以我怀疑我也不能告诉你两者之间的区别。@w2 你能修好通信阵列吗?这就是我需要知道的。@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官,我将负责重新配置通信设备。@w2 但我需要你成为我的眼睛和手来完成这项任务。任务的安全取决于你。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] I need an answer now. We have a carrier coming in soon and I need all the Com Relays working.@w2 Can you fix a com array or not? That's all I need to know.@p9 [ IDA ] Commander, I will handle the reconfiguration of the Communications Equipment.@w2 But I require you to be my eyes and hands for this task. The safety of the mission relies on you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 我现在就需要一个答案。我们很快就有一艘航母要进来,我需要所有的通信中继器都工作正常。@w2 你能修好通信阵列吗?这就是我需要知道的。@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官,我将负责通信设备的重新配置。@w2 但我需要你作为我的眼睛和手来完成这项任务。任务的安全就靠你了。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] You can? That's great!@w2 I've been waiting on maintenance for a week to send someone over to take a look at the relay signals and find out what's been going wrong with the signalling cycle.@p9 [ IDA ] Commander, i'm aware that you aren't qualified with communications equipment, Polaris or otherwise.@w2 So I will handle the reconfiguration of the Communications Equipment.@w2 But I require you to be my eyes and hands for this task. The safety of our mission relies on you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 你可以吗?那太好了!@w2 我已经等了维护部门一个星期派人过来看看中继信号,找出信号循环出了什么问题。@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官,我知道你并不熟悉通信设备,无论是极星的还是其他的。@w2 所以我将负责重新配置通信设备。@w2 但我需要你作为我的眼睛和手来完成这项任务。我们任务的安全就靠你了。

English: <color=#0088ff>That's an affirmative, Chief. I'm pretty sure I can do it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这是肯定的,主管。我很确定我能做到。</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>So what exactly is the problem, Chief?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那么到底是什么问题呢,主管?</color>

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Glad to hear you can handle it!@w2 For the last week we've had degrading communication relays in this sector that's causing havoc with our relay systems.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] You see, this sector has a triangulation setup of communication relay satellites, six of them with Kenex in the middle.@w2 Together we collate transmission data from neighboring sectors, route it through the trading terminal, banking systems, everything, then beam it back into deep space for another repeater that sends it out to other systems.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] The problem is that something is interfering with the transmissions between the Com Relays in this sector.@w2 It could be an asteroid in the way, it could be a misaligned dish, it could be sabotage or it could've just been some asshole could've just crashed into it and didn't report the collision.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 很高兴听到你能处理它!@w2 在过去的一周里,我们这个区域的通信中继器一直在退化,这给我们的中继系统造成了混乱。@p9 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 你看,这个区域有六个通信中继卫星构成的三角测量设置,Kenex在中间。@w2 我们一起从邻近区域收集传输数据,通过交易终端、银行系统等路由,然后将其传回深空,由另一个中继器将其发送到其他系统。@p9 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 问题是有什么东西在干扰这个区域的通信中继器之间的传输。@w2 可能是小行星挡住了路,可能是天线对准错误,可能是有人蓄意破坏,或者也可能是有人撞上了它却没有报告碰撞。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] What about them?@w1 They're standard orbital stations with just the bare basics.@w2 Life support, server rooms, data storage buffers and the system core.@w1 No defenses.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 他们呢?@w1 它们只是具有最基本功能的轨道站。@w2 生命维持系统、服务器室、数据存储缓冲区和系统核心。@w1 没有防御设施。

English: <color=#0088ff>What's my job with them supposed to be then?</color>

@q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Every so often some pirate bastards come around and try to siphon off banking data from the com relays.@w2 It's not possible, but that doesn't stop them from trying.@w4 The real problem is when they hang around to ambush the guys sent out to repair the relay. So watch your ass, got it?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 时不时地,一些海盗混蛋会过来,试图从通信中继器中窃取银行数据。@w2 这是不可能的,但这并不能阻止他们尝试。@w4 真正的问题是当他们徘徊在周围,伏击被派出来修复中继器的人。 所以小心点,懂了吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>So what's my job out there then? Aside from avoiding pirates.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那我的工作是什么?除了避免海盗.</color>

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Your job out there is to check each relay for any signs of damage, inside and out and fix it if it's broken.@w3 If you don't have the materials to fix or bypass the problem area, you come back here, got it?@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] I'll be patched into your radio the whole time.@w3 If pirates do turn up, i'll call up a security patrol to back you up. It'll probably take a few minutes for them to reach you though, so you'll be on your own until they turn up.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] You have a ship right? Better get to it and make sure it's armed.@w1 You could run into anything out there, so it's best to be prepared.@w3 Any questions?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 你的工作是检查每个中继器是否有任何损坏,内部和外部,并在它坏了的时候修复它。@w3 如果你没有材料来修复或绕过问题区域,你就回到这里,懂了吗?@p9 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 我会一直连接到你的无线电。@w3 如果海盗真的出现,我会呼叫一个安全巡逻队来支援你。他们可能需要几分钟才能到达你那里,所以在他们到达之前你得靠自己。@p9 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 你有飞船,对吧?最好去看看它,并确保它是武装的。@w1 在外面你可能会遇到任何情况,所以最好做好准备。@w3 有问题吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>How much am I getting paid for this job?</color>

@q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Should've already been listed on the contract you agreed to.@w4 It's 12,500 credits for the job, no medical or dental. If we have to reLife your corpse because you screwed up, you'll be paying 2,000 out of your pay for the encoding and genotyping.@w2 So don't screw up, kiddo.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通信主管梅森 ] 应该已经在你同意的合同中列明了。@w4 工作报酬是12,500信用点,不包括医疗或牙科。如果我们不得不因为你的失误而重新编码你的尸体,你将需要从你的薪水中支付2,000用于编码和基因分型。@w2 所以别搞砸了,孩子。

English: <color=#0088ff>Okay, I guess i'm good to go.</color>
@q0[ Coms Chief Mason ]\nI'll be monitoring your progress from here.@w2\nSo let's get to it then, shall we?
Chinese (simplified): [ 通信主管梅森 ]\n我会从这里监控你的进展。@w2 \n那么,我们开始吧,好吗?

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Alright Ida, Spill it!@w2 What's going on with this job for Polaris?@p9 [ IDA ] It is a delicate situation, Commander.@w2 I would like you to confirm the condition of the Communication Relay satellites before I give you a definitive answer.@w3 I would prefer to avoid alarming you if possible.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Bull. Shit.@w4 You're up to something and you're not telling me because I either won't like it or wouldn't agree with whatever it is you're doing behind my back.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You've been steering me towards this station as soon as we heard about it and now the job that has nothing to do with finding the rest of the fleet!@w3 What am I supposed to think?@w3 Were you infected with that Polaris malware they tried to slip you after all?@p9 [ IDA ] Commander...@w2 I believe that I will be able to access Polaris' Secure Systems through their Communications Relay and obtain the secure data from their systems.@w2 That is why I had to undertake this mission for Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 好吧,Ida,快说!@w2 这份给极星的工作到底是怎么回事?@p9 [ IDA ] 这是一个微妙的情况,指挥官。@w2 我想让你在给我一个明确的答案之前,先确认通信中继卫星的状态。@w3 如果可能的话,我想避免让你感到惊慌。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 胡说八道。@w4 你在搞什么鬼,而且你没有告诉我,因为我不喜欢或者不会同意你在我背后做的任何事情。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 自从我们听说这个站点以来,你就一直在引导我来这里,现在这份工作和寻找舰队的其他部分毫无关系!@w3 我应该怎么办?@w3 难道你最终还是被他们试图偷偷给你的极星恶意软件感染了吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官...@w2 我相信我将能够通过他们的通信中继进入极星的安全系统,并从他们的系统中获取安全数据。@w2 这就是为什么我必须执行这项极星的任务。

English: @q0[ IDA ]\nI am not lying to you, {PlayerName}.@w4\nAccessing the Communications Relay is vital to the future@w2... for the both of us.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ]\n我没有对你撒谎,{PlayerName}。@w4 \n接入通讯中继站对我们的未来至关重要@w2 ... 对我们双方都一样。

English: <color=#0088ff>Alright, i'll do as you say. It's not like I have much of a choice.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>好吧,我会照你说的做。我也没什么选择的余地.</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ] I did not want to get your hopes up, {PlayerName}.@w3 There is a great deal of risk involved and I do have an ulterior motive in accessing the Com Relay system.@w2 But right now, neither of us have a choice.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我不想让你抱有希望,{PlayerName}。@w3 涉及的风险很大,我确实有一个访问Com Relay系统的隐秘动机。@w2 但现在,我们都没有选择。

English: <color=#0088ff>Alright, i'll do as you say. But I want a proper explanation sooner rather than later.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>好吧,我会照你说的做。但我想要一个合理的解释越快越好.</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ]\nI will explain myself properly, when I can confirm whether or not my plan to interface with one of the Com Relays is successful.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ]\n我会在能够确认与通信中继之一的接口是否成功时,适当地解释我自己。

English: <color=#0088ff>That'll have to do for now, I guess...</color>

[ Huntmaster ] Greetings, Traveller.@w2 I am afraid I am not equipped to extend you the formalities of custom that I would normally perform.@w3 We hunters are severely short-handed and our hunts are not providing enough this season.@w3
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 问候你,旅行者.@w2 我恐怕没有能力向你提供应该有的礼节了.@w3 我们猎人人手严重不足,这个季节猎到的猎物不够了.@w3

English: <color=#0088ff>That's why i'm here. I came to offer my aid as an ally of the tribe.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这就是我来这里的原因。我是作为部落的盟友来提供帮助的.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ] Truly?@w2 This is great news!@w3 We need all the help we can get and your help, even from an outsider would be much appreciated.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] What do you need me to do?@w3 I'm pretty good with a crossbow.@p6 [ Huntmaster ] Ha! I like your spirit, Traveller.@w2 But I think your weapons are best suited for you,@w2 Just as ours are best left to us.@w4 What I need for you is to hunt a number of the more dangerous Predators;@w2 the larger, the better!@w3 And bring back their meat to me before it spoils.@w3 The predators hunt our prey and attack my hunters and they need to be culled.@w3 They are also a useful source of meat themselves.@p7 Do that for the Tal'ohn and we shall be immeasurably grateful, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 真的?@w2 这是个好消息!@w3 我们需要所有我们能得到的帮助和你的帮助,即使是从一个局外人我们都非常感激.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 你需要我做什么?@w3 我很擅长用十字弓.@p6 [ 狩猎大师 ] Ha!我喜欢你的精神,旅行者.@w2 但是我认为你们的武器最适合你们,就像我们的武器最好留给我们一样.@w4 我需要你做的是猎一些更危险的捕食者;@w2 越大越好!@w3 另外 在它们的肉带给我 在坏掉之前.@w3 捕食者捕食我们的猎物,攻击我的猎人,他们需要被剔除.@w3 它们本身也是一种有用的肉类来源.@p7 旅行者,为泰隆这样做吧,我们将无比感激.

English: <color=#0088ff>Okay, I think I can handle that.</color>
[ Huntmaster ]\nTraveller! You have returned!@w3\nWas your hunt successful?
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ]\n旅行者! 你返回了!@w3 \n你的狩猎成功了吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>Why yes it was. Look at this haul! (Give 20 Meat)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那是当然的. 看看这些收获! (给20肉)</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I have taken care of the predators, but did not bring the meat. Sorry. (Not enough Meat)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经干掉了捕食者,但没有带来肉。对不起. (没有足够的肉类)</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ] That is great work, Traveller!@w3 The tribe will be very grateful for this food@w2 and the removal of the Predators will allow the hunters to range out further in search of prey.@w3 Praise be to Empyrion!
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 这是伟大的工作, 旅行者!@w3 部落将非常感激这这些食物@w2 同时掠食者的清除将允许猎人更远的范围寻找猎物.@w3 赞美至高嵩!

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm just glad I could help, Huntmaster.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我很高兴能帮上忙, 狩猎大师.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ] I see...@w3 I assume the meat spoiled before you could bring it back.@w2 You have ranged far for us, Traveller and the dangerous predators that have driven the prey from our territory have been dealt with,@w2 allowing the hunters to go out further each day in search of food.@w5 You have done us a great service, Traveller.@w2 You have my thanks...
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 我看看...@w3 我认为肉在你能把它带回来之前就坏了.@w2 你们为我们远行, 旅行者,同时那些把猎物从我们的领土上赶走的危险的捕食者已经被解决了,@w2 让猎人每天走得更远去寻找食物.@w5 你帮了我们很大的忙, 旅行者.@w2 谢谢你...

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm glad I could help, as much as I could at least. I only wish i'd been able to bring you the meat I hunted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我很高兴我能帮上忙,至少我能帮到的。我要是能把我猎到的肉带给你就好了.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ]\nYou have done more than enough, Traveller.@w2\nMay Empyrion light your path...
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ]\n旅行者,你已经做得够多了.@w2 \n愿苍天照亮你的道路...

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Welcome to the village, Traveller.@w3 My name is Yan'terel of the Artificer's Guild@w2 and you...@w4 you are a Terran.@w3 No,@w2 I have no quarrel with Terrans.@w2 But I would like to ask your help.
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 欢迎来到这个村庄, 旅行者.@w3 我的名字是Yan'terelArtificer的守护者@w2 而你...@w4 你是人类.@w3 不,@w2 我和人族没有争吵.@w2 但是我想请求你的帮助.

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] As you may have noticed, our village has lost many of it's outer buildings and support structures due to fires or intentional...@w3 'Demolition'@w2 by our Zirax overseers.@w5 We're used to zirax patrols using outlying sheds and houses as target practise, so we know to avoid keeping anything valuable in those buildings.@p8 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] However, the recent fires destroyed our lumberyard so we are currently lacking building materials to repair or replace any damaged structures.@w4 You're probably wondering why bother repairing those buildings if we know the patrols are just going to destroy them again.@w3 It's because if we don't, they'll turn their attentions on the village proper.@w2 Which would be a far worse disaster.
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 你可能已经注意到, 我们的村庄已经失去了许多外部建筑和支撑结构,由于火灾或故意...@w3 '拆毁'@w2 因为我们的 兹瑞克斯 监督者.@w5 兹瑞克斯巡逻队喜欢用我们偏僻的棚屋和房屋作为靶子练习, 所以我们知道要避免在这些建筑里存放任何有价值的东西.@p8 [ 泰隆守护者 ] 然而,最近的火灾烧毁了我们的木材场,所以我们目前缺乏建筑材料来修复或更换任何受损的结构。你可能在想,既然我们知道巡逻队会再次摧毁这些建筑,为什么还要费心去修复它们呢?因为如果我们不这样做,他们就会把注意力转移到村庄本身。这将是一场更严重的灾难.

English: <color=#0088ff>So what do you need me to do?</color>

[ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Without our source of lumber and many of our youths going into the Hunters or Farmers to provide food for the village, there's not enough people able to bring in fresh building supplies.@w5 I am a builder, not a...@w2 lumberjack.@w2 You don't appear to be either, but you are not restricted to primitive axes like we are.@p7 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] So yes, I want you to leave Tal'ohn territory where the Zirax patrols won't see evidence of power tools and bring back enough wood to start the repairs on the more vital buildings.@w3 If need be, I can pay you@w2 both in coin and in gratitude, Traveller.@w3 So what is your decision?
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 村里的年轻人都去收集食物去了,没人砍树, 所以我们急缺建筑材料.@w5 我是一个建设者, 不是...@w2 伐木工人.@w2 你看起来也不是,但是你不像我们一样局限于原始工具.@p7 [ 泰隆守护者 ] 所以,我希望你离开泰隆区域进行伐木,兹瑞克斯巡逻人员不会看到电动工具的证据,并带回足够的木材来开始维修更重要的建筑.@w3 如果需要, 我可以@w2 同时支付你金币和感激, 旅行者.@w3 你的决定是什么?

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ]\nWelcome back, Traveller.@w3\nDid you bring me the wood you promised?@w2 I'm looking forward to getting started on repairs to some of the village buildings as many of our people have been left homeless.
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ]\n欢迎回来, 旅行者.@w3 \n你给我带来你答应过的木头了吗?@w2 我期待开始修复村里的一些建筑,因为很多人无家可归.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought you a great amount of logs. (Give 40 logs)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我给你带来了大量的原木. (给 40 原木)</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>I cut down the trees for you, that's as much as i'm willing to do. Hand over the money, Alien.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>我为你砍树,这是我所愿意做的。把钱交出来,外星人.</color>

English: <color=#ffae00>I brought you only 20 logs. It's all I could manage to carry.</color>

[ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Ah yes!@w1 This is perfect!@w3 Thank you, Traveller.@w3 With this I can finally repair some of the damage done recently.@w2 You have proven yourself trustworthy and honorable and a credit to your people.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm just glad I could help out.@w2 My people owe a debt to the Tal'ohn, which I intend to make good on.@p6 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] By all means,@w2 continue to make good on it!@w4 You'll hear no complaints from me!@w3 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion, Traveller.@w2 Farewell...
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 啊 YES!@w1 太完美了!@w3 谢谢你, 旅行者.@w3 有了这个,我终于可以修复最近造成的一些损害.@w2 你已经证明了你是值得信赖的,值得尊敬的,是你的人民的荣誉.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我很高兴能帮上忙。我的人民欠泰隆一笔债,我打算做点好事.@p6 [ 泰隆守护者 ] 无论如何,@w2 继续做好它!@w4 你不会听到我的抱怨!旅行者,愿灵魂指引你到至庇里翁,.@w2 祝你好运...

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Rude bastard!@w2 If I didn't have a quarrel with your people before, I most certainly do now!@w2 You could've at least brought the wood back with you, you lazy turd!@w2 I certainly hope the rest of your kind aren't so utterly useless!@p7 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Here!@w2 Take your money and begone! @w2 I would gladly pay to have you out of my sight!
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 粗鲁的混蛋!@w2 如果我以前没有和你们吵过架,我现在肯定会的!@w2 你至少可以把木头带回来,你这个懒鬼!!@w2 我当然希望你们其他的同类不要这么没用!@p7 [ 泰隆守护者 ] Here!@w2 带着你的钱滚吧!@w2 我愿意付钱让你离开我的视线!

English: <color=#0088ff>Yeah, well... Maybe next time I won't try and </color><color=#0088ff>cheat the system</color><color=#0088ff>.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>是的,嗯…也许下次我不会尝试 </color><color=#0088ff>欺骗系统</color><color=#0088ff>.</color>

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Yes!@w1 This should be enough.@w3 Thank you, Traveller.@w3 With this I can get started on repairing some of the damage done.@w2 You have done well to bring me this much, though I had hoped twice this amount.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, I couldn't carry any more with me, sorry.@w2 My people owe a debt to the Tal'ohn, which I intend to make good on.@p6 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] You've made a decent start,@w2 continue to make good on that debt.@w3 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion, Traveller.@w2 Farewell...
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 是!@w1 这应该足够了.@w3 谢谢你, 旅行者.@w3 有了这个,我可以开始修复一些已经造成的损害.@w2 你做得很好,给了我这么多,尽管我希望是这个数目的两倍.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 是的,我身上带不了那么多,对不起.@w2 我的人民欠泰隆一笔债,我打算做点好事.@p6 [ 泰隆守护者 ] 你已经有了一个不错的开始,@w2 继续做好事还债.@w3 愿灵魂指引你到至庇里翁, 旅行者.@w2 祝你好运...

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nWell...@w2 Time to go.@w4\nMy work is done here!
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n好吧...@w2 该走了.@w4 \n我的工作完成了!

English: <color=#0088ff>Not as much as I'd hoped, but this should be more than enough. (Give 10 Meat)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>没有我希望的那么多,但这应该足够了. (给10肉)</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Nothing, really.@w2 They won't do anything though.@w2 I'm breaking no laws, no regulations and i'm not even asking for an exorbitant payoff.@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] I saw you get paid by the boss-man, so I know you're flush with cash now.@w3 You want something from me, you have to pay for it.@w2 That's how things work around here...@w2 as long as you don't overcharge your merchandise.@w3 If you try to take too much of the pie,@w1 there's always someone higher up who'll want his slice.@w2 If you get my meaning?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, I get your meaning.@w3 So...@w2 How much are you asking for the information?@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] I was going to sell it to you for 80, but since you brought up Station Security...@w2 make it 100 credits.@w4 Consider it a mark-up in exchange for the general tips on Polaran...@w1 'culture'.@w3 So what'll it be?@w2 Wire transfer or find someone else?
