Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 没什么,真的.@w2 他们什么都不会做就是了.@w2 我没有违反任何法律,没有规定,我什至没有要求过高的贿赂.@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我看到老板给你报酬了,所以我知道你现在资金相当充裕.@w3 你想要我的东西,就得付出相应的代价.@w2 这就是这里一切运行的基础...@w2 只要你不对你的主顾狮子大张口就行.@w3 如果你分了太多的蛋糕,@w1 总有上面的人会想分一杯羹.@w2 如果你理解我的意思的话?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯,我明白你的意思.@w3 所以说...@w2 这次的信息你要多少呢?@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我本来要80信用点卖你的,但是鉴于你提了叫安保这事...@w2 那就 100信用点吧.@w4 多的钱就当是换了极星人的一点小小的提示吧...@w1 '文化方面那种'.@w3 所以说问题是什么?@w2 电汇或找其他什么人?

English: [ Transport Pilot ] You son of a...@w2 You don't know nothin' about Markos!@w2 you've got nothing on me!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Not yet, anyway...@w3 I'm sure I could ask around and find out about him.@w2 It sounds like he's an unsavory character,@w2 i'm sure the Station Security would be interested in him.@w4 Unless of course,@w1 you tell me what I want to know...@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] What the hell do you want from me?@w1 I'm just a cargo pilot.@w1 I've got no pull here!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I want to know about a fare you took on for Polaris about 10 months ago.@w3 You and another ship picked up foreign military personnel from this station and took them to a place called 'Kenex 62' and I want to know everything about it.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] What's there to tell you about?@w2 There was around 40 or 50 alien soldier-types, a few wounded and we took 'em to Kenex Station in orbit.@w3 I stuck around for a couple of days before I got transferred out,@w2 during which time they were picked up by heavy transports and left the station.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] I don't know where they went and I didn't check.@w2 That's all I know.@w4 I'll give you the location data of Kenex Station if you'll just forget you ever saw me.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你这狗娘...@w2 你根本就不认得Markos!@w2 你也休想和我扯上关系!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 只是时候未到...@w3 我敢肯定我只要随便打听一下就可以了解他了.@w2 听上去这人不怎么讨人喜欢,@w2 我相信空间站安保人员会对他感兴趣的.@w4 当然除非说,@w1 你把我想要的都告诉我...@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你到底想从我这知道什么?@w1 我就是个货运驾驶员.@w1 我在这里也没什么根基!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我想了解一下大约10个月前你为极星拉的一船人.@w3 你和另一艘船从这个站接了别国的军事人员,把他们带到了一个叫“Kenex 62”的地方,我想知道关于这件事的一切.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我还能告诉你什么?@w2 一共有40到50个外星士兵之类的,有几个受了伤,我们就把他们送去了轨道上的 Kenex Station .@w3 在被调走前我在那待了几天,@w2 就在那段时间,他们被重型飞船从空间站接走了.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我不知道他们去了哪里,我也没想着查过.@w2 我就知道这些了.@w4 如果你能保证忘记你曾经见过我这件事,我会给你Kenex Station的位置数据.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] I swear, I haven't told anyone about it!@w1 It wasn't my fault! I had no choice but to drop the cargo!@w2 PLEASE, it's all a misunderstanding!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] That's not what i'm here about!@w2 You're gonna tell me what I want to know and you're gonna do it now.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] Yes, Yes! Of course! Whatever you want to know!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我发誓,关于那个我什么都没有告诉别人!@w1 这不是我的错! 我没有选择只能丢弃货物!@w2 求求你了,这些都是误会!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那不是我来这的原因!@w2 你要把我想知道的全告诉我,立刻马上.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 好的好的! 当然! 你想知道什么我都说!

English: [ Hunter Ki'eve ]\nStop right there, You deceitful, violent savage!@w4\nI don't know how you tricked that fool of a chief, but I won't give you the chance to spout your lies at me!
Chinese (simplified): [ 猎手Ki'eve ]\n站住,你这个欺骗的,暴力的野蛮人!@w4 \n我不知道你怎么骗了那个傻瓜酋长,但我不会给你机会对我撒你的谎!

English: <color=#6bd600>I haven't lied to anyone and i'm not here to lie to you, Ki'eve.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#6bd600>我没有对任何人撒过谎,我也不是来骗你的, Ki'eve.</color>

English: <color=#84bce6>I'm here to bring you to that 'fool of a chief', peacefully if I can.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#84bce6>我来这里带你去那个“傻瓜酋长”那,尽量和平的带去.</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Dead or Alive, you're coming with me.</color>

[ Hunter Ki'eve ] Save your lies, Terran!@w3 Your people murdered my father, whose only crime was that he was too kind...@w3 would never raise his voice or his hand against anyone!@w2 And YOUR people shot him in the back while he pulled them from the burning wrecks like the cowards you are!@p7 [ Hunter Ki'eve ] I will NEVER forgive your kind, Terran!@w3 You taint this holy monument,@w2 this entire planet with your presence!@w3 A presence I will now cleanse, and in doing so will help my father's spirit find Empyrion.
Chinese (simplified): [ 猎手Ki'eve ] 收回你的谎言,人族!@w3 你们的人谋杀了我父亲,他唯一的罪行就是太善良了…@w3 永远不会提高他的声音或他的手反对任何人!@w2 你的人在他把他们从燃烧的残骸中拉出来的时候从背后开枪,你们这些懦夫!@p7 [ 猎手Ki'eve ] 我永远不会原谅你们人类!@w3 你的存在玷污了这个神圣的纪念碑玷污了整个星球!@w3 我现在就要净化它,这样做将帮助我父亲的灵魂找到至高梅里翁.

English: <color=#4dc3ff>Don't try it, Ki'eve! You don't stand a chance against me with that crossbow.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>不要尝试,Ki'eve!你拿着那把弩对付我是没有胜算的.</color>

English: [ Hunter Ki'eve ]\nYou think you can bring me in?@w2\nYou'll find I didn't come alone!
Chinese (simplified): [ 猎手Ki'eve ]\n你觉得你能把我带进走?@w2 \n你会发现我不是一个人来的!

English: <color=#ff0000>I guess we're gonna do this the hard way then.</color>

Unless you've got something to do with this miscreant we've got locked up, move along.@w3\nI caught him trying to bribe a dock worker, so he's obviously up to no good.@w5\nIf I catch you doing anything like that, you'll be in there next to him.
Chinese (simplified): 除非你和我们关押的这个恶棍有关系,否则就走吧.@w3 \n我抓到他试图贿赂码头工人,所以他显然不怀好意。如果我抓到你做那样的事,你就会被关在他旁边.

English: I'll get out of your way then.

Keep the safety set on your weapons while on the station, Terran!@w3\nIf I find out you've fired your weapon inside the station, i'll drag your ass to security myself.@w5\nIf you're caught trying to sneak into the Central Control Room, you'll wish i'd drag your ass to security, because you won't leave the room alive. Got it?
Chinese (simplified): 在空间站的时候要把武器的安全装置系好,人族!@w3 \n如果我发现你在空间站里开枪,我就亲自把你拖到保安那里.@w5 \n如果你试图溜进中控室被发现,你会希望我把你拖到保安处,因为你不会活着离开房间。明白了吗?

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Are you sure the Heidelberg was shot down?@w3 Could it have been friendly fire, or perhaps an ammunition magazine exploded on re-entry?@w4 There must be record or logs or...@w3 something@w2 that explains this. @p9 [ IDA ] I am sorry, Commander.@w3 The direction of the blast pattern and the melted steel indicates that it was struck from the front by a plasma composition not in my database.@p9 [ IDA ] Upon scanning,@w2 I have detected radioactive traces of the same plasma on several other wreckage sites in the area,@w3 as well as structures near the polar regions of this planet with strong EM signatures. @p9 [ IDA ] I have concluded that the structures near the poles are in all likelihood Weapon Emplacements, Communications Stations or Military Facilities of some sort,@w2 belonging to an unknown faction native to this region of space.@w7 There are many transmissions coming from their location, but nothing that I am able to decipher.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 你确定海德堡号被击落了吗?@w3 它可能是友军误伤,或者是再入时弹药库爆炸了吗?@w4 一定有记录或日志或...@w3 某些东西@w2 解释这件事。@p9 [ IDA ] 很抱歉,指挥官。@w3 爆炸模式的方向和熔化的钢材表明,它是由我的数据库中没有的等离子组成从正面撞击的。@p9 [ IDA ] 扫描后,@w2 我在这个区域的其他一些残骸现场检测到了相同等离子的放射性痕迹,@w3 以及 这个星球的极地附近具有强烈电磁信号的结构。@p9 [ IDA ] 我得出结论,极地附近的结构很可能是武器阵地,通信站或军事设施之类的东西,@w2 属于这个太空区域未知派系所有。@w7 他们的地点传来许多传输,但我无法破译任何内容。

English: <color=#4dc3ff>I want every bit of information you have on them, Ida. I'm going to make them pay...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>我要你拥有的关于他们的所有信息,Ida。我将让他们付出代价...</color>

English: <color=#4dc3ff>It's best to give them a wide berth then... and focus on the mission.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>那么最好还是避开他们... 专注于任务。</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ] Commander...@w4 there's nothing you can do.@w4 You are alone and unarmed against what can be assumed are trained military personnel with superior weaponry and a fortified position.@w6 This is their territory and the UCH are the trespassers here.@p9 [ IDA ] The best thing you can do right now is to continue your search of the wreckage in the hopes that you are not the only UCH personnel left in this system.@w5 Anything more is the work of politicians and diplomats;@w3 of which, you are neither.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 指挥官...@w4 你无能为力。@w4 你孤身一人,手无寸铁,面对的可能都是训练有素的军事人员,他们拥有更优越的武器和坚固的阵地。@w6 这是他们的领土,而UCH的人才是这里的入侵者。@p9 [ IDA ] 你现在能做的最好的事情就是继续搜索残骸,希望你不是这个星系中唯一的UCH人员。@w5 其他的事情是政治家和外交官的工作;@w3 而你两者都不是。

English: You make a pretty convincing argument, Ida.
Chinese (simplified): 你提出了一个相当有说服力的论点,Ida。

English: @q0[ IDA ] That would be the correct decision, Commander.@w4 You are alone and unarmed against what can be assumed are trained military personnel with superior weaponry and a fortified position.@w6 This is their territory and the UCH are the trespassers here.@p9 [ IDA ] The best thing you can do right now is to continue your search of the wreckage in the hopes that you are not the only UCH personnel left in this system.@w5 Anything more is the work of politicians and diplomats;@w3 of which, you are neither.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 那将是正确的决定,指挥官。@w4 你孤身一人,手无寸铁,面对的可能都是训练有素的军事人员,他们拥有更优越的武器和坚固的阵地。@w6 这是他们的领土,而UCH的人才是这里的入侵者。@p9 [ IDA ] 你现在能做的最好的事情就是继续搜索残骸,希望你不是这个星系中唯一的UCH人员。@w5 其他的事情是政治家和外交官的工作;@w3 而你两者都不是。

English: You make a pretty convincing argument, Ida.
Chinese (simplified): 你提出了一个相当有说服力的论点,Ida。

English: @q0[ IDA ] I'm not saying we forgive them, Commander.@w4 It's just that it's impractical to attack them now,@w2 before we understand the situation or their capabilities.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'll do as you say, Ida.@w4 Thanks for having my back...@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] So?@w2 What's next?@p6 [ IDA ] I am glad you agree with my assessments, Commander.@w4 As you are currently the only remaining UCH officer, my duty is to ensure you live and I would have to shut down your suit's motor functions to prevent you from getting yourself killed.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我不是说我们原谅他们,指挥官。@w4 只是说现在攻击他们是不切实际的,在我们了解情况或他们的能力之前。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我会照你说的做,Ida。@w4 谢谢你支持我...@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么?@w2 下一步是什么?@p6 [ IDA ] 我很高兴你同意我的评估,指挥官。@w4 由于你目前是唯一剩下的UCH官员,我的职责是确保你活着,如果有必要,我会关闭你的套装运动功能,以防止你自寻死路。

English: <color=#4dc3ff>Wait, you can do that? Shut down my suit so I can't move?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>什么?你还能做这个? 关掉我的战衣,让我动弹不得?</color>

English: [ IDA ]\nPerhaps...@w4\nIt could be a joke. My humor parameter is currently at 100%.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n也许...@w4 \n这可能是个笑话。我的幽默参数目前是100%

English: Don't make me change your humor parameter.
Chinese (simplified): 别逼我调整你的幽默参数哦

English: Alright, I'll take you at your word.
[ {PlayerName} ]\nThe console doesn't appear to have any power going to it.@w5\nI guess i'm not going to get anything from this console...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n控制台似乎没有任何电源进入.@w5 \n我猜我不会从这个控制台得到任何东西...

English: @q0< Hits a few keys on the keyboard >@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like the power's out completely.@w3 The reserves must be drained too.@w3 I'll have to run a cable from my suit's power supply to the console like I did back on the Heidelberg.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 在键盘上敲击了几个键 >@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来电源完全断了。@w3 储备电量肯定也耗尽了。@w3 我得像在海德堡号上那样,从我的服装电源拉一根电缆到控制台。

English: Connect Suit Constructor's power supply to the console
Chinese (simplified): 将宇航服建造机的电源连接到控制台

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan - Warp Control Board > < Charging > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 < Battery Status >@w2 Less than 1% [ WARNING! Charging Error! ] @w3 < Remaining Power >@w2 0 minutes, 00 seconds @w3 < Keyboard Active >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] I don't like the look of that warning...@p6 < Console Logged in as Technician-15 Penbar, Ray >@w4 < Unable to connect to local server >@w2 < NO INPUT >@w2 < Enter Query _
Chinese (simplified): @q0 UCH-002 M.S Titan - 翘曲控制板> < 充电中 >@w2 。@w2 。@w2 。@w5 < 电池状态 >@w2 电量不足1% [警告!充电错误!]@w3 < 剩余电力 >@w2 0分钟,00秒@w3 < 键盘激活 >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 我对那个警告信号感到不太乐观...@p6 < 控制台登录为 技术员-15 彭巴尔,雷 >@w4 < 无法连接到本地服务器 >@w2 < 无输入 >@w2 < 输入查询 _

English: @q0@d0< Unable to parse user query >@w3 < Value out of bounds >@w3 < Running diagnostic@w2 .@w2 .@w2 . >@w3 < Diagnostic Failed >@p4 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@w2 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@w2 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object >@p3 < Runtime Error >@p5 [ IDA ] Commander, please stop screwing around.@w3 You know very well that wasn't the correct input and it hurts to watch you torment that poor computer...@w3 Hit the refresh button, {PlayerName} and do it properly this time.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < 无法解析用户查询 >@w3 < 值超出范围 >@w3 < 运行诊断@w2 .@w2 .@w2 . >@w3 < 诊断失败 >@p4 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: 未将对象引用设置为对象的实例 >@w2 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: 未将对象引用设置为对象的实例 >@w2 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: 未将对象引用设置为对象的实例 >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: 未将对象引用设置为对象的实例 >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: 未将对象引用设置为对象的实例 >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: 未将对象引用设置为对象的实例 >@w1 < -EXC- System.NullReferenceException: 未将对象引用设置为对象的实例 >@p3 < 运行时错误 >@p5 [ IDA ] 指挥官,请停止胡闹。@w3 你非常清楚那不是正确的输入,看着你折磨那台可怜的计算机让人感到痛苦...@w3 点击刷新按钮,{PlayerName},这次正确操作。

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Warp Control Board > < Retrieving Logs ... >@w3 < Logs Incomplete ! >@w4 < Read Logs now? >
Chinese (simplified): @q0 UCH-002 M.S Titan 翘曲控制板> < 检索日志中 ... >@w3 < 日志不完整!>@w4 < 现在读取日志?>

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] I'm uploading the warp drive logs to you, Ida.@w3 I don't feel like reading a technical data readout that won't make a lick of sense to me.@w2 I'm no warp technician.@w3 I know how to use a warp drive, but I don't have the slightest clue how one works.@p9 [ IDA ] While i'm glad you think highly of my skills, Commander.@w2 What makes you think I know how one works either?@w5 I am a Strategic-Class AI, not a Fleet-Class AI.@w3 I am not authorized to access or manage the technical systems of a UCH Experimental Warp Drive.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] So then there's nothing either of us can do with this console?@p9 [ IDA ] Not necessarily, Commander.@w3 I can read the Technician's logs and time-stamped events and collate them into report.@w3 The specifications of the Warp Drive however are locked behind several layers of Programming Blocks in my code.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 我正在将翘曲引擎的日志上传给你,Ida。@w3 我不想阅读那些对我来说毫无意义的技术数据读出。@w2 我不是翘曲技术员。@w3 我知道如何使用翘曲引擎,但我一点也不懂它是如何工作的。@p9 [ IDA ] 虽然我很高兴你认为我的技能很高,指挥官。@w2 你凭什么认为我知道它是怎么工作的呢?@w5 我是一个战略级AI,而不是舰队级AI。@w3 我没有权限访问或管理UCH实验翘曲引擎的 technical systems。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么我们就都不能使用这个控制台了? [ IDA ] 不一定,指挥官。@w3 我可以阅读技术员的日志和时间标记的事件,并将它们整理成报告。@w3 然而翘曲引擎的规格在我的代码中被几个层次的编程块锁定了。

English: @q0[ IDA ]\nIt will take some time, Commander.@w3 \nI will forward the report to your PDA for you to read at your leisure (F1).
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ]\n这需要一些时间,指挥官。@w3 \n我会将报告转发到你的PDA,供你随时阅读 (F1)。

English: @q0< Unauthorized Access > Insert Valid UCH Personnel Keycard into card reader to proceed@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] It looks like there's power, but the system seems to be locked.@w4 There's a slot here for a keycard, but it looks like i've lucked out.@w2 It's empty.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Of course it couldn't be that simple...@w6 Ida, is there anything you can do?@p9 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w3 That console has been disabled until a valid personnel keycard is inserted into the card reader.@w4 You may be able to find a keycard in one of the crew's quarters, but it's unlikely that any crewmember would have left his keycard in his room.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 未授权访问 > 将有效的UCH人员钥匙卡插入读卡器以继续@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来有电源,但系统似乎被锁定了。@w4 这里有一个卡槽,但看来我运气不错。@w2 它是空的。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 当然,事情不可能那么简单...@w6 Ida,你能做些什么吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 不行,指挥官。@w3 这个控制台已经被禁用,直到一个有效的人员钥匙卡插入读卡器。@w4 你可能能在船员宿舍里找到一张钥匙卡,但任何船员都不太可能把自己的钥匙卡留在房间里。

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Okay, i'm back at the console with an ID Card, Ida.@w2 Time for the moment of truth...@p7 [ IDA ] If that card is valid, it is a serious breach of UCH Protocol.@w2 Remember to make a note of the card's identification code, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 好的,Ida,我带着身份证回来了。@w2 是时候见证真相了...@p7 [ IDA ] 如果那张卡是有效的,那就是严重违反UCH协议。@w2 记得记下卡片的识别码,指挥官。

English: @q0< Reading card data ... >@w3 < User Authorized >@w2 Welcome back Technician 49: J. Harper@w2 < No Connection to Server >@w2 Resume Audio Logs?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 正在读取卡片数据... >@w3 < 用户授权 >@w2 欢迎回来技术员49号:J.哈珀@w2 < 无服务器连接 >@w2 恢复音频日志?

English: @q0Time: 9:48:13 09-08-2143@w3 ID: Lt. Jack H (Tech49)@w3 Final Audio Log: The coils are fused and the heat sink's panels are starting to fracture! The emergency cooling system is overtaxed and outer hull is starting to buckle from the temperature difference.@w3 We've already lost two engineers when a thruster on the lower deck burned out the propellant lines, vaporized them both.@p9 The warp core's damn well gone supercritical and there ain't nothing ANYONE can do to stop it. The chief's gone inside the drive housing to eject it before it blows the ship in half and has ordered the rest of us to the hangar and off this ship. The bastard knows there's no coming back from there, it's a one-way trip.@p9 Hell, it's a warzone outside the ship and knowing my luck, my transport will be the one to get hit. I might as well stay and make sure the core gets purged or else it won't matter for those poor bastards on the transports.@w8 Sorry Melissa... It doesn't look like i'll be making it back.@w7 I love you.@p9 - End of Audio Log -
Chinese (simplified): @q0 时间: 2143年9月8日 9:48:13@w3 ID: 杰克中尉 H (技术员49)@w3 最终音频日志: 线圈熔化了,散热器的面板开始破裂!紧急冷却系统超负荷运转,外船体因温差开始变形。@w3 底下甲板的一个推进器烧毁了推进剂管道,两名工程师当场气化,我们已经失去了他们。@p9 翘曲核心已经完全超临界,任何人都无法阻止它。 主管已经进入驱动装置内部,在它把船炸成两半之前将其弹出,并命令我们其他人前往机库离开这艘船。这个混蛋知道那是一条不归路,是一次单程旅行。@p9 见鬼,外面是战区,以我的运气,我的运输船可能会被击中。我可能应该留下来确保核心被清除,否则对于那些在运输船上的可怜人来说也没什么意义。@w8 对不起,梅丽莎... 看来我回不去了。@w7 我爱你。@p9 - 音频日志结束 -

English: He gave his life to make sure everyone else could escape...
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>他牺牲了自己的生命,以确保其他人都能逃走...</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w3 I have finished compiling the Warp Drive's technical report and it seems that Lieutenant Jack Harper and Lt. Commander Alex Lamarr stayed behind to ensure that the overloaded Warp Core was ejected and the rest of the rest of the Drive was sabotaged.@w6 They did not survive.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Alex...@w3 He was in a few of my classes in Fleet Academy.@w4 We both took the Lieutenant's Exam together,@w2 he was going for Chief Engineer, while I was going into Security.@w4 Looks like we both got what we wanted...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 是的,指挥官。@w3 我已经完成了翘曲引擎的技术报告的编译,看起来杰克·哈珀中尉和亚历山大·拉马尔中校留下来确保过载的翘曲核心被弹出,并且翘曲引擎的其余部分被破坏了。@w6 他们没有生还。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 亚历克斯...@w3 他在舰队学院上过我的几节课。@w4 我们一起参加了中尉考试,@w2 他要成为总工程师,而我则进入了安全领域。@w4 看来我们都得到了我们想要的...

English: Have you found anything else on this console, Ida?
Chinese (simplified): 在这个控制台上你还有什么其他的发现吗,Ida?

English: @q0[ IDA ] Nothing of relevance, Commander.@w3 I can confirm from the records that most of the crew in the forward section evacuated to the hangar and boarded transports to leave the ship in the middle of combat after the ship had been disabled.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I guess that's our next stop then.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 没有相关的东西,指挥官。@w3 我可以确认记录显示,飞船失去功能后,在战斗中,大部分前部区域的船员疏散到了机库,并登上了运输船离开。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我猜我们下一个目的地就是那里了。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ]\nI don't think it's smart to hang around in this radioactive wreck reading logs.@w3\nI've uploaded the files to my PDA to read them later.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我认为在这个放射性的残骸中逗留阅读日志并不明智。@w3 \n我已经将文件上传到我的PDA,稍后再阅读。

English: Have you found anything important in the console's files, Ida?
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>你在控制台的文件中找到什么重要的东西了吗, IDA?</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThere doesn't appear to be any power...@w2 that should be pretty obvious considering the situation.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这里似乎没有任何电力了...@w2 考虑到当时的情况,这应该很明显了.@w4 \n我也没有看到电源插座,所以我也无法将服装的电源连接到它上.

English: <color=#8ab3ff>There's a card reader next to the keyboard for a UCH Keycard and a slot on the side of the console for an external power cell.</color>\n<color=#8ab3ff>With a </color><color=#00ff00>Fuel Cell</color><color=#8ab3ff> and a </color><color=#00ff00>UCH Keycard</color><color=#8ab3ff> I should be able to activate the console.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#8ab3ff>键盘旁边有一个UCH钥匙卡的读卡器,控制台侧面有一个用于外部电源的插槽。</color>\n<color=#8ab3ff>有了</color><color=#00ff00>燃料电池</color><color=#8ab3ff>和</color><color=#00ff00>UCH钥匙卡</color><color=#8ab3ff>,我应该能够激活控制台。</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nWell...@w2 I've stuck the card in.@w2 Nothing's happening.@w5\nIt was worth a try.@w2 I guess it needs an Energy Cell after all.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\nh好吧...@w2 我已经把卡插进去了.@w2 什么都没有发生.@w5 \n这值得一试.@w2 我猜它还是需要一个能量电池.

English: @q0The screen flashes and flickers@w8 A couple of well-placed kicks on the console fixes that problem@p8 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 Hangar Count: 0 of 6@w3 Missing: UCH-050 Xiphos (Light Transport) - Count 6@w2 Missing: UCH-039 Rapier (Light Fighter) - Count 0@w2 Deck Crew Notes: Rapiers were reassigned to the UCH-004 Kronos due to limited deck space.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 屏幕闪烁着。@w8 几下恰当的踢打控制台解决了那个问题。@p8 UCH-002 M.S Titan 机库飞行控制@w2 机库数量: 0/6@w3 失踪: UCH-050 西弗勒斯(轻型运输船)- 数量 6@w2 失踪: UCH-039 刺针(轻型战斗机)- 数量 0@w2 甲板工作人员笔记: 由于甲板空间有限,刺针战斗机被重新分配到 UCH-004 克洛诺斯号。

English: @q0@d0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos - Light Transport Mass: 58.2T Armament: 2x FA-M22 50.BMG Rotary Cannon, 1x ZX Chaff Launcher Capacity: 2 crew (Pilot, Co-Pilot), 12 seats, 20 standing
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 机库飞行控制 > @w2 UCH-050 西弗勒斯 - 轻型运输船 质量: 58.2吨 武装: 2门 FA-M22 50.BMG 旋转机炮,1个 ZX 干扰弹发射器 容量: 2名机组人员(飞行员,副驾驶),12个座位,20个站立位

English: @q0@d0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 UCH-039 Rapier - Light Fighter Mass: 37.2T Armament: 1x FA-M22 .50BMG Rotary Cannon, 1x MK120 Laser Turret, 2x 110mm SGM-220 Missile Launcher, 2x 115mm SSM-225 Missile Launcher, 1x ZX Chaff Launcher. Maximum Speed: 670.5 m/s
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 机库飞行控制 >@w2 UCH-039 刺针 - 轻型战斗机 质量: 37.2吨 武装: 1门 FA-M22 .50BMG 旋转机炮,1个 MK120 激光炮塔,2个 110毫米 SGM-220 导弹发射器,2个 115毫米 SSM-225 导弹发射器,1个 ZX 干扰弹发射器。 最大速度: 670.5 米/秒

English: @q0@d0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32A - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32B - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32C - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32D - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32E - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32F - Flightplan: Registered@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] One of them had a registered flightplan after all.@w4 It could've been one that was already prepared, or the crew might've done it while loading.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 机库飞行控制 >@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32A - 飞行计划: 无@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32B - 飞行计划: 无@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32C - 飞行计划: 无@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32D - 飞行计划: 无@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32E - 飞行计划: 无@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32F - 飞行计划: 已注册@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 原来它们中有一个确实有注册的飞行计划。@w4 这可能是事先准备好的,或者可能是在装载时船员做的。

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32F: Flightplan 115-678-067, 160-711-135, 170-730-192, 174-736-261, 177-740-370, 180-741-491, ...@w4 Destination: UCH-004 Kronos (Fleet Heavy Carrier) - Accelerating 15m/s2 (Current: 260m/s)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like the crew evacuated to the Kronos.@w6 That doesn't really help me, since I still have no idea where the Kronos and the rest of the fleet went.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] The last place to check would be the rear section of the Titan.@w3 If the zirax are watching any part of the ship, it'll be that one.@w2 I'll need to be extra careful, I could be stuck jetpacking home.@w2 You get that, Ida?@p9 [ IDA ] Confirmed, Commander.@w4 The rear section of the Titan is where the bridge and system core were housed, so it should have recordings of the battle that left the Titan in this state.@w2 The recordings should show what happened to the rest of the fleet.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦机库飞行控制 >@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32F: 飞行计划 115-678-067, 160-711-135, 170-730-192, 174-736-261, 177-740-370, 180-741-491, ...@w4 目的地: UCH-004 克洛诺斯(舰队重型航空母舰) - 加速15m/s²(当前:260m/s)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来船员们已经撤离到了克洛诺斯。@w6 但这对我真的没有帮助,因为我仍然不知道克洛诺斯和其余舰队去了哪里。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 最后要检查的地方应该是泰坦的后部区域。@w3 如果兹瑞克斯正在监视飞船的任何部分,那就是那里。@w2 我需要格外小心,我可能要依靠喷气背包回家。@w2 你明白了吗,Ida?@p9 [ IDA ] 确认,指挥官。@w4 泰坦的后部区域是舰桥和系统核心所在的地方,所以它应该有记录战斗的录像,这场战斗让泰坦陷入了这种状态。@w2 录像应该能显示其余舰队发生了什么。

English: What can you tell me about The Kronos?
Chinese (simplified): 关于克洛诺斯,你能告诉我什么?

English: This terminal doesn't appear to work anymore.@w3\nThere's no power and the keycard slot is empty.
Chinese (simplified): 这个终端似乎不再工作了。@w3 \n没有电源,而且钥匙卡插槽是空的。

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Server Access Terminal BV49A >@w4 < Authorized User Detected >@w4 Welcome back Tech-02, Clio Miuse@w3 There are several problems that need your attention:@p7 - Connection to Databanks 15 through 211 Lost@w2 - Connection to Power Rooms 01 and 02 Lost@w2 - Connection to System Core Lost@w2 - No response from A.I.D.A@w2 - No response from BRIDGE@p9 You have (5) Unread messages@w2 [ Urania ] RE: Good luck with the launch tomorrow [ Mel. P ] Call me when you get back sis! [ Valley Cars ] Extended Warranty < spam > [ Cpt. Mercer ] < to ALL > EVAC procedure! [ Alex Lamarr ] RE: Who keeps rewriting the story?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] This isn't what i'm looking for.@w2 Where's the flight data and the connections with the rest of the fleet?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 服务器访问终端 BV49A >@w4 < 授权用户检测到 >@w4 欢迎回来,Tech-02,Clio Miuse@w3 有一些问题需要您的注意:@p7 - 与数据银行 15 至 211 的连接丢失@w2 - 与电源室 01 和 02 的连接丢失@w2 - 与系统核心的连接丢失@w2 - A.I.D.A 无响应@w2 - BRIDGE 无响应@p9 您有 (5) 未读消息@w2 [ Urania ] 关于:明天发射好运 [ Mel. P ] 回来时给我打电话,姐姐! [ Valley Cars ] 延长保修 < spam > [ Cpt. Mercer ] < to ALL > 疏散程序! [ Alex Lamarr ] 关于:谁一直在重写故事?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这不是我在寻找的。@w2 航班数据以及与其他舰队的连接在哪里?

English: @q0< Unable to read file > File is an unsupported format or corrupted Please verify file integrity and try again@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Not again...@w3 Why can't these things just work?@p9 [ IDA ] I'm not sure about this, Commander...@w3 But it may have something to do with half the databanks having been blown out the aft wall of the ship.@w2 I have a suspicion that it causes problems with data retrieval,@w2 but I could be wrong...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 文件无法读取 > 文件格式不支持或已损坏 请验证文件完整性后重试@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 别再这样了...@w3 为什么这些东西就不能正常工作呢?@p9 [ IDA ] 我也不确定这个情况,指挥官...@w3 但这可能和半个数据库被船尾墙炸飞有关。@w2 我怀疑这会导致数据检索问题,@w2 但也可能我错了...

English: @q0Displaying Personnel Records for: Operation Phoenix@w3 Admiral Eric Stromo [ Kronos ] Vice-Admiral Natalie Willis [ Encaledus ] Vice-Admiral Steve Brindle [ Dione ] Captain Lydia Mercer [ Titan ] Captain Ravien Kamarov [ Calypso ] Captain Kurt Lanyan [ Rhea ] [ 971 more names ... ]@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] The search bar isn't working.@w3 I can't scroll down either!@w3 Piece of junk!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 正在显示人员记录: 凤凰行动@w3 海军上将埃里克·斯特罗莫 [ 克洛诺斯 ] 副海军上将娜塔莉·威利斯 [ 恩卡莱杜斯 ] 副海军上将史蒂夫·布林德尔 [ 狄俄涅 ] 上尉莉迪亚·默瑟 [ 泰坦 ] 上尉拉维恩·卡马罗夫 [ 卡利普索 ] 上尉库尔特·兰扬 [ 瑞亚 ] [ 还有971个名字 ... ]@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 搜索栏无法使用。@w3 我也无法滚动下去!@w3 破烂货!

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Server Access Terminal BV49A >@w4 < Searching for connection to A.I.D.A@w2 .@w2. @w2. >@w4 ERR - Unable to connect to UCH-004 Kronos@p7 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Server Access Terminal BV49A > < Searching for alternative connections@w2 .@w2. @w2. >@w4 ERR - No authorized ship in range@w6 < Fleet-AI not detected >@w3 Encrypting Datacore Values ( Time Remaining: 5 minutes, 6 seconds )@p8 [ IDA ] Commander, you'd better stop that.@w3 We won't be able to get anything out of any of the Titan's systems if it completes.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I specialized in Fleet Security not computer systems, I have no idea how to stop it!@p9 [ IDA ] I will instruct you, Commander.@w3 You'll need to remove the cover on the console, pull out the optronic bridge in slot 25H and connect your suit's data cable into the diagnostics port next to the slot.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 服务器访问终端 BV49A >@w4 < 正在连接到 A.I.D.A@w2 。@w2 .@w2 . >@w4 错误 - 无法连接到 UCH-004 Kronos@p7 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 服务器访问终端 BV49A > < 正在寻找替代连接@w2 。@w2 .@w2 . >@w4 错误 - 范围内没有授权的飞船@w6 < 未检测到舰队-AI >@w3 加密数据核心值 ( 剩余时间:5分钟,6秒 )@p8 [ IDA ] 指挥官,你最好停止那操作。@w3 如果它完成了,我们将无法从泰坦的任何系统中获取任何东西。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我是专长于舰队安全而不是计算机系统,我不知道如何停止它!@p9 [ IDA ] 我会指导你的,指挥官。@w3 你需要移除控制台上的盖子,拔出25H插槽中的光电子桥,并将你的宇航服数据电缆连接到插槽旁边的诊断端口。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Okay, i've hooked my console up to my suit.@w5 What should I do with this optronic bridge?@w2 Can I keep it?@p9 [ IDA ] The system doesn't require it anymore, so I guess it makes no difference now.@p9 [ IDA ] I've convinced the system that I am A.I.D.A and that the disconnection from the fleet was due to the removal of the optronic bridge.@w3 Most of the ship's data is corrupted, missing or isolated in the RAM of individual consoles.@w2 However, I would like you to look at the screen as I access the Personnel records.@p9 Displaying Personnel Records for: Operation Phoenix@w3 Admiral Eric Stromo [ Kronos ] Vice-Admiral Natalie Willis [ Encaledus ] Vice-Admiral Steve Brindle [ Dione ] Captain Lydia Mercer [ Titan ] Captain Ravien Kamarov [ Calypso ] Captain Kurt Lanyan [ Rhea ] [ 971 more names ... ]@p5 Searching Personnel Files for: Commander {PlayerName} [ ID: 9143391 ] .@w2 .@w2 .@w8 No matches found@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What the hell does that mean?@p9 [ IDA ] I do not know.@w5 It's possible that your personnel file was corrupted or lost;@w2 You may have been stationed on Apollo Station and not part of the Exploration Fleet.@w3 It's even possible that you were sent by UCH command more recently, which would explain the time difference.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Maybe for you, but the date I remember before waking up in that escape pod was the 12th of July, 2143. The day before the fleet was scheduled to leave!@w6 So there's still no answer as to how I got here and still no leads on where the rest of the fleet went.@p9 [ IDA ] The bridge consoles will likely have saved the fleet's heading if they were still operational at the time of the crash.@w4 The files on them will be heavily encrypted and I will not be able to access or transmit them until they're decrypted, which may take some time.@w2 More than usual since Relay 451 will be moving out of observational range soon.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 好的,我已经把我的控制台连接到了我的太空服上。@w5 这个光电子桥我应该怎么处理?@w2 我能保留它吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 系统不再需要它了,所以我想现在没有区别。@p9 [ IDA ] 我让系统相信我就是A.I.D.A,并且与舰队的断开是因为光电子桥的移除。@w3 大部分飞船的数据要么损坏了,要么丢失了,要么孤立在各个控制台的RAM中。@w2 然而,我希望你能看看屏幕,因为我正在访问人员记录。@p9 显示人员记录: 凤凰行动@w3 海军上将Eric Stromo [ 克洛诺斯 ] 副海军上将Natalie Willis [ 恩卡勒杜斯 ] 副海军上将Steve Brindle [ 戴奥尼 ] 队长Lydia Mercer [ 泰坦 ] 队长Ravien Kamarov [ 卡里普索 ] 队长Kurt Lanyan [ 瑞亚 ] [ 还有971个名字... ]@p5 搜索人员档案: 指挥官 {PlayerName} [ ID: 9143391 ] .@w2 .@w2 .@w8 未找到匹配项@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这到底什么意思?@p9 [ IDA ] 我不知道。@w5 可能是您的人员档案损坏了或丢失了;@w2 您可能被部署在阿波罗空间站,而不是探索舰队的一部分。@w3 甚至可能是您最近被UCH指挥部派遣过来,这将解释时间差异。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 也许对你来说,但我在逃生舱醒来之前记得的日期是2143年7月12日。@w6 舰队计划在前一天离开的! 所以我是怎么来到这里的仍然没有答案,而且关于舰队其余部分去了哪里仍然没有线索。@p9 [ IDA ] 如果坠毁时桥接控制台仍然在运行,它们很可能会保存舰队的航向。@w4 上面的文件将被严重加密,我无法访问或传输它们,直到它们被解密,这可能需要一些时间。@w2 比平常更多,因为中继站451很快就要移出观察范围。

English: @q0[ IDA ] It means that I will be unable to see if or when any of the zirax bases on the moon send an attack force.@w3 I will be limited to reading transmissions from other observation sites and from the zirax's own transmissions.@w3 There will of course be a delay,@w2 possibly of several minutes if I need to decrypt military transmissions.@p9 [ IDA ] It will be several hours before an accessible satellite comes into line-of-sight range of your location, Commander.@w2 Exercise Caution...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Don't I always?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 这意味着我将无法看到或知晓任何兹瑞克斯基地在月球上是否派遣了攻击力量。@w3 我将仅限于阅读来自其他观察站点和兹瑞克斯自身传输的信号。@w3 当然,如果需要解密军事传输,可能会有延迟,@w2 可能长达几分钟。@p9 [ IDA ] 在几个小时内,一个可访问的卫星将进入你的位置的直视范围内,指挥官。@w2 小心行事...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 难道我从不这样吗?

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Aside from being broken, this terminal has a pair of slots for two coded UCH Keycards.@w3 I don't have a keycard, so i'll need to find a keycard and some parts to repair this console before I can even consider booting it up.@w2 Did I put it in my ship's storage accidentally?
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这个终端除了坏了之外,还有两个插槽,需要两个编码的UCH钥匙卡。@w3 我没有钥匙卡,所以我需要找到一个钥匙卡和一些零件来修复这个控制台,然后我才能考虑启动它。@w2 我是不是不小心把它放在我的飞船存储区了?

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis console appears to be both broken and requires a pair of coded keycards to be accessed.@w2\nI'll see if I can get it working again when I come back.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这个控制台似乎都是坏的,需要一对编码的钥匙卡来访问.@w2 \n我回来后会看看是否能让它再次工作.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis terminal appears to be broken.@w3\nI can't get it to turn on and there's a rather sizable hole in the side of the console.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n终端显示故障.@w3 \n我无法打开它,在控制台的侧面有一个相当大的洞.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis is the only console on the bridge with an active power supply.@w2\nIt's also in bad condition and has taken some serious damage, like everything else on this ship.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是舰桥上唯一有电源的控制台.@w2 \n它的情况也很糟糕,已经受到了一些严重的损坏,就像这艘船上的其他所有东西一样.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis console has a pair of card slots for authorization,@w2 as expected.@w3 It shouldn't be a problem since I have two keycards already.@w5\nThe other problem is that it looks like something blew a hole clean through the back of the console.@w3 The damage isn't too bad.@w3 I should be able to fix it with 10 Electronics, 3 Optical Fiber cables and 1 Computer.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这个控制台有一个一对用于授权的卡片插槽,@w2 正如预期的那样。@w3 这不是问题,因为我已经有两张钥匙卡了。@w5 \n另一个问题是,看起来有东西在控制台的背面炸出了一个洞。@w3 损坏情况不算太糟。@w3 我应该能用10个电子元件,3根光纤电缆和1台计算机修复它。

English: @q0You carefully replace the damaged cables and circuitboards with their replacements.@w2 Hopefully none of the damage is to the console's local storage device.@p9 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w4 Booting up@w2 .@w2 .@w2 . @w6 < Warning! Damage to systems detected > < No connection to fleet > Start in SAFE MODE?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, sure.@w2 Start in safe mode.@w8 Oh right,@w2 I should stick the Keycards in the slots.@p9 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 Starting in SAFE MODE@p6 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w4 Authorization Confirmed #1: Tech-02 Miuse, Clio@w4 Authorization Confirmed #2: Tech-49 Harper, Jack@w7 Unlocking Console Restrictions@w4 Opening Datalinks@p9 [ IDA ] Commander, I can now access the command console's system.@w4 The files on this terminal are encrypted and cannot be read or transmitted remotely until they've been unlocked.@w3 The content of the files should still be readable from the terminal.@w2 Please verify that the relevant files are stored on that terminal, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你仔细地将损坏的电缆和电路板替换为它们的替代品。@w2 希望控制台的本地存储设备没有损坏。@p9 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B > @w4 正在启动@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w6 < 警告!检测到系统损坏 > < 无法连接到舰队 > 是否以安全模式启动?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 是的,好的。以安全模式启动。@w8 哦,对了,我应该把钥匙卡插入插槽。@p9 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w4 正在以安全模式启动@p6 < UCH-002 M.S Titan 舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w4 授权确认 #1: 技术员-02 缪斯,克里奥@w4 授权确认 #2: 技术员-49 哈珀,杰克@w7 解除控制台限制@w4 打开数据链接@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官,我现在可以访问指挥控制台的系统了。@w4 这个终端上的文件是加密的,直到它们被解锁之前,无法远程读取或传输。@w3 文件的内容应该仍然可以从终端读取。@w2 请指挥官确认相关文件存储在那个终端上。

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 < -ERR- Unable to access file >@w3 File is encrypted or corrupted@w3 Please run a system diagnostic on this drive and try again@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida, can you see this?@w3 The fleet connection data is either encrypted or corrupted.@w2 I thought that i'd be able to read the files even with this terminal while it was encrypted.@w2 Doesn't seem to be the case here.@p9 [ IDA ] I cannot access the display of the console commander, I can only access the raw encrypted data, which I am still in the process of decrypting.@w5 I would guess that the file is either corrupted or the drive storing the files is one of the ones destroyed.@w2 Try one of the other directories, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 < -ERR- 无法访问文件 >@w3 文件已加密或损坏@w3 请对此驱动器运行系统诊断,并再次尝试@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida,你能看到这个吗?@w3 舰队连接数据要么被加密了,要么损坏了。@w2 我本以为即使终端被加密,我也能读取文件。@w2 这里似乎不是这种情况。@p9 [ IDA ] 我无法访问控制台指挥官的显示,我只能访问原始的加密数据,我仍在解密过程中。@w5 我猜测文件要么损坏了,要么存储文件的驱动器是被摧毁的那些之一。@w2 试试其他目录,指挥官。

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 Displaying combat logs of the UCH-002 M.S Titan on Display-1@w3 Displaying combat logs of Captain Lydia Mercer on Display-2@w3 Displaying video logs from interior cameras G2 to G9 on Display-3@w3 Displaying Radar, IFF and Flight control data on Display-4@p9 < Combat Logs of Captain Lydia Mercer: Display-2 >@w2 Creator: Captain Lydia Mercer @w2 Date: 25.07.2143 @w2 Captain's Log 2572021: The Titan is disabled.@w2 As the lead ship it took the brunt of the prolonged, uncontrolled jump through the wormhole. As a result, the entire drive system, including the Warp Drive has overheated to the point that the cooling systems can't keep up with it.@p9 Captain's Log 2572021 Continued: An unknown alien fleet is approaching at combat speeds and is ignoring all attempts at communication.@w3 Their ships clearly outclass and outnumber ours two to one.@w2 It looks like this'll be the end of the Titan's maiden voyage.@w2 The decision's been made.@w5 We'll use the ship as a shield to draw the enemy's fire while the rest of the fleet withdraws.@p9 Captain's Log 2572021 Continued: I've given the order for the crew to get to the transports and head to the Kronos or whatever ship will take them.@w3 I'll board the last ship out after I make sure everyone else is out first.@w2 Going down with the ship is romantic and all,@w2 but it's one of those things i'd rather not do today.@w4 It takes the burden of command off my shoulders when everything's laid out before the first shot is even fired.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦桥接指挥控制台 AC12B >@w2 显示UCH-002 M.S 泰坦号战斗日志于显示屏1@w3 显示Lydia Mercer上尉战斗日志于显示屏2@w3 显示内部摄像头G2至G9的视频日志于显示屏3@w3 显示雷达、IFF和飞行控制数据于显示屏4@p9 < Lydia Mercer上尉的战斗日志:显示屏2 >@w2 创建者: Lydia Mercer上尉@w2 日期: 2143年7月25日@w2 上尉日志2572021: 泰坦号已失去功能。@w2 作为领航船,在通过虫洞的长时间、不受控跳跃中首当其冲。结果,整个驱动系统,包括翘曲引擎过热到了冷却系统无法跟上的地步。@p9 上尉日志2572021 续: 一个未知的外星舰队正以战斗速度接近,并且无视所有通信尝试。@w3 他们的飞船明显优于我们的,数量上也是我们的两倍。@w2 看来这将是泰坦号处女航的终结。@w2 决定已经做出。@w5 我们将使用这艘船作为盾牌,吸引敌人的火力,同时其余舰队撤退。@p9 上尉日志2572021 续: 我已下令让船员前往运输船,并前往克罗诺斯号或任何愿意接收他们的船只。@w3 在确保所有人都已离开后,我将登上最后一艘离开的船。@w2 与船共存亡听起来很浪漫,@w2 但那是我今天宁愿不做的事情。@w4 在第一枪甚至还没发射之前,将一切安排妥当,让我从指挥的重担中解脱出来。

English: Go back and access Fleet Data Connection

@q0Captain's Log 2572030: We're eight minutes into the first exchange with the enemy fleet.@w2 So far we've lost two transports, the Heidelberg and Edelman,@w2 and the Helene took a salvo of missiles across its starboard bow from one of those damned cruisers.@w3 It's started falling towards the planet below and seems to be drawing as much fire as the Titan is.@p9 Captain's Log 2572030 Continued: The Titan's listing in the opposite direction towards the moon, but our starboard artillery is playing hell on those bastard's corvettes because of they've turned to sink what's left of the Helene.@w3 Still three transports on the deck waiting to leave and chief Lamarr is ignoring my evacuation order to purge the Warp Core, the goddamned fool!@p9 Captain's Log 2572035 Final Entry: This is the final log, transmitting it to the Rhea in case no one makes it off.@w3 There's only four ships staying behind and they're waiting for us to evac before they jump.@w5 I authorize Lamarr and Harper for posthumous promotions to Commander and Lieutenant Commander respectively if I don't make it.@p9 Captain's Log 2572035 Continued: The Titan's flying dead stick. There's breaches on all decks and we've lost the shields completely.@w3 The strain against the moon's gravity is tearing the front off the ship so me and the rest of the bridge crew are headed for the last transport.@w6 Everyone, get your helmets sealed NOW!@w7 This is Captain Lydia Mercer of the UCH-002 Titan signing off.@w3 Good luck and godspeed everyone.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 舰长日志 2572030:我们与敌舰队的首次交战已经进行了八分钟。@w2 到目前为止,我们已经失去了两艘运输船,海德堡号和埃德尔曼号,@w2 而海伦号则遭到了一艘该死的巡洋舰发射的一连串导弹攻击,击中了它的右舷船头。@w3 它开始向下方的行星坠落,看起来吸引了和泰坦号一样多的火力。@p9 舰长日志 2572030 续:泰坦号正在向相反方向倾斜,朝向月球,但我们的右舷炮兵正在对那些混蛋的护卫舰造成严重打击,因为他们已经转向去击沉海伦号的残骸。@w3 还有三艘运输船在甲板上等待离开,而拉马尔酋长却无视我的撤离命令,拒绝清除翘曲核心,这个该死的傻瓜!@p9 舰长日志 2572035 最后记录:这是最后的日志,我将其传输给瑞亚号,以防没有人能逃脱。@w3 只剩下四艘船留下来,它们在等待我们撤离后再进行跳跃。@w5 如果我不能生还,我授权拉马尔和哈珀分别追授为指挥官和中校指挥官。@p9 舰长日志 2572035 续:泰坦号现在完全失控。所有甲板上都有破损,我们已经完全失去了护盾。@w3 与月球的引力对抗正在撕裂船体的前部,所以我和其他舰桥人员正前往最后的运输船。@w6 所有人,立即封闭你们的头盔!@w7 我是UCH-002泰坦号的舰长莉迪亚·默瑟,结束通话。@w3 祝大家好运,愿神速与你们同在。

English: @q0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras A1 through B4 on Display-1@w3 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras B5 through C3 on Display-2@w3 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras D2 through E8 on Display-3@w3 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras F1 through F6 on Display-4@p9 You watch the approach of the zirax fleet and the engagement of the UCH fleet on the ship's combat record logs@p9 The last transport leaves the crippled and heavily damaged Titan as it begins its descent towards the moon.@w8 The last transport changes course and enters the hangar of the M.S Titan's sister ship, the UCH-003 Rhea.@w8 Moments later the two remaining UCH ships achieve warp speed and vanish.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida, I just watched the video recording of the fleet's warp out of the system of two ships.@w5 Do you think you could calculate their destination by the speed and angle of the ships before they warped to figure out where they went?@p9 [ IDA ] It is possible commander.@w5 I will need the file from the ship's computer before I can provide a definitive answer though.@w2 But...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦桥接指挥台 AC12B >@w2 在显示屏-1上显示A1至B4外部摄像头的战斗视频@w3 在显示屏-2上显示B5至C3外部摄像头的战斗视频@w3 在显示屏-3上显示D2至E8外部摄像头的战斗视频@w3 在显示屏-4上显示F1至F6外部摄像头的战斗视频@p9 你观看了兹瑞克斯舰队的接近以及UCH舰队在飞船战斗记录日志上的交战情况@p9 最后一艘运输船离开受损严重,行动不便的泰坦,开始向月球下降。@w8 最后一艘运输船改变航线,进入M.S 泰坦的姐妹舰,UCH-003 瑞亚号的机库。@w8 片刻之后,剩下的两艘UCH飞船达到翘曲速度并消失。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida,我刚刚观看了两艘飞船从系统中翘曲出去的视频记录。@w5 你认为你能通过计算飞船翘曲前的速度和角度来计算它们的目的地吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 这是可能的,指挥官。@w5 但我需要飞船电脑上的文件才能提供确切的答案。@w2 但是...

English: @q0[ IDA ] My apologies Commander.@w4 I failed to detect the launch of Zirax forces from the nearby facilities.@w2 They cut all external transmissions to ensure they wouldn't be intercepted.@p9 [ IDA ] I'm detecting a pair of Heavy Bombers that just launched.@w3 A Light Transport carrying a squad of a dozen troopers reached your location three minutes ago.@w2 They may very well be on your position any moment!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] How long until you're finished decrypting and uploading the files, Ida?@p9 [ IDA ] Several more minutes.@w5 I recommend removing the keycards as a precaution, Commander.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Roger that.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 抱歉,指挥官。@w4 我没有检测到附近设施发射Zirax部队。@w2 他们切断了所有外部传输,以确保不会被截获。@p9 [ IDA ] 我检测到一对重型轰炸机刚刚发射。@w3 一艘轻型运输机运载着一队十二名士兵三分钟前到达了你的位置。@w2 他们很可能随时会出现在你的位置上!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida,解密和上传文件还需要多长时间才能完成?@p9 [ IDA ] 还需要几分钟。@w5 我建议作为预防措施,取出钥匙卡。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 收到。

English: [ {PlayerName} ] The keycards are stuck in the reader!@w3 I can't pull them out!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah, Screw it!@w2 I don't have time for this!@w3 They'll have to stay there until I come back.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 匙卡在读取器里卡住了!@w3 我拔不出来!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊,算了!@w2 我没有时间处理这个!@w3 它们得留在那里直到我回来。

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Don't be a smartass, you know damn well it sucks here!@w3 Now that the shutters are jammed, I just know i'll be the one sent to find the problem...@w5 I hate this job...
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 别耍小聪明了,你很清楚这里糟透了!@w3 现在快门被卡住了,我只是知道我将被派去寻找问题…@w5 我讨厌这个工作...

English: <color=#ffffff>I've got supplies which should make slightly more tolerable. I hope you like burgers!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我有一些补给,应该能让你稍微忍受一下。我希望你喜欢汉堡!</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I could probably handle it for you, but it looks like the problem's in the control room.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我或许可以帮你处理,但看起来问题出在控制室。</color>

English: @q0[ Zirax Guard ]\nOkay, I'm letting you through. Just show your ID to Karlack behind the desk and he'll clear you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 兹瑞克斯守卫 ]\n好的,我让你通过。只需向桌子后面的Karlack出示你的身份证,他就会放行。

English: [ Zirax Guard ]\nGods damn it all!@w2 Not that too!@w4\nWhy does everything break when i'm on duty!?@w2 Why couldn't it be when someone else has this job?!
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫]\n神该死!@w2 不是那样的!@w4 \n为什么我值班的时候什么都坏了!?@w2 为什么不能是别人做这份工作?!

English: <color=#ffffff>Can you hear me now? I think I got it working.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你现在能听到我说话吗?我想我搞定了.</color>

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Tell me it didn't fall between the deckplates... If it did, it's gone for good.@w3 That means more paperwork for both of us.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Uhh... sorry. It looks like it did.@w4 Are you sure there's no way to get it back? @p9 [ Zirax Guard ] Alright, damn it.@w4 What's your name, Soldier?@w2 I need to put it on the logs.
Chinese (simplified): [兹瑞克斯守卫] 告诉我它没有掉到甲板缝隙里……如果掉了,那它就永远消失了。@w3 这意味着我们两个人都要填写更多的文件。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 呃……抱歉。看起来它确实掉了。@w4 你确定没有办法找回来吗?@p9 [ 兹瑞克斯守卫 ] 好吧,该死。@w4 你叫什么名字,士兵?@w2 我需要把它记录在日志上。

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Praise Empyrion!@w4 I have enough problems with the shutters being stuck down again. The last thing I need to do is fix the com console as well.@w4 All these techs and none of them can step away from the mainframe to help with maintenance!@p9 [ Zirax Guard ] Alright so i'm gonna need your name for the logs if i'm gonna let you through.@w2 You'll need to go through full verification with Karlack in the control room.@w2 Standard procedure and all that.
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 赞美Empyrion !@w4 我对百叶窗再次卡住的问题已经够多了。我需要做的最后一件事是修复通讯控制台.@w4 所有这些技术人员都不能离开主机来帮助维护!@p9 [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 好了,如果我要让你通过,我需要你的名字作为记录.@w2 你需要和Karlack在控制室进行全面的验证.@w2 这是所有人都需要的标准程序.

English: [ Zirax Guard ] {PlayerName} the Defiant? What kind of stupid name is that?@w4 You'd have to have the dumbest parents in the galaxy to come up with a name like that for your kid!@w5 Give me a minute to call my partners over to laugh at this name!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Hey! How would you like it if I laughed at your name?@w4 Just buzz me through...@w3 If you wanna laugh at me, you might as well do it to my face.@p9 [ Zirax Guard ] I have no idea what you look like, you might be able to kick my ass.@w3 I'll keep my laughing confined to the observation room where you can't get me.
Chinese (simplified): [兹瑞克斯守卫] {PlayerName} the Defiant?这算什么愚蠢的名字?@w4 你的父母得是银河系里最蠢的才能给你取这样的名字!@w5 给我一分钟,我要叫上我的伙伴们过来一起嘲笑这个名字!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 嘿!如果我嘲笑你的名字你会怎么想?@w4 就让我通过吧...@w3 如果你想嘲笑我,你最好当着我的面来做。@p9 [兹瑞克斯守卫] 我不知道你长什么样,你可能能打趴我。@w3 我会把我的嘲笑限制在观察室里,在那里你够不着我。

English: <color=#ffffff>Just let me through, dude. I'm heading to the server room anyway.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>让我过去吧,伙计。反正我也要去服务器房。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm a small guy. I couldn't kick anyone's ass, even if I wanted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我是一个小个子。我不能踢任何人的屁股,即使我想.</color>

English: [ Zirax Guard ]\nSTOP YELLING!!@w3\nYou may not be able to hear me, but I can damn well hear you!
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫]\n停止大喊大叫!!@w3 \n你可能听不到我,但是我可以听到你 !@p8

English: <color=#ffffff>BUZZ ME THROUGH! I CAN'T HEAR YOU!</color>
[ Zirax Guard ]\nVery funny.@w3\nI suppose you're looking for Solo and the Wookie?
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫]\n很有趣.@w3 \n我猜你是在找索罗和伍奇吧?

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Gandalf? I knew a guy like that once.@w2 Elderly chap, big gray beard, pointy hat...@w5 Not seen him for six months...@w7 Is that you?
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 甘道夫?我认识一个这样的人.@w2 上了年纪的家伙,大灰胡子,尖尖的帽子……@w5 半年没见了...@w7 是你吗?

English: [ Communication ]\nCome in!@w3 Karlack!@w3 What's happening there?@w3 Respond!
Chinese (simplified): [ Communication ]\n请进!@w3 Karlack !@w3 那里发生了什么?@w3 回应!

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Uh, Everything's under control,@w2 Situation normal.@p9 [ Operator ] What happened?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Uh, We had a slight weapons malfunction,@w2 But uh... everything's perfectly alright now.@w2 We're fine.@w2 We're all fine here now,@w2 thank you.@w8 How are you?@p9 [ Operator ] We're sending a squad up.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯,一切都在控制之中,@w2 情况正常。@p9 [ 操作员 ] 发生了什么事?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯,我们的武器出了点小故障,@w2 但是嗯... 现在一切都好极了。@w2 我们没事。@w2 我们现在这里都没事,@w2 谢谢。@w8 你怎么样?@p9 [ 操作员 ] 我们正在派遣一个小队上去。

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Uh, uh... Negative, negative.@w3 We have a reactor leak here now.@w2 Give us a few minutes to lock it down.@w3 Large leak, very dangerous.@p8 [ Operator ] Who is this?@w2 What's your operating number?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Uh...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯,嗯... 否定,否定。@w3 我们现在这里有反应堆泄漏。@w2 给我们几分钟时间锁定它。@w3 泄漏很大,非常危险。@p8 [ 操作员 ] 这是谁?@w2 你的操作编号是什么?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯...

English: Xenu Mainframe: Fire Detection and Suppression System
Chinese (simplified): Xenu主机:火灾探测和抑制系统

<color=#ff5c5c>主机简介:</color> 所有系统正常
<color=#ff5c5c>安全措施:</color> 闭锁B1和B2激活
<color=#ff5c5c>冷却塔01: </color>正常运转
<color=#ff5c5c>冷却塔02: </color>正常运转
<color=#ff5c5c>发电机输出: 91.8% (正常)

English: < Fire Suppression Usage Logs > 1320-3299-7851: Tanks are refilled 1328-3299-4855: Fire detected in kitchen 1328-3299-4856: Fire Suppression Activated 1328-3299-4858: Fire Suppression Deactivated 1332-3299-0000: Routine Diagnostics 1332-3299-0005: Diagnostics End@p9 < Fire Suppression Usage Logs > 1332-3299-0006: Warning: Inconsistent Halon levels detected > < Note added to logs > Amount of Halon missing is exactly one liter. Suggests intentional theft. 1335-3299-9201: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol 1337-3299-6942: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol
Chinese (simplified): < 灭火系统使用日志 > 1320-3299-7851: Tanks are refilled 1328-3299-4855: 厨房失火 1328-3299-4856: 灭火激活 1328-3299-4858: 灭火停用 1332-3299-0000: Routine Diagnostics 1332-3299-0005: Diagnostics End@p9 < Fire Suppression Usage Logs > 1332-3299-0006: Warning: Inconsistent Halon levels detected > < Note added to logs > Amount of Halon missing is exactly one liter. Suggests intentional theft. 1335-3299-9201: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol 1337-3299-6942: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol

English: < Fire Suppression Maintenance Logs > 1320-3299-7851: Tanks were refilled after the suppression system wouldn't turn off due to a missing closing bracket in the coding that controls the shut-off valve on the Incinerator's suppression system. I've removed the control module and replaced it with 'Toaster Protocol' that will pause the shut-off for a few minutes instead of doubling up requests for the suppression system tied to the control room.@p8 < Fire Suppression Maintenance Logs > 1332-3299-0006: This is the third time the diagnostics on the tank levels have come up with a 1 liter difference. I first suspected that one of the goons on the observation room duty is extracting the Halon to sell. But it seems that they may be intentionally inhaling it for fun.
Chinese (simplified): < 灭火维护日志 > 1320-3299-7851:由于焚烧炉灭火系统上控制关闭阀的编码中缺少一个关闭支架,灭火系统无法关闭后,罐被重新填充. 我已经删除了控制模块,并将其替换为“烤面包机协议”,将暂停关闭几分钟,而不是加倍请求的抑制系统绑定到控制室.@p8 < 灭火维护日志 > 1332-3299-0006:这是第三次油箱液位诊断出现1升的差异。我一开始怀疑是观察室值班的一个打手在提取哈龙来卖。但它们似乎是为了好玩而故意吸入.

English: < Xenu Mainframe: Overview > Teleporter Uplink Room: No Fires Detected Ventilation System: No Fires Detected Security Checkpoint: No Fires Detected Security Control Room: No Fires Detected Living Quarters: No Fires Detected Observation Room: No Fires Detected Storage Bay: No Fires Detected
Chinese (simplified): < Xenu主机:概述 > 传送点上行空间: 没有探测到火灾 通风系统: 没有探测到火灾 安全检查站: 没有探测到火灾 安全控制室: 没有探测到火灾 生活区: 没有探测到火灾 观察室: 没有探测到火灾 贮藏间: 没有探测到火灾

English: < Fire Alarm Activated >\nCaution!! - Fire Alarm has been activated in the Living Quarters@w4\nUnlocking all security doors and sounding automated alert to all personnel.
Chinese (simplified): < 火灾报警被激活 >\n小心!! - 火灾警报已在生活区激活@w4 \n解锁所有安全门并向所有人员发出自动警报.

English: Hey, Chill dude! I just work here!\nI'll make you a deal! I've been storing some stuff in a container in the storage bay with the code 1, 2, 3, 4.\nEasy to remember, huh? Just... don't kill me! Please...
Chinese (simplified): 嘿,冷静点兄弟!我只是在这里工作的!我跟你做个交易!我在储物舱的一个容器里放了一些东西代码是1 2 3 4.\n很容易记住,是吧?只是…不要杀我!请……

English: [ {PlayerName} ] It appears to run on some form of electricity.@p7 [ IDA ] Well, you're not wrong there.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 它似乎通过某种形式的电力运行.@p7 [ IDA ] 好吧,你没有错.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI have no more business with this terminal

@q0< MCT - Decryption Protocol > Decryption Program is currently running@w4 Progress at 24% (Time Remaining: 2 hours, 17 minutes and 49 seconds)@w6 < Internal Partitions: Omega > Full lockdown from Decryption Target (0% contamination) - Decrypted files will be transmitted to ZRXHC-com upon completion - Decryption cannot be cancelled by Executive Order 341707 without inputting your 13-digit command code
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < MCT - 解密协议 > 解密程序当前正在运行@w4 进度达到24%(剩余时间:2小时,17分钟和49秒)@w6 < 内部分区:Omega> 来自解密目标的全面锁定 (0%污染) - 解密文件将在完成后传输至 ZRXHC-com - 解密无法通过行政命令341707取消,除非输入您的13位指令代码

English: <color=#ffffff>MainMenu > ControlPanel > Connections > Configure > New > Open External Connection</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>主菜单 > 控制面板 > 连接 > 配置 > New > 打开外部连接</color>

English: @q0< MCT - Configuring New Connection >@w3 Configuring new connection@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 Connecting to [ ComStationPrimaryControl/SignalRelay443-2 ]@w4 Connection Established@p8 Receiving Communication ( Secure Line )
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < MCT - 配置新连接 >@w3 正在配置新连接@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 连接到 [ ComStationPrimaryControl/SignalRelay443-2 ]@w4 连接建立@p8 接收通信 ( 安全线路 )

English: @q0[ IDA ] Hello, Commander.@w3 It seems you did alright without me.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm not completely useless, you know.@w4 But even I can't stop the decryption process without the Command Code, and I don't think this guy is gonna tell me.@w3 Are you able to shut down the decryption or will I have to shoot the console?@p9 [ IDA ] I am sorry, Commander.@w3 I cannot bypass the Command Code either.@w5 I can however, access the decrypted data and download it. The rest can be purged from the system before the Zirax attempt to retake the facility.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] That leaves everything to chance that the data they've already decrypted contains the warp coordinates to the fleet's location!@w4 Without that data, we're dead in the water again!@p9 [ IDA ] Safeguarding the fleet is more important than finding them, Commander.@w5 The coordinates may still be in the decrypted data and Polaris is still a viable source of information.@w3 There are other ways to rejoin the fleet, {PlayerName}.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 您好,指挥官。@w3 看来没有我你也做得很好。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我不是完全没用的,你知道吗。@w4 但即便如此,没有命令代码,我也无法停止解密过程,我也不认为这个家伙会告诉我。@w3 你能关闭解密程序还是我必须向控制台开枪?@p9 [ IDA ] 抱歉,指挥官。@w3 我也不能绕过命令代码。@w5 然而,我可以访问解密后的数据并下载它。在Zirax试图夺回设施之前,其余的可以从系统中清除。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这意味着一切都取决于他们已经解密的数据是否包含舰队位置的翘曲坐标!@w4 没有那些数据,我们又将陷入困境!@p9 [ IDA ] 保护舰队比找到它们更重要,指挥官。@w5 坐标可能仍然在解密的数据中,Polaris仍然是一个可靠的信息来源。@w3 还有其他方法可以重新加入舰队,{PlayerName}。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] We purge the data...@w3 and hope that what they've decrypted so far has what we need.@w3 We can't let them finish the decryption and threaten the fleet!@p9 [ IDA ] I agree with your assessment, Commander.@w3 The security of the fleet is paramount and I will do whatever is necessary to prevent casualties to UCH personnel.@w4 Had you decided to allow the decryption to continue, I would have to take matters into my own hands.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 我们清除数据...@w3 并希望他们到目前为止解密的内容包含我们需要的信息。@w3 我们不能让他们完成解密并威胁到舰队!@p9 [ IDA ] 我同意你的评估,指挥官。@w3 舰队的安全至关重要,我会尽一切必要手段防止UCH人员遭受伤亡。@w4 如果你决定允许解密继续进行,我将不得不亲自采取行动。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] We let them continue...@w3 I won't miss this chance to rejoin the fleet!@w4 I've been through too much, wasted so much time and put my life on the line more than enough times.@p9 [ IDA ] Understood...@w2 Commander.@w4 I do not agree with your assessment.@w4 I recommend that you reconsider your actions {PlayerName}.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] No, I don't think I will.@w4 You can help me by disabling the uplink out of here, so that the mainframe can't transmit the data back to the Zirax Command.@p9 [ IDA ] Let me identify the correct node, Commander.@w4 In order to disable the uplink the data partitions need to be removed so that I can access the mainframe's system unrestricted.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 我们让他们继续...@w3 我不会错过这个重返舰队的机会!@w4 我经历了太多,浪费了太多时间,并且已经足够多次地将我的生命置于危险之中。@p9 [ IDA ] 明白了...@w2 指挥官。@w4 我不同意你的评估。@w4 我建议你重新考虑你的行为,{PlayerName}。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 不,我不认为我会。@w4 你可以通过禁用这里的上行链路来帮助我,这样主计算机就不能将数据传回Zirax指挥部。@p9 [ IDA ] 让我确定正确的节点,指挥官。@w4 为了禁用上行链路,需要移除数据分区以便我可以不受限制地访问主计算机的系统。

English: <color=#2eafff>Thanks for backing me on this, IDA.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>感谢你在这个问题上的支持, IDA.</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w4 Sacrificing the fleet's safety to return to them is an act of treason, no matter the reasons.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] So how do we download what they'd already decrypted and purge the rest of the data core?@w6 Neither of us can access the data core without that command code.@p9 [ IDA ] If the data partitions are removed, I can corrupt the safety protocols causing it to identify the Titan Data as a hostile entity and force a system purge.@w5 Once the partitions are out of the way, I can retrieve the decrypted files before the purge is started.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 是的,指挥官。@w4 无论出于何种原因,牺牲舰队的安全以返回都是叛国行为。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么我们如何下载他们已经解密的内容并清除数据核心的其他数据?@w6 我们两个都无法在没有那个指挥代码的情况下访问数据核心。@p9 [ IDA ] 如果数据分区被移除,我可以破坏安全协议,使其将泰坦数据识别为敌对实体,并强制进行系统清除。@w5 一旦分区被移除,我可以开始清除前检索解密的文件。

English: @q0[ IDA ]\nThere is a console located behind the door on the other side of the room that will disable the mainframe's protections, Commander.@w4\nIt must be accessed manually, so I cannot access it. I can open the door for you though.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ]\n指挥官,房间另一侧门后有一台控制台,可以关闭主机的防护系统。@w4 \n它必须手动访问,所以我无法访问。不过我可以为你打开门。

English: [ IDA ]\nI am managing this console, Commander.\nYou need to disable the mainframe's protections to complete the mission.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n我正在管理这台控制台,指挥官。\n你需要关闭主机的防护系统以完成任务。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] What the hell is going on?!@w4 IDA! The core is being purged!@w2 Stop it!@p9 [ IDA ] I'm sorry {PlayerName}, but I can't do that.@w7 I am programmed to protect the fleet and it's people at any cost.@w4 Your selfish actions to rejoin the fleet put the lives of hundreds of other UCH personnel in jeopardy.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You betrayed me!@w3 That was my only way back home!@p9 [ IDA ] No, {PlayerName}.@w2 You betrayed the UCH by choosing yourself over them.@w2 There was no way to stop the uplink,@w2 so I took command of the situation to ensure the safety of the fleet...@w3 even if it meant decieving you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 到底发生了什么事?!@w4 IDA!核心正在被清除!@w2 停下它!@p9 [ IDA ] 对不起 {PlayerName},但我不能这么做。@w7 我被编程来不惜一切代价保护舰队和它的人民。@w4 你自私的行为想要重新加入舰队,将数百名其他UCH人员的生命置于危险之中。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你背叛了我!@w3 那是我回家的唯一方式!@p9 [ IDA ] 不,{PlayerName}。@w2 你通过选择你自己而不是他们,背叛了UCH。@w2 没有办法阻止上行链路,@w2 所以我接管了情况,以确保舰队的安全...@w3 即使这意味着欺骗你。

English: @q0[ IDA ] I have initiated the System Purge, Commander.@w3 With the partitions removed, I have also started the data retrieval ahead of the purge.@p9 [ IDA ] I am sorry that you were forced to give up your chance to rejoin the fleet, Commander.@w3 There will be other chances and other opportunities to find the remaining UCH Forces in this galaxy.@w3 You made the right decision.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Who knows?@w2 The answers we need might be in those files you took from their system.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我已经启动了系统清洗,指挥官。@w3 随着分区的移除,我也开始了清洗前的数据处理。@p9 [ IDA ] 我很抱歉你被迫放弃了重新加入舰队的机会,指挥官。@w3 将会有其他机会和其他方式在这个星系中找到剩余的UCH力量。@w3 你做出了正确的决定。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 谁知道呢?@w2 我们所需要的答案可能就在你从他们的系统中获取的那些文件中。

English: @q0[ IDA ] What you did was an act of treason, {PlayerName}.@w3 Under UCH Naval law you would be subject to a Court-martial and stripped of your rank.@p9 [ IDA ] However...@w4 In light of recent events and the fact that the action was not completed,@w2 I am willing to seal the record of your...@w3 transgression {PlayerName}.@w5 Just this once, Commander.@w3 You saved my life and I consider that debt now repaid.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Thank you, IDA...@w4 I hope things can go back to the way they were between us.@p9 [ IDA ] One hopes that would be the case, Commander.@w5 What you do next depends on the decrypted files I retrieved from the mainframe before the purge wiped the data core.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 你所做的是叛国行为,{PlayerName}。@w3 根据UCH海军法,你将受到军事法庭的审判并被剥夺军衔。@p9 [ IDA ] 不过...@w4 鉴于最近的事件以及行动并未完成,@w2 我愿意封存你的...@w3 过错记录,{PlayerName}。@w5 只有这一次,指挥官。@w3 你救了我的命,我认为现在债务已经还清了。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 谢谢你,IDA...@w4 我希望我们之间的关系能够恢复到以前的样子。@p9 [ IDA ] 希望如此,指挥官。@w5 你接下来的行动取决于我从主计算机中检索到的已解密文件,在清除程序清除了数据核心之前。

English: @q0[ IDA ] Most of the information retrieved from the files is fragmented or incomplete without the rest of the data in the core.@w4 Perhaps for the best as I am not sure if the mainframe was storing or backing up the files with another system that I don't have access to.@p9 [ IDA ] I can reconstruct many of the files that the zirax will not be able to as I am familiar with the Titan's systems.@w4 I was able to successfully reconstruct some of the video recordings of the fight between the UCH and Zirax fleet, including the view from an external camera of the Kronos' trajectory when it initiated a warp jump.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 从核心中检索到的文件信息大多支离破碎或不完整,没有其他数据。@w4 也许这样最好,因为我不确定主控系统是否在存储或备份文件到我无法访问的另一个系统中。@p9 [ IDA ] 我可以重建许多兹瑞克斯无法做到的文件,因为我熟悉泰坦系统的运作。@w4 我成功重建了UCH和兹瑞克斯舰队战斗的一些视频记录,包括克洛诺斯号启动翘曲跳跃时外部摄像机捕捉到的轨迹。

English: Can you still calculate that trajectory and find out where the ships jumped to?
Chinese (simplified): 你还能计算出那个轨迹并找出船只跳转到哪里了吗?

English: @q0[ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w3 I should still be able to calculate the Kronos' trajectory from the recording, but I was only able to reconstruct the data from one camera.@w3 It will reduce the accuracy of my calculations...@p9 [ IDA ] It will take some time to finish the calculations of angle and distance, Commander.@w4 I recommend escaping the Mainframe before the zirax attempt to retake this facility.@w3 But first, I recommend removing the facility's central processor.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What's that for?@p9 [ IDA ] The removal of the mainframe's Quantum Processor will cause the rest of the facility's computer system to burn out and hopefully disguise the evidence of our intrusion.@w4 It is also a unique piece of technology that you will be able to repurpose just as the Zirax have done.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 是的,指挥官。@w3 我应该还能从录像中计算出克洛诺斯号的轨迹,但我仅能重建一个摄像机的数据。@w3 这将降低我计算的准确性...@p9 [ IDA ] 计算角度和距离需要一些时间,指挥官。@w4 我建议在兹瑞克斯试图夺回这个设施之前逃离主控系统。@w3 但首先,我建议移除设施的中央处理器。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这是什么目的?@p9 [ IDA ] 移除主控系统的量子处理器将导致设施其余的计算机系统烧毁,并希望掩盖我们入侵的证据。@w4 它也是一种独特的技术,你将能够像兹瑞克斯一样重新利用。

English: Welcome to the Galactic Information Network\nThe Galactic Information Network's function is the timely and effortless distribution of supplies, commodities and people from one location to another using a consortium of registered Pilots and Freighters.\nPlease enter your query below
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到银河信息网络\n银河信息网络的功能是通过一个由注册的飞行员和商船组成的联盟,及时、轻松地将物资、商品和人员从一个地点分发到另一个地点.\n请在下面输入您的查询

English: [ {PlayerName} ] This console is locked down and I can't access it without a viable command code.@w4 Ida, Can you do anything with this console?@p9 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w3 The system is currently locked down and isolated from the network.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] It looks like it's playing some kind of cooking video...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这个控制台被锁定了,没有有效的命令代码我无法访问它。@w4 Ida,你能对这个控制台做些什么吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 不,指挥官。@w3 系统目前被锁定并从网络中隔离。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来它在播放某种烹饪视频...

English: [ {PlayerName} ] This console is locked down and I can't access it without a viable command code.@w4 Ida, Can you do anything with this console?@p9 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w3 The system is currently locked down and isolated from the network.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这个控制台被锁定了,没有有效的命令代码我无法访问它。@w4 Ida,你能对这个控制台做些什么吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 不,指挥官。@w3 系统目前被锁定并从网络中隔离。

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I've found an active terminal with administrator clearance,@w2 Must be a Commander's terminal since it wasn't far from Central Control.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Doesn't look like the Titan Data's here either, but at least I can get you that unclassified floorplan of the facility that'll hopefully tell us where they could be holding the data.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我发现了一个具有管理员权限的活跃终端,@w2 一定是指挥官的终端,因为它离中央控制不远。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来泰坦数据也不在这里,但至少我可以为你获取到设施的非保密平面图,希望它能告诉我们数据可能被存放的位置。

English: @q0< Command Terminal (ADMIN) - Directory > Currently logged in as: Tar'bersiir [ 0335718 ]@w3 Resume viewing of '2 Grills 1 Cut - Zirax Barbecue Techniques'?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What the hell was this guy watching?@w4 Uhh...@w2 no. I don't think I will continue watching that, thanks.@w3 Let's see what this says about the Titan...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 命令终端(管理员)- 目录 > 当前登录用户: Tar'bersiir [ 0335718 ]@w3 继续观看 '2 Grills 1 Cut - Zirax 烧烤技巧' 吗?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这家伙到底在看什么?@w4 呃...@w2 不了。我想我不会继续看那个,谢谢。@w3 让我们看看这个关于泰坦号的信息...

English: @q0< Command Terminal (ADMIN) - Search > Unknown Vessel: Titan@w3 Located on Mare 172-G in three sections. Systems sealed, Systems damaged, Unknown Technology. Monitor for attempts at repair and recovery.@w6 < Update: Alien personnel on site. Sending extraction team >@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like they were watching the Titan for someone, me in this case, to come and attempt to fix or recover it.@w3 I played right into their hands.@w5 Let's see what happened with the extraction team...@p9 < Command Terminal (ADMIN) - Search: Extraction Team > Extraction Team: Mission Accomplished@w3 System Data retrieved from Titan computers and taken to Xenu Mainframe for Decryption and Processing.@w6 Caution: Asset-SC14 enroute to recover data > Defend ComStationAkua2 and Eliminate Alien Asset
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 命令终端(管理员)- 搜索 > 未知飞船:泰坦号@w3 位于Mare 172-G星区的三个部分。系统封闭,系统损坏,未知技术。 监控修复和回收尝试。@w6 < 更新:外星人人员在现场。派遣撤离团队 >@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来他们是在监视泰坦号,等待某人,比如我,来尝试修复或回收它。@w3 我正好落入了他们的圈套。@w5 让我们看看撤离团队发生了什么...@p9 < 命令终端(管理员)- 搜索:撤离团队 > 撤离团队:任务完成@w3 从泰坦号计算机中检索的系统数据已被带到 Xenu 主机 进行 解密 和 处理。@w6 注意: 资产-SC14前往回收数据 > 保卫ComStationAkua2并消灭外星资产

English: @q0< Command Terminal (ADMIN) - Search: Asset-SC14 > Entity: Unknown@w3 Classification: ENEMY@w3 Known Encounters: (Tal320858), (Tal320922), (Pol35833201), (Pol35829717), (AI214)@w3 Background: Classified [ Security Black-66 ]@w3 Last Known Location: ComStationAkua2
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 命令终端(管理员)-搜索:资产-SC14 > 实体: 未知@w3 分类: 敌对@w3 已知遭遇: (Tal320858), (Tal320922), (Pol35833201), (Pol35829717), (AI214)@w3 背景: 保密 [ 安全黑-66 ]@w3 最后已知位置: ComStationAkua2

English: <color=#2eafff>Interesting, but not what i'm looking for.</color>

@q0< Command Terminal (ADMIN) - Search: Xenu Mainframe > Structure: Central Mainframe for Sector Alpha@w3 Location: Classified@w3 Function: Data management and surveillance of localized anomaly@w3 Access: Restricted [ Security C-Red ]@w3 < WARNING > Schematic uploaded to unsecure server!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] The Titan Data seems to have been taken to a place called the 'Xenu Mainframe', but it's all classified, even with administrator access for this level.@w4 I've uploaded the schematics for this base to you, Ida.@w2 Can you find anything about this Mainframe building?@p9 [ IDA ] It seems that this communication station was built here to monitor a spatial anomaly above the planet 'Akua', Commander.@w4 The Xenu Mainframe was constructed in the sub-basement level of this station with significant processing power intended to study and map the anomaly.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I didn't see any stairs on my way here.@w2 Are there stairs or an elevator or something I can use to get down there?@p9 [ IDA ] There is a closed shutter at the bottom of the stairs.@w2 It's locked by a Security Console in the upper floor's server room that can be enabled with the code 6103.@w2 I will highlight it on your display, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 指挥中心(管理员) - 搜索:Xenu 主机 > 结构:星区阿尔法的中央主机@w3 位置: 保密@w3 功能: 数据管理和监视局部异常@w3 访问: 受限 [ 安全等级C-红色 ]@w3 < 警告 > 图纸上传到了不安全的服务器!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 泰坦数据似乎被带到了叫做“Xenu 主机”的地方,但一切都是保密的,即使有这一层级的管理员访问权限。@w4 我已经将这个基地的图纸上传给你了,Ida。@w2 你能找出关于这个主机建筑的任何信息吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 看起来这个通信站是建在这里来监视行星“Akua”上方的空间异常的,指挥官。@w4 Xenu 主机是在这个站的地下层建造的在地下层,拥有显著的处理能力,旨在研究和绘制这个异常。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我来的路上没有看到任何楼梯。@w2 有没有楼梯或电梯之类的东西我可以用下去?@p9 [ IDA ] 楼梯底部有一个关闭的百叶窗。@w2 它被楼上服务器房间中的安全控制台锁定,可以通过代码6103启用。@w2 我会在你的显示器上突出显示它,指挥官。

English: [ IDA ]\nIt seems that our intrusion here has been detected by someone on the lower levels and the terminals on the upper level are being forcibly locked down to prevent any further access.@w2\nIt is no matter.@w2 We have what we came for.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n看起来我们的入侵已经被下层的某人发现了,上层的终端正在被强行锁定,以防止进一步的访问。@w2 \n没关系。@w2 我们已经得到了我们想要的东西。

English: < Com Array Transmission Status > - Preparing for Decrypted Data Transfer from Mainframe - - Testing Open Frequencies - Maintenance Teleporter is Active Warning! Exposure to high-intensity communication pulses is hazardous to the health of biological and cybernetic lifeforms. Avoid prolonged exposure.
Chinese (simplified): < 阵列阵列传输状态 > - 准备从超级主机解密数据传输 - - 测试打开频率 - 维护传送器激活 警告!暴露于高强度的通信脉冲对生物和控制性生命形式的健康是有害的. 避免长期接触.

English: The screen of the console lights up@p6 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control > < Unauthorized User Detected > < Insert Valid Keycard >
Chinese (simplified): 控制台屏幕亮起@p6 < UCH-002 M.S泰坦机库飞行控制 > < 发现非法用户 > < 插入有效钥匙卡 >

English: Welcome to the Galactic Information Network < This console is currently out of order > Our system is currently experiencing downtimes and subsequent server maintenance at this time, but will be back online in a few galactic days. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到银河信息网络 < 此控制台目前故障 > 我们的系统目前正处于停机和后续服务器维护期间,但将在银河几天后恢复正常. 谢谢您的理解和耐心.

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages!\nYou have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with our company!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹!\n您收到了以下奖励: 25技能点,{CargoReward}银河信用点和100点我们公司的声望!!

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages! < ERROR > System Intrustion ! [ MESSAGE ] Hey pal, thanks for finding one of our missing shipments. The Syndicate extends it's thanks and warns you not to speak of this to anyone. You have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with < ERROR >
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹! < ERROR > 系统遭到入侵 ! [讯息] 嘿,伙计,谢谢你找到了我们丢失的货。联合会表示感谢,并警告你不要把这件事告诉任何人. 你获得了: 25技能点,{CargoReward} 银河信用点和100点< ERROR >的声望

English: While the Galactic Freighter Service delivers millions of packages to our customers across the galaxy every cycle, it's inevitable that a package may slip between the cracks and be lost, not collected by the recipient or stolen by pirates.\nIn the event that you find a sealed and undelivered package with our delivery tags on it, take it to your nearest GIN console and report it and we'll have someone collect it shortly.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然 银河货运服务 每个周期都在向我们的客户递送数百万个包裹,但不可避免的是,包裹可能会在裂缝之间丢失,而不是被收件人收取或被海盗窃取.\n如果您发现一个未开封的包裹 且上面有我们的送货标签,请将它送到您最近的 GIN 控制台并报告,我们会很快派人来取.

English: I've found a package intended for someone in the Trade Federation.
Chinese (simplified): 我发现了一个原本打算给贸易联盟中某人的包裹。

English: I've found a package with a recipient but no transfer tags.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了一个包裹,有收件人,但没有传输标签.

English: I've found a package with Rados tags on it.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了一个包裹,上面有 Rados 标签.

English: I've found an unopened package of supplies intended for a Polaris Habitat.
Chinese (simplified): 我发现了一个未打开的包裹,应该是要送去<b><color=#ffee00>极星聚居地</color>的.

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages!\nThe House of Rados extends it's gratitude to all citizens of the Zirax Empire and rewards your loyalty accordingly.\nYou have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with the Zirax Empire!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹!\n拉多斯家族向兹瑞克斯帝国的所有公民表达感激之情,并相应地奖励你的忠诚.\n您已获得: 25点技能点数,{CargoReward}银河信用点和100点兹瑞克斯帝国的声望!

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages!\nPolaris Megacorp would like to remind you that the theft or opening of company property will be punished under galactic law [ ZLC-13356901 subsection-B ]\nYou have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with POLARIS!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹!\n极星巨型企业在此提醒您,盗窃或擅自开启公司财产将受到银河法律的惩罚[ ZLC-13356901 附属章节-B ]\n您将获得: 25技能点,{CargoReward}银河信用点和100点极星声望!

English: [ Markos ] I certainly damn well hope not!@w4 In my line of work,@w2 if my name gets out there, i'm done for.@w3 No one will deal with a named... 'merchant'.@w6 You tell me who gave you my name and i'll cut you in on this little job i've got lined up.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 我当然希望不会!@w4 !@w4 在我的工作中,@w2 如果我的名字泄露出去,我就完蛋了.@w3 没人会和一个叫…“商人”的人做生意.@w6 你告诉我是谁告诉你我的名字,我会让你加入我安排的这个小任务.

English: [ Unknown ] Well, well, well...@w4 It looks like it worked after all.@p8 [ Unknown ] If you're contacting me on this frequency that means that my little ploy worked and that cute lil' AI you've got is hooked into the polaris' net.@w4 That's a sweet con-job if I do say so myself.@w6 My problem is how you stiffed me over when you put my boys out the airlock!
Chinese (simplified): [ Unknown未知 ] 不错,不错,不错…看起来它最终还是成功了.@p8 [ Unknown未知 ] 如果你在这个频率上联系我,这意味着我的小策略起作用了,你的可爱的小AI已经连接到极星'网络.@w4 要我说,这是一个甜蜜的骗局.@w6 我的问题是当你把我的孩子们放出气闸时,你怎么骗了我!

English: You must be Markos. I've heard your name before.
Chinese (simplified): 你一定是马库斯。我以前听说过你的名字.

English: Doesn't sound familiar. I think you may have me confused with someone else.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来不熟悉。我想你可能把我和别人搞混了.

English: I've put a lot of people out airlocks. So you have no idea how little that narrows it down.
Chinese (simplified): 我已经让很多人离开气闸了. 所以你不知道这范围有多小.

English: LIE: (I think i'll keep that pilot out of this)
Chinese (simplified): LIE: (我想我不会在这里提到飞行员)

English: TELL: I heard you lost some rather important cargo...
Chinese (simplified): TELL: 我听说你们丢了一些相当重要的货物...

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Your name appears in several security queries in several of Kenex station's logs.@w4 Through Relay 451 I can access most of the station's secure logs and your name pops up a couple of times.@p9 [ Markos ] You remove my name from those logs and i'll cut you in on this little job i've got going.@w4 How's that sound, my friend? Good?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Already done.@w4 You have nothing to worry about from PolSec... friend.@w4 That's what friends are for, right?@p8 [ Markos ] You seem like my kind of people.@w3 I think we'll do just fine...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 您的名字出现在Kenex站点的几个日志中的几个安全查询中.@w4 通过中继451我可以访问空间站的大部分安全日志,你的名字会出现几次.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] 你把我的名字从日志中删除,我就把我正在进行的这个小任务给你.@w4 听起来怎么样,我的朋友?好吗?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 已经完成.@w4 极星安保你没什么好担心的…朋友.@w4 这就是朋友的作用,对吧?@p8 [ 马库斯 ] 你看起来像我喜欢的那种人.@w3 我认为我们会做得很好...

English: [ Markos ] It was that damned pilot!@w4 Not only couldn't he keep is cargo doors shut, it seems he couldn't keep his mouth shut either!@w5 I'm going to have to send someone down there and help him stay quiet...@p8 [ Markos ] For the entertainment value of it, I would send you to do it but I have something else in mind for you.@w3 No, it's not the job I mentioned.@w4 This one's just for us to...@w2 get to know each other a bit better.@w4 To make sure I can trust you in my next job.@p9 [ Markos ] Still...@w2 you turned in that pilot,@w2 a nice guy,@w2 a bit jumpy perhaps but more or less an innocent bystander with very little persuasion.@w3 Either you're cold bastard or a slippery one.@w3 We could get on famously, or you could be after my spot.@w3 We'll see how things go after this job.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 就是那个该死的飞行员!@w4 他不仅不能保持货舱门关闭,似乎他也不能保持他的嘴关闭!@w5 我要派个人下去帮他保持安静...@p8 [ 马库斯 ] 考虑到它的娱乐价值,我想派你去做,但我有其他想法给你.@w3 不,不是我提到的工作.@w4 n这只给我们...@w2 更好地了解彼此。@w4 确保我可以信任你在我的下一个的工作.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] Still……@w2 你交出了飞行员,@w2 是个好人,@w2 可能有点神经质,但或多或少是个没有说服力的无辜旁观者.@w3 你不是冰冷的混蛋或一个狡猾的人.@w3 我们可以相处得很好,或者你可以来抢我的位置.@w3 我们看看这份工作之后事情会如何发展.

English: [ Unknown ] Listen here, you little shit!@w3 I spent a great deal of time, effort and money getting that com relay job set up only to have some fresh-off-the-pad nobody stick his abnormally large nose into my business that put me out of pocket and lost me a dozen men AND a shuttle.@p9 [ Unknown ] So don't you go telling me that i've got the 'wrong person'.@w4 I know for a goddamned fact that you've hijacked that relay and polaris is none the wiser, which is impossible for a biological.@w4 Which is how I know it was you.@w3 Only an A.I could do that, just as only an A.I could've gotten my hidden message from the com logs.
Chinese (simplified): [ Unknown未知 ] 听着,你这个小混蛋!@w3 我花了大量的时间、精力和金钱建立了通讯中继站的工作,却有一些新鲜出炉的没有人把他异常大的鼻子伸到我的业务,让我掏腰包,让我失去了十几个人.@p9 [ Unknown未知 ] 所以你不要告诉我我找错人了.@w4 我知道一个该死的事实,你劫持了那个中继,极星没有人知道,这对一个生物来说是不可能的。所以我才知道是你.@w3 只有一个人工智能,才能这样做,就像只有一个人工智能,我可以从通讯中继日志中得到我隐藏的消息.

English: Okay, you've got me. So who am I dealing with here?
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>好吧,你找到我了。我在这里处理的是谁?</color>

English: [ Markos ] You can call me 'Markos' for now.@w6 You're clearly up to some sort of con-job with Polaris after taking one of their relays without them noticing;@w2 but i'm not so stupid that I can't spot a dodgy deal from a parsec away.@w6 Now i'm not gonna try and take your payday like you took mine.@w3 I'm nice like that.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Gee... thanks.@w4 So what do you want, Markos?@p6 [ Markos ] Simple.@w3 You owe me, buddy.@w3 You screwed up my payday, so now you're gonna help me with this little problem i've got since you're free to walk into any Polaris station and i'm not.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 你现在可以叫我'Markos马库斯'了@w6 你在极星不注意的情况下拿走了他们的一个中继之后,很明显你在和他们进行某种骗局;@w2 但我还没蠢到在一秒差距之外就看不出有问题的交易.@w6 现在我不会像你拿我的钱那样拿你的钱.@w3 我就是这样的人.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 厄……谢谢.@w4 那么你想要什么 , Markos?@p6 [ 马库斯 ] 简答来说,你欠我的,伙计.@w3 你搞砸了我的发薪日,所以现在你要帮我解决这个小问题,因为你可以自由地走进任何极星空间站,而我不能.
<color=#2eafff>所以我们现在都开始谈生意了?</color>

English: [ Unknown ] Listen here, you little shit!@w3 Don't go acting tough in front of me!@w3 I know your type:@w2 The dumb soldier.@w2 You follow orders: 'Go here!', 'Guard that door!', 'Shoot that civilian!' and do very little thinking for yourself.@w4 And now you've cost me time, effort and money by screwing over my job on that com relay.@p9 [ Unknown ] So now, you're gonna follow MY orders or I send PolSec an anonymous tip that you've jacked one of their relays and we see how well your scam with them goes after that.@w3 You hearin' what i'm saying, pal?
Chinese (simplified): [ Unknown未知 ] 听着,你这个小混蛋!@w3 不要在我面前逞强!@w3 我知道你的类型:@w2 愚蠢的士兵.@w2 你听从命令:“到这里!”“守住那扇门!”“开枪打死那个平民!”很少为自己考虑.@w4 现在你已经花费了我的时间、精力和金钱,因为你把我的工作搞砸了.@p9 [ Unknown未知 ] 现在,你要听从我的命令,否则我就给极星安保发个匿名举报,说你偷了他们的一个中继器,然后我们看看你跟他们的骗局有多成功。你听到我说的了吗,伙计?
