The gods know i'm all out of patches with plenty of leaky pipes, so i'll appreciate any help you can give@p9 What i'll need is: x50 Aluminium Foil x150 Cobalt Alloy The first is to keep the pipes insulated, the second is to re-line the pipes. Think you can handle that? I'll pay you out of my own pocket if The Company won't help.
Chinese (simplified): 这个工作并不难,我只是需要手头没有的材料来修补一些旧管道,用耐腐蚀的材料. 上帝知道我已经没有补丁了,有很多漏水的管子,所以我会感谢你的任何帮助给予@p9 我需要的是: x50 铝线圈 x150 钴合金 首先是保持管道绝缘,其次是重新排好管道。你觉得你能行吗? 我会自掏腰包给你,如果 公司 不帮忙.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought the supplies you need to patch those pipes</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我带来了修补管道所需的材料</color>

English: If you can get me the supplies the Polaris Head Office promised me months ago then I can get this efficiency back up.@p9 What I need to get started is: x80 Bottles of Nitrogen We need that Nitrogen for half the industrial processes we do here, both as a reactant and as a refridgerant for some of the more volatile tanks. You probably won't be able to carry all that, so equip a Transportation Booster or two on your armor.@p9 The problem is that there's currently a shortage of Nitrogen everywhere. The only places you'll be able to find it is gas refineries and gas harvesters. It'll be expensive from anywhere but a gas harvester, but i'll try and cover the costs...
Chinese (simplified): 如果你能给我极星总部几个月前答应给我的供应,那么我就能把效率提高.@p9 我需要开始的是: x80 氮气瓶 我们有一半的工业生产过程都需要氮气,既作为反应物,也作为一些更容易挥发的容器的制冷剂. 你可能无法携带所有这些,所以装备一个运输增强器或两个在你的护甲上。问题是现在到处都缺氮。你唯一能找到它的地方是天然气精炼厂和天然气收割机。除了气体收集器,其他任何地方都很贵,但我会试着支付这些费用...

English: <color=#0088ff>I managed to track down some Nitrogen</color>

I don't need any volunteer workers if that's the help you're offering. What I really need is some radiation shielding for the Pentaxium Catalyst tanks. They're leaking Radiation and I can't get any of my guys to go near it.@p9 So i'm giving you the choice of either bringing my guys x6 Radiation Boosters for their suits OR x6 Radiation Shielding to armor the tanks Radiation Boosters are expensive, but easy to buy. Radiation Shielding on the other hand is cheaper, but you'll need to get them from a factory.@p9 I don't think Polaris will cover the kind of repayments for refitting my guys' suits. So that's the problem we're faced with here.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你提供的帮助是志愿者的话,我不需要任何志愿者. 我真正需要的是翘曲水晶催化剂容器的辐射屏蔽。他们在泄漏辐射 我不能让我的人去接近它.@p9 所以我给你一个选择,给我带来 x6 套装上用的辐射支持器 或者 x6 辐射屏蔽器来强化货柜 辐射支持器很贵,但很容易买到。另一方面,辐射屏蔽更便宜,但你需要从工厂得到它们.@p9 我不认为极星能支付给我手下改装套装的钱. 这就是我们现在面临的问题.

English: <color=#ffffff>Not right now.\nYou've really helped me and the boys out here in getting up to speed.@w2\nWe still have a huge quota from </color><color=#ffbb00>Polaris</color><color=#ffffff>, but we can still handle small orders for you as a preferred customer.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>不是现在。你真的帮助我和这里的男孩们跟上了进度@w2 \n我们仍然有很大的配额在</color><color=#ffbb00>极星</color><color=#ffffff>那,但作为首选客户我们仍然可以为您处理小订单.</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>You've really helped us out already, but if you're willing to help us out further i'll be glad of the help.@w2</color>\n<color=#ffffff>We're still not at peak efficiency and I doubt we'll ever get there without a complete shut down and getting a full refit.\nThat'll take us months, so the best we can do is make do with what we've got.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你已经帮了我们大忙了,但如果你愿意进一步帮助我们,我会很高兴的.@w2 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>我们仍然没有达到最高效率,我怀疑如果不完全关闭并进行全面改装,我们将永远无法到达这个效率.\n不过这种改装这将花费我们几个月的时间,所以我们能做的最好的事情就是凑合着用我们现有的.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I can help with the burst tank</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我可以帮忙处理破裂的燃料箱</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I can help with the leaking pipes</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我可以帮忙处理泄露的管道</color>

English: Welcome to Com-Hazard Processing.\nWe handle waste processing of toxic contaminants and commercial processing of waste materials, turning it into resellable resources.\nWelcome back {PlayerName}! Got a job for us?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到联合危险处理.\n我们处理有毒污染物的废物处理和废物的商业处理,将其转化为可转售的资源.\n欢迎回来{PlayerName}!有什么活要我干么?

English: I won't take up any more of your time then
Chinese (simplified): 那我就不再占用你的时间了

English: Welcome to Com-Hazard Processing.\nNormally i'd welcome any customers or guests that come down to this disgusting cesspool that Polaris has us running here, but we've got a jam in the main turbine that's overstrained the engines and caused structural damage.\nSo we're out of commission right now and can accept no new orders.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到联合危险处理.\n通常情况下,我欢迎任何客户或客人来到这个恶心的污水池, 极星 在这里运营,但我们的主涡轮机出现了堵塞,使引擎过度紧张,造成了结构损坏.\n所以我们现在停止生产,不能接受新的订单.

English: This is just what we needed! I'll pass this onto the boys in the tanks and we'll see if that fixes the problems we've got. Thanks for the assistance. I know it's none of your business.@p9 Here's a bit of compensation for your help. It's out of my discretionary funds for crew rewards. {MoneyCounter} Credits isn't much but should be enough to compensate you for help. I'll put in a good word with polaris, so they'll added {RepCounter} to your Reputation.@p9 Just so you know how grateful I am for your help, i'm also supplying you with some of our products. I'm sure you can find a use for them.
Chinese (simplified): 这正是我们需要的 我将把这个交给给水槽里的男孩们,我们将看看这是否解决了我们的问题. 谢谢您的帮助。我知道这不关你的事.@p9 这是对你的帮助的一点补偿。这是从我的船员奖金里拨出来的. {MoneyCounter} 信用点 虽然不多,但应该足以补偿你的帮助。 我会在极星那说一些好话,所以他们会添加 {RepCounter} 到你的声望里.@p9 为了让你知道我对你的帮助有多感激,我还向你提供了我们的一些产品.

English: You've done enough already with just helping fixing one of our problems. I wouldn't want to inconvenience you further.\nIf you're really determined to help us out here, well... i'm not one to refuse your help.\nPolaris sure isn't pitching in.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经帮我们解决了一个问题。我不想再给你添麻烦了.\n如果你真的决定要帮助我们,那么…我不是拒绝你帮助的人.\n极星 肯定是不管我们的.

English: This isn't your problem and this is a crappy job to offer assistance with, so i'm not gonna ask again. But if you're sure you want to help, i'm not one to look a gift horse in the mouth.@p9 What i'll need first is: x120 Bags of Cement To fill in the cracks where the turbine's engine ripped through the concrete foundations. Now, you probably won't be able to carry that and we're not allowed to unload connected ships here. So you'll need to get some Transportation Boosters in your suit to hold the weight. I know, it sucks, but those are Polaris' safety laws in actions.
Chinese (simplified): 这不是你的问题,这是一个蹩脚的工作提供帮助,所以我不会再问了。但如果你确定你想帮忙,我不是那种对礼物吹毛求疵的人.@p9 我首先需要的是: x120 袋水泥 用来填补涡轮机的发动机撕裂混凝土地基的裂缝. 现在,你可能无法携带那个,我们不允许在这里卸载连接的船只。所以你需要在你的西装中加入一些 运输增强器s 来支撑重量. 我知道这很糟糕,但是这些是 极星' 安全法则在行动中.

English: We've got raw chemicals and sewage from two different treatment tanks that are leaking and the stuff is toxic. We can't do anything to patch the cracks in the tanks until that crap is safe enough for the boys to work around. What we need is a something that can be dumped onto the mess to neutralize it, but we don't have anything like that on hand.@p9 If you can bring me: x500 Salt I can pour the stuff on the spill and the boys can patch the tanks. You'll be hard-pressed to find that stuff around here. You can dig it up from the ocean floor, sea cliffs and the seashore from the sand around there.I'll pay you out of my own pocket for it if I have to.
Chinese (simplified): 我们从两个不同的处理槽中得到的原料化学品和污水正在泄漏,这些东西是有毒的。我们没法修补水箱上的裂缝除非那玩意儿足够安全,能让孩子们在附近工作. 我们需要的是一种可以倾倒到混乱中去中和它的东西,但我们手头没有这样的东西.@p9 如果你能给我带来 x500 盐 我可以把东西倒在溢出来的东西上,男孩们可以修补水箱. 在这里很难找到这些东西。你可以从海底、海崖和附近的沙滩上挖出来。如果有必要,我会自掏腰包给你.

English: <color=#0088ff>You should be able to clean up the spill with this.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>你应该能用这个清理掉泄漏的东西.</color>

English: We've got two cracked tanks leaking toxic wastes and a third that's turbine has seized. If it's not restarted soon, the mass will harden and we'll never get it restarted.@p9 In the meantime, a temporary fix will do. So what I need right now is: x22 Chemicals XO-23 Chemicals from Chemmix Industrial should keep the tanks fluid until I can get replacement parts for the turbine engine and get it churning again. You bring me 22 bottles of XO-23 and I'll pay you back.
Chinese (simplified): 我们有两个破裂的水箱泄漏有毒废料,第三个是涡轮机,已经卡住了。如果不尽快重启,淤积物会变硬,我们将永远无法重启它.@p9 在此期间,一个临时修复就可以了。所以我现在需要的是: x22 化学品 XO-23 化学品来自Chemmix工业应该保持油箱的液体状态,直到我可以得到再生水泥零件的涡轮发动机,让它再次运转。你给我22瓶XO-23,我会补偿你的.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got some Chemicals for you, chief</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>主管,我给你弄来了些化学品</color>

English: The turbine on tank #3 has seized and the mass in the tank is at risk of hardening into something harder and... nastier than concrete. I'll have to demolish the entire tank to fix it if it goes completely solid. So I need to get the turbine in the tank churning away again.@p9 The engine underneath the tank is the problem, but it needs x50 Energy Regulators x30 Motors x15 Flux Coils In order to get it up and running again.@p9 Fortunately, it's not a big order so a standard constructor should be able to produce the components from raw materials fairly easy. If you're able to bring me the parts, I can fix the turbine and pay you for the trouble.
Chinese (simplified): 3号水槽上的涡轮卡住了,水槽里的质量有变硬的危险…类似混凝土. 如果它完全变成固体的话,我就得把整个水箱都拆了才能修好。所以我需要让水箱里的涡轮再次运转起来。@p9 油箱下面的引擎是问题,但它需要 x50 能量矩阵 x30 马达 x15 通量线圈 为了让它再起来运行中。幸运的是,这不是一个大订单,所以一个标准的建造器应该能够从原材料相当容易地生产组件. 如果你能把零件带给我,我可以修理涡轮,并支付你的修理费.
<color=#0088ff>我给你带来了修理用的替换件.</color>

English: I'm happy to get any help I can get at this point, but it'll take a miracle to fix the generator that burned out when the turbines seized. It's basically wrecked. It'll need an entirely new mounting in order to get it working again.@p9 So the choice here is to bring me either x1 Large Generator and replace the entire generator OR x10 Spare Parts to repair the existing one Replacing the generator would be easier, but transporting it will require a full set of Transportation Boosters to carry it. The spare parts don't require any infrastructure, but you'll need to find a factory that makes them first.@p9 Ultimately, The generator is more expensive but easier. The spare parts are harder to get, but cheaper. I'll stand by whichever decision you make.
Chinese (simplified): 在这一点上,我很高兴得到任何我能得到的帮助,但它需要一个奇迹来修复发电机,当涡轮机卡住时烧毁了. 基本上摧毁了。为了让它重新工作,它需要一个全新的支架.@p9 所以你有以下两个选择 x1 大型发电机来替换整个发电机组 或者 x10 备用零件来修复现成的 替换发电机会更容易,但运输它需要一整套运输增强器来携带. 备件不需要任何基础设施,但您将需要首先找到一个制造它们的工厂.@p9 最终,生成器更昂贵但更容易。备件比较难买,但是比较便宜. 我将支持你的任何决定.

English: <color=#ffffff>No, everything's fine now, thanks to you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>We've got the tanks fixed and the turbines running, so everything's back to business.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks again for all your help.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>不,现在一切都好了,多亏了你.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我们已经修复了水槽和涡轮机,他们已经运行中,所以一切都是回到正常.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>再次感谢您的帮助.</color>

English: I'll leave you to it then

Chinese (simplified): 索拉里斯 AMP 主管

English: Welcome to Solaris AMP Manufacturing.\nThis is our factory floor where we produce our signature products such as Generators, Solar Cells and Fusion Cores from raw materials.\nWe recently had a Radiation Storm impact factory performance, but we're back in action again.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到索拉里斯AMP制造.\n这是我们的工厂车间,我们在这里生产我们的标志性产品,如发电机,太阳能电池和聚变核心从原材料.\n我们最近有一个辐射风暴影响工厂的性能,但我们又恢复生产了.

English: Welcome to Solaris AMP Manufacturing.\nI'm sorry but we don't do factory tours and thanks to a radiation storm we're currently in the middle of shutting down our processes while a repair crew works on restoring the facility.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到索拉里斯AMP制造.\n我很抱歉,但是我们不提供工厂参观,由于辐射风暴,我们目前正在关闭我们的生产流程,而维修人员正在恢复设施.

English: <color=#ffffff>Ah, it's you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thank you for your assistance thus far. Because of you, we don't have to shut down for repairs.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You're right, there is still much to do and if you're willing to help the factory get back up to speed there's a reward waiting for you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>啊,是你.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>感谢您到目前为止的帮助。因为你,我们不用关门维修了.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>你是对的,还有很多事情要做,如果你愿意帮助工厂恢复速度,有奖励等着你.</color>

English: I'll leave you to it then

Ah, thank you so very much, sir! Your assistance in this matter is very welcome and i'll see to it that you're paid accordingly!@w3 {MoneyCounter} Credits should be enough to cover your expenses and for the help, Polaris will add a further {RepCounter} to your Company Reputation.@p9 Polaris takes care of it's subsidiary businesses like us. Especially when they're as important to them as Solaris AMP! I'll even include one of our premier products as a reward to show how much your help means to us!
Chinese (simplified): 啊,非常感谢,先生! 非常欢迎您在这件事上的协助,我将确保您得到相应的报酬!@w3 {MoneyCounter} 信用点应该足以支付您的费用,为了帮助,极星将进一步增加 {RepCounter} 到您的公司声誉.@p9 极星像我们一样照顾它的子公司业务。尤其是当他们像索拉里斯AMP! 我甚至会把我们的第一款产品作为奖励,以显示您对我们的帮助是多么重要!

English: Oh dear, you're one of our clients aren't you? I couldn't possibly ask you to help us with repairs! We're just short of a few supplies needed to bring the factory back online that we don't stock ourselves. If you're genuine in your offer, we're not in any position to refuse.@p9 Now, the recent Radiation Storm we had was quite a terrible ordeal and one of the things that happened was that our transmitters were struck by lightning and now need to be completely replaced. x12 Communications Equipment is what the repair crew tell me we're short on.@p9 We don't stock replacements, so you'll need to purchase them from an Electronics Manufacturer. They're not standard fare in trade stations, so you'll need to order them directly from a factory much like ours.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,亲爱的,你是我们的客户,对吗?我不可能让你帮我们修理! 我们只是缺少一些让工厂重新上线所需的供应品,我们自己不进货。如果你的提议是真诚的,我们没有任何理由拒绝.@p9 现在,最近的辐射风暴是一个非常可怕的考验,其中发生的一件事是我们的发射器被闪电击中,现在需要完全更换. x12 通信设备 是维修人员告诉我缺少的东西.@p9 我们不库存替换件,所以你需要从电子元件制造商购买. 它们不是贸易站的标准商品,所以你需要直接从像我们这样的工厂订购.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've managed to get my hands on some Communications Equipment</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经设法弄到了一些通信设备</color>

English: Regrettably, static discharge inside a storage silo from a radiation storm fused our graphite stockpiles into worthless slag. We can't restart production without a shipment of graphite and that's where one of the largest problems stems from@p9 If you can bring me: x450 Graphite I'll be able to get production up earlier. I know it's not actually a repair, but since this benefits everyone and with our communications array still being repaired, we can't call for resupply. Worry not! I will compensate you well above market price for the materials!
Chinese (simplified): 遗憾的是,一个辐射风暴导致的存储筒仓静态放电将我们的石墨库存熔化成毫无价值的渣. 如果没有石墨储备,我们就不能重新开始生产,这是风暴带来的最大的问题之一@p9 如果你能给我带来: x450 石墨 我就能早点开始生产了。我知道这不是真正的修复,但由于这对每个人都有好处,而且我们的通信阵列仍在修复,我们不能要求补给. 不要担心!我将以高于市场价格的价格补偿你的材料!

English: <color=#0088ff>I have a shipment of graphite with me</color>

The production line is down since an overload caused by radiation damage created a self-destructive error routine in the robotics and they proceeded to dismantle each other before the power was cut.@p9 We can't reassemble them since they did it rather violently, so a complete replacement of: x5 Robotics In order to get the secondary production line working again. But since our FTL transmitters are still being repaired we can't call for replacement. You should be able to get them from Non-Linear Productions or Hostile Apparatus.
Chinese (simplified): 由于辐射损坏造成的过载在机器人中产生了自毁性的错误程序,生产线已经关闭,他们在电源切断前开始拆卸彼此.@p9 我们不能重新组装他们,因为他们做得太暴力了,所以一个完整的替换组件: x5 机械设备 能够让第二条生产线再次工作。但由于我们的超光速发射器仍在维修中,我们无法呼叫替换组件. 您应该能够 非流水线生产或者敌方装置中得到它们.
<color=#0088ff>我给你带了些替代品替代设备</color>

English: Overcharging blew out the capacitor stack on the laser cutter when it was rebooted after the Radiation storm. The automated system isn't set to check for a capacitor being OVERcharged, so it made a spectacular mess.@p9 If your help is genuine, the capacitors need to be replaced. x40 Advanced Capacitors x8 Energy Regulators x5 Power Coils This time they'll have an Energy Regulator to ensure they output safely next time there's a bad radiation storm... or so the repair crew tell me.@p9 These are rather expensive components, so you will be compensated by Polaris appropriately for their cost. Well above market value!
Chinese (simplified): 超负荷充电在辐射风暴过后重启激光切割器时,导致电容器堆爆裂。自动系统未设置检查电容器是否被过度充电,因此造成了壮观的混乱。@p9 如果您的帮助是真诚的,那么需要更换电容器。 40个高级电容器 8个能量调节器 5个动力线圈 这次他们将有一个能量调节器来确保在下次有严重的辐射风暴时安全输出...或者至少维修团队是这么告诉我的。@p9 这些是非常昂贵的部件,所以您将由Polaris适当地按高于市场价格的标准进行补偿。

English: <color=#0088ff>I have the replacement parts for the capacitors.</color>

While i'm glad of your offer, I think this one may be beyond even your abilities. My repair crew sure is stumped on how to deal with the problem at hand. The nanolathing lasers used to treat the Solar Cells have somehow vented their supply of Xenon.@p9 That means the laser heads require: x50 Xenon Gas Bottles to replenish their reserves. Xenon is a very rare gas and very valuable. I don't know anywhere you could even get it aside from a gas harvester.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然我很高兴你的报价,但我认为这项报价可能超出你的能力范围. 用于处理太阳能电池的纳米激光以某种方式释放了储备的氙气,这意味着激光头需要: x50 氙气瓶 来补充他们的储备。氙是一种非常稀有、非常珍贵的气体。我不知道除了气体收集装置你还能在哪里找到它.

English: <color=#ffffff>Thank you for your assistance. But we can take it from here.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Imagine the scandal if our competitors knew we put our clients to work in our factory!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'd rather not risk imposing on you any further.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>谢谢你的帮助。但我们可以从这里开始.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>想象一下,如果我们的竞争对手知道我们让客户在我们的工厂工作,那该是多么大的丑闻</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我不想冒险再强加任务给你了.</color>

English: Welcome to PentMaxIt! The industry leaders in Pentaxium-based warp fuels.\nWelcome to one of our processing plants where we refine the raw ore into our signature products!\nIf you'd like to schedule a delivery to a new trade or supply station, you'll need to contact my secretary for an order form.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到PentMaxIt! 以翘曲水晶为基础的曲速燃料的行业领导者.\n欢迎来到我们的一个加工厂,在这里我们将原始矿石提炼成我们的标志性产品!\n如果你想安排送货到一个新的贸易或补给站,你需要联系我的秘书以获得一张订单.

English: Welcome to PentMaxIt! The industry leaders in Pentaxium-based warp fuels.\nWelcome to one of our processing plants where we refine the raw ore into our signature products!@p8\nUnfortunately, we're not doing any group tours of the factory today because of a disgruntled former employee that decided to resign by opening several processing tanks and vats and dump their contents on the floor on his way out.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到PentMaxIt! 以翘曲水晶为基础的曲速燃料的行业领导者.\n欢迎来到我们的一个加工厂,在这里我们将原始矿石提炼成我们的标志性产品!@p8 \n不幸的是,我们今天没有任何团体参观工厂,因为一位不满的前员工决定辞职,他打开了几个加工槽和桶,并在他出去的时候把里面的东西倒在了地板上.

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid we won't be able to do any factory tours. Even after all your help, it's going to be some time before we can resume our normal schedule.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我们恐怕不能安排任何工厂参观。即使你帮了这么多忙,我们还需要一段时间才能恢复正常的工作安排.</color>

English: I'll leave you to it then

Your assistance in this matter is greatly appreciated! I'm sorry that we can't offer you a factory tour like we do for all our guests because of a certain someone. To show our gratitude for your assistance and understanding in this trying time PentMax-It would like to offer {MoneyCounter} Credits and {RepCounter} Reputation with our parent company, Polaris Megacorp.@p9 Polaris takes the disruptive actions of rogue employees very seriously and will strive to ensure such unpleasantness doesn't happen again.@w3 Thank you again for your understanding in this matter. Please accept this shipment of Pentaxid as a consolation.
Chinese (simplified): 非常感谢您在这件事上的帮助! 很抱歉,我们不能为您提供工厂参观,就像我们为所有客人提供的一样,因为某个的人。 . 为了感谢您在这艰难的时刻给予我们的帮助和理解我们的母公司愿意提供 {MoneyCounter} 信用点和 {RepCounter} 信誉, 极星巨型企业.@p9 非常重视流氓员工的破坏行为,并将努力确保此类不愉快事件不再发生.@w3 再次感谢您对此事的理解。请接受这批翘曲水晶 作为安慰.

English: I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we're short on supplies for such a large clean up since we never expected someone to intentionally dump the contents of multiple tanks and vats onto the factory floor!@p9 We've currently exhausted the supplies we had and are weeks away from getting replenished. x34 Filters are minimum of what we need after the corrosive fumes destroyed half the plant's air filters and damaged many of the ventilators. If we don't replace them soon, we may have to shut down as the air quality becomes dangerous.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕我们还在清理,但是我们这么大的清理的供应短缺,因为我们从来没有想到有人会故意把多个水箱和大缸的内容倾倒到工厂地板上!@p9 我们目前已经耗尽了所有的供应品,还要几周才能补充 x34 过滤器 是我们所需要的最低限度,腐蚀性烟雾摧毁了工厂一半的空气过滤器并损坏了许多通风设备. 如果我们不尽快更换它们,我们可能不得不关闭工厂,因为空气质量变得危险.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got some Air Filters on me</color>

I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we're simply not equipped to handle this amount of toxic materials on the factory floor! The work crews can't spend longer than a few minutes before their rebreathers burn out from the fumes.@p9 If we had... x4 Oxygen Tank Boosters for the crew's suits, they could get the work done in a quarters of the time without needing to constantly check that the toxins haven't melted through their masks.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕我们还在清理,但是我们根本没有能力处理工厂里这么多的有毒物质!工作人员不能超过几分钟,他们的换气器就会被烟雾烧坏.@p9 如果我们有船员套装所需要的 x4 氧气管支持系统 ,他们可以在四分之一的时间内完成工作,而不需要不断地检查毒素是否融化了他们的面具.

English: <color=#0088ff>I have some spare oxygen tanks if you need them</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我有一些备用氧气罐,如果你需要的话</color>

English: I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we're constantly dealing with more problems in an never-ending cascade of system failures that we weren't prepared for! The latest one is with the vats that were dumped...@p9These vats are shielded against radiation and corrosion on the inside, but are just regular steel on the outside and the chemicals poured over the side have corroded the vats from the outside-in so we can't use them anymore.@p9 We can't even bring in new vats, so our only hope is cut out and replace the walls with x20 Radiation Shielding. They're big and heavy. Intended mostly for use on Fusion Reactors. But they're the only thing we can get here, as long as someone has Transportation Boosters enough to carry them in through the door.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕我们仍然在清理,但是我们在不断地处理更多的问题,这些问题是我们没有准备好应对的、永无止境的系统故障级联! 最新的问题是被倾倒的桶…@p9 这些大桶可以屏蔽辐射和内部的腐蚀,但外面只是普通的钢,化学品倒在侧面已经从外到内腐蚀了大桶,所以我们不能再使用它们了.@p9 我们甚至连新大桶都弄不来,所以我们唯一的希望就是把墙体用 x20 辐射屏蔽器. 来更换它们又大又重。主要用于核聚变反应堆。但它们是我们在这里唯一能得到的东西,只要有人有运输增强器s 足够把它们带进大门.

English: I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we've still got the problem of cleaning the toxic sludge from off the factory floor. We've got work crews on it, but they're doing it by hand after the vaccuum pumps burned out from the radiation.@p9 In order to repair and harden the pumps against the liquid we need: x72 Plastic Tubes x32 Advanced Electronics x16 Motors x8 Platinum Plates to make them resistant to the toxic sludge. But I have no idea where we'd even find platinum plates!
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕我们还在清理,但是我们仍然有清除工厂地板上有毒污泥的问题. 我们有工作人员在做,但是在辐射上的真空泵烧坏后,他们只能徒手进行.@p9 为了修理泵来抽掉液体,我们需要 x72 塑料管 x32 先进电子元件 x16 马达 x8 铂金板 使其抗有毒污泥。但我甚至不知道我们在哪里找到白金板

English: Thanks to your assistance we've managed to get all the toxic chemicals cleaned up and are back in business!\nUnfortunately, we still won't be running any factory tours until Polaris sends an official team to review the damages.\nBut we can still sell you any PentMax-It products, at a fair discount!
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>感谢你的帮助,我们已经成功地把所有有毒的化学品清理干净,并重新开业!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>遗憾的是,我们仍然不会安排任何工厂参观,直到</color><color=#ffbb00>极星 </color><color=#ffffff>发送一个官方团队来审查损害</color>\n<color=#ffffff>不过我们仍然可以以合理的折扣卖给你任何PentMax-It产品!</color>

English: I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, probably the largest problem is that the floor panels are completely corroded from the Pentaxium Hexafluoride that was poured on them. Even if we manage to clean it all off, it will still be dangerously radioactive.@p9 Honestly, I think it would be cheaper to replace the entire section of floor rather than try and decontaminate the entire floor. If you know anyone with: x400 Titanium Plates I'll buy them off them unseen for 50% above market price if it means getting rid of this headache!
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕我们还在清理,可能最大的问题是地板面板完全被倾倒在其上的翘曲水晶六氟化物腐蚀了. 即使我们设法把它全部清除掉,它仍然会有危险的放射性.@p9 说实话,我觉得更换整个楼层比尝试去净化整个楼层更便宜. 如果知道谁有 x400 钛板 我将以高于市场价50%的价格购买他们,如果这意味着摆脱这个头痛问题!

English: <color=#0088ff>I just happen to have 400 Titanium Plates on me.</color>

Uhh... yeah, this is InterWeapon Manufacturing We make ammunition and weapons in this facility, it's not so much a shop as it is a supplier to the InterWeapon and InterWep outlets across this quadrant. We do bulk orders for military and security forces as well. So... what are you here for?
Chinese (simplified): 喔…是的,这里是Inter武器制造工厂 我们在这个工厂生产弹药和武器,与其说它是一个商店,不如说它是InterWeapon和InterWep在这个象限的销售点的供应商. 我们也为军队和安全部队做大宗订单. 所以…你来这里干什么??

English: Uhh... yeah, this is InterWeapon Manufacturing\nAre you the guy Polaris sent? We've been shortstaffed all week and need those supplies.\nWe can't fill any of our major contracts until you bring in those supplies. You're already two week late and we'll have to shut down if it takes any longer.
Chinese (simplified): 喔…是的,这里是Inter武器制造工厂\n你是极星派来的吗?我们整个星期都人手不足,需要这些物资。除非你带来那些供应品.\n否则我们无法履行任何主要合同。你已经晚了两周了,如果再拖下去,我们就得关门了

English: <color=#ffffff>The guys Polaris sent still haven't turned up, so may have bought us a few days with your help but unless they turn up soon we've only delayed the inevitable.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Still willing to lend a hand?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>极星派来的人还没有出现,在你的帮助下有可能为我们争取几天的时间,但除非他们很快出现,否则我们只能推迟不可避免的事情.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>还愿意帮忙吗??</color>

English: Thank the gods we don't have to shutdown! I hope whoever Polaris sent has a good excuse. I hate being indebted to anyone and it'll be on their head when they turn up. Look, here's {MoneyCounter} Credits and {RepCounter} Reputation with Polaris to make up for the trouble.@p9 It probably won't cover the trouble, but here's a shipment of our products here. I'm sure you'll find a use for them.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢上帝,我们不用关门了! 我希望极星派来的人有一个好的借口。我不喜欢欠别人的人情,一旦他们出现,我就要怪他们 看,这里是 {MoneyCounter} 信用点和 {RepCounter} 信誉关于极星 的,作为弥补麻烦的报酬.@p9 这可能不能解决问题,但这里有一批我们的产品,我想你能找到用途.

English: You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order is for... x1000 Elemental Pentaxid that's used as the ignition source in plasma cartridges to vaporize the Erestrum gel and charge the weapon's capacitors. I'll pay you above market price for the order.
Chinese (simplified): 你不是极星 派来给我们送补给的,但也没区别。如果你能把我们在这家工厂使用的材料带来,我会给你报酬. 如果没有补给,我们将在一周内被迫关闭.@p9 当前订单为... x1000 元素氧化剂 它是等离子弹中的点火源用来汽化锷凝胶并为武器的电容器充电. 我将以高于市场价格的价格购买你的订单.

English: <color=#0088ff>I have the shipment of Elemental Pentaxid for you</color>

You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order on the board for today is: x650 Sulfur, about a ton. We need it to mass-produce ammunition, and we're down to our last container. It's not something you can pick up from your local trade station, you'll need to find an industrial supplier or mine it yourself from the surface of Lava Planets.
Chinese (simplified): 你不是极星 派来给我们送补给的,但也没区别。如果你能把我们在这家工厂使用的材料带来,我会给你报酬. 如果没有补给,我们将在一周内被迫关闭.@p9 今天板子上的订单为: x650 硫磺, 大约一吨. 我们需要它来大量生产弹药,现在只剩最后一个容器了. 这不是你可以从当地的贸易站买到的东西,你需要找到一个工业供应商或自己从地表开采Lava Planets.

English: You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order on the board for today is: x1 Large Upgrade Kit. We don't build these here, or at all. These are produced in the Zirax Empire, but we've got a custom order for some heavy weapons. You bring me one of these and i'll pay you 75k on delivery. No questions asked.
Chinese (simplified): 你不是极星 派来给我们送补给的,但也没区别。如果你能把我们在这家工厂使用的材料带来,我会给你报酬. 如果没有补给,我们将在一周内被迫关闭.@p9 今天板子上的订单为: x1 大型升级工具. 这东西不是在本地造的,全都不生产。这些是在兹瑞克斯帝国上生产的,但我们有一个重型武器的定制订单. 你给我带一个,我给你7.5万。别问问题.

English: You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order on the board for today is: x50 Advanced Capacitors used in the current production line of Laser Rifles. We ran out a week ago, so the entire shipment has been put on hold while we resupply, but they still haven't turned up yet and we're going to end up going back on the contract.
Chinese (simplified): 你不是随船来的,这艘船叫 极星 ,是来给我们送补给的,但你也行。如果你能带来我们这个工厂使用的材料,我甚至会给你支付报酬。 如果没有补给,我们将在一周内被迫关闭。@p9 今天的板上订单是: 50个高级电容器 用于当前激光步枪生产线。 我们一周前就断货了,所以整个货物都暂停了,等待我们补给,但它们仍然没有出现,我们最终将违反合同。

English: You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 Already we've been forced to shelve production on a line of Baryonic Laser Cannons because we're missing the: x30 Heat Exchangers used to keep the laser array from overheating. We were being supplied by another factory, but the shipment was being transported by the same freighter.
Chinese (simplified): 你不是极星 派来给我们送补给的,但也没区别。如果你能把我们在这家工厂使用的材料带来,我会给你报酬. 如果没有补给,我们将在一周内被迫关闭.@p9 我们已经被迫搁置了重型激光大炮生产线的生产,因为我们缺少: x30 热交换器 用于防止激光阵列过热。我们是由另一家工厂供货的,但这批货是由同一艘货轮运输的.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got some Heat Exchangers for you</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我弄来了一些热交换器 for you</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Thanks to you, we won't need to shutdown for at least a month, maybe two.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If the freighter carrying our resupply doesn't turn up in the next day or two, i'll file a report with </color><color=#ffbb00>Polaris </color><color=#ffffff>and see if they can get another shipment out.</color>\n<color=#ffbb00>We're always short on sulfur though, if you can bring us more we can exchange it for Nitro.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>多亏了你们,我们至少一个月,或者两个月都不需要关闭.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果装载我们补给的货轮在未来一两天内没有出现,我将向</color><color=#ffbb00>极星 </color><color=#ffffff>提交一份报告,看看他们是否能再出一批货.</color>\n<color=#ffbb00>我们一直缺少硫磺,如果你能再给我们带一些,我们可以换成Nitro硝基.</color>

English: We're always short on Sulfur around here and the shipments and price are always irregular.\nIf you ever end up with sulfur you can't sell, we take shipments of 500 and will exchange it for our surplus of Nitrocellulose.\nMake sure you're connected to a ship so we can unload it all.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里总是缺货硫磺,而且发货和价格总是不定期.\n如果你们的产品硫磺卖不出去,我们可以接收500件,然后用它来换我们多余的硝化棉.\n确保你连接到一艘船,这样我们才能卸货.
交换 500 硫磺 为10,000 硝化棉

English: <color=#ffffff>Thanks. We never have enough sulfur, so any help you can provide is appreciated.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>This is strictly off-books by the way, so </color><color=#ffbb00>Polaris </color><color=#ffffff>has no idea i'm doing this and I think we'd both prefer it if they didn't find out.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>谢谢。我们从来没有足够的硫磺,所以你可以提供任何帮助是非常感谢的.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>顺便说一下,这是绝对的帐外操作,所以 </color><color=#ffbb00>极星 </color><color=#ffffff>不知道我在做这个,我想我们都希望他们不知道.</color>

English: This is Hostile Apparatus' production line... I don't normally deal with customers, but the overseer is on vacation. We uhh... make robotics here. Defensive mechs for protecting private property for the most part. You ever seen those Combat Androids? Yeah, we make those here. Cybernetic prosthetics too.
Chinese (simplified): 这是敌我识别装置生产线 我通常不与客户打交道,但是监工在休假 我们喔…制造机械设备。主要是用来保护私人财产的防御机甲. 你见过那些战斗机器人么吗?是的,我们在这里生产,顺便还做机械义肢.

English: This is Hostile Apparatus' production line... I don't think you're supposed to be in here. I'm...@w3 tired. I don't have time for any more problems.@w3 The overseer went on vacation this week and now i'm stuck with double duty, and I swear that ass intentionally left so he could dump this mess on me!@w3 Err... i'm sorry. This isn't your problem.
Chinese (simplified): 这是敌我识别装置的生产线... 我认为你不应该在这里。我...@w3 很累。我没时间再解决任何问题了.@w3 工头这周去度假了,现在我要承担两份工作,我发誓那个混蛋是故意离开的,这样他就可以把这些烂摊子扔给我了!!@w3 我很抱歉,你有什么事情.

English: <color=#ffffff>God, yes.@w2 Still overworked. Still no sleep.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're still willing to help, I could certainly use it so I can take a break. I've been on my feet for almost 2 days straight now.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>天啦,是的.@w2 我还是太累了,我一直没有睡觉.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你还愿意帮忙,我当然可以用它来休息一下。我已经站了两天了.</color>

English: Praise be to Empyrion, for whoever sent you my way! Here! Take this {MoneyCounter} Credits and i'll personally write a commendation for {RepCounter} Reputation with Polaris for all your help with this nightmare. I'll finally get to see my bed tonight! Hell, take these spare robotics as well. You've possibly saved my life, if not my sanity.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢上天,感谢把你送到我这里的人! 这个!拿着这个 {MoneyCounter} 信用点 ,我会亲自写一份表彰信让极星给你增加{RepCounter} 信誉 感谢你们对这场噩梦的帮助. 今晚我终于可以看到我的床了 你可能救了我的命,如果不是我的理智,拿着这些机械设备.

English: Gods, i'm so tired.@w3 If you can help me out so I can take a break from this mess the overseer dumped on me, i'll be eternally grateful.@p9 I've got a backlog of orders going back almost 2 months. This one i'm holding right here is for... x375 Graphite. We use it in the ceramic armor on Android's chestpieces and I checked the storage crates and we're completely out of Graphite!
Chinese (simplified): 天啊,我好累.@w3 如果你能帮我摆脱监工给我带来的麻烦,我将永远感激你。我已经积压了将近两个月的订单.@p9 我现在拿着的这个是为了… x375 石墨. 我们用它来制作机器人外壳上的陶瓷装甲,我检查了一下储物箱,石墨已经卖光了!

English: <color=#0088ff>I have a box of graphite you might be interested in</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我有一盒石墨,你可能会感兴趣</color>

English: Yes, still overworked. But at least i'll see my bed tonight.@w3 If I ever get my hands on the overseen, i'm going to throw him off the roof for letting things get this bad.@p9 I've got a backlog of orders going back almost 2 months. This one i'm holding right here is for... x12 Communication Equipment. These are used on the command units for issuing orders and they're so important that we can't ship out any Boxguard Mechs without them.
Chinese (simplified): 是,还是过度劳累。但至少今晚我能看到我的床.@w3 如果我碰到被监管的人,我会把他从屋顶上扔下去,因为他让事情变得如此糟糕.@p9 我已经积压了将近两个月的订单。我手头上的是… x12 通信设备. 这些是用于发布命令的命令单位,它们是如此重要,以至于没有它们我们就无法发货任何警卫机甲.

English: I need to get off my feet, just for a few hours.@w3 If you'll give me a hand in clearing these backlogged orders, I can pay you and maybe i'll finally get some rest.@p9 This order i'm working on right now needs... x16 Coolant. We're short on just about everything, which makes me wonder if the overseer was ever actually doing his job. You'd need a Transportation Booster just to carry. We sell those, by the way.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要放松一下,就几个小时.@w3 如果你能帮我清理这些积压的订单,我可以付钱给你,也许我终于可以休息一下了.@p9 我现在正在处理的这个订单需要... x16 冷却剂. 我们几乎什么都缺,这让我怀疑监工是否真的在做他的工作. 你需要一个 运输增强器 顺便说一下,我们卖这玩意.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got some extra coolant on me.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我弄来了一些额外的冷却剂.</color>

English: Still working my way through these piles of old work orders and backlogged contracts.@w3 If you're looking to place your own order, you're going to have to wait until this lot is cleared up before I can accept anything new.@p9 This order right here is ridiculous! It should've been handled a month ago, but here it is. x50 Cobalt Alloy x32 Advanced Electronics x24 Motors x16 Computers.@p9 These are all for a new line of prosthetics and they're still an option on our order forms and the factory doesn't stock ANY of the main components!
Chinese (simplified): 我还在处理这些成堆的旧工作订单和积压的合同.@w3 如果你想自己下订单,你必须等到这批货清理完毕后,我才能接受新的东西.@p9 这个订单太荒谬了!一个月前就该处理了,但现在就在这里 x50 钴合金 x32 先进电子元件 x24 马达 x16 计算机.@p9 这些都是机械义肢的新生产线,它们仍然是我们订单上的一个选项,工厂没有库存任何主要组件!!

English: I can barely concentrate on what i'm doing. I thought i'd filled this same order 3 times, but I just checked and I haven't finished it. I don't think I can finish it. I'm missing the Optronics used in the sensor heads.@p9 Can you help me out and find me some Optronics? Not the bridges or the matrices, just: x4 Optronics I'll pay you double their market value, if you can get them to me before I collapse.
Chinese (simplified): 我几乎不能集中精力做我正在做的事情。我以为这个订单我已经填了3次了,但是我刚刚检查了一下,我还没有完成. 我不认为我可以完成它. 我没找到传感器头里用的光电元件.@p9 你能帮我找一些光电产品吗?不是光电桥或矩阵,只是: x4 光电设备 我将支付你他们的市场价值的两倍,如果你能在我崩溃之前把他们给我.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got those Optronics you asked for</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我得到了光电设备你要求的</color>

English:
<color=#ffffff>Gods... I'm finally out of work orders.@w3</color>
<color=#ffffff>I'm long overdue for a nap, and at least the overtime alone will let me go on vacation.@w3</color>
<color=#ffffff>I'm damned well going to file a formal complaint with Polaris about the condition the overseer left the factory in as well.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Thanks for saving my sanity.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>天啦……我终于完成工作了.@w3 </color>
<color=#ffffff>需要睡一个长长的午觉,至少光是加班就能让我去度假了.@w3 </color>
<color=#ffffff>我真想就监工离开工厂时的状况向极星提出正式投诉.</color>
<color=#ffffff>谢谢你的帮助.</color>

English: Welcome to Thermal Interactions Ltd. A subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp.\nWe're the current leaders in thermal technology and supplies; from coolant to heat exchangers and heat sinks for beam weapons.\nWe supply industrial, military, and private enterprises with high-grade temperature regulation equipment.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Thermal Interactions Ltd. 有限公司极星巨型企业的子公司\n我们是目前热工技术和耗材的领导者;从冷却剂到热交换器和波束武器的散热器.\n我们为工业、军工、民企提供高档调温设备.

English: Welcome to Thermal Interactions Ltd. A subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp. We're the current leaders in thermal technology and supplies; from coolant to heat exchangers and heat sinks for beam weapons. Is what i'd like to claim, but productivity has been falling lately and we're risking dropping down a few ranks in the Trade Index.@p9 You look like a pilot, a go-getter, a fellow of action. Do you think you can help me out here?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Thermal Interactions Ltd. 有限公司极星巨型企业的子公司 我们是目前热工技术和耗材的领导者;从冷却剂到热交换器和波束武器的散热器.. 这是我想说的,但是最近生产力一直在下降,我们的 贸易指数的排名有下降的风险.@p9 你看起来像飞行员,一个有进取心的人,一个行动派。你能帮我一下吗?

English: Ah, yes.\nYou've managed to waylay our descent down the Trade Index this cycle, but unless something is done we won't go up either.@w3\nIf you're interested in some more payment in exchange for some grunt work, I can provide.
Chinese (simplified): 啊,是.\n你成功地阻止了我们 贸易指数 在这个循环的下降,但是除非采取措施,否则我们也不会上升.@w3 \n如果你想要更多的报酬来换取一些繁重的工作,我可以提供.

English: Excellent work! This can only improve our standing on the Trade Index.@w2 Here. Here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits and i'll make sure you're recognized by Polaris your help in this endeavour. Let's say... {RepCounter} Reputation?@p9 Oh, and please take these Heat Exchangers. Use them yourself or give them to your friends. Make sure they know they're from Thermal Interactions Ltd!
Chinese (simplified): 漂亮的工作! 这可以稍微改善我们的贸易指数.@w2 这里。这是您的报酬{MoneyCounter} 信用点 的付款,我保证通过 极星 您在这次努力中的帮助来识别您. 假设……{RepCounter} Reputation?@p9 哦,请拿这些热交换器。你自己使用或者送给你的朋友。确保他们知道他们来自 Thermal Interactions Ltd!!

English: We're always short on supplies around here. We're rather remote and don't get a lot of regular shipments. Which is what I need you to do: Bring me x100 Aluminium Foil. It's one of the things we use in our Large Heat Sinks and while we've got plenty today, we'll need to pay exceed to order more.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里的供应总是很短缺。我们很偏远,没有很多定期装运的货物。这就是我需要你做的 带我来 x100 铝线圈. 这是我们在大型散热器中使用的东西之一,虽然我们今天有很多,但如果想订购更多,我们需要额外支付.

English: I knew I was right about you! What i'm looking for some help with is that I need someone that can bring me x250 Gold Ingots. They're used in the company's signature Heat Exchangers and we never have enough and when an order comes through, they charge us double. Double!!
Chinese (simplified): 我就知道我没看错你! 我需要的帮助是,我需要有人能带给我 x250 金锭。 它们用于公司的招牌热交换器,我们永远不够用,当订单来的时候,他们向我们收取双倍价格。双倍!

English: That's the attitude I like to see! What I need from you is to head on to Chromium-Sierra Sciences and get me... x4 Scientific Equipment. They're one of the only companies that make Science Equipment that we need for measuring the thickness of the radiator vents in our heat sinks. So they're very important.
Chinese (simplified): 这就是我喜欢看到的态度! 我需要你去Chromium-Sierra Sciences给我弄来... x4 科研设备. 他们是唯一一家制造科学设备的公司,我们需要他们来测量我们散热器散热器通风口的厚度。它们很重要.

English: Our Heat Exchangers have microchannels filled with non-reactive Helium, but one of our tanks was emptied for a co-worker's birthday party. Now we're a little short for this week's quota.@p9 I'll need you to bring me: x50 Helium Bottles So we can speed up the manufacturing process instead of delaying it for our regular shipment. I know, not quite what you signed up for. But you'll be compensated for your trouble.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的热交换器拥有充满非活性氦气的微通道,但是我们的一个水箱却因为同事的生日派对而清空了。现在我们这周的定额有点短缺了.@p9 我需要你给我带 x50 氦气瓶 这样我们就可以加快生产过程而不是耽误我们的正常出货. 我知道,这不太符合你的初衷。但是你的麻烦会得到补偿的.

English: Many of the products we make here are made from Titanium; but since our last shipment of Titanium Ingots ran afoul of pirates on it's way here, we've been needing to prioritize contracts.\nYou'd really help us out if you could bring in a fresh supply of:\nx750 Titanium Ingots
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里生产的很多产品都是由钛制成的;但自从我们的上一批钛锭在来的路上和海盗发生了冲突,我们就需要优先考虑合同.\n如果您能带来一批新的钛锭,那可真是帮了我们大忙了\nx750 钛锭

English: <color=#ffffff>We're well on our way back up the </color><color=#66ccff>Trade Index</color><color=#ffffff> thanks to your efforts.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Please feel free to purchase from our catalogue. I'll always make time to fill out your order.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我们的</color><color=#66ccff>贸易指数</color><color=#ffffff> 正在回升感谢您的努力.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>请随意从我们的目录中购买。我总是会抽出时间来填写您的订单.</color>

English: Welcome to Chromium-Sierra Sciences.\nIn this facility we produce the finest in medical and scientific equipment, used all across the galaxy.\nFrom hospitals to research stations, nothing beats Chromium-Sierra!
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Chromium-Sierra Sciences.\n在这个设施中,我们生产最好的医疗和科研设备,在整个银河系使用.\n从医院到研究站,没有什么能比得上Chromium-Sierra!

English: Welcome to Chromium-Sierra Sciences.\nIn this facility we used to produce the finest in medical and scientific equipment, used all across the galaxy.\nWe're facing a shutdown after a biological speciment in one of the labs got free, and now we're looking at an official enquiry!
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Chromium-Sierra Sciences.\n在这个设施中,我们生产最好的医疗和科研设备,在整个银河系使用.\n我们要关门了,因为实验室里的一个生物标本泄露了,现在我们要接受官方调查!

English: <color=#ffffff>You're willing to help?</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Well, the enquiry is still some time off and if we can get all the mess cleaned up and our supplies restocked we can downplay the incident and get off with a slap on the wrist.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你愿意帮忙吗?</color>\n<color=#ffffff>好吧,询问还需要一段时间,如果我们能把所有的混乱收拾干净,补充我们的物资,我们就能淡化这一事件,免受轻微处罚.</color>

English: Things are looking up, thanks to you! With this mess on the way to being cleaned up, we might just pass the inspection with nothing worse than a warning. Here's {MoneyCounter} Credits to cover your expenses and an official {RepCounter} Reputation Bonus with Polaris.@p9 Polaris hates it when productivity drops in any sector. So they'll have no problem supporting your activities and will fully endorse any free samples I hand out, like these. Enjoy. And thank you again.
Chinese (simplified): 一切向好,谢谢你 由于已经进行了清理,我们通过检查同时只是给了一个警告. 这里是 {MoneyCounter} 信用点以支付您的费用和极星官方的 {RepCounter} 声誉奖励对于 极星.@p9 极星讨厌任何部门的生产力下降。所以他们会毫无疑问的支持你的活动,并会完全支持我分发的任何免费样品,就像这样. 再次感谢.

English: If you're willing to help and keep the inspectors from digging too deeply into our little industrial accident, then i'll pay you for bringing in:\nx400 Xenomaterial\nTo replace our stores of the hazardous material. This was originally the cause of the outbreak. Some of it wasn't inert.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你愿意帮助并阻止检查员深入调查我们的小工业事故,那么我将付钱给你,因为你带来了:\nx400 异种基底\n替换我们储存的危险材料。这是最初爆发的原因.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got your Alien goop. You actually use this?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我拿到你的外星人黏液了. 你真的会用这玩意?</color>

English: If you'll help us keep the inspectors from investigating our problem, i'll surely repay you for your help. We need to replace our stocks of x45 Helium Bottles Which are used to keep hazardous biomaterials in an inert atmosphere in which they cannot spread during transit. We exhausted our supplies containing the outbreak.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你能帮助我们阻止检查员调查我们的问题,我一定会报答你的帮助. 我们需要替换我们的库存 x45 氦气瓶 用于将有害生物材料保持在惰性气氛中,它们在运输过程中不能传播. 我们耗尽了控制爆发的供应.

English: Since you're so willing to help us hide the severity of the incident, i'll pay you above market price for replacing the x24 Superconductors That were destroyed during the event. We can't order more without raising suspicion about the amount of damage done. Arriake Technology manufactures them.
Chinese (simplified): 既然你如此愿意帮助我们隐藏事件的严重性,我将以高于市场价的价格购买你替换在事件中损坏的 x24 超导体 我们不能再订购了,否则就会引起对损失的怀疑. Arriake Technology制造.

English: Excellent! We're always short on glass plates around here and we lost a fair number in the incident, so I'll need you to bring me: x150 Glass Plates Don't worry. You'll be compensated for your trouble with a little extra on top.
Chinese (simplified): 太棒了! 我们这里总是缺少玻璃板,在这次事件中我们损失了相当数量的玻璃板,所以我需要你把我带来: x150 玻璃板 别担心。您的麻烦将得到补偿,上面有一点额外的.

English: We took a lot of damage to the lab's containment vessel that ended up venting our backup oxygen tanks so we're currently lacking reserves for our clean room facilities:\nx50 Oxygen Bottles\nAre all we need to recover our reserves and resume normal procedures in the clean rooms.
Chinese (simplified): 我们实验室的安全壳受到了很大的损坏,最终导致备用氧气罐泄漏,所以我们目前缺乏洁净室设施的储备:\nx50 氧气瓶\n是我们恢复储备和恢复洁净室正常程序所需要的全部吗.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought you some of my spare oxygen tanks.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经带来了你是我的备用氧气罐.</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>You won't need to concern yourself with helping us with our problems any longer. We've cleaned up most of the damage, and left only a few scorchmarks so the inspectors don't get suspicious.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>It looks exactly like it was. A minor incident, and nothing more.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你不用再操心帮我们解决问题了。我们已经清理了大部分的损坏.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>只留下了一些烧焦的痕迹,所以检查人员不会起疑心.</color>

English: Welcome to Arriake Technology. The leading manufacturer of Optronics and Advanced Electronics in the galaxy!\nI'm the secretary for the plant manager. I handle any and all service orders and supplies. So, what can I do for you?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Arriake Technology。银河光电设备和先进电子元件的领先制造商!\n我是秘书的工厂经理. 我处理所有服务订单和用品. 我能为你做什么?

English: Welcome to Arriake Technology. The leading manufacturer of Optronics and Advanced Electronics in the galaxy!\nI'm the secretary for the plant manager. I handle any and all service orders and supplies. You don't seem to be one of our regular suppliers, so i'm afraid you're not authorized to be here.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Arriake Technology。银河光电设备和先进电子元件的领先制造商!\n我是秘书的工厂经理. 我处理所有服务订单和用品.你似乎不是我们的固定供应商,所以恐怕你无权到这里来.

English: <color=#ffffff>Yes, you've passed muster.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You're listed as a contractor and are authorized to supply us with raw materials.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Are you interested in a little contract work?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>是,您通过了测试.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>您被列为承包商,并被授权向我们提供原材料.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>你对承包的小工作感兴趣吗?</color>

English: Your order has been confirmed and received. Here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits and an official {RepCounter} Reputation Bonus with Polaris. We'll notify you if we need further supplies from you in future. Please take one of our products as a sample to distribute to potential clients.
Chinese (simplified): 您的订单已经收到确认. 这里是我的支付{MoneyCounter} 信用点 一名官员 {RepCounter} 声誉奖励 对于 极星. 以后如果我们需要你们的货,我们会通知你们的. 请选取我们的一款产品作为样品分发给潜在客户.

English: One of our suppliers ran afoul of pirates and their delivery won't be coming. You'll be paid accordingly for bringing in the same shipment of:\nx750 Gold Ingots\nThat are used in almost all of our Electronics manufacture and you can guess why they were targeted by Pirates.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的一个供应商遭遇了海盗,他们的货物不会来了。你将得到相应的报酬,用于运送以下货物:\nx750 金锭\n这些金锭几乎用于我们所有的电子产品制造,你不难猜出它们为何成为海盗的目标。

English: One of our regular suppliers has gone bankrupt, so we're still waiting for replacement. In the meantime, you could take over their regular contract of:\nx50 Xenon Bottles\nThey're used in many of our lasers and we'll have depleted our supplies soon. So the company is willing to pay 50% over market price for a shipment.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的一个定期的供应商已经破产了,所以我们还在等待替换组件。在此期间,你可以接管他们的常规合同:\nx50 氙气瓶\n我们的激光器中经常用到它们,我们的供应很快就会用完。所以公司愿意支付比市场价高出50%的运费.

English: We've used up more coolant this month than the last and our regular supplier won't be sending a shipment for another three weeks. We need:\nx15 Coolant\nIn the meantime to tide over our stocks until it can arrive. I'm authorized to issue payments up to double the market price.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这个月用掉的冷却剂比上一个月用掉的更多,我们的定期的供应商要在三周内才会发货。我们需要\nx15 冷却剂\n与此同时,我们的库存要维持到到货为止。我被授权可以支付市场价格的两倍.
<color=#0088ff>我已经带来了你要的冷却剂</color>

English: Platinum is in high demand with low supply. We haven't had a shipment in 4 months and our stocks are running low. Bring me: x750 Platinum Ingots And you'll be compensated with double market value for the shipment. That's more than anywhere else will pay.
Chinese (simplified): 铂金需求量大,供应少。我们已经4个月没有出货了,库存状态很低 给我弄来: x750 白金锭 您将获得双倍市场价的补偿,这比其他任何地方都要贵.

English: As many of the procedures here are conducted using robotics, we need a steady supply of replacement parts. A service order has been in effect for a month with no word from our suppliers at Hostile Apparatus. If you can fill the order of x10 Robotics I'm authorized to pay double market price for the parts you deliver. You will likely need Transportation Boosters to bring them inside though.
Chinese (simplified): 由于这里的许多程序是使用机械设备进行的,我们需要替换组件部件的稳定供应. 服务订单已经生效一个月了,但我们的供应商在敌我识别装置没有任何消息. 如果你能满足订单 x10 机械设备 我有权以市场价的两倍购买你交付的零件. 你可能需要 运输增强器s 来把它们带进来.

English: <color=#ffffff>Your services are no longer required.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Feel free to browse our catalogue though. Normally we only sell to high-value customers, but your loyalty to the company is admirable so we've made an exception.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>您的服务已经不再需要了.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>请随意浏览我们的目录。通常我们只卖给高价值的客户,但是您对公司的忠诚令人钦佩,所以我们破例了.</color>

English: Welcome to Non-Linear Productions or 'NLP' as we're most commonly known.\nI'm the foreman for the entire plant. As you can see: In this here place we handle the manufacturing of Warp Drives, Mining Equipment and Fusion Reactors.\nMake sure you've got a ship connected before you buy any of our oversized products. Not our problem if you drop it on your foot.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Non-Linear Productions非流水线生产或我们常说的“NLP”.\n我是整个厂区的工头。如你所见:在这个地方,我们处理翘曲引擎,采矿设备和聚变反应堆的制造.\n在购买我们的超大号产品之前,请确保您的船已经连接好了.

English: Welcome to Non-Linear Productions or 'NLP' as we're most commonly known. I'm the foreman for the entire plant. As you can see: In this place we handle the manufacturing of Warp Drives, Mining Equipment and Fusion Reactors.@p9 We're not taking any more orders at this time due to a material shortage. Sorry, pal. Pirates keep hitting our shipments.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Non-Linear Productions非流水线生产或我们常说的“NLP”. 我是整个厂区的工头。如你所见:在这个地方,我们处理翘曲引擎,采矿设备和聚变反应堆的制造.@p9 由于短缺,我们现在不再接受任何订单. 对不起,朋友,海盗不断袭击我们的货物.

English: <color=#ffffff>We're back on track for supplies thanks to you; We can handle a few new orders now but we're still short on supplies.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you can lend a hand, we'd be mighty appreciative.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我们回到正轨,为您提供谢谢;我们现在可以接受一些新订单,但仍然供不应求.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你能帮个忙,我们将非常感激.</color>

English: Sorry, but you're on your own

Great news! Your shipment's been taken to the boys around the back and they're bouncin' off the walls, now that the load's off their back. Here's a lil' something the boys and I put together. It's just {MoneyCounter} Credits and {RepCounter} Company Rep.@p9 We'll be fine from here on out, so don't you worry. As a little extra, we're giving you a couple of castoffs from the production line. We can't sell 'em ourselves because of some scratches in the finish, but they'll work fine if ya don't mind 'em looking a bit seedy.
Chinese (simplified): 好消息! 你的货已经运到后面的小伙子们那里了,他们总算是可以轻松一些了. 这是我和男孩们的小礼物。只是一些 {MoneyCounter} 信用点 and {RepCounter} 公司代表.@p9 从现在开始我们会很好,所以不要担心。 作为额外的东西,我们给你一些生产线上丢弃的东西. 我们自己不能卖,因为表面有一些划痕,但如果你不介意它们看起来有点破的话,它们会很好用的.

English: We've been working our asses off day and night with the supply shortage requiring all hands on deck to make sure nothing gets wasted. The boys need a break so if'n ya can bring them:@p8 x48 Bottles of Beer x48 Bottles of Liquor x5 Pizzas That'll do. Doesn't take more than a few six-packs and a pizza to keep the boys happy for a shift.
Chinese (simplified): 由于供应短缺,我们一直在夜以继日地工作,要求所有人都齐心协力,确保不浪费任何东西:@p8 x48 瓶啤酒 x48 瓶烈性酒 x5 披萨 就够了. 只需要一些六瓶装和一个披萨就能让男生们开心换班.

English: We're missing a few shipments, so if'n you can make up the difference, we'll be able to cut back on the recycling processes we're currently running double-time to make up for the material shortages.@p9 What we're missing right now is mostly raw materials. x800 Sathium Ingots Will do us a load of good, and the boys'll help me chip in for a payout if you can manage it. You might need a Transportation Booster to carry all them ingots. Don't worry, well make back the difference in a few days.
Chinese (simplified): 我们少发了几批货,所以如果你们能弥补差额,我们就能减少目前正在进行的回收流程运行中双倍时间来弥补材料短缺.@p9 我们现在缺少的大多是原材料. x800 钑锭 会对我们有很大的好处,如果你能安排的话,孩子们会帮我凑钱.你可能需要一个 运输增强器 以装在这些矿锭 别担心,我们会在几天内补回差价.

English: Ai'ght, so we're down several shipments of parts for our Fusion Cores and we can't make any more until we've got a shipment of: x50 Superconductors Yes, you heard me right. I need 50 of them, and they're expensive and they're made mostly by those eggheads at Arriake Technology. I'll pay through the nose for them if you can get me a load.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,我们的融合核心(Fusion core)的零件减少了几批,我们不能再生产了,直到我们收到以下货物: x50 超导体 是,你没听错。我需要50个,它们很贵而且大多是由Arriake科技的书呆子们制造的. 如果你能给我一个,我愿意花大价钱买.

English: <color=#0088ff>I have a shipment of Superconductors for you, boss.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我弄来了一些超导体给你, 老板.</color>

English: We had a shipment of Heat Exchangers on the way, but the pirates got 'em so now we're down a set for the Drive Core that's going in a freighter refit:\nx30 Heat Exchangers\nAre all we need to complete the order, but it's on the backburner while another shipment's on its way.
Chinese (simplified): 我们有一批热交换器在路上,但是被海盗带走了,所以现在我们为驱动器核心准备了一套,要在货轮上改装:\nx30 热交换器\n是我们完成订单所需要的全部,但是当另一批货在路上时它就被搁置了.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought you those Heat Exchangers, Boss</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经带来了you those 热交换器, 老板</color>

English: Ai'ght, so we make big stuff here. We're not so good with the little things, so we get them shipped in. Problem is that we're running low on regulators and need a shipment or ten to keep working at the current pace.@p9 If you can work out a deal for: x400 Energy Regulators We can work out a reward for you. The boys are too busy to unload yer ship, so you'll be need Transportation Boosters to bring them inside yourself. They're pretty heavy.
Chinese (simplified): 好了,我们在这里做了一些大的东西。我们不太擅长处理这些小东西,所以我们把它们运过来了。问题是,我们的监管机构非常少,需要一到十艘船来保持目前的工作速度。@p9 如果你能想出一个交易: x400 能量调节器 我们可以为你想出一个奖励. 伙计们太忙了,没时间卸载你的船,所以你需要 运输增强器把它们自己弄进来。它们很重.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought you those Energy Regulators you wanted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经带来了你要的能量调节器.</color>

English: Great work, kiddo.\nThe boys can finally take a break and all our work schedules are coming together. We can put out the shipments we've been holding off on and go home tonight.\nCouldn't have done it without you!
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>做的不错,老兄.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>伙计们终于可以休息一下了,我们所有的工作安排都在一起了。我们可以把耽搁了很久的货放出来,今晚就回家.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>没有你是做不到的!</color>

English: Welcome to Zero Horizons. Where nothing can stop you.\nAs you can see, we're in space. And in space, we're specialized for zero-G construction and cold welding.\nWhat can I help you with today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Zero Horizons。没有什么能阻止你.\n如你所见,我们在太空中。在太空中,我们擅长零重力构造和冷焊.\n今天我能为您做些什么?

English: Welcome to Zero Horizons. Where nothing can stop you. ... Except import tax apparently. We've got 4 ships lined up outside the system awaiting clearance from the Zirax Sector Command under suspicion that the ships are actually pirates.@p9 What a load of crap! This is clearly targeted harassment by Rados for undercutting their market to the Imperial Shipyards!@w3 Say, do you wanna make some quick cash?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Zero Horizons。没有什么能阻止你. 显然除了进口税. 我们有4艘船在系统外排队等待兹瑞克斯区指挥部的许可,怀疑这些船实际上是海盗.@p9 真是废话! 这显然是Rados针对帝国造船厂市场的蓄意骚扰!@w3 告诉我,你想快速赚钱吗?

English: <color=#ffffff>We've still got those ships stuck outside the system under guard by Xenu Cruisers with our supplies on board.@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You've helped us out, and I could sure use the help in sorting out this mess again. If we can hold out another few weeks, they'll be forced to let the ships go.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>Mind helping us out again?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我们仍然有那些船被困在系统外,由Xenu巡洋舰看守,我们的补给也在船上.@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>你已经帮我们解决了,我肯定会再次需要你的帮助来整理这个烂摊子。如果我们能再坚持几周,他们就会被迫放船了.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>介意再帮我们一下吗?</color>

English: I knew I could count on you! You've helped us stay in the game another few days and given us the opportunity to one-up the Zirax border patrol. Here's {MoneyCounter} Credits and {RepCounter} Polaris Company Rep to make up for the trouble you had to go through.@p9 We can't get a number of our shipments out through the blockade either, so you can take some of the overflow. We'll make more when those goons give it up and traffic can flow again.
Chinese (simplified): 我就知道我能指望你! 你帮助我们在游戏中多呆了几天,给了我们机会领先兹瑞克斯边境巡逻队. 这里是{MoneyCounter} 信用点 and {RepCounter} 极星 公司代表弥补你所经历的麻烦.@p9 我们的一些货物也无法通过封锁线,所以你可以拿走一些溢出的货物. 当那些打手们放弃了,流量恢复正常时,我们会赚更多的.

English: That's what I like o hear! Right, so the first order of business is food. It's not on the freighters out there, but because of the zirax blockade the regular deliveries aren't getting through to us OR the planets.@p8 We're already on short rations, so if you can bring us: x10 Dino Stew x10 Waffles x10 Fruit Pies x30 Coffee That should spice up our meals for a few days. Just make sure you get us COFFEE, not that herbal tea crap.
Chinese (simplified): 这就是我喜欢听的! 好的,所以第一要务是食物。它不在外面的货船上,但由于兹瑞克斯的封锁,常规的货物无法到达我们或其他星球 x10 恐龙炖 x10 华夫饼 x10 水果派 x30 咖啡 这应该会为我们几天的饭菜增添不少味道。一定要给我们买咖啡,而不是花草茶

English: Great! What we need you to do is get get us the same orders as the freighter's they've got impounded out there. We'll pay you 50% above market price for anything you bring.@p9 One of the freighters out there is carrying a shipment of... x92 Bottles of Helium We need it for deep-space transports that use them in their thrusters as propellant. Old-fashioned, I know. But it's still the best way to stop in a hurry without a 2 week reverse burn after a long lead-up.@p9 You won't be able to move that much mass yourself, even in zero-G. Get yourself some good armor with Transportation Boosters and you'll be able to carry the bottles. I know you can buy them from Hostile Apparatus and maybe ServantCorp.
Chinese (simplified): 很棒! 我们需要你做的是给我们拿到和被扣押的货船一样的订单。你带来的任何东西,我们都会支付市场价的50%以上.@p9 其中一艘货轮载着一批 x92 瓶氦气 我们需要它用于深空运输,在推进器中使用它们作为推进剂。老式的,我知道。但这仍然是最好的方法,在一个匆忙的停止,没有长时间的准备的2周的反向燃烧后.@p9 你自己不可能移动那么大的质量,即使在零重力下。给自己找一些好的护甲,带有 运输增强器 你就可以携带瓶子了. 我懂的,你可以从(Hostile Apparatus)敌意装置公司购买y又或者ServantCorp公司.

English: We line our thruster cones with graphite since they're the only things that can withstand the heat and force of a high-powered plasma thruster, but all our graphite is on one of those freighters being held by the Zirax authorities.@p9 If you can bring us a shipment of: x525 Graphite We can bring production back up, which will hopefully force those goons into reconsidering wasting credits holding freighters carrying spare supplies.
Chinese (simplified): 我们用石墨来排列推进器锥,因为它们是唯一可以承受高功率等离子推进器的热量和力量的东西,但我们所有的石墨都在兹瑞克斯当局扣留的其中一艘货轮上.@p9 如果你能给我们带来一批: x525 石墨 我们可以恢复生产,这将有希望迫使那些打手重新考虑浪费信用点装载备用物资的货轮.

English: If we want to get those zirax authorities off our case, we need to show them that holding the freighters is only going to cost them credits. But bringing in a shipment under their nose and ramping up production, they'll realize they're wasting their time trying to starve us out.@p9 If you can bring in a shipment of: x750 Sathium Ingots We can stick it to those corrupt port authorities and get production back on track.
Chinese (simplified): 如果我们想让兹瑞克斯当局离开我们的案例,我们需要让他们知道持有货船只会让他们付出罚款信用点的代价. 但是在他们眼皮底下运货,增加产量,他们就会意识到想让我们饿死是在浪费时间.@p9 如果你能带来一批货物 x750 钑锭 我们可以把它粘到那些腐败的港口管理部门,让生产回到正轨.

English: Great work, kiddo.\nThe boys can finally take a break and all our work schedules are coming together. We can put out the shipments we've been holding off on and go home tonight.\nCouldn't have done it without you!
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>做的不错,老兄.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>伙计们终于可以休息一下了,我们所有的工作安排都在一起了。我们可以把耽搁了很久的货放出来,今晚就回家.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>没有你是做不到的!</color>

English: Welcome to P3: Polaris Planetside Production.\nWe're only a small operation, but we're wide-spread across the galaxy, producing supplies and infrastructure for colonies and emergency shelters.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到P3: 极星行星边缘生产公司.\n我们只是一个小机构,但我们广泛分布在银河系各地,为殖民地和应急避难所生产供应品和基础设施.

English: Welcome to P3: Polaris Planetside Production. We're only a small operation, but we're wide-spread across the galaxy, producing supplies and infrastructure for colonies and emergency shelters.@p8 It's the fact that we're so small that this factory is often overlooked by Polaris. So we never get the supplies we order, or when a shipment arrives it's bottom-of-the-pile stuff. It's making it hard to put our products on the market.@w3 You've got a ship right? Wanna make some extra cash getting supplies for us?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到P3: 极星行星边缘生产公司. 我们只是一个小机构,但我们广泛分布在银河系各地,为殖民地和应急避难所生产供应品和基础设施.@p8 正是因为我们这么小,这个工厂经常被极星忽略。所以我们从来没有得到我们订购的物资,或者当货物到达时,它是最底层的东西。这使得我们的产品很难投放市场.@w3 你有船了吧?想赚点外快给我们买些东西吗?

English: <color=#ffffff>You've done right by us here, and we're always looking for a dedicated bunch of suppliers that won't stiff us on the quality because we're small.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>Mind helping us out again?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你们在这里做得对,我们一直在寻找一批敬业的供应商,他们不会因为我们规模小而在质量上欺骗我们.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>介意再帮我们一下吗?</color>

English: Your shipment was a welcome addition to our supplies! It's nice to have someone come through on bringing in good quality resources for our factory. You have no idea how much this'll put the guys in marketing at ease.@p8 Here's your agreed upon payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits and i've sent a memo to polaris for {RepCounter} Company Rep for your account. And just to show our gratitude, here's some of our products. I'm sure you can a colony that needs them.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎您的发货,增加了我们的供货! 很高兴有人来为我们的工厂带来优质的资源。你不知道这能让市场部的人安心多少.@p8 这里是我的同意支付 {MoneyCounter} 信用点,我已经向极星发送了一份备忘录,为您的帐户提供{RepCounter} 公司代表. 为了表示我们的感谢,下面是我们的一些产品。我相信你可以找到一个需要它们的殖民地.

English: Great news! We've been getting stiffed by our suppliers because of our size, so you helping us out might stimulate their competitive side. Wishful thinking probably, but there's no harm in it.@p8 What we normally get in our shipments is raw materials like: x400 Titanium Plates Which we use for our modules, but the ones we get are always dented, bent or scratched which means either we spend more resurfacing the plates or put out sub-standard products. Hopefully you can help us with that.
Chinese (simplified): 好消息!由于我们的规模,我们的供应商一直不给我们钱,所以你帮助我们可能会激发他们的竞争力. 大概是一厢情愿吧,不过也没什么坏处.@p8 我们通常在我们的发货中得到的原材料是这样的: x400 钛板 我们用于我们的模块,但我们得到的总是有凹痕,弯曲或划伤,这意味着我们要么花更多的钱重新表面板或推出不合格的产品. 希望你能帮助我们.

English: <color=#0088ff>The plates i've brought are pristine. Fresh out of the constructor.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>崭新的板材我已经带来了. 从建造器新造出来的.</color>

English: Oh, that's excellent! I'm tired of Ea-Nasir constantly supplying us with the wrong grade of copper to the point that i've filed numerous complaints with Polaris for having him on the registered trader list.@p9 If you can supply us with a shipment greater than his, we'll have a legitimate reason to break the contract with him. Let's say... x1250 Copper Ingots should give us reason enough to end our business with him.@p9 Get yourself some Transportation Boosters and you'll be able to move the Copper. I know, not ideal that you need to equip at least two of the things to carry the copper, but that's how it's done in high-volume trading.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,太棒了! 我厌倦了Ea-Nasir不断地向我们提供错误等级的铜,以至于我已经向极星提交了无数的投诉,因为他在注册交易员名单上。如果贵方能提供给我们比他的数量更多的货,我们就有正当理由与他毁约。比方说... x1250 铜锭 应该给我们足够的理由结束我们和他的生意.@p9 获得一些 运输增强器 ,你将能够搬运这些铜. 我知道,你装备至少两件这玩意来携带铜有点难受,但这就是在大额交易中所做的.

English: One of the hardening process for some housing module variants require sulfur for vulcanization of the sealing for airtightness, but our suppliers never send us enough to do the process properly@p8 If you can bring us: x850 Sulfur We can put out more reliable products consistently, at least for a while. That should encourage our supplier that we can and will go somewhere else for the sulfur they won't provide enough.@p9 If you can't find a supplier or mining site that can get you sulfur; you can always get it yourself by mining magmatic rock. Set up your own mining facility and you can very likely find a good market for Sulfur. I know InterWeap's factories never have enough.
Chinese (simplified): 一些外壳模块变种的硬化过程需要硫磺进行密封的硫化,但我们的供应商从来没有给我们足够的时间来正确的做这个过程@p8 如果你给我们带来: x850 硫磺 我们可以始终如一地推出更可靠的产品,至少是一段时间。这应该会鼓励我们的供应商,我们可以和将去硫磺的其他地方,他们不会提供足够的.@p9 如果你找不到可以让你硫磺的供应商或挖矿站;你总是可以通过挖掘岩浆岩来获得它magmatic rock. 建立自己的采矿设施,您很可能会找到一个很好的硫磺市场. 我知道InterWeap的工厂总是不够用.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got a steady supply of sulfur</color>

We're always getting off-cuts and low-quality plastic tubing that we use inside our prefab housing modules. These are vital to the people who live in them and poor insulation or a leak can be fatal. At least for the sake of those people, we need better quality materials.@p8 If you can supply the factory with: x265 Plastic Tubes We can all breathe a little bit easier knowing that our prefab housing won't suddenly implode in a high pressure environment.
Chinese (simplified): 我们总是会在预制房屋模块中使用一些边角料和低质量的塑料管。这些对住在里面的人来说是至关重要的,绝缘不良或泄漏可能是致命的. 至少为了那些人,我们需要质量更好的材料.@p8 如果您能给工厂提供: x265 塑料管 我们都可以松一口气了,因为我们的预制房屋在高压环境下不会突然内爆.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got you a shipment of plastic tubing.</color>

While some of our suppliers will at least send up materials, poor quality or not, they're at least sending them. We're locked in a contract with a third-party for tablet interfaces for a number of vital parts, and they won't even ship to any of our factories.@p9 If I could, i'd open a new contract to Chromium-Sierra Sciences, but head office won't allow it. If you can bring back: x400 Tablets We can actually finish one of the orders we've put on hold for 6 months and maybe force Polaris to authorize a trade agreement with CSS for all future sales.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然我们的一些供应商至少会把材料送上来,不管质量好坏,但他们至少会送上来。我们与第三方签订了平板电脑界面的合同,为我们提供一些重要的部件,但这些部件甚至不会发货给我们的任何一家工厂.@p9 如果可以的话,我想给Chromium-Sierra Sciences开一个新合同,但是总部不允许. 如果你能带回来: x400 平板电脑 我们实际上可以完成我们搁置了6个月的其中一个订单,也许还可以迫使极星授权与CSS签订一份未来所有销售的贸易协议.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought you a shipment of tablets</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经带来了你需要的平板电脑</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Thanks to your undercutting our current suppliers, a few of them have finally taken the initiative to start shipping us good quality materials. At least for a while...@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Head office wasn't happy with you jeopardizing their contracts, but was far happier that you'd put profits up with no extra costs. So they've authorized contracts to new suppliers.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Looks like this'll be the end of our partnership. Thanks for all your help.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>谢谢感谢你们削价出售补给,他们中的一些人终于主动开始向我们发运质量好的材料...@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>至少有一段时间……总部对你危及他们的合同感到不满,但更高兴的是你在没有额外成本的情况下提高了利润。所以他们授权给新的供应商.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>看来我们的合作到此结束了。谢谢你的帮助.</color>

English: We're in space. So we need a steady supply of oxygen, which we can get. The problem is that we're burning through it too fast since our Air Filters are starting to deteriorate with the increased up-time we're doing.@p9 If you can work out a deal for: x40 Filters We can work out a reward for you... or we'll all suffocate.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在太空. 所以我们需要稳定的氧气供应,我们可以得到氧气。问题是我们消耗的速度太快了,因为我们的空气过滤器随着运行时间的增加而开始恶化.@p9 如果你能来个交易: x40 过滤器 我们可以为你想出一个奖励…否则我们都会窒息.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got those Air Filters you need.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我得到了空气过滤器你需要的.</color>

English: The hell are you doing back here?\nThis isn't a sight-seeing tour or some kinda boutique shop on a trade station. This is a cloudmining factory. We skim the surface of Gas Giants and harvest the gases below, pull back up and process them.\nWe don't deal with customers; we ship our stuff out and that's it.
Chinese (simplified): 你回来干什么?\n这不是观光游,也不是什么贸易站的精品商店。这是一个云采矿工厂。我们掠过气体巨行星的表面,收集下面的气体,把它们拉上来处理.\n我们不接待客户;我们把东西运出去,就是这样.

English: How about we cut out the middleman and you sell direct?
Chinese (simplified): 我们跳过中间商,你直接卖怎么样?

English: The hell are you doing here? This isn't a sight-seeing tour or some kinda boutique shop. This is a cloudmining factory. We skim the surface of Gas Giants and harvest the gases below, pull back up and process them.@p8 If you're looking to avoid getting stomped, you'll stay where you are and out of the way of my boys and the mechanoids. We're already operating at max capacity and I don't have the time to handhold you dirtdiggers.
Chinese (simplified): 你在这里做什么? 这不是观光游,也不是什么精品商店。这是一个云采矿工厂。我们掠过气体巨行星的表面,收集下面的气体,把它们拉上来处理.@p8 如果你想避免被踩到,你就待在原地,别挡我的工人和机械设备的路. 我们已经在最大容量运行了,我没有时间和你们这些脏东西打交道.

English: <color=#ffffff>Don't go offering more help or might put you to actual work on the turbines. I just want you out of my way and off my station.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>As it happens, i've got a problem for an outsider that needs solving.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>不要去提供更多的帮助,或者可能会让你在涡轮机上实际工作。我只想让你离我远点,滚出我的警局.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>碰巧,我有一个外来者的问题需要解决.</color>

English: I was wrong about you, kid!\nYou've got your head on straight an done me an' the boys a solid, so here's {MoneyCounter} Credits for the work you put in. No rep.\nI've thrown in a couple o' old tanks with some fresh gas, for the road.
Chinese (simplified): 我看错你了,孩子!\n你清醒的头脑,赢得了我和工人们的信任,所以这里有 {MoneyCounter} 信用点 为你付出的工作.\n我扔了几个旧的油箱和一些新鲜的汽油,在路上.

English: Alright, you wanna play with the big boys? Well, we work hard and play harder. Go bring us back some booze. The good stuff, none of that TOP-brewery piss... Except Gerold, he likes those fruity cocktails.@p9 That'll be: x250 Liquor x5 Bloody Zirax x5 Promethium Blues x5 Dirty Legacy You can get those cocktails from most bars and restaurants. Liquor from a real distillery.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,你想和大人物们一起玩吗?嗯,我们工作努力,玩得更疯狂。 去给我们弄些好酒回来。好东西,不是那些TOP-酿酒厂的尿... 除了Gerold,他喜欢那些水果鸡尾酒。@p9 那将是: x250 烈酒 x5 血腥兹瑞克斯 x5 钷蓝调 x5 脏遗留者 你可以在大多数酒吧和餐馆得到这些鸡尾酒。从真正的酿酒厂弄来的烈酒。

English: Well, we process gasses here. That means we go through Gas Filters at an insane rate. We have to clean them to make them last longer since the delays between shipments can put an end to work for a week or longer.@p9 You bring us a fresh load and you cut down on our workload. x100 Filters should do it, and once we're back at peak productivity, we'll accept as more shipments.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,我们在这里处理气体。这意味着我们通过Gas过滤器的速度非常快。我们必须清洗它们,使它们更耐用,因为发货之间的延迟可能会使工作中断一周或更长时间.@p9 你给我们带来了新的负荷,减少了我们的工作量. x100 过滤器 应该可以了,一旦我们恢复到最高生产力,我们将接受更多的发货.

English: You see those big intake vents on the outside of the hull? Inside them are big graphite filters that suck all the radioactive gases out of the intake. They need replacing every week. You wanna help? Go get me: x500 Graphite That'll let me boys send out a mechanoid to replace the one we've got. Hop to it, kid.
Chinese (simplified): You see those big intake vents on the outside of the hull? Inside them are big 石墨 过滤器 that suck all the radioactive gases out of the intake. They need replacing every week. You wanna help? Go get me: x500 石墨 That'll let me boys send out a mechanoid to replace the one we've got. Hop to it, kid.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got your replacement graphite right here</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我弄来你要的替换组件 石墨</color>

English: Your assistance in this matter is appreciated. Either way, you've accepted the task on your own recognizance. It won't affect the labs negatively either way, so do your best.@p9 I have a list of materials to replace here, and the one currently at the top of the list is: x500 Biological Specimens Uncommon growths that are used in antibacterial scrubs and injections. They can be artificially grown from sprouts from any Medical Constructor, or even a food processor if you're desperate enough.
Chinese (simplified): 我们对您在此事上的帮助表示感谢。无论如何,您已自愿接受这项任务。 不论结果如何,这都不会对实验室产生负面影响,所以请尽您最大的努力。@p9 我这里有一份需要替换的材料清单,目前清单上排在首位的是: 500个生物样本 这些是不常见的生长物,用于抗菌擦洗和注射。它们可以从任何医疗建造机的嫩芽中人工培育,或者如果你足够绝望,甚至可以用食品处理器培育。

English: I'll make you regret offerin' to help out 'round here. Get in yer ship and go find me: x300 Zascosium Alloy Been needing to strip the cladding on the reaction chambers and just waiting on some new Zasc for the job an' here you are. Go on, get!
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>我要让你后悔在这里提供‘帮助’。
上你的船去找我吧:
x300铡合金
我一直在拆反应室的包层,等着找个新的Zasc来做这件事,然后你就来了,快去,弄来这玩意</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Won't be needin' yer help from now on, I reckon.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you wanna give us a hand out, we'll take a few shipments of Filters if you got 'em.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我想从现在起我不需要你的帮助了。\n如果你想给我们一些帮助,我们将想要一些过滤器,如果你有.</color>

English: <color=#aaff00>Friend! Look at what my farms have produced! Have you not seen anything as glorious?</color>\n<color=#aaff00>Truly I cannot be outdone by any </color><color=#ffbb00>Polaris </color><color=#aaff00>farmer!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#aaff00>朋友! 看看我的农场生产了什么! 你见过这么让人骄傲的事情么?</color>\n<color=#aaff00>真的,任何一个</color><color=#ffbb00>极星</color><color=#aaff00>农民都不能超越我!</color>

English: Yes, i'm worried. My mushrooms are sensitive to changes in temperature and we've lately been getting many cold nights. Far colder than the previous cycles and it looks as though I may lose my entire crop if it drops to sharply.@p9 Ideally, I would like to cover my farm with beryllium nanofiber mesh, but the Zirax will likely burn it to ash to see such advanced materials in the hands of the Tal'on. Perhaps you can bring me 10 of your Thermal Regulators instead?
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我很担心。 我的蘑菇对温度的变化很敏感,而且我们最近经常会遇到极为寒冷的夜晚。 比之前的周期要冷得多,看起来如果温度急剧下降,我可能会失去所有作物。@p9 理想情况下,我想用铍纳米纤维网覆盖我的农场 ,但 看到 泰隆 手中有如此先进的材料兹瑞克斯 很可能会把它烧成灰烬,。 也许你可以带我来10 的热调节器 代替?

English: <color=#0088ff>I have brought you some Thermal Regulators</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我给你带来了一些温度调节器</color>

English: My thanks to you, traveller.\nPlease take this token of my gratitude to repay you for the kindness you've shown me. It's only {MoneyCounter} Credits and my clan will be just as grateful.\nTake some of my products as a gift! Spiked Mushrooms can be consumed to treat serious injuries.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您,旅行者。\n请收下这份感谢信,以报答您对我的善意。只需要 {MoneyCounter} Credits,我的部落也会感激不尽。\n拿我的一些产品作为礼物! 尖刺蘑菇可以用来治疗重伤。

English: It is of little concern, traveller. If you would hear of my plight, then gladly will I share with you the problem that I face, aside from the wild temperatures.@p8 I grow my mushrooms in a crevasse outside the village that is well shadowed and damp, where my mushrooms will grow easily. The downside to this is that the wooden logs on which I grow the spores rots quickly, but I am forbidden from entering the forest to collect new logs.@p9 It is the duty of the woodcutters and hunters to enter the forests, not mine. The wood they give to me is not suitable. Twigs and sticks and no thick logs. I ask of you if you would be willing to bring me 25 Wood Logs in their stead away from Clan Territory?
Chinese (simplified): 没什么大不了的,旅行者。 如果您知道我的困境,那么我很乐意与您分享我面临的问题,除了狂野的温度。@p8 我在村外阴凉潮湿的裂缝中种植蘑菇,在那里我的蘑菇很容易生长。 这样做的缺点是我用来生长孢子的木原木腐烂得很快,但我被禁止进入森林收集新原木。@p9 进入森林是樵夫和猎人的职责,而不是我的。他们给我的木头不合适。树枝和木棍,没有厚厚的原木。 请问你是否愿意带我来25 原木来避免让我远离氏族领地?

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought you some nice, thick wooden logs for you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我给你带来了一些漂亮的厚木原木。</color>

English: I would like to avoid imposing on you further, traveller.@w4 It seems as though nothing I do is improving my current crop. Fresh logs, warmer temperatures, even using nutrient solution does nothing.@p7 I need the industrial fertilizer used in commercial farms that the Polaris and the Trade Federation operate on other planets, but we are forbidden by our Zirax overseers from conducting interstellar trade, even through Polaris proxies.@p9 You are not so restricted as my people. If you can bring me 5 Fertilizer from one of the Polaris' offworld factories, you could do much to help. If even that fails, then at least I can say that i've tried everything. What say you? One last job?
Chinese (simplified): 我不想进一步打扰您,旅行者。@w4 看起来我所做的一切都无法改善我目前的作物。新鲜的原木、更温暖的温度,甚至使用营养液都无济于事。@p7 我需要在商业农场中使用的工业肥料,这是Polaris和贸易联盟在其他星球运营时所使用的,但我们被我们的兹瑞克斯监督者禁止进行星际贸易,即使是通过Polaris代理也不行。@p9 您并没有像我的人民那样受到限制。如果您能从Polaris的世外工厂给我带来5袋肥料,您将能够提供很大的帮助。 如果连这都失败了,那么至少我可以说我尝试了一切。 您怎么看?最后一个任务?

English: I'll see what I can do

Praise be to the spirits, my friend! You have done so much for me, and it's only fair that I return the favor. So here is the few {MoneyCounter} Credits I can offer you my chief is just as pleased with your generosity.@p9 We have together brought together a suitable reward that you will surely use well, since it is of less use to us. Take with you the products of my people, our art, our trade and our produce. Know that you have done more for me than any other.
Chinese (simplified): 赞美精神,我的朋友! 你为我做了这么多,我回报这个人情是公平的。所以这里有一些 {MoneyCounter} Credits 我可以为您提供的,我的酋长对您的慷慨表示同样满意。@p9 我们凑齐了一个合适的奖励,你肯定会好好利用,因为它对我们用处不大。 请带上我的人民的产品、我们的艺术、我们的贸易和我们的产品。知道你为我做的比其他任何人都多。

English: <color=#aaff00>My mushrooms are growing healthy and strong again.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>Your generous gifts were much appreciated and as I did not use all the fertilizer, I shared it among my clan's farmers to spread on the fields.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>We will have a bountiful harvest next season, and it is thanks to you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#aaff00>我的蘑菇又长得又健康又强壮了。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>非常感谢您慷慨的礼物,由于我没有用完所有的肥料,所以我把它分享给了我氏族的农民撒在田野上。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>下个季节我们会有大丰收,多亏了你。</color>

English: <color=#aaff00>Hail, traveller.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>Welcome to my Tannery. I am devoted entirely to the production of leather.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>I am fortunate that it is one role in which our products are in high demand, even on planets we are forbidden to visit.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#aaff00>欢迎,旅者。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>欢迎来到我的制革厂。我全身心致力于皮革的生产。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>我很幸运,即使在我们被禁止访问的星球上,我们的产品需求量也很高。</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>That's quite a smell you have here</color>
