I give you my thanks for your gift, traveller.\nPlease take these {MoneyCounter} Credits to cover the costs. I was planning on buying some from the Polaris' Trade Station on my next visit there, though they always overcharge me, so this is preferrable.\nPlease take some of my products as a gift! At least I know they will be put to good use.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您的礼物,旅行者。\n请收下这些{MoneyCounter} 信用点以支付费用。我本打算在下次访问波拉利斯的贸易空间站时购买一些,尽管他们总是向我过度收费,所以这样更可取。\n请收下我的一些产品作为礼物!至少我知道它们会被好好利用。

English: Indeed it is. Which is why I my Tannery is where it is, away from the others. I still receive regular complaints about the smell when the wind changes and I would certainly prefer an alternative method of tanning.@p9 Perhaps you would be willing to help me out by bringing me 15 Bottles of your Nutrient Solution? It should be able to achieve a similar effect without any of the odiferous side-effects.
Chinese (simplified): 确实如此。 这也是为什么我的制革厂位于这里,远离其他地方。当风向改变时,我仍然会定期收到关于气味的投诉,我当然更倾向于一种无异味的制革方法。@p9 或许您愿意帮我个忙,给我带来15瓶您的营养液? 它应该能够实现类似的效果,而且不会有任何气味方面的副作用。

English: Yes, the solution you provided has done much to alleviate the stench, but it has taken a toll on the tanning process; Producing lower quality leather. This could be improved with an infusion of salt.@p8 I ask of you if you would be willing to bring me 150 Salt? You can obtain it from digging up the sand and rock surrounding and under oceans and lakes. It appears as a fine crystalline powder.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,您提供的营养液在很大程度上缓解了恶臭,但这影响了鞣制过程;产生了质量较低的皮革。 这可以通过注入盐来改进。@p8 我想知道您是否愿意为我带来 150 盐? 您可以通过挖掘周围和海洋及湖泊下的沙子和岩石来获得它。它呈现为细小的结晶性粉末。

English: I'll see what I can do

It's possible to improve my leather yield significantly if I could get some industrial chemicals from Polaris. But they're not willing to risk their profits with the zirax to accomodate our people. Such chemicals could be used to produce weapons.@p9 Since you are not of Polaris and no friend of the zirax, perhaps you can aid me where they will not by bringing me 5 Bottles of Chemicals from one of the Polaris' offworld factories. It would do much to improve my production.
Chinese (simplified): 如果我能从Polaris那里获得一些工业化学品,我的皮革产量就能大幅提升。但Polaris不愿意冒着损失利润的风险,与兹瑞克斯打交道来满足我们的人。 这样的化学品可以用来生产武器。@p9 由于你不是Polaris的人,也不是兹瑞克斯的朋友,也许你可以在他们不愿意的地方帮助我,通过从Polaris的一个外星球工厂带给我5瓶化学品。 这将大大提升我的生产能力。

English: I'll see what I can do

Praise be to the spirits, my friend! You have done so much for me, and it's only fair that I return the favor. So here is the few {MoneyCounter} Credits I can offer you my chief is just as pleased with your generosity.@p9 We have together brought together a suitable reward that you will surely use well, since it is of less use to us. I have received gifts from the other villagers for purging the stench, but these rightfully belong to you. Take them and go in peace, my friend.
Chinese (simplified): 赞美众灵,我的朋友! 你为我做了这么多,我也应该回报你。所以这里有一些{MoneyCounter} 信用点我可以提供给你,我的首领也对你的慷慨感到高兴。@p9 我们共同为你准备了一份合适的奖励,你肯定会很好地使用它,因为我们不太需要它。 我从其他村民那里收到了清除恶臭的礼物,但这些礼物理应属于你。拿去它们,和平地离开,我的朋友。

English: <color=#aaff00>Indeed it is.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>I am producing more leather than before, at a higher quality and without the smells.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>It is thanks to you that the village now has more money to spare for the Polaris traders.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#aaff00>确实如此。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>我现在生产的皮革比以前多,质量更高,而且没有异味。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>多亏了你,村子现在有更多的钱可以用于极星商人。</color>

English: Welcome to Vitalife Pharmaceuticals. The leading producer of medical ingredients and pharmaceuticals.\nI'm one of the researchers at this labs, probably the lead researcher. We... don't really deal with customers here. I am authorized to provide samples to drug reps, and negotiate supply contracts though.\nSo I guess I can help you.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到维塔利夫制药。领先的医疗原料和药品生产商。\n我是这个实验室的研究员之一,可能算是首席研究员。我们...这里并不真正与客户打交道。我有权向药品代表提供样品,并谈判供应合同。\n所以我猜我可以帮助你。

English: Welcome to Vitalife Pharmaceuticals. The leading producer of medical ingredients and pharmaceuticals. I'm one of the researchers at this labs, probably the lead researcher. We... don't really deal with customers here. I am authorized to provide samples to drug reps, and negotiate supply contracts though.@p9 I'm currently juggling a half dozen issues so I don't have time for it. Refrigeration went down on half our supply cabinets so many of our supplies are ruined. Now i've got requests from Labs 2 and 3 for materials that we don't have!
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Vitalife制药公司。领先的医疗原料和药品生产商。 我是这个实验室的研究员之一,可能算是主要研究员。我们……这里并不真正处理客户。我有权向药品代表提供样品,并谈判供应合同。@p9 目前我正在处理六个问题,所以没有时间。 我们的冷藏设施有一半停工了,导致许多物资损坏。 现在我收到了实验室2和3对于我们没有的材料的请求!

English: <color=#ffffff>Your help is welcome, though some of the materials we bring in are quite exotic. I'm not sure if you can even bring in many of the parts on my list.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're willing to try, that's fine by me.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>欢迎您的帮助,虽然我们带来的一些材料是相当奇特的。我不确定你能不能把我单子上的很多部分都带来。\n如果你愿意尝试,我没问题。</color>

English: These all appear to be in order... You've brought all the materials I requested and faster than our regular suppliers. Here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits and i'll forward a request for {RepCounter} Reputation for your account with Polaris.@p9 I'm impressed enough with your performance that i've decided to include a sample of our products in your payment. Please be careful with what you do with them. They can be quite a problem in the wrong hands.
Chinese (simplified): 这些看起来都是有序的… 你带来了我要的所有材料,而且比我们的定期的供应商还快。这里是我的支付{MoneyCounter} 信用点,我请求转发{RepCounter} 信誉为您的账户对于 极星.@p9 我对你的表现印象深刻,所以我决定在你的付款中包括我们产品的一个样本。 请小心处理它们.

English: Your assistance in this matter is appreciated. Either way, you've accepted the task on your own recognizance. It won't affect the labs negatively either way, so do your best.@p9 I have a list of materials to replace here, and the one currently at the top of the list is: x4 Science Equipment It wasn't just refrigeration that cut out, a number of sensitive devices seized up and we've got a repair crew investigating the cause. You'll want to check with our supplier, Chromium-Sierra Sciences.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您在这件事上提供的帮助。无论如何,您已经自愿接受了这个任务。 无论结果如何,都不会对实验室产生负面影响,所以请尽您最大的努力。@p9 我有一份需要替换的材料清单,目前清单上排在首位的是: 4套科学设备 不仅仅是制冷系统出现了故障,一些敏感设备也停止了工作,我们有一支维修团队正在调查原因。 您需要与我们的供应商联系,铬-西拉科学。

English: Your assistance in this matter is appreciated. Either way, you've accepted the task on your own recognizance. It won't affect the labs negatively either way, so do your best.@p9 I have a list of materials to replace here, and the one currently at the top of the list is: x60 Bottles of Xenon Gas A rare gas, primarily used in anesthetics and a variety of medical processes undertaken here. You'll not find it on trade stations, most likely at a gas harvester as a byproduct.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您在此事项上的支持。不管怎样,您已经自愿接受了这项任务。 无论如何,这都不会对实验室产生负面影响,所以请尽您最大的努力。@p9 我这里有一份需要替换的材料清单,目前清单上排在首位的是: 60瓶氙气 这是一种稀有气体,主要用于麻醉剂和这里进行的各种医疗过程。您可能不会在贸易空间站找到它,最有可能在气体采集器作为副产品。

English: Your assistance in this matter is appreciated. Either way, you've accepted the task on your own recognizance. It won't affect the labs negatively either way, so do your best.@p9 I have a list of materials to replace here, and the one currently at the top of the list is: x750 Sulfur It's used in sulfide and sulfate-based medications and treatments. You can find a factory or supplier; but it's probably more cost-effective to mine it yourself on any Lava planet.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您在此事上的协助。无论如何,您已自愿接受了这项任务。 无论哪种方式,它都不会对实验室产生负面影响,所以请尽您所能。@p9 我有一份需要替换的材料清单,目前清单上最顶端的是: 750个硫磺 它用于硫化物和硫酸盐类的药物和治疗。您可以找到一个工厂或供应商;但自己在一个熔岩星球上采矿可能更具成本效益。
<color=#0088ff>我已经带来了一些你要的硫磺</color>

English: I've got all the lazy bums I need around here. You wanna work? You can hop in your ship and go find me: A new Fusion Reactor Core. I'll pay you double market price since our current one has been running dirty for the last month and no one wants to deliver one out here.@p9 Non-Linear Productions and Solaris-AMP makes 'em and they're perfect for a gas miner since we've got a limitless source of Hydrogen and Helium to run 'em on.
Chinese (simplified): 我这里已经有足够的懒鬼了。 你想工作吗?你可以跳进你的飞船,去给我找: 一个新的 聚变反应堆核心。 我会以双倍市场价格支付你,因为我们现在的这个已经脏了一个月了,而且没有人愿意送到这里来。@p9 非线性制作和Solaris-AMP制造它们,它们对于气体矿工来说非常完美,因为我们有无限的氢气和氦气来驱动它们。
<color=#0088ff>我找到了你那个反应堆核心.</color>

English: Your assistance in this matter is appreciated. Either way, you've accepted the task on your own recognizance. It won't affect the labs negatively either way, so do your best.@p9 I have a list of materials to replace here, and the one currently at the top of the list is: x10 Brafus Fungi They have tremendous recovery properties. Unfortunately, they cannot be grown in a lab and have to be imported through the Tal'on.
Chinese (simplified): 我们感谢您在此事上的协助。无论如何,您已经自愿接受了这项任务。 不管怎样,这不会影响实验室的运作,所以请尽您最大的努力。@p9 我这里有一份需要替换的材料清单,目前排在清单最前面的是: 10个布拉弗斯真菌 它们拥有惊人的恢复特性。不幸的是,它们不能在实验室中培育,必须通过塔隆进口。

English: <color=#0088ff>I managed to track down some Brafus Fungi</color>

<color=#ffffff>You've managed to replace all of our missing stocks.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thank you for your assistance in such an important matter. We're all truly grateful here, I just wish we could show it properly.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>We're heavily scrutinized by Polaris here, so we have to act professional at all times.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你把我们缺的货都补上了。\n谢谢你在这么重要的事情上的帮助。我们都很感激,我只是希望我们能恰当地表达出来。\n我们在这里受到极星的严格审查,所以我们必须时刻表现得专业.</color>

English: Civvy on deck! You lot! Watch your load so you don't turn our guest here into street pizza!@p4 And you, this is a work site. If ya don't want to get crushed under a couple of tonnes of ore, don't just walk on across the concourse without a care in the world, Aye? Now what do ya want?
Chinese (simplified): 平民在甲板上! 你们这些家伙!小心你们的载荷,别把我们的客人变成街边披萨!@p4 还有你,这是一个工地。如果你不想被几吨矿石压扁,就不要毫无顾忌地在广场上随意走动,明白吗? 现在你想要什么?

English: This here's a Hematite mine. That's a kind of iron ore, got a little bit of Cobalt mixed in with this lot.\nWe're supplying iron to a half-dozen companies so we kin' always use help. I have a massive list of things I need help with, so be careful about volunteering help.\nI can't put in a good word with any of my buyers, but I will pay fer ya services.
Chinese (simplified): 这里是一处赤铁矿矿场。这是一种含有铁矿石,其中混有少量钴的矿石。\n我们向六家公司供应铁矿,所以我们总是需要帮助。 我有一份长长的需要帮助的事项列表,所以请小心自愿提供帮助。\n我不能向我的任何买家说好话,但我会支付你的服务费用。

English: Thanks be ta' ye, kid.\nYou've really helped me out here, an here's yer payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits.\nI'll even give ye a small shipment of ore fer ya trouble.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你,孩子。\n你真的在这里帮了我大忙,这是你的报酬{MoneyCounter} 点信用点。\n我甚至还会送你一小批矿石作为你的麻烦的补偿。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. What we need here right now is replacements fer our current mining equipment. They're fine fer now, but we don't got no replacements. x1 Mining Equipment Should be all we need fer now. P3 and NLP factories make 'em so should sell 'em too.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔提供给我这个帮助的。 我们现在需要的是替换我们现有的采矿设备。它们现在还可以用,但我们没有备用的。 x1采矿设备 现在应该只需要这些。P3和NLP工厂制造它们,所以也应该卖它们。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. What we need here right now is replacements fer our current mining equipment. They're fine fer now, but we don't got no replacements. x2 Mining Equipment Should be all we need fer now. P3 and NLP factories make 'em so should sell 'em too.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔提供给我这个帮助的。 我们现在需要的是替换我们目前的采矿设备。它们现在还可以用,但我们没有备用的。 两倍采矿设备 现在应该就只需要这些。P3 和 NLP工厂制造它们,所以也应该出售它们。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. Motor's burned out on our back-up drill and some of the conveyors and we need replacements. x65 Motors Should be all we need to get it all back up 'n running.
Chinese (simplified): 你提供帮助给我,你将会后悔的。 我们的备用钻机的马达烧坏了,还有一些传送带也需要更换。 x65 马达 这应该是我们恢复所有设备运行所需的一切。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. What we need here right now is a new Subspace Transmitter. The last one got knocked down by one of the loading hovers. x10 Communication Equipment Only place ya can get 'em is Arriake Technology. It's an Electronics factory under Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔提供给我这个帮助的选择的。 我们现在需要的是一个新的子空间发射器。上一个被装载悬浮物撞倒了。 x10 通信设备 唯一能拿到它们的地方是 Arriake Technology。它是一个位于 Polaris 下的电子工厂。
我已经带来了你要的通信设备

English: Good ta hear! We're pretty good fer now, but the boys've been workin' for two days and need a break an' a lil' reward. You go bring us... x100 Bottles of Liquor Can buy the stuff all over. Try either Totally OP's Brewery or one o' the Tal'on breweries.
Chinese (simplified): 很高兴听到这个消息! 我们现在情况还不错,但小伙子们已经连续工作两天了,需要休息一下,还有小小的奖励。你去给我们带来... 100瓶烈酒 你可以在各地购买到这些东西。试试完全逆天的酿酒厂或者其中的一个Talon酿酒厂。

English: We've got patch jobs all over the place 'n we need new parts else we'll need a complete replacement soon. Think you can get me: x1500 Mechanical Components and x100 Steel Plates? Easy to make, but we don't have a dedicated Constructor here to do it ourselves.
Chinese (simplified): 我们到处都有需要修补的工作,而且如果不及时更换新部件,我们很快就需要完全替换。你觉得你能帮我弄到:\n1500个机械部件和\n100块钢板?这些很容易制造,但我们这里没有专门的建造机来自己完成。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. We've got two conveyor belts down and another half-dozen held together with duct tape. We can't do any more patch jobs. We need... x6 Spare Parts That'll be enough to fix the ones we've got for a while at least. Can get the parts from P3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories.
Chinese (simplified): 你将会后悔提供给我这个帮助。 我们的两条传送带坏了,还有另外六个勉强用胶带粘在一起。我们不能再做任何修补工作了。我们需要... 6个备用零件 这将足够我们至少暂时修复现有的设备。可以从P3和敌对机器的工厂中获取这些零件。
我已经带来了你要的备用零件

English: We've got problems comin' out our ears, but one of the major ones we got is that, well... look around. We're out in the open here and it gets mighty cold at night. What we be needin' is...\nx3 Prefab Housing Units\nWe can set 'em up nearby for the boys to take breaks in. Can only buy 'em from P3 Factories since there ain't much money in helpin' us poor folks.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的问题多得像耳朵里长出来的一样,但其中最大的一个就是我们...看看周围。我们这里暴露在外,晚上非常冷。我们真正需要的是...\n3套预制住房单元\n我们可以在附近搭建它们,供大家休息。只能从P3 工厂购买,因为帮助我们这些穷苦人没有多少利润。
我已经带来了你要的组合式单位

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. Our drills are using water for coolant, but it's not drawing enough heat away so we need to shut down every couple of ours to cool off. x15 Heat Exchangers Should do the trick, so's we don't need to cool down as often. Zero Horizons' and Thermal Interactions' factories make 'em so should sell 'em too.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔给我提供这个帮助的。 我们的钻头使用水作为冷却剂,但水不足以吸收足够的热量,所以我们需要每隔几个小时就停机冷却。 需要x15个热交换器 这样我们就不用那么频繁地冷却了。零点地平线和热能互动的工厂制造这些,所以也应该会出售。
我已经带来了你要的那些热交换器

English: Our old capacitors are pretty old and they've been losin' their charge faster 'n faster each time we charge 'em. We need replacements and the regulators to keep 'em in line. Think ya can get me: x12 Advanced Capacitors and x12 Energy Regulators? We can't have 'em shipped in ourselves since it's a pretty small order and they'll charge us a premium for it.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的旧电容器已经相当陈旧了,它们每次充电后保持电荷的时间越来越短。我们需要替换它们,并需要调节器来控制它们。你能帮我们弄到: x12个高级电容器 和 x12个能量调节器? 我们自己不能进货,因为这是一个相当小的订单,他们会为此收我们很高的费用。
我已经带来了你要的替换组件电容器

English: As you've been warned, this is a work site and we get a lot of injuries 'round here so if you can top up our First Aid kit with: x20 Bandages x3 Trauma Kits and x10 Adrenaline Shots We'll be a mite grateful.
Chinese (simplified): 正如你所被警告的,这是一个工地,我们这里经常发生很多伤害,所以如果你能补充我们的急救包,包括: x20 绷带 x3 外科医疗包和 x10 肾上腺素注射 我们会非常感激。

English: I've topped up your first aid kit
Chinese (simplified): 我已经把你的急救箱装满了

English: A'ight, the boys here are sick of eatin' canned beans and meat, we want some real stuff but none of us are any good at cookin'. You bring us some good grub like: x7 Cheeseburgers x5 Pizza x3 Cakes And we'll be much better off. We'll even pay you double their value, 'cause we're sick of canned food.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,这里的兄弟们已经厌倦了吃罐头豆类和肉类,我们想要一些真正的食物,但我们都不擅长烹饪。 你给我们带来一些好吃的,比如: 7个奶酪汉堡 5个比萨 3个蛋糕 我们的情况会好很多。我们甚至会付给你它们价值的双倍,因为我们真的厌倦了罐头食品。

English: Work's on hold while we rig up a temporary generator. If you can be gettin' us a replacement, it should solve all our problems. Just need: x1 Small Advanced Generator and x30 Electronics And we can get back to work without needin' to risk scorched buttcracks an' burnt eyebrows.
Chinese (simplified): 工作暂停,我们正在安装一个临时发电机。如果你能帮我们弄到一个替换品,应该能解决我们所有的问题。只需要: x1 小型 高级发电机和 x30 电子元件 这样我们就可以继续工作,而不需要冒着烫伤屁股和烧焦眉毛的风险。

English: I've got a replacement generator and cables for you
Chinese (simplified): 我给你准备了替换组件发电机和电缆

English: We've hit a dense plate of Granite an' we can't get the drill through it before it overheats. We need to try blastin' the rocks out: x20 Explosive Charges and x40 Optical Fiber Should do. We'll lower the explosive bundle down and use a line o' optical fiber for remote detonation.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的钻头在密集的花岗岩板前过热了,无法钻穿。我们需要尝试用爆破来清除岩石: 需要x20个炸药包和 x40个光纤 应该就可以了。我们将把炸药包放下去,用光纤线进行远程引爆。

English: The local wildlife have been a problem lately. Think you can get us a few guns for the boys to take care of them? x3 MB-15B Sniper Rifles and x200 7.62mm Rifle Rounds Will do, an' it'll keep the boys busy while they're off-duty and hopefully put a little fresh meat on the table.
Chinese (simplified): 最近当地野生动物一直是个问题。你能帮我们弄几把枪给那些家伙处理它们吗? x3 MB-15B 狙击步枪 和 x200 7.62mm 步枪子弹 会的,这会让那些家伙在下班时忙碌起来,希望还能在餐桌上增加一些新鲜的肉。

English: Hey you! Watch where yer walkin' or else you're gonna get squashed!@p4 Now what's a flyboy like you doin' down here in the dirt? Not here for a shipment, an' not one of our client's agents, not with them guns. So what do you need with our lil' copper mine, huh?
Chinese (simplified): 嘿,你! 小心走路,否则你会被压扁的!@p4 现在,像你这样的飞行员在这里的泥土中做什么?不是为了送货,也不是我们的客户代理,不是带着那些枪。 那你对我们的小铜矿需要什么,嗯?

English: You're standing next to a Copper Mine. We mine Chalcocite here. It's a mix of Copper an' Sulfur. There's some Enargite in there too, which is toxic to all hell so we've always got protesters complaining about arsenic in the runoff.\nI can't put in a good word with any of my buyers, but I will pay fer ya services.
Chinese (simplified): 你正站在一个铜矿旁边。我们在这里开采辉铜矿。这是一种铜和硫的混合物。里面还有一些辉铋矿,这东西极其有毒,所以我们总是有抗议者抱怨废水中的砷。\n我不能向任何买家推荐你,但我会为你的服务付费。

English: Thanks be ta' ye, kid.\nYou've really helped me out here, an here's yer payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits.\nI'll even give ye a small shipment of ore fer ya trouble.
Chinese (simplified): 多谢你,孩子。\n你真的帮了我大忙,这是你的报酬 {MoneyCounter} 信用点。\n我还会送你一小批矿石,以示感谢。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. What we need here right now is replacements fer our current mining equipment. They're fine fer now, but we don't got no replacements. x1 Mining Equipment Should be all we need fer now. P3 and NLP factories make 'em so should sell 'em too.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔提供给我这个帮助的。 我们现在需要的是替换我们现有的采矿设备。它们现在还好,但我们没有备用的。 x1 采矿设备 这应该就是我们目前所需要的。P3和NLP工厂制造它们,所以也应该卖它们。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. What we need here right now is replacements fer our current mining equipment. They're fine fer now, but we don't got no replacements. x2 Mining Equipment Should be all we need fer now. P3 and NLP factories make 'em so should sell 'em too.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔提供给我帮助的决定的。 我们现在需要的是替换我们现有的采矿设备。它们现在还可以用,但我们没有备用的。 两倍采矿设备 这应该是我们现在所需要的全部。P3和NLP工厂制造它们,所以也应该销售它们。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. We've been using solars as a backup fer years, but this latest vein has been throwing out finer dust that's been damaging our panels. x30 Solar Cells Is what we need to fix the panels, but the only place ya can get 'em is Solaris-AMP. It's an Electronics factory under Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔提供给我这个帮助的。 我们多年来都使用太阳能作为备用能源,但最近这个矿脉产出的更细的灰尘一直在损害我们的太阳能板。 需要30个太阳能电池 这是修复太阳能板所需的,但唯一能获得它们的地方是Solaris-AMP。它是一个位于Polaris下的电子产品工厂。
我已经给你带来了一些太阳能电池

English: Good ta hear! We're pretty good fer now, but the boys've been workin' for two days and need a break an' a lil' reward. You go bring us... x100 Bottles of Liquor Can buy the stuff all over. Try either Totally OP's Brewery or one o' the Tal'on breweries.
Chinese (simplified): 很高兴听到这个消息! 我们现在状态还不错,但是小伙子们已经连续工作两天了,需要休息一下,也需要一点小小的奖励。你去给我们带回来... 100瓶烈酒 你可以在各地买到这些东西。试试完全超常的酿酒厂或者其中一个泰隆酿酒厂。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. We've got two conveyor belts down and another half-dozen held together with duct tape. We can't do any more patch jobs. We need... x6 Spare Parts That'll be enough to fix the ones we've got for a while at least. Can get the parts from P3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories.
Chinese (simplified): 你提供帮助给我,迟早会后悔的。 我们的两条传送带都坏了,另外还有六条几乎就是用胶带拼凑起来的。我们不能再做任何修补工作了。我们需要... 6个备用零件 这至少能让我们现有的设备再维持一段时间。可以从P3和敌对机器的工厂获取这些零件。
我已经带来了你的备用零件

English: We've got problems comin' out our ears, but one of the major ones we've got right now is that, the drills are kicking up a lot of dust. We've got extractors running constantly but the filters are getting clogged...\nx72 Air Filters\nIs all we need to be set for another month or two. Can buy 'em from Chromium-Sierra, Vitalife and Chemmix Factories. They're the bunch dealing in chemical treatments.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的问题多得数不胜数,但目前最主要的问题是,钻头激起了大量灰尘。我们的抽风机一直在运转,但过滤器正在被堵塞...\nx72 空气过滤器\n是我们接下来一两个月所需的。可以从 铬-塞拉利昂、维塔利夫和 化学混合工厂。他们专门处理化学处理方面的事务。
我已经带来了你要的空气过滤器

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. Our drills are using water for coolant, but it's not drawing enough heat away so we need to shut down every couple of ours to cool off. x10 Coolant Should do the trick, so's we don't need to shut down as often. Hydroflux and Thermal Interactions' factories make the stuff.
Chinese (simplified): 你会后悔提供给我这个帮助的。 我们的钻机正在使用水作为冷却剂,但它没有吸走足够的热量,所以我们需要每隔几个小时就停机冷却。 x10 冷却剂 应该能解决这个问题,这样我们就不需要那么频繁地停机了。Hydroflux 和 热能互动的工厂生产这种材料。
我已经带来了you that 冷却剂

English: We've got patch jobs all over the place 'n things've gone past the point of no return, so we need complete replacements for the drillheads and motors:\nx8 Mechanical Drill Modules (HV)\nShould do it. We'd make 'em ourselves, but our constructor can't make big stuff like that.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的修补工作到处都是,而且事情已经到了无法挽回的地步,所以我们需要完全替换钻头和马达:\n8个高电压机械钻探模块\n应该可以了。我们自己会制造,但我们的建造机不能制造那么大的东西。

English: We've got a problem with the bore holes we're diggin' constantly filling with water an' dust and it's ruining the drills. We need that slurry pumped out now. x2 Water Extractors and x50 Plastic Pipes should be able to pull out all the water an' slurry and free up the drillheads.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的钻孔工作遇到了问题,不断有水和灰尘填充到钻孔中,这正在损坏钻头。我们需要立即抽出这些泥浆。 x2 水提取器和 x50 塑料管 应该能够抽出所有的水和泥浆,让钻头自由工作。

English: Yer gonna be regretting yer choice to offer me this help. Motor's burned out on our back-up drill and some of the conveyors and we need replacements. x65 Motors Should be all we need to get it all back up 'n running.
Chinese (simplified): 你将会后悔提供给我这个帮助的。 我们的备用钻机上的马达烧坏了,一些传送带也需要更换。 65个马达 这应该就是我们让一切重新运转所需的全部。

English: As you've been warned, this is a work site and we get a lot of injuries 'round here so if you can top up our First Aid kit with: x20 Bandages x3 Detox Kits and x30 Antibiotic Ointment We'll be a mite grateful.
Chinese (simplified): 正如你被警告的,这是一个工地,我们这里经常发生很多伤害,所以如果你能补充我们的急救包包括: x20 绷带 x3 解毒医疗包和 x30 抗生素软膏我们将感激不尽。

English: I've topped up your first aid kit
Chinese (simplified): 我已经把你的急救箱装满了

English: A'ight, the boys here are sick of eatin' canned beans and meat, we want some real stuff but none of us are any good at cookin'. You bring us some good grub like: x7 Waffles x5 Dino-Stew x3 Fruit Pies And we'll be much better off. We'll even pay you double their value, 'cause we're sick of canned food.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,这里的伙计们已经厌倦了吃罐头豆子和肉,我们想吃点真正的食物,但我们中没有人擅长烹饪。 如果你能给我们带来一些美味的食物,比如: 7份华夫饼 5份恐龙炖肉 3份水果派 我们会过得更好。我们甚至愿意支付你这些食物价值的双倍,因为我们真的厌倦了罐头食品。

English: We've been patching the electrics on our rig for years, and it's finally died on us, so we're on hold while we're trying to rewire the rig but we'd be better with: x15 Computers and x100 Advanced Electronics And we can get back to work without needin' to risk scorched buttcracks an' burnt eyebrows.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的钻井平台的电路已经修修补补多年了,现在终于彻底报废了,所以我们现在暂停工作,尝试重新布线,但如果我们有: 15台计算机和 100个高级电子产品 我们就能安全地恢复工作,而不需要冒着屁股烧焦和眉毛烧焦的风险。

English: We've hit a dense plate of Granite an' we can't get the drill through it before it overheats. We need to try blastin' the rocks out: x20 Explosive Charges and x40 Optical Fiber Should do. We'll lower the explosive bundle down and use a line o' optical fiber for remote detonation.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的钻头在遇到一片密集的花岗岩板时过热,无法钻穿。我们需要尝试爆破岩石:\n需要x20个炸药包和\nx40个光纤应该就足够了。我们将把爆炸物包放下去,并使用光纤进行远程引爆。

English: We get protesters around complaining about arsenic in the groundwater. They've smashed some of our equipment when they think they can. If the boys were armed, they'd think twice. x6 DT-55 SMGs and x1000 Pistol Rounds Them SMGs are good. Nice n' small an' won't get in their way while they work.
Chinese (simplified): 我们周围有抗议者抱怨地下水中的砷。当他们认为可以的时候,他们会砸坏我们的一些设备。如果那些家伙武装起来,他们会三思的。 x6 DT-55 冲锋枪 和 x1000 手枪子弹 那些冲锋枪很好。小巧玲珑,不会妨碍他们工作。

English: Watch your step, kid. The ground may look stable, but we're digging right beneath your feet.\nWhat we're digging out of the ground here is Quartz. We ship it off to be ground down into silicon powder and processed into industrial silicon boules.
Chinese (simplified): 小心你的脚步,孩子。地面看起来可能很稳定,但我们就在你脚下挖掘。\n我们从地下挖掘出来的是石英。我们将其运走,磨成硅粉,加工成工业硅锭。

English: Aye. We always need help here. You don't look like you'd be much use in the mine, so if you're serious about offering help. I'll put you on requisitions. You'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books. Is that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 好的。我们这里总是需要帮助。 你看起来不像是在矿井里能派上大用场的人,但如果你真的愿意提供帮助,我会把你安排在补给任务上。 当然,你会得到报酬。如果工作做得好,我可能会额外给你奖金。但你的工作将不会正式记录在册。 这样对你来说可以吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,一切看起来都井然有序。 如我们约定的,这是您的支付金额 {MoneyCounter} 信用点。 这比在贸易空间站购买商品的价格要高,但对我来说仍然是一笔好交易,因为这里没有过高的运费。 也拿走这批矿石。这是我之前提到的可能作为额外奖励的东西。

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Our current problem is that we need replacement equipment for our larger drills. They're not the ones you use on a ship, so they need specialized parts. x1 Mining Equipment Is all we need at the moment. You can get them from P3 and NLP factories run by Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 我们目前的问题是我们的大型钻头需要替换组件设备. 这不是你飞船上使用的那种,这是一种特殊的部件. x1 采矿设备 我们现在需要的就这些了.极星的P3和NLP工厂生产这玩意,理论上会出售.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Our current problem is that we need replacement equipment for our larger drills. They're not the ones you use on a ship, so they need specialized parts. x2 Mining Equipment Is all we need at the moment. You can get them from P3 and NLP factories run by Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 我们目前的问题是我们的大型钻头需要替换组件设备. 这不是你飞船上使用的那种,这是一种特殊的部件. x2 采矿设备 我们现在需要的就这些了.极星的P3和NLP工厂生产这玩意,理论上会出售.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Our current problem is that we need replacement equipment for our larger drills. They're not the ones you use on a ship, so they need specialied parts. x3 Mining Equipment Is all we need at the moment. You can get them from P3 and NLP factories run by Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 我们目前的问题是我们的大型钻头需要替换组件设备. 这不是你飞船上使用的那种,这是一种特殊的部件. x3 采矿设备 我们现在需要的就这些了.极星的P3和NLP工厂生产这玩意,理论上会出售.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We have drinks here every friday, but the guy in charge of restocking the fridges fell into a borehole and broke his leg. He wasn't in much shape to remember to file an order so...@p9 I'll need you to restock the fridges with x300 Bottles of Beer Try Totally Overpowered for a good supply of beer. I'd recommend one of their breweries, not one of their stores. I'll pay you double market price for this order, since we need it before Friday.
Chinese (simplified): 我们每周五都在这里喝饮料,但负责补货冰箱的那个人掉进了一个钻孔里,摔断了腿。他没有太多状态去记得下订单,所以...@p9 我需要你补货冰箱里 300瓶啤酒 尝试完全超能力以获得良好的啤酒供应。我会推荐他们的一个酿酒厂,而不是他们的一家商店。 我会为这个订单支付你双倍市场价格,因为我们需要在周五之前得到它。

English: I've finished your order and brought the beer
Chinese (simplified): 你要的菜我已经点完了,啤酒也拿来了

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Our loading equipment is welded into their frames and so we can't replace them, we have to replace the parts inside which is more expensive.@p9 As you can guess, the motors have finally ground down the drive train from being overburdened, so we need: x8 Spare Parts To replace the parts the drive train. You can get the parts from Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能就会后悔提供帮助。 我们的装载设备被焊接在他们的框架内,所以我们不能更换它们,我们必须更换里面的部件,这更昂贵。@p9 正如你可以猜到的,电机最终因为超负荷而磨损了传动系统,所以我们需要: x8 备用零件 来替换传动系统的部件。你可以从Polaris' P-3和敌对机器的工厂获得这些零件。
我已经带来了你要的备用零件

English: You're in charge of sourcing replacement filters for the work crew's helmets. Cutting quartz throws up some really fine dust that causes all sorts of hell if it gets in your lungs. We've already had to send one of the boys to Ok'y for Silicosis from working with a clogged filter...@p9 So as you can guess, this is an important job. We need x100 Air Filters To cover both work crews for a couple of months. They're mostly made at Chromium-Sierra, Vitalife and Chemmix Factories. So they're fairly easy to get your hands on.
Chinese (simplified): 您负责为工作组的头盔寻找替换过滤器。切割石英会产生一些非常细小的灰尘,如果这些灰尘进入肺部,会引起各种麻烦。 我们已经不得不因为一个堵塞的过滤器导致的矽肺病,将一个小伙子送到Ok'y去……@p9 所以您应该能猜到,这是一个重要的工作。我们需要 100个空气过滤器 来覆盖两个工作组几个月的需求。它们主要在铬-西拉、Vitalife和Chemmix工厂生产。所以它们相对容易获得。
我已经带来了你要的空气过滤器

English: As you can see, we're at the edge of an open pit mine. It's a nice enough place to work, but there's not much cover. We need... \nx4 Prefab Housing Modules\nFor the boys to hang in when the weather packs in. The only place that produces them is P3 Factories which is always a problem.
Chinese (simplified): 正如你所见,我们在一个露天矿坑的边缘。这是一个足够好的地方工作,但遮蔽物不多。我们需要... \nx4 预制房屋模块\n供大家在天气恶劣时避难。唯一生产它们的地点是 P3 工厂,这总是一个问题。
我已经带来了你要的那些房屋组件

English: A couple of the drills we've got on the lower tier have shorted their motors and now the flux coils have come unspooled. It's cheaper to just replace them than attempt to repair them:\nx40 Flux Coils\nIs all we need. Technically, we only need 30, but it's always good to have spares for next time it happens.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的下层有一些钻头的马达短路了,现在通量线圈也已经松散了。直接更换它们比尝试修理它们要便宜:\n40个通量线圈\n这就是我们所需要的。严格来说,我们只需要30个,但总是备有备用的以防下次再发生这种情况。

English: Okay, so quartz is susceptible to changes in temperature that causes it to crack. We don't use laser drills and beam cutters for that very reason. The problem is there's impurities of iron in the deposit we're working now and it's building up heat and is risking a collapse.@p9 What I need from you is to get: x25 Heat Exchangers From Zero Horizons or Thermal Interactions' factories so we can draw the heat out and prevent cracking around the drill site that could bring the entire wall down.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,所以石英对温度变化很敏感,这会导致它破裂。我们出于这个原因不使用激光钻头和光束切割器。 问题是我们目前正在开采的矿床中含有铁的杂质,它正在积累热量,有可能引发坍塌。@p9 我需要你做的是获取: 25个热交换器 来自Zero Horizons或Thermal Interactions' factories,以便我们可以抽出热量,防止钻探点周围的裂缝,这可能会导致整个墙体坍塌。

English: This is a pit mine, so falling is a real hazard. Unfortunately, we have wildlife that does fall in and we need an easy way to get it out. Most of the creatures that are likely to fall in can climb a ladder, so we'll set some of them up at each level.\nx100 Ladders\nShould be all we need to keep things from getting stuck in the bottom. The boys can use them too, so it's a win for everyone.
Chinese (simplified): 这是一个露天矿坑,所以跌落是一个真正的危险。不幸的是,我们的野生动物有时会掉进去,我们需要一个简单的方法把它们弄出来。大多数可能会掉进去的生物都可以爬梯子,所以我们会在每个层次上设置一些梯子。\nx100 梯子\n应该足以防止事物卡在底部。我们的人也可以使用它们,所以这对每个人都是赢家。

English: We've always got injuries around here, but our medical supplies are fairly well-stocked. The one thing we don't have enough of are painkillers. They're especially needed when someone gets a lungful of dust. That stuff burns like acid.@p9 You bring me: x20 Narcotics And i'll pay double. I don't care where you get them from, get them from a medical supplier or the black market, just as long as it spares my boys of going without.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里总是有伤害,但我们的医疗用品储备相当充足。我们唯一不够多的就是止痛药。 特别是当有人吸了一肺的灰尘时。那些东西像酸一样烧灼。@p9 你给我带来: 20份麻醉剂 我会付双倍的价钱。我不在乎你从哪里得到它们,只要它们能让我的人免于没有。
我已经带来了你要的那些止痛药

English: There's a birthday coming up next week and we can't get any of the supplies in under the radar without him figuring out we're holding a surprise party. That's where you come in:@p9 x15 Veggie Burgers x10 Curry x5 Fruit Pies x2 Cakes Are what's on the list. You bring them to me without anyone seeing and i'll pay you double their market price. And NO meat. The guy's a vegetarian, and I don't want him getting sick.
Chinese (simplified): 下周有个生日要到了,我们不能在不引起他注意的情况下得到任何物资,否则他就会知道我们要为他举办一个惊喜派对。 这就是你出场的地方:@p9 15个素食汉堡 10份咖喱 5个水果派 2个蛋糕 是清单上的内容。你把它们带到我这里,不要让任何人看见,我会付给你市场价的两倍。 而且不要肉。那家伙是素食者,我不想让他生病。

English: I've got what you asked for. Don't worry, nobody saw me.
Chinese (simplified): 我弄到你要的了. 别担心,没人看到我.

English: We've been adding more and more hardware to the site for faster automation, but it seems our old computer system has finally given up the ghost. There's not much we can do without: x1 Large Optronic Bridge and x30 Advanced Electronics To get the damned machine back up and running besides removing vital equipment from the grid.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一直在为站点增加越来越多的硬件以实现更快的自动化,但我们的老计算机系统似乎终于彻底报废了。没有了以下设备,我们几乎束手无策: x1 大型光电桥 和 x30 高级电子设备 除了从电网中移除关键设备,我们无法让这台该死的机器重新运转。

English: We're looking at detonating charges at a lower depth to open up fissures from which we can start to work on a lower level of the mine. x20 Explosive Charges and x40 Optical Fiber Would help us with getting started on that, if you'd find us the supplies for the job.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正考虑在较低深度处引爆炸药,以打开裂缝,从而我们可以开始在矿井的较低层级进行工作。 x20 炸药包和 x40 光纤 如果您能为我们找到这些物资,将有助于我们开始这项工作。

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Our current problem is that we need replacement equipment for our larger drills. They're not the ones you use on a ship, so they need specialized parts. x4 Mining Equipment Is all we need at the moment. You can get them from P3 and NLP factories run by Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 我们目前的问题是我们的大型钻头需要替换组件设备. 这不是你飞船上使用的那种,这是一种特殊的部件. x4 采矿设备 我们现在需要的就这些了.极星的P3和NLP工厂生产这玩意,理论上会出售.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: You there! Check your suit seals! I don't want any visitors here getting killed on my watch.\nYou see that rock being loaded over there? That's Cobaltite. Nasty stuff, full of arsenic. You don't want it on you or in your suit's filters.\nIt's valuable though. So what brings you here?
Chinese (simplified): 你在那里!检查一下你的太空服密封!我不希望在我的值班期间有访客在这里丧命。\n你看到那边正在装载的那块岩石了吗?那是钴蓝石。这玩意很糟糕,含有很多砷。你可不想它沾到你身上或者进入你太空服的过滤器里。\n不过它很有价值。那么你来这里是为了什么?

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我们这里总是需要帮助运送物资。并不是说在重体力劳动方面。如果你在找工作,我们正需要一个快速,便宜的快递员。\n你当然会得到报酬。如果工作做得好,我可能会额外给你奖金。但你会是在非正式账簿上工作。\n这对你是否合适?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts, so I may have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,看起来一切都井然有序。 按照约定,这是您的付款{MoneyCounter} 信用点。 我没有足够的现金来进行大额支付,所以我可能需要把钱汇入您的账户。@p9 这比在贸易空间站购买商品的价格要高,但对我来说仍然是一笔好交易,因为没有过高的运费。 也带走这批矿石。这是我之前提到可能会额外赠送的。

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've got a problem with the extractor feed getting jammed every 15 minutes. We've taken the entire assembly apart looking for the problem but can't seem to find it.@p9 We need a completely new assembly, which means we need: x3 Mining Equipment x20 Motors x400 Mechanical Components To overhaul the old extraction system. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们的提取器进料每15分钟就会卡住。我们已经把整个组装拆开寻找问题,但似乎找不到。@p9 我们需要一个全新的组装,这意味着我们需要: 3采矿设备 20个马达 400个机械组件 来彻底检修旧的提取系统。你可以从极星的P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've replaced the feed system twice, but it looks like the problem we've actually been getting is from a mixed signal from the computer system that's been grinding off the gears on the extractor when it should be idling. Now we're down an extractor and need to replace the computers that run it.@p9 That means we need another assembly replacement of: x5 Mining Equipment x10 Computers x20 Advanced Electronics To replace and rewire the feed system and rig up a new control computer. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经更换了两次给料系统,但看起来我们真正遇到的问题是由计算机系统发出的一个混合信号造成的,这个信号在应该处于空闲状态时却磨损了提取器上的齿轮。 现在我们的提取器坏了,需要更换运行它的计算机。@p9 这意味着我们需要另外组装更换: x5 采矿设备 x10 计算机 x20 高级电子设备 以替换和重新布线给料系统,并设置一个新的控制计算机。你可以从宝拉瑞斯的P-3和NLP工厂获取采矿设备。

English: We've got this problem, but every time we think we've fixed it, it moves to another part of the rig and breaks something. I'm at the point of suspecting sabotage by some malicious AI. This time, the capacitors that run the packager blew when a transformer shorted.@p9 We've got the boys unloading the conveyors manually, but they can't keep that up for long, so we need: x7 Mining Equipment x10 Advanced Capacitors x20 Energy Regulators To get things back up and running normally. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories. You'll probably need to pick up a Transportation Booster too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 我们遇到了这个问题,但每次我们以为已经解决了,它就会移动到钻井平台的另一个部分并破坏东西。我已经开始怀疑是不是有些恶意AI在搞破坏。 这次,当一个变压器短路时,运行打包机的电容器爆炸了。@p9 我们让工人们手动卸载传送带,但他们不能长时间这样维持,所以我们需要: 7套采矿设备 10个高级电容器 20个能量调节器 以使一切恢复正常运行。你可以从Polaris的P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。 你可能还需要带上一个运输加速器,因为这些东西携带起来会非常困难。
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We have drinks here every friday night, but the last supply ship left it out of our order, so we've used up our reserves last week and have nothing for this friday...@p9 I'll need you to restock the fridges with x300 Bottles of Liquor Try either Totally Overpowered's Brewery or one of the Tal'on Breweries if you can find one. I'd recommend one of TOP's breweries, not one of their stores. I'll pay you double market price for this order, since we need it before Friday.
Chinese (simplified): 我们每周五晚上都在这里喝东西,但是上一艘补给船没有把我们的订单送到,所以我们在上周已经用光了我们的储备,这个星期五已经没有东西了...@p9 我需要你重新给冰箱补充 300瓶烈酒 尝试去完全超能酿酒厂或者如果你能找到的话,去其中一个塔隆酿酒厂。我会推荐你去完全超能的酿酒厂,而不是他们的商店。 因为我们需要在星期五之前拿到,所以我会为这个订单支付双倍市场价。

English: I've finished your order and brought the beer
Chinese (simplified): 你要的菜我已经点完了,啤酒也拿来了

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've been losing charge from our main generators steadily over the last few months and now the charge is too low to even run the equipment for longer than an hour at a time.@p9 We can't shorten the distance between the two points, so we need to increase the efficiency with: x8 Spare Parts x25 Superconductors The problem with getting both of those is that Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories make one and Arriake Technology and Solaris-AMP make the other.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的。在过去的几个月里,我们的主发电机一直在不断地失去电量,现在电量太低了,设备一次运行的时间甚至不能超过一个小时。@p9 我们不能缩短两点之间的距离,所以我们需要提高效率: x8 备用零件 x25 超导体 同时生产两种材料的厂家是极星' P-3和 (Hostile Apparatus)敌意装置公司的工厂' 另外 Arriake Technology制作其中一个而 Solaris-AMP制作另外一个.
我已经带来了你要的备用零件

English: As i've probably explained to you, this ore we're mining here is toxic as hell due to the high arsenic content in it. We're in full hazmat gear the entire time we're near the drills, and those suits get HOT. We've already had 3 guys come down with heatstroke and there's nothing we can do until we pull them away and pry them out of the suits.@p9 We need temperature regulators inside our suits, but the best we can do requires: x20 Heat Exchangers x10 Coolant To cover both work crews for a couple of months. I know you can get Heat Exchangers at Thermal Interactions Ltd and Zero Horizons Manufacturing. They might have coolant too, or you can try a chemical plant.
Chinese (simplified): 正如我可能已经向你解释过的,我们在这里开采的矿石含有高量的砷,因此具有极高的毒性。我们在靠近钻机的时候,全程穿戴着全套防护服,而这些防护服非常热。 我们已经有3个人中暑了,在我们把他们拉出来并脱下防护服之前,我们无能为力。@p9 我们需要在防护服内部安装温度调节器,但我们能做的最好选择需要: x20 热交换器 x10 冷却剂 以覆盖两个工作班组几个月的需求。我知道你可以在热力互动有限公司 和零点地平线制造公司.那里获得热交换器,他们可能也有冷却剂,或者你可以尝试去化工厂看看。

English: We don't handle the ore directly, instead we have it loaded by robotic arms that sorts the cobalt from the rock the drills pull up. We've recently hit a snag since a radiation storm last week has caused the arms to seize up at random times.@p9 We're looking at getting replacements, but the only place that handles: x5 Robotics of the right size and quality is Hostile Apparatus' Main Factories which don't ship their products out here. If you can get them, i'll pay 75% over market price.
Chinese (simplified): 我们不直接处理矿石,而是通过机械臂将其装载,这些机械臂将钻头拉上来的岩石中的钴分离出来。但自从上周的辐射风暴以来,我们遇到了一些麻烦,因为风暴导致这些机械臂随机出现故障。我们正在考虑更换,但唯一能处理合适大小和质量的机械臂的地方是: x5 机器人 但只有在敌对机器的主要工厂中才能找到,而这些工厂不向我们这里发货。如果你能弄到它们,我愿意以市场价格的75%溢价支付。
我已经带来了你要的那些替换组件 parts

English: We've cracked another set of lenses in the laser drill. This is the third this week and we're on our last lens. The eggheads have narrowed it down to a spike in thermal temperatures, which should be fixable with: x10 Heat Exchangers x10 Laser Upgrade Kits I know InterWeap sells laser kits and Thermal Interactions sells Heat Exchangers. But there are probably cheaper ways to get both... I'll pay 75% above market price for both.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的激光钻头又裂开了一组镜片。这是本周的第三次,我们现在只剩下最后一片镜片了。专家们已经确定这是由于热温度的突增造成的,这个问题可以通过以下方式解决: x10 热交换器 x10 激光升级套件 我知道 InterWeap 出售激光套件而 Thermal Interactions 出售热交换器。但很可能有更便宜的方式来同时获取这两种设备... 我愿意为这两种设备支付高于市场价格75%的价格。

English: I've brought the new lenses and heatsinks
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了新的镜头和散热器

English: We're testing a new extraction method using an autominer, but none of us on the platform are authorized by Polaris to purchase a whole autominer and we don't have a constructor capable of assembling one even if we got all the parts.@p9 I need you to go around Polaris' chokehold and get me: x1 Basic Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在测试一种使用自动采矿机的新开采方法,但平台上的我们没有人获得Polaris的授权购买一整个自动采矿机,即使我们有了所有零件,我们也没有建造机能够组装它。@p9 我需要你绕过Polaris的控制,给我弄到: x1 基础自动采矿装置 自己购买或建造它,然后带给我。这是我知道一些探矿者在野外使用的小技巧,用来绕过Polaris对采矿的垄断。
我给你带来了一台自动矿机.

English: We use laser drills to extract the cobaltite from the ground, but there's a great deal of dust being kicked up from the process and it gets everywhere, including into the drills where it corrodes the power coils, meaning we need to replace them at least once a month.@p9 We're at that time of the month again when we need to replace the corroded coils with fresh ones. x20 Power Coils will cover replacements on all our drills, with a couple of spares if something else goes wrong with them. Think you can handle it?
Chinese (simplified): 我们使用激光钻头从地下提取钴矿石,但这一过程中会产生大量的灰尘,这些灰尘到处都是,包括进入钻头内部,腐蚀了动力线圈,这意味着我们至少每个月都需要更换它们。@p9 又到了每个月需要更换腐蚀线圈的时候了。 20个动力线圈 将覆盖我们所有钻头的更换,如果还有其他问题发生,还会有几个备用的。 你觉得你能处理吗?
我已经带来了你要的能源线圈

English: We've always got injuries around here, but our medical supplies are fairly well-stocked. The one thing we don't have enough of are Antitoxic Injections. They're the best thing we've got when someone inhales a lungful of cobalt dust.@p9 You bring me: x80 Antitoxic Injections And i'll pay double their market price, since they're the only treatment we've got on hand to deal with acute arsenic poisoning.
Chinese (simplified): 这里总是有各种伤害,但我们的医疗用品储备相当充足。唯一不足的是解毒注射液。 当有人吸入大量钴尘时,它们是我们拥有的最好的东西。@p9 你带给我: 80注射液 我会以市场价的双倍支付,因为它们是我们现在手头用来处理急性砷中毒的唯一治疗方法。

English: We've been eating ration packs for the last week since we're pretty sure the food stores we had have been contaminated and we're pretty desperate for something much better at this point. We can't make it ourselves, and i'm pretty sure it's too complicated for a Food Processor.@p9 What we need is x10 Ziraxian Salad x10 Strawberry Milkshakes That's a proper salad, not just that wet green paper smothered in ranch dressing you terran eat. We're all chipping in to pay you more than they cost because we can't stand ration packs for one more night.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经连续一个星期吃配给包了,因为我们相当确定我们之前的食物储备已经被污染了,目前我们非常迫切需要更好的食物。 我们自己无法制作,而且我相当肯定这对于一个食物加工器来说太复杂了。@p9 我们需要的是 10份Ziraxian沙拉 10份草莓奶昔 那是一份真正的沙拉,不是你们地球人吃的那些湿漉漉的绿色纸片淋上牧场调料。我们所有人都愿意多付钱给你,因为我们再也无法忍受再吃一晚上的配给包了。

English: We're considering bringing a new drill online on the west edge of the digsite. We've got most of the parts to assemble a drill already, we're only missing a few components that i'd like you to go get for me: x3 Power Coils x50 Zascosium Alloy x1 Advanced Upgrade Kit and x24 Advanced Electronics And we'll be able to get started next week.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在考虑在采矿站的西侧引入一个新的联网钻机。我们已经有大部分的部件组装钻头了,只是还缺少一些组件,我想让你为我去弄来 x3 能源线圈 x50 铡合金 x1 先进升级工具包和 x24 先进电子元件 ,这样我们下周就可以开始.
我已经带来了你要的全新钻头计算机.

English: We've had serious problems with the drills when we've shut down at the end of the week. It gets very cold out here at night and a weekend in extremely cold temperatures causes stress fractures on some of the equipment when it's started up. We need a better way to keep the cold out and the heat in.@p9 It's for that reason that we've come up with the idea of adding insulation by gluing: x120 Aluminium Foil using x6 Bottles of Chemicals To the titanium shell of the drills to keep the sudden temperature drops from impacting the shock absorbers on the legs. We can't just order those things in, so it'll be up to you to track them down.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在使用钻探机在周末结束关机时遇到了严重问题。晚上这里非常冷,周末的极低温度会导致一些设备在启动时产生应力裂纹。 我们需要一种更好的方法来保持寒冷的外部和热量的内部。@p9 因此,我们想出了一个主意,通过使用: 120张铝箔和 6瓶化学物质来粘贴到钻探机的钛壳上,以防止突然的温度下降影响腿部的减震器。 我们不能简单地订购这些东西,所以这将取决于你去追踪它们。

English: I've got the components for your... 'insulation' right here
Chinese (simplified): 我给你准备好了... 绝缘材料

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We're short on general supplies. Not very important, but we still need them to conduct basic repairs or alterations to equipment when we decide to move it further than the current infrastructure allows.@p9 I've got a list of parts I need from you: x175 Neodymium Ingots x65 Motors x140 Titanium Plates Not so hard, but very important to us if you can manage it.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要的东西,你可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们缺少一般物资。这些物资并不是非常重要,但我们仍然需要它们来执行基本的修理或设备更改,当我们决定将其移动到超出当前基础设施允许的范围时。@p9 我有一份需要你提供的零件清单: x175 钕锭 x65 电动机 x140 钛板 虽然不是很难,但如果你能做到,对我们来说非常重要。

English: Whoa there! Careful with that jetpack. We have exposed Magnesium here and if you get a spark on the wrong spot... 'boom'.\nAlways a problem with Magnesite mining, especially when the mineral is seamed with pure metal.\nNow that you've been warned. What are you looking for here?
Chinese (simplified): 哇哦!小心使用那个喷气背包。我们这里有暴露的镁,如果你在错误的地方产生火花……‘嘭’。\n镁矿开采总是个问题,特别是当这种矿物与纯金属共生时。\n现在你已经被警告了。你在这里找什么?

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我们总是需要帮助将物资运送到这里。并不是那么需要体力劳动。如果你在找工作,我们需要一个快速、便宜的快递员。\n你当然会得到报酬。如果工作出色,我可能会额外发放奖金。但你将是非正式工作。\n这对你来说合适吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts, so I may have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,一切看起来都井然有序。 按照约定,这是你应得的 {MoneyCounter} 信用点。 我没有随身携带大量现金,所以我可能需要通过转账的方式把钱汇入你的账户。@p9 这比你在贸易空间站购买商品要贵,但对我来说仍然是一笔好交易,因为这里没有高额的运输费用。 也带上这批矿石。这是之前我提到的可能给你的额外奖励。

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've got a problem with the extractor feed getting jammed every 15 minutes. We've taken the entire assembly apart looking for the problem but can't seem to find it.@p9 We need a completely new assembly, which means we need: x3 Mining Equipment x20 Motors x400 Mechanical Components To overhaul the old extraction system. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们的提取器进料系统每15分钟就会卡住,我们已经将整个组件拆开寻找问题,但似乎找不到。@p9 我们需要一个全新的组件,这意味着我们需要: x3 采矿设备 x20 马达 x400 机械组件 来彻底检修旧的提取系统。你可以从极星P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've replaced the feed system twice, but it looks like the problem we've actually been getting is from a mixed signal from the computer system that's been grinding off the gears on the extractor when it should be idling. Now we're down an extractor and need to replace the computers that run it.@p9 That means we need another assembly replacement of: x5 Mining Equipment x10 Computers x20 Advanced Electronics To replace and rewire the feed system and rig up a new control computer. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经更换了两次给料系统,但看起来我们实际上遇到的问题是由于计算机系统发出的混合信号,当它应该处于空闲状态时,却磨损了提取器上的齿轮。 现在我们的提取器坏了,需要更换运行它的计算机。@p9 这意味着我们需要另外组装替换: x5 采矿设备 x10 计算机 x20 高级电子产品 用于替换和重新布线给料系统,并搭建新的控制计算机。你可以从Polaris' P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've got this problem, but every time we think we've fixed it, it moves to another part of the rig and breaks something. I'm at the point of suspecting sabotage by some malicious AI. This time, the capacitors that run the packager blew when a transformer shorted.@p9 We've got the boys unloading the conveyors manually, but they can't keep that up for long, so we need: x7 Mining Equipment x10 Advanced Capacitors x20 Energy Regulators To get things back up and running normally. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories. You'll probably need to pick up a Transportation Booster too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 我们遇到了这个问题,但每次我们以为解决了,它就会转移到设备上的另一个部分并破坏东西。我甚至开始怀疑是不是有恶意AI搞破坏。 这次,当一个变压器短路时,运行打包机的电容器爆炸了。@p9 我们让小伙子们手动卸载传送带,但他们不能长时间这样做,所以我们需要: x7 采矿设备 x10 高级电容器 x20 能量调节器 让事情恢复正常运作。你可以从极星的P-3和NLP工厂获取采矿设备。 你可能还需要拿起一个运输助推器,因为那些东西很难携带。
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We have drinks here every friday night, but the last supply ship left it out of our order, so we've used up our reserves last week and have nothing for this friday...@p9 I'll need you to restock the fridges with x300 Bottles of Liquor Try either Totally Overpowered's Brewery or one of the Tal'on Breweries if you can find one. I'd recommend one of TOP's breweries, not one of their stores. I'll pay you double market price for this order, since we need it before Friday.
Chinese (simplified): 每周五晚上我们这里都有饮品供应,但上一批补给船遗漏了我们的订单,所以我们上周已经用光了储备,这个星期五已经没有任何东西了...@p9 我需要你重新补充冰箱里的存货 300瓶烈酒 尝试去完全超能酿酒厂或者如果你能找到的话,去其中一家泰隆酿酒厂。我会推荐去完全超能的酿酒厂,而不是他们的商店。 因为我们需要在周五前得到这些,所以我会按双倍市场价支付你这笔订单。

English: I've finished your order and brought the beer
Chinese (simplified): 你要的菜我已经点完了,啤酒也拿来了

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've been losing charge from our main generators steadily over the last few months and now the charge is too low to even run the equipment for longer than an hour at a time.@p9 We can't shorten the distance between the two points, so we need to increase the efficiency with: x8 Spare Parts x25 Superconductors The problem with getting both of those is that Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories make one and Arriake Technology and Solaris-AMP make the other.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的。在过去的几个月里,我们的主发电机一直在不断地失去电量,现在电量太低了,设备一次运行的时间甚至不能超过一个小时。@p9 我们不能缩短两点之间的距离,所以我们需要提高效率: x8 备用零件 x25 超导体 同时生产两种材料的厂家是极星' P-3和 (Hostile Apparatus)敌意装置公司的工厂' 另外 Arriake Technology制作其中一个而 Solaris-AMP制作另外一个.
我已经带来了你要的备用零件

English: We've got to be careful about managing our temperatures here, since if the drills get too hot we risk igniting an exposed seam of Magnesium. I shouldn't need to warn you how disastrous that would be. You'd be looking at a blinding inferno that we can't put out. We'd have to relocate the entire site.@p9 The problem is that the best measure we can take is judicious use of Heat Exchangers to keep the heat away from the drill site: x120 Heat Exchangers are required for a full draw that pulls a good 95% of the heat away from the impact point. You can get them from Thermal Interactions Ltd and Zero Horizons Manufacturing.
Chinese (simplified): 我们必须小心控制这里的温度, 因为如果钻头太热,我们就有可能点燃暴露的镁层. 我不需要提醒你们到时候会有多糟糕。你会看到我们无法扑灭的熊熊烈火。我们得重新安置整个地点.@p9 我们能采取的最佳措施是明智地使用热交换器,使热量远离钻头区域: x120 热交换器 可以形成一个完整的散热系统让使采矿点的热量降低95%. 你可以从以下企业采购到:Thermal Interactions Ltd公司 and Zero Horizons 大型企业.
我已经带来了你要的热交换器

English: We can't rely on a generator this close to an open seam of magnesium, especially since the ones we'd need to run all the equipment have are hot enough to ignite. We've been making do with Solar Panels, but they're not strong enough.@p9 We're looking at getting upgrades, but the only place that can make the: x35 Solar Cells we'd need is Solaris-AMP Manufacturing which don't ship their products out here. If you can get them, i'll pay 75% over market price.
Chinese (simplified): 我们不能依赖发电机,尤其是在靠近镁的开放裂缝的地方,特别是我们需要运行所有设备的发电机温度足够高,足以点燃。 我们一直在使用太阳能板,但它们的强度不够。@p9 我们正在考虑升级,但能制造我们需要的: x35 太阳能电池 的地方只有Solaris-AMP 制造厂,他们不向外运送产品。如果你能弄到,我愿意以市场价的75%溢价购买。
我已经给你带来了一些太阳能电池

English: We're having problems with both heat and sparks. It seems there are some iron impurities inside the magnesite around a seam of pure magnesium metal. We don't want to risk igniting the raw magnesium, so I want to try sheathing the drill heads in Zascosium to see if that keeps the sparks to a minimum.@p9 We can draw away any heat build-up using disposable Heat Sinks: x50 Heat Exchangers x200 Zascosium Ingots You should be able to mine one and build the other, so since you're taking on all the work for this I'll pay 75% above market price for both.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的高温和火花问题都存在。看起来在纯镁金属的矿脉周围,镁矿石内部有一些铁杂质。 我们不想冒险点燃原始的镁,所以我想尝试用铡 给钻头镀上一层膜,看能不能将火花减到最少。@p9 我们可以使用一次性的散热片来吸引任何热量积累: x50 热交换器 x200 铡锭 你应该能够开采一个并建造另一个,所以既然你承担了这项工作的全部 我会为两者支付比市场价格高出75%的费用。

English: I've brought the new thermal sheathing materials
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了新型保温护套材料

English: We're testing a new extraction method using an autominer, but none of us on the platform are authorized by Polaris to purchase a whole autominer and we don't have a constructor capable of assembling one even if we got all the parts.@p9 I need you to go around Polaris' chokehold and get me: x1 Basic Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在测试一种使用自动采矿机的新提取方法,但是平台上的我们没有人被Polaris授权购买整个自动采矿机,我们也没有建造机能组装一个,即使我们得到了所有的零件。@p9 我需要你绕过Polaris的控制并为我获取: x1 基础自动采矿设备 购买它或自己组装它,并把它带给我。这是我知道一些探矿者在现场使用的小漏洞,以绕过Polaris对采矿的垄断。
我给你带来了一台自动矿机.

English: Magnesite is safe enough to mine, but the deposits we're mining have seams of pure Magnesium and an electrical arc is hot enough to ignite it. We have to take safety seriously here and reduce the amount of exposed ferrous materials and surfaces where we can.@p9 We'll need: x250 Titanium Plates x50 Platinum Plates To resurface many of the replacement parts we've already brought in. Especially the parts that come in contact with possible heat sources.
Chinese (simplified): 菱镁矿的开采是足够安全的,但我们正在开采的矿床有纯镁的接缝,采矿产生的电弧足够热,有可能点燃它们。所以我们必须认真对待这里的安全问题,尽可能减少暴露的铁材料和表面的数量.@p9 我们需要: x250 钛板 x50 铂金板 用来重新调整我们已经引进的替换组件部分。特别是与可能的热源接触的部分.
我已经带来了你要的重修的材料

English: Our containers that we hold and ship the magnesium in needs extra insulation against heat and pressure in the event of an accident. The manufacturers won't include the extra processing that we need for transporting the shipments of pure magnesium and we don't have the technology on hand to refine it from thin shards into plates and ingots.@p9 As such, we need to sheath the containers in Graphite ourselves if we don't want to risk a shoddy freighter igniting on re-entry. That means we need constant shipments of Graphite. x500 Graphite Will do for a while and i'll even pay double market price. The boys'll will handle the fitting.
Chinese (simplified): 我们存储和运输镁的容器需要额外的隔热材料以防止在事故中的热量和压力。 制造商不会包括我们运输纯镁所需的额外处理,我们手头也没有技术能将其从薄片精炼成板和锭。@p9 因此,如果我们不想冒着货船在再入时点燃的风险,我们需要自己将容器包裹在石墨中。 这意味着我们需要不断供应石墨。 x500 石墨 暂时会这样做,我甚至会支付双倍市场价格。小伙子们会处理安装。

English: I've got a shipment of Graphite for you

We're running on a steady diet of ration packs and cold coffee like every other drilling rig out here. We need a fresh supply of coffee that wasn't made from a 50-year old food processor and something that goes with it.@p9 x500 Coffee x500 Pumpkin Cookies I know coffee comes in all kinds and they change whatever's available seasonally. I don't care if it's a Pumpkin-Spice Latte, anything's better than the hot bean water we get now. I'll even pay double if it's hot.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里像其他钻井平台一样,一直靠定量配给包和冷咖啡度日。我们需要新鲜供应的咖啡,不是那种用50年前的食品加工机做出来的东西,还需要与之搭配的东西。@p9 500袋咖啡 500袋南瓜饼干 我知道咖啡有各种各样的,而且他们会根据季节性提供可用的东西。我不在乎是南瓜香料拿铁还是别的什么,只要比我们现在喝的热豆水好就行。 如果是热的,我甚至愿意付双倍的价钱。

English: We're considering bringing a new drill online on the west edge of the digsite. We've got most of the parts to assemble a drill already, we're only missing a few components that i'd like you to go get for me: x3 Power Coils x50 Zascosium Alloy x1 Advanced Upgrade Kit and x24 Advanced Electronics And we'll be able to get started next week.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在考虑在采矿站的西侧引入一个新的联网钻机。我们已经有大部分的部件组装钻头了,只是还缺少一些组件,我想让你为我去弄来 x3 能源线圈 x50 铡合金 x1 先进升级工具包和 x24 先进电子元件 ,这样我们下周就可以开始.
我已经带来了你要的全新钻头计算机.

English: We've run low on the Helium used to pressurize the pure metal storage containers. It reduces the chance of accidental ignition from solar storms generating electrical arcs inside the silos.@p9 We don't need a lot of Helium, just: x65 Bottles of Helium You should be able to get them from a Gas Refinery or Harvester.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经耗尽了用于给纯金属存储容器加压的氦气。它减少了太阳风暴在筒仓内产生电弧的意外点火的机会。@p9 我们不需要太多氦气,只要: x65 瓶氦气 你应该可以从天然气精炼厂或收集器获得它们.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We're short on general supplies. Not very important, but we still need them to conduct basic repairs or alterations to equipment when we decide to move it further than the current infrastructure allows.@p9 I've got a list of parts I need from you: x175 Neodymium Ingots x65 Motors x140 Titanium Plates Not so hard, but very important to us if you can manage it.
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的。我们的日常用品短缺。这不是很重要,但当我们决定将设备移动到超出现有基础设施允许的地方时,我们仍然需要它们进行基础的维修或对设备进行改造。@p9 
x175钕块
x65马达
x140钛板
不是那么难,但如果你能处理好,对我们非常重要.</color>

English: Welcome to Treiaz Mining, or at least that's the company that owns the rig. I'm pretty sure Polaris owns them. We mine Rutile here, a source of Titanium.\nNow that introductions are over. What are you looking for here?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Treiaz Mining, 至少我们拥有公司的钻井平台. 我很确定 极星 y拥有 它们. 我们在这里开采金红石,一种富含钛的资源.\n现在介绍结束了. 你在这里找什么?

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我们总是需要帮助来运送这里的物资。在重体力劳动方面倒不是那么需要。如果你在找工作,我们急需一个快速,便宜的信使。\n当然你会得到报酬。如果工作做得好,我可能会额外加薪。但你的工作将不在正式记录上。\n这样对你合适吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts, so I may have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,一切看起来都井然有序。 如我们约定的,这是你的付款{MoneyCounter} 信用点。 我没有那么多现金用于较大额度的支付,所以我可能需要把钱汇入你的账户。@p9 这比你在贸易空间站购买货物的价格要高,但对我来说仍然是一笔好交易,因为这里没有过高的运输费用。 也带上这批矿石。这是我之前提到的可能额外赠送的。

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've got a problem with the extractor feed getting jammed every 15 minutes. We've taken the entire assembly apart looking for the problem but can't seem to find it.@p9 We need a completely new assembly, which means we need: x3 Mining Equipment x20 Motors x400 Mechanical Components To overhaul the old extraction system. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 你听到我们需要什么后可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们的提取器进料每15分钟就会卡住。我们已经把整个组装拆开寻找问题,但似乎找不到。@p9 我们需要一个全新的组装,这意味着我们需要: x3 采矿设备 x20 马达 x400 机械部件 来彻底检修旧的提取系统。你可以从极星P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've replaced the feed system twice, but it looks like the problem we've actually been getting is from a mixed signal from the computer system that's been grinding off the gears on the extractor when it should be idling. Now we're down an extractor and need to replace the computers that run it.@p9 That means we need another assembly replacement of: x5 Mining Equipment x10 Computers x20 Advanced Electronics To replace and rewire the feed system and rig up a new control computer. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经更换了两次给料系统,但看起来我们实际上遇到的问题是由于计算机系统发出的混杂信号,导致在应该空转时,萃取器的齿轮被磨掉。 现在我们的萃取器坏了,需要更换运行它的计算机。@p9 这意味着我们需要另外组装替换: x5 采矿设备 x10 计算机 x20 高级电子设备 以替换和重新布线给料系统,并搭建一个新的控制计算机。你可以从宝拉里斯的P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've got this problem, but every time we think we've fixed it, it moves to another part of the rig and breaks something. I'm at the point of suspecting sabotage by some malicious AI. This time, the capacitors that run the packager blew when a transformer shorted.@p9 We've got the boys unloading the conveyors manually, but they can't keep that up for long, so we need: x7 Mining Equipment x10 Advanced Capacitors x20 Energy Regulators To get things back up and running normally. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories. You'll probably need to pick up a Transportation Booster too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 我们遇到了这个问题,但每次我们认为已经解决了,它就转移到钻井平台的另一个部分并破坏某些东西。我到了怀疑是一些恶意人工智能搞破坏的地步。 这次,当一个变压器短路时,运行打包机的电容器爆炸了。@p9 我们已经让工人们手动卸载传送带,但他们不能长时间这样做,所以我们需要: 7套采矿设备 10个高级电容器 20个能量调节器 让一切恢复正常运行。你可以从波拉利斯的P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。 你可能还需要拿起一个运输助推器,因为那些东西将很难携带。
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We have drinks here every friday night, but the last supply ship left it out of our order, so we've used up our reserves last week and have nothing for this friday...@p9 I'll need you to restock the fridges with x300 Bottles of Liquor Try either Totally Overpowered's Brewery or one of the Tal'on Breweries if you can find one. I'd recommend one of TOP's breweries, not one of their stores. I'll pay you double market price for this order, since we need it before Friday.
Chinese (simplified): 我们每周五晚上都在这里喝饮料,但是上一批补给船没有把饮料送到,所以我们上周已经把储备用光了,这个星期五没有东西喝……@p9 我需要你重新给冰箱补货 300瓶烈酒 试试完全超能的酿酒厂或者如果你能找到的话,其中一个泰隆酿酒厂。我推荐你去完全超能的酿酒厂,而不是他们的商店。 因为这笔订单我们需要在周五之前完成,我会按市场价的两倍支付给你。

English: I've finished your order and brought the beer
Chinese (simplified): 你要的菜我已经点完了,啤酒也拿来了

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've been losing charge from our main generators steadily over the last few months and now the charge is too low to even run the equipment for longer than an hour at a time.@p9 We can't shorten the distance between the two points, so we need to increase the efficiency with: x8 Spare Parts x25 Superconductors The problem with getting both of those is that Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories make one and Arriake Technology and Solaris-AMP make the other.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的。在过去的几个月里,我们的主发电机一直在不断地失去电量,现在电量太低了,设备一次运行的时间甚至不能超过一个小时。@p9 我们不能缩短两点之间的距离,所以我们需要提高效率: x8 备用零件 x25 超导体 同时生产两种材料的厂家是极星' P-3和 (Hostile Apparatus)敌意装置公司的工厂' 另外 Arriake Technology制作其中一个而 Solaris-AMP制作另外一个.
我已经带来了你要的备用零件

English: We've been forced to switch from Laser Drills to mechanical ones since this deposit of Rutile is just too refractive. We kept damaging supports and getting nowhere on pulling out the deposit. Now our problems involve overheating from Kimberlite inclusions jamming the drill.@p9 We can solve the problem with: x15 Coolant x2 Handheld Laser Drills So the boys can manually get in there and free the kimberlite from the drill and the coolant to keep it from burning out the motors.
Chinese (simplified): 由于这里的金红石矿床折射性太强,我们不得不从激光钻机改为机械钻机。我们不断损坏支撑,却无法开采出矿床。 现在我们的问题变成了由金伯利岩包裹体引起的过热,堵塞了钻头。@p9 我们可以通过以下方式解决问题: x15 冷却剂 x2 手持激光钻机 这样工人们就可以手动进入,将金伯利岩从钻头上解放出来,使用冷却剂来防止电机烧毁。

English: We need to replace the Density Scanner's lens after our initial attempts at mining this deposit with a laser drill bounced back and fried the scanner's head and let me tell you, those damned things are expensive. There's no chance in hell of repairing it, so we need a new one.@p9 Shouldn't be too difficult to find a supplier, since I believe Arriake Technology sells them from their factory. We only need: x3 Optronics If you can get them, i'll pay 75% over market price.
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要更换密度扫描器的镜头,我们最初的尝试开采的时候,激光钻头发出的光束在这个矿床上反弹了,并烧毁了扫描器的镜头。我告诉你,这些玩意非常贵。根本修不好,所以我们需要一个新的.@p9 找供应商应该不难,因为我相信 Arriake Technology 出售这东西,在它们的工厂. 我们只需要: x3 光电设备 如果你能买到,我愿意多付市场价的75%.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件 parts

English: We lost our Subspace Transmitter last week when one of our freighters got caught in a crosswind and smashed the antenna into the mine. We need the parts to repair the stand and replace the transmitter itself. Not the daunting task it seems...@p9 What we need you to bring us here is: x10 Communication Equipment x10 Computers x30 Advanced Electronics x450 Optical Fiber You can get the Com Equipment from Arriake Technology. It's an Electronics factory under Polaris. The rest you'll have to source yourself.
Chinese (simplified): 上周我们损失了子空间传送器,一艘货轮遭遇侧风,把天线撞到矿井里. 我们需要修理支架和更换发射机本身的部件。这并不是一项艰巨的任务。..@p9 我们需要你给我们弄来这些东西: x10 通信设备 x10 计算机 x30 先进电子元件 x450 光纤 你可以从这家公司弄来通讯装备: Arriake Technology. 这是一个电子元件工厂隶属于 极星. 剩下的你得自己找了.

English: I've got the parts for the transmitter

We're testing a new extraction method using an autominer, but none of us on the platform are authorized by Polaris to purchase a whole autominer and we don't have a constructor capable of assembling one even if we got all the parts.@p9 I need you to go around Polaris' chokehold and get me: x1 Basic Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在测试一种使用自动采矿机的新萃取方法,但我们平台上的任何人都没有获得Polaris授权购买整个自动采矿机,即使我们得到了所有零件,我们也没有建造机能够组装它。@p9 我需要你绕过Polaris的控制,为我获取: x1 基础自动采矿装置 买它或自己建造它,然后带给我。这是我知道的一些勘探者在野外使用的小漏洞,以绕过Polaris在采矿上的垄断。
我给你带来了一台自动矿机.

English: I have a small job for you. We have enough fuel to last us a week or so once solar's no longer an option. Soon the planet and moon will be changing their orientation that'll reduce solar efficiency and force us to rely solely on the generators.@p9 Naturally, we need to top up our fuel supplies so I need you to fill our reserve tanks with: x50 Promethium Hydrocells You should be able to make them yourself, we don't mine promethium so we can't do it ourselves.
Chinese (simplified): 我有个小任务给你。一旦太阳能被淘汰,我们有足够的燃料维持一周左右。很快,地球和月球将改变它们的方向,这将降低太阳能的效率,迫使我们只能依靠发电机.@p9 当然,我们需要加满燃料,所以我需要你把我们的油箱加满: x50 融合电池 你应该可以自己制造,我们不开采钷,所以我们不能自己制造.

English: We've always got injuries around here, but our medical supplies are fairly well-stocked. The one thing we don't have enough of are painkillers. We don't need them often. Titanium is a nice safe ore to mine, so they're only for the serious injuries.@p9 I don't need many, only... x25 Narcotics I'll even pay double, since we need licensing to carry high-strength painkillers like that. It's especially hard when we have to list that our workplace only mines Rutile. It's not toxic and lightweight, so we're often ignored.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里总是有人受伤, 但是我们医疗用品的库存相当充足。我们唯一不够用的是止痛药. 我们不经常需要它们。钛是一个很安全的矿,所以他们只用于重伤.@p9 我不需要很多,只要... x25 麻醉剂 我甚至会付双倍, 因为我们需要许可来携带高强度的止痛药. 当我们的工作场所只开采金红石时,这尤其困难. 它无毒,重量轻,所以我们经常被忽视.

English: We're running on a steady diet of ration packs and cold coffee like every other drilling rig out here. What the boys want right now is some REAL food.@p9 x250 Spare Ribs x125 Ziraxian Salad Some nice red meat and fresh vegetables will do the whole crew some good. I'll pay double if you can get it here fresh and hot.
Chinese (simplified): 就像其他的标准矿场一样,我们工作时候有稳定供应的定量包装食物和冷的咖啡. 工人需要一些真正的食物.@p9 x250 肋排 x125 兹瑞克斯沙拉 一些优质的红肉和新鲜的蔬菜对全体船员都有好处. 我愿意支付双倍 如果你能在这里买到新鲜的热的.
我已经带来了你要的肉和蔬菜

English: We're considering bringing a new drill online on the west edge of the digsite. We've got most of the parts to assemble a drill already, we're only missing a few components that i'd like you to go get for me: x3 Power Coils x50 Zascosium Alloy x1 Advanced Upgrade Kit and x24 Advanced Electronics And we'll be able to get started next week.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在考虑在采矿站的西侧引入一个新的联网钻机。我们已经有大部分的部件组装钻头了,只是还缺少一些组件,我想让你为我去弄来 x3 能源线圈 x50 铡合金 x1 先进升级工具包和 x24 先进电子元件 ,这样我们下周就可以开始.
我已经带来了你要的全新钻头计算机.

English: Our conveyors have just collectively blown all their motors. We're pretty sure something unexpected fell into the back of the belt line and was dragged through each motor, destroying it in the process. We've switched out half the motors and are making do, but we need to fit the rest of them and restock our reserves.@p9 We simply weren't prepared for this to happen to all the motors on the conveyor system all at once and we weren't prepared. x160 Motors Is what we need to get the line back up and restock the reserves. We'll also need to invest in preventing the problem from happening again.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的传送带刚刚集体烧毁了所有的电机。我们相当确定有意外的东西掉进了传送带的背面,并被拖过每个电机,在过程中将其摧毁。 我们已经更换了一半的电机,并正在凑合使用,但我们需要安装其余的电机并补充我们的储备。@p9 我们根本没有准备好让传送系统上的所有电机一下子都发生这种情况,我们也没有准备好。 需要x160个电机 这是我们让生产线重新运转并补充储备所需的。我们还需要投资于防止问题再次发生。
我已经带来了马达替换组件

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We're short on general supplies. Not very important, but we still need them to conduct basic repairs or alterations to equipment when we decide to move it further than the current infrastructure allows.@p9 I've got a list of parts I need from you: x350 Cobalt Alloy x60 Energy Regulators x20 Advanced Capacitors Not so hard, but very important to us if you can manage it.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们缺少一般物资。这不是很重要,但我们仍然需要它们来在决定将其移出当前基础设施允许的范围时进行基本修理或更改设备。@p9 我有一份需要你提供的零件清单: x350 高钴合金 x60 能量调节器 x20 高级电容器 不难,但如果你能做到,对我们来说非常重要。

English: Hey there, newbie! You here for a pick-up or a drop-off? I'm Avritaz, the foreman on this operation. If you don't know what me an' the boys do here, it's Bauxite.\nYep, Bauxite. That'll be made into Aluminium soon enough and used in everything from spacecrafts to toasters.
Chinese (simplified): 嘿,新手!你是来取货还是送货的? 我是Avritaz,这里的工头。如果你不知道我们这些人在这里做什么,那就是 铝土矿。\n是的,铝土矿。这很快就会被制成铝,用于从宇宙飞船到烤面包机的所有东西。

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我们这里总是需要帮助运送物资。体力活倒不是特别需要。如果你在找工作,我们急需一个快速,便宜的信使。\n当然,我们会付钱。如果你工作出色,我可能会额外给奖金。但你的工作是不在正式账目上的。\n这样对你来说可以吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I may have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了,一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识, 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出, 所以我可能得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了,但对我来说还是很划算的,因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've got a problem with the extractor feed getting jammed every 15 minutes. We've taken the entire assembly apart looking for the problem but can't seem to find it.@p9 We need a completely new assembly, which means we need: x3 Mining Equipment x20 Motors x400 Mechanical Components To overhaul the old extraction system. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 你听到我们需要什么后可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们的提取器进料系统每15分钟就会卡住一次。我们已经将整个组件拆开寻找问题,但似乎找不到原因。@p9 我们需要一个全新的组件,这意味着我们需要: x3 采矿设备 x20 马达 x400 机械部件 来彻底检修旧的提取系统。你可以从 极星P-3 和 NLP工厂 获取采矿设备。

English: We've replaced the feed system twice, but it looks like the problem we've actually been getting is from a mixed signal from the computer system that's been grinding off the gears on the extractor when it should be idling. Now we're down an extractor and need to replace the computers that run it.@p9 That means we need another assembly replacement of: x5 Mining Equipment x10 Computers x20 Advanced Electronics To replace and rewire the feed system and rig up a new control computer. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们更换了两次给料系统,但看起来我们真正遇到的问题是因为计算机系统发出的混合信号,导致在应该空转的时候,提取器的齿轮被磨损。 现在我们的提取器坏了,需要更换运行它的计算机。@p9 这意味着我们需要另一个组装替换,包括: x5 采矿设备 x10 计算机 x20 高级电子设备 用于替换和重新布线给料系统,并搭建一个新的控制计算机。你可以从宝拉星的P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've got this problem, but every time we think we've fixed it, it moves to another part of the rig and breaks something. I'm at the point of suspecting sabotage by some malicious AI. This time, the capacitors that run the packager blew when a transformer shorted.@p9 We've got the boys unloading the conveyors manually, but they can't keep that up for long, so we need: x7 Mining Equipment x10 Advanced Capacitors x20 Energy Regulators To get things back up and running normally. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories. You'll probably need to pick up a Transportation Booster too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 我们遇到了这个问题,但每次我们认为已经解决了,它就会转移到钻井平台的另一个部分并破坏东西。我现在开始怀疑是某个恶意AI的破坏行为。 这次,当变压器短路时,运行打包机的电容器爆炸了。@p9 我们让工人们手动卸载传送带,但他们不能长时间这样做,所以我们需要: x7 采矿设备 x10 高级电容器 x20 能量调节器 以使事情恢复正常运行。你可以从Polaris' P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。 你可能还需要拿起一个运输助推器,因为那些东西很难携带。
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We have drinks here every friday night, but the last supply ship left it out of our order, so we've used up our reserves last week and have nothing for this friday...@p9 I'll need you to restock the fridges with x300 Bottles of Liquor Try either Totally Overpowered's Brewery or one of the Tal'on Breweries if you can find one. I'd recommend one of TOP's breweries, not one of their stores. I'll pay you double market price for this order, since we need it before Friday.
Chinese (simplified): 我们每周五晚上都在这里喝东西,但是上一批补给船没有把我们的订单放进去,所以我们上周就用完了我们的储备,这周五没有东西了...@p9 我需要你重新装满冰箱 300瓶烈酒 试试Totally Overpowered的酿酒厂或者如果你能找到的话,其中一个Tal'on酿酒厂。我会推荐TOP的酿酒厂,而不是他们的商店。 因为我们需要在周五之前拿到,我会为这个订单支付双倍市场价格。

English: I've finished your order and brought the beer
Chinese (simplified): 你要的菜我已经点完了,啤酒也拿来了

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Bauxite throws up a lot of dust, it's not too bad but we still go through filters quickly, so we need replacements on a regular basis.@p9 Our last shipment was waylaid, so we need you to go out and get: x8 Spare Parts x30 Filters The problem with getting both of those is that Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories make one and Chemmix, CSS and Vitalife make the other.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么,你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 铝土矿扬起很多灰尘, 还不算太糟,但我们还是会快速检查过滤器, 所以我们需要定期使用替代设备.@p9 我们最后一批货被耽搁了,所以我们需要你出去弄来: x8 备用零件 x30 过滤器 同时生产两种材料的厂家是极星' P-3和 (Hostile Apparatus)敌意装置公司的工厂' Chemmix, CSS生产其中一个Vitalife 生产另外一个.
我已经带来了你要的备用零件

English: Solar output is higher this season, so we've been thinking about adding some new solar panels that can handle the power load of the new laser drills. Standard panels are supplimental devices, so we need some commercial grade cells to ensure we're not wasting our time.@p9 We can handle the refit with: x30 Solar Cells x60 Energy Regulators They don't ship out cells to places like this, we're too small an operation to bother with, so we need to go through a third-party.
Chinese (simplified): 这个季节的太阳能输出更高,所以我们一直在考虑增加一些新的太阳能电池板,可以搞定新的激光钻头的电力负荷. 标准面板是补充设备,所以我们需要一些商业级电池,以确保我们不浪费时间.@p9 我们能用这些东西来搞定改装: x30 太阳能电池 x60 能量调节器 他们不会把能量单元运送到这样的地方,我们的组织太小了,不需要这么麻烦,所以我们需要通过第三方.

English: We'll be setting up a fresh mine nearby soon, but the density scanner we used for the first mine has been left uncovered for months and naturally, it's taken some damage and need repairs.@p9 Shouldn't be too difficult to find a supplier, since I believe Arriake Technology sells what we need at their factory. We only need: x3 Optronics x12 Computers If you can get them, i'll pay 75% over market price.
Chinese (simplified): 我们很快将在附近建立一个新的矿场,但我们第一次使用的密度扫描仪已经暴露在外数月,自然地,它已经受到了一些损坏并且需要维修。@p9 找到一个供应商应该不难,因为我相信 阿瑞亚克技术 在他们的工厂销售我们所需的产品。 我们只需要: x3 光电元件 x12 计算机 如果你能弄到它们,我会支付比市场价格高出75%的费用。
我已经带来了你要的那些替换组件 parts

English: One of our loaders collided with Generator-02's transformer while backing up yesterday and somehow caused it to burn out all the wiring on the packaging rig along with all the displays on every machine on the site. The crews are looking over processes manually now.@p9 What we need you to bring us here is: x10 Advanced Capacitors x20 Computers x150 Tablets x300 Electronics You can get the Tablets from Chromium-Sierra Sciences or Hostile Apparatus Factories. I'm not sure one the rest of the parts, but we need them quickly before someone loses a hand.
Chinese (simplified): 昨天我们的一台装载机在倒车时与发电机-02的变压器相撞,不知怎的导致包装装置上的所有线路以及现场所有机器上的显示屏都烧毁了。 现在工作人员正在手动检查流程。@p9 我们需要你为我们带来以下物品: 10个高级电容器 20台计算机 150台平板电脑 300个电子元件 你可以从铬-塞拉科学或敌对机器工厂获取平板电脑。我不确定其他部件的来源,但我们急需它们,以免有人受伤。

English: I've got the parts for the transmitter

We're testing a new extraction method using an autominer, but none of us on the platform are authorized by Polaris to purchase a whole autominer and we don't have a constructor capable of assembling one even if we got all the parts.@p9 I need you to go around Polaris' chokehold and get me: x1 Basic Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在测试一种使用自动采矿机的新开采方法,但我们平台上没有人被波拉利斯授权购买整台自动采矿机,我们也没有建造机能够组装一台,即使我们得到了所有零件。@p9 我需要你绕过波拉利斯的控制,为我获取: x1 基础自动采矿设备 购买它或者你自己建造它,然后带给我。这是我所知道的一些探矿者在野外使用的一个小漏洞,用来绕过波拉利斯在采矿上的垄断。
我给你带来了一台自动矿机.

English: We've reached our annual maintenance cycle; which means we need need to replace most of the wiring and control systems on our rigs. We've seen what happens if we don't rewire in this kind of environment.
