This is no easy job, but the products are always in demand and so are medical supplies.@p9 I need you to get us: x10 Detox Kits x100 Antibiotic Ointment x20 Adrenaline Shots That's all we need. We mostly have to deal with sulfur burns and the occasional broke toe.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里有从化学烧伤到实际烧伤的各种情况。中暑很常见。这不是一个轻松的工作,但产品总是有需求,医疗用品也是如此。@p9 我需要你帮我们获取: x10 解毒医疗包 x100 抗生素软膏 x20 肾上腺素注射 这就是我们需要的全部。我们主要需要处理硫磺烧伤和偶尔的脚趾骨折。
我已经补充了你的医疗用品

English: Oxygen quality is poor here and the sulfur dust in the air has a habit of turning into sulfuric acid when it gets damp, so we need to keep suited up with oxygen tanks and filters on most of the time we're outside.@p9 That's why I need: x25 Oxygen Bottles x50 Filters To top up our supplies.
Chinese (simplified): 这里的氧气质量很差,空气中的硫磺灰尘受潮时习惯性地会变成硫磺酸,所以我们需要穿上氧气罐,在户外的大部分时间里都要过滤器.@p9 这就是为什么我会需要: x25 氧气瓶 x50 过滤器 来补充我们的供给.

English: I've brought the pump and pipes you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你想要的泵和管道

English: Keep clear of the drills, civvy. I don't want to have to clean you out of the borehole because you got minced.\nYou don't look like any kind of bandit i've ever seen. So what brings you to our graphite mine?
Chinese (simplified): 远离钻头,公民. 我可不想因为你被剁碎了就把你从钻孔里清理出来。\n你看起来一点也不像我所见过的强盗. 什么风把你吹到石墨矿井来了?

English: You want to help? Well, sure I don't mind some extra help. But not with the drills, I need a courier to bring in supplies for me and the crew.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 你想帮忙吗?我当然不介意有额外的帮助. 但不是钻头,我需要一个快递员为我和船员带来补给.\n你当然会得到报酬的. 我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金. 但你得私下工作.\n这对你有好处吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of materials too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了,一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识, 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了,但对我来说还是很划算的,因为没有过高的运费. 把这批材料也带上。这是我告诉过你我可能会给你的奖金.

English: Like all mining rigs run by all the companies and factions, we're always in need of replacement parts for our drills.\nx2 Mining Equipment\nfrom P3 or NLP factories should fix the current problem.
Chinese (simplified): 像所有公司和派系运行的所有采矿钻机,我们总是需要为我们的钻头替换部分组件.\nx2 采矿设备\n来自 P3或者NLP 工厂应该可以解决当前的问题.
我已经带来了the 采矿设备

English: If someone set up a shipping network that dealt exclusively in supplying mining equipment to digsites like ours, they'd probably make a killing. Since no one has done that, we need to rely on couriers like you to go out and bring us the parts we need.@p9 Today at least, we need: x4 Mining Equipment from P3 or NLP factories to fix a broken drive train.
Chinese (simplified): 如果有人建立了一个运输网络,专门向我们这样的站点提供采矿设备,他们可能会大赚一笔. 因为没有人这样做过,我们需要依靠像你这样的快递员,把我们需要的零件带来.@p9 至少在今天,我们需要: x4 采矿设备 来自 P3或者NLP 工厂来修理坏了的传动系统.
我已经带来了the 采矿设备

English: I hope you can get some higher quality parts than the usual fare we deal with. We're on our third drill head this week and we're tired of replacing them, so I need some higher quality parts that won't wear out as fast.@p9 That's why I need you to go and get me: x10 Flux Coils x25 Motors x200 Sathium Plates I'll pay well for the parts if they're good quality.
Chinese (simplified): 我希望你们能买到一些高质量的常用零件. 这已经是这周第三个钻头了,我们已经厌倦了更换它们,所以我需要一些质量更高、不会很快磨损的零件.@p9 所以我才需要你去帮我弄来: x10 Flux Coil通量线圈 x25 马达 x200 钑 Plates 如果零件质量好,我愿意出高价.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件 parts

English: Our power feed hasn't been what it used to ever since we got that shoddy generator from Polaris. The flow is irregular and there's nothing we can do to fix it, so we need a transformer to smooth the output so it doesn't keep straining our systems.@p9 Shouldn't be a problem for you to get: x50 Advanced Capacitors x50 Energy Regulators Which we can use to rig up a capacitor and transformer. We may still have to replace the generator again...
Chinese (simplified): 自从我们从Polaris得到那个破旧的发电机以来,我们的电源供应就不再像以前那样了。流动是不规则的,我们无法修复它,所以我们需要一个变压器来平滑输出,这样它就不会继续对我们的系统造成压力。@p9 对你来说获取: x50 高级电容器 x50 能量调节器 应该不是问题,我们可以用它们来搭建一个电容器和变压器。我们可能仍然需要再次更换发电机...
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: We've got a heat build-up in the drill frame around midday. We've not sure if it's because it's the middle of the day or because we've been running the drills constantly for several hours. We need them to cool off faster, which means better tech.@p9 What I need you to get is: x15 Heat Exchangers x20 Computers x200 Cobalt Alloy The heat exchangers can be bought from any Thermal Interactions Ltd's Factory. They're one of our major buyers.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在中午的时候在钻头框架内发现了热量累积. 我们不确定这是因为现在是中午,还是因为我们已经连续几个小时持续运行这个钻头了. 我们需要它们更快地冷却,这意味着更好的技术.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x15 热交换器 x20 计算机 x200 钴合金 热交换器可以在以下工厂购买 Thermal Interactions Ltd's Factory.他们是我们的主要买主之一.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: We're running low on food and it's time for me to order supplies. Those guys overcharge us for delivery every time, so i'm assigning the job to you and at least i'll know the money is going somewhere worthwhile.@p9 Here's the list of what I need you to get: x100 Beer x150 Ham x200 Sandwiches
Chinese (simplified): 我们库存的食物不够了,是时候订购补给了. 那些家伙每次送货都要多收我们的钱,所以我把这个工作分配给你,至少我知道钱花得值了.@p9 以下是我需要你得到的东西的清单: x100 Beer x150 Ham x200 Sandwiches

English: This site is pretty open and we'll be getting a couple of youngsters on board in a few weeks for training in the business but we've no place to put them. Even when I was starting out I had a place to sleep, so i'd like to have more than a tent waiting for when they arrive.@p9 It'll be costly, but worth it to give them some proper housing units. x5 Prefab Housing Modules Should do it. The only place that produces them are the P3 Factories under Polaris. They're pretty bulky though.
Chinese (simplified): 这个站点是开放的,我们将在几周内让几个年轻人上船进行业务培训,但我们没有地方安置他们. 即使在我刚开始工作的时候,我也有地方睡觉,所以当他们到来的时候,我希望有一个比帐篷更大的地方.@p9 虽然有点昂贵,但值得为他们提供一些合适的住房. x5 预制房屋模块 可以搞定它. 唯一能生产它们的地方就是P3 工厂 属于极星. 不过它们相当笨重.
我已经带来了那些房屋组件

English: We've had problems recently with pests and other... wildlife, trying to get into the crew housing units and we need something that'll get rid of them and keep them out.@p9 You help us out by getting: x5 Flamethrowers x30 Ethanol Canisters To deal with the more problematic of the wildlife.
Chinese (simplified): 我们最近遇到了害虫和其他...野生动物的问题,它们试图进入船员的住房单元,我们需要一些东西来摆脱它们并阻止它们。@p9 你可以通过得到: 5个火焰喷射器 30个乙醇罐 来对付更麻烦的野生动物。
我已经带来了你想要的东西

English: Graphite's not heavy or particularly hard, so we don't get a lot of physical injuries. What we do get a lot of is problems with inhalation of the dust that's on the crew's suit when they take them off.@p9 I need you to get us: x20 Health Packs x50 Adrenaline Shot That's for the occasional incident with high-volume dust inhalation.
Chinese (simplified): 石墨不是很重,也不是特别硬,所以我们不会遭受很多身体伤害. 我们经常遇到的问题是宇航员脱下宇航服时吸入的灰尘.@p9 我需要你帮我弄来: x20 保健医药包s x50 肾上腺素针剂 这是针对偶尔吸入大量粉尘的情况.
我已经补充了你的医疗用品

English: Because of the graphite dust that gets everywhere, the crew needs to be suited up at all times while near the drills. That means they need an O2 supply and filters to keep the dust out of their lungs.@p9 That's why I need: x25 Oxygen Bottles x50 Filters To top up our supplies.
Chinese (simplified): 由于石墨灰尘到处都是,当船员在钻头附近时,他们需要随时穿上宇航服. 这意味着它们需要氧气供应和过滤器来防止灰尘进入肺部.@p9 这就是为什么我会需要: x25 氧气瓶 x50 过滤器 来补充我们的供给.

English: I've brought the pump and pipes you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你想要的泵和管道

English: Welcome to QuantumSTAR!\nWe've got the best deals on high-end electronics and computer systems this side of the galaxy!\nNow, what can I do for you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到QuantumSTAR!\n我们有最好的交易的高端电子元件和计算机系统在银河系的这一边!\n现在,我能为你做什么呢今天?

English: Graphite is in high demand these days. Especially in electronics and engine parts.\nYou could probably make a killing selling to an electronics factory like Arriake Technology or Thermal Interactions Ltd.
Chinese (simplified): 石墨这几天的需求量很大. 特别是在电子元件和引擎部件.\n卖给电子元件这样的工厂,你可能会赚大钱Arriake Technology或者Thermal Interactions Ltd.

English: I've heard that those snobs at Gold Standard Luxuries aren't allowed to sell a certain poster because the Zirax High Command didn't like the portrayal of their people.\nApparently they have crates of the things filling up their factory.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说那些势利的人在Gold Standard Luxuries不允许卖某张海报,因为兹瑞克斯最高指挥部不喜欢他们的人的写照。\n显然他们的工厂里装满了这种东西.

English: We've had a few people in here asking about Hacking Software.\nWe know about the stuff, but we don't sell it. We at QuantumSTAR strive to follow the letter of the law.
Chinese (simplified): 已经有几个人来问过了黑客软件.\n我们知道这些东西,但我们不卖. 我们在QuantumSTAR努力遵守法律条文.

English: <color=#ffffff>Looking for work are you?</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I don't have anything for you in the shop. But you look like the capable sort.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>This is all under-the-table. So you keep this to yourself and you get paid, got it?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你在找工作?</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我的店里可以没有你要的东西.但你看起来很能干.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>这都是私下的. 所以你要保密,然后拿到钱,明白了吗?</color>

English: We've been getting customers coming in and asking us about hacking software. We've had reports of this hacking software being passed around and it seems to be an auto-loading external drive that's burned out on use.@p9 I've been trying to track down one so I can crack it open and see how it works. Think you can get me a Hacking Software: Spam? I'll pay you 15,000 credits for one of those things.
Chinese (simplified): 一直有客户来问我们黑客软件的问题. 我们收到报告说这个黑客软件正在四处传播,它似乎是一个自动加载的外部驱动器,在使用过程中烧坏了.@p9 我一直在找一个这样我就能把它打开,看看它是怎么工作的. 我想你能帮我弄到黑客软件: Spam? 我会支付你15,000 信用点为这件事.

English: We've been getting customers coming in and asking us about hacking software. We've had reports of this hacking software being passed around and it seems to be an auto-loading external drive that's burned out on use.@p9 I've been trying to track down one so I can crack it open and see how it works. Think you can get me a Hacking Software: Overclock? I'll pay you 50,000 credits for one of those things.
Chinese (simplified): 一直有客户来问我们黑客软件的问题. 我们收到报告说这个黑客软件正在四处传播,它似乎是一个自动加载的外部驱动器,在使用过程中烧坏了.@p9 我一直在找一个这样我就能把它打开,看看它是怎么工作的. 我想你能帮我弄到黑客软件: Overclock? 我会支付你50,000 信用点为这件事.

English: One of our suppliers has been developing communication equipment and selling it through another company in direct conflict with their contract with us. I need to prove to head office that they're violating their contract.@p9 What I need you to do is acquire 10 of Arriake Technology's new Communication Equipment and bring it here. I'll pay you 15,000 credits for proof they're undercutting our sales.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的一个供应商一直在开发通信设备,并通过另一家公司销售它,这与他们与我们的合同直接冲突 我需要向总部证明他们违反了合同.@p9 我要你做的是获取10台Arriake Technology生产的通信设备并且带到这里. 我会支付你15,000 信用点为了证明他们在降低我们的销售额.

English: <color=#ffffff>Thank you for your help with my little problem.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Unfortunately, i'm all out of work for you to do now.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>谢谢你帮我解决这个小问题.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>不幸的是,我现在没有工作给你做了.</color>

English: Excellent!\nThank you for a job well done. Here's your payment.\nIt's been a pleasure having you work for me.
Chinese (simplified): 太好了!\n谢谢你干得漂亮. 这里是我的报酬.\n你能为我工作真是我的荣幸.

English: Welcome to Totally Overpowered!\nWe're well-known for having the best drinks this side of the Delphic Abyss! Come in, sit down, and have a pint.\nSo what can I get ya?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Totally Overpowered!\n我们以在德尔菲深渊这一边有最好的饮料而闻名! 进来,坐下,喝一杯.\n我能为你做什么?

English: I'll let you in on a lil' secret about the beer our brewery makes...@w4\nThe stuff has more alcohol in it than most people would expect. You can even use it to treat Infected Wounds and Dermal Parasites.
Chinese (simplified): 我要告诉你一个关于我们酿酒厂生产啤酒的小秘密...@w4 \n这种饮料的酒精含量超出了大多数人的预期. 你甚至可以用它来治疗Infected Wounds 和 Dermal Parasites.

English: While TOP does a good deal, we're having trouble lately with them Tal'on breweries putting out better quality booze than us at cheaper prices.\nThe only reason we ain't threatened is that they can't make more than a few small batches at a time.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然TOP做了很多生意,但我们最近和他们有点麻烦泰隆 啤酒厂以更低的价格生产出比我们质量更好的酒.\n我们没有受到威胁的唯一原因是他们一次只能生产几小批.

English: You can get drunk off most of our Beers, Wines and Liquors.\nJust so you know, while you're drunk you won't feel much. You'll probably feel better than you do sober. Your health will go up the whole time, but that hangover's a real killer.
Chinese (simplified): 你可以在我们这里获得大部分的饮料,比如啤酒, 葡萄酒 和 烈酒.\n你要知道,当你喝醉的时候,你不会有什么感觉. 你可能会比清醒时感觉更好. 你的健康状况会提高在整个过程中,但宿醉是真正的杀手.

English: <color=#ffffff>I only have a single odd-job that needs taking care of. If you don't mind that is?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我只有一份需要处理的临时工作. 如果你不介意的话?</color>

English: I'm running low on ice back here behind the bar. Think you can get me 100 Ice Chunks? I'll pay you more than double their market price. That's around 7k, right?\nSound good.
Chinese (simplified): 我吧台后面的冰非常少. 我想你能帮我弄来100 冰块? 我会付你比市场价高一倍的价钱. 大概是7000,对吧?\n听起来不错.

English: If you haven't already taken a look at our drinks list, we use some exotic ingredients in a few of our cocktails. One of them is Helium, but it's proving to be hard to come by after sanctions against Cloud Miners on the local gas giant, so we have to import from out-system.\nThink you can bring me 50 bottles of Helium? I'll pay 2.5x market price if you can get me some this week.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你还没有看我们的饮料清单,我们在一些鸡尾酒中使用了一些奇异的成分. 其中之一是氦气,但事实证明,在受到制裁后,它很难获得星云采集者在本地的气体巨星上,所以我们必须从外部系统导入.\n我想你可以带我来50 瓶氦气?我将会支付2.5x 市场价格如果你这周能给我弄到.

English: I think I can help you there

We have snacks back here that are great with our drinks. Salted chips, nuts and other things that dry the mouth and go good with a beer. Only problem is that we've run out of salt and no one else is willing to share what they've got. Considering how easy it is to get, you'd expect us to never run short, but...@p9 What I need you to get me is... well, Salt. But I need a ton of it. A literal metric ton of salt... maybe a bit less. So let's say... 600 Salt. If you can find an Ocean Planet, there may be a Salt Extractor somewhere on the water that'll sell it to you cheap.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里有零食,和饮料很配. 咸的核心,坚果和其他能让口干的东西,和啤酒很搭. 唯一的问题是盐已经用完了,没有人愿意分享他们得到的东西.考虑到它是如此容易得到,你会认为我们永远不会短缺,但是...@p9 我要你帮我弄到的是... 很好, 盐. 但我需要很多. 字面上的一公吨盐... 可能少一点. 所以比如说... 600 盐. 如果你能找到海洋行星, 可能会有盐矿井在水上的某个地方,能便宜卖给你.

English: I've managed to find you some salt
<color=#ffffff>Thanks for your help, sir.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Please, have a drink. This one's on the house.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>谢谢感谢您的帮助,先生.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>请喝一杯.这杯是免费的.</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm all out of odd jobs, i'm afraid.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'm sure if something else comes up, i'll contact you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恐怕我已经没有工作给你了.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我相信如果有其他事情发生,我会联系你的.</color>

English: Welcome to Bertram's Arms!\nI'm not the man himself, but I am his cousin! I can get you a pretty sweet deal on weapons and tech if that's your jam!\nSo what are you looking for today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Bertram's Arms!\n我不是他本人,但我是他的表弟!我可以帮你在武器和技术上搞到一笔不错的交易如果你喜欢的话!\n你今天想要什么?

English: We sell a selection of entry-level weapons, armors and supplies here at Bertram's.\nWe can't compete with M.A Corp, InterWeapon or ServantCorp on their field so we generalize... and we do alright.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在伯特伦店里出售入门级武器,盔甲和补给.\n我们无法与之竞争M.A Corp, InterWeapon或者ServantCorp公司在他们的领域所以我们概括…我们做得很好.

English: You should check out Shipyards if you're looking to make a quick buck in salvage. They're always in need of materials and components to fast-track their building.
Chinese (simplified): 你应该检查一下船坞如果你想靠打捞赚点快钱. 他们总是需要材料和部件来快速建造.

English: Have you tried a Dirty Legacy yet?\nIt's a drink they make at Totally Overpowered. It's more radioactive than they claim it is, you'll probably end up glowing.\nYou won't feel heat or cold while it's in your system though. I'm not so sure that's a good thing...
Chinese (simplified): 你试过Dirty Legacy吗?\n这是他们制作的一种饮料Totally Overpowered.它的放射性比他们声称的要高,你最后可能会发光.\n你不会感到热或冷当它在你的身体里时. 我不确定这是件好事...

English: <color=#ffffff>If you're looking for work, I may have something for you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I've only got the one job, but it's kinda important. Interested?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>如果你在找工作,我可能有东西给你.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我只有一份工作,但它很重要. 感兴趣么?</color>

English: We pride ourselves on providing entry-level weapons and hunting equipment, so we aren't competing with InterWeapon. But they've just put out a line of new weapons for hunting big game. That's them picking a fight with us.@p9 The good news is that the weapons are terrible for hunting. They make a big mess of the target and ruin hides. Now we need to hit back at them with something unique that they won't expect.@p9 The Tal'on use Crossbows for their hunting and leather is one of their most valuable commodities. So i'm thinking we should start producing and selling Crossbows. If you can get me just 5 Hunting Crossbows i'm willing to pay 5,000 credits each.
Chinese (simplified): 我们自豪地提供入门级武器和狩猎设备,所以我们不会与InterWeapon竞争。但是他们刚刚推出了一系列新的狩猎大型游戏的武器。 那就是他们向我们发起挑战。@p9 好消息是,这些武器对于狩猎来说非常糟糕。它们会把目标弄得一团糟并毁掉毛皮。 现在我们需要用他们意想不到的独特东西反击。@p9 塔隆人使用弩弓进行狩猎,皮革是他们最有价值的商品之一。所以我在想我们开始生产和销售弩弓。 如果你能给我5个狩猎弩弓我愿意支付每个5000信用点。
我已经给你带来了一些弩箭

English: ServantCorp has been on my ass for months for selling EVA Boosters. I want to show them up by offering higher quality armor, but it still has to be entry-level or else they'll take it as a challenge.\nI've seen some Improved Light Armors... around. Think you can get me three of them? I'll pay 15,000 credits per suit.
Chinese (simplified): ServantCorp几个月来一直在找我卖EVA推进器的麻烦。我想通过提供更高质量的盔甲来展示他们,但它仍然必须是入门级的,否则他们会将其视为挑战。\n我见过一些改进型轻型盔甲...周围。你认为你能给我三套吗?我会支付每套15000信用点。

English: I have a few spare suits with me

I've got a regular customer who takes his ship out camping on different worlds. He's got that whole 'I'm gonna camp on every world in the galaxy' goal that you see in a lot of the younger idiots. The problem is that he's gonna get himself killed camping on some of the planets in just this system alone.@p9 So I need to pitch him something more sturdy than a Survival Tent that can withstand harsh climates and airless moons while being compact enough to haul around. I've heard about those Prefab Housing Modules that P3 makes that'll do the job. I just need a couple of them to pitch to him.@p9 If you can get me Two Prefab Housing Modules from P3 Productions, I can surely sell them to him, or at least dissuade him from his insane mission before he gets himself killed. I'll pay you 100,000 credits for the both of them if you can get them.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个常客,他会把船开到不同的世界上去露营。他有那个'我要在银河系的每一个世界上露营'的目标,这是你在很多年轻的笨蛋中看到的。 问题是,他只是在我们这个系统内的一些星球上露营,就会把自己置于死地。@p9 所以我需要向他推销一些比生存帐篷更坚固的东西,能够承受恶劣的气候和无空气的月亮,同时足够紧凑,便于携带。 我听说过那些预制房屋模块,P3制造的可以胜任这份工作。我只需要一对它们来向他推销。@p9 如果你能从P3制作那里得到两个预制房屋模块,我可以肯定地把它们卖给他,或者至少在他自寻死路之前劝阻他不要执行他的疯狂任务。 如果你能弄到它们,我会支付你总共10万个信用点。
我给你带来了一些预制模块

English: <color=#ffffff>Ah yes, this is exactly what I was after!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'll get them prepped for sale immediately. Thanks for your help.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>啊是,这正是我想要的!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我马上准备出售. 谢谢感谢你的帮助.</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid you've put yourself out of a job.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>That was the only thing I needed help with and you're done.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恐怕你已经失业了.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>这是我唯一需要帮助的事,你完了.</color>

English: Welcome to Ok'Y Medical Care!\nI am doctor Su'oul and I am licensed to offer you medicines and injectors compatible with Terran physiology.\nHow may I help you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Ok'Y Medical Care!\n我是苏乌尔医生,我有资格为你提供符合人类生理机能的药物和注射器.\n今天我能为您做些什么?

English: I've heard that there are Polaris Labs out there that handle all sorts of illegal research. I'd sure like to get a job in a place like that...\nI bet the pay is amazing.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说有极星实验室在外面进行各种非法研究. 我很想在那样的地方找到一份工作...\n我打赌工资是惊人的.

English: Ok'y Medical is more widespread and primarily handle Vaccines, Injectors and Ointments since that's what most people need.\nAndromedical deals in Commercial medical supplies, medkits and pills.\nWe both cover different parts of the market, but that doesn't stop head office from competing with them.
Chinese (simplified): Ok'y Medical更广泛,主要处理疫苗,因为大多数人都需要注射剂和软膏.\nAndromedical交易的商业医疗用品,医疗包和药丸.\n我们都覆盖不同的市场,但这并不妨碍总公司与他们竞争.

English: I'm sure I don't need to warn you that lasers cause Dermal Burns. They're extremely painful and the worse it is, the more likely it is to get infected.\nPlasma on the other hand is radioactive and will cause Radiation Burns. Get those treated immediately before the damage becomes permanent.
Chinese (simplified): 不用我提醒你也知道激光会导致皮肤灼伤.非常疼,而且越疼越容易感染.\n等离子另一方面是放射性同时还会带来辐射病.在损伤变成永久性损伤之前,立即进行治疗.

English: Well, I don't need any help with preparing the medicines or behind the counter.\nI am waiting on a few late shipments, if you're interested in making a few credits.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>嗯,我不需要什么帮助准备药物或在柜台后面.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我在等待一些迟来的发货,如果你有兴趣赚取一些信用点.</color>

English: One of the medical labs that supply Ok'y recently had a power failure that killed off their refrigeration and ruined half of their supplies. That included a shipment of Brafus Fungi intended for Ok'y.@p9 If you can, i'd like you to track down an alternative source of Brafus Fungi for me. I'll pay double, since it's rather urgently needed in several medications. I only need a small shipment of 50 Brafus Fungi to tide me over until my supplier can cultivate more.
Chinese (simplified): 为Ok'y提供服务的一个医学实验室最近停电了,冰箱坏了,一半的供应品都毁了. 其中包括一批Brafus真菌为Ok'y准备的.@p9 如果可以的话,我想让你帮我找到Brafus真菌的另一个来源. 我会支付双倍,因为很多药物都急需它. 我只需要一小批50 Brafus真菌帮我度过难关,直到我的供应商培育出更多.

English: I've brought you a shipment of Brafus Fungi
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你需要的Brafus真菌

English: As you can see, Ok'y Medical is a distributor of medical treatments. Unfortunately, Pirates struck one of our cargo freighters and made off with a shipment of prescription painkillers. Extremely valuable.@p9 No, I don't want you to track down the pirates and get them back. Though it would be nice if you did. What I need is 25 boxes of Narcotics. You can get them from any Medical Supplier, but I need them urgently.
Chinese (simplified): 如你所见,Ok'y Medical是一家提供医疗服务的经销商. 不幸的是, 海盗袭击了我们的一艘货轮,带着一船处方药逃走了止痛药. 极具价值.@p9 不,我不想让你追踪海盗把他们找回来.不过如果你知道就好了. 我需要的是25 盒麻醉剂. 你可以从任何一家医疗供应商那里拿到,但我现在急需.

English: I've brought you a replacement for those Painkillers
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了备用的止痛药

English: We use Xenon as an anesthetic in Ok'y Medical's clinic. It's an effective treatment that works on Zirax, Tal'on, Praven, and even you Terrans. It is however, in short supply all across the galaxy and in even shorter supply in our own clinic.@p9 What I need from you is to track down a shipment of Xenon to replace our depleted reserves. Around 50 Tanks of Xenon should do.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在Ok医疗诊所用氙做麻醉剂. 这是一种有效的治疗方法兹瑞克斯, 泰隆, Praven,甚至你Terrans. 然而,它在整个银河系都供不应求,在我们自己的诊所更是供不应求.@p9 我需要你做的是弄来一批氙气 来取代我们耗尽的储备. 大约50 罐氙气应该能搞定.

English: I've found you some tanks of Xenon
Chinese (simplified): 我给你带来了一些tanks of 氙气

English: You've saved a lot of lives with your help, my friend.\nPlease, take this prototype Regeneration Kit as thanks in addition to your payment.
Chinese (simplified): 你的帮助救了很多人的命,朋友.\n请拿着这些原型再生医疗包作为付款外额外的补偿.

English: <color=#ffffff>I don't wish to impose on you further.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You've already done enough, and saved me from a headache would've been inevitable if i'd had to solve the problem myself.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>So thank you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我不想再打扰你了.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>你已经做得够多了,如果我必须自己解决这个问题,我就不会再头疼了.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>所以谢谢你.</color>

English: One of the medical labs that supply Ok'y recently had a power failure that killed off their refrigeration and ruined half of their supplies. That included a shipment of Varon Root intended for Ok'y.@p9 If you can, i'd like you to track down an alternative source of Varon Root for me. I'll pay double, since it's rather urgently needed in several medications. I only need a small shipment of 75 Varon Root to tide me over until my supplier can cultivate more.
Chinese (simplified): 为Ok'y提供服务的一个医学实验室最近停电了,冰箱坏了,一半的供应品都毁了. 其中包括一批Varon根为Ok'y准备的.@p9 如果可以,我想让你帮我找到Varon根的另一个来源根. 我会支付双倍,因为很多药物都急需它. 我只需要一小批75 Varon根帮我度过难关,直到我的供应商培育出更多.

English: I've brought you a shipment of Varon Root

We use ingredients here to produce prescription medications for many of our regular customers here. Nothing exotic, just regular household diseases, colds, gout, that sort of thing.@p9\nUnfortunately, during a medical emergency here in the store, our machines used for combining the ingredients was knocked over by station staff assisting.\nI need 5 Scientific Equipment to replace the parts that were broken.
Chinese (simplified): 我们用这里的原料为这里的许多老客户生产处方药. 没什么特别的,只是普通的家庭疾病,感冒,痛风之类的.@p9 \n不幸的是,在一次医疗紧急事件中,我们用于混合原料的机器被辅助工作人员打翻了.\n我需要5 科研设备更换损坏的部件.

English: I've brought you that equipment you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你得到你想要的设备

English: Welcome to AndroMedical Galactic!\nThe leading producers of medical supplies in the galaxy! All of our staff are trained medical professionals, ready to help with day-to-day afflictions and more serious surgery.\nHow may I help you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到AndroMedical Galactic!\n银河医疗用品的主要生产商!我们所有的工作人员都是受过训练的专业医疗人员,随时准备帮助日常的病痛和更严重的手术.\n今天我能为您做些什么?

English: Although not official, it's known that Totally Overpowered's Beer has enough alcohol in it to disinfect Infected Wounds.\nThey don't put that on the bottle of course. We get drunks in here every day who misjudged how much alcohol is in their beer.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然不是官方的,但众所周知,Totally Overpowered的啤酒含有足够的酒精来消毒感染的伤口。\n他们当然不会在瓶子上写这个。我们这里每天都有喝醉的人,他们误判了啤酒中的酒精含量。

English: Do you have any Ablative Spray? It's good if you're expecting to be exposed to lasers or acid since it provides a protective barrier over the skin that prevents contact burns.\nIt doesn't treat the condition and has no effect on Radiation Burns though.
Chinese (simplified): 你们是否有一些烧伤喷雾? 如果你希望接触到激光或者酸因为它在皮肤上提供了一个保护屏障,防止接触烧伤.\n它不能治疗辐射烧伤也没有效果.

English: I'm sure you already know, but minor cuts and scratches don't appear on your suit's display. You'll only receive an 'Open Wound' warning if it's an injury to an artery beyond what your suit is capable of sealing.\nIf you don't treat it quickly, you'll lose too much blood and pass out. Then you'll be in real trouble.
Chinese (simplified): 我相信你已经知道了,但轻微的割伤和划痕不会出现在你套装的显示屏上. 你只会收到一个开放性创伤' 如果是动脉的损伤超出了你的防护服的密封性就会发出警告.\n如果你不迅速治疗,你就会失血过多而晕倒. 那你就会遇到真正的 麻烦.

English: Well, I don't need any help with preparing the medicines or behind the counter.\nI am waiting on a few late shipments, if you're interested in making a few credits.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>嗯,我不需要什么帮助准备药物或在柜台后面.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我在等待一些迟来的发货,如果你有兴趣赚取一些信用点.</color>

English: We have an indoor plantation on a nearby desert world that supplies us with Spike Lemons which we use in mass-producing antitoxic medication. A recent sandstorm has buried the greenhouses and cut off their supply of solar power. They're still clearing away the sand from the panels, but have lost their entire crop.@p9 In the meantime, I need a new supply but there are no other suppliers anywhere nearby. The only people I know of that can even grow Spike Lemons are the Tal'on. If you can get them to part with 100 Alien Spike Lemons, i'll pay you double what you paid for them.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在附近的沙漠世界有一个室内种植园,为我们提供刺柠檬我们用它来批量生产抗毒素药物. 最近的一场沙尘暴掩埋了温室,切断了它们的太阳能供应.他们仍在清理面板上的沙子,但已经失去了所有的作物.@p9 与此同时,我需要新的货源但附近没有其他货源. 我所知道的唯一一个能种植的人刺柠檬在泰隆. 如果你能在他们那弄到100外星刺柠檬,我会支付你 两倍你所支付的费用.
我已经给你带来了一些刺柠檬

English: As you can see, AndroMedical is a distributor of medical treatments. Unfortunately, Pirates struck one of our cargo freighters and made off with a shipment of prescription painkillers. Extremely valuable.@p9 No, I don't want you to track down the pirates and get them back. Though it would be nice if you did. What I need is 25 boxes of Narcotics. You can get them from any Medical Supplier, but I need them urgently.
Chinese (simplified): 如你所见,AndroMedical是一家医疗产品的经销商. 不幸的是, 海盗袭击了我们的一艘货轮,带着一船处方药逃走了止痛药. 极具价值.@p9 不,我不想让你追踪海盗把他们找回来.不过如果你知道就好了. 我需要的是25 盒麻醉剂. 你可以从任何一家医疗供应商那里拿到,但我现在急需.

English: I've brought you a replacement for those Painkillers
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了备用的止痛药

English: There's a new brand of synthetic drug on the market from somewhere in pirate space that may have beneficial properties with further research.@p9 I'd really like to get my hands on some of those vials, find out what's in them and see if Andromedical can benefit from it somehow. But so far no one sells the stuff through regular channels. If you can bring me... 10 Zyme Vials, i'll pay 50,000 credits for the lot.
Chinese (simplified): 市场上出现了一种新的合成药物品牌,它来自海盗空间的某处,可能具有进一步研究的有益属性。@p9 我真的想弄到一些那些小瓶,找出里面是什么,并看看安德罗医疗能否以某种方式从中受益。 但到目前为止,还没有人通过正规渠道销售这些东西。 如果你能带给我... 10个酶小瓶,我会为这些支付50,000信用点。

English: I've managed to find you those bug sprays.

There's a patient that's currently afflicted with an Alien Parasite that we can't remove and doesn't respond to any anti-parasitic treatment we know. This is a rather precarious situation since we know the parasite has been discovered, but all information regarding treatments has been sealed.@p9 The patient in question has offered a 100,000 credit reward for anyone that can provide any information on treating the parasite. I believe if you can 'obtain' Biological Data from a Science Satellite, we can both come out on top.@p9 We'll split the reward 80:20, since I still need to develop a treatment for the condition or else neither of us get paid. 80,000 credits is still a good deal for you, isn't it?
Chinese (simplified): 有个病人现在被一种外星寄生虫折磨我们无法移除而且我们知道的任何抗寄生虫治疗都没有反应. 这是一个相当危险的情况,因为我们知道寄生虫已经被发现,但所有有关治疗的信息都被密封.@p9 这个病人提供了一个100,000 信用点的报酬给任何能提供治疗寄生虫信息的人. 我相信如果你能“获得”生物数据从一个科学卫星,我们所有人都能获利.@p9 赏金我们82分,因为我还得研究出治疗方法否则我们俩都拿不到钱. 80,000 信用点对你来说还是很划算的,不是吗?

English: I've got my hands on that Biological Data
You've saved a lot of lives with your help, my friend.\nPlease, take this new Antibiotic Ointment as thanks in addition to your payment.
Chinese (simplified): 你的帮助挽救了很多生命,我的朋友。\n请接受这个新的抗生素软膏作为感谢,除了你的报酬。

English: <color=#ffffff>You've helped me enough, sir.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I couldn't ask you to do any more than you've already done.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>You've helped me enough,先生.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我不能要求你做比你已经做的更多的事了.</color>

English: As you can see, AndroMedical is a distributor of medical treatments. Unfortunately, Pirates struck one of our cargo freighters and made off with a shipment of prescription painkillers. Extremely valuable.@p9 No, I don't want you to track down the pirates and get them back. Though it would be nice if you did. What I need is 50 boxes of Narcotics. You can get them from any Medical Supplier, but I need them urgently.@p9 I'm aware that 50 boxes is quite a bulky load to carry yourself, so I recommend getting yourself a couple of Transportation Boosters for your armor. I'll compensate you with an extra 15,000 credits for the trouble.
Chinese (simplified): 如你所见,AndroMedical是一家医疗产品的经销商. 不幸的是, 海盗袭击了我们的一艘货轮,带着一船处方药逃走了止痛药. 极具价值.@p9 不,我不想让你追踪海盗把他们找回来.不过如果你知道就好了. 我需要的是50 盒麻醉剂. 你可以从任何一家医疗供应商那里拿到,但我现在急需.@p9 我知道50个箱子对你自己来说是相当大的负担,所以我建议你买几个运输增强器在你盔甲上. 我将会补偿你,通过 额外 15,000 信用点 为了你遇到的麻烦.

English: I've brought you a replacement for those Painkillers
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了备用的止痛药

English: Welcome to InterWeapon Armaments!\nWe supply industrial, commercial, private and even military with only the best quality weapons, mods and ammunition.\nWhat are you looking for today, buddy?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到InterWeapon Armaments!\n我们为工业、商业、私人甚至军队提供最优质的武器、改装装置和弹药.\n你今天想要什么,伙计?

English: I've heard the old Elite Combat Pistols never caught on with the Zirax Captains they were made for. They've recently recalled them all and outfitted them as Heavy Pistols.\nI guess the Starhawk really impressed them. They want the new Elite Combat Pistols to be just like them.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说旧的 精英战斗手枪从来没有受到兹瑞克斯舰长的欢迎,尽管他们是为舰长而生产的. 他们最近召回了所有的产品,并把它们改装成重型手枪.\n我猜沙漠之鹰真的让他们印象深刻. 他们想要新的精英战斗手枪就像它一样.

English: Be careful handling a minigun. They're a good all-rounder with devastating firepower and a big magazine, but they have the worst accuracy at long range.\nThose things are really heavy and trying to fire them and keep them steady is a nightmare.
Chinese (simplified): 在使用迷你机枪时要小心。它们是全能型的武器,具有毁灭性的火力和大容量弹匣,但在远距离射击时精确度极差。\n这些东西非常重,试图开火并保持稳定是一个噩梦。

English: <color=#ffffff>I don't need any help with the store.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I have a special order I need filled that i'm having trouble with if you're interested.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我与商店没有需要什么帮助.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我有一个特殊的订单,我需要填写麻烦,如果你感兴趣的话.</color>

English: Alright, if you insist. You've seen those guns the Zirax Commanders were issued? The Heavy Pistols that they copied from those new aliens to the galaxy.@p9 Seems those Starhawks are really popular among the Xenu's commanders. Whoever those 'U-C-H-ers' are they apparently really know how to make a pistol.@w4 I want one.@p9 If they're good enough to impress the Zirax, then they're something I can sell. I just need to know how they're made. If you can bring me just one Starhawk Heavy Pistol, i'll pay you 50,000 credits for it.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,如果你坚持。 你见过那些 兹瑞克斯指挥官 发配的枪吗?那些他们从那些新来的外星人那里模仿的重型手枪。@p9 看来那些 星鹰 在 Xenu的指挥官 中真的很受欢迎。不管那些 'U-C-H-ers' 是谁,他们显然 真的 知道怎么做手枪。@w4 我想要一把。@p9 如果它们足够好,能够打动 兹瑞克斯,那它们就是我可以出售的东西。我只是需要知道它们是如何制造的。 如果你能带给我 一把 星鹰重型手枪,我会为此支付你 50,000信用点。
我为你找到了一把沙漠之鹰

English: Alright... I've heard rumors of some weapons being tested on a moon nearby, but I have no idea who's doing it or which moon. It could even be a different moon each time. The regular zirax patrols won't tell me anything and I need to know whether or not it's one of InterWeap's weapons being used.@p9 I need to avoid any tricky legal situations if it is. So I need you to go and hack one of those Security Satellites around the sun and bring me back their Weapons Signatures Report. Even if it's not one of ours, I can at least use the data to reconstruct the kind of weapon it is. I'll wire 150,000 credits into your account for the trouble, of course.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧... 我听说一些武器在附近的月球上进行测试,但我不知道是谁做的,也不知道是哪个月球。甚至可能每次都是不同的卫星. 普通的兹瑞克斯巡逻不会告诉我任何事情,我需要知道这是否是interweapons使用的武器之一.@p9 如果是的话,我得避免任何棘手的法律纠纷. 所以我需要你去黑进其中一个恒星附近的安全卫星然后把他们的武器特征报告带回来. 即使它不是我们的,我至少可以用这些数据重建它的武器类型. 我会打给你150,000 信用点 到你的账户去 为了你遇到的麻烦.

English: You're probably familiar with Heavy Turrets, right? Well, InterWeapon's been trying to get it's hands on the parts that the Zirax use on their turrets to see if we can reproduce them. We've managed to produce smaller upgrade kits, but nothing we can sell to freighters and warships.@p9 Needless to say, we need one of their Large Upgrade Kits and there's an open contract for a large upgrade kit for 150,000 Credits to any store manager that can get one. If you can bring me one, we can split the reward 90,000 for you and 60k for me. Sound good?
Chinese (simplified): 你可能熟悉重型炮塔,对吧? 好吧, InterWeapon's一直在尝试获得兹瑞克斯在他们的炮塔上使用的部分零件,看看我们是否可以复制它们. 我们已经成功生产了小型武器升级包,但我们没有产品可以卖给货船和军舰.@p9 不用说,我们需要一个它们的大型升级工具并且一个公开出售的大型升级工具可以得到150,000 信用点给任何能买到的商店经理. 如果你能给我弄来一个,我们可以平分奖励90,000给你同时60000给我. 听起来不错?

English: Deal. Wire the money into my account.
Chinese (simplified): 交易. 把钱汇到我的账户里.

English: I have a repair order for a set of Particle Beam Rifles. These things are top of the line. Brand spankin' new, right out of the lab and i'm not even qualified to touch these things, letalone work on them. The coils overheat too fast, causing the heatsink to melt unevenly and eject prematurely.@p9 The only fix I can think of would require... Heat Exchangers, but I don't have that kind of thing on hand. They're usually used on drilling rigs and fusion reactors, not weapons. If you can track down 35 of them for these seven rifles, i'll pay you 95,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一套阳电子束步枪的修理单. 这玩意可是顶级的. 全新的,从实验室出来的,我甚至没有资格触摸这些东西,更不用说在它们上面工作了. 线圈过热过快,导致散热片融化不均匀并过早弹出.@p9 我能想到的唯一修复办法就是... 热交换器,但我手头没有这种东西. 它们通常用于矿井钻机和聚变反应堆,而不是武器. 如果你能找到35个这东西给这七支步枪使用,我会支付你 95,000 信用点.

English: I need to send one of my work crew out to repair the weapons system on a Skenya-Class Destroyer, but they didn't tell me that the damn thing is mounting a Lohengrin Positron Cannon. He's not qualified to work on it and I certainly don't have a clue to fix one of those things.@p9 What I need you to do is go behind Polaris' back and get your hands on their Maintenance Data. It shouldn't be too hard. You've seen those satellites they've got in orbit around the sun? They relay communication data between systems and keep backups of the things they send. That includes maintenance and technical data.@p9 If you can hack into one of those Common Satellites, you should be able to download the backups they keep of everything they've sent. That includes Maintenance Reports on the weapons system. I'll pay you 60,000 credits for that Data.
Chinese (simplified): 我要派一名工作人员去修理Skenya-级驱逐舰的武器系统, 但他们没告诉我那该死的东西正在安装罗恩正电子大炮. 他没有资格处理这个问题,而我也完全没有办法解决这些问题.@p9 我需要你做的是跟在极星后面,并且拿到它们的维护数据. 这应该不会太难.你们已经看到了那些环绕太阳运行的卫星? 它们在系统之间传递通信数据,并对它们发送的东西进行备份. 这包括维护和技术数据.@p9 如果你能黑进通讯卫星, 你应该能下载到他们所发送的所有文件的备份. 其中包括武器系统的 维护报告. 我会支付你60,000 信用点对这些数据.

English: I've got my hands on those Maintenance Reports
Thanks for all your help! That's a load off my back.\nI've given you your payment, and I found these Plasma Charges in storage that you can have as well.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你的所有帮助!这让我轻松多了。\n我已经给你支付了,我在仓库里找到了这些等离子电荷,你也可以拿走。

English: I don't have any more work for you. You might want to try one of the other merchants.\nIf you've got spare time you might want to check out one of InterWeapon's Factories. They've always got a bunch of loose jobs and need supplies.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有更多的工作给你了。你可能想尝试找其他商人。\n如果你有空闲时间,你可能想要去看看 InterWeapon's 工厂。他们总是有一堆零工,并且需要物资。

English: This should be standard knowledge for you military types. Rocket Launchers are the best handheld weapon for taking down Drones and Sentry Guns. Ain't nothing better for taking down an Assault Mech or a Drone Gunship than a well-placed rocket or two. Plasma's better for taking down groups of lightly-armored troops.
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>这应该是你军事类型的标准知识.
火箭发射器是摧毁无人机和哨兵炮的最佳手持武器.
一两个装填好的火箭是干掉一个突击机器人或无人机和武装直升机的最好武器.
等离子可以轻松的干掉成群的轻甲部队.</color>

English: Welcome to SERVANT CORP OUTFITTERS!\nWhere we sell only the latest in suit enhancements and attachments. So if you need anything, I am your servant.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到SERVANT CORP 旅行用品商!\n我们只卖最新的套装和附件. 若是你需要的有什么,我就是你的服务者.

English: The typical humanoid armors we sell come in Light, Medium and Heavy variants.\nThere are also improved, reinforced and advanced versions of them. We stock some of them, but the Advanced Heavy Armor is custom-made for paramilitary groups and so not available for sale... ever.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我们出售的典型人形盔甲有轻型, 中型和重型版本.\n还有改进, 加强和高级个版本.我们有一些库存,但是先进重型装甲是为准军事集团定制的,所以从不出售….</color>

English: Shield Capacitors increase the strength of your ship's shield at the cost of recharge speed, while Shield Chargers increase the recharge speed of your ship's shield at the cost of Shield Strength.\nFinding the right balance is what's key to a good ship.@w5\nSorry about the big lecture, but you did ask for something interesting.
Chinese (simplified): 护盾电容器增加了飞船护盾的强度,但代价是重新充能的速度,而护盾充电器则增加了飞船护盾的重新充能速度,但代价是护盾强度。\n找到正确的平衡是打造一艘好飞船的关键。@w5 \n抱歉讲了这么多,但你确实要求了一些有趣的事情。

English: Each type of armor is best for different situations. Light Armor is comfortable, easy to move around in and cheap. It's good for everyday use, but isn't the best for heavy combat.@w2 Meanwhile, Heavy Armor's protection is second to none but it's slow, so it's a trade-off.@p9 Medium Armor is a good all-rounders. Better protection than Light Armor, more mobile than Heavy Armor. But not really the best at anything.
Chinese (simplified): 每种类型的装甲都适用于不同的情况。 轻型装甲舒适,易于活动,而且便宜。它适合日常使用,但并不是重型战斗的最佳选择。@w2 与此同时,重型装甲的保护无与伦比,但它速度慢,所以这是一种权衡。@p9 中型装甲是全能型的好选择。比轻型装甲有更好的保护,比重型装甲更灵活。但并不是最擅长任何事情。

English: <color=#ffffff>I don't need any help with the store.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I have a special order I need filled that i'm having trouble with if you're interested.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我与商店没有需要什么帮助.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我有一个特殊的订单,我需要填写麻烦,如果你感兴趣的话.</color>

English: I have a service order to repair an older model of Heavy Armor for a customer that has sentimental value. The parts for this model of armor haven't been produced in 10 years and the ones that were in circulation have either been bought up or scrapped. Which means i'll need to improvise...@p9 The problem with this particular suit is that the Radiation Shielding and Thermal Insulation is completely degraded and there's nothing on the market that can replace it. I'm sure I can make something work using 150 Graphite and 75 Aluminium Foil though. You bring me those and i'll pay you 50,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个服务订单,要修复一个旧型号重型装甲,这是给一个有情感价值的客户的单子。 这个型号的装甲的部件已经10年没有生产了,流通中的部件不是被买光了就是报废了。这就意味着我需要随机应变…@p9 辐射屏蔽器和保温绝缘层已经完全退化,市场上没有任何东西可以替代它。 我确信我可以使用 150 石墨 和 75 铝线圈你给我这些,我会支付你50000信用点.

English: I have a service order to repair a suit of X-01 Advanced Heavy Armor for a valuable customer. We don't typically handle the repairs on this kind of armor at a shop like this. This is the kind of thing you send to our factory to be refit, so i'm stuck on this one.@p9 There's a hole through the suit's oxygen filter and the radiation shielding on the left arm and shoulder has been completely melted. It needs a replacement, but I don't have any of the parts for this. What I need you to find for me is 10 Air Filters and 10 Radiation Shielding (not boosters). You bring me those parts and i'll pay you 70,000 credits on the spot.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个单子要修一套X-01 先进重型装甲这是一个有价值的客户的订单. 我们一般不会在这样的商店处理这种装甲的维修。这是你送到我们工厂去改装的东西,所以我被困在这个上面了。@p9 衣服的氧气过滤器有个洞,左臂和肩膀的辐射屏蔽器已经完全融化了。它需要替换组件,但我没有这个的任何零件。我需要你为我找到是什么 10 空气过滤器 和 10 辐射屏蔽器 (不是支持器)。 你把那些零件给我,我会当场支付你70,000信用点.

English: I have a service order to repair a suit of X-01 Advanced Heavy Armor for a valuable customer. We don't typically handle the repairs on this kind of armor at a shop like this. This is the kind of thing you send to our factory to be refit, so i'm stuck on this one.@p9 The suit needs a new jetpack but none of the components in the standard armors are compatible with the armor. I need something stronger, and I think I know what. I need 4 Thruster Components, 10 Power Coils and 10 Advanced Capacitors. For those, i'll wire 100,000 credits to your account on the spot.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个服务订单要修理一套X-01高级重型装甲给一个重要客户。 我们通常不会在这样的商店里处理这种装甲的修理。这是你送到我们的工厂去改装的那种东西,所以我卡在这个问题上了。@p9 这套装备需要一个新的喷气背包,但标准装甲中的任何组件都与装甲不兼容。我需要更强大的东西,我想我知道是什么。 我需要4个推进器组件,10个动力线圈和10个高级电容器。 为此,我将立即向你的账户转账100,000信用点。

English: Deal. Wire the money into my account.
Chinese (simplified): 交易. 把钱汇到我的账户里.

English: We get extreme sports types in here looking for the latest in high performance suits and boosters and wanting to do something stupid with them. I probably shouldn't talk bad about them since they make up half our profits...@p9 Anyway, this one guy wants to jump from orbit onto a certain ocean planet with some seriously bad weather. He'll end up dead if the weather's bad, so I need you to get Atmospheric Data for the planet.@p9 You can probably get it from an Exploration Satellite around one of the nearby stars. You'll have to hack it yourself, but the guys a big spender and will fork out 90,000 credits if you do this for him.
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>这里有极限运动爱好者,他们穿着最新的高性能盔甲和助推器,想做些蠢事。
我可能不应该说他们的坏话,因为他们占了我们一半的利润…@p9 
总之,这个家伙想从轨道上跳到某个天气非常糟糕的海洋行星上。如果天气不好,他会死的,所以我需要你得到大气数据。@p9 
你可能可以从附近某颗恒星附近的探索卫星得到它。你得自己搞定它,但如果你为他们这么做,他们会为你支付90,000信用点.</color>

English: We've had a problem recently with hackers gaining access to people's suits and shutting down environmental controls. We haven't had a serious incident, but all it takes is someone to turn off radiation protection or open a visor and we'll have full-blown panic over our products.@p9 We know how they're getting in and we've put safety measures in place, but what we need is Anti-Hacking Software of our own. Something that'll boot them from the system automatically.@p9 Now, i've heard of some nasty hacking software used for brute-forcing security systems. Among these disposable software drives is one Hacking Software called 'Fortify' that the techs might be able to reverse-engineer into something we can install in every suit.@p9 I'm not sure where you'd even find something like that, and i'm sure they're very illegal, but this is for a good cause. If you can find me one, you'll save a lot of lives. And of course, i'll pay you 30,000 credits for it.
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>我们最近遇到了一个问题黑客侵入了人们的防护服并关闭了环境控制系统。我们没有遇到严重的事故,但只要有外人可以随便关闭辐射保护或打开遮阳板,他们就会对我们的产品产生全面的恐慌。@p9 
我们知道他们是怎么进来的,我们已经采取了安全措施,但我们需要的是我们自己的反黑客软件。能让它们自动从系统中启动的东西。@p9 
现在,我已经听说了一些恶意的黑客软件用于暴力胁迫安全系统。在这些一次性软件驱动器中,有一个黑客软件,名为“强化”,技术人员可能会将其转换成我们可以安装在每一套防护服上的东西。@p9 
我不确定你在哪里甚至能找到这样的东西,我确定他们非常的非法,但这里有一个很好的理由:
如果你能给我找一个这玩意,你会拯救很多人的生命。当然,我会支付你积30000分.</color>

English: I managed to track down one of those Hacking Softwares for you
Chinese (simplified): 我设法为你找到了一个黑客软件

English: Thanks for all your help! That's a load off my mind.\nIn addition to your payment, please take these 5.56mm Rounds that we use for ballistic testing our products.\nIt's not much, but it's what the head office'll let me give you.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你的所有帮助!我心里的大石头终于落地了。\n除了你的报酬,请收下这些5.56mm子弹,我们用它们来进行产品弹道测试。\n虽然不多,但这是总部允许我能给的。

English: <color=#ffffff>You've done all the work I had, and i'm very thankful for it too.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Put those 5.56mm Rounds I gave you to good use will you?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你完成了我所有的工作,我对此非常感激。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>好好利用我给你的5.56毫米子弹,可以吗?</color>

English: Welcome to Grocer's Grove!\nWe supply only the freshest produce! We're responsible for provisioning colonies, starships and everyday consumers like you!\nSo how many I assist you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Grocer's Grove!\n我们只提供最新鲜的农产品! 我们负责供应殖民地、星际飞船和像你这样的日常消费者!\n那么今天我帮助了你多少?

English: One of major consumers are the Station Quartermasters you can find on many trade stations and habitats.\nThey always need Fruit, Vegetables and Meat and pay top credit for it. They don't buy a lot each time, but they're regulars.\nYou can make a real killing selling surplus crops to the outlying stations.
Chinese (simplified): 主要消费者之一在Station Quartermasters,您可以在许多贸易站和栖息地找到。\n 他们总是需要水果、蔬菜和肉 并为此付出最高的荣誉。 他们每次都不会买很多,但他们是常客。\n你可以把多余的作物卖给边远站,赚大钱.

English: If you can find a Polaris or Trade Federation Waste Processing Plant you can get Fertilizer from them for cheaper than Grimgar's Garden.\nThey have Nitrogen as well, but it's so ridiculously overpriced that there's no profit from reselling it.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你能找到一个极星或者贸易联盟 废物处理厂你可以得到肥料比他们便宜Grimgar's Garden.\n他们也有知识,但它的价格高得离谱,转售没有任何利润。

English: Food and Medicine always sell well, since they're constantly in demand everywhere. Not like mechanical components and machines that'll run for years before needing to be replaced.
Chinese (simplified): 食物和医药 总是卖得很好,因为它们到处都有需求。不像机械元件和机器会运行多年才需要更换。

English: Need work?\nWell... we probably have a job in the greenhouses, but not here.\nActually I think I might have something...
Chinese (simplified): 需要工作吗?\n嗯……我们可能在温室里有份工作,但这里没有。\n其实我觉得我可能有什么事情...

English: We've had problems with thieves breaking into our warehouses lately and stealing our best produce. We need some better security, but station services won't help us out.@p8\nCan you bring me 5 Sensor and Signal Blocks, 10 Spotlights and 2 Laser Upgrade Kits?\nI'll pay you 25,000 credits for your help. I'm not getting any help from anyone else around here, that's for sure!
Chinese (simplified): 最近我们遇到了小偷闯入我们的仓库并偷走我们最好的产品的问题。我们需要一些更好的安全措施,但站点服务帮不了我们。@p8 \n你能带给我吗 5 传感器和Signal Blocks, 10 Spotlights 和 2个激光工具包?\n我会支付你25,000信用点 for你的帮助。我没有从这里的 任何其他人那里得到任何帮助,这是肯定的!

English: I've brought you those parts you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你要的那些零件

English: I'm sure you may have noticed, but we don't stock any mushrooms at Grocer's Grove. We've tried several times to get a reliable supplier out here, but no one can transport mushrooms without them going bad or dying.@p9\nI'm hoping you can find a good supply of nice, big, brown mushrooms for us to sell. They're vital for the production of some foods that many of our customers want but can't make themselves without the missing ingredients.\nWhat we need is a good supply of 500 mushrooms. I'll even pay 60 credits per mushroom.
Chinese (simplified): 我相信你可能已经注意到了,但我们在 Grocer's Grove 没有任何蘑菇库存。 我们已经多次尝试在这里找到可靠的供应商,但没有人可以运输蘑菇而不让它们变质或死亡。@p9 \n我希望你能找到一个好的 供应漂亮的、大的、棕色的蘑菇供我们出售。 它们对于生产我们的许多客户想要但如果没有缺少的成分就无法自己制作的一些食物至关重要。\n我们需要提供充足的500 个蘑菇。 我什至会为每个蘑菇支付 60 信用点。

English: I have a big box of mushrooms with me

I'm trying to branch out into some of the more exotic plants and crops and I want to see what kind of a market I have to work with. But without any examples for people to try, it's proving hard to get started. I've heard that the Opuntia Cactus Fruit is used as a medical ingredient, but i've also heard that the fruit is delicious, so it's got me wondering if I can sell it.@p9 If you can bring me... 90 Opuntia Cactus Fruit, i'll pay you 30,000 credits for the lot. I heard the Tal'on are fairly adept at harvesting the plant. You could start by asking them.
Chinese (simplified): 我正在尝试涉足一些更具异国情调的植物和作物,我想看看我必须与什么样的市场合作。 但是没有任何示例供人们尝试,事实证明很难入门。 我听说仙人掌果被用作医疗成分,但我也听说过 水果很好吃,所以我想知道我是否可以卖掉它。@p9 如果你让我弄来... 90仙人掌果,我会支付你30,000信用点 作为报酬。 我听说了泰隆 非常擅长收割植物。 你可以先问问他们。

English: I've found you some Opuntia Cactus Fruit
Chinese (simplified): 我给你带来了一些Opuntia Cactus Fruit

English: Ah yes, this is exactly what I was after!\nYou have no idea how much you've helped me. Please, take these vegetables as a bonus.\nThey're too ugly to sell, but I can guarantee the quality!
Chinese (simplified): 啊是,这正是我想要的!\n你不知道你帮了我多少。 请收下这些蔬菜作为奖励。\n他们 太难卖了,但我可以保证质量!

English: <color=#ffffff>Oh no, i'm afraid I have no more jobs for you to do.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks again for your help!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>哦不,我恐怕没有更多工作要你做。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>再次感谢你的帮助!</color>

English: Welcome to Grimgar's Garden!\nWe're currently having a sale on seedlings, saplings, hydroponics units and everything for your very own garden! Get yours today!\nSo what can I get you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎格林加的花园!\n我们目前正在出售苗木、树苗、水培装置和一切适合您的东西 自己的花园! 今天你可以随意挑选!\n那么我今天能给你什么?

English: Be careful if you're growing Pentaxid Crystals!\nThey're not like regular plants, though they DO need a good supply of nutrients to form strong fusionable material, they also draw power from your ship's grid to accelerate their growth.\nMore than that, they're highly radioactive and will harm any regular plants around them.
Chinese (simplified): 种植时要小心水晶!\n它们与普通植物不同,虽然它们确实需要充足的养分来形成强大的可融合材料,但它们也会从你的舰船网格中汲取能量来加速它们的生长。 color>\n不仅如此,它们还具有 高放射性 并且会伤害任何 他们周围的常规植物。

English: Although Polaris and the Trade Federation both have greenhouses for growing and selling unique plants and crops for medicinal use, you should never overlook the Tal'on.\nThere are a lot of weird and wonderful plants that can't be grown, in which case it's up to the Tal'on to hunt them in the wild.
Chinese (simplified): 尽管极星和贸易联邦都有温室种植和销售用于药用的独特植物和作物,你绝不能忽视塔隆。\n有很多奇特的植物是无法种植的,这种情况下,就轮到塔隆去野外狩猎它们了。

English: The scars left behind by The Legacy from the War of Silence are as fresh today as they were centuries ago.\nIrradiated places left where Infectors slammed into a planet's surface and corrupted everything they touched...@p9\nEven today, the plantlife in those places is warped beyond all recognition. Even with the controlling mind gone, they continue to spit out radioactive detritus that turns into storms of radioactive fallout.
Chinese (simplified): 遗留者在沉默之战中留下的痕迹,就像几个世纪前一样,至今仍然清晰可见。\n辐射之地,是感染者撞击行星表面并腐蚀了他们所触及的一切的地方...@p9\n即使到了今天,那些地方的植物生命已经扭曲得无法辨认。即使控制它们的心智已经消失,它们仍然继续喷发出放射性碎片,这些碎片转变成放射性尘埃的风暴。

English: Need work?\nWell... we probably have a job in the greenhouses, but not here.\nActually I think I might have something...
Chinese (simplified): 需要工作吗?\n嗯……我们可能在温室里有份工作,但这里没有。\n其实我觉得我可能有什么事情...

English: A number of the seedlings in the store aren't looking so good. I won't be able to sell them if they get any worse, but the problem seems to be poor soil quality. Can you fetch me 50 Bottles of Nitrogen? It should be enough to solve the problem. I'll pay you 20,000 credits for your help.
Chinese (simplified): 店里的一些苗看起来不太好。\n如果它们变得更糟,我将无法出售它们,但是问题似乎是土壤质量不佳,这会导致情况恶化。你能帮我弄来50瓶氮气吗? 这应该就可以解决问题了。\n如果您提供帮助我会支付你20000信用点 。

English: A number of the seedlings in the store aren't looking so good. I won't be able to sell them if they get any worse, but the problem seems to be poor soil quality. Can you fetch me 600 Sulfur? It should be enough to solve the problem. I'll pay you 35,000 credits for your help.
Chinese (simplified): 店里的一些苗看起来不太好。\n如果它们变得更糟,我将无法出售它们,但是问题似乎是土壤质量不佳,这会导致情况恶化。你能帮我弄来600 硫磺? 这应该就可以解决问题了.\n如果您提供帮助我会支付你35000信用点 .
我已经给你带来了一些硫磺

English: Some of our home greenhouses that supply us with fresh saplings, herbs and a variety of ornamental plants have suddenly been having trouble. They suspect the groundwater is being poisoned, but they don't have proof.@p9 Do you think you can check a number of factories for any sort of Toxic Waste that they can test against the water they're drawing up from below ground? If you can find a source of Toxic Waste. Preferrably 20 barrels of the stuff, they can see if there's a match.
Chinese (simplified): 一家为我们提供新鲜树苗、药草和各种观赏植物的家庭温室突然有了麻烦。 他们怀疑地下水被污染了 ,但他们找不到原因。@p9 你认为试试检查许多工厂是否有任何种类的 有毒废物并且试着用从地下抽取的水进行测试 如果你能找到来源 有毒废物。 最好是20桶这个数量,这样就可以看看是否有匹配。

English: I've brought you some Toxic Waste I found
Chinese (simplified): 我已经给你带来了一些我找到的有毒废水

English: You've really helped me out here!\nSo in addition to your payment for the job, please take this Fertilizer. I hope you'll put it to good use!
Chinese (simplified): 你真的帮了我大忙!\n所以除了你的工作报酬,还请收下这些肥料

English: <color=#ffffff>Oh no, i'm afraid I have no more jobs for you to do.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks again for your help!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>哦不,我恐怕没有更多工作要你做。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>再次感谢你的帮助!</color>

English: Welcome to Market Cafe Bar and Grill!\nWe have everything from burgers to salads, even some unique in-store dishes that you can't get anywhere else!\nSo what can I get you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎 Market Cafe Bar and Grill!\n从汉堡到沙拉,我们应有尽有,甚至还有一些独特的店内菜肴让你不用再去其他任何地方!\n所以我今天能给你什么服务?

English: Don't just ignore what's on our menu! We've got a selection of high-quality foods not seen anywhere else! Each one has a unique status effect that could mean the difference between life and death!\nThere are other foods and drinks out there that have special abilities too.
Chinese (simplified): 不要忽视我们菜单上的内容! 我们精选了其他地方没有的优质食品! 每一个都有一个独特的状态效果在战场上,这可能意味着生死之别!\n 还有其他食物和饮料也有特殊能力。

English: High quality foods that are complex and difficult to make provide better nutrition and prolonged beneficial effects over poor quality foods.\nCheeseburgers, Pizza, Fruit Pie and Cake are all High-Quality Foods.
Chinese (simplified): 复杂且难以制作的优质食品比劣质食品提供更好的营养和持久的有益效果。\n芝士汉堡、披萨、水果派 和 Cake 都是优质食品.

English: If you find a merchant offering you some weird plants or food you've never seen, it's worth buying some in case it's needed somewhere else or has some hidden health benefits.@p9\nI know that no one ever eats Varon Root, Spiky Mushrooms or Brafus Fungi, but have you seen what they do? Some of them are like instant-use medkits! They're amazing!
Chinese (simplified): 如果您发现商家为您提供一些您从未见过的奇怪植物或食物,那么值得购买一些以防其他地方需要或有一些隐藏的健康益处。@p9 \n我知道 没有人 吃过 瓦隆,尖刺蘑菇或者布拉弗斯真菌根,但是你有没有发现他们能够做成什么? 比如一些即时使用的医疗包! 这玩意太棒了!

English: I'm afraid all positions in-house have been taken and we're accepting no employees at this time.\nI do have one small job I was going to get a freelancer to do, but I suppose I can give it to you instead.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕所有内部职位都已被占用,我们目前不接受任何员工。\n不过我确实有一个小工作,我本来打算找一个自由职业者做的,但我想我可以把它交给你。

English: We're running low on salt because no one has been shipping any to this station and it's absolutely vital for all our cooking!\nI'm offering better than the normal market prices for 660 salt.\nI'm ordering in excess because I don't want to be caught with my pants down next time our shipments don't come through.
Chinese (simplified): 我们库存中的盐分很低,因为没有人向这个站运送任何东西,但是这对我们所有的烹饪来说绝对是至关重要的!\n我需要你提供更多的 660 盐我会以正常市场价格更高的价格收购。\n我会多订购一些,因为我不想在下次我们的货物没有通过时遇到麻烦。

English: We have a number of 'fine diners' that are always asking for rare ingredients and most of the time I have no idea where to get anything they ask for. If I don't cater to them, they'll ruin my shop's reputation!@p9 The latest one of their demands is slow-roasted Blue Pepper! Where would you even find a Blue Pepper? And the recipe calls for THREE of them! If by some miracle you can find them, i'll pay 13,000 credits each!
Chinese (simplified): 我们有许多“高级食客”,他们总是需要稀有食材,而大多数时候我不知道从哪里可以买到他们要的东西。 但是如果我不迎合他们,他们会毁了我店的名声!@p9 他们最新的要求是慢烤蓝胡椒! 你会去哪里呢找到 a 蓝胡椒? 并且配方需要 三个 ! 如果 你能奇迹般的找到它们,我会付出13,000 信用点每个的报酬!

English: I managed to track down three Blue Peppers

I have a party of 'influencers' reserved for next week. I would've refused them if i'd known when they made the reservation since they've made some of the dumbest requests i've ever heard of! Gods of Empyrion, I hope they all die in a shuttle crash!@p9 Anyway, they're going to be a pain my ass unless I can get rid of them without issue, but they've made some ridiculous demands. Ahax Fruit Ice Cream for dessert? Where do you even GET ahax fruit?@p9 I thought they'd come from Ahax Plants, but no. It's a different Ahax plant. What I want from you is to track down where one can find the real Ahax Fruit and bring me hmmm... 30 of them. I'll pay you 15,000 credits for them if you can find them.
Chinese (simplified): 我下周为一群‘网红’预订了派对。如果我知道他们在预订时会提出一些我听过的最愚蠢的要求,我本会拒绝他们的! Empyrion的诸神啊,我希望他们都在穿梭机坠毁中死去!@p9 无论如何,除非我能在不引起问题的情况下摆脱他们,否则他们将成为我的麻烦,但他们提出了一些荒谬的要求。 阿哈克斯水果冰淇淋作为甜点?你甚至在哪里可以得到阿哈克斯水果?@p9 我以为它们来自阿哈克斯植物,但不。它是不同的阿哈克斯植物。 我想让你找到真正的阿哈克斯水果在哪里可以找到,并带给我嗯...30个。如果你能找到它们,我会支付你15,000信用点。

English: I've found some Ahax Fruit for you
You have no idea how much this helps! Trust me. You have no idea how bad the headache i've gotten from this problem's been.\nHere's take this Ziraxian Salad, on the house. You've earned it.
Chinese (simplified): 你无法想象这帮了我多大的忙!相信我,你无法想象这个问题给我带来的头痛有多严重。\n这是给你的齐拉克沙拉,免费。你值得拥有。

English: <color=#ffffff>Nope, you've taken care of the only job I needed your help with.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks again for that!</color>
Chinese (simplified): 不,你已经完成了我唯一需要你帮助的工作。\n再次感谢!没问题

English: Welcome to M.A Corp Industrial Supply.\nWe're a subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp, but don't hold that against us! We currently have deals on mining equipment and refined metals.. How may I assist you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到 M.A Corp 工业供应商。\n我们是 极星巨型企业 的子公司,但不要因此迁怒于我们!现在购买采矿设备和精炼金属享有优惠.. 今天我可以为您提供什么帮助?

English: We supply industrial mining rigs all across the galaxy.\nUnfortunately, Industrial Mining Equipment can't be sold over the counter. We can't stock it since it's just too big.@p9\nIt's one of those things you have to get from one of the manufacturers like P3: Polaris Planetside Production or Non-Linear Productions. They're always in demand since drills wear out fast.
Chinese (simplified): 我们供应了全银河的工业钻机\n不幸的是,工业采矿设备不能在柜台销售。 我们不能存货,因为它太大了。@p9 \n这是您必须从其中一家制造商那里获得的东西之一 P3: Polaris Planetside Production 或者 Non-Linear Productions. 由于钻头磨损很快,因此它们总是很受欢迎。.

English: There are a variety of odd resources out there that all have good markets in different places. But they're not the kind of thing you can find in ore deposits like Iron and Copper. I'm talking about commodity resources like Graphite, Sulfur and Salt.@p9 Graphite can be found in asteroids and some darker surface rocks on planets. Sulfur can be mined out of most volcanic rocks. Salt can be mined out of cliffs and beaches around oceans, as well as the ocean floor.
Chinese (simplified): 那里有各种各样的奇特资源,它们在不同的地方都有很好的市场。 但它们不是您可以在铁和铜等矿床中找到的那种东西。 我说的是像石墨, 硫磺 和 盐.@p9 石墨 可以在小行星和行星上一些较暗的地表岩石中找到。 硫磺 可以从大多数火山岩中开采。 盐 可以从周围的悬崖和海滩中开采 海洋,以及海底。

English: Salt is a big seller among food and chemical companies. Graphite is in high demand at electrical and thermal factories. Sulfur is used by pharmaceutical, agricultural and ammunition producers and factories.@p9 In fact, I believe InterWeapon Manufacturing has a standing offer to trade Sulfur for Nitrocellulose at a very good ratio. You might want to check that out...
Chinese (simplified): 盐是食品和化工公司中的重要销售商品。 石墨在电气和热能工厂需求很高。 硫磺被制药、农业和弹药生产商及工厂使用。@p9 事实上,我相信InterWeapon 制造有一个固定的交易提议,用硫磺交换硝化棉,比例非常优惠。 你可能想要查一查这个...

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid that we're not hiring any new employees at this time.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're interested in a freelance job contract, I do have something that needs doing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恐怕我们目前不会招聘任何新员工。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果您对自由职业合同感兴趣,我确实有事情需要做。</color>

English: M.A Corp operates it's own set of asteroid mining crafts but recently they've been striking out on asteroid surveys. Initially we thought it was bad luck, until we sent a mining craft to an already-surveyed site and the asteroids there were gone. Not mined out, gone. As though they'd been moved.@p9 This doesn't seem like the kind of thing that pirates would do, which means we have a third-party competition stealing asteroids instead of mining them, but we need proof that they're violating business practice before we can do anything.@p9 What I need you to do is find one of the common communication satellites in orbit around the sun and hack it's logs and bring the Communication Data back to me. Polaris has authorized me to pay you 64,000 credits for the data.
Chinese (simplified): M.A Corp一直以来都只是运营者他们自己的小行星开采飞船,但是最近他们开始在小行星勘测方面遇到了一些麻烦. 一开始我们以为那只是运气不好,但是有一次我们往已经勘测过的小行星发送飞船时,发现它竟然消失了. 不是挖完了, 是凭空蒸发了. 就好像有人把它移走了一样.@p9 这看起来可不像是 海盗 会做的事, 这也就意味着有个第三方的竞争者直接从我们手上偷走而非盗挖了这颗小行星,但是在我们采取实质行动之前必须有证据证明他们违反了行规.@p9 你要做的就是在恒星的轨道附近找到一颗 common communication satellites,黑了它的日志然后把 通讯数据 带给我. 极星 已经授权我给你 64000 信用点 的报酬.

English: M.A Corp has recently lost track of one of it's mining crafts in a nearby system. They haven't reported in, but are continuing to receive their paychecks from Polaris.@p9 I've been tasked with finding out whether they're still working, gone rogue, or have been taken by pirates. The only way to find out whether or not they're working is to check their personal work shift logs recorded on all Polaris Ships.@p9 What I need you to do is find one of the common communication satellites in orbit around the sun and hack it's logs and bring the Work Shift Data back to me. Polaris has authorized me to pay you 60,000 credits for the data.
Chinese (simplified): M.A Corp 最近在附近的星系里丢了一艘采矿船. 尽管说它们没有报道,但却一直在从极星@p9 收取薪水. 我的任务就是要查明它们究竟是还在工作,叛逃了,又或者是被海盗弄走了. 唯一能确定他们到底是不是还在工作的办法就是去查查极星飞船上所有人的工作日志.@p9 而你要做的就是在恒星的轨道附近找到一颗 common communication satellites,黑了它的日志然后把轮班数据 带给我. 极星 已经授权我拿到数据后给你 60000 信用点 的报酬.

English: As you may know, M.A Corp is a subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp. Despite breaking away from the Trade Guild, both M.A Corp and Polaris are still subject to the Galactic Index of the Trade Guild. A bad year could spell disaster for us in the Index.@p9 That's why we need to get ahead of the competition and get our hands on the economic data before it makes it's way to The Prologue and is entered into the Index and find out our standing and maneuver ahead of potential disaster.@p9 What I need you to do is find one of the common communication satellites in orbit around the sun and hack it's logs and bring the Economic Data back to me. Polaris has authorized me to pay you 80,000 credits for the data.
Chinese (simplified): 也许你已经知道了, M.A Corp 是 极星巨型企业的子公司之一. 尽管说脱离了 贸易协会, M.A Corp 和 极星 都依然依附于贸易协会的 星系指数. 一年的营收欠佳就可能为我们的指数带来灾难.@p9 这也是为什么我们要先手去搞到 经济数据,这些东西会被送去 序言 然后录入 指数 之中,这样就可以在潜在的灾难发生之前知道我们的状态并且提前规避.@p9 而你要做的就是在恒星的轨道附近找到一颗common communication satellites,黑了它的日志然后把经济数据 带给我. 极星 已经授权我拿到数据后给你 80000 信用点 的报酬.

English: We have dozens of company-owned mining rigs and facilities across the galaxy, but we're having trouble with a few of our newest mining rigs. It seems that the planets in this system formed with a layer of extremely dense granite not far below the surface and it's stopping the drills.@p9 What I need you to do is find one of the Exploration Satellites in orbit around the sun and hack it's system and bring the Geological Data back to me. Polaris has authorized me to pay you 100,000 credits for the data.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的公司在全星系拥有数十个矿钻和设施,但我们最新的矿钻遇到了一些问题. I似乎这个星系中的行星在地表以下不远的地方形成了一层极其致密的花岗岩,挡住了钻头.@p9 而你要做的就是在恒星的轨道附近找到一颗 Exploration Satellites,黑了它的日志然后把地质数据 带给我. 极星 已经授权我拿到数据后给你 100000 信用点 的报酬.

English: We have dozens of company-owned mining rigs and facilities across the galaxy, but we're having trouble with a few of our newest mining rigs. Most of these planets have been surveyed by independent surveyors, but these individuals refuse to sell the results of their exploits.@p9 They're not miners themselves. They sell their surveys to the highest bidder, but they're refusing all overtures from our parent company, Polaris Megacorp. We believe they're instead selling the rights to pirate companies.@p9 What I need you to do is find one of the Exploration Satellites in orbit around the sun and hack it's system and bring the Planetary Resource Data back to me. Polaris has authorized me to wire you 150,000 credits directly into your account for the data.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的公司在全星系拥有数十个矿钻和设施,但我们最新的矿钻遇到了一些问题. 这些行星中的大多数都由独立测量员进行了调查,但这些人拒绝出售他们的探索成果.@p9 他们自己不是矿工,而是把调查结果卖给出价最高的人,但他们拒绝了我们母公司,也就是极星巨型企业的所有提议. 我们认为他们是在向海盗公司出售这些数据.@p9 而你要做的就是在恒星的轨道附近找到一颗 Exploration Satellites,黑了它的日志然后把Planetary Resource Data 带给我. 极星已经授权我拿到数据后直接把150000 信用点转入你的账户.

English: On behalf of Polaris Megacorp, and M.A Corp I offer you our heartfelt thanks for going above and beyond what many other contractors are willing to do for our company.\nAs such, I have added a 400 Reputation bonus with your Polaris Megacorp account.
Chinese (simplified): 谨代表极星巨型企业,以及M.A Corp我衷心感谢您为我们公司做出了远超许多其他承包商意愿的贡献.\n因此,我在你的极星账户中添加了额外的 400声望 .

English: I'm afraid M.A Corp is not accepting any new employees at this time and we have no more freelance contract jobs available.\nYou may want to try P3: Polaris Planetside Production.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕 M.A Corp 目前不接受任何新员工,我们 没有更多的自由合同工作了。\n你不妨试试P3:极星星球边缘生产公司.

English: Welcome honorable customer to the Gold Standard! Would you like to see our showroom or our catalogue? We have many great deals here, yes? If you've ordered one of the limited edition Boyband posters, I'm afraid we're no longer licensed to sell them. Now how may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎尊贵的客户使用黄金标准! 您想看看我们的陈列室或目录吗? 我们这里有很多超值优惠,是吗? 如果您订购了一张限量版 Boyband 海报,恐怕我们不再获得销售许可。 color> 现在有什么可以帮助您的吗?

English: Our luxury goods are in high demand in many settlements and housing facilities. There's not much need for luxury on a dig site or a military base.\nIt's all about knowing where your products are wanted.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的奢侈品在许多地方需求量很大比如定居点和住房设施 . 挖掘现场或军事基地并不需要奢侈品。\n关键是要知道您的产品在哪里需要。

English: <color=#ffffff>Posters are a great way to cover an empty wall in an emptier room. It makes a good point of interest if you can't come up with anything to fill a room or blank space with.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>海报是在空荡荡的房间里覆盖空墙的好方法。 如果你想不出任何东西来填充房间或空白空间,这是一个很好的兴趣点。</color>

English: Not many people know this but many of those Decorative Consoles and Indoor Plants can be placed on small vessels and hover vehicles.\nI don't know why it hasn't caught on, considering it's a good way to spruce up their drab interiors.
Chinese (simplified): 不是很多人知道,许多这些装饰性控制台和室内植物可以放置在小型飞船和悬浮车辆上。\n我不知道为什么它没有流行起来,考虑到这是装饰它们单调内饰的好方法。

English: I'm afraid all positions in-house have been taken and we're accepting no employees at this time.\nI do have one small job I was going to get a freelancer to do, but I suppose I can give it to you instead.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕所有内部职位都已被占用,我们目前不接受任何员工。\n我确实有一个小工作,我本来打算找一个自由职业者来做,但我想我可以把它交给你。

English: We have a constant demand of raw materials of high quality. Both here and at our factories. We can never get enough leather and it's driving head office up the wall when we have to explain that there's more demand than supply.@p9 What we need right now is a shipment of high-quality leather. None of that synthetic crap that Constructors make out of carbon composite. Just 50 bolts of supple, well-treated, high-quality Leather. I'll pay 25,000 credits for just one shipment.
Chinese (simplified): 我们对高品质原材料的需求不断。 在这里和我们的工厂都是如此。 我们永远无法获得足够的皮革,当我们不得不解释需求大于供应时,这让总部陷入困境。@p9 我们现在需要的是一批优质皮革。 建造器用碳复合材料制造的那些合成垃圾都不是。 只是50 柔软、处理良好、优质的皮革。 我将支付 25,000 信用点 一次发货。

English: I've brought you a shipment of leather

We at Gold Standard have been using gold in many of our highest quality products. This may have been a mistake as gold is soft and prone to deformation. We're thinking about using platinum in some of our goods that see wear and tear.@p9 We've been having trouble procuring enough platinum to make more than a cursory attempt at the gold standard refridgerators, which need platinum for the hinges. Bring me 250 Platinum Ingots and you will be paid accordingly.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在黄金标准在我们许多最高品质的产品中一直使用黄金。 这可能是一个错误,因为黄金很软且容易变形。 我们正在考虑在我们的一些磨损的商品中使用铂金。@p9 我们一直在努力采购足够的铂金,而不是草率地尝试黄金,铰链需要铂金。 给我250白锭你会得到相应的报酬。

English: We have a very exclusive clientele here at Gold Standard. One of our patrons has been very interested in getting his hands on some authetic ancient relics to put on display at his beach house.@p9 It's been rather difficult to acquire the necessary relics without them being seized by Ghy'st Security Forces. What I need from you is to find me 10 Ancient Relics and you'll be paid accordingly. Not in cash.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在 Gold Standard 拥有非常独特的客户。 我们的一位顾客非常有兴趣获得一些真正的古代遗物,以便在他的海滨别墅展出。@p9 在不被 Ghy'st 安全部队没收的情况下获得必要的遗物是相当困难的。 我需要你帮我弄来 10 件古代遗物,您将获得相应的报酬。 不是现金.

English: I've managed to dig up some ancient relics.
Chinese (simplified): 我设法挖掘了一些古代遗迹.

English: Yes, well. Your efforts are appreciated.\nPlease take your payment and a few bottles of our signature Gold Standard Whiskey.
Chinese (simplified): 是,好吧。 感谢您的努力。\n请收下您的付款和几瓶我们的签名黄金标准威士忌.

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid all positions in-house have been taken and we're accepting no employees at this time.</color>
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕所有内部职位都已被占用,我们目前不接受任何员工。\n不过我确实有一个小工作,我本来打算找一个自由职业者做的,但我想我可以把它交给你。

English: This is Gold Standard's warehouse and workshop.\nWe don't typically do sales here except in bulk to furnish art shows and high class venues. Normally, you'd go through one of the Gold Standard Showrooms.\nI'll try my best, but it's not really my job.
Chinese (simplified): 这是 Gold Standard 的仓库和车间。\n我们通常不在这里进行销售,除了批量提供艺术展览和高 职业场地。 通常情况下,您会经过其中一间黄金标准展厅。\n我会尽力而为,但这不是我的工作。

English: This is Gold Standard's warehouse and workshop.\nWe don't typically do sales here except in bulk to furnish art shows and high class venues. Normally, you'd go through one of the Gold Standard Showrooms.\nUnfortunately, everyone's quit so I can't even open up.
Chinese (simplified): 这是 Gold Standard 的仓库和车间。\n我们通常不在这里进行销售,只是批量提供艺术展览和专业场地。 通常情况下,您会经过其中一间黄金标准展厅。\n不幸的是,那个展厅每个人都退出了,所以我甚至无法打开。

English: <color=#ffffff>I've managed to bring in one of the guys, so we can open up the warehouse but we're still short on people and even shorter on materials and supplies.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're serious about helping me out, I can't exactly turn you down.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我已经设法把其中一个人带了进来,这样我们就可以打开仓库了,但我们仍然缺少人手,甚至材料和用品都短缺。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你真的想帮助我,我不能完全拒绝你。</color>

English: Thanks for all your help... It's not much but we keep an emergency fund for this kind of thing, so please accept this payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits and i'll forward a request for {RepCounter} Reputation for your account with Polaris.@p9 This is all Gold Standard's fault. So i'm throwing in some free merchandise, so they can foot some of the bill for once. Thanks again!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的帮助... 虽然不多,但是我们为这种事情准备了应急基金,所以请收下这笔款项 {MoneyCounter} 信用点 我会转发一个< {RepCounter} color=#ffbb00>信誉 为您的帐户添加 极星声望.@p9 这都是 黄金标准 的错。 所以我扔了一些免费商品,这样他们就可以一次性买单。 再次感谢!

English: We've got only a couple of people actively working after most of them quit over the conditions. I can't get them back unless we can improve the conditions in the workshop and the warehouse.@p9 What I need from you is to get: x40 Filters x30 Heat Exchangers To make the temperatures and air quality bearable for the staff (and me) in here.
Chinese (simplified): 我们只有少数人在积极工作,大多数人因条件原因辞职了。 除非我们能改善车间和仓库的条件,否则我无法让这些员工回来。@p9 我需要你做的是得到:x40 过滤器 x30 热交换器 为了让这里的工作人员(和我)可以忍受温度和空气质量。

English: We've got only a couple of people actively working after most of them quit over the conditions. We have a few of our craftsment back in the workshop, but the ones who quit took most of the materials with them.@p9 We're still missing: x50 Leather x200 Gold Coins that are used in a dozen of Gold Standard's signature furniture pieces.
Chinese (simplified): 我们只有少数人在积极工作,大多数人因条件原因辞职了。 除非我们能改善车间和仓库的条件,否则我无法让这些员工回来.@p9 我们仍然需要: x50 皮革 x200 金币 用来采购一些Gold Standard's 标志性家具.

English: When the floor manager skipped town after everyone quit he locked all the warehouse's computers so we can't contact head office or access the warehouse's funds to pay for anything.@p9 I need you to find me some less than legal software that I can use to crack the security on his computer. x1 Hacking Software: Overclock Should do the job. I'll be able to pay you for helping me out and pay to get the conditions improved and the crew rehired.
Chinese (simplified): 当区域经理在所有人离开后也离开了设施,他锁了所有仓库的计算机,所以我们不能联系总部或使用仓库的资金来支付任何东西。@p9 我需要你给我找一些不合法的软件,我可以用来破解他计算机上的安全性。 x1 黑客软件:Overclock 应该能胜任。 我会付钱给你帮助我,并付钱让条件得到改善并重新雇用船员。

English: When the conditions in the workshop became intolerable, a few of the staff sabotaged several of the machines. Even if we get the place fully staffed again, we can't produce anything without those machines up and running again.@p9 I'm just a warehouse worker, i'm not cut out for a management job. But I need the job, so I have to step up and get everything sorted out and running. I'm not sure where you can get them from, but what I do know we need is:@p9 x5 Spare Parts x5 Power Coils x30 Motors x250 Mechanical Components I'll use the company funds to pay you for everything you get me.
Chinese (simplified): 当车间的条件变得无法忍受时,一些工作人员破坏了几台机器。 即使我们再次让这个地方满员,如果没有那些机器启动并再次运行中,我们也无法生产任何东西。@p9 我只是一个仓库工人,我是 不适合管理工作。 但是我需要这份工作,所以我必须站出来,把所有的事情都整理好,然后运行中。 我不知道你可以从哪里得到它们,但我知道 我们需要的是:@p9 x5 零件 x5 能源线圈 x30马达 x250机械元件 我会用公司的资金来支付你得到的一切。

English: When the conditions in the workshop became intolerable, most of the staff eventually quit and took the food in the fridges with them. Those fridges were meant to supply all the workers at the warehouse and workshop and we need them back.@p9 I'll reimburse you double for it, but can you get me: x100 Coffee x100 Cookies x100 Sandwiches To keep us going and hopefully entice those still on the fence.
Chinese (simplified): 当车间的条件变得无法忍受时,大多数员工最终辞职,并带走了冰箱里的食物。那些冰箱本应供应仓库和车间的所有工人,我们需要它们回来。@p9 我会双倍偿还你,但你能帮我弄到: x100 咖啡 x100 饼干 x100 三明治 为了让我们继续前进,希望吸引那些还在犹豫的人。

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought some food for the fridges</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经为冰箱带来了一些食物</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>You've really helped us out here!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Everything is back to normal and running great! We're still short a couple of people, but they're not vital.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'm sure we'll get a few new hires in the next couple of days.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你真的帮了我们大忙!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>一切恢复正常,运行中很棒! 我们仍然缺少几个人,但他们并不重要。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我相信我们会在接下来的几天内招聘到一些新员工.</color>

English: This is only a small spaceport, not much need for anything more than some maintenance equipment and replacement parts.\nDon't let the logo fool you, I was hired by the Trade Guild.\nSo what can I do ya for?
Chinese (simplified): 这只是一个小型的太空港,除了一些维修设备和替换组件外,不需要太多东西。\n别让标志骗了你,我被Trade Guild雇佣。\n所以我能为你做什么?

English: <color=#ffffff>This is only a small spaceport, not much need for anything more than some maintenance equipment and replacement parts.</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>After some idiot did a rough landing, we've had to shut down while we repair the platform and restock the supplies.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>这只是一个小型的太空港,除了一些维修设备和替换组件外,不需要太多东西。</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>有个白痴在降落过程中遇到了麻烦,我们不得不在维修平台和补给物资时关闭太空港。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Okay, the Spaceport's open for business again.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I still need to replace the parts and supplies that were used, so I still need some help here if you're willing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>好的,太空港又开始营业了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我还需要更换用过的零件和耗材,所以如果您愿意我这里还需要一些帮助。</color>

English: This'll help get the platform back in shape.\nHere's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits for the materials and manpower. I've also credited your account with the head office with {RepCounter} Reputation.\nThanks for your help on this, pal.
Chinese (simplified): 这将有助于让平台恢复原状。\n这是你{MoneyCounter} 信用点的报酬,用于材料和人力。我还在你的总部账户上增加了{RepCounter} 声望。\n谢谢你这次的帮助,伙计。

English: I need to repair the platform itself. That's not gonna be cheap or easy, since not only do I need a strong material for resurfacing the platform, and I need to repair the lifter that was hammered into the ground.@p9 I should be able to do it with: x250 Sathium Plates x3 Spare Parts I know Hostile Apparatus sells the parts, P3 too. Though it's polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要修复平台本身。 这既不便宜也不容易,因为我不仅需要一种坚固的材料来重铺平台,而且我还需要修理被锤击到地面的升降机。@p9 我应该可以这样做: x250 钑板 x3 备用零件 我知道(Hostile Apparatus)敌意装置公司卖零件,P3也是。 虽然是极星。

English: In order to get that guy out of here, I had to use all my spare Large Plasma Thrusters to get him spaceworthy.\nI need replacements... I think 5 Small Plasma Jet Thrusters (SV) will do it.\nThink you can resupply me?
Chinese (simplified): 为了把那家伙弄走,我不得不用掉我所有的备用大型等离子推进器让他能够太空航行。\n我需要替换品...我认为5个小型等离子喷射推进器(SV)就足够了。\n你能帮我补货吗?

English: When that guy crash landed onto the pad, he'd taken some serious damage to put him down here. The lifter on the pad took the brunt of the landing and was badly damaged. In order to reach the underside of the ship, I had to use the robotic arms to tilt the ship.@p9 Those arms weren't designed to lift an entire ship, so they're completely ruined and I need a complete replacement set. I need 4 Robotics that you can get from Hostile Apparatus Robotics. Don't worry about the cost, i'll pay you back and bill the crap out of that lunatic.
Chinese (simplified): 当那个家伙撞到停机坪上时,他受了重伤并且摔在这里。 停机坪上的升降机在着陆时首当其冲,受损严重。 为了到达船底,我不得不使用机械臂倾斜飞船。@p9 那些臂不是设计用来举起整艘船的,所以它们已经完全损坏了,我需要一套完整的替换组件。 我需要4个机械设备你可以从(Hostile Apparatus)敌意装置公司机械设备采购。 不用担心费用,我会还给你,然后把那个疯子弄走。

English: When that guy crash landed onto the pad, he'd taken some serious damage to put him down here. He wasn't going anywhere without a shield generator, so I fitted him with one I had in storage. Turns out that was the last one I had.@p9 I have no idea where the other one I had was, but now i'm short an emergency shield generator. Think you can get me a Standard Shield Generator (SV) to replace the emergency-use one? I'll pay 20,000 credits for the help.
Chinese (simplified): 当那家伙坠毁在停机坪上时,他受到了严重的损伤,把他带到了这里。没有护盾发生器,他哪儿也去不了,所以我给他装了一个我库存中的护盾发生器。 结果发现那是我最后一个了。@p9 我不知道我另一个护盾发生器在哪里,但现在我缺少一个应急用的护盾发生器。 你觉得你能帮我弄一个标准护盾发生器(SV)来替换那个应急用的吗? 我会为此支付20,000信用点作为帮助的报酬。
