握把: 狙击手手枪握把 (提高精确度和后坐力)
握把: 补偿后坐力手枪握把 (大幅改善后坐力)
机匣: 轻型手枪机匣 (提高精确度 - 增加后坐力)
机匣: 重型手枪机匣 (改善后坐力)
机匣: 电磁手枪机匣 (增加伤害 - 增加后坐力)

English: You want me to switch out the grip for this one? Sure thing, just give me a minute to fit it to your gun. Don't try this at home, kid.@p8 ...@p8 Done!@w5 I've added a {ModSelection} to your weapon. It should be more comfortable than what you had one there, which I wasn't able to salvage. Come see me again if you want to replace it with something else.
Chinese (simplified): 您想要我更换这个的握把吗?当然,给我一分钟时间就可以安装到您的枪上。 孩子,不要在家里尝试这个。@p8 ...@p8 完成!@w5 我给您的武器添加了一个{ModSelection}。它应该比您之前的那个更舒适,我无法回收。 如果您想更换其他东西,请再次来找我。

English: Alright, give me a second to switch out the barrel. It'll only take a few seconds for me. Don't try this at home, kid.@p8 ...@p8 Done!@w5 I've swapped out the barrel of your weapon for {ModSelection}, which should last until you want it changed out again.@w4 I wasn't able to salvage the barrel you originally had on there though. Come see me again if you want to change something else.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,给我一秒钟换一下枪管。只需要几秒钟。 孩子,不要在家里尝试这个。@p8 ...@p8 完成!@w5 我已经将您的武器的枪管更换为{ModSelection},这应该可以使用,直到您想要再次更换。@w4 不过,我无法回收您原来安装的那个枪管。 如果您想更换其他东西,请再次来找我。

English: This is gonna be a harder job than switching out the barrel. I'll need to take the whole thing apart. This is one of those things you leave to the professionals.@p8 ...@p8 Done!@w5 I had to cut some of the original parts away in order to install your {ModSelection}. Hate tell you that there's no way to salvage the frame you had on there, but this one should be better than ever. If you want to attach a better frame, come see me again!
Chinese (simplified): 这将是一项比更换枪管还要困难的工作。我需要把整个东西拆开。 这是那些你留给专业人士做的事情。@p8 ...@p8 完成!@w5 我不得不切除一些原始部件以安装你的{ModSelection}。遗憾地告诉你,没有办法回收你之前安装的框架,但这个新的应该会比以前更好。 如果你想安装一个更好的框架,再来找我!
