English:
<color=#ffffff>Weapons and some ammunitions can be customized with the weapon locker's workbench using weapon modification kits found in containers or looted from enemies.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Weapons have 3 Slots for modifications. </color><color=#ff0000>If you apply another mod that goes in that slot, the existing modification is destroyed</color><color=#ffffff>.@p9</color>
<color=#ffffff>Modifications attached to a weapon will be stored in your suit's logistics buffer and re-applied to any identical weapons you wield, so you don't need to re-mod a new weapon if you lose your existing one.</color>
<color=#ffffff>You must have both the weapon and the modification in your inventory for the table to recognize it.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>武器和一些弹药可以通过武器储物柜的工作台使用在容器中找到或从敌人那里掠夺的武器改装套件进行定制。</color>
<color=#ffffff>武器有3个插槽用于改装。 </color><color=#ff0000>如果你应用了另一个占用该插槽的改装,现有的改装将被销毁</color><color=#ffffff>。@p9 </color>
<color=#ffffff>附加在武器上的改装将存储在你的服装物流缓冲区中,并重新应用于你持有的任何相同武器,所以你不需要重新改装一把新武器,如果你失去了你现有的武器。</color>
<color=#ffffff>你必须同时拥有武器和改装在你的库存中,桌子才能识别它。</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nLooks like the wreckage of a UCH Frigate.@w4\nThere's a data port here, but I have no reason to access it.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n看起来是一艘UCH护卫舰的残骸。@w4 \n这里有一个数据端口,但我没有理由去访问它。

English: @q0[ IDA ]\nIf you would like to know more about the origins of the UCH, The Fleet and The mission, I have uploaded the relevant information to your PDA (F1).@w5\nYou can find in-depth records in the Journeybook Tab of the PDA, and practical information in the Empyriopedia Tab.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ]\n如果你想了解更多关于UCH、舰队和任务的起源,我已经将相关信息上传到你的 PDA (F1)。@w5 \n你可以在PDA的 旅程手册标签中找到深入的记录,在 帝国百科标签中找到实用信息。

English: <color=#ffffff>The container's main compartment appears to be locked with this keypad.\nThe signal seems to be coming from somewhere inside...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>容器的主舱似乎被这个键盘锁定了。\n信号似乎来自内部的某个地方...</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThe container is sealed, to be left undisturbed.
[ {PlayerName} ]\nIt's the keypad to the cargo container's main compartment.@w4\nI have no use for this.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是货柜主舱的键盘。@w4 \n我现在用不到这个。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI have no use for this right now.\nI'm sure there's something else I should be doing...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我现在用不到这个。\n我相信还有别的事情我应该去做……

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nIt's a datapad belonging to a member of the ship's crew.@w5\nI have no use for this right now.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是属于船员的数据板。@w5 \n我现在用不到这个。

English: There appears to be a damaged Datapad used for cargo management among the debris.\nThis must be the source of the signal...
Chinese (simplified): 在残骸中似乎有一个用于货物管理的损坏数据板。\n这一定是信号的来源……

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThe battery's power has run out.@w3\nI have no use for this right now, but i'm sure other survivors may need it.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n电池没电了。@w3 \n我现在用不到这个,但我确信其他幸存者可能需要它。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nIt's the console on a Constructor.@w4\nThere's no power, so there's nothing I can do with it.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是建造机上的控制台。@w4 \n没有电源,所以我无法使用它。
这是海德堡号的桥接控制台……

English: This is the Heidelberg's Bridge Console...@w4\n\nThere's a high probability that activating the console will draw unwanted attention, so I should have an appropriate weapon to defend myself.
Chinese (simplified): 这是海德堡桥控制台...@w4 \n\n激活控制台很有可能会吸引不必要的注意,所以我应该准备一个合适的武器来自卫。

English: Don't have a Rifle: Activate the console anyway?
Chinese (simplified): 没有步枪:还是激活控制台吗?

English: @q0[ Commander {PlayerName} ] So...@w4 It looks like we've got our first lead, Ida.@w3 Somewhere on this planet is a neutral station that our people used to get offworld and regroup with the rest of the fleet@p9 [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w3 However... I was able to verify the cause of the inconsistencies between the physical evidence and the logs left behind by the Heidelberg's crewmembers.@w2 Which will complicate matters significantly.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 指挥官 {PlayerName} ] 那么...@w4 看起来我们已经得到了第一条线索,Ida。@w3 在这个星球上的某个地方有一个中立的站点,我们的人曾经用它来离开这个世界,与舰队的其他部分重新集结@p9 [ IDA ] 是的,指挥官。@w3 然而... 我能够验证海德堡号船员留下的物理证据和日志之间的不一致之处的原因。@w2 这将显著使事情复杂化。

English: Save it for now, IDA. I need to get out of here first. (Skip)
Chinese (simplified): 现在先别说了,IDA。我得先离开这里。 (跳过)

English: @q0[ IDA ] From the level of decay of Sergeant Palant's body and the Runtime of the Logistics Unit, I can confirm with 97% accuracy that 1452 days, or just under 4 years have passed since the Heidelberg crashed.@w4 I... do not know how this is possible, Commander.@p9 [ Commander {PlayerName} ] How could almost FOUR YEARS have passed between us leaving Jupiter's orbit and me arriving here years after everyone else?@w4 Some kind of side-effect of traveling through the Rift?@w2 Time dilation?@w2 Time travel?! @p9 [ IDA ] An unforeseen side-effect of traveling through the Spatial Rift is a possibility, Commander.@w3 And by the same token, so would time dilation in much the same way that a Black hole affects the passage of time.@w4 Time travel as an explanation however, is purely fictional.@p9 [ IDA ] The most likely explanation is that your Escape pod malfunctioned or was damaged, and remained in orbit while maintaining you in Cryosleep for the duration.@w4 But there are no known cases of memory loss that weren't also accompanied by severe neurological damage.@p9 [ Commander {PlayerName} ] I remember everything up to Apollo Station, but beyond that...@w3 nothing.@w4 Are you saying I could have brain damage?@p9 [ IDA ] You have passed all cognitive tests I have performed, and your physical and mental conditions are monitored by your suit.@w4 Both of which match your previous medical assessments on record. So whatever the cause is... I cannot discern at this stage.@p9 [ IDA ] Although more difficult than previously estimated, finding the rest of the UC Fleet would be the fastest method to confirming whether or not this condition is unique to you or experienced by others.@w5 Until then, I will monitor your conditions while the cause remains a mystery.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 根据帕兰特军士的遗体腐烂程度和后勤单元的运行时间,我可以以97%的准确率确认自从海德堡号坠毁以来已经过去了1452天,或者将近4年。@w4 我... 不知道这怎么可能,指挥官。@p9 [ 指挥官 {PlayerName} ] 在我们离开木星轨道和我来到这里之间,几乎四年怎么可能已经过去了?@w4 穿越裂缝的某种副作用?@w2 时间膨胀?@w2 时间旅行?!@p9 [ IDA ] 穿越空间裂缝的不可预见的副作用是一种可能性,指挥官。@w3 同样,时间膨胀也会以类似黑洞影响时间流逝的方式发生。@w4 然而,将时间旅行作为解释纯粹是虚构的。@p9 [ IDA ] 最有可能的解释是你的逃生舱出现了故障或受损,并且在轨道上停留了这段时间,同时让你在低温睡眠中度过了这段时间。@w4 但目前还没有已知的记忆丧失案例不是伴随着严重的神经损伤。@p9 [ 指挥官 {PlayerName} ] 我记得到阿波罗站的一切,但除此之外...@w3 什么也没有。@w4 你是说我可能有脑损伤?@p9 [ IDA ] 你通过了我进行的所有认知测试,你的身体和心理状况由你的服装监控。@w4 两者都与你在案的先前医疗评估相匹配。所以不管原因是什么... 在这个阶段我无法辨别。@p9 [ IDA ] 尽管比以前估计的要困难,找到UC舰队的其余部分将是确认这种状况是否只对你独特,还是其他人也经历过的最快方法。@w5 在那之前,我将监控你的条件,而原因仍然是个谜。

English: I guess I'd better get moving if I plan on finding a way back to the Fleet.
Chinese (simplified): 我想我最好开始行动,如果我打算找到回到舰队的方法。

English: [ IDA ]\nAgreed, Commander.@w3\nAll sources of information at this site have been exhausted and this location is no longer secure.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n同意,指挥官。@w3 \n这个地点的所有信息来源已经被耗尽,这个地方不再安全。

English: [ Chief ] Tena koe te tangata haere.@w4 Ki te kore koe e mohio ki taku e korero nei, kare ano koe i whakaatu he whoa koe no taku iwi.@w4 Poroporoaki...
Chinese (simplified): [ 酋长 ] 你好,旅行者。@w4 如果你不知道我在说什么,那么你就不是我的族人。@w4 结束语...

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Well... I found a way inside.@w3 That was quite a way to fall.@w2 I was expecting a staircase, an elevator, or something...@p9 [ IDA ] Whatever that place is, Commander...@w3 My scans are unable to penetrate the walls.@w3 It appears to be heavily shielded except for a data transceiver that I am unable to access.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯... 我找到了进去的方法。@w3 那真是一个相当的方式。@w2 我期待的是楼梯,电梯或者别的什么...@p9 [ IDA ] 不管那个地方是什么,指挥官...@w3 我的扫描无法穿透墙壁。@w3 它似乎被严重屏蔽了,除了一个我无法访问的数据发射器。

English: Let's see if I can get the lights turned on (Skip)
Chinese (simplified): 让我们看看我能否把灯打开(跳过)

English: @q0[ IDA ] The design of the structure is far more advanced that anything in the Tal'on village, but there are many similarities in their architecture, styling and repeated motifs on both.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] How could they be made by the same people, yet be so technologically different?@w4 What could've happened to cause them to abandon the technology that made all this possible?@p9 [ IDA ] There could be any number of reasons, Commander.@w4 But I surmise that the Zirax's presence here is the cause of their apparent regression, otherwise they would be standing as equals.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah. They'd be at the top of my list too...@w4 But why would they send me here?@w2 To show me what they used to be?@p9 [ IDA ] Those devices appear to be some form of computer terminal and may contain the answers to your questions.@w3 However, without any power there is no way to interface with them.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 这个结构的设计比塔隆村庄的任何东西都要先进,但在它们的建筑、风格和重复的图案上有许多相似之处。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 它们怎么可能是由同一个人制造的,但又在技术上如此不同?@w4 是什么导致了他们放弃了使所有这些成为可能的技术?@p9 [ IDA ] 原因可能有无数,指挥官。@w4 但我推测兹瑞克斯的存在是他们明显退步的原因,否则他们会平等地站立。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 是的。他们也会是我名单上的首位...@w4 但他们为什么会派我来这里?@w2 向我展示他们曾经是什么?@p9 [ IDA ] 这些设备看起来是某种计算机终端,可能包含你问题的答案。@w3 然而,没有电力就无法与它们交互。

English: Then I need to be looking for some way to turn the power on
Chinese (simplified): 那我需要寻找一种方法来打开电源

English: @q0[ IDA ]\nOne of the consoles appears to be different from the others. It possibly controls whatever power source is intended to power the building.@w4\nOnce the power is active, I may be able to access the building's transceiver.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ]\n其中一个控制台看起来与其他的不同。它可能控制着旨在为建筑供电的电源。@w4 \n一旦电源激活,我可能能够访问建筑的传输器。

English: I'll see if I can figure something out...
Chinese (simplified): 我会看看我能否弄清楚一些事情...

English: This isn't the terminal i'm looking for.@w3\nThere's no power going to the terminal...
Chinese (simplified): 这不是我要找的终端。@w3 \n终端没有电源...

English: I have no use for this right now...
@q0The screen is lit up and alien symbols stream down the interface
Chinese (simplified): @q0 屏幕亮起,外星符号在界面上流下

English: @q0Loading Tal'on Translation Key to SSD < Talon.lex > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 > Talon.lex added to Database @w3 Forwarding translation to HUD and Audio Input/Output @p9 ...In the year of 2106 TC, the noble Tal'on having regained the power of spaceflight and finally returned to the stars encountered our first adversary in the form of the Arkenian Republic. An economic power spanning thousands of systems without formal military, they found opposition with our enlightened system of equality and saw our people as both threat and resource...@p9 With no military force of our own, we turned to an honorable warrior race, great in number and military prowess but lacking interstellar travel and uplifted them to be our allies and protectors against the economic might of the Arkenian fleet. With their military and tactical superiority on our side, the Republic's aggression was halted and a stalemate achieved...@p9 Seeing no way for a profitable outcome for them, the Republic entered negotiations with our Tal'on-Zirax Assembly to construct a system of co-dependent commerce between all our peoples. Giving up their right to military force in exchange for our ally's protection from external sources in their place. And so, by the Unity Accords the Tallaxan Federation was formed...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 加载 塔隆 翻译键到SSD < Talon.lex >@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 > Talon.lex 添加到数据库@w3 转发翻译到HUD和音频输入/输出@p9 ...在2106年TC,高贵的塔隆恢复了太空飞行的力量,最终回到了星星,遇到了我们的第一个对手,即阿尔肯共和国。一个跨越数千个系统的经济强国,没有正式的军事力量,他们发现我们的平等启蒙系统与他们对立,并将我们的人民视为威胁和资源...@p9 由于我们自己没有军事力量,我们转向了一个尊贵的战士种族,他们在数量和军事实力上都很强,但缺乏星际旅行,并将他们提升为我们的盟友和保护者,以对抗阿尔肯舰队的经济实力。 有了他们的军事和战术优势在我们这边,共和国的侵略被制止,僵局得以实现...@p9 看到对他们来说没有盈利的结果,共和国与我们的 塔隆-兹瑞克斯 议会进行谈判,以构建一个我们所有人民相互依赖的商业系统。放弃他们的军事力量权利,以换取我们盟友的保护,代替他们抵御外部来源。 于是,根据统一协议,塔拉克斯联邦成立了...

English: <color=#1083fe>This looks like some kind of historical record</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#1083fe>这看起来像是某种历史记录</color>

English: ...In the year of 2106 TC, the noble Tal'on having regained the power of spaceflight and finally returned to the stars encountered our first adversary in the form of the Arkenian Republic. An economic power spanning thousands of systems without formal military, they found opposition with our enlightened system of equality and saw our people as both threat and resource...@p9 With no military force of our own, we turned to an honorable warrior race, great in number and military prowess but lacking interstellar travel and uplifted them to be our allies and protectors against the economic might of the Arkenian fleet. With their military and tactical superiority on our side, the Republic's aggression was halted and a stalemate achieved...@p9 Seeing no way for a profitable outcome for them, the Republic entered negotiations with our Tal'on-Zirax Assembly to construct a system of co-dependent commerce between all our peoples. Giving up their right to military force in exchange for our ally's protection from external sources in their place. And so, by the Unity Accords the Tallaxan Federation was formed...
Chinese (simplified): ...在2106年TC,高贵的塔隆恢复了太空飞行的力量,最终回到了星星,遇到了我们的第一个对手,即阿尔肯共和国。一个跨越数千个系统的经济强国,没有正式的军事力量,他们发现我们的平等启蒙系统与他们对立,并将我们的人民视为威胁和资源...@p9 由于我们自己没有军事力量,我们转向了一个尊贵的战士种族,他们在数量和军事实力上都很强,但缺乏星际旅行,并将他们提升为我们的盟友和保护者,以对抗阿尔肯舰队的经济实力。 有了他们的军事和战术优势在我们这边,共和国的侵略被制止,僵局得以实现...@p9 看到对他们来说没有盈利的结果,共和国与我们的 塔隆-兹瑞克斯 议会进行谈判,以构建一个我们所有人民相互依赖的商业系统。放弃他们的军事力量权利,以换取我们盟友的保护,代替他们抵御外部来源。 于是,根据统一协议,塔拉克斯联邦成立了...

English: This isn't the terminal i'm looking for.@w3\nThere's no power going to the terminal...
Chinese (simplified): 这不是我要找的终端。@w3 \n终端没有电力供应...

English: I have no use for this right now...
Chinese (simplified): 我现在没有用这个东西...

English: ... Slowly, the silence spread across the galaxy engulfing everything it touched. No warnings, no transmissions and no survivors. Gone were the days of peace for the Federation. War was upon us once again and the bonds that bound us together burned bright as the fires of war were waged upon the ancient evil of the past, our past, our Legacy.@p9 An ancient enemy we thought left behind long ago, bound to a dying galaxy with no way to travel the gulf of emptiness between the origin and destination. Naiive we were, for while we are bound by lifetimes and memory, they were not. They took the long journey across the expanse with no thought or risk, only the cost of time the journey would take...@p9 ...To emerge here and now, when we were once again at peace to take from us all that we have built again. To fight was our only choice, but time and distance served to only strengthen the ancient enemy. And so silence spread like a stain across the face of the galaxy, for where they spread only silence was heard.
Chinese (simplified): ... 沉默慢慢地蔓延至整个银河系,吞噬了它接触到的一切。没有警告,没有传输,也没有幸存者。 联邦的和平日子已经一去不复返。战争再次降临我们,将我们紧密联系在一起的纽带在对抗古老邪恶的战火中闪耀着光芒,那是我们的过去,我们的遗留者。@p9 我们以为很久以前就已留下的古老敌人,被束缚在一个垂死的银河系中,没有办法穿越起源和目的地之间的空虚鸿沟。 我们太天真了,因为虽然我们受到生命和记忆的束缚,但他们没有。他们毫不考虑或冒险地进行了漫长的旅程,只是旅程所需时间的代价...@p9 ...现在出现在这里,当我们再次和平时,夺走我们再次建立的一切。 战斗是我们唯一的选择,但时间和距离只加强了古老敌人。因此,沉默像污点一样在银河系的脸上蔓延,因为它们传播的地方只听到了沉默。

English: Infector The most numerous of the Legacy's many bioships; Infectors have a near-impenetrable segmented shell propelled through space with antimatter reactions and gravity manipulation. Infectors are the first wave of an attack, where they drop from space onto densely populated areas to cause maximum damage before extending tendrils into the ground to pump their contamination to infect both the living and dead.@p9 Decimator One of the possible evolutions of the Infector after having absorbed enough biomass from a successful drop. The Decimator's role is defensive; to protect Infectors during their inital assault from Zirax warships using omni-directional firing from numerous Disruptor cannons.@p9 Devastator An uncommon evolution of the Infector. The Devastator is a wholly offensive creature; developed for total offense against potential threats to the Infectors. While lacking the armor and shielding of a Decimator, it has a significant number of forward-facing Disruptor Cannons, far in excess of those that stud a Decimator's carapace.@p9 Eradicator A rare occurence among Devastators is a secondary evolution into an Eradicator. Only a handful of them were ever encountered, and almost always resulted in a complete route of the Tallaxan forces. Eradicators possess an overwhelming number of Disruptors and virtually impenetrable shields. The only Eradicator ever destroyed in combat was caught alone facing a Tovera-Class Dreadnought and 2 Imerat-Class Destroyers.@p9 Annihilator No Information Available@p9 Cataclysm Only one Cataclysm is known to exist. The size of a small moon, it uses gravitic tidal forces to fracture the mantle of entire planets. Despite multiple attempts to damage the Cataclysm, no damage has ever been observed.
Chinese (simplified): 感染者 作为遗留者众多生物飞船中数量最多的一种;感染者拥有几乎无法穿透的分段外壳,通过反物质反应和重力操控在太空中推进。 感染者是攻击的第一波,它们从太空降落到人口密集的地区,在伸出触须进入地面泵送污染以感染生者和死者之前,造成最大损害。@p9 破坏者 感染者在成功降落后吸收足够的生物量可能发生的进化之一。破坏者的角色是防御性的;使用多向发射的破坏者机炮,保护感染者在初始攻击期间免受兹瑞克斯战舰的攻击。@p9 毁灭者 感染者不常见的进化。毁灭者是一种完全进攻性的生物;为对抗感染者的潜在威胁而发展。 虽然缺乏破坏者的装甲和护盾,但它拥有大量面向前方的破坏者机炮,远远超过那些点缀在破坏者甲壳上的机炮。@p9 根除者 在毁灭者中罕见的二次进化成根除者。只有少数几个根除者被遇到过,而且几乎总是导致塔拉克森军队的彻底失败。 根除者拥有压倒性的破坏者数量和几乎无法穿透的护盾。唯一在战斗中被摧毁的根除者是独自面对一艘托维拉级无畏舰和两艘伊梅拉特级驱逐舰时。@p9 歼灭者 没有可用信息@p9 灾变 已知只有一个灾变存在。它的大小相当于一个小月亮,它使用引力潮汐力来破裂整个行星的地幔。 尽管多次尝试损坏灾变,但从未观察到任何损伤。

English: Disruptor Found on every bioship in the Legacy's numbers, Disruptors produce a beam of collimated, precisely-controlled positrons that fracture the atomic bonds in matter, causing a spontaneous fission reaction as the target is consumed in nuclear fire. Numerous attempts to reproduce this effect have been made and are still on-going with little success.@p9 Whisperdrive Functioning in a similar capacity to a Warp Drive, the Legacy's Whisperdrive accelerates to near-light speed instead of phasing the creature into a higher dimension. While significantly slower, it prevents any ships in its vicinity from spooling up their warp drive. It's theorized that entering conventional Warp separates a Legacy from the Nexus causing all processing functions to stall.
Chinese (simplified): 破坏者 在遗留者的所有生物飞船上都能找到,破坏者产生一束准直的、精确控制的正电子束,这种束会断裂物质中的原子键,导致目标在核火中被消耗时发生自发的裂变反应。 已经进行了多次尝试来复制这种效果,并且仍在进行中,但成功甚微。@p9 轻语驱动 类似于翘曲引擎的功能,遗留者的轻语驱动加速到接近光速,而不是将生物相位到更高的维度。 虽然速度明显较慢,但它可以防止其附近的任何飞船启动它们的翘曲引擎。据推测,进入传统的翘曲会使遗留者与网络断开连接,导致所有处理功能停滞。

English: I have no use for this right now...
Chinese (simplified): 我现在没有用这个东西...

English: @q0Running Tal'on Translation Key < Talon.lex > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 > Tal'on Translation 99% Accurate @w3 Forwarding translation to HUD and Audio Input/Output @p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Wait a second...@w5 This console only seems to have a database of Tal'on controlled planets, foods, dances and other culture-related stuff.@w2 While this is probably what the chief wanted me to read, it's no use to us.@p9 [ IDA ] Yes, this console appears to contain information about the Tal'on as a people.@w4 Personally, I find it fascinating, Commander. Can you enable the upload connection on the console so I can store these files for the UCH Database?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You, IDA? Find something 'fascinating'?@w4 That's the most expression i've heard out of you so far, Ida.@p9 [ IDA ] One of my parameters is to investigate and document first contact with any alien species, Commander.@w4 I am predisposed to fascination of alien creatures and cultures.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Does that mean you're 'investigating' those big-ass spiders we've been running into as well?@p9 [ IDA ] Of course, Commander.@w3 If you would like to know more about the creatures we've encountered, you can review the Ecological Database in your PDA (F1).
Chinese (simplified): @q0 正在运行 塔隆 翻译密钥 @w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 > 塔隆翻译 99% 准确@w3 将翻译转发到 HUD 和音频输入/输出@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 等一下...@w5 这个控制台似乎只有塔隆控制的行星、食物、舞蹈和其他与文化相关的东西的数据库。@w2 虽然这可能是酋长想要我读的,但对我们来说没有用。@p9 [ IDA ] 是的,这个控制台似乎包含了关于塔隆作为一个民族的信息。@w4 就我个人而言,指挥官,我觉得这很有趣。你能在控制台上启用上传连接,让我把这些文件存储在 UCH 数据库中吗?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你,IDA?发现某事 '有趣'?@w4 那是我到目前为止听到你说的最有表情的话了,Ida。@p9 [ IDA ] 我的一个参数是调查和记录与任何外星物种的首次接触,指挥官。@w4 我对外星生物和文化有天生的迷恋。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这是否意味着你也在 '调查' 那些我们一直在遇到的大蜘蛛?@p9 [ IDA ] 当然,指挥官。@w3 如果你想更多地了解我们遇到的生物,你可以查看你的 生态数据库 在你的 PDA (F1) 中。

English: <color=#0088ff>I'll uhh... i'll pass on that. Thanks, Ida.</color>
This isn't the terminal i'm looking for.@w3\nThere's no power going to the terminal...
Chinese (simplified): 这不是我要找的终端。@w3 \n终端没有电源...

English: This isn't the terminal i'm looking for.@w3\nI need the other one.
Chinese (simplified): 这不是我要找的终端。@w3 \n我需要另一个。

English: This isn't the terminal i'm looking for.@w3\nI need the other one.
Chinese (simplified): 这不是我要找的终端。@w3 \n我需要另一个。

English: [ Chief ] Greetings, Traveller.@w4 As much as I would like to speak to you of your travels, I am busy with the running of my village.@w4 Perhaps you would assist my kin with their problems?@w2 There are many small troubles in this village that I am unable to deal with.
Chinese (simplified): [ 酋长 ] 问候,旅行者。@w4 尽管我很想和你谈论你的旅行,但我忙于管理我的村庄。@w4 也许你可以帮助我的族人解决他们的问题?@w2 这个村庄有很多小麻烦我无法处理。

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] Fighting is the way of the young or foolish.@w2 I'm too old to fight and couldn't bear to order my people to their death,@w2 And it would be to their deaths.@w2 There's no way that bows and arrows can stand against heavy machine guns.@w2 We are few, and we are weak.@w2 As much as it pains me to admit it, we can only endure.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Sooner or later, your people will need to stand up and fight.@w2 One day they won't remember the past as you do and then they'll have nothing to fight for.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I thank you for your opinion, Traveller. But this business is our own.@w3 Things will resolve themselves one way or the other.@w5 Shall we get back to the matter at hand then?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 战斗是年轻人或愚蠢人的方式。@w2 我太老了,不能战斗,也不能忍受命令我的人民去死,@w2 而且这会是他们的死亡。@w2 弓箭无法对抗重机枪。@w2 我们人少,我们弱。@w2 尽管我痛苦地承认,我们只能忍受。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 迟早,你的人民会需要站起来战斗。@w2 有一天他们不会像你一样记住过去,然后他们将没有什么可战斗为了。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 感谢你的意见,旅行者。但这是我们自己的事情。@w3 事情会以这样或那样的方式解决。@w5 那我们回到手头的事情吧?

English: <color=#0088ff>Tell me where they're meant to be and i'll look for them myself</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>告诉我他们应该在哪里,我会亲自去找他们</color>

English: @q0[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] They are all exceptional hunters, despite their youth.@w3 I expect that Ki'eve among them to one day succeed me when I retire.@w2 Geam and Torma are likewise expected to take positions in leadership.@w3 It's unthinkable that they would betray the village.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] While it is true that some of them are troubled. Ki'eve more than most.@w2 They all have bright futures in the village.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Why is Ki'eve more troubled than most?@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] The boy lost his father when your people's ships crashed in the forest years in the past.@w2 He has had...@w2 problems adjusting to the loss of his father.@w2 Nothing the Shaman or myself couldn't deal with.@w3 It's just...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] So there's an angry teenager out there with a grudge against my people?@w2 Still so sure he's innocent?@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] I...@w2 do not know...@w4 I will wait a while longer before I go to the Chief...@w2 It cannot be true.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 他们都是杰出的猎手,尽管他们还很年轻。@w3 我期望其中之一的基夫有一天在我退休后接替我。@w2 吉姆和托尔马也有望担任领导职务。@w3 他们背叛村庄是不可想象的。@p9 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 虽然确实有些人有问题。基夫尤其如此。@w2 他们所有人在村庄都有光明的未来。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 为什么基夫比其他人更麻烦?@p9 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 伙子在你族人的飞船多年前在森林中坠毁时失去了他的父亲。@w2 他一直……@w2 难以适应失去父亲的痛苦。@w2 萨满或我自己都能处理的事情。@w3 只是……@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 所以外面有一个怀恨在心的愤怒少年?@w2 你仍然确定他是无辜的吗?@p9 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 我……@w2 不知道……@w4 我会再等一会儿,然后再去找酋长……@w2 这不可能是真的。

English: <color=#0088ff>Just tell me where they usually hunt. If he's innocent, he'll come back with me.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>只要告诉我他们通常在哪里狩猎。如果他是无辜的,他会和我一起回来的。</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ]\nKaore au i te wa mo nga manene kuare penei i a koe.@w3\nHaere, ka hoki mai ina tika koe mo taku taima.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ]\nKaore au i te wa mo nga manene kuare penei i a koe.@w3 \nHaere, ka hoki mai ina tika koe mo taku taima.

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ]\nI am Ku'reil. The leader of this village's hunter parties.@w3\nI have no business with you, and you have none with me.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ]\n我是库雷尔。这个村庄猎人队伍的领导者。@w3 \n我和你没有任何关系,你和我也没有。

English: [ Huntmaster Kureil ] I will continue to wait here for the missing party a little longer.@w3 If they do not return soon, I will seek council from the Chief before setting off to find the youngsters myself.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] If you intend to find them yourself, you will likely find Ki'eve near the Monument to our dead,@w2 where he honors his fallen father.@w4 If he does not wish to come quietly...@w3 please do not resort to violence in that place...
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 我将继续在这里等待失踪的队伍一会儿。@w3 如果他们不久不回来,我会在出发去找这些年轻人之前向酋长寻求建议。@p9 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 如果你打算自己去找他们,你很可能会在我们的死者纪念碑附近找到基夫,@w2 他在那里纪念他已故的父亲。@w4 如果他不愿意安静地来……@w3 请不要在那个地方诉诸暴力……

English: @q0[ Tal'on Hunter ]\nThat's far enough, Terran.@w3\nThis is no place for your kind.@w2 Your very presence contaminates this place.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 塔隆猎人 ]\n那就到此为止吧,地球人。@w3 \n这不是你这种人的地方。@w2 你的存在污染了这个地方。

English: @q0[ Hunter Ki'eve ] Talk?@w2 Where was the talk when your people gunned down my people,@w1 my father?!@w4 He was a kind man, who never raised his voice or his hand to anyone!@w2 He was everything I had,@w1 whose only sin was that he was too good!@w3 Shot in the back by your people as he pulled them from the burning wreckage of their ship!@w4 No...@w2 Save your talk,@w1 save your lies.@w1 I will hear none of it!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 猎人基夫 ] 谈谈?@w2 当你的族人枪杀我的族人,@w1 我的父亲?!@w4 他是一个善良的人,从不提高他的声音或他的手对任何人!@w2 他是我所拥有的一切,@w1 唯一的罪过就是他太好了!@w3 被你的族人射在背后,当时他正把他们从燃烧的飞船残骸中拉出来!@w4 不……@w2 省省你的谈话,@w1 省省你的谎言。@w1 我什么也不想听!

English: <color=#0088ff>So you sold me out to the Zirax?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>所以你把我卖给了兹瑞克斯?</color>

English: <color=#ff5c5c>I guess there's nothing more to say then.</color>

@q0[ Hunter Ki'eve ]\nThat's what i've come to expect from the people who murdered my father.@w2 You care for nothing but yourselves!@w4\nI had some misgivings in handing you over to the Zirax, but not anymore!@w2 You're all the same, and the universe would be better without you!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 猎人基耶夫 ]\n这就是我从杀害我父亲的那些人那里所期待的。@w2 你们只关心自己!@w4 \n我之前还有些犹豫要不要把你交给兹瑞克斯,但现在不了!@w2 你们都一样,没有你们宇宙会更好!

English: <color=#0088ff>So it was you who sold me out to the Zirax</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>所以是你把我出卖给了兹瑞克斯</color>

English: <color=#ff5c5c>I guess there's nothing more to be said</color>

@q0[ Hunter Ki'eve ] Of course it was me!@w2 My father's spirit deserves justice!@w2 And what better way to get justice than to hand you over to the Zirax as the first step towards a brighter future for my people!@w4 Even that fool of a Chief will see that this is the right course of action...@w2 in time.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 猎人基耶夫 ] 当然是我!@w2 我父亲的灵魂值得正义!@w2 还有什么比把你交给兹瑞克斯作为我人民更光明未来第一步更好的正义方式呢!@w4 即使是那个愚蠢的酋长最终也会明白这是正确的行动...@w2 迟早。

English: <color=#ff5c5c>So there's no way to convince you to turn yourself in?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff5c5c>所以没有办法说服你自首吗?</color>

English: @q0[ Traitor Ki'eve ] It's too late to solve anything with talking.@w3 You have contaminated this place for too long, and the only thing that will cleanse the filth from this sacred place is your death.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Don't even try it Ki'eve.@w2 Your band of merry men and their bows and arrows are no match for me.@p9 [ Traitor Ki'eve ] You think i'd be dumb enough to try and take on your alien armor and weapons, then you're even more foolish than I took you for.@w3 My companions aren't even here,@w2 But in their place I brought some new friends who'll be more than a match for you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 叛徒基耶夫 ] 现在谈话已经解决不了任何问题了。@w3 你已经污染了这个地方太久了,唯一能从这个神圣之地清除污秽的就是你死亡。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 基耶夫,别尝试了。@w2 你的那群快乐伙伴和他们的弓箭对我来说不是对手。@p9 [ 叛徒基耶夫 ] 你以为我会愚蠢到试图用你的外星盔甲和武器来对抗你,那你比我想象的还要愚蠢。@w3 我的同伴甚至都不在这里,@w2 但我带来了一些新朋友,他们会是你的对手。

English: @q0[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] I sought council with the Chief when Ki'eve and his hunting party did not return.@w4 But you have returned...@w2 and it is without him.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ki'eve is dead.@w4 He was waiting to ambush me with a team of Zirax soldiers at the monument.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Those are serious accusations.@w3 I have already dispatched a group of hunters.@w3 Maybe I should go myself...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] They've already started to move the bodies.@w2 You'd better hurry if you want to find anything.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] If I find that you are lying,@w2 then you'd better be gone by the time I return.@w3 For I will hunt you to the edges of this world to make sure you pay for your treachery...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 当基耶夫和他的狩猎队伍没有回来时,我向酋长寻求了建议。@w4 但你回来了...@w2 却没有他。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 基耶夫死了。@w4 他在纪念碑那里等着用一队兹瑞克斯士兵伏击我。@p9 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 这是严重的指控。@w3 我已经派出了一群猎人。@w3 也许我应该亲自去...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 他们已经开始移动尸体了。@w2 如果你想找到任何东西,你最好快点。@p9 [ 狩猎大师库雷尔 ] 如果我发现你在撒谎,@w2 那么我回来的时候你最好已经离开。@w3 因为我会追你到这个世界的边缘,确保你为你的背叛付出代价...

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] Do not lie to me!@w3 We are very familiar with the damage the weapons carried by our Zirax jailers causes and Ki'eve's body was found alone, dead at the hands of your weapon.@w5 No...@w3 Your guilt is apparent.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I had hoped you would become a friend of the clan, Traveller.@w4 We are so lacking in allies in these trying times that it seems that I foolishly pinned my hopes on you, that we could mend the gap between our two peoples...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [酋长Na'tuk] 不要对我撒谎!@w3 我们非常熟悉我们的兹瑞克斯狱卒携带的武器所造成的伤害,而Ki'eve的尸体被发现独自一人,死在你的武器之下。@w5 不...@w3 你的罪行显而易见。@p9 [酋长Na'tuk] 我曾希望你能成为部落的朋友,旅行者。@w4 在这些艰难时期,我们缺少盟友,看来我愚蠢地把希望寄托在你身上,我们可以弥合我们两个民族之间的鸿沟...

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm not lying. The bodies were removed after I left to return here!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我不撒谎。尸体是在我离开回到这里后被移走的!</color>

English: Welcome to Bertram's Arms!\nI'm not the man himself, but I am his cousin! I can get you a pretty sweet deal on weapons and tech if that's your jam!\nSo what are you looking for today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Bertram's Arms!\n我不是他本人,但我是他的表弟!我可以帮你在武器和技术上搞到一笔不错的交易如果你喜欢的话!\n你今天想要什么?

English: [ Bertram's Arms Clerk ] Oh no...@w2 Not one of you little bastards.@w3 Nope. Get out of my store!@w2 I'm not going to pay exorbitant prices for your trashy armor and guns.@w3 See that thing right there? That's my Constructor.@w3 I can turn 20 credits' worth of iron into one of those guns, so I sure as hell don't want to buy 30 of them at 1100 credits each.@p9 [ Bertram's Arms Clerk ] So you either buy something or you get out.@w3 I don't care, nor do I want to know where your people went. I don't want scammers in my store.@w3 Ask someone else.
Chinese (simplified): [伯特伦武器店职员] 哦不...@w2 你们这些小混蛋。@w3 不。从我的店里滚出去!@w2 我不会为你那些破烂盔甲和枪支付离谱的价格。@w3 看到那边那个东西了吗?那是我的建造机。@w3 我可以把价值20信用点的铁变成那样的一把枪,所以我当然不想以每把1100信用点的价格买30把。@p9 [伯特伦武器店职员] 所以你要么买点什么,要么就滚出去。@w3 我不在乎,也不想知道你们的人去了哪里。我不想让我的店里有骗子。@w3 去问别人吧。

English: [ Bertram's Arms Clerk ]\nDidn't I tell you to beat it?@w2\nI don't know where your buddies went. So try one of the other traders around here.
Chinese (simplified): [伯特伦武器店职员]\n我不是让你滚了吗?@w2 \n我不知道你的朋友们去了哪里。所以试试这附近的其他商人。

English: Welcome to Market Cafe Bar and Grill!\nWe have everything from burgers to salads, even some unique in-store dishes that you can't get anywhere else!\nSo what can I get you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎 Market Cafe Bar and Grill!\n从汉堡到沙拉,我们应有尽有,甚至还有一些独特的店内菜肴让你不用再去其他任何地方!\n所以我今天能给你什么服务?

English: Welcome to GS-Entertainment!\nWe're a leading retailer of the latest video games, anime, collectibles and card games. We also broker deals between avid collectors and hold TCG Tournaments on the weekends.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到 GS-Entertainment!\n我们是最新视频游戏、动漫、收藏品和卡牌游戏的领先零售商。我们还促成热情收藏家之间的交易,并在周末举办TCG锦标赛。
我在这里是为了完成我的收藏

English: Oh yeah, we buy and sell trading cards here!@w2 The current biggest seller is the Empyrion Trading Card Game! Everyone's getting in on this hot new trend.@w2 Even Imperial soldiers come in here buying booster packs. We're completely sold out of packs as a result!@p9 It also means that there's a huge demand for rare cards from the more... excitable members of the community.@w2 They pay quite a bit for some of the rarer cards like the Tovera-Class Dreadnought or the Maveth planet card.@w1 I think the going rates for those two is around 5000 credits each right now.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,是的,我们在这里买卖交易卡!@w2 目前最畅销的是 帝国霸业交易卡游戏!每个人都在追求这个热门的新趋势。@w2 甚至帝国士兵也来这里购买增益包。结果我们完全卖光了包!@p9 这也意味着社区中更...激动的成员对稀有卡片有巨大的需求。@w2 他们为一些稀有卡片支付相当多,比如 托维拉级无畏舰 或 Maveth 星球卡。@w1 我认为那两个现在的行情大约是每个5000信用点。

English: I'll keep an eye out for them

<color=#ffffff>Oh yeah, we sell the latest anime releases.@w2 Single vids, box sets, extended collections, collectors boxes, posters, dakimakura and even limited edition figurines.@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Anime is universal. Anime is life. Just ask our customers!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>哦,是的,我们销售最新的动漫发布。@w2 单个视频,盒装套装,扩展收藏,收藏家盒子,海报,抱枕,甚至是限量版手办。@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>动漫是普遍的。动漫是生活。问问我们的顾客就知道了!</color>

English: If you're going to participate in one of the card game tournaments this weekend, please remember that as of last month The Epilogue and Cataclysm are both limited to one per deck.@w2\nUpdated rules will be available from judges one tournament day.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你打算参加本周末的纸牌游戏锦标赛,请记住,从上个月开始 尾声 和 灾变 每个牌组都限制为一张。@w2 \n更新的规则将在锦标赛当天由裁判提供。

English: <color=#ffffff>I've got a special request for a rare card that's no longer in print. There's still a few floating around out there and they'll pay big for them.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Interested?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我有一个特殊请求,寻找一张不再印刷的稀有卡片。那里仍然有一些,他们会为此付出高昂的代价。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>感兴趣吗?</color>

English: Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Rogue J-5565. Now, the card was only worth around 400 credits when it was printed, but it's an older card and they don't print it anymore. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 19,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太好了!@w2 我现在的要求是 交易卡: 流氓J-5565。 现在,这张卡在印刷时只值大约400信用点,但它是一张旧卡,他们不再印刷了。 你带给我一个,我会付给你 19,000信用点 的一半佣金。

English: I found the card you're looking for
I'll see if I can find one

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Kamirat-Class Battlecarrier. Now, the card is... or was a common card. But ever since the real ship got removed from service everyone wants the card to remember it by. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 7,500 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太好了!@w2 我现在的要求是 交易卡: 卡米拉特级战斗航母。 现在,这张卡是... 或者说曾经是一张普通卡。但自从真正的船退役后,每个人都想要这张卡来纪念它。 你带给我一个,我会付给你 7,500信用点 的一半佣金。

English: I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Eradicator. I've got a guy, girl actually, trying to get the full Legacy set and they're just missing this one Ultra Rare card. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 17,500 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太好了!@w2 我现在的要求是 交易卡: Eradicator。 我有一个人,女孩,实际上,试图获得完整的遗留者套装,他们只是缺少这一张超稀有卡。 你带给我一个,我会付给你 17,500信用点 的一半佣金。

English: I've found you that Legacy Eradicator card
I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Overseer. This is a rare creature card, but it's basically the face of the entire set. You'll know it when you see it and i've got a kid who really wants it and a rich daddy. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 11,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太好了!@w2 我现在的要求是 交易卡: Overseer。 这是一张稀有生物卡,但它基本上是整个套装的面孔。当你看到它时你会知道,我有一个非常想要它的孩子和一个富有的父亲。 你带给我一个,我会付给你 11,000信用点 的一半佣金。

English: I have the Overseer card for you
I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Zirax Assault Trooper. It's going to the commander of a Drone Base. He want to frame it and put it in his office to show his troopers what they're supposed to look like or something like that. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 16,250 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 目前我收到的请求是交易卡: 兹瑞克斯突击兵。 它将被送往一个无人机基地的指挥官。他想把它装裱起来,放在他的办公室里,向他的士兵展示他们应该是什么样子或类似的事情。 你带给我一张那样的,我会给你16,250信用点的一半佣金。

English: I found the trooper card. The previous owner didn't want it anymore.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了士兵卡。之前的主人不再需要它了。

English: I'll see if I can find someone who'll part with it
Chinese (simplified): 我会看看我能否找到愿意放手的人

English: <color=#ffffff>Thanks for all your help! That'll keep my customers happy and buying boosterpacks.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I know we didn't agree on this, but here's a few extra credits for the trouble.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>感谢你的所有帮助!这将让我的客户满意并购买增强包。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我知道我们没有就此事达成协议,但这是一些额外的信用点作为麻烦的补偿。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>No more special requests.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're looking for more generic cards to sell, we're buying a whole bunch of commons, rares, ultra rares and secret rare cards for their full market price in the catalog.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>没有更多的特殊请求。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你正在寻找更多的通用卡来销售,我们正在以目录中全市场价格购买一大堆普通卡、稀有卡、超稀有卡和秘密稀有卡。</color>

English: Welcome to GS-Entertainment!\nWe're a leading retailer of the latest video games, anime, collectibles and card games. We also broker deals between avid collectors and hold TCG Tournaments on the weekends.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到GS-Entertainment!\n我们是最新的视频游戏、动漫、收藏品和卡牌游戏的领先零售商。我们还促成狂热收藏家之间的交易,并在周末举行TCG锦标赛。
我来这里是为了完成我的收藏

English: Welcome to SERVANT CORP OUTFITTERS!\nWhere we sell only the latest in suit enhancements and attachments. So if you need anything, I am your servant.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到SERVANT CORP 旅行用品商!\n我们只卖最新的套装和附件. 若是你需要的有什么,我就是你的服务者.

English: <color=#ffbb00>What was the job you gave me?</color>
[ Waitstaff ]\nIs that what you are?@w2\nNo, i'm afraid I haven't seen and of your kind around here.@w2 I only started working here last week. Sorry.
Chinese (simplified): [ 服务员 ]\n你是那个吗?@w2 \n不,恐怕我没有在这附近看到过你们这样的人。@w2 我上周才开始在这里工作。抱歉。

English: [ Waitstaff ] Didn't you already ask me that?@w3 I only started working here a week ago. And honestly, I don't even look at customers' faces anymore.@w2 I could've just served a human and wouldn't even realize...
Chinese (simplified): [ 服务员 ] 你不是已经问过我了吗?@w3 我一个月前才开始在这里工作。老实说,我甚至不再看顾客的脸了。@w2 我可能刚刚服务了一个人类,甚至都没有意识到...

English: [ Nerd ] I don't think we have any Human cards yet.@w2 Maybe they're in the next boosterpack coming out in a month?@w5 Oh, sorry. You were asking if i'd seen any 3D humans!@p9 [ Nerd ] No, we only opened a store here a year ago.@w2 You should try The Layover. They've been here for years, and anyone visiting the station without their own ship has to stay there.
Chinese (simplified): [ 书呆子 ] 我想我们还没有人类卡片。@w2 也许下个月即将推出的增强包里有?@w5 哦,抱歉。你是在问我是否见过任何3D人类!@p9 [ 书呆子 ] 不,我们一年前才在这里开了这家店。@w2 你应该试试The Layover。他们在这里已经很多年了,任何没有自己的飞船访问站点的人都必须住在那里。

English: [ Nerd ]\nNo, the new boosterpack still isn't out.@w2\nOh, it's you again.@w2 Did you check out The Layover? It's just next door.
Chinese (simplified): [ 书呆子 ]\n不,新的增强包还没有出来。@w2 \n哦,又是你。@w2 你去过The Layover了吗?它就在隔壁。

English: [ Storeclerk ] Humans? Oh, Terrans! From the... 'United Command of the Homeworld', right?@w5 We had a few Terrans in a month ago to buy some spacesuits and drop off a shipment of Radiation Shielding.@p9 [ Storeclerk ] They came in on their own ships. We get fairly regular shipments from them every 6 months.@w2 I'm afraid I don't know where they come from or where they go once they leave here.@w2 You should try one of the other shops here.@w1 Maybe they know something?
Chinese (simplified): [ 店员 ] 人类?哦,地球人!来自... 'United Command of the Homeworld',对吧?@w5 一个月前我们这里有一些地球人来买一些太空服并放下一批辐射屏蔽。@p9 [ 店员 ] 他们是乘坐自己的飞船来的。我们每六个月都会收到他们相当规律的货物。@w2 恐怕我不知道他们来自哪里或者他们离开这里后去了哪里。@w2 你应该试试这里的其他商店。@w1 也许他们知道些什么?

English: [ Storeclerk ]\nOh, you're back.@w2\nDid you talk to the other stores here already?@w2 You might want to try the receptionist at The Layover.@w2 That's the Hotel on the other side of the food court. Most people stay there when they're visiting the station.
Chinese (simplified): [ 店员 ]\n哦,你回来了。@w2 \n你已经和其他商店谈过了吗?@w2 你可能想试试The Layover的接待员。@w2 那是食品广场另一边的酒店。大多数人在访问站点时都住在那里。

English: Hi and welcome to The Layover.\nWe supply clean and spacious rooms for any visitors for an affordable price.@w4\nNow, how can I help you?
Chinese (simplified): 您好,欢迎来到 The Layover。\n我们为任何访客提供干净宽敞的房间,价格合理。@w4 \n现在,我怎么能帮到你?

English: Who did you say I should talk to?

<color=#ffffff>Oh, i'm afraid </color><color=#ff5c5c>all our rooms are taken at the moment.</color><color=#ffffff>@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>They look to be booked up for a week by a survey crew from </color><color=#dd0000>Xanthos</color><color=#ffffff>.@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'm terribly sorry.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>哦,恐怕 </color><color=#ff5c5c>我们现在所有的房间都被预定了。</color><color=#ffffff>@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>他们看起来被Xanthos的一个调查队预订了一周。@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>非常抱歉。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid we don't take reservations.@w2</color>\n<color=#ffffff>It's a big dangerous galaxy and there's no way of knowing whether you'll turn up for your reservation or not.@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Sorry for the inconvenience.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恐怕我们不接受预订。@w2 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>这是一个庞大而危险的银河系,我们无法知道你是否会按时出现。@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>对于造成的不便,我们深表歉意。</color>

English: @q0Humans?@w2 Ah yes. Your kind aren't very common around here, so I know humans have stayed here a couple of times in the past.@w3 Let me just check my records...@p9 . @w2 . @w2 . @p6 There's a few records over the last few years of brief stopovers by your people.@w4 The earliest records show that several dozen Humans arrived here almost four years ago.@w4 That was before I started working here,@w2 But it says they had several meetings with Administrator Pavrell before leaving on a pair of chartered shuttles.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 人类?@w2 啊,是的。你们这种人在这里并不常见,所以我知道过去有几次人类在这里停留过。@w3 让我查一下我的记录...@p9 .@w2 .@w2 .@p6 过去几年里有一些记录显示,你们的人短暂停留过。@w4 最早的记录显示,大约四年前有几十名人类来到这里。@w4 那是在我来这里工作之前,@w2 但是上面说他们与行政官帕夫雷尔举行了几次会面,然后乘坐租用的穿梭机离开了。

English: Do the records say where they went?
Chinese (simplified): 记录上有没有说他们去了哪里?

English: @q0I'm sorry but the records don't have that kind of detail.@w2 They only list the reason for a guests' stay.@w2 It's actually a miracle that the receptionist here back then filled out the comments section at all.@p9 You might want to ask Administrator Pavrell, over in the Administration and Security booth across the Trading Floor for more.@w3 He's been here for years, trying to get a transfer off this world. He's a bit of a jerk, but he's not... terrible.@w2 It looks like he's just finished a call with someone, so you'd better hurry and get him before he gets another one.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 很抱歉,记录里没有那种细节。@w2 它们只列出了客人停留的原因。@w2 实际上,接待员当时填写评论栏简直就是个奇迹。@p9 你可能想要问行政官帕夫雷尔,在交易大厅对面的行政和安全亭了解更多。@w3 他在这里工作了很多年,一直试图调离这个世界。他有点讨厌,但也不算...太坏。@w2 看起来他刚打完一个电话,所以你最好在他接下一个电话之前赶紧找他。

English: <color=#ffffff>Oh,@w2 </color><color=#ffbb00>Administrator Pavrell</color><color=#ffffff>.@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>He's the only one who dealt with the humans who came here in that first wave.@w3 But you might want to be careful around him. He doesn't do anything for free.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>哦,@w2 </color><color=#ffbb00>行政官帕夫雷尔</color><color=#ffffff>。@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>他是唯一一个与第一批来这里的人类打交道的人。@w3 但你最好小心点。他不会无缘无故地做事。</color>

English: He appears to be busy with some sort of phone call
Chinese (simplified): 他似乎正在忙于某种电话通话

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] I see you're finished hassling the station staff.@w2 I was getting tired of watching your bumbling around, obstructing productivity and being a general nuisance.@w3 Are you aware you're costing The Company credits with your ceaseless interruptions?@w2 I'm sure I could assist you with what you're after...@w3 if you're willing to pay for it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 行政官帕夫雷尔 ] 我看到你已经结束了对站点工作人员的骚扰。@w2 我厌倦了看着你笨拙地四处走动,妨碍生产力,成为一个普遍的麻烦。@w3 你知道你的不断打扰正在让公司损失信用点吗?@w2 我确信我可以帮助你得到你想要的...@w3 如果你愿意为此付费。

English: Let's just skip to where you tell me what you want (Skip)
Chinese (simplified): 让我们直接跳到你告诉我你想要什么 (跳过)

English: I'm trying to find the rest of my people

@q0[ Administrator Pavrell ]\nI will tell you that they were here four cycles ago and that they made a deal for safe passage off the planet.@w3 However anything more than that would be confidential information, only accessible to Polaris Employees. Of which, you are not.@w6\nDon't even consider begging or threatening me for the information. I will have station security on you before you even unholster your weapon.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 行政官帕夫雷尔 ]\n我会告诉你他们四个周期前就在这里,并且他们达成了一项安全离开星球的协议。@w3 但是除此之外的任何信息都是机密信息,只有极星员工才能访问。而你不是。@w6 \n不要考虑乞求或威胁我获取信息。在你甚至还没拔出武器之前,我就会叫站点安全人员来对付你。

English: I'm sure if I keep asking around, I could find someone else who knows
Chinese (simplified): 我相信如果我继续打听,我能找到知道的人

English: What will it take to get you to tell me?
Chinese (simplified): 我要怎么做才能让你告诉我?

English: Or I could punch you in the face, just for the fun of it
Chinese (simplified): 或者我可以一拳打在你的脸上,只是为了好玩

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] It's nice to see that you're so accepting.@w3 Most people would want to know what kind of contract they're signing onto.@w2 You may regret it later, but oh well...@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] I'm sure you've noticed that everyone you've seen around here are clearly not Human. We are Prenn. That's our race, our species.@w3 You are not like us.@w4 That makes you valuable for removing unwanted obstacles to Polaris' expansion.@w3 You'll give us Plausible Deniability.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Considering what they did to your people, this should be a very beneficial contract for you too.@w2 Provided you follow our script to the letter...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 行政官帕夫雷尔 ] 很高兴看到你这么接受。@w3 大多数人会想知道他们签的是什么样的合同。@w2 你以后可能会后悔,但好吧...@p9 [ 行政官帕夫雷尔 ] 我相信你已经注意到你在这里看到的每个人都明显不是人类。我们是普伦人。那是我们的种族,我们的物种。@w3 你和我们不一样。@w4 这让你成为清除极星扩张道路上不想要的障碍物的有价值的人选。@w3 你会给我们提供工业考量。@p9 [ 行政官帕夫雷尔 ] 考虑到他们对你的同胞所做的事情,这对你来说应该是一份非常有利的合同。@w2 只要你完全按照我们的剧本行事...

English: And what do I get out of this?

[ Administrator Pavrell ] You don't need to come see me for any more jobs.@w2 They've been added to your PDA.@w2 If you approach a planet that has any active contracts, they'll appear there and you can accept them.@w3 The less I have to do with you, the better for everyone involved...
Chinese (simplified): [ 管理员帕夫雷尔 ] 你不需要再来找我接任务了。@w2 它们已经被添加到你的PDA中。@w2 如果你接近有活跃合同的星球,它们就会出现在那里,你可以接受它们。@w3 我和你打交道越少,对所有人来说就越好...

English: He appears to be busy with some sort of phone call
Chinese (simplified): 他似乎正忙于某种电话通话

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ]\nAre you ready to accept the job #8376455466?@w2\nThis one shouldn't be too difficult, but we don't want Polaris affiliated with the target or its contents if things go wrong.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ]\n你准备好接受任务 #8376455466 了吗?@w2 \n这个任务应该不会太困难,但我们不希望如果事情出错,波拉利斯与目标或其内容有所关联。

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] A small Trade Federation cargo freighter was carrying sensitive cargo for us when it had engine trouble and had to set down outside the safe zone.@w3 It's only a matter of time before zirax patrols discover it and call it in, at which point they'll like shoot first and ask questions later.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Your job this time is to find where the freighter went down and do what it takes to get them off the ground.@w3 If patrols come sniffing around, make a big show of defending the freighter so they'll think it's affiliates with the UCH instead of Polaris.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] You won't be reimbursed for any materials or components that may be needed to repair the ship though. So keep that in mind.@w4 As for payment: The going rate is 10,000 credits for this job. If you do a good job, you might get a bonus.@w3 I've sent a data packet to your AI regarding the details of the job. Delete it when you're done.@w2 Now get going.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 一艘小型贸易联邦货运飞船为我们运送敏感货物时,引擎出现故障,不得不在安全区外降落。@w3 兹瑞克斯巡逻队发现它只是时间问题,一旦他们报告,他们可能会先开火再问问题。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你这次的工作是找到货运飞船降落的地方,并采取一切必要措施让它们重新起飞。@w3 如果巡逻队过来探查,大肆展示保卫飞船,这样他们会认为它与UCH有关联,而不是波拉利斯。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你不会得到任何可能需要用于修理飞船的材料或组件的报销。所以请记住这一点。@w4 至于报酬:这项工作的现行价格是 10,000 信用点。如果你做得好,你可能会得到奖金。@w3 我已经向你的AI发送了有关工作细节的数据包。完成后删除它。@w2 现在开始行动吧。

English: [ Administrator Pavrell ] Don't you have somewhere more important to be?@w3 If you're so braindead that you can't even remember the details of the mission I just explained to you, then you should ask your Support AI.@w3 It's clearly the smarter of the two of you...@w4 Now get out of my office.
Chinese (simplified): [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你没有更重要的地方要去吗?@w3 如果你笨到连我刚刚解释的任务细节都记不住,那么你应该问问你的 支援AI。@w3 显然它比你们俩都聪明...@w4 现在从我的办公室出去。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Captain?@w2 I heard you were in some trouble and needed some help.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] Yer the one Polaris sent ta help us, eh?@w2 I'm Orli, Capt'n of the Diomese.@w1 Rest of the crew's out patching the damage from the bad landin' we had.@w3 Hit some junk as we're comin' in on 'proach.@w2 Smashed our En'jin pods up real bad.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] I hope ye've got some spare parts, because we ain't gettin' this tub off a the ground any time soon, an' if ye look here...@w3 Them Zax are getting ready to poke us 'nto moving.@w1 Only we CAN'T!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 舰长?@w2 我听说你遇到了一些麻烦,需要帮助。@p9 [ 奥利舰长 ] 你就是 波拉利斯 派来帮助我们的人,对吧?@w2 我是 奥利,迪奥梅斯号 的舰长。@w1 其余的船员正在修补我们糟糕着陆造成的损伤。@w3 在我们接近时撞到了一些垃圾。@w2 把我们的引擎舱撞得很严重。@p9 [ 奥利舰长 ] 我希望你们有备用零件,因为我们很快就不能让这艘船起飞了,如果你看这里...@w3 那些兹瑞克斯正准备把我们赶出去。@w1 但我们 不能!

English: What do you need me to do?

@q0[ Captain Orli ] Need ye to go give me crew a hand with the repairs.@w1 We've 'ready emptied our supplies on patchin' the en'jin pods, but there's some kinda pro-blem with the landing gears that're sending false signals to the ship's core.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] Ye prolly passed me En'jineer on the way up the ramp.@w2 He's working on the landing gears now and 'e says 'e needs help, but I don't got no one else to send.@w2 So that's where yer needed.@w4 Come back ta me when yer done helpin' 'im.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 奥利舰长 ] 需要你帮我的船员修理。@w1 我们已经用尽了我们的供应来修补引擎舱,但是着陆装置出了点问题,它们向飞船核心发送了错误的信号。@p9 [ 奥利舰长 ] 你可能在上坡的路上遇到了我的工程师。@w2 他现在正在修理着陆装置,他说需要帮助,但我没有其他人可以派。@w2 所以你就是需要的地方。@w4 完成帮助他后回来见我。

English: [ Captain Orli ] The en'jins are jes' heating up.@w2 Will take a while fer them to run diagnostics, then we're outta 'ere.@w2 Jes' make sher yer not onboard when it's time ta go.
Chinese (simplified): [ 奥利舰长 ] 引擎只是刚刚开始加热。@w2 它们运行诊断需要一段时间,然后我们就可以离开这里了。@w2 只是确保离开的时候你不在船上。

English: [ Captain Orli ] Had a bit o' en'jin trouble coming in.@w2 Set down 'ere so's we can do repairs.@w3 Yer welcome aboard 'slong as ya don't touch nuthin'.
Chinese (simplified): [ 奥利舰长 ] 进来时引擎出了点问题。@w2 我们在这里降落以便进行修理。@w3 只要你不碰任何东西,欢迎你上船。

English: @q0[ Captain Orli ] Are ye done helpin' tha en'jineer?@w2 No? Well, git to it!@w3 He's outside working on the landing gear.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 奥里舰长 ] 你帮工程师忙完了吗?@w2 没有?那快去!@w3 他正在外面修理起落架。

English: [ Engineer ]\nLookin' for the Capt'n?@w2 He's on the bridge.@w4\nMe? I'm tryin' ta fix this here broken landing gear.
Chinese (simplified): 【工程师】\n你在找舰长吗?@w2 他在舰桥上。@w4 \n我吗?我正试图修理这个坏掉的起落架。

English: [ Engineer ]\nYou the one Polaris sent?@w2\nCapt'n waitin' on the bridge for you.@w2 Just head up the ramp and follow the stairs up.
Chinese (simplified): 【工程师】\n你是极星派来的吗?@w2 舰长在舰桥上等你。@w2 直接上坡道,然后沿着楼梯上去。

English: @q0[ Engineer ]\nCapt'n already called down to say you're 'ere to help me sort out this problem.@w4\nI hope you know how to fix magnetic interlocks with vacuum tape, 'cause we're out of spare parts to fix it properly.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 【工程师】\n舰长已经打电话来说你是来帮我解决这个问题的。@w4 \n我希望你懂得如何用真空胶带修理磁性互锁装置,因为我们没有备用零件来正确修复它。

English: @q0[ Engineer ] Don't have the raw materials to make replacement parts, and tha ships' constructor is bein' screwy ever since the engines overheated.@w2 We've got problems all over tha ship thanks to that piece of junk we hit.@p9 [ Engineer ] The problem is that tha sensors in tha Landing gear keep telling tha ship's computer that we're flyin' over tha ocean.@w2 Now, i'm workin' on it on this end, but I need more parts, an' we're all out of 'em.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I thought I saw a constructor on my way to the bridge. Can't you make more parts?@p9 [ Engineer ] The Constructors are controlled by the ship's computer and it's blown a CPU Extender, which means it's over the CPU Limit.@w2 That means that the constructors are running at 10% speed, everything's drawing more power to run processes internally, the generators are running hot to deal with the extra power draw and Weapon tracking is offline.@p9 [ Engineer ] Your ship'll have the same problems if it goes over the processing limit, so make sure you've got enough CPU Extenders ta run yer ship.@w2 Every CPU Extender adds to the processing limit. None of that stupid CPU Tier business.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 【工程师】 没有原材料来制造替换零件,而且自从引擎过热后,飞船的建造机就一直在出问题。@w2 我们因为撞上那堆垃圾而船上到处都是问题。@p9 【工程师】 问题是起落架里的传感器一直在告诉飞船的计算机我们正在海上飞行。@w2 现在,我正在这边工作,但我需要更多的零件,而且我们用完了。@p9 【{PlayerName}】 我想我在去舰桥的路上看到了一个建造机。你不能制造更多的零件吗?@p9 【工程师】 建造机由飞船的计算机控制,它烧坏了一个CPU扩展器,这意味着它超过了CPU限制。@w2 这意味着建造机以10%的速度运行,所有东西都在消耗更多的电力来运行内部过程,发电机为了应对额外的电力消耗而运行得过热,武器跟踪系统也离线了。@p9 【工程师】 如果你的飞船超过处理限制,它也会有同样的问题,所以确保你有足够的CPU扩展器来运行你的飞船。@w2 每个CPU扩展器都会增加处理限制。没有那些愚蠢的CPU等级的事情。

English: <color=#0088ff>So what do you need me to do?</color>

@q0[ Engineer ] Grab a pen an' i'll tell ya what parts I need you to go out an' either buy or make yourself.@w2 What I need is:@w2 50 Steel Plates@w2 30 Mechanical Components@w2 48 Electronics@w2 20 Plastic Tubing@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I've copied the list to my PDA (F1), so it shouldn't be a problem.@p9 [ Engineer ] Better get to it then.@w2 Them Zax'll be knockin' on our door soon an' I don't wanna be caught with my pants down.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [工程师] 拿支笔,我来告诉你我需要你出去买或者自己制作的部件。@w2 我需要的是:@w2 50块钢板@w2 30个机械部件@w2 48个电子元件@w2 20个塑料管@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我已经把清单复制到我的PDA (F1)里了,所以应该没问题。@p9 [工程师] 那就赶紧行动吧。@w2 那些兹瑞克斯很快就要来敲我们的门了,我可不想被他们抓个措手不及。

English: @q0[ Engineer ] You need that list again? I thought you had it in yer PDA or somethin?@w2 What I need is:@w2 50 Steel Plates 30 Mechanical Components 48 Electronics 20 Plastic Tubing Don't take too long. Them 'Zax'll be here before ya know it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 工程师 ] 你又需要那份清单?我以为你已经在个人数字助理里存着呢?@w2 我需要的是:@w2 50块钢板 30个机械组件 48个电子元件 20个塑料管 别花太长时间。那些兹瑞克斯很快就会到这儿的。

English: I've brought you the parts you needed

@q0[ Engineer ] Nice work, mate!@w3 I'll have this repaired in 15 minutes and we should be able ta take off...@w2 if we're lucky and feather tha throttle so it doesn't overload again.@w2 Will need ta set 'er down at tha Trade Station for proper repairs though.@w1 Capt'n ain't gonna be happy about that.@p9 [ Engineer ] You go up to the bridge an' tell the Capt'n about the good news.@w2 With repairs and pre-flight checks, we're looking at an hour 'slong as nuthin' goes wrong.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 工程师 ] 干得好,伙计!@w3 我会在15分钟内修好它,如果幸运的话,我们就能起飞...@w2 如果我们运气好,并且轻轻地加油门,这样它就不会再次过载。@w2 不过我们得在贸易空间站降落进行适当的修理。@w1 舰长不会对此感到高兴的。@p9 [ 工程师 ] 你上桥去告诉舰长这个好消息。@w2 包括修理和飞行前检查,我们预计需要一个小时,如果一切顺利的话。

English: @q0[ Captain Orli ] Dammit! I thought we'd have more time!@w3 You, Polaris-Guy!@w1 How's tha repairs coming?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Engineer says the repairs will be done in 15 minutes, and pre-flight checks in another 40.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] That ain't enough time, dammit!@w2 Their ships'll be 'ere in less than 5 minutes and the Diomese's guns are still outta commission.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] By the looks of it, yer ain't 'quipped to deal with high-speed bombers neither...@w6 You know 'ow to use tha manual control on a Turret?@w2 This tub's guns might not 'ave target tracking, but you can still take control of 'em an' fire them manually!@p9 [ Captain Orli ] Head downstairs to either the Core Room at the rear or the Ship's Computer Room at tha front. We got a Flak Turret at tha front and a Gatling Turret at tha back.@w3 There'll be a Holographic Interface against the ceiling. Go up to it and Interact with the bottom of the turret to take manual control.@w3 Use 'em to shoot down them 'zax ships before they blow up my ship.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 奥里利舰长 ] 该死!我以为我们会有更多时间!@w3 你,极星的家伙!@w1 修理进展如何?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 工程师说修理将在15分钟内完成,飞行前检查还需要另外40分钟。@p9 [ 奥里利舰长 ] 那时间不够,该死!@w2 他们的飞船将在不到5分钟内到达,而迪奥米斯的炮台仍然无法使用。@p9 [ 奥里利舰长 ] 看起来,你也没有装备来对付高速轰炸机...@w6 你知道怎么使用手动控制在炮塔上吗?@w2 这艘船的炮台可能没有目标追踪,但你仍然可以接管它们并手动开火!@p9 [ 奥里利舰长 ] 下楼去船尾的核心室或者船头的飞船计算机室。我们在船头有一个高射炮炮塔,在船尾有一个加特林炮炮塔。@w3 天花板上会有一个全息界面。走到它下面并与之互动,以手动控制炮塔。@w3 用它们击落那些兹瑞克斯飞船,在我船被炸飞之前。

English: [ Captain Orli ] What are ye still doin' here?@w1 Get yer ass to either the Core Room at the rear or the Forward Computer room and get on those turrets!@w1 If ye still can't figger it out, the computer in there will tell ya what you need to do.
Chinese (simplified): [ 奥里利舰长 ] 你还在这儿干什么?@w1 赶紧去船尾的核心室或者船头的前计算机室,去操作那些炮塔!@w1 如果你还是搞不清楚,里面的计算机会告诉你需要做什么。

English: Warning!@w2 Exceeded CPU Limit! (Insufficient processing power)@w3 Install additional CPU Extenders or remove excessive devices@p6 Unlocking Manual Control@w2 To activate manual controls: Stand beneath the drop-down holographic display and press 'Interact' to take manual control of the Retractable Turret. Failing that, just look at the underside of the turret mounted in the ceiling and press the 'Use' button.
Chinese (simplified): 警告!@w2 超过CPU限制! (处理能力不足)@w3 安装额外的CPU扩展器或移除过多设备@p6 解锁手动控制@w2 要激活手动控制:站在下拉全息显示器下方,按'互动'以手动控制可伸缩炮塔。 如果不行,只需查看天花板上安装的炮塔底部,按'使用'按钮。

English: Warning!@w2\nExceeded CPU Limit! (Insufficient processing power)@w3\nInstall additional CPU Extenders or remove excessive devices
Chinese (simplified): 警告!@w2 \n超过CPU限制! (处理能力不足)@w3 \n安装额外的CPU扩展器或移除过多设备

English: @q0[ Captain Orli ] Damn fine shootin' there, kiddo!@w4 Ya really stuck it to them 'zax thugs!@w2 If ya ever get tired of runnin' errands fer Polaris, you should come work fer me over 'in the Trade Federation. We'll be glad to 'av someone like you aboard!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm afraid I have a prior engagement with Polaris, so i'll have to take a raincheck on that, Captain.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] That's too bad, then.@w2 Can't blame a Prenn for tryin'.@w2 Now, since the 'zax saw ya commin' abord, they think ye'v taken over the ship and don't want nuthin' to do with a hostage situation, so've called Polaris to sort it all out fer them.@w2 Looks like ye'r in the clear, I reckon.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] Since I know ye'r fixin' to get inta space an' that Polaris will prolly stiff ya on a bonus, i'm givin' you an Insulation Booster fer yer suit an' a lil' extra.@w2 It'll make it easier ta get around in space an' cold places.@w3 There's an Armor Locker down in the Hold that ye can use ta put the booster onta yer suit 'fore ya leave.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 奥里舰长 ] 真不错的射击,小家伙!@w4 你真的给了那些'zax流氓一个教训!@w2 如果你厌倦了为极星跑腿,你应该来贸易联盟为我工作。我们会很乐意有像你这样的人加入!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 恐怕我与极星有先前的约定,所以我得婉拒你的邀请,舰长。@p9 [ 奥里舰长 ] 那太遗憾了。@w2 作为一个普伦人,我不能责怪你尝试。@w2 现在,因为'zax看到你登上了飞船,他们认为你已经接管了飞船,不想陷入人质局面,所以他们联系了极星来解决这一切。@w2 看起来你已经摆脱困境了,我想。@p9 [ 奥里舰长 ] 既然我知道你打算进入太空,而且极星可能会在奖金上亏待你,我给你一个绝缘增强器用于你的宇航服,还有一点点额外的。@w2 这将使你在太空和寒冷的地方更容易行动。@w3 船舱里有一个装备箱,你可以在离开前使用它来将增强器安装到你的宇航服上。

English: @q0[ Captain Orli ] No it ain't!@w2 Most people from Polaris'd take tha cargo and split 'n leave us ta deal with the 'zax ourselves.@w2 Don't ya turn out like 'em!@w1 Only thing they care 'bout is creds.@p9 [ Captain Orli ] Right!@w2 Git off me ship.@w2 Off wit' ye!@w1 Go on, Git!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 奥里舰长 ] 不是这样的!@w2 大多数来自极星的人会拿走货物,然后分道扬镳,让我们自己对付兹瑞克斯。@w2 别变成他们那样!@w1 他们唯一关心的就是信用点。@p9 [ 奥里舰长 ] 对!@w2 从我的船上下去。@w2 走吧!@w1 快走,走吧!

English: [ Captain Orli ] Good ta see ya!@w2 We're just doing pre-flight checks right now. Then we'll be off.@w5 Might stick 'round fer a bit longer ta milk the 'Hostage Situation' a bit an' use it ta beat the 'zax inta dropping their import taxes on this cargo run.
Chinese (simplified): [ 奥里舰长 ] 很高兴见到你!@w2 我们现在正在进行飞行前的检查。然后我们就要出发了。@w5 可能会多待一会儿,利用‘人质情况’多赚一些,用它来迫使兹瑞克斯降低这批货物的进口税。

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] Welcome back, #8376455466.@w2 I've just received word from the Zirax that a 'Terran terrorist' has taken control of the freighter and want Polaris to handle negotiations.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] That's quite the coup you've pulled off, and we at Polaris are very happy with the results of this transaction.@w2 Not only can we get import taxes written off for the cargo, we got leverage over the local authorities since they launched an attack against a Trade Federation freighter.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 帕夫雷尔行政官 ] 欢迎回来,#8376455466。@w2 我刚收到兹瑞克斯的消息,一个‘地球恐怖分子’控制了货船,并希望极星处理谈判。@p9 [ 帕夫雷尔行政官 ] 你这次干得非常漂亮,我们在极星对这次交易的结果非常满意。@w2 我们不仅可以免除这批货物的进口税,我们还对当地当局有了影响力,因为他们对贸易联盟的货船发动了攻击。

English: I've done what you've asked. Now tell me how to find my people.
Chinese (simplified): 我已经按你的要求做了。现在告诉我如何找到我的人。
我期望得到相应的报酬 (跳过)

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] We do things a specific way around here, #8376455466.@w2 You do a job, you get paid.@w2 Under the umbrella of Polaris, money always comes first.@w2 It's a measure of one's value.@w2 A physical means of measuring the worth of an individual and everything they've achieved.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] A man with no wealth is either a failure, or a threat to those that do.@w3 A man who does not seek to gain wealth is a danger to everyone that does.@w4 So keep in mind {PlayerName}.@w2 That if you do not seek compensation at Polaris, you will be considered untrustworthy.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] I suppose you could think of money to us as counters in the great game of life, and we're all players.@w2 Whether we like it or not.@w2 And now you're a player at the table...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员 帕弗雷尔 ] 我们这里做事有一套特定的方式,#8376455466。@w2 你做了工作,就会得到报酬。@w2 在波拉利斯的保护伞下,金钱总是第一位的。@w2 它是衡量一个人价值的标准。@w2 一种衡量一个人的价值以及他们所取得成就的物质手段。@p9 [ 管理员 帕弗雷尔 ] 没有财富的人要么是一个失败者,要么是对那些拥有财富的人的威胁。@w3 不寻求获得财富的人对每个寻求财富的人都是一种危险。@w4 所以请记住,{PlayerName}。@w2 如果你在波拉利斯不寻求报酬,你将被视为不可信任。@p9 [ 管理员 帕弗雷尔 ] 我猜想你可以把金钱看作是我们生活中伟大游戏的筹码,我们都是所有玩家。@w2 无论我们是否喜欢。@w2 现在你已经是桌子上的玩家了...

English: @q0[ Administrator Pavrell ] You did well on this assignment, so i've been authorized to give you a 2,500 bonus on top of the original 10,000 credits offered.@w2 I'm sure the freighter's captain likely gave you a bonus as well.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] And the UC crew who made a deal with you?@w2 What about them?@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] I was about to get to that...@w3 The exact details on your people's contracts are still classified, so i'll summarize them for you:@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Your Naval personnel agreed to long-term contracts with Polaris to loan us two teams of UC Engineering Corps' to provide Terran equipment and manufacturing processes to Polaris Megacorp in exchange for funding, transportation and opening a dialogue with various Polaris Megacorp subsidiaries.@p9 [ Administrator Pavrell ] Upon completing arrangements, the...@w2 'clients'@w2 were taken to Kenex-62 in orbit aboard a pair of transports for medical attention and to be assigned to long-distance couriers to their chosen destinations.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你在这次任务中表现得很好,因此我被授权给你额外发放2,500奖金,加上原先提供的10,000信用点。@w2 我相信货船的舰长可能也给了你奖金。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 和你达成协议的UC船员呢?@w2 他们怎么样了?@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 我正要说到那一点...@w3 方人员的合同细节仍然是保密的,所以我会为你总结:@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 你的海军人员同意与极星签订长期合同,借给我们两支UC工程兵团,为极星集团提供地球设备和制造工艺,以换取资金、运输和与极星集团各子公司开展对话。@p9 [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ] 安排完成后,...'客户'@w2 被带到了轨道上的Kenex-62接受医疗照顾,并被分配到长途快递前往他们选择的目的地。

English: [ Administrator Pavrell ]\nDon't you have somewhere else to be?@w3\nPreferrably upstairs annoying someone else.
Chinese (simplified): [ 管理员帕弗雷尔 ]\n你不是还有别的地方要去吗?@w3 \n最好是上楼去烦别人。

English: Welcome to The Cargo Bay! The #1 Shipping and Transport company in this quadrant!@w2\nI'm afraid we can't book any flights at this time due to pirate activity.@w2 Our shipping services are still operational, provided you have a legal address.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到 货物舱!这个象限中排名第一的航运和运输公司!@w2 \n很抱歉,由于海盗活动,我们现在无法预订任何航班。@w2 我们的航运服务仍然运营,前提是你有合法地址。

English: Administrator Pavrell says you have some logs for me?
Chinese (simplified): 管理员帕弗雷尔说你有一些日志要给我?

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid you need to have an authenticated and legal address in order to send a package through our services.@w2</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You're not listed as having a home address, or at least one not recognized by the system.@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'm terribly sorry, but you'll have to get authenticated if you want to use our services.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>很抱歉,您需要有一个经过认证且合法的地址才能通过我们的服务发送包裹。@w2 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>您没有被列为有家庭地址的人,或者至少没有一个系统认可的地址。@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>非常抱歉,但如果您想使用我们的服务,您必须经过认证。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm sorry, but due to a recent hijacking, all chartered flights between this Trade Station and Kenex Station are current suspended.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Flights should resume their regular schedule tomorrow.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>很抱歉,由于最近发生的劫机事件,目前这个贸易空间站和Kenex空间站之间的所有包机航班都已暂停。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>航班应该会在明天恢复正常时刻表。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>@q0Oh, yes.@w2 Administrator Pavrell just sent me a message about that.@w5</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You're looking for the transport logs for a chartered flight from almost 4 years ago?@w2 That's a long time. Do you know what you're looking for?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>@q0 哦,是的。@w2 管理员Pavrell刚刚给我发了一条消息。@w5 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>您正在寻找大约4年前的包机航班的运输记录?@w2 那是很久以前的事了。您知道您在找什么吗?</color>

English: Two shuttles carrying humans to Kenex Station
Chinese (simplified): 两艘运送人类前往Kenex空间站的穿梭机

English: @q0Give me a moment, sir.@p7 @w3 .@w3 .@w3 .@p3 There's only one flight that matches those criteria.@w4 The two shuttles transported 27 of your 'humans' to Kenex Station.@w2 Three of them went to Ok'y Medical for long-term medical treatment, while the remaining passengers were booked for transport on a PolSec convoy.@w2 The flight was booked and paid for by the Polaris Executive Board.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 请稍等,先生。@p7 @w3 .@w3 .@w3 .@p3 只有一个航班符合这些条件。@w4 两艘穿梭机将27名您的“人类”运送到了Kenex Station。@w2 其中三人前往Ok'y Medical接受长期医疗治疗,而其余乘客则预订了PolSec车队的运输。@w2 这次航班是由极星执行委员会预订并支付的。

English: @q0Ok'y Medical is one of the major medical healthcare centers and suppliers of various medications in the Arkenian Republic and Zirax Empire.@w2 They have a small branch on Kenex Station.@w3\nThey don't usually handle long-term care. But this... 'Ensign Emmerson' must've been in bad shape.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 Ok'y Medical 是阿肯尼亚共和国和兹瑞克斯帝国的主要医疗保健中心和各种药物的供应商之一。@w2 他们在Kenex Station有一个小型分支机构。@w3 \n他们通常不处理长期护理。但这个... 'Ensign Emmerson' 一定状况很差。

English: So how do I get to Kenex Station?

@q0PolSec?@w2 They're Polaris' private security forces.@w3 They're the reason pirates don't mess with our shuttles and package freighters... usually.@w3 For your people to get on one of their flights, they'd have to be very important to the executive board.@w2 No one but security personnel are allowed on their ships.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Any way for me to find out where they were taken after that?@p9 I'm afraid not, sir.@w2 The Cargo Bay is not directly affiliated with PolSec after all. They're basically the Military.@w3 PolSec has it's own docking bay on Kenex Station. So you might want to try asking there.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 PolSec?@w2 他们是Polaris的私人安全部队。@w3 他们是我们穿梭机和包裹货船不受海盗骚扰的原因... 通常。@w3 要让你的人乘坐他们的航班,他们必须对 执行委员会 非常重要。@w2 除了安全人员外,没有人被允许登上他们的飞船。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我有什么办法可以找出他们被带到哪里了吗?@p9 恐怕不行,先生。@w2 货舱 毕竟不直接隶属于 PolSec。他们基本上是军队。@w3 PolSec在 Kenex Station 有自己的码头。所以你或许可以试着去那里问问。

English: How do I get to Kenex Station?

@q0The Polaris Executive Board are like... the owners of Polaris. They run the entire corporation.@w2 There are... I think twelve Executives that direct all of Polaris and it's subsidiaries? I'm not really sure.@w2 I just work the counter here. I'm not really management material, so I don't really pay attention to that kind of stuff.@p9 I know there's a CEO that makes all the big decisions.@w2 They took the position like...@w2 15 cycles ago and there hasn't been a problem. So I guess everything's fine.@w3 Anyway, It looks like your people got full board approval to be sent... somewhere.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 极星执行委员会 就像是... Polaris的所有者。他们管理着整个公司。@w2 有... 我认为有十二位高管指导着Polaris及其所有子公司?我不太确定。@w2 我只是在这里柜台工作。我不是真正的管理层材料,所以我不太关注那种事情。@p9 我知道有一位CEO做出所有重大决策。@w2 他们大约在...@w2 15个周期前上任,而且没有问题。所以我猜一切都很好。@w3 无论如何,看起来你的人得到了董事会的全面批准被送往... 某个地方。

English: So how do I get to Kenex Station?
So what's this PolSec that took them?

@q0Normally, you'd be able to book a flight with us.@w2 Unfortunately, a hijacker has apparently crashed a freighter so the Imperial Authorities have ordered us to hold all commercial transport flights off the planet so the hijacker can't escape.@p9 If you don't have teleport clearance, then your only other option is to use a personal spacecraft.@w2 The empire can't stop private flights, so there's nothing stopping you from flying up there yourself if you have your own Small Ship.@p9 If you do have your own ship, I can give you the coordinates of Kenex Station and clearance to use the main hangar at Kenex Station.@w3 Is that something you'd be interested in?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] That's exactly what I need.@w2 I'm sure I can sort a ship out for myself.@p9 I've sent the access codes and coordinates of Kenex Station to your personal device.@w3 Thank you for choosing to fly with The Cargo Bay!
Chinese (simplified): 通常来说,您可以通过我们预订航班。不幸的是,一名劫机者显然坠毁了一艘货船,因此帝国当局已下令暂停所有商业运输航班,以防止劫机者逃脱。如果您没有传送许可,那么您唯一的其他选择是使用个人飞船。帝国无法阻止私人飞行,所以如果您拥有自己的小型飞船,没有什么可以阻止您自己飞上去。如果您确实拥有自己的飞船,我可以为您提供Kenex Station的坐标以及在Kenex Station主机库的使用许可。这是否是您感兴趣的?[ {PlayerName} ] 这正是我需要的。 我相信我可以为自己安排一艘飞船。 我已经将Kenex Station的访问代码和坐标发送到您的个人设备。 感谢您选择与The Cargo Bay!飞行。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Looks like we've got our best lead yet, Ida.@w2 It seems that the survivors from the UC Fleet were able to escape the planet from here, without the Zirax tracking them.@w3 If I can make it to Kenex Station, I should be able to pick up their trail to wherever the rest of the Fleet fled to.@p9 [ IDA ] It is worth noting Commander, that almost four years have passed since they left this location and it's possible that the fleet is no longer there, or Polaris may be unwilling to divulge the current whereabouts of the Fleet.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 看来我们得到了迄今为止最好的线索,Ida。 似乎UC舰队的幸存者能够从这里逃离星球,而没有被兹瑞克斯追踪。 如果我能到达Kenex Station,我应该能够找到他们逃往舰队其余部分的踪迹。[ IDA ] 值得注意的是,指挥官,自从他们离开这个位置已经过去了将近四年,舰队可能已经不在那里了,或者Polaris可能不愿意透露舰队当前的位置。

English: We'll cross that bridge when we come to it

@q0[ IDA ] I will continue to infiltrate the Polaris' systems, but it seems that there's nothing more to learn from the Trade Station's databanks.@w2 More can hopefully be learned from the systems on Kenex Station.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Well, that's the next step on the journey, Ida.@w2 I've got to get a ship together. One that's armed well enough to deal with enemy crafts, because I know there's all sorts of dangers up there aside from explosive decompression.@p9 [ IDA ] Shall I plot an exit trajectory in preparation for your eventual flight from this planet, Commander?
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我将继续渗透Polaris的系统,但从贸易空间站的数据库中似乎没有什么更多可学的了。希望从Kenex Station的系统中可以学到更多。 [ {PlayerName} ] 好吧,Ida,那是旅程的下一步。 我得组建一艘飞船。一艘武装得足以对付敌机的飞船,因为我知道除了爆炸性减压之外,上面还有各种各样的危险。 [ IDA ] 指挥官,我是否应该为您最终离开这个星球的飞行准备一个出口轨迹?

English: Welcome to Ok'Y Medical Care!\nI am the Station Medical Officer Su'oul and I am licensed to offer you medicines and injectors compatible with Terran physiology.\nHow may I help you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Ok'Y医疗护理!\n我是站点医疗官Su'oul,我有执照为您提供与地球生理学兼容的药物和注射器。\n我今天怎么帮助您?

English: I'm looking for several of my people

[ Doctor Su'oul ] Terran, aren't you?@w2 Yes, some members of your kind were brought in here a few years ago.@w2 Your kind are particularly rare in these parts, so I know you're some relation to them and not some kind of criminal@w2... right?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] No, i'm just a little late to the party.@w2 I'm trying to find where the rest of my crew went to, but i'm running low on leads.@w5 All I know is that Ensign Emmerson was brought here.@p9 [ Doctor Su'oul ] Well, i'm afraid i'm not allowed to tell you any more than that.@w2 It's a violation of Doctor-Patient confidentiality to discuss anything more than that.@w3 I'm sure you understand...
Chinese (simplified): [ 医生Su'oul ] 地球人,对吧? 是的,几年前有一些您的同类被带到这里。 您的同类在这些地区特别罕见,所以我知道您与他们有某种关系,而不是某种罪犯...对吧? [ {PlayerName} ] 不,我只是来晚了一点。 我正在试图找到我的其他船员去了哪里,但我的线索快用完了。 我只知道Emmerson少尉被带到了这里。 [ 医生Su'oul ] 嗯,恐怕我不能告诉你更多了。 讨论超出这一点的任何内容都是违反医患保密的。 我相信您能理解...

English: @q0[ Doctor Su'oul ] Thank you for your kind donation, sir.@w4 Since you're one of Ok'y Medical's donors, I'm obligated to show you how successful our medical practices are with a review of our previous patients.@w2 I'm sure they'd be happy to share their records with you if it means we can save more lives like we saved theirs.@p9 [ Doctor Su'oul ] For this patient in question, a...@w2 Natasha Emmerson, she came in here in bad shape.@w2 Broken collarbone, compound fractures to her right leg and an untreated concussion that was causing swelling in her brain.@w2 It was quite serious at the time.@p9 [ Doctor Su'oul ] Don't look so concerned, sir.@w2 Such conditions are easily treated and she walked out of here a month later.@w2 She was the last of the injured crew to be discharged.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What happened to the rest of the crew after that?@p8 [ Doctor Su'oul ] I'm afraid that's outside my job description.@w2 Once the patient walks out those doors, they're no longer my patient.@w3 However...@w2 I would suggest you try speaking with the Floor Manager. He will have detailed records of your people's stay on the station. Have a good day, sir!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [苏尔医生] 感谢您的慷慨捐赠,先生。@w4 既然您是Ok'y 医疗的捐赠者,我有责任通过我们之前病人的回顾来向您展示我们的医疗实践有多成功。@w2 我相信他们会很乐意与您分享他们的记录,如果这意味着我们可以像拯救他们一样拯救更多生命。@p9 [苏尔医生] 对于这位病人来说,一个...@w2 娜塔莎·艾默森,她来到这里时情况很糟糕。@w2 锁骨骨折,右腿复合性骨折,以及未经治疗的脑震荡导致大脑肿胀。@w2 当时情况相当严重。@p9 [苏尔医生] 先生,请不要那么担心。@w2 这样的情况很容易治疗,一个月后她就从这里走了出去。@w2 她是最后一批出院的受伤船员。@p9 [{PlayerName}] 那之后其他船员怎么样了?@p8 [苏尔医生] 恐怕那不是我的工作范畴。@w2 一旦病人走出那些门,他们就不再是我的病人了。@w3 然而...@w2 我建议您尝试与楼层经理交谈。他将有您的人在空间站逗留的详细记录。 祝您有美好的一天,先生!

English: What if I made it worth your while? (Bribe 800 credits)
Chinese (simplified): 如果我让你感到值得呢? (贿赂800信用点)

English: What if I made it worth your while? (Bribe 800 credits)
Chinese (simplified): 如果我让你感到值得呢? (贿赂800信用点)

English: I'm sure I can change your mind when I come back
Chinese (simplified): 我相信我回来时可以改变你的想法

English: [ Doctor Su'oul ]\nNo.@w3 I can't just go around handing out confidential patient files to people who just come in off the back of a shuttle.@w3\nWe at Ok'y Medical are always happy to show evidence of our expert medical practices to our donors, if you understand my meaning...
Chinese (simplified): [ 苏尔医生 ]\n不,@w3 我不能就这样把病人的保密文件交给刚从穿梭机后面进来的人。@w3 \n我们在奥基医疗总是乐于向我们的捐助者展示我们专业的医疗实践的证据,如果你明白我的意思的话...

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Know anything about this 'Floor Manager', Ida?@w2 I don't want to be stuck doing errands for another Pavrell.@p9 [ IDA ] The Floor Manager handles the day-to-day running of the station's public facilities.@w3 He can be found in his office near the elevator on the upper trading floor.@w2 From the station's records and communications, the current Manager's name is Damris.@p9 [ IDA ] It seems as if he has only been working here for a year after the previous manager was caught embezzling funds.@w2 He has been massively overworked cleaning up the mess and dealing with the aftermath of the previous manager.@w3 There's a high probability he will want some help.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 你知道这个“楼层管理员”,Ida,有什么信息吗?@w2 我不想再次为另一个Pavrell跑腿。@p9 [ IDA ] 楼层管理员负责管理空间站公共设施的日常运作。@w3 你可以在上层交易区附近的电梯旁的办公室找到他。@w2 根据空间站的记录和通信,现任管理员的名字叫Damris。@p9 [ IDA ] 看起来他在这里工作了一年,是在上一位管理员因挪用公款被抓后。@w2 他一直在超负荷工作,清理混乱局面并处理前任管理员的遗留问题。@w3 有很大可能性他会需要一些帮助。

English: [ Doctor Su'oul ] As I explained: The Floor manager should have records of your people's stay.@w2 You can find his office upstairs next to the elevator. Have a good day, sir.
Chinese (simplified): [ 苏尔医生 ] 正如我解释的:楼层经理应该有你人民住宿的记录。@w2 你可以在电梯旁边的楼上找到他的办公室。 祝你有美好的一天,先生。

English: [ Manager Damris ]\nHave you been upstairs to the Polaris Security dock yet?@w2\nThat's where you'll need to ask around. Not down here.
Chinese (simplified): [ 经理达姆里斯 ]\n你去过楼上的极星安全码头了吗?@w2 \n那就是你需要打听的地方。不是这里。

English: He appears to be hard at work\nBest not to disturb him
Chinese (simplified): 他看起来正在努力工作\n最好不要打扰他

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ]\nYou don't look like you're part of PolSec...@w2 What are you doing up here?
Chinese (simplified): [@q0 [极星操作员 67372867]\n你看起来不像是极星的一员...@w2 你在这里做什么?

English: I'm looking for someone in PolSec to give me a hand with something
Chinese (simplified): 我在寻找极星的某个人来帮我处理一些事情

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Yeah well, don't go touching anything and don't go into any of the restricted areas.@w3 It would be a different story if we had a ship in port, but we don't. So... *Shrugs*
Chinese (simplified): [极星操作员 67372867] 嗯,不要乱碰任何东西,也不要进入任何限制区域。@w3 如果我们有飞船在港就好了,但我们没有。所以... *耸肩*

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Seriously? You don't know what PolSec is?@w2 How'd you even get past security without knowing that.@w3 We're basically Polaris' private military force.@w2 Deal with pirates, cargo escorts, that sort of thing.@p9 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] I mean, I say 'Military' but our ships are pretty small compared to the actual Imperial ships that.@w2 We're not allowed to have anything bigger than a Destroyer thanks to the Unity Accords.@w3 A pity, eh?@w1 I'd love to crew on a Heavy Cruiser instead of crewing this desk.@p9 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Well, now you're all caught up on PolSec.@w2 Anything else?
Chinese (simplified): [极星操作员 67372867] 真的吗?你不知道极星是什么?@w2 你是怎么在不知道的情况下通过安全检查的。@w3 我们基本上是极星的私人军事力量。@w2 处理海盗,货物护送,这类事情。@p9 [极星操作员 67372867] 我的意思是,我说'军事',但我们的飞船与实际的帝国飞船相比相当小。@w2 根据统一协议,我们不允许拥有比驱逐舰更大的东西。@w3 可惜,对吧?@w1 我宁愿在重型巡洋舰上工作,而不是坐在这里办公。@p9 [极星操作员 67372867] 嗯,现在你对极星有所了解了。@w2 还有其他事吗?

English: I think i'll look around a bit
Think you can help me out with something?
Chinese (simplified): 你觉得你能帮我处理一些事情吗?

English: @q0[ PolSec Operator 67372867 ]\nNo problem, but...@w2 are you alright? You just kinda stopped mid-sentence and started talking to yourself.@w2\nYou might wanna check yourself into Ok'y Medical if you're hearing voices.
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星操作员 67372867 ]\n没问题,但是...@w2 你还好吗?你刚才突然停顿,然后开始自言自语。@w2 \n你可能需要去Ok'y医疗中心检查一下,如果你听到了声音。

English: [ Coms Chief ]\nYou definitely shouldn't be up here. This is where we handle the station's communications, and we're all busy.@w2\nNow get out of here.
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ]\n你绝对不应该在这里。这里是我们处理空间站通讯的地方,我们都很忙。@w2 \n现在离开这里。

English: [ Coms Chief Mason ] Don't have any more work for you, kiddo.@w2 The com relays haven't had a single problem since you fixed 'em.@w2 That's part of the reason why I don't have more work for you.
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 Mason ] 没有更多的工作给你,孩子。@w2 自从你修好了通讯中继器,它们就没有出现过任何问题。@w2 这也是我没有更多工作给你的原因之一。

English: [ Coms Chief ]\nYou definitely shouldn't be up here. This is where we handle the station's communications, and we're all busy.@w2\nNow get out of here.
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ]\n你绝对不应该在这里。这里是我们处理空间站通讯的地方,我们都很忙。@w2 \n现在离开这里。
