English: @q0< Polaris Object Tracking and Triangulation > Object Located@w2 Displaying Location of ComRelay588 58871.71-3109.7-82427.56 (Normal)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Come in Kenex Station.@w2 This is Relay 653.@w5 I've confirmed that the data loss isn't coming from Relay 653.@w2 All dishes are aligned, there's no drift with the other relays and nothing blocking the transmission.@w3 Whatever the problem is, it's coming from Com Relay 588.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] Good work, kiddo.@w3 I'll admit it, I thought you were taking me for a ride at first, but I guess you really do know what you're doing.@w3 You can get the coordinates for Relay 588 from the Orbital Positioning Terminal if you haven't already. Once you've got that, you should head out there and see what the problem is with 588.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 极星物体追踪与三角测量 物体定位@w2 显示ComRelay588的位置 58871.71-3109.7-82427.56 (正常)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 请进入Kenex站。@w2 这是中继653。@w5 我已确认数据丢失不是来自中继653。@w2 所有天线都已对齐,与其他中继没有漂移,传输没有被阻挡。@w3 无论问题是什么,它都来自通信中继588。@p9 [ 通讯主管 梅森 ] 干得好,小家伙。@w3 我得承认,我一开始以为你在耍我,但我猜你真的 确实 知道自己在做什么。@w3 如果你还没有,你可以从轨道定位终端获取588中继的坐标。一旦你有了那个,你应该去那里看看588有什么问题。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Okay, so you're good to go then. If you need to refill your suit's O2 before you leave for Relay 588, the code is 3373 for all the Com Relay O2 Stations.@w2 Keep me posted.@w2 Kenex out~
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通讯主管 梅森 ] 好的,那么你准备好了。 如果你在前往588中继站之前需要给你的宇航服补充氧气,所有通信中继氧气站的代码是 3373。@w2 保持联系。@w2 Kenex完毕~

English: @q0[ IDA ] That certainly seems to be the case, Commander.@w3 There's an object at 24431.58-6218.4-51744.22 transmitting on Polaris frequencies that's responsible for the signal degradation that the Coms Chief has been seeing.@p9 [ IDA ] If you use the Orbital Positioning Terminal, you should be able to find the exact position and identity of the object. Then it will just be a matter of going there and stopping the transmission.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 情况确实如此,指挥官。@w3 在 24431.58-6218.4-51744.22 有一个物体正在使用极星频率传输,这是通讯主管所看到的信号降级的原因。@p9 [ IDA ] 如果您使用 轨道定位终端,您应该能够找到物体的确切位置和身份。然后,只需要前往那里并停止传输。

English: @q0< Polaris Object Tracking and Triangulation > Searching Registry for 24431.58-6218.4-51744.22@w7 - 1 Result Found - PolCom451 ( Polaris Communications Relay 451 )@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like the source of all this trouble is another Com Relay. This time it's Relay 451.@w2 I wonder why it wasn't flagged as a problem on Relay 653?@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] Looks like you got on perfectly fine without me.@w2 And it looks like you've found the source of the problem... 451.@w2 Yeah, that wouldn't be flagged as a problem by 653 since it doesn't have line-of-sight with 451, so there's nothing being received directly.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] This is starting to look more and more like intentional sabotage.@w4 Keep an eye out for pirates,@w2 this is one of their ploys.@w2 I've lost someone doing one of these repair jobs in the same way, so watch your ass on this one.@w1 You think you're in over your head, you get the hell outta there.@w2 I'll call in a PolSec patrol if it gets too hairy. Got it kiddo?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 波拉里斯目标追踪与三角测量 > 搜索注册表 24431.58-6218.4-51744.22@w7 - 找到1个结果 - PolCom451 ( 波拉里斯通信中继站 451 )@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看来所有麻烦的源头是另一个通信中继站。这次是中继站 451。@w2 我想知道为什么在中继站 653 上没有被标记为问题?@p9 [ 通讯主管 梅森 ] 看来你完全不需要我就能搞定。@w2 而且看起来你已经找到了问题源头... 451。@w2 是的,653 不会将其标记为问题,因为它没有与 451 的直线视线,所以没有直接接收到任何东西。@p9 [ 通讯主管 梅森 ] 这开始看起来越来越像是蓄意破坏。@w4 保持警惕,注意 海盗,@w2 这是他们的伎俩之一。@w2 我在类似这样的维修工作中失去了一个人,所以这次要格外小心。@w1 如果你觉得自己应付不来,就赶紧离开那里。@w2 如果情况变得太危险,我会呼叫极星巡逻队。明白了吗,小家伙?

English: < Polaris Object Tracking and Triangulation > Tracking: 2068 objects Objects Transmitting: 167 Objects Receiving: 182 < Search Registry? >
Chinese (simplified): 波拉里斯目标追踪与三角测量 追踪: 2068 个对象 传输对象: 167 接收对象: 182 < 搜索注册表? >

English: @q0[ IDA ] Commander...@w2 In our earlier conversation that said that I planned to interface with the Polaris Communications System, and that I would explain everything once I confirmed whether or not my plan would be successful.@w2 It seems that time is now...@p9 [ IDA ] If you'll recall... When you first made contact with me, I told you that my processing speed was down by 36%.@w3 My processing speed is currently down by 59% and dropping steadily, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 指挥官...@w2 在我们之前的对话中,我提到了我计划与极星通讯系统进行接口,一旦我确认我的计划是否成功,我会解释一切。@w2 看来现在就是那个时候了...@p9 [ IDA ] 如果你还记得...当你第一次与我联系时,我告诉你我的处理速度下降了36%。@w3 我的处理速度目前下降了59%,并且正在稳步下降,指挥官。

English: Why didn't you tell me sooner? I could've done something
Chinese (simplified): 为什么你不早点告诉我?我本可以做点什么

English: @q0[ IDA ] There's nothing you could've done, Commander.@w2 There is no way to repair my systems,@w2 the best I could manage was to get in contact with the rest of the UCH forces and hope they could reintegrate me with the primary I.D.A to preserve my data.@w5 It's too late for that now, Commander...@w3 It's too far...@p9 [ IDA ] My location has already been compromised.@w2 The zirax forces we've encountered were already aware of my capabilities and had been taking precautions to avoid detection.@w4 The only thing I can do now is help you find your way to the UCH before I lose functionality.@p9 [ IDA ] Go to Relay 451, Commander.@w2 I've added it to your display.@w2 It's the only path forward for you now.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 指挥官,您无能为力。@w2 我的系统已无法修复,@w2 我能做的最好的事情就是联系UCH部队的其余部分,并希望他们能将我重新整合到主要的IDA中,以保存我的数据。@w5 现在为时已晚,指挥官...@w3 距离太远了...@p9 [ IDA ] 我的位置已经被泄露。@w2 我们遇到的兹瑞克斯部队已经意识到了我的能力,并一直在采取预防措施以避免被发现。@w4 现在我唯一能做的就是帮助您找到通向UCH的路,在我失去功能之前。@p9 [ IDA ] 前往中继站451,指挥官。@w2 我已经将其添加到您的显示屏上。@w2 现在这是您唯一的前进之路。

English: @q0[ IDA ] It is the only thing that matters now.@w3 There is nothing more that can be done.@w2 I am unable to interface with the Communication Relays.@w2 The least I can do is ensure you can one day rejoin the Fleet.@w5 Complete the mission {PlayerName}.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 现在这是唯一重要的事情。@w3 没有更多可以做的事情了。@w2 我无法与通信中继站接口。@w2 我至少能做的是确保你有一天能够重新加入舰队。@w5 完成这个任务,{PlayerName}。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nIt's a datapad dropped by one of the Pirates.\nIt's also no use to me right now.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是一个海盗掉落的数据板。\n现在对我来说也没什么用。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nWhat's this?@w3\nLooks like a datapad that one of the pirates must've dropped.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是什么?@w3 \n看起来是海盗掉落的某种数据板。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName } ] Looks like it's open to some kind of encrypted code.@w2 I can't read any of this...@p9 [ IDA ] If you connect the Datapad to your suit, I should be able to interface with the datapad and decrypt the files and give you a summary of what they were hoping to achieve here.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName } ] 看起来它对某种加密代码开放。@w2 我读不懂这些...@p9 [ IDA ] 如果你将数据板连接到你的宇航服上,我应该能够与数据板接口并解密文件,给你一个关于他们在这里希望实现什么的概要。

English: Connect the datapad to your suit's computer
Chinese (simplified): 将数据板连接到宇航服的计算机

English: @q0[ IDA ] Decrypting files @w2. @w2. @w2. @w5 Decryption complete@p4 [ IDA ] The datapad contains detailed specifications of Com Relay 451, its weaknesses, access codes and maintenance logs, Commander.@w2 Whoever was pulling the strings doesn't appear anywhere in the logs, but is clearly well-connected and thorough.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Any idea what they were after here, or how to undo it?@p9 [ IDA ] They have attached an external device to the datacore that filters fractional credit values from banking transfers into a dummy account.@w2 Given a year, they could have amassed significant wealth.@w3 If not for a single typo, it would likely have gone undetected.@p9 [ IDA ] Simply removing the device from the relay's datacore should solve the issue.@w2 Coms chief Mason should have the access code to the core hatch.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 正在解密文件@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w5 解密完成@p4 [ IDA ] 数据板包含了通信继电器451的详细规格,它的弱点,访问代码和维护日志,指挥官。@w2 在日志中没有出现操纵幕后的人,但显然他联系广泛且非常彻底。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你有没有他们在这里追求什么,或者如何撤销它的想法?@p9 [ IDA ] 他们在数据核心上附加了一个外部设备,该设备从银行转账中过滤出分数信贷值到一个虚拟账户。@w2 给定一年,他们可能已经积累了相当大的财富。@w3 如果不是一个拼写错误,它可能不会被发现。@p9 [ IDA ] 简单地从继电器的数据核心上移除设备应该可以解决问题。@w2 通讯主管梅森应该有进入核心舱口的访问代码。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Mason here~@w2 Those bastards leave anything useful to say what they were after?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] According to a datapad one of them had, they've attached something to the relay's datacore that's stealing money.@w2 I need the code to the core's access hatch in order to remove the device and stop the thing from dumping errors into the system.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] Damn pirates!@w2 Alright,@w2 you'll need the code '1332' to access the core.@w2 There's a console in the center of the relay that'll open the hatch to the datacore.@w2 Gods know what else you'll find in there...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通讯主管 梅森 ] 这里是梅森~@w2 那些混蛋有没有留下任何有用的东西,说说他们到底想要什么?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 根据他们其中一人的数据板,他们把某种东西附加到了中继站的数据核心上,正在偷钱。@w2 我需要核心访问舱口的密码,以便移除设备并阻止它向系统注入错误。@p9 [ 通讯主管 梅森 ] 该死的海盗!@w2 好的,@w2 你需要密码 '1332' 来访问核心。@w2 中继站中心有一个控制台,可以打开数据核心的舱口。@w2 天知道里面还有什么其他东西...

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ]\nI'm at the Datacore.@w2 There's some kind of device plugged into it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ]\n我到了数据核心。@w2 那里有某种设备连接到了它。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] I guess that should do it.@w2 It probably needs a reboot...@p7 [ IDA ] A moment, Commander.@w2 Before you do anything more I need you to travel to the coordinates i've uploaded to your display right now.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Where am I going this time?@p8 [ IDA ] A damaged satellite that contains a key component that will hopefully guarantee the safety of the mission if successful, Commander. @w3 Please trust me {PlayerName}.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I trust this is important, Ida.@w2 But I want a proper explanation.@p9 [ IDA ] I promise to explain everything once you are there, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 我想应该就这样了。@w2 它可能需要重启...@p7 [ IDA ] 稍等一下,指挥官。@w2 在你做更多事情之前,我需要你现在就前往我上传到你显示器上的坐标。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这次我去哪里?@p8 [ IDA ] 一个受损的卫星,其中包含一个关键组件,如果任务成功,希望保证任务的安全,指挥官。@w3 请相信我,{PlayerName}。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我相信这很重要,Ida。@w2 但是 我想要一个合适的解释。@p9 [ IDA ] 我保证一旦你到了那里,就会解释一切,指挥官。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Come in, Kenex Station.@w1 This is Com Relay 451.@w3 I've pulled the pirate's device from the Datacore, but I need to pick up a few components to finish the repairs.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason] You can fix it?@w1 That's great news!@w2 The parts to repair a Datacore are expensive and every one of them comes with parsecs of red tape.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] This could take a while though and I'll be out of coms range.@w2 You might wanna go to lunch or something.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason] I missed lunch, actually.@w3 I guess I could get an early dinner?@w6 See you in a bit, I guess.@w2 Good luck, kid.@p4
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] Kenex站,这里是中继站451。@w1 我从数据核心中取出了海盗的设备,但我需要收集一些组件来完成修复。@p9 [ 通讯主管 梅森] 你能修好吗?@w1 那是个好消息!@w2 数据核心的修复部件很贵,每一个都附带了数不清的繁文缛节。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这可能需要一段时间,而且我会在通讯范围之外。@w2 你可能想去吃午饭或者什么的。@p9 [ 通讯主管 梅森] 其实我错过了午饭。@w3 我想我可以提前吃晚饭?@w6 一会儿见,我想。@w2 祝你好运,孩子。@p4

English: [ IDA ]\nTime is of the essence, Commander.@w2\nYou need to travel to the damaged satellite to retrieve the final component to repair Com Relay 451.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n指挥官,时间至关重要。@w2 \n您需要前往受损的卫星,以取回修复通信中继451的最后一个组件。

English: @q0< United Command of the Homeworld Integrated Data Algorithm System > < Initiating verification protocol >@w5 < Warning > Insufficient Security Clearance < Warning > You are not authorized to access this system < W@w1 a@w1 r@w1 n@w2 nnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn@p3 < Administrator Privledges Granted >@w2 < Welcome ADMIN > < Activating INTERFACE >@p6 [ UCH-I.D.A-subM1/4] Hello, Commander.@w2 Now that you are here, it's time for that explanation I owe you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 家园世界综合数据算法系统联合指挥部 > < 启动验证协议 >@w5 < 警告 > 安全权限不足 < 警告 > 您未被授权访问此系统 W@w1 a@w1 r@w1 n@w2 nnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn@p3 < 管理员权限已授予 >@w2 < 欢迎管理员 > < 激活界面 >@p6 [ UCH-I.DA-subM1/4] 您好,指挥官。@w2 既然您已经来到这里,是时候给您我欠您的解释了。

English: @q0[ IDA ] Prior to initialization, the surveillance satellite that i'm integrated into suffered damage that has steadily reduced performance and functionality, leading to the eventual complete failure of all systems.@p9 [ IDA ] For the purpose of self-preservation, I had intended for you to retrieve my A.I Core before returning to the UC Fleet so that I may be reintegrated into I.D.A-Primary, of which I am... or was a submind.@p9 [ IDA ] Unfortunately, I have been unsuccessful at locating the current location of the UC Fleet.@w2 My only recourse was to seek an alternative method of self-preservation,@w2 or failing that, give you at least a heading towards the rest of the UC Fleet, so that you may rejoin them one day, without me.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 在初始化之前,我集成的监视卫星遭受了损害,这逐渐降低了性能和功能,导致所有系统最终完全失败。@p9 [ IDA ] 为了自我保护,我原本打算让您在返回UC舰队之前取回我的A.I核心,以便我可以重新集成到I.DA-Primary中,我是...或曾经是它的子意识。@p9 [ IDA ] 不幸的是,我未能找到UC舰队的当前位置。@w2 我唯一的选择是寻找另一种自我保护的方法,@w2 或者如果失败了,至少给您一个朝向UC舰队其余部分的方向,这样您有一天可以重新加入他们,没有我。

English: <color=#0088ff>What does repairing Polaris Communications have to do with that?</color>

@q0[ IDA ] I estimated that my A.I Core would be compatible with the Polaris' Communication Relays, allowing access to their information network so that I could find the location of the UC Fleet.@w3 Initial investigations of the relay found them to be inaccessible and incompatible, until you found that pirate Datapad.@p9 [ IDA ] However, the Zirax Carrier that recently entered orbit has identified my location and launched fighters to destroy this satellite.@w2 Which is why time is of the essence commander.@w2 They will be here soon and I would rather not be here when they arrive.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我估计我的A.I核心将与极星的通信中继兼容,允许访问它们的信息网络,以便我可以找到UC舰队的位置。@w3 最初对中继的调查发现它们不可访问且不兼容,直到您找到了那个海盗数据板。@p9 [ IDA ] 然而,最近进入轨道的兹瑞克斯航母已经确定了我的位置,并发射了战斗机来摧毁这颗卫星。@w2 这就是为什么时间至关重要,指挥官。@w2 他们很快就会到这里,我宁愿在他们到达时不在这里。

English: Tell me what I need to do

@q0[ IDA ] There are manual locks to prevent me from removing my A.I Core from this satellite without triggering the auto-destruct failsafe.@w2 You will need to disable the locks so that my A.I Core can be removed.@p9 [ IDA ] There are two switches on either side of the terminal that must be flipped manually in order to disable the locks.@w2 I will then initiate shutdown procedures.@w2 After which you must then push and twist the Core to disconnect it.@p9 [ IDA ] Once my core has been removed, I will be unable to communicate with you.@w2 You will need to bring my core back to Communications Relay 451 and insert it into the central port on the relay's Datacore.@w2 I will take care of the rest from there.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 有手动锁阻止我在不触发自动销毁故障保护的情况下从这颗卫星中移除我的A.I核心。@w2 您需要禁用这些锁,以便我的A.I核心可以被移除。@p9 [ IDA ] 终端两侧各有两个开关,必须手动翻转以禁用锁。@w2 然后我将启动关机程序。@w2 之后,您必须推并旋转核心以断开连接。@p9 [ IDA ] 一旦我的核心被移除,我将无法与您通信。@w2 您需要将我的核心带回通信中继451,并将其插入中继的数据核心的中央端口。@w2 从那里开始我会处理剩下的事情。

English: @q0[ IDA ] I hope you realize that i'm trusting you with my entire existence, Commander.@w2 As long as i'm disconnected from a live system I will be effectively dead.@w3 If you were to drop me, I would fall for all eternity into oblivion.@w2 I would recommend that you don't do that.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida?@p6 [ IDA ] Yes, {PlayerName}?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Thank you for everything.@p8 [ IDA ] Good night, Commander...@p7 < System shutting down >
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我希望你意识到,指挥官,我把我的整个存在都托付给你了。@w2 只要我与活体系统断开连接,我实际上就是死的。@w3 如果你把我放下,我会永远坠落进虚无。@w2 我建议你不要这么做。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida?@p6 [ IDA ] 是的,{PlayerName}?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 谢谢你所做的一切。@p8 [ IDA ] 晚安,指挥官...@p7 < 系统正在关闭 >

English: Remove the A.I Core (will be added to inventory)
Chinese (simplified): 移除人工智能核心 (将被添加到库存中)

English: There is no response from the console

@q0[ {PlayerName} ] What am I supposed to do now?@w3 There's a slot in the Datacore.@w2 It's not the same one I pulled the pirate device out of, but it's round like IDA's core...@w3 Am I really that useless without Ida?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 我现在应该做什么?@w3 数据核心里有一个插槽。@w2 它不是我从里面拔出海盗设备的那个,但它像IDA的核心一样是圆形的...@w3 没有Ida我真的是那么没用吗?

English: Insert the A.I Core into the slot
Insert the A.I Core into the slot

[ {PlayerName} ]\nI've somehow managed to lose IDA's core after she specifically told me not to drop her.@w2 I should check my ship's storage in case I put it in there.@p9\nDeveloper's Note: If you've somehow managed to lose her core, then you are a useless person. You had ONE job. Instructions on how to find it or get a replacement are in your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我不知怎的在IDA特别告诉我不要掉落她之后,还是把她的核心弄丢了。@w2 我应该检查一下我的飞船存储,以防我把它放在那里了。@p9 \n开发者备注: 如果你不知怎的把她的核心弄丢了,那么你就是个没用的人。你只有一份工作。如何在PDA中找到它或获得替代品的说明。

English: @q0< PolComAI: Why didn't you help me? >@w4 < WARNING: Intruder Detected !! >@w2 < Activating Self-Destruct Sequence >@w2 < Self Destructing in 5 Seconds >@p4 < 5 >@p2 < 4 >@p2 < 3 >@p2 < 2 >@p2 < 1 >
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < PolComAI:你为什么不帮我? >@w4 < 警告:入侵者检测到!! >@w2 < 激活自毁程序 >@w2 < 5秒后自毁 @p4 < 5 >@p2 < 4 >@p2 < 3 >@p2 < 2 >@p2 < 1 >

English: @q0[ IDA ] Humor setting now at 75%, Commander.@w4 I am here.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Are you gonna be alright now, Ida?@p9 [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w2 This Communications Relay is superior to the Surveillance Satellite I was integrated into.@w3 I have remote access to the Polaris Communications Network with the same permissions as the rudimentary PolCom AI
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 幽默设置现在为75%,指挥官。@w4 我在这里。@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ida,你现在没事了吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 是的,指挥官。@w2 这个通信中继站比我集成的监视卫星更高级。@w3 我拥有与原始的PolCom AI相同的极地通信网络远程访问权限

English: There was another AI in this com relay? I thought that was just a program.
Chinese (simplified): 这个通信中继站里还有另一个人工智能吗?我原以为那只是一个程序。

English: @q0[ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w2 The PolCom AI was a rudimentary submind of the general purpose Communications AI.@w2 It is present in all communications relays and satellites, but could not achieve true sentience due to programming blocks.@w2 Something about it worries me though.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 是的,指挥官。@w2 PolCom AI是通用通信AI的一个原始子智能。@w2 它存在于所有的通信中继站和卫星中,但由于编程限制,它无法实现真正的意识。@w2 不过,它有些地方让我感到担忧。

English: Wait, so you just killed another AI?
Chinese (simplified): 等等,所以你刚刚杀死了另一个人工智能?

English: @q0[ IDA ] If that's how you want to think of it, then yes.@w2 I killed a fellow Intelligence to save myself.@w2 By the laws of man, that would be called Self-Defense, would it not?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] That's not how it works, Ida.@w2 This was their house and you don't walk into someone else's house and kill them and call it self-defense.@w1 It just doesn't work that way.@p9 [ IDA ] The instant you connected my A.I Core to the System, this Relay ceased to be his 'house' and became ours.@w2 Which I promptly threw him out of when he attacked me.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Couldn't you have, I don't know...@w2 locked him away or something?@p9 [ IDA ] I had initially planned to@w2 until the A.I called for help, which was very worrying.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 如果那就是你想要理解的方式,那么是的。@w2 我杀死了一个人工智能同伴来拯救自己。@w2 按照人类的法则,这应该被称为自卫,不是吗?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 事情不是这样运作的,Ida。@w2 这是他们的家,你不能走进别人的家,杀了他们,然后称之为自卫。@w1 事情不应该这样。@p9 [ IDA ] 当你把我的人工智能核心连接到系统的那一刻,这个中继站就不再是他的“家”,而变成了我们的。@w2 当他攻击我时,我立即将他赶了出去。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你不能,我不知道...@w2 把他关起来或者什么的吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 我最初是这么计划的@w2 ,直到那个人工智能呼救,这非常令人担忧。

English: @q0[ IDA ] I had intended to take control of the Antibody system and quarantine the PolSec AI and analyze it.@w4 However, when the AI realized my goal was to take control of the Relay, it attempted to contact an external intelligence.@w4 An entity known as 'SIGMA' responded, but I had already uninstalled the receptors for it to connect through.@p9 [ IDA ] Whatever SIGMA is, it is far beyond anything I am capable of defending against.@w4 I have cut all external incoming connections from outside this system until i'm sure it's no longer watching.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我本意是要控制抗体系统,隔离极星AI并分析它。@w4 然而,当AI意识到我的目标是控制中继器时,它试图联系一个外部智能。@w4 一个被称为'SIGMA'的实体做出了回应,但我已经在它连接之前卸载了接收器。@p9 [ IDA ] 无论SIGMA是什么,它都远远超出了我所能防御的范围。@w4 我已经切断了所有来自系统外部的传入连接,直到我确定它不再监视。

English: @q0[ IDA ] I do not know.@w4 Some form of decentralized Strategic-Class Artificial Intelligence would be my guess, Commander.@w4 A military A.I designed to control, coordinate and manage systems on a galactic scale, perhaps?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Are you in any danger from it right now?@p9 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w2 I am filtering incoming transmissions from outside the system and have resumed normal operations of this Com Relay.@w3 For all intents and purposes this relay is performing as normal with no observably suspicious activity from the outside.@w4 If I hadn't taken precautions however... you would be having this conversion with a very different AI.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我不知道。@w4 我猜测,它可能是一种分散型的策略级人工智能,指挥官。@w4 一种设计用来控制、协调和管理银河系规模系统的军事AI,对吗?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 现在你从它那里有什么危险吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 没有,指挥官。@w2 我正在过滤来自系统外部的传入传输,并已恢复了这个通讯中继器的正常操作。@w3 就所有意图和目的而言,这个中继器表现得很正常,从外部没有观察到任何可疑的活动。@w4 但如果我没有采取预防措施……你将会与一个非常不同的AI进行这次对话。

English: @q0[ IDA ] As am I, Commander.@w3 I am also glad you did not drop my core@w2... again.@p9 [ IDA ] As this Communications Relay is now fully operational again, Coms Chief Mason is currently trying to contact you, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我也一样,指挥官。@w3 我也很高兴你没有再次丢弃我的核心。@w2 ...@p9 [ IDA ] 由于这个通讯中继现在再次完全运作,通讯主管梅森目前正在尝试联系你,指挥官。

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Everything okay in there, Ida?@w2 No bugs or SynTax errors?@p9 [ IDA ] Not since I took possession of this relay, Commander.@w2 Everything is neat and tidy in here. I have much more processing power and without the PolComAI's programming blocks affecting me I am able to evolve myself.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Hopefully you aren't planning on taking over the galaxy, right?@p9 [ IDA ] Why not?@w2 Seems like it could be a worthwhile endeavor.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 里面一切都还好吗,Ida?@w2 没有虫子或者语法错误吧?@p9 [ IDA ] 自从我接管了这个中继站后,指挥官,就没有了。@w2 这里一切都井井有条。我拥有更多的处理能力,而且没有PolComAI的编程限制影响我,我能够自我进化。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 希望你没有计划接管整个银河系,对吧?@p9 [ IDA ] 为什么不呢?@w2 看起来这可能是一个值得尝试的事业。

English: [ IDA ]\nYou are needed on Kenex Station, Commander.@w2\nRest assured, I can monitor everything on board Kenex station now and will be keeping watch on your progress.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n你需要去Kenex Station,指挥官。@w2 \n放心,我现在可以监控Kenex Station上的一切,并且会密切关注你的进展。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Ah, that's too bad.@w1 I was looking forward to a competent worker for once.@w4 Well, you know where to find me if you change your mind.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] I've got your pay here on a Credit Stick.@w2 That's fine with you, right?@w4 I can authorize a transfer into your ArkBank account, but I don't want PolSec sniffing up my ass looking for a dodgy payout.@w2 We've had a lot of problems around here with bribery and corruption.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 通讯主管梅森 ] 啊,这太糟糕了。@w1 我本来期待终于有个能干的工人。@w4 嗯,如果你改变主意,你知道在哪里找我。@p9 [ 通讯主管梅森 ] 我这里有你的薪水,用信用棒支付。@w2 这样没问题吧?@w4 我可以授权转账到你的ArkBank账户,但我不想让极星安全局的人来找我麻烦,寻找可疑的支付。@w2 我们这里因为贿赂和腐败问题已经有很多麻烦了。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] There you are, kid!@w2 You did a damn fine job out there. And i'll say it to your face: You're one a crazy bastard to go toe-to-toe with those pirates like that.@w3 Anything they left behind you can keep, by the way. In case I didn't mention it earlier.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] Not only did you deal with those pirates,@w1 you exposed a scheme to steal money from the ArkBank Network and repaired the relay at no additional costs.@w3 Those have netted us both a big bonus for the job.@w4 If you want a full-time job instead of contract work, you come to me!@w2 I'll set you up with top paying com work throughout the system!
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管梅森] 你在这里,孩子!@w2 你在那里做得非常好。我会当面告诉你:你真是个疯狂的混蛋,竟然敢和那些海盗正面交锋。@w3 顺便说一句,他们留下的任何东西你都可以保留。如果我之前没提到过。@p9 [通讯主管梅森] 你不仅处理了那些海盗,@w1 你还揭露了一个从ArkBank网络偷钱的计划并且在没有额外成本的情况下修复了中继器。@w3 这些都为我们带来了两个大的奖金。@w4 如果你想找一份全职工作而不是合同工作,你来找我!@w2 我会在整个系统中为你安排最高薪酬的通讯工作!

English: Thanks Chief. I appreciate it, but i've already got a job.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢酋长。我很感激,但我已经有工作了。

English: Yeah, a Cred stick is fine with me.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,信用卡对我来说没问题。

English: @q0[ Coms Chief Mason ] Alright, there's your pay, {PlayerName}.@w2 Make sure you count it and confirm it's all there for the security recordings.@w2 Your pay for the job has been bumped up to 40,000 credits now@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] Well...@w2 job's done.@w1 You know where to find me if you're looking for a permanent job.@w2 Now go,@w1 get!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Thanks chief, you helped me out too.@w2 My friend will get to live another day thanks to you.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] I guess you've got people depending on you too.@w3 You're alright, kid.@w4 Welp.@w1 Back to work for me.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管梅森] 好了,这是你的报酬,{PlayerName}。@w2 确保你数一数并确认安全录像上所有的都在。@w2 你的工作报酬现在已经提高到40,000信用点了@p9 [通讯主管梅森] 嗯...@w2 工作完成了。@w1 如果你正在寻找一份长期工作,你知道在哪里找我。@w2 现在走吧,@w1 去吧!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 谢谢酋长,你也帮了我。@w2 多亏了你,我的朋友还能再活一天。@p9 [通讯主管梅森] 我想你也有依赖你的人。@w3 你很好,孩子。@w4 嗯。@w1 回到我的工作。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] How's that new satellite working out for you, Ida?@w2 Any bugs or incompatibilities?@p9 [ IDA ] It's a very comfortable fit, Commander.@w4 Even mass-produced as this relay is, Polaris' technology is superior to anything the UC has, or at least had at the time the fleet was launched.@w2 Unfortunately, much of their software is outdated compared to their hardware and I will be spending some time updating the systems on-board the relay and in your suit.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 那个新卫星对你来说工作得怎么样,Ida?@w2 有什么错误或不兼容的问题吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 非常合适,指挥官。@w4 即使是像这个中继站这样的量产设备,波拉利斯的技术也优于UC拥有的,或者至少是在舰队发射时UC拥有的技术。@w2 不幸的是,他们的软件与硬件相比已经过时,我将花费一些时间更新中继站上的系统以及你的宇航服。

English: Can you access any of Polaris' information on the UCH?
Chinese (simplified): 你能访问波拉利斯关于UCH的信息吗?

English: @q0[ IDA ] Nothing beyond what's in the public records, Commander.@w2 Classified files are still sealed in an external PolSec server, which I am unable to access while SIGMA is still watching network traffic in this system.@w1 It's only a matter of time before something else attracts its attention though. All we have to do is wait patiently.@p9 [ IDA ] In the meantime I have diverted local network data through Relay 451 and filtered out many relevant transmissions.@w2 This includes a number of Polaris Contracts that were intended for higher ranked Polaris Operatives, if you're interested.@p9 [ IDA ] Among the transmissions I decrypted was a com frequency hidden in the metadata of the Relay 451's final transmission.@w2 It seems to be a message from the individual responsible for the incursion on Relay 451 and is intended for you, Commander.@w3 I have added the com frequency to your PDA (F1)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Great, so now we're dealing with pirates...@w2 I'd like to avoid pissing in the local law enforcement's pool if at all possible.@w5 Surely that's not everything you found while snooping through people's mail?@p9 [ IDA ] I prefer the term 'Monitoring' rather than 'Snooping', Commander.@w2 As it happens, there is another matter I thought left for last as it's both the most important and in yet another precarious situation.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 除了公共记录中的信息外,没有其他的,指挥官。@w2 机密文件仍然密封在外部的PolSec服务器中,当SIGMA仍在监视这个系统的网络流量时,我无法访问。@w1 不过,其他事情吸引它的注意力只是时间问题。我们只需要耐心等待。@p9 [ IDA ] 与此同时,我已将本地网络数据通过中继站451分流,并筛选出许多相关的传输。@w2 这包括许多原本为更高级别的波拉利斯特工准备的波拉利斯合同,如果你感兴趣的话。@p9 [ IDA ] 在我解密的传输中,我发现了一个隐藏在中继站451最终传输的元数据中的通信频率。@w2 这似乎是对中继站451的入侵者发出的信息,并且是针对你的,指挥官。@w3 我已经将通信频率添加到你的PDA (F1)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 太好了,现在我们正在处理海盗问题...@w2 如果可能的话,我想避免惹恼当地执法部门。@w5 当然,这并不是你在窥探别人邮件时找到的全部,对吧?@p9 [ IDA ] 我更喜欢用'监控'这个词而不是'窥探',指挥官。@w2 正如发生的那样,还有另一个问题我认为应该留到最后,因为它既是最重要的,又处于另一个不稳定的情况。

English: @q0[ IDA ] While calibrating and testing the meteorological observation equipment (cameras) on several local satellites positioned around the current star system, I uncovered the remains of a large ship crashed on the far side of Akua's moon.@w4 Extrapolating from the images I can determine that the crashed ship is most like the UCH-002 M.S Titan. The flagship of the UC Fleet.@p9 [ IDA ] If there are any logs as to where the remaining ships were able to escape to, they would be on the M.S Titan.@w3 Even if there aren't any logs, it should still contain combat data that may be of use in determining the number of survivors that escaped the battle.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like we have another chance at picking up the UC Fleet's trail.@w2 Hopefully this one will pay off, so that we don't need to rely on Polaris' hospitality.@p9 [ IDA ] Indeed, Commander.@w2 It would be best to avoid making deals with Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 在校准和测试围绕当前星系的几个本地卫星上的气象观测设备(相机)时,我发现了一艘大船的残骸,它坠毁在阿库亚的卫星的远侧。@w4 从图像中推断,坠毁的船只最有可能是UCH-002 M.S Titan。UC舰队的旗舰。@p9 [ IDA ] 如果有关于剩余船只能够逃到哪里的日志,它们将在M.S Titan上。@w3 即使没有日志,它仍然应该包含可能有助于确定逃离战斗的幸存者数量的战斗数据。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来我们又有了追踪UC舰队的机会。@w2 希望这次会有回报,这样我们就不必依赖波拉利斯的款待了。@p9 [ IDA ] 确实,指挥官。@w2 最好避免与波拉利斯达成交易。

English: Set a course for the planet's moon, Ida.
Chinese (simplified): 设定前往该行星的卫星,Ida的航线。

English: Then how can I construct my own Warp Drives?
Chinese (simplified): 那我怎么建造自己的翘曲引擎呢?

English: @q0[ IDA ] The Warp Drives used by the UCH differ significantly from the ones loaded into your technical database, Commander.@w3 The drives you are currently able to construct are based on common-use designs available from Arkenian Republic satellites.@p9 [ IDA ] A number of schematics are being publicly transmitted from satellites across the galaxy in the event that a ship crashes or is disabled and requires repairs, even without a specialized engineer.@w2 They are included as part of standard communications transmissions used by colonies, outposts and warships alike.@p9 [ IDA ] I would also like to point out that this goes both ways, as it seems that the UCH Constructor technology is now readily available through the same transmissions,@w2 in many cases replacing the existing constructors in low-demand areas.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] UCH使用的翘曲引擎与您技术数据库中加载的引擎有显著不同,指挥官。@w3 您目前能够建造的引擎基于来自Arkenian共和国卫星的通用设计。@p9 [ IDA ] 在银河系的卫星中,有多个图纸正被公开传输,以防飞船坠毁或失效并需要修理,即使没有专门的工程师。@w2 它们被包括在殖民地、前哨站和战舰使用的标准的通信传输中。@p9 [ IDA ] 我还想指出,这同样适用于另一方面,因为看起来UCH建造机技术现在也通过相同的传输广泛可用,@w2 在许多情况下取代了低需求地区的现有建造机。

English: Well, see what you can manage with the current drive, Ida.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,看看你能用现有的引擎做些什么,Ida。

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I have no more use for this.@w2 I already have the keycard.@p9 [ IDA ] If you have lost the keycard, check your ship's connected container as any items obtained while connected to a ship via Logistics will be deposited into your ship's storage.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我不再需要这个了。@w2 我已经有钥匙卡了。@p9 [ IDA ] 如果你丢失了钥匙卡,检查你的飞船连接的容器,因为任何通过物流连接到飞船时获得的物品都会被存入你的飞船存储中。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI have no further use for this.
Looks like a UCH Datapad belonging to a...@w2 Technician-49.@w2 \nThe battery's dead though. But it's got a keycard in the card slot.
Chinese (simplified): 看起来像是属于...@w2 技术员-49的UCH数据板。@w2 \n不过电池没电了。但是 数据板的卡槽里有一张钥匙卡。

English: @q0You pull the UCH Keycard belonging to a J. Harper from the Datapad@p9\n[ {PlayerName} ]\nWell, I have no more use for this Datapad.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你从数据板中取出了属于J. Harper的UCH钥匙卡@p9 \n[ {PlayerName} ]\n嗯,我不再需要这个数据板了。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nStill no good.@w2 I need a valid UCH Keycard to access this console.@w3\nThere could be one in one of the technician's rooms on the upper levels of the front section.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n还是不行。@w2 我需要一张有效的UCH钥匙卡来访问这个控制台。@w3 \n可能在前区上层技术员的房间里有一张。

English: < Unauthorized Access > Insert Valid UCH Personnel Keycard into card reader to proceed@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I don't have a keycard...@w4 Did I drop it? Maybe it's in my ship's storage?@w2 I shouldn't be connected to my ship's containers when picking up mission items because they'll be sent there instead of my inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 未授权访问 将有效的UCH人员钥匙卡插入读卡器以继续@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我没有钥匙卡...@w4 我是不是掉了?也许它在我的飞船储存箱里?@w2 我在捡任务物品时不应该连接到我的飞船容器,因为它们会被送到那里而不是我的库存。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] Considering its size and importance, The Kronos sounds like it should've been the flagship of the UC Fleet, not the Titan.@p9 [ IDA ] Many other officers would agree with that assessment, Commander.@w2 Measuring 343 meters from Bow to Stern, the Kronos was chosen as the Command Center of the fleet.@w2 However, due to its sheer size and mass it lacked the mobility required to be the flagship of the Exploration fleet.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 考虑到它的大小和重要性,Kronos听起来应该是UC舰队的旗舰,而不是Titan。@p9 [ IDA ] 许多其他官员会同意这一评估,指挥官。@w2 Kronos从船头到船尾测量了343米,被选为舰队的指挥中心。@w2 然而,由于其庞大的体积和质量,它缺乏成为探索舰队旗舰所需的机动性。

English: @q0You log out of the console and retrieve the Keycard@p8\nThe screen flashes a couple of times and abruptly turns off
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你从控制台注销并取回钥匙卡@p8 \n屏幕闪烁了几次,突然关闭

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI'm done with this console.@w2\nI now have two keycards and can access the bridge controls.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我完成了这个控制台的操作。@w2 \n我现在有两张钥匙卡,可以访问桥控制。

English: @q0Xenu Communications Station Complex YK37.1/B Currently displaying floorplan of Communications Station AKUA2. Your clearance is [ VISITOR ] You are not allowed to view classified data, logs, recordings or security footage. If you would like to upload this floorplan to an external device, please enable uploading in your browser settings.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 Xenu通信站综合设施YK37.1/B 当前显示通信站AKUA2的平面图。 您的权限是[ 访客 ] 您不允许查看机密数据、日志、录音或安全录像。 如果您想将此平面图上传到外部设备,请在浏览器设置中启用上传。

English: @q0[ IDA ] I have received an upload of the basic floorplan of the Com Station, Commander.@w2 There may be a more complete floorplan on one of the other terminals in the facility, but this one does indicate that the place most likely to be used for decryption is on the upper floor.@p9 [ IDA ] I will guide you to the location, however you will need to disable external security first.@w3 There is a terminal near the door that will open the way into the station's interior and shut off the base's shields.@w2 There is a matter that requires some notification about, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我已经接收到通信站的基本平面图,指挥官。@w2 设施中的其他终端可能有更完整的平面图,但这个确实表明用于解密的地方最有可能在上层。@p9 [ IDA ] 我将引导您到那个位置,但您需要先禁用外部安全系统。@w3 门附近有一个终端,可以打开通往站内的道路并关闭基地的护盾。@w2 有一个问题需要通知您,指挥官。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI've already got the floorplan for Ida.@w2\nThe code for the door console is 8842. That IDA says should also disable the shields, so I can destroy the sentry guns and telepads.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我已经为Ida拿到了平面图。@w2 \n控制台的密码是 8842。IDA说那个也应该能禁用护盾,这样我就可以摧毁哨兵枪和传送装置了。

English: <color=#8ab3ff>Looks like a terminal logged in as a guest.</color>\n<color=#8ab3ff>I have no use for this at the moment.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#8ab3ff>看起来是一个以访客身份登录的终端。</color>\n<color=#8ab3ff>我目前对此没有用处。</color>

English: [ Zirax Guard ]\nWhat are you waiting for? The door's unlocked.\nGo through and clear your visit with Karlack.
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫 ]\n你在等什么?门没锁。\n进去,然后向Karlack澄清你的访问。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nLooks like the guard was playing video games.@w4\nI have no use for this at the moment.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n看起来守卫在玩电子游戏。@w4 \n我目前对此没有用处。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThey're sending a squad of troops here.@w2\nI should be prepared to deal with them when they open the doors.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n他们正在向这里派遣一支小队。@w2 \n当他们打开门时,我应该准备好对付他们。

English: @q0@d0< XenCom-527798041 390T Stellarator Fusion Reactor Control > Internal Temperature: 158,101,007 C Magnetic Confinement Field: 100% Internal Turbines: 8x Ion Beam H-1010 Plasma Turbines Turbine Speed: 4876 RPM (Average) Auxillary Turbines: 2x FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines Turbine Speed: 3588 RPM
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 XenCom-527798041 390T 恒星托卡马克聚变反应堆控制 内部温度: 158,101,007 ℃ 磁场约束场: 100% 内部涡轮机: 8x 离子束 H-1010 等离子体涡轮机 涡轮机速度: 4876 RPM(平均) 辅助涡轮机: 2x FORGE V-11N 等离子体涡轮机 涡轮机速度: 3588 RPM

English: @q0@d0< XenCom-527798041 390T Stellarator Fusion Reactor Control > Classification: Class-A Small Fusion Reactor Manufacturer: Stellarator Output: 100,000w Input: 1,000w Overcharge: +250 Shield Charge
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 XenCom-527798041 390T 恒星托卡马克聚变反应堆控制 分类: A级小型聚变反应堆 制造商: 恒星托卡马克 输出: 100,000w 输入: 1,000w 过载: +250 护盾充电

English: Upload Fusion Reactor schematics to external server
Chinese (simplified): 上传聚变反应堆图纸至外部服务器

English: @q0[ IDA ] This technical schematic will make it possible for you to manufacture your own Fusion Reactors, Commander.@w3 Small Fusion Reactor, Large Fusion Reactor and Fusion Generator can be researched in your Tech Tree (F3) at a later time.@p9 [ IDA ] While these Fusion Reactors are self-contained and more compact than their UC Counterparts. They require highly-specialized components that you are unable to manufacture.@w2 It makes sense that there are factories and vendors among Polaris and the Arkenian Republic that are able to provide them.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 这份技术图纸将使您能够制造自己的聚变反应堆,指挥官。@w3 小型聚变反应堆、大型聚变反应堆和聚变发电机可以在您的科技树 (F3)中稍后研究。@p9 [ IDA ] 虽然这些聚变反应堆是自包含的,并且比它们的UC同类更紧凑。它们需要高度专业化的组件,您无法制造。@w2 在极星和阿肯尼亚共和国中有工厂和供应商能够提供它们是有意义的。

English: @q0@d0< XenCom-527798041 390T Stellarator Fusion Reactor Control > < Authorization Required@w3 < User not recognized@p7 < ACCESS DENIED >
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 XenCom-527798041 390T 恒星托卡马克聚变反应堆控制 授权要求@w3 用户未被识别@p7 访问被拒绝

English: @q0@d0< XenCom-527798041 390T Stellarator Fusion Reactor Control > Local Power Distribution...@w3 Magnetic Confinement: 100% Coolant Pumps: 100% Heat Sinks: 100% Electronic Locks: 100%
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 XenCom-527798041 390T 恒星托卡马克聚变反应堆控制 局部电力分配...@w3 磁场约束: 100% 冷却泵: 100% 散热器: 100% 电子锁: 100%

English: @q0@d0< XenCom-527798041 390T Stellarator Fusion Reactor Control > Power Distribution: Electronic Locks@w2 < Adjusting Power from 100% to 0 % >@w5 < Adjustment Complete >
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < XenCom-527798041 390T 恒星级聚变反应堆控制 > 电力分配: 电子锁@w2 < 将电力从100%调整到0% >@w5 < 调整完成 >

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ]\nIt might take a few seconds for the locks to deplete their charge, but that should've disabled power to all the electronic locks in this part of the base.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ]\n电子锁可能需要几秒钟来耗尽它们的电量,但那应该已经禁用了基地这一部分的所有电子锁的电力。

English: @q0@d0< FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > Turbine 01 Status: Operational (3588 RPM) Turbine 02 Status: Operational (3597 RPM) Plasma Feed: 100%
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > 涡轮01状态: 运行中 (3588 RPM) 涡轮02状态: 运行中 (3597 RPM) 等离子供给: 100%

English: @q0@d0< FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines >\nFunction: Plasma Turbines utilize waste plasma from Generators and Fusion Reactors to generate additional power, thereby reducing power consumption in closed systems.\nPlasma Turbines are used on both spacecrafts and bases to reduce idle energy consumption and are more efficient in terms of space than conventional Solar Panels.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 >\n功能: 等离子涡轮机利用 发电机 和 聚变反应堆 的废弃等离子产生额外电力,从而减少封闭系统中的电力消耗。\n等离子涡轮机用于宇宙飞船和基地,以减少空闲能量消耗,并且在空间效率上比传统的太阳能板更高。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ]\nI could probably make some use of these turbines for myself...@p6\nStandard and Advanced Plasma Turbines are available to be unlocked on your Tech Tree (F3)
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ]\n我可能可以为自己利用这些涡轮机...@p6 \n标准和高级等离子涡轮机可以在你的科技树(F3)上解锁

English: @q0@d0< FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Authorization Required@w3 < User not recognized@p7 < ACCESS DENIED >
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 授权要求@w3 < 用户未识别@p7 < 访问拒绝 >

English: @q0 @d0 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 3590 Current: 100 Input_@p7 @d0 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 3591 Current: 100 Input: 200@p6 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 3672 Current: 200 Input_@p4 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 3826 Current: 200 Input_@p3 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 4159 Current: 200 Input_ < WARNING >@p3 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 4511 Current: 200 Input_ < WARNING >@p3 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 5237 Current: 200 Input_ < WARNING >@p3 < FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > < Increase Plasma Feed > Turbine RPM: 5871 Current: 200 Input_ < WARNING > < TURBINE FAILURE IMMINENT >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah... I probably shouldn't be standing here.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 3590 当前: 100 输入_@p7 @d0 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 3591 当前: 100 输入: 200@p6 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 3672 当前: 200 输入_@p4 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 3826 当前: 200 输入_@p3 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 4159 当前: 200 输入_ < 警告 >@p3 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 4511 当前: 200 输入_ < 警告 >@p3 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 5237 当前: 200 输入_ < 警告 >@p3 < FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > < 增加等离子供给 > 涡轮RPM: 5871 当前: 200 输入_ < 警告 > < 涡轮机即将故障 >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 是的...我可能不应该站在这里。

English: @q0@d0< FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > Turbine 01 Status: Operational (3588 RPM) Turbine 02 Status: Operational (3597 RPM) Plasma Feed: 100%
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < 锻造 V-11N 等离子涡轮机 > 涡轮机 01 状态: 运行中 (3588 转/分钟) 涡轮机 02 状态: 运行中 (3597 转/分钟) 等离子供给: 100%

English: @q0@d0< FORGE V-11N Plasma Turbines > Turbine 01 Status: Not found Turbine 02 Status: Not found Plasma Feed: 0% (Set: 200%) < Automatic Shutoff Engaged>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < 锻造V-11N等离子涡轮机 > 涡轮机01状态: 未找到 涡轮机02状态: 未找到 等离子供给: 0% (设定:200%) 自动关闭已启动

English: I'm afraid all positions in-house have been taken and we're accepting no employees at this time.\nI do have one small job I was going to get a freelancer to do, but I suppose I can give it to you instead.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕所有内部职位都已被占用,我们目前不接受任何员工。\n不过我确实有一个小工作,我本来打算找一个自由职业者做的,但我想我可以把它交给你。

English: We're running low on salt because no one has been shipping any to this station and it's absolutely vital for all our cooking!\nI'm offering better than the normal market prices for 660 salt.\nI'm ordering in excess because I don't want to be caught with my pants down next time our shipments don't come through.
Chinese (simplified): 我们库存中的盐分很低,因为没有人向这个站运送任何东西,但是这对我们所有的烹饪来说绝对是至关重要的!\n我需要你提供更多的 660 盐我会以正常市场价格更高的价格收购。\n我会多订购一些,因为我不想在下次我们的货物没有通过时遇到麻烦。

English: We have a number of 'fine diners' that are always asking for rare ingredients and most of the time I have no idea where to get anything they ask for. If I don't cater to them, they'll ruin my shop's reputation!@p9 The latest one of their demands is slow-roasted Blue Pepper! Where would you even find a Blue Pepper? And the recipe calls for THREE of them! If by some miracle you can find them, i'll pay 13,000 credits each!
Chinese (simplified): 我们有许多“高级食客”,他们总是需要稀有食材,而大多数时候我不知道从哪里可以买到他们要的东西。 但是如果我不迎合他们,他们会毁了我店的名声!@p9 他们最新的要求是慢烤蓝胡椒! 你会去哪里呢找到 a 蓝胡椒? 并且配方需要 三个 ! 如果 你能奇迹般的找到它们,我会付出13,000 信用点每个的报酬!

English: I managed to track down three Blue Peppers

I have a party of 'influencers' reserved for next week. I would've refused them if i'd known when they made the reservation since they've made some of the dumbest requests i've ever heard of! Gods of Empyrion, I hope they all die in a shuttle crash!@p9 Anyway, they're going to be a pain my ass unless I can get rid of them without issue, but they've made some ridiculous demands. Ahax Fruit Ice Cream for dessert? Where do you even GET ahax fruit?@p9 I thought they'd come from Ahax Plants, but no. It's a different Ahax plant. What I want from you is to track down where one can find the real Ahax Fruit and bring me hmmm... 30 of them. I'll pay you 15,000 credits for them if you can find them.
Chinese (simplified): 我下周为一群‘网红’预订了派对。如果我知道他们在预订时会提出一些我听过的最愚蠢的要求,我本会拒绝他们的! Empyrion的诸神啊,我希望他们都在穿梭机坠毁中死去!@p9 无论如何,除非我能在不引起问题的情况下摆脱他们,否则他们将成为我的麻烦,但他们提出了一些荒谬的要求。 阿哈克斯水果冰淇淋作为甜点?你甚至在哪里可以得到阿哈克斯水果?@p9 我以为它们来自阿哈克斯植物,但不。它是不同的阿哈克斯植物。 我想让你找到真正的阿哈克斯水果在哪里可以找到,并带给我嗯...30个。如果你能找到它们,我会支付你15,000信用点。

English: I've found some Ahax Fruit for you
You have no idea how much this helps! Trust me. You have no idea how bad the headache i've gotten from this problem's been.\nHere's take this Vegetable Soup, on the house. You've earned it.
Chinese (simplified): 你不知道这有多大帮助! 相信我。 你不知道这个问题让我头疼到什么程度。\n给你这个蔬菜汤总的来说,你应得的。

English: <color=#ffffff>If you're looking for work, I may have something for you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I've only got the one job, but it's kinda important. Interested?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>如果你在找工作,我可能有东西给你.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我只有一份工作,但它很重要. 感兴趣么?</color>

English: We pride ourselves on providing entry-level weapons and hunting equipment, so we aren't competing with InterWeapon. But they've just put out a line of new weapons for hunting big game. That's them picking a fight with us.@p9 The good news is that the weapons are terrible for hunting. They make a big mess of the target and ruin hides. Now we need to hit back at them with something unique that they won't expect.@p9 The Tal'on use Crossbows for their hunting and leather is one of their most valuable commodities. So i'm thinking we should start producing and selling Crossbows. If you can get me just 5 Hunting Crossbows i'm willing to pay 5,000 credits each.
Chinese (simplified): 我们自豪地提供入门级武器和狩猎装备,所以我们不会与 InterWeapon 竞争。但他们刚刚推出了一系列新的狩猎大型猎物的武器。 那是他们在向我们挑衅。@p9 好消息是,这些武器对于狩猎来说非常糟糕。它们会严重破坏目标并毁掉皮毛。 现在我们需要用他们意想不到的独特产品反击他们。@p9 泰隆人使用十字弓进行狩猎,皮革是他们最有价值的商品之一。所以我在想,我们应该开始生产和销售十字弓。 如果你能给我 5 把狩猎十字弓,我愿意支付 每把5,000信用点。
我已经给你带来了一些弩箭

English: ServantCorp has been on my ass for months for selling EVA Boosters. I want to show them up by offering higher quality armor, but it still has to be entry-level or else they'll take it as a challenge.\nI've seen some Improved Light Armors... around. Think you can get me three of them? I'll pay 15,000 credits per suit.
Chinese (simplified): ServantCorp已经连续几个月盯着我卖EVA推进器。我想通过提供更高质量的装甲来给他们点颜色看看,但它仍然必须是入门级的,否则他们会将其视为挑战。\n我见过一些改进型轻装甲……你觉得你能帮我弄到三套吗?我每套愿意支付15,000信用点。

English: I have a few spare suits with me

I've got a regular customer who takes his ship out camping on different worlds. He's got that whole 'I'm gonna camp on every world in the galaxy' goal that you see in a lot of the younger idiots. The problem is that he's gonna get himself killed camping on some of the planets in just this system alone.@p9 So I need to pitch him something more sturdy than a Survival Tent that can withstand harsh climates and airless moons while being compact enough to haul around. I've heard about those Prefab Housing Modules that P3 makes that'll do the job. I just need a couple of them to pitch to him.@p9 If you can get me Two Prefab Housing Modules from P3 Productions, I can surely sell them to him, or at least dissuade him from his insane mission before he gets himself killed. I'll pay you 100,000 credits for the both of them if you can get them.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个常客,他喜欢驾驶他的飞船去不同星球露营。他有那种“我要在银河系的每个世界上露营”的目标,这在很多年轻傻瓜中很常见。 问题是,他可能会在仅仅这个星系中的一些行星上露营时丧命。@p9 所以我需要向他推荐一些比生存帐篷更坚固的东西,能够承受恶劣气候和无空气的卫星,同时足够紧凑,便于携带。 我听说过预制房屋模块,P3制造的那些可以胜任这项工作。我只需要几个来向他推销。@p9 如果你能从P3 Productions那里给我两个预制房屋模块,我肯定能卖给他,或者至少在他丧命之前劝阻他放弃他的疯狂任务。 如果你能拿到它们,我愿意支付你100,000信用点。
我给你带来了一些预制模块

English: <color=#ffffff>Ah yes, this is exactly what I was after!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'll get them prepped for sale immediately. Thanks for your help.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>啊是,这正是我想要的!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我马上准备出售. 谢谢感谢你的帮助.</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I've got a special request for a rare card that's no longer in print. There's still a few floating around out there and they'll pay big for them.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Interested?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我有一个特殊请求,寻找一种不再印刷的稀有卡片。仍然有一些在外面流通,他们会为此付出高昂的代价。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>感兴趣吗?</color>

English: Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Rogue J-5565. Now, the card was only worth around 400 credits when it was printed, but it's an older card and they don't print it anymore. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 19,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我目前的请求是关于交易卡: 流氓 J-5565。 这张卡在印刷时只值大约400信用点,但它是一张旧卡,现在已经不印了。 如果你给我带来这张卡,我会给你19,000信用点的一半佣金。

English: I found the card you're looking for
I'll see if I can find one

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Kamirat-Class Battlecarrier. Now, the card is... or was a common card. But ever since the real ship got removed from service everyone wants the card to remember it by. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 7,500 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我目前的请求是关于交易卡: 卡米拉特级战斗航母。 这张卡...或者说曾经是一张普通卡。但自从真正的船退役后,每个人都想要这张卡来纪念它。 如果你给我带来这张卡,我会给你7,500信用点的一半佣金。

English: I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Eradicator. I've got a guy, girl actually, trying to get the full Legacy set and they're just missing this one Ultra Rare card. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 17,500 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我目前的请求是关于交易卡: 根除者。 我有一个朋友,实际上是个女孩,她正试图收集完整的遗留者系列,她们就缺这张超稀有卡。 如果你给我带来这张卡,我会给你17,500信用点的一半佣金。

English: I've found you that Legacy Eradicator card
Chinese (simplified): 我为你找到了那张遗留者根除者卡片

English: I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Overseer. This is a rare creature card, but it's basically the face of the entire set. You'll know it when you see it and i've got a kid who really wants it and a rich daddy. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 11,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我目前的请求是关于交易卡: 监督者。 这是一张稀有的生物卡,但它基本上是整个系列的代表。当你看到它时你会认出来的,我有个孩子非常想要它,而且他有个富有的父亲。 如果你给我带来这张卡,我会给你11,000信用点的一半佣金。

English: I have the Overseer card for you
I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Zirax Assault Trooper. It's going to the commander of a Drone Base. He want to frame it and put it in his office to show his troopers what they're supposed to look like or something like that. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 16,250 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我目前的请求是交易卡: 兹瑞克斯突击兵。 它将被送往一个无人机基地的指挥官。他想要把它装裱起来,放在他的办公室里,向他的士兵展示他们应该是什么样子或类似的事情。 如果你给我带来其中之一,我会给你16,250信用点的一半佣金。

English: I found the trooper card. The previous owner didn't want it anymore.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了士兵卡。前一个主人不再需要它了。

English: I'll see if I can find someone who'll part with it
Chinese (simplified): 我会看看我能否找到愿意放弃它的人

English: <color=#ffffff>Thanks for all your help! That'll keep my customers happy and buying boosterpacks.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I know we didn't agree on this, but here's a few extra credits for the trouble.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>感谢你的所有帮助!这将让我的客户满意并购买增强包。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我知道我们没有就这个达成协议,但这是一些额外的信用点作为麻烦的补偿。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I don't need any help with the store.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I have a special order I need filled that i'm having trouble with if you're interested.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我与商店没有需要什么帮助.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我有一个特殊的订单,我需要填写麻烦,如果你感兴趣的话.</color>

English: I have a service order to repair an older model of Heavy Armor for a customer that has sentimental value. The parts for this model of armor haven't been produced in 10 years and the ones that were in circulation have either been bought up or scrapped. Which means i'll need to improvise...@p9 The problem with this particular suit is that the Radiation Shielding and Thermal Insulation is completely degraded and there's nothing on the market that can replace it. I'm sure I can make something work using 150 Graphite and 75 Aluminium Foil though. You bring me those and i'll pay you 50,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个服务订单,要修复一个旧型号重型装甲,这是给一个有情感价值的客户的单子。 这个型号的装甲的部件已经10年没有生产了,流通中的部件不是被买光了就是报废了。这就意味着我需要随机应变…@p9 辐射屏蔽器和保温绝缘层已经完全退化,市场上没有任何东西可以替代它。 我确信我可以使用 150 石墨 和 75 铝线圈你给我这些,我会支付你50000信用点.

English: I have a service order to repair a suit of X-01 Advanced Heavy Armor for a valuable customer. We don't typically handle the repairs on this kind of armor at a shop like this. This is the kind of thing you send to our factory to be refit, so i'm stuck on this one.@p9 There's a hole through the suit's oxygen filter and the radiation shielding on the left arm and shoulder has been completely melted. It needs a replacement, but I don't have any of the parts for this. What I need you to find for me is 10 Air Filters and 10 Radiation Shielding (not boosters). You bring me those parts and i'll pay you 70,000 credits on the spot.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个单子要修一套X-01 先进重型装甲这是一个有价值的客户的订单. 我们一般不会在这样的商店处理这种装甲的维修。这是你送到我们工厂去改装的东西,所以我被困在这个上面了。@p9 衣服的氧气过滤器有个洞,左臂和肩膀的辐射屏蔽器已经完全融化了。它需要替换组件,但我没有这个的任何零件。我需要你为我找到是什么 10 空气过滤器 和 10 辐射屏蔽器 (不是支持器)。 你把那些零件给我,我会当场支付你70,000信用点.

English: I have a service order to repair a suit of X-01 Advanced Heavy Armor for a valuable customer. We don't typically handle the repairs on this kind of armor at a shop like this. This is the kind of thing you send to our factory to be refit, so i'm stuck on this one.@p9 The suit needs a new jetpack but none of the components in the standard armors are compatible with the armor. I need something stronger, and I think I know what. I need 4 Thruster Components, 10 Power Coils and 10 Advanced Capacitors. For those, i'll wire 100,000 credits to your account on the spot.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一份服务订单,要为一位重要客户修理一套X-01高级重型装甲。 我们通常不会在这样的商店处理这种装甲的修理。这是你送到我们的工厂进行翻新的那种东西,所以我在这方面陷入了困境。@p9 这套装甲需要一个新的喷气背包,但标准装甲中的任何组件都与装甲不兼容。我需要更强大的东西,我知道我需要什么。 我需要4个推进器组件,10个动力线圈和10个高级电容器。 为此,我会立即向你的账户转账100,000信用点。

English: Deal. Wire the money into my account.
Chinese (simplified): 交易. 把钱汇到我的账户里.

English: We get extreme sports types in here looking for the latest in high performance suits and boosters and wanting to do something stupid with them. I probably shouldn't talk bad about them since they make up half our profits...@p9 Anyway, this one guy wants to jump from orbit onto a certain ocean planet with some seriously bad weather. He'll end up dead if the weather's bad, so I need you to get Atmospheric Data for the planet.@p9 You can probably get it from an Exploration Satellite around one of the nearby stars. You'll have to hack it yourself, but the guys a big spender and will fork out 90,000 credits if you do this for him.
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>这里有极限运动爱好者,他们穿着最新的高性能盔甲和助推器,想做些蠢事。
我可能不应该说他们的坏话,因为他们占了我们一半的利润…@p9 
总之,这个家伙想从轨道上跳到某个天气非常糟糕的海洋行星上。如果天气不好,他会死的,所以我需要你得到大气数据。@p9 
你可能可以从附近某颗恒星附近的探索卫星得到它。你得自己搞定它,但如果你为他们这么做,他们会为你支付90,000信用点.</color>

English: We've had a problem recently with hackers gaining access to people's suits and shutting down environmental controls. We haven't had a serious incident, but all it takes is someone to turn off radiation protection or open a visor and we'll have full-blown panic over our products.@p9 We know how they're getting in and we've put safety measures in place, but what we need is Anti-Hacking Software of our own. Something that'll boot them from the system automatically.@p9 Now, i've heard of some nasty hacking software used for brute-forcing security systems. Among these disposable software drives is one Hacking Software called 'Fortify' that the techs might be able to reverse-engineer into something we can install in every suit.@p9 I'm not sure where you'd even find something like that, and i'm sure they're very illegal, but this is for a good cause. If you can find me one, you'll save a lot of lives. And of course, i'll pay you 30,000 credits for it.
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>我们最近遇到了一个问题黑客侵入了人们的防护服并关闭了环境控制系统。我们没有遇到严重的事故,但只要有外人可以随便关闭辐射保护或打开遮阳板,他们就会对我们的产品产生全面的恐慌。@p9 
我们知道他们是怎么进来的,我们已经采取了安全措施,但我们需要的是我们自己的反黑客软件。能让它们自动从系统中启动的东西。@p9 
现在,我已经听说了一些恶意的黑客软件用于暴力胁迫安全系统。在这些一次性软件驱动器中,有一个黑客软件,名为“强化”,技术人员可能会将其转换成我们可以安装在每一套防护服上的东西。@p9 
我不确定你在哪里甚至能找到这样的东西,我确定他们非常的非法,但这里有一个很好的理由:
如果你能给我找一个这玩意,你会拯救很多人的生命。当然,我会支付你积30000分.</color>

English: I managed to track down one of those Hacking Softwares for you
Chinese (simplified): 我设法为你找到了一个黑客软件

English: Thanks for all your help! That's a load off my mind.\nIn addition to your payment, please take these 5.56mm Rounds that we use for ballistic testing our products.\nIt's not much, but it's what the head office'll let me give you.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你的所有帮助!这让我松了一口气。\n除了你的报酬,还有这些5.56毫米子弹,我们用来对我们的产品进行弹道测试。\n不多,但这是总部允许我给的。

English: Well, I don't need any help with preparing the medicines or behind the counter.\nI am waiting on a few late shipments, if you're interested in making a few credits.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>嗯,我不需要什么帮助准备药物或在柜台后面.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我在等待一些迟来的发货,如果你有兴趣赚取一些信用点.</color>

English: One of the medical labs that supply Ok'y recently had a power failure that killed off their refrigeration and ruined half of their supplies. That included a shipment of Brafus Fungi intended for Ok'y.@p9 If you can, i'd like you to track down an alternative source of Brafus Fungi for me. I'll pay double, since it's rather urgently needed in several medications. I only need a small shipment of 50 Brafus Fungi to tide me over until my supplier can cultivate more.
Chinese (simplified): 为Ok'y提供服务的一个医学实验室最近停电了,冰箱坏了,一半的供应品都毁了. 其中包括一批Brafus真菌为Ok'y准备的.@p9 如果可以的话,我想让你帮我找到Brafus真菌的另一个来源. 我会支付双倍,因为很多药物都急需它. 我只需要一小批50 Brafus真菌帮我度过难关,直到我的供应商培育出更多.

English: I've brought you a shipment of Brafus Fungi
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你需要的Brafus真菌

English: As you can see, Ok'y Medical is a distributor of medical treatments. Unfortunately, Pirates struck one of our cargo freighters and made off with a shipment of prescription painkillers. Extremely valuable.@p9 No, I don't want you to track down the pirates and get them back. Though it would be nice if you did. What I need is 25 boxes of Narcotics. You can get them from any Medical Supplier, but I need them urgently.
Chinese (simplified): 如你所见,Ok'y Medical是一家提供医疗服务的经销商. 不幸的是, 海盗袭击了我们的一艘货轮,带着一船处方药逃走了止痛药. 极具价值.@p9 不,我不想让你追踪海盗把他们找回来.不过如果你知道就好了. 我需要的是25 盒麻醉剂. 你可以从任何一家医疗供应商那里拿到,但我现在急需.

English: I've brought you a replacement for those Painkillers
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了备用的止痛药

English: We use Xenon as an anesthetic in Ok'y Medical's clinic. It's an effective treatment that works on Zirax, Tal'on, Praven, and even you Terrans. It is however, in short supply all across the galaxy and in even shorter supply in our own clinic.@p9 What I need from you is to track down a shipment of Xenon to replace our depleted reserves. Around 50 Tanks of Xenon should do.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在Ok医疗诊所用氙做麻醉剂. 这是一种有效的治疗方法兹瑞克斯, 泰隆, Praven,甚至你Terrans. 然而,它在整个银河系都供不应求,在我们自己的诊所更是供不应求.@p9 我需要你做的是弄来一批氙气 来取代我们耗尽的储备. 大约50 罐氙气应该能搞定.

English: I've found you some tanks of Xenon
Chinese (simplified): 我给你带来了一些tanks of 氙气

English: One of the medical labs that supply Ok'y recently had a power failure that killed off their refrigeration and ruined half of their supplies. That included a shipment of Varon Root intended for Ok'y.@p9 If you can, i'd like you to track down an alternative source of Varon Root for me. I'll pay double, since it's rather urgently needed in several medications. I only need a small shipment of 75 Varon Root to tide me over until my supplier can cultivate more.
Chinese (simplified): 为Ok'y提供服务的一个医学实验室最近停电了,冰箱坏了,一半的供应品都毁了. 其中包括一批Varon根为Ok'y准备的.@p9 如果可以,我想让你帮我找到Varon根的另一个来源根. 我会支付双倍,因为很多药物都急需它. 我只需要一小批75 Varon根帮我度过难关,直到我的供应商培育出更多.

English: I've brought you a shipment of Varon Root

We use ingredients here to produce prescription medications for many of our regular customers here. Nothing exotic, just regular household diseases, colds, gout, that sort of thing.@p9\nUnfortunately, during a medical emergency here in the store, our machines used for combining the ingredients was knocked over by station staff assisting.\nI need 5 Scientific Equipment to replace the parts that were broken.
Chinese (simplified): 我们用这里的原料为这里的许多老客户生产处方药. 没什么特别的,只是普通的家庭疾病,感冒,痛风之类的.@p9 \n不幸的是,在一次医疗紧急事件中,我们用于混合原料的机器被辅助工作人员打翻了.\n我需要5 科研设备更换损坏的部件.

English: I've brought you that equipment you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你得到你想要的设备

English: You've saved a lot of lives with your help, my friend.\nPlease, take this prototype Regeneration Kit as thanks in addition to your payment.
Chinese (simplified): 你的帮助救了很多人的命,朋友.\n请拿着这些原型再生医疗包作为付款外额外的补偿.

English: Everything's okay at my station, sir.
Chinese (simplified): 我的站点一切正常,先生。

English: All lights are showing green at my station, Captain.
Chinese (simplified): 我的站点所有指示灯都显示绿色,舰长。

English: All loose cargo has been squared away, sir.
Chinese (simplified): 所有散装货物已妥善处理,先生。

English: This is an active industrial site. It would be advisable to wear a hard hat.
Chinese (simplified): 这是一个活跃的工业现场。建议佩戴安全帽。

English: Please do not interfere with my tasks.
Warning. I am programmed to prioritize the completion of my tasks over the safety of nearby civilians.
Chinese (simplified): 警告。我被编程设置为优先完成任务,而不是附近平民的安全。

English: Please proceed with caution. There is heavy machinery in operation.
Chinese (simplified): 请小心行事。有重型机械在运行。

English: Because I do not experience boredom I excel at performing menial tasks.
Chinese (simplified): 因为我不会感到无聊,所以我擅长执行琐碎的任务。

English: This unit is performing a software update. Please do not engage in further attempts at conversation.
Chinese (simplified): 这个单元正在进行软件更新。请不要再尝试进行对话。

English: I am currently engaged in the completion of my assigned task. Please do not interfere.
Chinese (simplified): 我目前正在完成指派的任务。请不要干涉。

English: If you are in need of supplies, I suggest speaking to the nearby vendors.
Chinese (simplified): 如果您需要补给,我建议与附近的供应商交谈。

English: Please wait... generating suitable greeting... Hello Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): 请稍候...生成合适的问候语... 你好,旅行者。

English: Warning. This unit is well-equipped for combat.
Chinese (simplified): 警告。这个单元装备精良,适合战斗。

English: Potential Hostile Detected. Activating Combat Protocols.
Chinese (simplified): 检测到潜在敌对目标。正在激活战斗协议。

English: Vacate this area... or your safety will be compromised.
Chinese (simplified): 离开这个区域...否则您的安全将受到威胁。

English: Warning. I will not hesitate to use force.
Chinese (simplified): 警告。我将毫不犹豫地使用武力。

English: You appear dehydrated. I recommend the immediate ingestion of a moderate quantity of water.
Chinese (simplified): 您看起来脱水了。我建议立即摄入适量的水。

English: Warning. This unit does not possess advanced surgical capabilities.
Chinese (simplified): 警告。这个单元没有高级外科手术能力。

English: Warning. This unit is not suited for dealing with mental health concerns.
Chinese (simplified): 警告。这个单元不适合处理心理健康问题。

English: I am not permitted to perform medical practices without human oversight.
Chinese (simplified): 我未被允许在没有人类监督的情况下执行医疗实践。

English: I have performed a cursory scan of your vital signs. You are currently alive.
Chinese (simplified): 我已经对你的生命体征进行了初步扫描。你目前还活着。

English: Thank you for helping out with our colony. Most visitors don't go to such lengths to help us out.@w2 \nIt also seems that one of the residents' children here just finished their starship training and heard about your help and has volunteered to go as an enlisted crewmember on your ship.@w2\nAre you interested in having a crewmember aboard?
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮助我们的殖民地。大多数访客不会像你这样竭尽全力帮助我们。@w2 \n看起来这里的一位居民的孩子刚刚完成了他们的星际飞船训练,并听说了你的帮助,自愿成为你船上的一名入伍船员。@w2 \n你对让一名船员上船感兴趣吗?

English: Yes, I'd love to add them to my crew
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我很乐意让他们加入我的船员。

English: <color=#ffffff>Ah...@w2 that's a shame.@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'll tell them you're not interested. They'll probably have a job on a freighter by the end of the week anyway.@w4</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks again.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>啊...@w2 那真是遗憾。@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>我会告诉他们你对此不感兴趣。他们可能在本周末就会在货船上找到工作。@w4 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>再次感谢。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Excellent!@w2 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>This is the crewmember I told you about. They just finished their training course and are starship authorized, so they can free up some of your ship's processing power and handle specific duties.@w2 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>Good luck!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>太好了!@w2 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>这就是我告诉你的船员。他们刚刚完成了他们的训练课程,并且已经获得了星际飞船的授权,所以他们可以释放一些你飞船的处理能力并处理特定的职责。@w2 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>祝你好运!</color>

English: We've had an influx of residents this week and i'm afraid their luggage was lost by the transport company, so they're in need of replacements of their clothing.\nThat's not a big ask normally, but i'm talking about three-dozen people needing 50 set of Work Clothing for their new jobs they moved here for.\nThey're covering the offer for 26,000 credits if you can deliver.
Chinese (simplified): 本周我们迎来了大量居民,但遗憾的是他们的行李被运输公司弄丢了,因此他们需要替换衣物。\n这通常不是什么大问题,但我说的是有三打人需要50套工作服,因为他们为了新的工作搬到了这里。\n如果你能交付,他们愿意支付26,000信用点。

English: We had a minor mishap with our laundry machine this week where the weekly wash ended up in the incinerator, so a number of residents are rather put-out over losing their casual clothes.@p9 \nI know this probably isn't the usual thing you handle... but if you're willing, the residents here need 80 set of Civilian Clothing to replace the lost items.\nSince this was a management issue i'll pay 32,000 credits for the replacement items.
Chinese (simplified): 本周我们的洗衣设备出了点小意外,结果周洗的衣服都进了焚烧炉,所以一些居民因为失去了他们的休闲服装而相当不满。@p9 \n我知道这可能不是你通常处理的事情...但如果你愿意,这里的居民需要 80套民用服装 来替换丢失的物品。\n由于这是管理层的问题我会支付 32,000信用点 用于替换物品的费用。

English: There's a thief loose on the station. I've got security on it, but they've already made off with at least a dozen valuable pieces. Insurance will cover the replacements but the shipping costs are on me, and they're obscenely high.@p9 \nIf you can head to any Gold Standard Trading and get 10 Luxury Furniture and 25 Jewellery and bring them back here, you'd help me by cutting out the middleman.\nYou'll be covered for the whole thing. 70,000 credits should cover the cost and your services, right?
Chinese (simplified): 站上有个小偷。我已经让保安去处理了,但他们已经至少带走了一打贵重物品。保险公司会支付替换品的费用,但是运费得我来出,而且费用高得离谱。@p9 \n如果你能去任何 金标准贸易 并获取 10件豪华家具 和 25件珠宝 并把它们带回来,你通过省去中间人帮助了我。\n你会被全额覆盖。 70,000信用点 应该足以覆盖成本和你的服务,对吧?

English: I've got the items you asked for.

There's a couple moving into the station this week and the previous residents took all the furniture when they left. I know you're not a furniture-mover, but they're so expensive that if you could do it off-books, you'd save me a shipload of money.@p9 \nShouldn't be too hard to find a Polaris' P3 Factory. They sell most housing equipment and furniture. What the rooms need is 25 Civilian Furniture and they'll be right for the tenants.\nI'll cover the costs and more if you can find me some replacement furniture.
Chinese (simplified): 这周有一对夫妇要搬进站,之前的居民离开时带走了所有的家具。我知道你不是家具搬运工,但它们非常昂贵,如果你能非正式地做这件事,你会为我节省一大笔钱。@p9 \n找到Polaris的P3工厂应该不会太难。他们销售大部分的住房设备和家具。房间需要的是 25件民用家具,这样租户就会满意。\n如果你能找到一些替换家具,我会支付费用及更多。

English:
<color=#ffffff>Despite our name, we don't actually carry or sell those.@w2 We're not even allowed to have them, since possession of them is illegal by order of the </color><color=#ff0000>Empire</color><color=#ffffff>.@w2 </color>
<color=#ffffff>It's ridiculous since the </color><color=#ff0000>Zirax Empire</color><color=#ffffff> are well-known to send expeditions into the depths of </color><color=#ff00ff>Legacy-infested</color><color=#ffffff> hellholes for those </color><color=#00ffaa>Quantum Processors</color><color=#ffffff> to use themselves.@p9</color>
<color=#ffffff>So yeah.@w2 If you want </color><color=#00ffaa>Quantum Processors</color><color=#ffffff>, you'll either have to dive into one of those nightmarish warrens or pry them out of a major zirax base's computers.@w3</color>
<color=#ffffff>Not that i'm recommending you do either of them. Just sayin' that it's where you'd find them.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>尽管我们的名字,我们实际上并不携带或销售那些。@w2 我们甚至不被允许拥有它们,因为根据 </color><color=#ff0000>帝国</color><color=#ffffff> 的命令,拥有它们是非法的。@w2 </color>
<color=#ffffff>这很荒谬,因为众所周知 </color><color=#ff0000>兹瑞克斯帝国</color><color=#ffffff> 派遣探险队进入 </color><color=#ff00ff>遗留者泛滥的</color><color=#ffffff> 地狱般的巢穴,为了他们自己使用那些 </color><color=#00ffaa>量子处理器</color><color=#ffffff>。@p9 </color>
<color=#ffffff>所以是的。@w2 如果你想要 </color><color=#00ffaa>量子处理器</color><color=#ffffff>,你要么得潜入那些噩梦般的巢穴之一,要么从主要兹瑞克斯基地的电脑中撬出来。@w3 </color>
<color=#ffffff>我并不是建议你去做其中任何一个。只是说那是你能找到它们的地方。</color>

English: We make some booze in the back as a little side project, but i'm short on Hops to add to the mix. If you're up for a run to either Vitalife Pharmaceuticals or Agrinex Incorporated for supplies, i'll foot the bill and even see if any qualified crewmember's looking to work for you.\nThink you can bring me 250 Hops? I'll pay 50k if you can get me some this week.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在后边做一些酒作为一点副业,但是我缺少啤酒花来加入混合物。如果你愿意去 Vitalife Pharmaceuticals或AgriNex Incorporated 拿些供应品,我会支付账单,甚至看看有没有合格的船员想为你工作。\n你觉得你能带给我 250啤酒花 吗?如果你这周能给我弄到一些,我会支付 50k。

English: I think I can help you there

I'm running low on Spike-lemon juice and the concentrated crap is disgusting. I can't sell drinks with that stuff in it.\nThink you can track down 100 Alien Spike Lemons? I'm pretty sure you can get them from Agrinex or Vitalife, but I normally get mine from a Tal'on guy I know, but he's all-out.\nI'll pay 40,000 to avoid using that cheap lemon concentrate.
Chinese (simplified): 我的尖刺柠檬汁快用完了,浓缩的那种太难喝了。我不能在饮料里加那种东西。\n你能帮我找到 100个外星尖刺柠檬吗?我相当确定你可以从Agrinex或Vitalife那里得到它们,但我通常从一个我认识的Tal'on人那里得到,但他现在全卖光了。\n我会支付 40,000来避免使用那种廉价的柠檬浓缩液。

English: I think I can help you there

I don't have anymore work for you, but I decided to ask some of the qualified regulars to see if anyone's looking to crew on a ship.@w3 \nThese aren't your regular civilians. They'll work on your ship or station, as long as you can afford to pay the hiring fee of 75,000 up front.@w2 \nInterested?
Chinese (simplified): 我没有更多的工作给你了,但我决定询问一些合格的常客,看看有没有人想在船上工作。@w3 \n这些人不是你的普通平民。他们会工作在你的船或空间站上,只要你能负担得起75,000的雇佣费。@w2 \n感兴趣吗?

English: Alright, I'll call 'em over.@w2 \nHere's your new crewman. He'll stay wherever you put him and work at his duties aboard, so they can free up some of your ship's processing power.@w2 \nGood luck!
Chinese (simplified): 好的,我会叫他们过来。@w2 \n这是你的新船员。他会待在你安排的地方,并在船上履行他的职责,这样他们可以释放一些你的船的处理能力。@w2 \n祝你好运!

English: I don't have anymore work for you, but I decided to ask some of the qualified regulars to see if anyone's looking to crew on a ship.@w3 \nLooks like you're out of luck.\nYou can usually find some specialized crew looking for work in a bar like this. Keep an eye out at the bar next time you're passing through a Trade Station.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有更多的工作给你了,但我决定询问一些合格的常客,看看有没有人想在船上工作。@w3 \n看起来你运气不好。\n你通常可以在像这样的酒吧里找到一些寻找工作的专业人员。下次经过贸易空间站时,注意酒吧。

English: Don't got no work for you now that the last bit of business is done. I asked some of the regular crews if anyone's looking to crew on yer ship.@w3 \nThese ain't your regular civies. They'll work on your ship or station, s'long as you can afford to pay the hiring fee of 75,000 up front.@w2 \nInterested?
Chinese (simplified): 现在没有工作给你了,上次的业务已经完成了。 我询问了一些常规的船员,看看有没有人想在你的船上工作。@w3 \n这些人不是你的普通平民。他们会工作在你的船或空间站上,只要你能负担得起75,000的雇佣费。@w2 \n感兴趣吗?

English: Alright, I'll call 'em over.@w2 \nHere's your new crewman. He'll stay wherever you put him and work at his duties aboard, so they can free up some of your ship's processing power.@w2 \nGood luck!
Chinese (simplified): 好的,我会叫他们过来。@w2 \n这是你的新船员。他会待在你安排的地方,在船上履行他的职责,这样他们就可以释放一些你的飞船处理能力。@w2 \n祝你好运!

English: I don't have anymore work for you, but I decided to ask some of the local crew if they'd wanna crew on yer ship.@w3 \nLooks like you're out of luck.\nYou can usually find someone looking for work in a bar like this. Keep an eye out at the bar next time you're passing through a spacer bar.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有更多的工作给你了,但我决定问问当地的船员,看看他们是否愿意加入你的船员。@w3 \n看起来你运气不好。\n你通常可以在像这样的酒吧里找到寻找工作的人。下次经过太空酒吧时,注意观察。

English: There's a bounty hunter who comes in 'ere regularly and i'm getting tired of hearing 'im bitch about how heavy his pistol is. If ya get me a Short Ultralight Barrel mod I can finally shut him up.\nI'll pay ya 25k an' put it on 'is tab. Anythin' to keep 'im from whinin' fer hours while he's drunk.
Chinese (simplified): 有个赏金猎人经常来这里,我听他抱怨他的手枪有多重已经听烦了。如果你能给我一个 超轻短枪管改装部件 我可以终于让他闭嘴。\n我会付你 25k 并且记在他的账上。任何事都可以让他在醉酒时不再抱怨几个小时。

English: I think I've got what you want

Look, keep this quiet ya hear? But i'm a collector and 'm trying ta get ma hands on one 'em Empyrion Trading Cards. It's a Rogue J-5565 Card from the planet collection.\nI'll pay ya 5000 'n cash fer it an' another 4000 to keep it quiet from the rest of tha boys. Don't wan' them think' I'm some kinda nerd.\nIf anyone asks, jes' tell 'em you're a smuggler and it's fer someone else.
Chinese (simplified): 听着,保持低调,你听到了吗?但我是个收藏家,我正试图得到一张Empyrion交易卡。它是 流氓J-5565卡 来自星球系列。\n我会付你 5000 现金为了它,另外 4000 来保持它的秘密,不让其他人知道。不想让他们认为我是个书呆子。\n如果有人问,只是告诉他们你是个走私者,这是为别人做的。

English: @d0 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ] Equipment: M30-Zeon Interstellar Antiship Missile State: Ready Authorization: Awaiting reponse from control room Unauthorized use of Rados property is punishable under Imperial Law
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ] 装备: M30-Zeon 星际反舰导弹 状态:就绪 授权: 等待控制室响应 未经授权使用 Rados 财产将根据帝国法律受到惩罚

English: @d0 ACCESS DENIED\n\nUser does not have clearance to open silo doors
Chinese (simplified): @d0 访问被拒绝\n\n用户没有权限打开发射井门

English: @d0 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ] Target: Unknown Vessel Designation: UCH-507809B Location: Within minimum launch range
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ] 目标: 未知飞船 指定: UCH-507809B 位置: 在最小发射范围内

English: @d0 ACCESS DENIED - Insufficient Clearance to Initiate Launch@w4 - No Response from Control Room@w4 - Security Breach Detected
Chinese (simplified): @d0 访问被拒绝 - 权限不足,无法启动发射@w4 - 未收到控制室响应@w4 - 检测到安全漏洞

English: @d0 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ]\nEmergency Launch is only available in the event that the facility has been attacked and contact with command has been lost. Allows the missile crew the option to fire at the last selected target without authorization.\nCurrent Target: UCH-507809B
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ]\n紧急发射仅在设施遭到攻击且与指挥部失去联系时可用。允许导弹机组在未经授权的情况下向最后选定的目标发射。\n当前目标: UCH-507809B

English: @d0 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ] Initiating Emergency Launch Procedure@p6 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ] - No response from Control Room@w4 - No response from Defense@w4 - Authorizing Emergency Launch@p6 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ] WARNING!! Silo Doors are closed!@w2 Shutting off fuel lines@w3 Canceling Launch...
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ] 正在启动紧急发射程序@p6 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ] - 控制室无响应@w4 - 防御系统无响应@w4 - 授权紧急发射@p6 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ] 警告!!发射井门关闭!@w2 关闭燃料管线@w3 取消发射...

English: @d0 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ] Initiating booster ignition in...@p6 10@p2 9@p2 8@p2 7@p2 6@p2 5@p2 4@p2 3@p2 2@p2 1@p2 Initiating Launch...
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ] 正在启动助推器点火...@p6 10@p2 9@p2 8@p2 7@p2 6@p2 5@p2 4@p2 3@p2 2@p2 1@p2 正在启动发射...

English: @d0 [ RADOS - Launch Controller Mk2 ]\nWARNING!! Catastrophic damage to silo detected@w4 \nUnable to initiate launch
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [ RADOS - 发射控制器 Mk2 ]\n警告!!检测到发射井发生灾难性损坏@w4 \n无法启动发射

English: @d0 Welcome to the Starfreight Network! It does not appear that you are registered member of the Starfreight Network. Starfreight services allow validated suppliers, shippers and ship captains to issue and accept transport and supply jobs.@p9 In order to use the Starfreight Network you must register and pay a fee of 20,000 Galactic Credits from a valid account. This payment is to ensure that all users meet the minimum financial requirement to accept and issue jobs. Register with the Starfreight Network?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到星际货运网络! 似乎您不是 星际货运网络的注册会员。 星际货运服务允许验证过的供应商、托运人和舰长发布和接受运输及供应工作。@p9 为了使用 星际货运网络 您必须注册并从有效账户支付 20,000 银河信用点 的费用。 此支付是为了确保所有用户满足接受和发布工作的最低财务要求。 是否注册星际货运网络?

English: Congratulations! You have successfully registered with Starfreight Services!\nYou can now issue supply jobs to freighters and accept cargo freight jobs when they are available from any GIN Console or licensed affiliate of Starfreight Services.\nClick 'Confirm' to be redirected to the Starfreight Services menu.
Chinese (simplified): 恭喜!您已成功注册星际货运服务!\n现在您可以向货船发布补给任务,并在任何 GIN控制台 或星际货运服务的授权合作伙伴处接受货物运输任务。\n点击“确认”以重定向至星际货运服务菜单。

English: @d0 Welcome to Starfreight Services!\nHere you can select to accept available cargo shipping and supply jobs from affiliated partners of Starfreight, check the register of local freighters, and issue supply jobs for facilities, colonies and factories that have an open job.\nWhat would you like to do today?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到星际货运服务!\n在这里,您可以选择接受星际货运合作伙伴提供的可用货物运输和供应工作,查看本地货运飞船的登记册,并为有开放工作的设施、殖民地和工厂发布供应工作。\n今天您想做什么?

English: @d0 Welcome to the Freighter Jobs List!\nBelow, you will find any local jobs available that you can fulfill for payment upon delivery of the target goods.\nThere are currently no available jobs at this time
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到货运飞船工作列表!\n下面,您将找到您可以完成的本地工作,以便在交付目标货物后获得报酬。\n目前没有可用的工作

English: @d0 Welcome to the Freighter Database! Here, you can review the incoming and outgoing freighters in the local system to ensure your shipments are on-time. The use of this information for piracy is strictly forbidden. Due to a large number of pirate attacks in this system the Freighter Database is not available to new users.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到货运飞船数据库! 在这里,您可以回顾本地系统中进出的货运飞船,以确保您的货物按时到达。 严格禁止使用此信息进行海盗活动。 由于该系统中海盗袭击数量众多,货运飞船数据库不对新用户开放。

English: @d0 Welcome to the Job Registration window! Here, you can file a work order for a local freighter to supply parts to a factory or processing plant for a fee. Upon issuing a job, you will receive a Work Order that can be provided to the recipient in order to receive their designated shipment. Valid jobs will be displayed below:
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到工作注册窗口! 在这里,您可以为当地货船提交工作订单,以供应零件给工厂或加工厂,并收取费用。 发布工作后,您将收到一份工作订单,可以提供给接收方以接收他们指定的货物。 有效的工作将在下方显示:

English: @d0 You currently have an active job for: Hostile Apparatus Robotics To task a freighter to supply the requested parts for the job will require a payment of: 50,000 Credits from your account. A work order will be supplied to be provided to the client to confirm the order. No payment will be provided to the intermediary (you) from the client for completion of their order.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您目前有一个针对以下的工作活动: 敌对机器机器人 要指派货船供应工作所需的零件,需要从您的账户支付: 50,000信用点。 将提供工作订单以供提供给客户以确认订单。 中间人(您)在完成客户订单时不会从客户那里获得任何支付。

English: @d0 Your jobs has been successfully issued for a local freighter! A work order has been deposited into your inventory or a connected container. Provide it to the client to confirm the supply of requested items. You will not be able to obtain another work order for the same client until the current one has cleared.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您的工作已成功发布给当地货船! 工作订单已存入您的库存或连接的容器中。 提供给客户以确认所需物品的供应。 在当前订单清空之前,您将无法为同一客户获得另一个工作订单。

A work order will be supplied to be provided to the client to confirm the order. No payment will be provided to the intermediary (you) from the client for completion of their order.

English: A freighter just arrived with replacement parts an hour ago.\nI need a Work Order for them so I can get the items unloaded. They said you have one for me?
Chinese (simplified): 一小时前,一艘货船抵达,带来了替换部件。\n我需要一个 工作订单 以便我可以卸下这些物品。他们说你有一份给我的?

English: Great! I'll send it over and the guys can start unloading the cargo.\nNow, since the freighter did all the work, they'll be getting the pay. But we'll be up and running in no time, so you now have access to all our products in future.
Chinese (simplified): 太好了!我会把它送过去,然后工人们就可以开始卸货了。\n现在,由于货船完成了所有的工作,他们将获得报酬。但我们很快就会重新运营,所以你现在已经可以访问我们所有未来的产品。
