English: Great! I'll send it over and the guys can start unloading the cargo.\nNow, since the freighter did all the work, they'll be getting the pay. But we'll be up and running in no time, so you now have access to all our products in future.

Chinese (simplified): 太好了!我会把它送过去,伙计们可以开始卸货了。\n现在,由于货船完成了所有的工作,他们将得到报酬。但我们很快就能运行起来,所以你以后可以访问我们所有的产品。

English: A freighter just arrived with replacement parts an hour ago.\nI need a Work Order for them so I can get the items unloaded. They said you have one for me?
Chinese (simplified): 一个小时前,一艘货船刚到达,带来了替换部件。\n我需要一个工作订单来让他们卸货。他们说你有一份给我的?

English: Great! I'll send it over and the guys can start unloading the cargo.\nNow, since the freighter did all the work, they'll be getting the pay. But we'll be up and running in no time, so you now have access to all our products in future.
Chinese (simplified): 太好了!我会发送过去,然后伙计们可以开始卸货了。\n现在,由于货船完成了所有的工作,他们会得到报酬。但我们很快就会开始运作,所以你现在可以在未来访问我们所有的产品。

English: A freighter just arrived with replacement parts an hour ago.\nI need a Work Order for them so I can get the items unloaded. They said you have one for me?

English: Great! I'll send it over and the guys can start unloading the cargo.\nNow, since the freighter did all the work, they'll be getting the pay. But we'll be up and running in no time, so you now have access to all our products in future.

Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < GSTBUN-527752029 390T 恒星级聚变反应堆控制 > 内部温度: 158,101,007 ℃ 磁场约束场: 100% 内部涡轮: 8x 离子束 H-1010 等离子涡轮 涡轮速度: 4876 RPM (平均) 辅助涡轮: 2x FORGE V-11N 等离子涡轮 涡轮速度: 3588 RPM

Y/N

Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 < GSTBUN-527752029 390T 恒星级聚变反应堆控制 > < 状态 > 冷却剂输入值调整为0%@w3 < 警告 > 反应堆内部温度上升@w3 < 紧急情况 > 通知管理员-B2@w5 < 警告 > 此控制台已被管理员-B2锁定

English: @d0 GHY'ST EXPERIMENTAL CONTAINMENT BUNKER-44@w2 \nThis bunker and all of its contents are property of the House of Ghy'st.\nInput Query_
Chinese (simplified): @d0 GHY'ST实验性封闭掩体-44@w2 \n此掩体及其所有内容属于Ghy'st家族所有。\n输入查询_

English:
<color=#8ab3ff>This bunker was built to contain an active </color><color=#00ffaa>Legacy</color><color=#8ab3ff> infestation to observe the Legacy under controlled conditions with the intent to research countermeasures against a resurgence of the </color><color=#00ffaa>Legacy</color><color=#8ab3ff> after their forced dormancy in the Silent War.@p9 </color>
<color=#8ab3ff>In addition, providing the </color><color=#00ffaa>Legacy Nexus</color><color=#8ab3ff> with the correct amount of raw resources allows us a degree of control over the infestation's growth, which we have used as a method of producing and extracting </color><color=#ff00ff>Quantum Processors</color><color=#8ab3ff> which are still beyond our ability to manufacture.@p9 </color>
<color=#8ab3ff>Since this facility was made operational 8 cycles ago, we have managed to grow, extract and decontaminate over 600 quantum samples for use across the </color><color=#ff0000>Empire</color><color=#8ab3ff>.</color>
<color=#8ab3ff>The risk has proven to be worth the reward, provided the now-fully developed infestation remains contained.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#8ab3ff>这座地堡建造的目的是为了控制活跃的</color><color=#00ffaa>遗留者</color><color=#8ab3ff>侵扰,以观察在受控条件下的遗留者,研究对策,阻止在静寂战争后被迫休眠的</color><color=#00ffaa>遗留者</color><color=#8ab3ff>复苏。@p9 </color>
<color=#8ab3ff>此外,向</color><color=#00ffaa>遗留者核心</color><color=#8ab3ff>提供正确数量的原材料,使我们能够在某种程度上控制侵扰的增长,我们将其用作生产和提取</color><color=#ff00ff>量子处理器</color><color=#8ab3ff>的方法,这些处理器仍超出了我们的制造能力。@p9 </color>
<color=#8ab3ff>自从这个设施在8个周期前投入运营以来,我们已经成功地培育、提取和净化了600多个量子样本,用于</color><color=#ff0000>帝国</color><color=#8ab3ff>的各个领域。</color>
<color=#8ab3ff>事实证明,风险是值得的,只要现在完全发展的侵扰保持被控制。</color>

English: Science Officer D'kar Log 021: The only thing that keeps us safe in this glass coffin surrounded by our greatest enemy is the knowledge that flamethrowers mounted to the outer walls will fry anything that tries to breach containment. So far it seems to be enough to keep the legacy from trying to get out... so long as we keep feeding it.@p9 Log 022: I don't envy the extraction crew that have to go in there every week to extract the Quantum Processors that may or may not have regrown since the last incursion. We keep the nutrient supply just right for it to grow more bioquantum processors, but sometimes it gets wise and grows a few Abominations to keep the crew away. Then it's 3 days in quarantine for them.@p9 Log 023: One of the extraction crew got snatched by an Overseer that dropped out of the ceiling. There's no getting him back. I've been keeping track of the infection's progress as he stands around in the middle of the room, gun-in-hand, next to the Overseer that grabbed him. Is there any thought in his head now that he's connected to the legacy's Gestalt?@p9 Log 024: The alarms went off. I thought it was another breach drill at first, but there was an emergency notification at the Commander's console that someone had sabotaged the Reactor. He locked down the reactor console, but it was too late. The reactor's gone and the feed supply to the nexus is jammed into supply mode. We're going to see explosive growth if someone doesn't shut it off soon...
Chinese (simplified): 科学官 D'kar 日志 021: 在这个被我们最大的敌人所包围的玻璃棺材中,唯一能让我们安全的东西,就是我们的知识:安装在外墙上的火焰喷射器会焚烧任何试图突破隔离的物体。 目前为止,这似乎足够让遗留者试图出去……只要我们继续喂养它。@p9 日志 022: 我不羡慕那些每周都要进去提取可能已经重新生长或者没有的量子处理器的提取小组。 我们保持精确的营养供应,让它生长更多的生物量子处理器,但有时它会聪明地生长一些畸形体以让小组远离。然后他们就要隔离3天。@p9 日志 023: 一个提取小组的成员被一个从天花板掉下监督者抓走了。没有办法把他救回来了。我一直在跟踪他连接到遗留者的集体意识后感染的进展,他手持枪站在房间里,旁边是抓他的监督者。 现在他与遗留者的集体意识相连,他的头脑中还有任何想法吗?@p9 日志 024: 警报响了。我最初以为是又一次突破演习,但指挥官的控制台上有紧急通知,有人破坏了反应堆。他锁定了反应堆控制台,但为时已晚。反应堆已经没了,向核心的供给被卡在供给模式中。如果没人尽快关闭,我们将看到爆炸性的增长……

English: Observations: The infestation has achieved it's most developed state within the confines of the bunker. With the correct supply of nutrients and raw materials via pipes into the nexus' core growth can now be directed to the development of bioquantum processors instead of sequestration.@p9 Repeated expeditions? Incursions? By the Extraction Team to extract the processors has lead to the growth of tank-like protrusions from the ceiling that appear to be used to grow defensive antibodies in the form of Abominations to protect the Quantum Processors from being extracted.@p9 With the appearance of an Overseer within the enclosure, we've had to change the Extraction door controls to hard-wired from the control room instead of an IR-signal to prevent the Overseer from accessing the door controls technopathically.
Chinese (simplified): 观察: 侵扰在地堡的限制内达到了最发达的状态。 通过管道向核心提供正确的营养和原材料供应,现在生长可以被引导到生物量子处理器的发展,而不是隔离。@p9 提取队伍反复的探险?入侵?通过提取处理器导致天花板上生长出坦克状的突起,似乎被用来生长防御性抗体,以畸形体的形式保护量子处理器不被提取。@p9 随着管理者在围栏内的出现,我们不得不将提取门控制改为从控制室硬线连接,而不是红外信号,以防止管理者通过技术感应访问门控。

English: Dear Elinalise...@w2 The base is under attack and everyone's at alert. B2's been breached and the power's gone into emergency mode.@w2 I don't think i'll be coming home this time, my love. Give my love to the boys and tell them how proud I am of them, and how I wish I could see them all grown up.@w3 I... I'm sorry Elie. I love you.@w2 The containment doors are open! Why?! Why would anyone do this!?@p9 - END OF RECORDING -
Chinese (simplified): 亲爱的Elinalise...@w2 基地正在受到攻击,每个人都处于警戒状态。B2已经被突破,电源已经进入紧急模式。@w2 这次我不认为我会回家,我的爱人。把我的爱给孩子们,告诉他们我为他们感到骄傲,我多么希望看到他们长大成人。@w3 我……我很抱歉,Elie。我爱你。@w2 隔离门开了!为什么?!怎么会有人这样做!?@p9 - 录音结束 -

English: Welcome to Aftermarket Arms! I've got weapon mods and kits for you to upgrade your weapons if the factory standard isn't your thing. I also handle a few repair jobs on the side for custom weapons, but not often and not cheap. So what are you in the market for?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到售后武器! 如果你不喜欢工厂标准配置,我有武器改装部件和套件供你升级武器。 我偶尔也会处理一些定制武器的修理工作,但不多,也不便宜。 那么你在市场上寻找什么?

English: I'd like to take a look at your selection

Chinese (simplified): 最近听到什么有趣的消息了吗?

English: Weapon upgrades come in three qualities: Standard mods come in blue cases and are most common. We sell 'em. High-end mods come in green cases. They're expensive. Mil-Spec mods come in red cases. Those're illegal for civilians to own, but god-damn are they fun to fire!
Chinese (simplified): 武器升级分为三种品质: 标准改装部件装在蓝色盒子里,是最常见的。我们卖这个。 高端改装部件装在绿色盒子里。它们很贵。 军用规格改装部件装在红色盒子里。平民拥有这些是违法的,但是该死的射击起来真有趣!

English: <color=#ffffff>Your suit's logistics system can retrieve and fit identical mods on any weapon you handle and store them in your suit's pattern buffer.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>This prevents other people from stealing mods off your gun, and lets you pick up any identical gun and have the mods in your pattern buffer fitted to the weapon automatically.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你的装备物流系统可以检索并适配你处理的任何武器上的相同模块,并将它们存储在你的装备模式缓冲区中。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>这可以防止其他人从你的枪上偷走模块,并且让你拿起任何相同的枪,自动将模式缓冲区中的模块适配到武器上。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Most weapon mods have trade-offs. It's up to you to balance what kind of effect you want versus the drawbacks of using enhanced weapon mods.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If a mod will increase your damage, it will in all likelihood increase the recoil. Conservation of mass and all that, right?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>大多数武器模块都有权衡。你需要平衡你想要的效果与使用增强型武器模块的缺点。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果一个模块会增加你的伤害,它很可能会同时增加后坐力。质量守恒定律,对吧?</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>This isn't the kind of job that needs an extra pair of hands, ya see?</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I got a job for a gopher, though. If you don't mind fetching me some stuff for cash.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>这不是那种需要额外一双手的工作,你懂吗?</color>\n<color=#ffffff>不过我有一个跑腿的工作。如果你不介意为我取一些东西来换取现金。</color>

English: Those syndicate bastards are up to no good.\nYou seen those SMGs they're packing? Small, lightweight, and mostly made of plastic. They've been sneaking them through security checkpoints everywhere and I wanna know how they're fitting my mods onto them!\nI want one of those Syndicate Uzis to see how they're getting those mods on them.
Chinese (simplified): 那些联合会混蛋没安好心。\n你看到他们携带的SMG了吗?小巧,轻便,大部分是塑料制成的。他们一直在各地的安全检查点偷偷带过,我想知道他们是怎么把我的模块装到上面的!\n我想要一把那些联合会乌兹冲锋枪来看看他们是如何将那些模块装上去的。
我为你找到了一把乌兹冲锋枪

English: I've got a regular whose had their suit's pattern buffer hacked by a bunch of scammers. That means he can't load his mods off 'n on his gun and that's bad fer business.@p9 So I need you to go and hack one of those Science Satellites around the sun and bring me back the Material Data they stole so I can reset their buffer. I'll load up the old buffer feed with an exploding mod that those scammers ain't gonna like. I'll wire 75,000 credits into your account for the trouble, of course.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个常客,他的装备模式缓冲区被一群骗子黑客攻击了。这意味着他不能在他的枪上加载和卸载他的模块,这对生意不利。@p9 所以我需要你去黑掉那些科学卫星之一,绕着太阳运行,然后把他们偷走的材料数据带回来,这样我就可以重置他们的缓冲区。 我会用一个爆炸模块加载旧缓冲区,那些骗子不会喜欢的。 当然,我会将75,000信用点转入你的账户作为报酬。

English: You may have seen my competition: Auxilary Augments?\nYeah, well they've got a heavy weapon mod that lets you swing a big gun around easily, and I want to see if it works on a machine gun, but I can't jes go up and ask for one.@p9\nSo I need you to track down a Gyro-Stabilized Frame and bring it back to me. They're Mil-Spec attachments, so they're not exactly legal fer civilians to have. But for 80,000 credits in your account it ain't a bad deal.
Chinese (simplified): 你可能见过我的竞争对手:辅助增强?\n是的,他们有一个重型武器模块,可以让你轻松地挥舞大枪,我想看看它是否适用于机枪,但我不能直接去要一个。@p9 \n所以我需要你追踪到一个陀螺稳定框架并把它带回来给我。它们是军用规格附件,所以平民持有并不完全合法。但为了80,000信用点在你的账户里,这笔交易还不错。

English: Deal. Wire the money into my account.
Chinese (simplified): 交易. 把钱汇到我的账户里.

English: I've got a big order to refurbish a pile of old rifles from a military contractor to resell for civilian use. Now, I do this all the time. The problem this time is that my usual guy can't deliver on the goods I need for the gun's furniture. Specifically the materials for the foregrip and stock.@p9 I assume you don't have any bad blood with the Tal'on, because what I need is 40 Leather and the Tal'on make the highest quality stuff, if you can get around the Zirax not wanting anyone to deal with them. The pay for the job is 25,000 credits though, so the choice is yours.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一笔大订单,要翻新一堆来自军事承包商的旧步枪,以便转售给民用市场。 现在,我经常这样做。但这次的问题是我的常规供应商不能提供我需要的枪械配件材料。特别是前握把和枪托的材料。@p9 我假设你和泰隆没有不良关系,因为我需要的是40皮革,而泰隆制造的是最高质量的产品,如果你能绕过兹瑞克斯不想让任何人与他们打交道的问题。 这项工作的报酬是25,000信用点,所以选择权在你。

English: In my line of work, I've gotta test every weapon I've refitted for a customer. Which means I need a target to shoot. My usual target's wearing out and I need to get it some quality armor or else it ain't a fair test.@p9\nSo what I need from you is a set of Improved Heavy Armor, and a single Advanced Armor Booster to put on it.\nI'll pay you 80,000 credits for the job.
Chinese (simplified): 在我的工作领域,我必须测试我为顾客重新装配的每件武器。这意味着我需要一个目标来射击。我的常规目标正在磨损,我需要给它一些高质量的盔甲,否则这不公平的测试。@p9 \n所以我需要你提供一套改进型重型盔甲,以及一个高级盔甲增强器放在上面。\n我会为这项工作支付你80,000信用点。

English: I've got the armor and booster you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我拿到了你想要的盔甲和助推器

English: That's what I was hoping to get. Thanks fer this kid.\nHere's your pay, and I've got a pack of 7.62mm Rounds you can have as well.
Chinese (simplified): 这就是我所希望得到的。谢谢你,孩子。\n这是你的报酬,我还有一包7.62毫米子弹,你也可以拿走。

English: <color=#ffffff>I don't have any more work for you. </color><color=#ffffff>You might want to try one of the other vendors 'round here</color><color=#ffffff>. Everyone's got a job fer someone with a ship.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我没有更多的工作给你了。</color><color=#ffffff>你可能会想试试这里的其他供应商</color><color=#ffffff>。每个人都有适合有飞船的人的工作。</color>

English: Aye, I can repair most unique or custom weapons.\nOnly problem is that i've only got enough of the important parts to repair one weapon. So if you've broken your gun again and bring it back to me, I ain't gonna be able to fix it.\nSo, what'll it be?
Chinese (simplified): 好的,我可以修理大部分独特或定制武器。\n唯一的问题是,我只有足够的重要部件来修理一件武器。所以如果你的枪又坏了并带回来给我,我可没法修它。\n那么,你想修理哪一个呢?

English: Right. Let me say up front, that this is both a very nice pistol, and also probably illegal to be in your hands. That being said, I'm perfectly to look the other way and fix it for you. But I don't have the right parts for something like this and it ain't gonna be cheap.@p9 So, first is my fee for fixing something like this. Which is 100,000 credits for a conventional firearm like this. It'd be more expensive for an energy or heavy weapon.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Pistol Upgrade Kits 2 Spare Parts 10 Platinum Plates 10 Sathium Plates and that 100,000 credits in cash. I'm not having a job like this go on the books. You bring me those, and i'll fix your gun for you.
Chinese (simplified): 好的。 让我先直说,这既是一把非常好的手枪,而且很可能在你手里是违法的。 话虽如此,我完全愿意视而不见,帮你修理它。但我没有适合这样东西的正确零件,而且这不会便宜。@p9 所以,首先是我修理这样东西的费用。对于像这样的常规火器是 100,000信用点。对于能量或重型武器会更贵。@w2 我还需要一些额外的零件来完成这项工作。@p9 让我看看... 对于这个我需要: 5个手枪升级套件 2个备用零件 10个白金板 10个钑板 还有 100,000信用点 的 现金。我 不 打算让这样的工作记录在案。 你把这些东西带给我,我会帮你修理你的枪。

English: <color=#ffffff>Alright, I've fixed up your gun. Good as new. Hope ya like it!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I had to use some parts from the back which I ain't gonna be able to replace any time soon, so don't break your gun again.</color>\n<color=#00bb00>I won't be able to handle another repair job like that for at least a month</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>
Chinese (simplified): 好了,我已经修好了你的枪。像新的一样。希望你喜欢!\n我不得不使用一些我短时间内无法替换的后部零件,所以不要再弄坏你的枪了。\n至少一个月内我无法处理像那样的另一个修理工作。

English: Thanks, I really didn't want to track down another one of these guns.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢,我真的不想去追踪另一把这样的枪。

English: Now this is a rifle. Didn't think i'd ever get the chance to work on one of these... mainly because they're illegal in civilian hands. Not that it's an issue with me. But I don't have the right parts for something like this and it ain't gonna be cheap.@p9 So, first is my fee for fixing something like this. Which is 100,000 credits for a conventional firearm like this. It'd be more expensive for an energy or heavy weapon.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Rifle Upgrade Kits 4 Spare Parts 10 Platinum Plates 20 Zascosium Ingots and that 100,000 credits in cash. I'm not having a job like this go on the books. You bring me those, and i'll fix your gun for you.
Chinese (simplified): 现在这个是一把步枪。我原以为我永远不会有机会去研究这些...主要是因为它们在平民手中是违法的。 不过对我来说这不是问题。但我没有合适的部件来处理这样的东西,而且这不会便宜。@p9 所以,首先是我修理这样东西的费用。对于这样的传统枪械是10万信用点。如果是能量武器或重型武器会更贵。@w2 我还需要一些额外的部件来完成这项工作。@p9 让我看看...对于这个我需要: 5个步枪升级套件 4个备用部件 10个白金板 20个铡锭 还有10万信用点的现金。我不会让这样的工作记录在案。 你带给我这些,我会帮你修理你的枪。

English: Oh, an energy weapon. That's gonna be a bit tricky. First, this gun is illegal outside the Imperial Military. Second, is that this an experimental weapon that's not even public. Which means I naturally don't have the right parts to fix it.@p9 So my fee for fixing something like this is 150,000 credits for all the added hassle involved with fixing an energy weapon.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job that I don't stock.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Laser Upgrade Kits 5 Superconductors 3 Power Coils 3 Advanced Capacitors and that 150,000 credits in cash. I'm not having a job like this go on the books. You bring me those, and i'll fix your gun for you.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,一把能量武器。那会有点棘手。 首先,这把枪在帝国军队之外是非法的。其次,这是一把甚至还没有公开的实验性武器。这意味着我自然没有合适的零件来修理它。@p9 所以我修理这样的东西的费用是 150,000信用点,因为修理能量武器涉及到的额外麻烦。@w2 我还需要一些我这里没有的额外零件来完成这项工作。@p9 让我看看...为此我需要: 5个激光升级套件 5个超导体 3个动力线圈 3个高级电容器 还有那 150,000信用点 的 现金。我 不打算将这样的工作记录在册。 你带来这些,我会帮你修理你的枪。

English: Ooh, it's a big-boy gun. That's gonna be a bit trickier. Lots of things can go wrong with fixing up one of those... but probably more so when I have no idea what this thing is. I can probably figure it out, but it's gonna add extra hassle.@p9 Without knowing how this thing works, i'm gonna have to make the service fee a flat 200,000 credits since I have no idea if it's meant to explode when I pull the trigger or not.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Heavy Weapon Upgrade Kits 5 Heat Exchangers 5 Radiation Shielding 5 Flux Coils and that 200,000 credits in cash. I'm not having a job like this go on the books. You bring me those, and i'll fix your... thing for you.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,这是一把大人用的枪。那会有点更难。 修理那些东西可能会出很多问题...但当我完全不知道这是什么东西时,可能更是如此。。 我可能能弄清楚,但这会增加额外的麻烦。@p9 由于不知道这个东西的工作原理,我得将服务费定为固定的 200,000信用点,因为我完全不知道当我扣动扳机时它是否会爆炸。@w2 我还需要一些额外的零件来完成这项工作。@p9 让我看看...为此我需要: 5个重型武器升级套件 5个热交换器 5个辐射屏蔽 5个通量线圈 还有那 200,000信用点 的 现金。我 不打算将这样的工作记录在册。 你带来这些,我会帮你修理你的...东西。

English: This is a very fancy shotgun you've got here. Something tells me that you probably shouldn't have it. Not that it's any of my business. A job's a job after all. Who am I to question whether your personal property was legally acquired or not?@p9 So, first is my fee for fixing something like this. Which is 100,000 credits for a conventional firearm like this. It'd be more expensive for an energy or heavy weapon.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Shotgun Upgrade Kits 4 Spare Parts 5 Flux Coils 20 Gold Ingots and that 100,000 credits in cash. I'm not having a job like this go on the books. You bring me those, and i'll fix your gun for you.
Chinese (simplified): 这是一把非常精致的霰弹枪。 有些东西告诉我,你可能不应该拥有它。不过这不是我的事。毕竟,工作就是工作。我有什么资格质疑你的个人财产是否合法获得?@p9 所以,首先是我修理这样的东西的费用。这是 100,000信用点 对于这样一种传统的火器。如果是能量武器或重型武器会更贵。@w2 我还需要一些额外的零件来完成这项工作。@p9 让我看看...为此我需要: 5个霰弹枪升级套件 4个备用零件 5个通量线圈 20个金锭 还有那 100,000信用点 的 现金。我 不打算将这样的工作记录在册。 你带来这些,我会帮你修理你的枪。

English: <color=#ffffff>I don't have the parts on my end to repair any more of those guns you've got.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Can't send you to fetch the parts either because they're not the sort of thing you'd be able to get your hands on.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>So if you need another repair job, you'll have to try somewhere else.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我没有零件来修理你拥有的那些枪了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>也不能让你去取零件,因为它们不是你能弄到的那种东西。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>所以如果你需要另一项修理工作,你得去别的地方试试。</color>

English: Welcome to Auxiliary Augments!\nThe leading supplier of 3rd-party modifications for industrial tools and tech. We also handle tool repairs for those special tools, weapons and family heirlooms.\nHow can I help you today?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到辅助增强装置!\n我们是工业工具和技术第三方改装的领先供应商。我们还处理特殊工具、武器和家族传家宝的修理工作。\n今天有什么可以帮您的吗?

English: I'd like to take a look at your selection

Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff><b>最近听到什么有趣的事了吗?<b></color>

English: Weapon upgrades come in three qualities: Standard mods come in blue cases and are most common. We sell 'em. High-end mods come in green cases. They're expensive. Mil-Spec mods come in red cases. Those're illegal for civilians to own, but god-damn are they fun to fire!
Chinese (simplified): 武器升级分为三种品质: 标准改装装在蓝色箱子里,是最常见的。我们出售它们。 高端改装装在绿色箱子里。它们很贵。 军用规格改装装在红色箱子里。这些对平民来说是非法拥有的,但是该死的射击起来真有趣!

English: <color=#ffffff>Your suit's logistics system can retrieve and fit identical mods on any weapon you handle and store them in your suit's pattern buffer.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>This prevents other people from stealing mods off your gun, and lets you pick up any identical gun and have the mods in your pattern buffer fitted to the weapon automatically.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你的服装物流系统可以检索并安装任何你处理的武器上的相同改装,并将其存储在你的服装模式缓冲区中。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>这可以防止其他人从你的枪上偷走改装,并且让你拿起任何相同的枪,自动将模式缓冲区中的改装安装到武器上。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Most weapon mods have trade-offs. It's up to you to balance what kind of effect you want versus the drawbacks of using enhanced weapon mods.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If a mod will increase your damage, it will in all likelihood increase the recoil. Conservation of mass and all that, right?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>大多数武器改装都有权衡。取决于你,要平衡你想要的效果和使用增强武器改装的缺点。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果一个改装会增加你的损伤,它很可能会同时增加后坐力。质量守恒之类的,对吧?</color>

English: Why yes, we can repair most unique or custom weapons.\nUnfortunately, we're low on stock for some of the more specialized parts, so I'm afraid we're only able to repair one weapon.\nSo, what weapon are we repairing today?
Chinese (simplified): 当然,我们可以修理大多数独特或定制武器。\n不幸的是,我们某些更专业的零件库存不足,所以恐怕我们只能修理一件武器。\n那么,我们今天要修理哪件武器呢?

English: This pistol is a fine weapon, and I can see it's been used extensively. It is also highly illegal to possess. That won't be a problem here, just giving you a warning.@p9 The fee for a job like this is 100,000 credits for a conventional firearm like this. It'd be more expensive for an energy or heavy weapon.@w2 We also don't stock some of the parts, which you will need to provide yourself.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Pistol Upgrade Kits 2 Spare Parts 10 Platinum Plates 10 Sathium Plates and 100,000 credits in cash, because no one wants a record of this job. The rest of the parts will come from my stock.
Chinese (simplified): 这把手枪是一件精良的武器,我可以看出它已经被广泛使用。它也是高度非法持有的。在这里不会有问题,只是给你一个警告。@p9 像这样的工作费用是 100,000信用点 对于像这样的常规火器。如果是能量或重型武器会更贵。@w2 我们也不储备一些零件,你需要自己提供。@p9 让我看看...对于这个我需要: 5个手枪升级套件 2个备用零件 10个铂金板 10个钑板 和 100,000信用点 在 现金 中,因为 没有人 想要这项工作的记录。 其余的零件将来自我的库存。

English: This is an Energy Weapon. That's going to include a higher cost for the added complexity. This is also an experimental military weapon that I'd rather not know how you got.@p9 So the fee for fixing something like this is 150,000 credits for all the red tape involved with fixing something like this.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job that I don't stock.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Laser Upgrade Kits 5 Superconductors 3 Power Coils 3 Advanced Capacitors and that 150,000 credits in cash, because no one wants a record of this job. The rest of the parts will come from my stock.
Chinese (simplified): 这是一种能量武器。它将包括更高的成本来应对增加的复杂性。这也是一种试验性的军事武器,我宁愿不知道你是怎么得到的。@p9 所以,修复像这样的东西的费用是 150,000信用点,因为修复这样的东西涉及的所有繁文缛节。@w2 我还需要一些额外的零件,这些我并不常备。@p9 让我看一下...为此我需要: 5个激光升级组件 5个超导体 3个动力线圈 3个高级电容器 而且那 150,000信用点 需要用 现金 支付,因为没有人想要这次工作的记录。 其余的零件将来自我的库存。

English: I... have no idea what this is. It's either some kind of experimental weapon or a prototype of some kind. I can probably fix it, but it's going to cost extra.@p9 Without knowing how this thing works, i'm gonna have to make the service fee a flat 200,000 credits since I have no idea if it's meant to explode when I pull the trigger or not.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Heavy Weapon Upgrade Kits 5 Heat Exchangers 5 Radiation Shielding 5 Flux Coils and that 200,000 credits in cash, because no one wants a record of this job. The rest of the parts will come from my stock... assuming they even fit.
Chinese (simplified): 我……完全不知道这是什么。 它可能是某种实验性武器或者某种原型。我可能能修好它,但这需要额外收费。@p9 在不知道这个玩意儿怎么工作的情况下,我不得不将服务费定为固定200,000信用点,因为我不知道当我扣动扳机时它是否会爆炸。@w2 我还需要一些额外的零件来完成这项工作。@p9 让我们看看……为此我需要: 5个重型武器升级套件 5个热交换器 5个辐射屏蔽 5个通量线圈 还有那个200,000信用点现金,因为没人想要这项工作的记录。 其余的零件将来自我的库存……假设它们甚至合适。

English: This is a nice rifle. I'm also pretty sure you shouldn't have it, either. But that's none of my business. We can't publicly repair a weapon like this without authorization from the manufacturer... We can repair it privately... for a fee.@p9 So the private service will set you back 100,000 credits for a conventional firearm like this. It'd be more expensive for an energy or heavy weapon.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job since it has to be off-books.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Rifle Upgrade Kits 4 Spare Parts 10 Platinum Plates 20 Zascosium Ingots and that 100,000 credits in cash, because no one wants a record of this job. The rest of the parts will come from my stock.
Chinese (simplified): 这是一把漂亮的步枪。我也相当确定你不应该拥有它,不过那不是我的事情。 我们不能在没有制造商授权的情况下公开修理这样的武器……我们可以私下里修理……收点费用。@p9 所以这种私人服务会让你支付10万信用点 用于这样一把常规的枪械。如果是能量或者重型武器会更贵。@w2 我还需要一些额外的零件来做这份工作,因为它必须不在账上。@p9 让我看看...对于这个我需要: 5个步枪升级套件 4个备用零件 10个铡板 20个锷锭 还有那10万信用点的现金,因为没人想要这份工作的记录。 其他零件将来自我的库存。

English: This is a very fancy shotgun you've got here. Something tells me that you probably shouldn't have it. Not that it's any of my business. A job's a job after all. Who am I to question whether your personal property was legally acquired or not?@p9 So, first is my fee for fixing something like this. Which is 100,000 credits for a conventional firearm like this. It'd be more expensive for an energy or heavy weapon.@w2 I'm also gonna need some extra parts to do the job.@p9 Let's see... for this i'd need: 5 Shotgun Upgrade Kits 4 Spare Parts 5 Flux Coils 20 Gold Ingots and that 100,000 credits in cash. I'm not having a job like this go on the books. You bring me those, and i'll fix your gun for you.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你这里有的一把非常花哨的霰弹枪。 有些事情让我认为你大概不应该拥有它。这不是我的事。毕竟,工作就是工作。我有什么资格质疑你的个人财产是否是合法获得的?@p9 所以,首先是我修理这样东西的费用。这是10万信用点 用于这样一把常规的枪械。如果是能量或者重型武器会更贵。@w2 我还需要一些额外的零件来做这份工作。@p9 让我看看...对于这个我需要: 5个霰弹枪升级套件 4个备用零件 5个通量线圈 20个金锭 还有那10万信用点的现金。我不会让这样的工作记录在账上。 你带给我那些,我会为你修好你的枪。

English: <color=#ffffff>I've switched out the firing mechanism and replaced the barrel, mounting and furniture. Should be compatible with any existing mods you had without any extra work.</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>To avoid any attention that a job like this would entail, I won't be able to handle any more repair jobs from you</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我已经更换了击发机制,替换了枪管、支架和家具。应该可以与你现有的任何改装兼容,无需额外工作。</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>为了避免这样的工作可能引起的注意,我不能再处理你其他的修理工作</color><color=#ffffff>。</color>

English: I'm afraid Auxiliary Augments is not able to comply with any more repair requests, sir.\nWhy don't you try asking at one of our other stores?
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕辅助增强无法再满足您的任何修理请求,先生。\n您为什么不尝试在我们的其他商店询问呢?

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid we at Auxiliary Arms have a full staff at this location.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>But if you're willing to retrieve some supplies, I have a single job you may be interested in.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恐怕我们辅助武器在这里已经有完整的员工了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>但如果你愿意取回一些供应品,我有一个工作你可能会感兴趣的。</color>

English: We need to test a number of tool and weapon modifications here, and one of the things that Auxiliary Augments handles most are Chemical Sprayers and Flamethrowers.\nThe shop model I normally use for testing is on it's last legs after years of service, so I'm in the market for some replacement parts.\nI need 10 Flux Coils and 30 Aluminium Foil to give the old girl a complete overhaul.
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要在这里测试一些工具和武器的修改,其中辅助增强处理最多的是化学喷雾器和火焰喷射器。\n我通常用于测试的商店模型在多年使用后已经到了寿命的尽头,所以我正在寻找一些替换部件。\n我需要 10个磁通线圈 和 30个铝箔 来给这位老女士进行一次彻底的大修。
我已经拿到了你的替换零件

English: Auxiliary Augments has to stay ahead of the competition, and that means the latest information on the newest and upcoming weapons and mods. The kind of information we want isn't something you can get easily... or legally.@p9 So I need you to go and hack one of those Military Satellites around the sun and bring me back Classified Military Data so we can stay ahead of Aftermarket Arms. The pay's good, of course. Just don't get caught. The head office will wire 200,000 credits into your account if you pull it off.
Chinese (simplified): 辅助增强必须保持在竞争的前列,这意味着要获取最新和即将推出的武器与改装的最新信息。 我们想要的那种信息并不容易得到……或者合法获取。@p9 所以我需要你去黑客攻击那些军事卫星,围绕着太阳,带回机密军事数据,这样我们就可以领先于黑市武器。 当然,报酬是丰厚的。只是别被抓到。 如果你能成功,总部会将200,000信用点电汇到你的账户里。

English: You may have seen our competition: Aftermarket Arms?\nThey've recently had a contract with Polaris to modify their androids' laser weapons with Superconductor Stocks and we want to know about any problems with their latest mod.@p9\nSo I need you to track down a Superconductor Stock and bring it back to me. I don't care where you get it from, since Aftermarket Arms made them all. But if you do there'll be 90,000 credits when you're done.
Chinese (simplified): 你可能已经看到我们的竞争对手:售后武器了吗?\n他们最近和Polaris签订了合同,用超导股票来修改他们的安卓激光武器,我们想了解任何关于他们最新改装的问题。@p9 \n所以我需要你追踪一个超导股票并把它带回来给我。我不在乎你从哪里得到它,因为售后武器制造了所有的。但如果你做到了,会有90,000信用点。

English: Deal. Wire the money into my account.
Chinese (simplified): 交易. 把钱汇到我的账户里.

English: We do a lot of work on plasma cutters, drills, welders and chemical sprayers at Auxiliary Augments. Those require specalized parts to keep them functioning, but we're running low on some parts and our usual delivery guy hasn't been able to source them.@p9 What we need to top up our supplies is 20 Bottles of Xenon and 20 Heat Exchangers. You should be able to get them from Zero Horizons or Thermal Interactions' factories. The pay for the job is 78,000 credits though, so it's worth the effort.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在辅助增强器(Auxiliary Augments)对等离子切割器、钻头、焊接机和化学喷雾器进行了大量的工作。这些设备需要专门的零件来保持其运行,但我们目前某些零件的库存不足,而且我们通常的供货商也无法提供它们。@p9 我们需要补充库存的是 20瓶氙气 和 20个热交换器。 你应该可以从 零点地平线 或 热能互动 的工厂那里得到它们。 这份工作的报酬是 78,000信用点,所以值得你的努力。

English: One of the most common problem with chemical sprayers and plasma welders is the radiation blowback. Some of the latest models from the factory don't care about safety, so we're the ones that need to mod weapons with added protection.@p9\nI'm looking into a different avenue than the usual Radiation Shielding and trying to see if armor mods might have what we're looking for.\nFor this I'll need a single Advanced Radiation Booster, and the pay's 60,000 credits for the job.
Chinese (simplified): 化学喷射器和等离子焊接机最常见的问题之一是辐射回击。一些工厂的最新型号不关心安全,所以我们是真正需要改装武器并增加保护措施的人。。@p9 \n我正在寻找一个不同于通常辐射屏蔽的途径,并试图看看装甲改装是否有我们正在寻找的东西。\n为此我需要一个高级辐射增强器,这项工作的报酬是60,000信用点。

English: I've got the armor booster you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我已经拿到了你想要的装甲增强器

English: Perfect, I'll have your pay right away!\nI've also got some Bioethanol Canisters you can have as a bonus. Use them as fuel, or convert into ammunition for your own Flamethrower.\nWe at Auxiliary Augments highly recommend using a flamethrower against hostile wildlife! You won't be disappointed!
Chinese (simplified): 完美,我马上给你发工资!\n我还有一些生物乙醇罐你可以作为奖金拥有。把它们当作燃料使用,或者转换成你自己的火焰喷射器的弹药。

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid I just had the one job.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>But if you're looking for more work, I'm sure there's someone else around here that could use your help, and you're always welcome as a customer.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恐怕我只有一个工作。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>但如果你在寻找更多的工作,我相信这里肯定有其他人需要你的帮助,你作为顾客也总是受欢迎的。</color>

English: Tena koe te tangata haere. Ko ahau te kaitukino o te kainga.\nKo taku tumanako ka murua e koe taku korero ki a koe i roto i te reo noa, engari me mau tonu ahau ki nga huarahi o toku iwi.
Chinese (simplified): 你好,旅行者。我是家庭的厨师。我的愿望是双重的,你用通用语言跟我说话,但我会坚持使用我族人的方式。

English: @d0 Abandoned Landing Pad Difficulty: 1 (Tutorial-level Dungeon) Estimated Completion Time: 8 Minutes Hazards: Radiation, Injury, Infection, Poison
Chinese (simplified): @d0 废弃着陆垫 难度: 1 (教程级地下城) 预计完成时间: 8分钟 危险: 辐射,伤害,感染,中毒

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Light Armor Recommended Minimum Weapons: Shotgun, Assault Rifle Recommended Minimum Supplies: Bandages, Antibiotic Pills, Antitoxic Pills, Antiradiation Ointment Expect to encounter hostile wildlife with contaminated or venomous bites and rogue security systems
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低护甲: 轻型护甲 推荐最低武器: 霰弹枪,突击步枪 推荐最低补给: 绷带,抗生素药丸,解毒药丸,防辐射软膏 预计将遇到具有污染或有毒咬伤的敌对野生动物和流氓安全系统

English: @d0 Radiation Hazards With insufficient protection from environmental radiation (Top right of your screen) you will slowly increase in body radiation the longer you are exposed. Upon reaching 1.0 Body Radiation you will be afflicted with Radiation Burns, that will slowly spread and increase your radiation level over time unless treated with Anti-Radition Ointment.@p9 Radiation Poisoning will occur at 5.0 Body Radiation, resulting in health loss and eventual Organ Failure and Death. Radiation Poisoning can be treated with Anti-Radiation Pills, but that will only buy time until the effect is reapplied from your body's radioactivity. Body Radiation can only be purged by use of a SHOWER or Decontamination Kit.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 辐射危害 如果环境辐射(屏幕右上角)防护不足,你将逐渐增加体内辐射,暴露时间越长,辐射水平越高。 一旦达到 1.0 体内辐射,你将受到 辐射烧伤,这将慢慢扩散并随时间增加你的辐射水平,除非使用 抗辐射药膏进行治疗。@p9 辐射中毒 将在 5.0 体内辐射时发生,导致健康损失并最终 器官衰竭和 死亡。辐射中毒可以用 抗辐射药片治疗,但这只能暂时延长时间,直到你的体内放射性再次引发效果。 体内辐射只能通过使用淋浴或净化医疗包来清除。

English: @d0 Structure History\nThis Abandoned Landing Pad was once a shuttle landing pad belonging to House Xenu of the Zirax Empire. A reduction in active personnel and a lack of maintenance resulted in the structure being simply abandoned rather than repaired, repurposed or sold.\nMuch of the landing pad's facilities remain intact and unlooted. However, it has become home to a large number of aggressive wildlife that thrive in toxic and radioactive environments; including remnants of The Legacy, now devoid of advanced intelligence.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 建筑历史\n这个废弃的着陆垫曾经是属于 Xenu家族的 兹瑞克斯帝国的穿梭机着陆垫。由于活跃人员减少和缺乏维护,这个结构被简单地废弃,而不是被修复、重新利用或出售。\n着陆垫的许多设施仍然完好无损且未被掠夺。然而,它已经成为大量在有毒和放射性环境中繁衍的攻击性野生动物的家园;包括 遗留者的残余,现在已失去了高级智能。
@d0 废弃车间 难度: 1 (教程级地下城) 预计完成时间: 8分钟 危险: 辐射、伤害、中毒

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Light Armor Recommended Minimum Weapons: Shotgun, Assault Rifle, Submachine Gun, Pistol Recommended Minimum Supplies: Bandages, Antibiotic Pills, Antitoxic Pills Expect to encounter hostile wildlife with contaminated or venomous bites
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低装甲: 轻型装甲 推荐最低武器: 霰弹枪,突击步枪,冲锋枪,手枪 推荐最低物资: 绷带,抗生素药丸,抗毒素药丸 预计将遇到有污染或有毒咬伤的敌对野生动物

English: @d0 Structure History\nOnce a workshop owned by the Polaris Megacorp for the processing of local resource deposits. As the easily-accessible resources slowly dried up, costs exceeded profits from such an isolated and outlying facility, it was scrapped and left to be inhabited by hostile wildlife... and perhaps something more sinister.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 结构历史\n这里曾经是 极星集团 拥有的车间,用于处理当地的资源矿床。随着容易获取的资源逐渐枯竭,这样一个孤立和偏远设施的成本超过了利润,它被废弃并留给了敌对的野生动物居住……或许还有更阴险的东西。

English: @d0 Abandoned Factory Difficulty: 4 Estimated Completion Time: 30-45 Minutes Hazards: Radiation, Injury, Infection, Burns, Supercooled Surfaces Shoot Fuel Drums and Coolant Barrels to damage nearby enemies Crouch to enter air vents and between lowered boarding ramps
Chinese (simplified): @d0 废弃工厂 难度: 4 预计完成时间: 30-45分钟 危险: 辐射、伤害、感染、烧伤、超冷表面 射击燃料桶和冷却剂桶以伤害附近的敌人 蹲下进入通风口和降低的登船坡道之间

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Medium Armor (Radiation and Armor Boosters) Recommended Minimum Weapons: Combat Shotgun, Advanced Assault Rifle, Advanced Sniper Rifle Recommended Minimum Supplies: Health Packs, Antibiotic Ointment, Antibiotic Pills Expect to encounter rogue mechanoids, combat androids, coolant leaks and Legacy-controlled lifeforms.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低装甲: 中甲(辐射和装甲增强器) 推荐最低武器: 战斗霰弹枪,高级突击步枪,高级狙击步枪 推荐最低补给: 医疗包,抗生素软膏,抗生素药片 预计会遇到流氓机械体,战斗机器人,冷却剂泄漏和遗留者控制的生命体。

English: @d0 Structure History\nFormerly a Polaris Planetside Production factory, the facility now lies abandoned after an off-books attempt at experimenting with active Legacy technology resulted in yet another Industrial accident.\nAn attempt was made by Polaris to retrieve their personnel locked in panic rooms, but proved too financially costly and so the remaining factory staff were left to their fate.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 结构历史\n曾经是极光行星侧生产工厂,该设施现在被遗弃,因为一次未经批准的尝试使用活跃的遗留者技术,导致另一起工业事故。\n极光曾试图救出被困在恐慌室的员工,但成本过高,因此剩下的工厂员工只能听天由命。

English: @d0 Abandoned Bunker Difficulty: 5 Estimated Completion Time: 45-60 Minutes Hazards: Radiation, Injury, Poison, Infection, Burns, Corrosive Gas Shoot Fuel Drums and Coolant Barrels to damage nearby enemies Corrosive Gas will damage any living thing that stands in it
Chinese (simplified): @d0 废弃的地堡 难度: 5 预计完成时间: 45-60分钟 危害: 辐射,伤害,中毒,感染,烧伤,腐蚀性气体 射击燃料桶和冷却剂桶以伤害附近的敌人 腐蚀性气体会损害任何站在其中的生物

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Improved Heavy Armor (Radiation and Armor Boosters) Recommended Minimum Weapons: Flamethrower, Combat Shotgun, Advanced Assault Rifle, Advanced Sniper Rifle Recommended Minimum Supplies: Health Packs, Antibiotic Ointment, Antibiotic Pills Expect to encounter hostile wildlife, corrosive gas and a multitude of legacy-controlled lifeforms.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低装甲: 改进型重型装甲(辐射和装甲增强器) 推荐最低武器: 火焰喷射器,战斗霰弹枪,高级突击步枪,高级狙击步枪 推荐最低物资: 健康包,抗生素软膏,抗生素药片 预计会遇到敌对野生动物,腐蚀性气体以及大量受遗留者控制的生物。

English: @d0 Structure History\nOnce a military bunker of the Tallaxian Federation during the War of Silence, it fell behind enemy lines when a number of infected refugees fleeing the Legacy sought refuge at the bunker only to transform and overrun the base from within.\nIt has remain abandoned for close to a century, with the now-dormant legacy still trapped within its walls.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 建筑历史\n这里曾是塔拉赛联盟在沉默战争中的军事掩体,当一些感染难民逃离遗留者寻求掩体时,它落入了敌方手中,这些难民在那里变形并从内部攻陷了基地。\n它已经被遗弃了将近一个世纪,现在休眠的遗留者仍然被困在其墙壁之内。

English: @d0 Abandoned Drone Base Difficulty: 4 Estimated Completion Time: 30-45 Minutes Hazards: Radiation, Injury, Infection, Burns, Corrosive Gas Shoot Fuel Drums and Coolant Barrels to damage nearby enemies Corrosive Gas will damage any living thing that stands in it
Chinese (simplified): @d0 废弃无人机基地 难度: 4 预计完成时间: 30-45分钟 危险: 辐射,伤害,感染,烧伤,腐蚀性气体 射击燃油桶和冷却剂桶以伤害附近的敌人 腐蚀性气体会损害任何站在其上的生物

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Improved Medium Armor (Radiation and Armor Boosters) Recommended Minimum Weapons: Flamethrower, Combat Shotgun, Advanced Assault Rifle Recommended Minimum Supplies: Health Packs, Antibiotic Ointment, Antibiotic Pills Expect to encounter rogue mechanoids, corrosive gas and a multitude of legacy-controlled lifeforms.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低防护: 增强型中级护甲(辐射和护甲增强器) 推荐最低武器: 火焰喷射器,战斗霰弹枪,高级突击步枪 推荐最低补给: 健康包,抗生素软膏,抗生素药丸 预计会遭遇流氓机械人,腐蚀性气体和多种遗留者控制的生命体。

English: @d0 Structure History\nFormerly a Drone Base belonging to the House of Epsilon of the Zirax Empire. As more advanced form of shielding and weapons became available, it became clear that this model of Drone Base would not be able to mount the new shields and so it was given to the House of Rados as an experiment in producing Legacy Technology in controlled conditions.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 结构历史\n曾属于兹瑞克斯帝国的伊普西龙家族的无人机基地。随着更高级的护盾和武器的诞生,这种型号的无人机基地显然无法安装新的护盾,因此被作为实验,交给了拉多斯家族,在控制条件下生产遗留者技术。

English: @d0 Abandoned Mine Difficulty: 3 Estimated Completion Time: 20-35 Minutes Hazards: Injury, Infection, Burns, Corrosive Gas Shoot Fuel Drums and Coolant Barrels to damage nearby enemies Corrosive Gas will damage any living thing that stands in it
Chinese (simplified): @d0 废弃矿井 难度: 3 预计完成时间: 20-35分钟 危险: 伤害、感染、烧伤、腐蚀性气体 射击燃料桶和冷却剂桶以伤害附近的敌人 腐蚀性气体会损害站在其中的所有生物

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Medium Armor (Radiation and Armor Boosters) Recommended Minimum Weapons: Flamethrower, Combat Shotgun, Advanced Assault Rifle Recommended Minimum Supplies: Health Packs, Antibiotic Ointment, Antibiotic Pills Expect to encounter hostile wildlife, corrosive gas and legacy-controlled lifeforms.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低防护: 中级护甲(辐射和护甲增强器) 推荐最低武器: 火焰喷射器,战斗霰弹枪,高级突击步枪 推荐最低补给: 健康包,抗生素软膏,抗生素药丸 预计会遇到敌对的野生动物,腐蚀性气体和遗留者控制的生命体。

English: @d0 Structure History\nAfter a number of geological disturbances during the course of normal operation, the mine eventually traced a submerged structure that was finally exposed by one of their drilling rigs.\nReports were passed to Polaris who immediately order the facility to be locked down and abandoned pending a full investigation of the find.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 建筑历史\n在正常运营过程中经历了若干地质干扰后,矿场最终发现了一个被淹没的结构,最终被他们的一个钻井平台暴露出来。\n报告随后被递交到极星,他们立即下令封锁该设施并废弃,直到对发现进行全面调查。

English: @d0 Abandoned Reactor Difficulty: 3 Estimated Completion Time: 30-45 Minutes Hazards: Radiation, Injury, Infection, Poison, Burns Shoot Fuel Drums and Coolant Barrels to damage nearby enemies
Chinese (simplified): @d0 废弃反应堆 难度: 3 预计完成时间: 30-45分钟 危险: 辐射,伤害,感染,中毒,烧伤 射击燃料桶和冷却剂桶以损伤附近的敌人

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Medium Armor (Radiation and Armor Boosters) Recommended Minimum Weapons: Flamethrower, Combat Shotgun, Advanced Assault Rifle Recommended Minimum Supplies: Health Packs, Antibiotic Ointment, Antibiotic Pills, Anti-Radiation Ointment, Antitoxic Pills Expect to encounter hostile wildlife, radiation and many legacy-mutated lifeforms.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低装甲: 中型装甲(辐射和装甲增强剂) 推荐最低武器: 火焰喷射器,战斗霰弹枪,高级突击步枪 推荐最低物资: 健康包,抗生素软膏,抗生素药片,抗辐射软膏,抗毒丸 预计将遇到敌对野生动物,辐射和许多遗留者变异生物。

English: @d0 Structure History\nServed as a local powerplant for nearby structures during the War of Silence. Following the removal of an active population after the war, the remaining structures were demolished, leaving this powerplant alone with only the bare minimum of infrastructure for future repurposing.\nIn the decades since, hostile wildlife and remnants of the Legacy have infested the lower levels.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 结构历史\n在寂静战争中作为附近结构的本地发电站。战争结束后,随着活跃人口的撤离,剩余的结构被拆除,留下这个发电站,只保留了未来重新利用的最基本的基础设施。\n自那之后的几十年里,敌对的野生动物和遗留者的残余已经侵占了下层区域。

English: @d0 Abandoned Depot Difficulty: 3 Estimated Completion Time: 20-30 Minutes Hazards: Radiation, Injury, Infection, Poison, Burns Shoot Fuel Drums and Coolant Barrels to damage nearby enemies
Chinese (simplified): @d0 废弃仓库 难度: 3 预计完成时间: 20-30分钟 危险: 辐射,伤害,感染,中毒,烧伤 射击燃料桶和冷却液桶,以伤害附近的敌人

English: @d0 Recommended Equipment Recommended Minimum Armor: Medium Armor (Radiation and Armor Boosters) Recommended Minimum Weapons: Flamethrower, Advanced Assault Rifle, Advanced Sniper Rifle, Minigun Recommended Minimum Supplies: Health Packs, Antibiotic Ointment, Antibiotic Pills, Anti-Radiation Ointment, Antitoxic Pills Expect to encounter hostile wildlife, radioactive material, corrosive gas and many legacy-mutated lifeforms.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 推荐装备 推荐最低防护装备: 中型护甲(辐射和护甲增强剂) 推荐最低武器: 火焰喷射器、高级突击步枪、高级狙击步枪、机枪 推荐最低补给品: 健康包、抗生素软膏、抗生素药丸、防辐射软膏、解毒药丸 预计会遭遇敌对野生动物、放射性物质、腐蚀性气体以及许多遗留者变异生物。

English: @d0 Structure History\nImproper labelling and storage of contaminated materials forced Rados to lock down and seal this depot when active Legacy material began consuming storage units on the lower level.\nAt least 20 workers from the lower level never made it out. Years since the structure was abandoned, hostile wildlife that thrives in toxic and radioactive environments have since moved into the upper levels, leaving the dormant legacy to roam the lower ones.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 结构历史\n由于标记不当和存放受污染材料,Rados不得不封锁并封闭这个仓库,因为活跃的遗留材料开始消耗下层的存储单元。\n至少有20名来自下层的工人未能逃脱。自该结构被遗弃以来已经过去了多年,喜欢有毒和放射性环境的敌对野生动物已经侵入了上层,让休眠的遗留生物在下层徘徊。
框架: 机械化自动装填器 (装填速度 +100% / 伤害 -20%)

English: Thank you for your assistance. I'll contact my people and they will come pick me up soon.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的协助。我会联系我的人,他们很快就会来接我。

English: Please you have to help me! I'm a very wealthy member of the Traders Guild and these filthy pirates abducted me and held me prisoner!
Chinese (simplified): 拜托你一定要帮帮我!我是贸易公会非常有钱的人,这些肮脏的海盗绑架并囚禁了我!

English: You are safe now. <color=#ff0000>(-2000 Pirates reputation)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 你现在安全了。<color=#ff0000>(-2000海盗名声)</color>

English: The prisoner hands you a data pad with a message addressed to you by name.
Chinese (simplified): 犯人递给你一个数据平板,上面有一条用你名字写的信息。

English: Oh thank you, thank you so much! I will contact my people and they will send a ship for me. I will transfer some credits from my bank account to yours.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢,非常感谢!我会联系我的人,他们会派船来接我。我会从我的银行账户转一些钱到你的账户上。

English: I'm glad to be of service.
The Raven sings on the midnight sun.
Chinese (simplified): 乌鸦在午夜的太阳上歌唱。

English: The Raven's shadow rises in the twilight.
Chinese (simplified): 乌鸦的影子在暮色中升起。

English: I have a package for you.
My time is very valuable. What do you want?
Chinese (simplified): 我的时间很宝贵。你想要什么?
滚开,你这个笨手笨脚的傻瓜!

English: The crow caws at the nest.
The sun shines during the day.
I think I'll leave you here.
I think somebody is trying to kill me!
Actually, now that you mention it...

Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>研究点数:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color>\n\n研究计算机准备就绪.

English: @d0Navigational data can be used to upgrade the distance you can make warp jumps while piloting any capital vessel.\nA maximum of <color=#00ff00>50</color> may be turned in.\nYou currently have a <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeVar}</color> light year increase to your base warp range. You may turn in up to <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeMax}</color> additional navigational data.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 导航数据可以用来升级你在驾驶任何主力舰时可以进行翘曲跳跃的距离。\n最多可以上交<color=#00ff00>50</color>个。\n你目前的基地翘曲范围增加了<color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeVar}</color>光年。你可以再上交最多<color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeMax}</color>个导航数据。

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Navigational Data:</color> A data pad containing various star charts and navigational maps. Allows a pilot to safely calculate longer warp jumps.\nIncreases the range a pilot may warp by 1 light year while piloting any warp capable capital vessel. May have a higher effect on more advanced warp drives. A maximum of 50 navigational data may be turned in. Excess may be sold.\nCan be obtained rarely in loot, missions, or bought from traders.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>导航数据:</color> 包含各种星图和导航地图的数据平板。允许飞行员安全计算更长的曲速跳跃。 \n使飞行员在驾驶任何能跃迁的飞船时能增加1光年跃迁距离

English: You have a bad rep here. Get out.
Chinese (simplified): 你在这里名声不好。出去。

English: Fine. Don't mind if I do. Leave, that is.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,如果我这样做,请不要介意。就是说,离开。

English: Welcome. Please, browse around.\nWatch out for pirate activity on your scanners, there's been an increase of attacks lately. Something is driving them to take on bigger and bigger targets.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎。请浏览。\n注意你的扫描器上的海盗活动,最近攻击有所增加。有什么东西驱使他们接受越来越大的目标。

English: You are no longer an enemy of the Free Colonists.
Chinese (simplified): 你不再是自由殖民者的敌人了。

English: How do I use the Salvage License?

Laying about the yard are Salvaged Vessels. Each one has a Core Lock mechanism attached to the top of the hull that prevents unauthorized access to the salvage.
Simply purchase a Salvage License and then use the switch on the Core Lock to overload the Core Lock, allowing you to claim the vessel for yourself.
@p9You may then either place your own core on the vessel to remove whole blocks and devices, or leave it coreless and use the salvage mode of a handheld or ship mounted multitool.
Each Salvage License is single use and allows one core lock to be removed.
Attempting to salvage a locked vessel or removing the core lock by force will be met with deadly force.
Chinese (simplified):
船厂里到处都是打捞上来的船只。每艘船都有一个附加在船体顶部的核心锁机制,以防止未经授权的人进入打捞。
只需购买打捞许可证,然后使用开关让核心锁过载,你自己就可以认领这艘船了。
@p9 然后你可以把你自己的核心放在船上用来移除整个模块和设备,或者让它没有核心,来使用手持或船上安装的多功能打捞模式。
每个打捞许可证是一次性使用,并允许一个核心锁被移除。
试图打捞被锁的船只或用武力拆除核心锁将会遭到致命的打击。

I want to turn in a Bandit Insignia

Chinese (simplified): @d0 如果你发现任何强盗,突袭者,或死亡之手的徽章,我会拿走他们。

English: @d0Thank you for taking care of those filthy bandits! A reward of {Eden_G_BanditRewardT1} has been deposited in your bank account and word of your deeds has spread. If you have more insignias please turn them in.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 谢谢你照顾那些肮脏的土匪! {Eden_G_BanditRewardT1} 的奖励已存入你的银行账户,你的事迹已传开。如果你有更多的徽章,请上交。

English: Please help us! Our ship's life support systems have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Life Support Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Chinese (simplified): 请帮助我们! 我们飞船的生命维持系统受损,我们需要<color=#00ff00>生命维持维修套件</color>。\n您可以在大型或高级建造机中的“装饰”选项卡下创建一个套件。 一旦你有了工具包,请和我说话。

English: Thank you for your assistance! We have deposited a reward into your credit account and will make sure to let the Free Colonists know that you helped us.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢您的帮助! 我们已将奖励存入您的信用账户,并将确保让自由殖民者知道您帮助了我们。

English:
I understand. You can craft a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab of the constructor.
Or you can sometimes find a kit in an old wreck or buy one from a trader.

Once you have a kit, place it in your personal inventory then speak to me again.
Chinese (simplified):
我明白。 您可以在大型或高级建造机中的装饰选项卡下制作套件。
有时您可以在旧残骸中找到套件或从商人处购买。

一旦您有了套件,请将其放置 在你的个人背包中,然后再和我说话。

English: Thank you for your timely assistance in this matter. As an official representative of Polaris Megacorp I wish to formally complete our transaction. I have deposited what I deem to be adequate payment for the job. Polaris will also hear of how you helped save this ship.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您在此问题上的及时协助。 作为 Polaris Megacorp 的官方代表,我希望正式完成我们的交易。 我已经存入了我认为足以支付这份工作的款项。 极星还将听到您如何帮助拯救了这艘船。

English: Please help us! Our ship's sensors have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Sensor Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Chinese (simplified): 请帮助我们! 我们飞船的传感器已损坏,我们需要<color=#00ff00>传感器维修套件</color>。\n您可以在大型或高级建造机中的“装饰”选项卡下创建一个套件。 一旦你有了工具包,请和我说话。

English: Thank you for your timely assistance in this matter. As an official representative of Polaris Megacorp I wish to formally complete our transaction. I have deposited what I deem to be adequate payment for the job. Polaris will also hear of how you helped save this ship.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您在此问题上的及时协助。 作为 Polaris Megacorp 的官方代表,我希望正式完成我们的交易。 我已经存入了我认为足以支付这份工作的款项。 极星还将听到您如何帮助拯救了这艘船。

English: Please help us! Our ship's weapons have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Weapon Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Chinese (simplified): 请帮助我们! 我们飞船的武器已经损坏,我们需要一个<color=#00ff00>武器修理工具包</color>。\n您可以在大型或高级建造机中的“装饰”选项卡下创建一个工具包。 一旦你有了工具包,请和我说话。

English: Thank you for your timely assistance in this matter. As an official representative of Polaris Megacorp I wish to formally complete our transaction. I have deposited what I deem to be adequate payment for the job. Polaris will also hear of how you helped save this ship.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您在此问题上的及时协助。 作为 Polaris Megacorp 的官方代表,我希望正式完成我们的交易。 我已经存入了我认为足以支付这份工作的款项。 极星还将听到您如何帮助拯救了这艘船。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

<color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 欢迎 {PlayerName} 加入银河信息网络邮件系统。 您有 1 封未读邮件。\n如果未立即阅读,发件人会将邮件标记为删除。 你想现在读吗?</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
<color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 您确定要退出邮件系统吗?\n如果您这样做,邮件将被删除。</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
Chinese (simplified): 我改变主意了。 带我回到主菜单。

English: @d0Well well well. You have managed to kill me. I would congratulate you on a job well done, but we both know it was all luck. I will be back in a new clone body, and you just made yourself a new enemy. You better watch your back, {PlayerName}.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 很好。 你成功地杀了我。 我要祝贺你做得很好,但我们都知道这全靠运气。 我将回到一个新的克隆体中,而你只是让自己成为了一个新的敌人。 你最好小心点,{PlayerName}。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0Somehow, against all odds, you have killed me. Again. To borrow a phrase I have heard you Terrans use, it was the lag.\nTomorrow is a new day, and with it I will plot my revenge.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 不知何故,你又一次杀了我。 借用你们人类的一句话,那是卡了。\n明天是新的一天,我将用它策划我的复仇。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0{PlayerName} you are starting to upset me. You and I won't like me when I'm upset. Nobody likes me when I'm upset. It's like being hangry. Or so you Terrans like to say.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 {PlayerName} 你开始让我不高兴了。 当我不高兴时,彼此都不会喜欢我。 当我不高兴的时候,没有人喜欢我。 这就像饿了。 或者你们人类喜欢这样说。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0You are most persistent, and stupid. All you are doing is making a name for yourself, {PlayerName}. A bad name. I will make sure that every warlord from here to Decay hears about you!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你是最执着的,也是最愚蠢的。 你所做的只是为自己正名,{PlayerName}。 垃圾名声。 我会确保从这里到 Decay 的每个军阀都听说过你!

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0You have no idea the level of pain I will bring down upon you! You will feel my wrath! I will find a way to kill you even if I have to hire half the pirate armada to do it!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你不知道我会给你带来多大的痛苦! 你会感受到我的愤怒! 就算要雇佣一半的海盗舰队,我也会想办法杀了你!
删除邮件并退出邮件系统。

English: @d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 似乎没有更多来自此人的邮件。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0I can admit defeat. You are clearly the better bandit. You will not hear from me again, but know that I will hunt you down.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 我可以认输。 你显然是更好的强盗。 你不会再听到我的消息,但你知道我会继续追捕你。

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 欢迎 {PlayerName} 加入银河信息网络邮件系统。 您有 1 封未读邮件。\n如果未立即阅读,发件人会将邮件标记为删除。 你想现在读吗?</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
<color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 您确定要退出邮件系统吗?\n如果您这样做,邮件将被删除。</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
Chinese (simplified): 我改变主意了。 带我回到主菜单。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0Greatness. It's about greatness. Or perhaps it's about the need to feel great.\nYes? No, it's more than that. It's bigger than that. Bigger than you or I or even the Empress herself. This is about justice. About revenge. About taking what is rightfully ours! Who are they to stand in our way?\nWe do not have to be enemies, {PlayerName}.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 伟大。这是关于伟大的。或许这是关于需要感觉伟大的。\n对吗?不,不仅如此。它比这更大。比你我甚至女皇本人都要大。这是关于正义。关于复仇。关于夺回我们应得的东西!他们凭什么挡我们的路?\n我们不必成为敌人,{PlayerName}。
删除邮件并退出邮件系统。

English: @d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 似乎没有更多来自此人的邮件。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0I admire your persistence. You have bested me where most others would have met with only failure. You are smart, and clearly skilled in the art of combat. I do wonder, if given a different life, you and I would have ended up on a similar path.\nI was once like you, concerned with duty, honor, and serving my people. It took me too long to realize that my people had been in decline for a long time. The Zirax Empire told in the stories of old, the empire that fought against the Legacy threat, is long gone.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 我很佩服你的坚持。 在大多数人必定失败的地方,你打败了我。 你很聪明,而且很擅长战斗。 我很想知道,如果给你不同的生活,你是否最终会跟我会走上相似的道路。\n我是o

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0You test my patience. I see now that I must be more direct with you than I have been. I will give you one more chance after this, but know that your days are numbered should you track me down again.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你在考验我的耐心。 我现在明白了,我必须比以前更直接地与你相处。 之后我再给你一次机会,但要知道,如果你再次找到我,你剩下的日子已经屈指可数了。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0Greatness. It's about greatness. Or perhaps it's about the need to feel great.\nYes? No, it's more than that. It's bigger than that. Bigger than you or I or even the Empress herself. This is about justice. About revenge. About taking what is rightfully ours! Who are they to stand in our way?\nWe do not have to be enemies, {PlayerName}.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 伟大。这是关于伟大的。或许这是关于需要感觉伟大的。\n对吗?不,不仅如此。它比这更大。比你我甚至女皇本人都要大。这是关于正义。关于复仇。关于夺回我们应得的东西!他们凭什么挡我们的路?\n我们不必成为敌人,{PlayerName}。

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 欢迎 {PlayerName} 加入银河信息网络邮件系统。 您有 1 封未读邮件。\n如果未立即阅读,发件人会将邮件标记为删除。 你想现在读吗?</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
<color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 您确定要退出邮件系统吗?\n如果您这样做,邮件将被删除。</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
Chinese (simplified): 我改变主意了。 带我回到主菜单。
删除邮件并退出邮件系统。

English: @d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 似乎没有更多来自此人的邮件。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0Y-y-you! How did you find me? Never mind that. How did you kill me? Useless guards!\nYou messed everything up, {PlayerName}. How could you do this to me? Do you know how hard I work to find free real estate? Now you ruined all my plans in that sector! I had dreams! Dreams that you ruined! I hate you!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你...你! 你是怎么找到我的? 不要管那个。 你是怎么杀了我的? 没用的守卫!\n你把一切都搞砸了,{PlayerName}。 你怎么能这么对我? 你知道我为找到免费的地产付出了多大的努力吗? 现在你毁了我在那个领域的所有计划!

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0Not again! Why do I always die! Why me?\nDo you know how hard it has been to climb the ranks of a bandit gang as a non-Zirax? Do you have any idea what I have had to put myself through?\nI hear them whispering, calling me names behind my back. Tiny Tony. Little Tony. Mini Tony. My name is Small Tony! How DARE they insult me. I'm going to go beat some sense into those Zirax scumbags as soon as I get a (the message abruptly ends)
Chinese (simplified): @d0 别! 为什么我总是死! 为什么总是我?\n你知道以非 兹瑞克斯 的身份爬上强盗团伙的阶级有多难吗? 你知道我不得不让自己经历什么吗?\n我听到他们在耳语,在背后叫我名字。 小吨

English: I would like to turn in a bounty

Find a bounty. Take their insignia. Bring it back to a Bounty Hunter Office at a trading station sector in a faction's territory. Get paid.\nDifferent factions have a different list of wanted individuals.\nIt's up to you to find them and obtain their insignias. That's why we pay you.
Chinese (simplified): 寻找赏金。 拿走他们的徽章。 将其带回派系领土内贸易站区的赏金猎人办公室。 获得报酬。\n不同派系有不同的通缉名单。\n由你来找到他们并获得他们的徽章。 这就是我们付钱给你的原因。

English: I want to ask something else.
Thank you for the information. I must be going.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您的信息。 我必须得走了。

English: The Bounty Hunter Guild is contracted out by all the big powers of the galaxy to hunt down everyone from lawbreaking troublemakers to ruthless warlords. Do you want to make money? Don't ask questions. Do the job. Get paid.
Chinese (simplified): 赏金猎人公会被银河系的各大势力承包,以追捕从违法乱纪者到无情军阀的一切相关人员。 你想赚钱吗? 不要问问题。 做好工作。 得到报酬。

English: I see... I want to talk about something else
Chinese (simplified): 我明白了……我想谈点别的

English: Wait, am I on a wanted list?
Chinese (simplified): 等等,我在通缉名单上吗?

English: Due to confidentiality agreements I am not allowed to say.
Chinese (simplified): 由于保密协议,我不能说。

English: I understand. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 我明白。 我想问点别的。

English: I better not be on someone's wanted list! I'll be going.
Chinese (simplified): 我最好不要在某人的通缉名单上! 我会去的。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0Enough! I will destroy you! I will rip out whatever internal organs you Terrans have and feed them to my pet Ripper Dog! As soon as I get a pet Ripper Dog. No one would dare make fun of me then! You won't stop me {PlayerName}!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 够了! 我会消灭你! 我会把你们人类所有的内脏都撕下来,喂给我的宠物开膛犬! 一旦我得到一只宠物开膛犬。 到时候谁都不敢取笑我! {PlayerName} 你无法阻止我!

English: Don't respond. Delete message and exit mail system.
Chinese (simplified): 不要回应。 删除邮件并退出邮件系统。

English: @d0P-p-perhaps a deal? Maybe if I give you something, you will stop coming to kill me? Yes? How does 50,000 credits, deposited directly into your account sound? I have the transfer all set up, I just need your response. W-w-what do you say? Stop killing me?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 也...也许是一笔交易? 也许如果我给你一些东西,你就不会来杀我了? 是吗? 直接存入您帐户的 50,000 信用点数听起来如何? 我已经设置好转账,只需要你的回应。 哇-哇-你说什么? 别杀我

English: Don't respond. Delete message and exit mail system.
Chinese (simplified): 不要回应。 删除邮件并退出邮件系统。

English: @d0You never responded to my last message! Why not! What do you have against Small Tony? Maybe I offered too little... Yes, how does 100,000 credits sound?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你从来没有回复我的最后一条消息! 为什么不! 你对小托尼有什么看法? 也许我提供的太少了……是的,100,000 信用点数听起来怎么样?

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0I gave you a chance! I gave you the opportunity to walk away! You won't stop me! No one will stop me! I am Small Tony! This wreck, I mean this fully armed and operational battle station will be mine!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 我给了你机会! 我给了你离开的机会! 你无法阻止我的! 没有人会阻止我! 我是小托尼! 这个残骸,我的意思是这个全副武装的作战平台将是我的!

English: Don't respond. Delete message and exit mail system.
Chinese (simplified): 不要回应。 删除邮件并退出邮件系统。

English: @d0Ouch! That death was especially painful. These clone bills are adding up fast. Small Tony doesn't have the money to keep spending on this. I will make you a final offer. 200,000 credits. P-p-please take it. I don't want to die anymore!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 哎哟! 那种死是特别痛苦的。 这些克隆账单正在快速增加。 小托尼没有钱继续花在这上面。 我会给你一个最终的报价。 200,000 信用点数。 请...请收下。 我不想再死了!

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0No! I can't take any more dying! That one hurt the most! Please, s-s-spare me! Stop killing me!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 不! 我不能再忍受死亡了! 那个太痛苦了! 求求你,饶了我吧! 别杀我了!

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 欢迎 {PlayerName} 加入银河信息网络邮件系统。 您有 1 封未读邮件。\n如果未立即阅读,发件人会将邮件标记为删除。 你想现在读吗?</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
<color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 您确定要退出邮件系统吗?\n如果您这样做,邮件将被删除。</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
Chinese (simplified): 我改变主意了。 带我回到主菜单。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0You show some promise, but your aim is a little off.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你展现了一点承诺,但有点偏离你的目标。
删除邮件并退出邮件系统。

English: @d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 似乎没有更多来自此人的邮件。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0Nobody likes a poor sport. You must learn to accept both victory and defeat with humility and grace.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 没有人喜欢糟糕的运动。 你必须学会以谦逊和优雅的态度接受胜利和失败。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0Your aim is improving. But you need to learn to lead your target.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你的目标正在改进。 但是你需要学会领导你的目标。

English: Reply to remind them your aim was good enough to take them out.
Chinese (simplified): 回复以提醒他们您的目标好到足以将他们带出。

English: Insult their aim by telling them they couldn't hit the broadside of a space barn.
Chinese (simplified): 告诉他们无法通过击中太空仓的侧面来羞辱他们的目标。

English: Insult their aim by telling them they couldn't hit the broadside of a space barn.
Chinese (simplified): 告诉他们无法通过击中太空仓的侧面来羞辱他们的目标。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Insult their flying by telling them you could fly better blindfolded with one hand tied behind your back.
Chinese (simplified): 告诉他们你可以用一只手绑在背后并蒙上眼睛用更好地飞行来羞辱他们。

English: @d0You are improving quickly! If I had pilots half as quick as you flying by my side I would have won.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你进步很快! 如果我身边的飞行员飞行速度有你的一半,我就会赢了。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Insult their flying by telling them you could fly better blindfolded with one hand tied behind your back.
Chinese (simplified): 告诉他们你可以用一只手绑在背后并蒙上眼睛用更好地飞行来羞辱他们。

English: @d0You keep this up and you'll get what's coming to you.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 坚持下去,你会得到什么。

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0I think you are ready for the trials ahead. But I am not sure if the others are. You must make allies. Build armies. And prepare for what's to come.\nI left the Xenu navy because they were too short sighted to prepare for what's coming. I hope you will have more vision.\nI have also sent you all my tips on flying which should add to your knowledge. <color=#ffffff><200 unlock points added></color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 我认为你已经准备好迎接未来的考验了。 但我不确定其他人是否也是如此。 你必须结交盟友、建立军队,并为即将发生的事情做好准备。\n我离开了 Xenu 海军,因为他们太短视了,无法为即将发生的事情做好准备。 我希望你跟他们不同

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
@d0I have sent you something you so obviously need. May it serve you well. <color=#ffffff><75 unlock points added></color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 我给你发了一些你显然需要的东西。 愿它为您服务。 <color=#ffffff><添加了 75 个解锁点></color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates 280, -8, 20. System name Preenah.\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#ff0000>INACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接目标:坐标 280, -8, 20。系统名称 Preenah。\n子空间链接状态:</color><color=#ff0000>未激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>密钥状态:</color><color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates 280, -8, 20. System name Preenah.\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#00ff00>ACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接目标:坐标 280, -8, 20。系统名称 Preenah。\n子空间链接状态:</color><color=#ff0000>激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>密钥状态:</color><color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: Activate subspace link and take key
Chinese (simplified): 激活子空间链接并获取密钥

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace link has been activated.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key and associated data has been retrieved.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Subspace link will only work for users who have personally activated it. Ensure all users activate the link.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接已激活。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>已检索密钥和相关数据。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>子空间链接仅对亲自激活它的用户有效 。 确保所有用户都激活链接。</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates -200, 3, -200. System name Kumbiyu.\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#ff0000>INACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接目标:坐标 -200, 3, -200。系统名称 Kumbiyu。\n子空间链接状态:</color><color=#ff0000>未激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6> 密钥状态:</color><color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: Activate subspace link and take key
Chinese (simplified): 激活子空间链接并获取密钥

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates -200, 3, -200. System name Kumbiyu.</color><color=#00ffc6>\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#00ff00>ACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接目标:坐标 -200, 3, -200。系统名称 Kumbiyu。</color><color=#00ffc6>\n子空间链接状态:</color><color=#00ff00>激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>密钥状态:</color><color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace link has been activated.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key and associated data has been retrieved.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Subspace link will only work for users who have personally activated it. Ensure all users activate the link.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接已激活。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>已检索密钥和相关数据。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>子空间链接仅对亲自激活它的用户有效 。 确保所有用户都激活链接。</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates -270, 9, -80. System name Leesha.\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#ff0000>INACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接目标:坐标 -270, 9, -80。系统名称 Leesha。\n子空间链接状态:</color><color=#ff0000>未激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6> 密钥状态:</color><color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: Activate subspace link and take key
Chinese (simplified): 激活子空间链接并获取密钥

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates -270, 9, -80. System name Leesha.</color><color=#00ffc6>\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#00ff00>ACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接目标:坐标 -270, 9, -80。系统名称 Leesha。</color><color=#00ffc6>\n子空间链接状态:</color><color=#00ff00>激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>密钥状态:</color><color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace link has been activated.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key and associated data has been retrieved.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Subspace link will only work for users who have personally activated it. Ensure all users activate the link.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接已激活。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>已检索密钥和相关数据。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>子空间链接仅对亲自激活它的用户有效 。 确保所有用户都激活链接。</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates </color><color=#00ffc6>200, 15, 50. System name Rogue System.</color><color=#00ffc6>.\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#ff0000>INACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 超空间链接目的地:坐标 </color><color=#00ffc6>200, 15, 50。系统名称 Rogue System.</color><color=#00ffc6>。\n超空间链接状态:</color><color=#ff0000>非激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>钥匙状态:</color><color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: Activate subspace link and take key
Chinese (simplified): 激活子空间链接并获取密钥

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace Link Destination: coordinates 200, 15, 50. System name Rogue System.</color><color=#00ffc6>\nSubspace link Status: </color><color=#00ff00>ACTIVE</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key Status: </color><color=#00ff00>Available</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接目标:坐标 200, 15, 50。 系统名称 Rogue System.</color><color=#00ffc6>\n子空间链接状态:</color><color=#00ff00>激活</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>密钥状态:</color> <color=#00ff00>可用</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>@d0Subspace link has been activated.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Key and associated data has been retrieved.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Subspace link will only work for users who have personally activated it. Ensure all users activate the link.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>@d0 子空间链接已激活。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>已检索密钥和相关数据。</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>子空间链接仅对亲自激活它的用户有效 。 确保所有用户都激活链接。</color>

English: @d0You have used up <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> Terabytes of Progenitor Research to create a Progenitor Translation Matrix.\nThe Translation Matrix grants access to Ancient Progenitor computer systems.\nProgenitor subspace signals have been detected near the edges of the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您已经使用 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> TB 的先祖研究数据来创建源翻译矩阵。\n翻译矩阵可以给予先祖计算机的访问权限。\n先祖星区可以在星系的边缘找到
上交<color=#00ff00>有缺陷的数据芯片</color>

English: I don't have any Data Chips. Back to Main Menu.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有任何数据芯片。 返回主菜单。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>The frequency is lower than your chosen frequency of {CodeGuess}.</color>
@d0<color=#ff0000>The frequency is higher than your chosen frequency of {CodeGuess}.</color>
@d0<color=#00ff00>Hack successful. You have matched the frequency and gained access to the system.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>破解成功。 您已匹配频率并获得系统访问权限。</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Hack unsuccessful. You have failed to match the frequency. Lockdown in effect.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>破解失败。 您未能匹配频率。 锁定生效。</color>

English: Thanks to you I will meet my deadline. Once I finish repairs I will be on my way.
Chinese (simplified): 多亏了你,我才能赶上我的最后期限。 一旦完成维修,我就上路。

English: Please help me! My ship was attacked by bandits. Before I could do anything they destroyed my mining turrets. I took a time sensitive mining contract for some Hematite and if I don't deliver in time I will lose the contract and my reputation will be ruined!\n@p9I would be in your debt if you were to mine up some Hematite Ore for me from the nearby Hematite asteroid. I need 1 Hematite Ore Shipment to fulfill my contract. You can package Hematite in the Decoration tab of a constructor, then place the shipment in your personal inventory and speak to me again.\nYou are also welcome to help yourself to any other asteroids in the area, I just need the Hematite.
Chinese (simplified): 求助! 我的船被土匪袭击了。 在我还没反应过来之前,他们就摧毁了我的采矿炮塔。 我签订了一份时间敏感的赤铁矿采矿合同,如果我不及时交付,我将违约,我的声誉也完蛋了!\n@p9 如果你帮我从附近的赤铁矿小行星开采一些赤铁矿,我将欠你一份人情。 我需要1批赤铁矿货物来完成我的合约。 你可以在建造机的装饰选项卡中打包赤铁矿,然后将货物放入你的个人背包,并再次与我交谈。\n如果你愿意,你也可以为自己挖掘该地区的任何其他小行星,但我只需要赤铁矿。

English: I will get the 2000 Hematite Ore for you.
Here is your Hematite Ore Shipment. Where's my payment? (100,000 credits)
Chinese (simplified): 这是您打包好的赤铁矿。 我的报酬在哪里? (100,000 信用点数)

English: Here is your Hematite Ore Shipment. I don't need any payment. I'm happy to help a friend in need. (750-1250 reputation)
Chinese (simplified): 这是您打包好的赤铁矿。 我不需要任何报酬。 我很乐意帮助有需要的朋友。 (750-1250 声望)

English: Thank you. Yes, I suppose it's only fair you are compensated for your time. I have transferred some credits to your bank account.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你。 是的,我想对于你的时间来说这是公平的补偿。 我已将一些信用点数转入您的银行帐户。

English: You do this for free? Thank you! I will tell others of your generosity. You have earned my respect and the respect of Free Colonists everywhere.
Chinese (simplified): 你免费做这个? 谢谢! 我会告诉别人你的慷慨。 你赢得了我和所有自由殖民者的尊重。

English: It is my pleasure to help.
Here is your Hematite Ore Shipment. Do you have any spare ore to trade for it? <color=#ffff00>(Connect to a cargo container first)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 这是您打包的赤铁矿。 你有多余的矿石可以交易吗? <color=#ffff00>(先连接到货柜)</color>

English: Thank you. I do have some spare ore in my cargo that I don't need. I have transferred it to you, it may be in your ship's connected inventory, or floating in a cargo box next to you.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你。 我的货物中确实有一些我不需要的备用矿石。 我已经把它转移给你了,它可能在你船上的链接货柜中,或者在你旁边漂浮货箱里。

English: Welcome to our mining operation. I am from Polaris Mining Company, a subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp. The mining vessels in my fleet are contracted through the Union of Independent Miners, or U. I. M.\nYou have perfect timing. One of our mining ships had to head to a repair dock for some maintenance leaving us down a ship. Don't suppose you're looking for work?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的采矿作业。 我来自 Polaris Megacorp 的子公司 Polaris 矿业公司。 我舰队中的采矿船是通过独立矿工联盟或 U. I. M. 签约的。\n你的时机很好。 我们的一艘采矿船不得不前往维修码头进行一些维护,迫使我们停留在一艘船上。 没猜错的话你在找工作?

English: You have already completed your mining contract in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 您已经完成了该部门的采矿合同。

English: I am glad you asked!\nSince we are down a mining ship we could use some help mining Ilmenite from this asteroid field. You can find several Ilmenite asteroids scattered throughout the area. You will have to use your ship's detector to find them.
Chinese (simplified): 我很高兴你能这样提问!\n因为我们在一艘采矿船上,我们可以借助它从这个小行星场开采钛铁矿。 您可以在该地区发现几颗钛铁矿小行星。 您将不得不使用船上的探测器来找到它们。

English: Sounds simple, but how do I transfer the ore to you and get paid?
Chinese (simplified): 听起来很简单,但我如何将矿石转移给您并获得报酬?

English: Once you have obtained 6,000 Ilmenite Ore, turn it into a Ilmenite Ore Shipment under the Decoration tab of a constructor, place the shipment in your personal inventory, then speak to me again.\nFor contractual reasons, we cannot accept partial transfers. You must turn in an entire shipment of Ilmenite Ore.\nPayment will be 200,000 credits deposited directly to your bank account, as well as an increase in reputation with Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 获得 6,000 钛铁矿后,在建造机的装饰选项卡下将其转化为钛铁矿货物,将货物放入您的个人背包中,然后再次与我交谈。\n出于合同原因,我们不能接受部分转让。 您必须上交整批钛铁矿。\n我们将直接将200,000 信用点数存入您的银行账户,同时在您和极星的声望也会增加。

English: I accept your terms. I will come back with a Ilmenite Ore Shipment.
Chinese (simplified): 我接受你的条件。 我会带回来钛铁矿货物。

English: I don't have time right now. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 我现在没时间。 再见。

English: I want to ask something else.
Thank you for your assistance! We have transferred credits to your bank account.\nThis concludes your contract. Polaris Mining Company wishes you a pleasant day!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢您的帮助! 我们已将信用点数转入您的银行帐户。\n 您的合同结束了。 极星矿业公司祝您拥有愉快的一天!

English: <color=#00ffff>Here is the Ilmenite Ore Shipment (200,000 credits)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>这里是钛铁矿货物(200,000 信用点数)</color>

English: Our records indicate you are not fit for employment. Good day, good sir and/or madam.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的记录表明您不适合这个职业。祝你好运,先生/女士。

English: Whatever. I didn't want the job anyway.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧。 反正我不想要这份工作。

English: According to my records, you are on a do not hire list. Get off my ship!
Chinese (simplified): 根据我的记录,你在不雇佣名单上。 滚下我的船!

English: Thank you for your assistance. You have saved my job and my ship!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢您的帮助。 你拯救了我的工作和我的船!

English: How do they expect us to mine all this Pyrolusite with one mining ship? I don't even know where to begin! I should have joined the union instead of working for Polaris directly. They are going to scrap my ship for sure for this.
Chinese (simplified): 他们怎么指望我们用一艘采矿船开采所有这些软锰矿? 我甚至不知道从哪里开始! 我应该加入工会而不是直接为极星工作。 他们肯定会为此废了我的船。

English: I have the Pyrolusite Ore Shipment
I don't have time to listen to your whining.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有时间听你的抱怨。

English: I was offered a job with Polaris Mining Company. Normally miners are contracted out with the Union of Independent Miners which offers them some autonomy, but this offer direct from Polaris was too good and I couldn't pass it up.\nIt was the worst decision of my life! They send us out into dangerous systems with no backup and give us impossible tasks. But if we don't do what they say they have the right to seize our ships and fire us!\n@p9I was given the job of mining 15,000 Pyrolusite from this mining site. I don't even know where to begin! I have a single low yield civilian mining turret and I'm already late. I've been sitting here overwhelmed by the stress.
Chinese (simplified): Polaris 矿业公司向我提供了一份工作。 通常矿工和为他们提供一些自主权的独立矿工联盟签订合同,但极星直接提供的这个提议太好了,我不能放弃。\n这是我一生中最糟糕的决定! 他们把我们送到没有备份的危险系统,给我们不可能的任务。 但是如果我们不按照他们说的去做,他们有权扣押我们的船只并开除我们!\n@p9 我被要求从这个采矿点开采 15,000 个软锰矿的工作。 我甚至不知道从哪里开始! 我有一个低产量的民用采矿炮塔,我已经超时了。 我一直坐在这里被压力压得喘不过气来。

English: I'm sorry about that. I have to go. Goodluck!
Chinese (simplified): 对此我很抱歉。 我得走了。 祝你好运!

English: Oh thank you, thank you so much! You have saved my job.\nPlease, how can I repay you for this?
