Chinese (simplified): 哦,谢谢,非常感谢! 你拯救了我的工作。\n请问,我该如何回报你?

English: I'll just take the credits. (+350,000 credits)
Chinese (simplified): 我只会这些信用点数。 (+350,000 信用点数)

English: I'll take any ore that you have. (Random assortment of ore. Connect to a container first)
Chinese (simplified): 我会拿走你所有的矿石。 (随机各种矿石。先链接到容器)

English: You could put in a good word for me with your boss. (+1,500-2,000 reputation with Polaris)
Chinese (simplified): 你可以和你的老板说一句好话。 (+1,500-2,000 极星的声望)

English: I need more time to think about it.
More than happy to pay! You saved my job and I will be able to feed my crew for once!
Chinese (simplified): 没什么比付款更开心了! 你拯救了我的工作,我将能够再次养活我的船员!

English: I will let my boss know how you assisted us.
Chinese (simplified): 我会让我的老板知道你是如何帮助我们的。

English: Thank you. I do have some spare ore in my cargo that I don't need. I have transferred it to you, it may be in your ship's connected inventory, or floating in a cargo box next to you.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你。 我的货物中确实有一些我不需要的备用矿石。 我已经把它转移给你了,它可能在你船上的链接货柜中,或者在你旁边漂浮货箱里。

English: Yes. Yes you can! I'll make you a deal. Mine up 15,000 Pyrolusite from the nearby Pyrolusite asteroids, package them up in your constructor's decoration tab, and give me a Pyrolusite Ore Shipment and I'll pay you!\nThat way we both win. You get a reward, and I get to keep my job and my ship. Oh, I guess I get to feed my crew as well.
Chinese (simplified): 是的。 是的你可以! 我和你做个交易。 从附近的软锰矿小行星上开采 15,000 个软锰矿,将它们打包到建造机的装饰标签中,然后给我一个软锰矿货物,我会付钱给你!\n这样我们双赢。 你得到奖励,我可以保住我的工作和我的船。 哦,我想我也可以养活我的船员。

English: Never mind. You're on your own.
Chinese (simplified): 没关系。 你只能靠自己了。

English: <color=#00ffff>I have a special delivery of fuel cells.</color>
Took long enough. Wait, let me inspect them... @w4Good, freshly crafted. I suppose you want payment. Here is what you were promised.
Chinese (simplified): 花了足够长的时间。 等等,让我检查一下……@w4 不错,新鲜制作。 我认为你想要报酬。 这是你应得的。

English: I want to ask something else.
I didn't want to listen to your bad music anyway!
Chinese (simplified): 反正我不想听你的垃圾音乐!

English: @q0 I have set out among the cosmic shores in search of a new home for my people. Our world is no longer safe for us.\nI was one of the first volunteers to delve into the great beyond. I hope I find what I seek.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 我已经出发到宇宙海岸为我的人民寻找新家。 我们的世界对我们来说不再安全。\n我是第一批深入探索伟大世界的志愿者之一。 我希望我能找到我想要的。

English: The search for a suitable planet has been difficult. Many are inhospitable or already inhabited. This planet does not have the correct oxygen levels or sunlight. I must move on.
Chinese (simplified): 寻找合适的行星很困难。 许多行星不适合居住或已经有人居住。 这个星球没有合适的氧气水平或阳光。 我必须继续寻找。

English: My ship was hit by an ion storm and I had to make an emergency landing here. I expect to have repairs complete in 2 to 3 suns.\nThere are locals here who speak Tal'on. They tell me of a strange black sphere with green glowing bands that appeared in the sky one day blocking out the sun, only to disappear a few minutes earlier. This is troubling.
Chinese (simplified): 我的船被离子风暴击中,我不得不在这里紧急降落。 我预计在 2 到 3 个太阳日内完成维修。\n这里有说泰隆语言的当地人。 他们告诉我有一天,天空中出现了一个带有绿色发光带的奇怪黑色球体,挡住了太阳,几分钟后又消失了。 这是个麻烦。

English: Another planet unsuitable for habitation. Though my species is naturally long lived, I miss home. I do this for them.\nI may have to change my search parameters if I am to find a home before the war reaches my homeworld.
Chinese (simplified): 另一个不适合居住的星球。 虽然我们的物种自然长寿,但我想家。 我为他们这样做。\n如果我想在我的家乡战争到达之前找到一个家,我可能必须更改我的搜索参数。

English: I now believe that we cannot afford to search for temperate worlds. I am going to expand my search to include Arid worlds. While not like the pristine woodlands of my home world, I know our species can survive there. If the Sun and Moon clans can do it, so can we.\nI heard about an arid planet called Parthix from a fellow traveler with rings of gold. That is where I will go next. Perhaps with luck it will be uninhabited.
Chinese (simplified): 我现在相信我们负担不起寻找温带世界的费用。 我将扩大我的搜索范围,包括干旱世界。 虽然不像我家乡的原始林地,但我知道我们的物种可以在那里生存。 如果太阳和月亮氏族能做到,那么我们也能做到。\n我从一位带着金环的旅伴那里听说了一个名为帕提克斯的干旱星球。 那就是我接下来要去的地方。 幸运的话也许它会无人居住。

English: Scan statue and import data into PDA.
Chinese (simplified): 扫描雕像并将数据导入 PDA。
在 PDA 中编译铭文

English: You can't be here! Guards! Guards!
Chinese (simplified): 你不能在这里! 卫兵! 卫兵!

English: <color=#ff0000>If you see this dialogue please report this to the Reforged Eden 2 developers following the directions found on the workshop.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>Thank you!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>如果您看到这段对话,请按照工作坊上找到的指示向Reforged Eden 2的开发者报告这个问题。</color>\n<color=#ff0000>谢谢!</color>

English: Welcome. Do you have Bandit, Raider, or Death's Hand Insignias to turn in?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎。 你有强盗、掠夺者或死亡之手徽章要上交吗?

English: Where do I find Bandit, Raider, or Death's Hand Insignias?
Chinese (simplified): 我在哪里可以找到强盗、掠夺者或死亡之手的徽章?

English: You can find Bandit, Raider, and Death's Hand Insignias from certain patrol vessels belonging to those Warlord factions. Most often found in neutral space in combat sites.
Chinese (simplified): 您可以从属于这些军阀派系的某些巡逻舰上找到强盗、掠夺者和死亡之手徽章。 最常见于战斗地点的中立空间。

English: I want to ask something else.

I get to meet all kinds of interesting people in my line of work! Like the captain who had just returned from a system near the edge of the galaxy. He couldn't stop talking about the strange alien drones he found there.
Chinese (simplified): 在我的工作中,遇到了各种各样有趣的人! 就像刚刚从靠近银河系边缘的一个星系回来的舰长。 他不停谈论他在那里发现的奇怪外星无人机。

English: Do you know about the Ancient Warp Gate that lies on the edge of the galaxy? No one has been able to figure out how to power it. Maybe you'd have better luck.
Chinese (simplified): 你知道位于银河边缘的远古亚空间门吗? 没有人能够弄清楚如何为其供电。 也许你会有更好的运气。

English: I have a hypothesis that The Progenitors we study now actually came from a far older civilization in a dwarf galaxy. Perhaps fragments of their technology remain, if only we can find them.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一个假设,我们现在研究的祖先实际上来自矮星系中一个更古老的文明。 也许他们的技术碎片仍然存在,只要我们能找到它们。

English: There have been reports of increased Bandit and Raider activity in neutral space. Be careful.
Chinese (simplified): 有报道称中立空间的强盗和入侵者活动有所增加。 当心。

English: Have you heard of Pantheis? He helped design the Project Eden research vessels. I hope to be half as good as he is one day.
Chinese (simplified): 你听说过潘提斯吗? 他帮助设计了伊甸园项目研究船。 我希望有一天能有他的一半成就。

English: Have you heard of the Brotherhood of Farr? My sister just got back from visiting their homeworld of Parthix. She said its golden rings are beautiful.
Chinese (simplified): 你听说过法尔兄弟会吗? 我姐姐刚从他们的家乡帕提克斯回来。 她说它的金环很漂亮。

English: Stay away from black holes and rogue planets. Heard many ships have been lost in those systems.
Chinese (simplified): 远离黑洞和Rogue行星。 听说在这些系统中迷失了许多船只。

English: I'm tired of being hunted by the Zirax empire. We should strike back at their homeworld! The Throneworld? Hah!
Chinese (simplified): 我厌倦了被 Zirax 帝国追捕。 我们应该反击他们的家园! 王座世界? 哈!

English: No time to chat. I have a lot of work to do.
Chinese (simplified): 没时间聊天。 我有很多工作要做。

English: Have you seen how much Magmacite weighs? That stuff is almost impossible to mine! First you have to find a molten planet around a M1Ia star and then... Well, you get the idea.
Chinese (simplified): 你知道磁浆石矿有多重吗? 那东西基本上没法挖! 首先,你必须在 M1Ia 恒星周围找到一颗熔化的行星,然后……嗯,你明白了。

English: I've thought about becoming a bounty hunter. You can make great money selling insignias to the other factions.
Chinese (simplified): 我曾想过成为一名赏金猎人。 你可以通过向其他派系出售徽章来赚大钱。

English: Had a Trading Guild representative visit us who gave us the best hamburgers I've ever had. Said he grew the wheat for them himself outdoors on a tropical planet.
Chinese (simplified): 有一位贸易公会代表拜访了我们,他给了我们我吃过最好的汉堡包。 说他在一个热带星球的户外为他们自己种植小麦。

English: I heard there are dead worlds out there full of salvage. I wonder what happened to the civilizations that lived there.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说外面有很多到处都是打捞物的死亡世界。 我想知道生活在那里的文明发生了什么。

English: Be careful flying through gas clouds. Bandits love to set up traps for the unwary.
Chinese (simplified): 在气体云中飞行时要小心。 土匪喜欢为粗心的人设置陷阱。

English: Hello there. Welcome to the Archives. May I interest you in some ancient cookbooks? Perhaps a text on our mythology or an old hunter's guide on how to skin a Farrbear?
Chinese (simplified): 你好呀。 欢迎来到档案馆。 我可以让你对一些古老的食谱感兴趣吗? 也许是关于我们神话的文字或是关于如何对熊剥皮的老猎人指南?

English: <color=#00ffff>I am looking for information on any travelers who had visited Parthix in the past.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>我正在寻找有关过去曾访问 Parthix 的任何旅行者信息。</color>

English: I wish to learn more about the Brotherhood of Farr
Chinese (simplified): 我想了解更多关于法尔兄弟会的信息

English: I don't need any assistance, goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 我不需要任何帮助,再见。

English: You can find much of our story here in the Archives or in the nearby Farr's Arrival which is the original ship Farr crashed in.
Chinese (simplified): 您可以在档案馆或附近的 Farr's Arrival 找到我们的大部分故事,那里是原始飞船 Farr 坠毁的地方。

English: Travelers to Parthix in the past? You mean besides Farr? Hmm... There is a tale of an ancient traveler who came here on an airship, but it is considered myth and not a historical fact.\nIt will take me some time to find the text in the Archive, come back later. In the meantime please consider exploring the rest of the Archives or Temple Prime and Farr's Arrival to learn more of our history.\nI will send a message to your PDA when I have located the text.
Chinese (simplified): 过去曾到过帕提克斯的旅行者? 你是说除了法尔? 嗯……有一个故事讲述古老的旅行者乘坐飞艇来到这里,但这被认为是神话而不是历史事实。\n我需要一些时间才能在档案中找到文字,稍后见。 同时,请考虑探索档案的其余部分或圣殿之星和Farr's Arrival,以了解更多我们的历史。\n当我找到文本后,我会向你的 PDA 发送一条消息。

English: <color=#00ffff>Thank you. I will wait for your message.</color>
@q0 @d0 I have found the text you're looking for {PlayerName}. Return to me in the Archives.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 {PlayerName},我找到了您要查找的文本。 在档案馆里找我。
有趣的名字。 和我们有关吗?

English: I don't believe so, though you do seem familiar... Wait, you... No, you can't be him! You're the one who....\nI have something for you. <color=#ffff00>Make sure you got some room in your inventory.</color>
Chinese (simplified): 我不相信,虽然你看起来很眼熟……等等,你……不,你不可能是他! 你是那个....\n我有东西给你。 <color=#ffff00>确保您的背包中有一些空间。</color>

English: Shhh. Don't say anything. I think I'm being watched.
Chinese (simplified): 嘘。 什么都别说。 我想我正在被监视。

English: Nope, must be a funny coincidence. I've never been here before. Who? Me? Never! Honest!
Chinese (simplified): 不,一定是一个有趣的巧合。 我以前从来没有来过这里。 谁? 我? 绝不! 坦白!

English: I completely understand. I don't know you and I never met you. It is a complete coincidence that I happen to have limited edition posters with your name on it then. Here, have them, as a token of appreciation for uhh, visiting our world for the first time. Yeah, we like to give out posters here on Parthix. The Archivist's expression suddenly changes... @p9My apologies, but I just remembered that our supply of posters were taken in the night by someone calling themselves Ravien. He promised to give us new ones later though I don't know if I can trust him.
Chinese (simplified): 我完全理解。我不认识你,也从未见过你。 这是一个巧合,我恰好有限量版的海报,上面印有你的名字。来,拿着它们,作为对...呃,第一次访问我们世界的感激之情。是的,我们喜欢在Parthix这里分发海报。 档案管理员的表情突然变了... @p9 抱歉,但我刚刚记起我们的海报供应在夜里被一个自称Ravien的人拿走了。他承诺稍后会给我们新的,但我不确定我是否能信任他。

English: You have worn out our generosity!
Chinese (simplified): 你已经耗尽了我们的耐心!

English: He wandered Parthix seeking audiences with leaders. Before he left he built a stone statue. The statue has long since been destroyed but the inscription was recorded in the book.
Chinese (simplified): 他在Parthix四处游荡,寻找领袖的听众。 在他离开之前,他建造了一座石像。 这座雕像早已被毁坏,但铭文被记录在书中。

English: The people of Parthix are divided but have much potential. Primitive, but resourceful. They cannot aid me, however, and I have received word that I am being given a new task. I am to travel to a moon where crystal meets the sky and keep watch there, waiting for the day the relic of the stars is found.
Chinese (simplified): Parthix 的人民分裂,但潜力巨大。 原始,但足智多谋。 然而,他们无法帮助我,而且我收到消息说我正在接受一项新任务。 我要去一个水晶与天空相遇的卫星,在那里守望,等待找到星星遗物的那一天。

English: I see. Thank you for this history lesson.
Chinese (simplified): 我懂了。 谢谢你的这堂历史课。

English: No please, it is I who should be thanking you! You have solved the mystery of who this traveler was and confirmed the myth was real. We have encountered several crystalline moons that fit the description in the inscription. Perhaps you can continue your search there.\nYou have added to our history today, and for that I am thankful. Please, have this gift, may it serve you well.
Chinese (simplified): 不,拜托,我应该感谢你! 你已经解开了这位旅行者是谁的谜团,并证实了这个神话是真的。 我们遇到了几个符合铭文描述的水晶卫星。 也许你可以在那里继续你的搜索。\n你今天加入了我们的历史,为此我很感激。 请收下这份礼物,愿它为您服务。

English: An ancient book of fables that speaks of a green skinned traveler who came from the sky in a ship of wood and metal.
Chinese (simplified): 一本古老的寓言书,讲述了一位绿色皮肤的旅行者,他乘坐木头和金属制作的船从天而降。
绿色的? 听起来像泰隆。
你能给我的<color=#ffff00>黄金法则</color>充电吗? <color=#ff0000>(-$100,000)</color>

English: Your Golden Rule has been recharged. I hope it continues to serve you well.
Chinese (simplified): 您的 Golden Rule已充值。 我希望它继续为您服务。

English: Hello, how may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): 您好,请问有什么可以帮助您的吗?

English: You do not have enough reputation with the Zirax Empire to have dealings with me.
Chinese (simplified): 你在Zirax帝国的声望不够,无法与我打交道。

English: My records indicate you do not have the required reputation with Polaris to trade with me.
Chinese (simplified): 我的记录表明您在 Polaris 中没有与我交易所需的声望。

English: You do not have the required reputation with the Trader Guild to access my trades.
Chinese (simplified): 您在贸易公会中没有足够的声望来与我交易。

English: You don't have enough reputation with the Free Colonists to trade with me.
Chinese (simplified): 你在自由殖民者中没有足够的声望和我交易。

English: The Pirates do not know you well enough to access my trades.
Chinese (simplified): 海盗对你了解得不够,不能与我交易。

English: You do not have enough reputation with my faction to access my trades.
Chinese (simplified): 你在我的派系中没有足够的声望来与我交易。

English: @d0On behalf of the Trader Guild, welcome!\nI am a Personal Assistant Mechanoid model T-799. How may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 代表 Trader Guild,欢迎您!\n我是个人助理 Mechanoid,型号为 T-799。 我如何才能帮助你呢?

English: I don't need any help. Thank you.
Chinese (simplified): 我不需要任何帮助。 谢谢你。

English: @d0Very simple. As a neutral party, the Trader Guild is often contracted out by the other factions to transfer cargo.\nIn turn, we contract out some of the deliveries to third parties such as you. Of course you probably want to know how you can make money from this.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 非常简单。 作为中立的一方,贸易公会经常承包其他派系的货物运输。\n反过来,我们将一些工作外包给第三方,比如你。 当然,您可能想知道如何赚钱

English: What do I need to do?

Chinese (simplified): @d0 前往贸易公会空间内贸易站区域的配送总部。\n贸易站区域在太阳系地图上显示为白色站点符号。\n与那里的贸易商交谈,了解您想要交付的派系并支付

English: I want to ask something else.

Chinese (simplified): 感谢您的信息。 我必须得走了。

English: Do you have any personal delivery contracts available?
Chinese (simplified): 你们有个人送货合同吗?

English: At this time personal delivery contracts are not available.\nThe Trader Guild hopes to make them available in the future.
Chinese (simplified): 目前个人交付合同不可用。\n贸易公会希望将来可以提供它们。

English: I want to ask something else.

@d0Once you have a schematic in your <color=#00ff00>personal inventory</color>, meet the <color=#00ff00>requirements</color> listed on the schematic, and <color=#00ff00>do not already have it unlocked</color>, you may turn them in here to unlock the crafting recipe.\n<color=#ffff00>Schematics may require a certain number of unlock points to be able to turn them in. You must have the unlock points available to use or you won't see the option to turn in the schematic.</color>\nYou can sell unneeded schematics to UCH Quartermasters on board the ship.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 一旦您的<color=#00ff00>个人背包</color>中有示意图,请满足示意图中列出的<color=#00ff00>要求</color>,并且<color=#00ff00>它还没有被解锁</color>,您可以将它们交在这里以解锁工艺
解锁 <color=#00ff00>哨兵防空炮塔</color>(花费 50 UP)

English:
@d0You can only see options to turn in schematics when you meet the requirements to use them and have not unlocked the item already.
Schematics will be listed under the category listed in their tooltip.
You can obtain schematics through missions, trading, or loot.

<color=#ffff00>Schematics may also require a certain number of unlock points to be able to turn them in. You must have the unlock points available to use or you won't see the option to turn in the schematic.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 只有满足使用要求且尚未解锁该物品时,您才能看到上交示意图的选项。\n示意图将列在其工具提示中的类别下。\n您可以通过任务和交易获得示意图
解锁 重型磁轨炮塔(花费 100 UP)
解锁<color=#ffff00>中型爆破炮</color>(花费50 UP)

English: @q0@d0You find yourself stranded on an alien world. Find a way to survive and eventually travel to space. Planet specific missions are not available to complete when starting on this planet. If you wish to do another starting planet's missions you will need to restart on that planet. You may also start the Project Eden main story by activating the mission Make Contact with Terran Forces in your PDA (F1). This starting planet may be intended for experienced players and may have more difficult POIs and other challenges not found on a typical starting planet and may require unconventional tactics. Play on this starting planet at your own risk. Valuable tips and useful information can be found in the Empyriopedia section of the PDA (F1).
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你发现自己被困在一个外星球上。找到生存的方法,最终前往太空。 当从这个星球开始时,特定星球的任务不可完成。如果你想完成另一个起始星球的任务,你需要在那个星球重新开始。 你也可以通过在你的PDA中激活任务与地球力量取得联系来开始伊甸园计划的主要故事(F1)。 这个起始星球可能针对经验丰富的玩家,可能有更多的困难POI和其他挑战,这些在典型的起始星球上找不到,可能需要使用非传统战术。 在这个起始星球上玩,风险自担。 有价值的提示和有用信息可以在PDA的帝国百科部分找到(F1)。
<color=#00ff00>我已阅读并理解了其中的内容.</color>

English: How do I start the story missions?
Chinese (simplified): 我该如何开启主线任务?

English: @q0 @d0Each planet can have its own intro missions. In order to do the intro missions on another planet you will need to restart on that planet.\nIf playing single player, quit the game back to Windows desktop, then start a new save game and select a different starting planet.\nIf playing on a server, contact your server admin and ask how to reset your character so you can select a different starting planet.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 每个星球都有自己的介绍任务。为了在另一个星球上完成介绍任务,你需要在那个星球上重新开始。\n如果是单人游戏,退出游戏回到Windows桌面,然后开始一个新的保存游戏并选择一个不同的起始星球。\n如果是在服务器上玩,请联系你的服务器管理员,询问如何重置你的角色,以便你可以选择一个不同的起始星球。

English: @q0@d0Still confused? Please see the <color=#00ffff>Empyriopedia</color> section of the PDA <color=#ffff00>(F1)</color> or post on the Workshop page for the scenario for assistance.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 依然感到迷惑吗? 请参阅PDA <color=#ffff00>(F1)</color>中的 <color=#00ffff>帝国百科</color> 栏目或是在创意工坊的mod讨论中发帖求助.

English:
@q0 @d0Code range: <color=#00ffc6>{CodeMin}</color> - <color=#00ffc6>{CodeMax}</color>.
You have <color=#00ff00>{Tries}</color> attempts remaining. You have broken through <color=#00ff00>{Score}</color> firewalls.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusTry}</color> Security Resets.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusComplete}</color> Codebreakers.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusMin}</color> Low Frequency Scanners.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusMax}</color> High Frequency Scanners.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 密码范围: <color=#00ffc6>{CodeMin}</color> - <color=#00ffc6>{CodeMax}</color>.
你还剩下 <color=#00ff00>{Tries}</color> 次尝试机会. 你已经突破了 <color=#00ff00>{Score}</color> 层防火墙.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusTry}</color> 安保重置.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusComplete}</color> 密码破解器.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusMin}</color> 低频扫描器.
<color=#00ffff>{BonusMax}</color> 高频扫描.

English: @d0Your guess was not within the valid code range.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您的猜测不在有效代码范围内.

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Your guess was lower than the code.</color>
@d0<color=#ff0000>Your guess was higher than the code.</color>

@d0Greetings commander. I have scanned the locking mechanism and computer and have determined how the mechanism works.
Each time you access the terminal a new security code is generated between two random values. I can detect those values but cannot see what the code is.
You must guess the code until you input the correct code. If you input an incorrect code I can determine whether the code is higher or lower than your guess and adjust the code range accordingly.
Each time you guess the code correctly a firewall will be breached and a vault door may open. Successfully hacking all firewalls will give the best rewards.
<color=#ff0000>Failing too many times may lock you out of the system permanently and closing the hacking window may cause you to lose all hacking progress.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 你好指挥官. 我已经扫描了锁定机制和计算机,并确定了该机制的工作原理.
每次您访问终端时,都会在两个随机值之间生成一个新的安全代码.我可以检测到这些值,但看不到具体代码是什么.
您必须猜测代码,直到输入正确为止.如果您输入了错误的代码,我可以确定该代码是高于还是低于您的猜测,并相应地调整代码范围.
每当您输入一次正确的密码,防火墙都会被打开一层,同时也可能会打开一道保险门. 成功黑入所有防火墙可以为您带来最好的奖励.
<color=#ff0000>失败次数过多可能会使您被永久锁定在系统之外,关闭黑入窗口可能会导致您丢失所有黑客进度.</color>

English: @d0Are you sure you want to exit the system? Make sure you are done with your hacking attempt first.\nExiting the system will cause you to lose all progress and lose a hacking attempt.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您确定要退出系统吗?请确保您首先完成了本次黑入尝试.\n退出系统会导致失去所有进度并失去一次尝试机会.

English: Have you seen those strange statues on Earth-like planets? They look like they could be of Talon origin.
Chinese (simplified): 你在类地行星上见过那些奇怪的雕像吗?他们看起来可能源于泰隆.

English: I hope to be on an expedition to the Dronelands! It's rumored to be dangerous but I don't believe the stories.
Chinese (simplified): 我希望能去Dronelands探险! 那里据说很危险,但我才不相信这些怪力乱神的故事.

English: Watch out for The Syndicate. My brother got involved with them and now he's deep in debt.
Chinese (simplified): 当心联合会。 我哥哥和他们有牵连,现在他负债累累.

English: We really should have stayed longer at that Abandoned Tomb on the last Desert Oasis planet we visited. I know there was a way inside!
Chinese (simplified): 我们真的应该在我们访问的最后一个沙漠绿洲星球上的废弃坟墓停留更长的时间。 我知道进去的路!

English: We really should have stayed longer at that Abandoned Tomb on the last Desert Oasis planet we visited. I know there was a way inside!
Chinese (simplified): 我们真的应该在我们访问的最后一个沙漠绿洲星球上的废弃坟墓停留更长的时间。 我知道进去的路!

English: Hello and welcome to our research vessel. She might not be much to look at but she's a tough ship.\nI'm the quartermaster of this ship. How may I help you?
Chinese (simplified): 您好,欢迎来到我们的研究船. 她可能没什么好看的,但是船体梆硬.\n我是这艘船的军需官。 请问有什么可以帮你的?

English: Yes I do have some supplies I can spare. I'm sure you will put them to good use.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我确实有一些我可以分发的物资。我相信你会好好利用它们。\n你会在个人库存中找到它们,或者连接的容器中,或者如果空间不够,它们会漂浮在你旁边。

English: I want to ask something else.

Yes I do have some supplies I can spare. This fuel should help you on your journey.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我确实有些补给品可以给你. 这些燃料应该对你的旅途有所帮助.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.
We have some spare cash you can have.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 我这有些闲钱可以给你.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.
We have a spare autominer core you can have.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 我这有几个多余的矿机可以给你.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.

One of our expeditions recorded data that should help you plot longer warp jumps.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 这是我们的远征数据,应该可以帮你规划更远的跃迁.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.
We found some more navigational data you can have.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 我们给你找到了一些导航数据.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.
We found these valuables while scavenging.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在搜寻时发现了这些贵重物品。\n你会在个人库存中找到它们,或者连接的容器中,或者如果空间不够,它们会漂浮在你旁边。

English: I want to ask something else.
Some more valuables you can have.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 拿上这些值钱货.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.

Chinese (simplified): 解锁 高射速鱼雷发射器 (花费 75 UP)
解锁 LX-2 原型轻磁轨炮 (花费 100 UP)

English:
@d0Turn in research reports to obtain unlock points. The report must be in your personal inventory.
You can create research reports in the Decoration tab of a Small, Large, or Advanced Constructor.
The amount of unlock points you gain is based on which report you turn in.

<color=#ffff00>You may perform research every 3 hours but you cannot turn in research reports to the same research vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 上交研究报告以获取解锁点数. 报告必须置于你的背包中.
您可以在小型,大型或高级建造机的装饰栏位中创建研究报告.
获取的解锁点数取决于你上交的报告类型.

<color=#ffff00>您每三个小时可以上交一次但是不能在同一艘船上进行.</color>
生物研究报告 (100 解锁点数)
园艺研究报告 (100 解锁点数)
地质研究报告 (100 解锁点数)
冶金研究报告 (150 解锁点数)

English: @q0 @d0Select Complete below to receive your {Eden_ResearchUPCount} Unlock Points.\n\n<color=#ffff00>IMPORTANT: You must press Complete below otherwise you will not receive your unlock points and your report will be wasted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 点击下方的完成来获取 {Eden_ResearchUPCount} 解锁点数.\n\n<color=#ffff00>重要提示:如果不点下面的完成你将无法获取解锁点数而且报告还会浪费掉.</color>

English: Alien Tech Research Report (250 Unlock Points)
Chinese (simplified): 外星科技研究报告 (250 解锁点数)

English: Where did you get this music?
Chinese (simplified): 你从哪搞到的这种音乐?

English: I got them off a Terran awhile ago. They said it's something called copyright free music from the early 2020's by a group known as Aim to Head.\nSaid it used to be played on something called a u tube. Maybe you can look them up in your historical database.\nYou Terrans are a strange bunch but you have good taste in music!
Chinese (simplified): 我前不久从地球人那弄来的. 他们说这玩意是一种2020年代的被称作无版权音乐的东西,创作团队叫Aim to Head.\n说是以前在个叫油管的地方播放的. 也许你可以在你们的历史数据库里找到.\n虽然说你们这些地球人都是一群怪胎不过音乐品味还真不错!

English: I want to ask something else.

@d0<color=#ff0000>You tried to turn in more navigational data than you have, more than the max you can turn in, or you entered an invalid quantity.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>You cannot turn in more navigational data than you have in your personal inventory.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>你尝试上交的导航数据数量大于你拥有的数量,超过了上交的上限或是输入了无效的上交数量.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>你不能上交超过你背包中拥有数量的导航数据.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} Data chips successfully input!</color>\n<color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT1C} Credits. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT1R} Research Points. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT1UP} Unlock Points.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} 成功导入数据芯片!</color>\n<color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT1C} 信用点. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT1R} 研究点数. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT1UP} 解锁点数.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You tried to turn in more data chips than you have or you entered an invalid quantity.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>你尝试上交的数据芯片数量大于你拥有的数量或是输入了无效的数量.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} Data chips successfully input!</color>\n<color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT2C} Credits. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT2R} Research Points. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT2UP} Unlock Points.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} 成功导入数据芯片!</color>\n<color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT2C} 信用点. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT2R} 研究点数. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT2UP} 解锁点数.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} Data chips successfully input!</color>\n<color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT3C} Credits. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT3R} Research Points. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT3UP} Unlock Points.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} 成功导入数据芯片!</color>\n<color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT3C} 信用点. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT3R} 研究点数. </color><color=#00ff00>+ {Eden_Input * Eden_G_DataChipT3UP} 解锁点数.</color>

English: When will you get more free supplies?
Chinese (simplified): 你什么时候能弄来更多补给品?

English:
I can't offer any more free supplies to you, however we can discuss trading and my stock is replenished regularly.

If you visit other UCH Research Vessels they may be able to offer you more supplies and different ones than I could.
As you explore more you may start finding ships that even have more valuable supplies.
Chinese (simplified):
我无法提供更多的免费补给品,不过我们可以谈谈交易,我的储备会经常性地刷新.

如果你找到了其他的UCH船只也许他们会给你更多和我不一样的物资.
随着探索的深入你可能会获得更高价值的物资.

English: Thank you. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你. 我想问点别的.

English: All I needed to know. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 该知道的都知道了. 再见.

English: Yes I can spare some supplies.\nPlease make sure that you use the logistics system to connect to a cargo container with at least 8,000 free space otherwise your items may be dropped nearby or lost.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我确实有些补给品可以给你.\n请确保你已经使用物流系统连接至空间至少有8000的容器,否则您的物品可能会掉落在周围或者丢失.

English: I will take the supplies now.
I'm not ready for the supplies.
Chinese (simplified): 我还没准备好拿补给品.

English: Here are some spare supplies we recently obtained.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 这些是我们最近获得的补给.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.
Here are some valuable supplies we can spare.\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Chinese (simplified): 这些就是我们能分给你的值钱物品了.\n您可以在您的背包或连接的容器中找到它们,如果容量不足,也有可能直接飘浮在你身边.

English: I want to ask something else.

Chinese (simplified): 解锁 自动化工业采矿钻机

English: Hello sir and or madam. Welcome to one of Polaris Megacorp's premiere distribution centers! How may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): 你好先生和或女士. 欢迎来到极星巨型企业最一流的配送中心之一! 我能帮上您什么忙吗?

English: <color=#00ff00>I was told to meet you here on behalf of the UCH.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我接到通知要代表UCH在这里与您会面.</color>

English: You are not the alien I'm looking for.
Ah yes, so you are {PlayerName}, I assume? It is good to meet you!\nI understand that you are interested in purchasing the schematics to one of our newest inventions?
Chinese (simplified): 啊对,所以你就是 {PlayerName},如果我记得没错的话? 非常高兴见到你!\n我想您对购入我们最新发明的图纸有点想法?

English: That is correct. I am authorized to purchase the schematic on behalf of the UCH for 3 million credits.
Chinese (simplified): 没错,我被UCH授权以300万的价格购入该图纸。

English: Ah yes, yes yes I see. Well, I would love to sell you the schematic but you see, I seem to have misplaced it.
Chinese (simplified): 啊没错,是这样的. 是这样的,我非常乐意把图纸卖给您,但是你也看得出来,我可能把它放错地方了.

English: Not my problem. You don't get a single credit until I see the schematic.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你的问题. 我见到图纸之前你一分钱也拿不到.

English: Well, more like had it stolen from me. Some filthy pirate thieves stole the schematic right off this station and took off in a corvette!\nIf you return the schematic to us, you can have it. Free of charge.
Chinese (simplified): 嘛,其实说是被偷的更贴切. 一群肮脏的海盗从空间站偷走了图纸,然后开了个护卫舰跑了!\n如果你能帮我们找回图纸,它就是你的了. 一分钱都不用.

English: Look, you came all the way out here from who knows where for this schematic. That tells me that you want it. Frankly if you won't help me then I'll just find someone else who will.\nSome pirates stole it from me. If you get it back I'll give you the schematic free of charge, even if it is against my better judgment with how rude you are.
Chinese (simplified): 你听好了,你从别人那听说了从哪能搞到图纸以后立刻就远道而来到我这里. 这说明你很明显需要它. 坦率地说,就算你不乐意我也能找到别的人来干这事.\n某些海盗从我这偷走了. 如果你能取回来我就把它免费给你,哪怕是你已经对我如此粗鲁.

English: Do you know where it is?
Do you know where it is?

Luckily I had placed a tracker on the case holding the schematic. You will find them in orbit of a planet in a nearby K2-7 class star system in Polaris territory, though you will have to warp to that system to narrow down their location. I will give you the tracking frequency.
Get my schematic back and you can have it. Free of charge. Honest.

To find the system, search your galaxy map for star type K2-7. There should be one nearby in Polaris territory.
Chinese (simplified):
幸运的是,我在装图纸的箱子里装了个追踪器. 你可以在附近极星领地内的K2-7 型星系的某个行星轨道上找到 ,不过你得跳过去来缩小寻找范围. 我会把追踪频率交给你.
把图纸拿回来它就是你的了. 完全免费. 我说真的.

To find the system,search your galaxy map for star type K2-7. There should be one nearby in 极星 territory.

English: <color=#00ff00>I will get it back and you better not be lying about it being free!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我会把它带回来的,免费的事你最好不要是随口乱说的!</color>

English: @d0There is power running to this console.

@d0There is various navigational and sensor logs on this console. From what you can tell they were simple rum smugglers that were ambushed by a Zirax patrol vessel.\nYou find no mention of stealing a schematic.\nThe logs show the Zirax patrol vessel landed on the nearby moon for 34 minutes and then departed the system. Perhaps you can continue your search there.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个控制台上有各种导航和传感器日志. 从这上面来看这些人只是单纯的朗姆酒走私犯,但是遭到了兹瑞克斯巡逻舰的袭击.\n你没有找到偷取图纸的记录.\n日志显示兹瑞克斯巡逻舰在附近的卫星登录了34分钟后就离开了星系. 也许你可以在那里继续寻找.

English: @d0The console stands ready. A zirax hack was partially successful.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 控制台准备就绪. 兹瑞克斯黑入部分成功.

English:
The schematic? Oh yes, about that. You see, I am afraid I may have... Exaggerated slightly as to the whereabouts of the schematic.

We've been having a problem with Zirax infiltrators sabotaging our prototype mining rigs. But we could not risk open warfare by dealing with them ourselves. That's where you came in.
@p9I knew that you would be willing to pay for the schematic, but I could not be sure whether you would be willing to risk killing members of the Zirax empire for it.
But if I told you that it had been stolen by a ruthless band of pirate scum? Well then that would give you a clear conscious to do what was needed.
Chinese (simplified):
图纸? 哦对,关于这点. 额,我可能... 对图纸的去向稍微夸张了一点.

我们一直都被兹瑞克斯间谍破坏矿钻的行为困扰. 但同时我们又不能自己处理,不然等同于开战. 然后你就来了.
@p9 我知道你想买那份图纸,但是我不确定你愿不愿意为了图纸杀几个兹瑞克斯帝国的人.
但是如果我告诉你其实是海盗偷的呢? 这样你就可以清楚地意识到自己该做什么了.

English: Lying is such a strong word. I see it more as keeping out some unnecessary details.\nAt the end of the day, our Zirax problem has been dealt with and you are now free to purchase the schematic you seek.
Chinese (simplified): 说谎这个说法有点重了. 我只是隐瞒了一些不必要的细节.\n到了最后,我们的兹瑞克斯恩替解决了而你也可以购买图纸了.

English: Purchase? You said it would be free.
Chinese (simplified): 购买? 你说好了免费的.

English: Free? Oh yes, I did say that, didn't I?\nWell then I will transfer a payment of 500,000 credits to your bank account for services rendered. Wait, did I say 500,000? I meant 10,000 credits. That's all you get. If you can cough up 3,000,000 credits then you are free to speak to me again to purchase the schematic.\nOr not. It's your choice.
Chinese (simplified): 免费?哦,是的,我确实这么说过,对吧?\n那么我将向你的银行账户转账500,000信用点作为提供的服务。等等,我说500,000了吗?我的意思是10,000信用点。那就是你得到的。如果你能拿出3,000,000信用点,那么你可以随时再找我购买图纸。\n或者不。这是你的选择。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You tried to turn in more data pads than you have or you entered an invalid quantity.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>You cannot turn in more data pads than you have in your personal inventory.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>你尝试上交的数据平板数量大于你拥有的数量或是输入了无效的数量.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>你不能上交超过你背包中拥有数量的数据平板.</color>

English: @d0If you find a Data Pad you can turn it in here to obtain additional unlock points. Each pad is worth {Eden_Global_DataPad} unlock points.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 如果你找到了数据平板,可以在这里提交以获取解锁点数. 每个平板价值 {Eden_Global_DataPad} 解锁点数.

English: I don't have any Data Pads. Back to Main Menu.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有数据平板了. 回到主菜单.
解锁 大型火神炮塔 (cost 75 UP)
解锁 富矿小行星开采钻头
贸易商会的出价不怎么样。

English: Hey there, glad you found my little boat. My village needs quite a lot of fish and I don't have much time left anymore.\nCan you please help me with fishing?\nIt won't be for nothing!
Chinese (simplified): 嘿,很高兴你找到了我的小船. 我的村庄需要相当多的鱼,而我的也没有多少时间了.\n你能帮我一起钓鱼吗?\n肯定不是白帮!

English: @q0 It looks like the school of fish is gone here. Maybe you have somewhere else more luck.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 看起来这里的这群鱼跑了. 也许去别的地方运气会好点.

English: How is it going? Did you catch any fish yet?
Chinese (simplified): 怎么样了? 抓到鱼了吗?

English: @q0 Success, but you scared away the school of fish! You got {0} Fish!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 成功,但是你把鱼群吓跑了! 你获得了 {0} 条鱼!

English: @q0 You failed and scared away the school of fish! Try next time. Hint: Your current Fish skill is {0}. Try to reach a higher skill for better fishing chances!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你失败了而且还把鱼群吓跑了! 下次再试试. 提示:你当前的钓鱼技能是 {0}. 试着达到更高等级来提高成功率!

English: @q0 You failed and scared away the school of fish! You have no Fish Bait or no Fish Rod with you. Go and get them before you can fish.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你失败了而且还把鱼群吓跑了! 你没带鱼竿或是鱼饵. 钓鱼之前记得都要带上.

English: @q0 It looks like this Fish of School is gone. Try somewhere else or next time.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 看上去这群鱼跑了. 下次去别的地方试试.

English: @q0 Hey, if you are looking for Fish, they are all gone already. Come back later.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 嘿,如果你还在找鱼,他们其实早就全跑了. 一会再回来.

English: Do you see the school of fish around the boat? It looks easy but they are fast and require some skill to catch. If you don't have fish equipment with you, I can sell you my spare one. Don't go near the school of fish without equipment! And don't forget: fishing is all about patience and the more often you fish, the better you get.
Chinese (simplified): 你在船附近发现鱼群了吗? 虽然看上去简单,但是它们可快了,抓住它们非常需要技巧. 如果你没有钓鱼装备,我可以把我这套备用的卖给你. 没有钓鱼装备不要靠近鱼群! 还有千万别忘了:钓鱼需要耐心,钓的次数越多,就钓的越好.

English: Sure, I'll be back with some Fish! (Accept Quest. End)
Chinese (simplified): 当然,我带回了一些鱼! (接受任务). End)

English: Oh, you need more Fishing equipment? I don't have much left anymore. I can only sell you the remaining things, so I can rebuy it tomorrow.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,你需要更多钓鱼装备? 我这没多少了. 我只能把剩下的卖给你了,这样我明天好去补货.

English: Buy 1 Fish Rod for {QuestFishRodPrice + 1000} credits (+1 Fish rod. -{1000 + QuestFishRodPrice} credits)
Chinese (simplified): 花费 {QuestFishRodPrice + 1000} 信用点购买一根鱼竿 (+1 鱼竿. -{1000 + QuestFishRodPrice} 信用点)

English: Buy 1 Fish bait for {QuestFishBaitPrice + 10} credits (+1 Fish bait. -{10 + QuestFishBaitPrice} credits)
Chinese (simplified): 花费 {QuestFishBaitPrice + 10} 信用点购买一个鱼饵 (+1 Fish bait. -{10 + QuestFishBaitPrice} 信用点)

English: Buy 1 Fish Rod for {QuestFishRodPrice + 1000} credits (Not enough credits)
Chinese (simplified): 花费 {QuestFishRodPrice + 1000} 信用点购买一根鱼竿 (信用点不足)

English: Buy 1 Fish bait for {QuestFishBaitPrice + 10} credits (Not enough credits)
Chinese (simplified): 花费 {QuestFishBaitPrice + 10} 信用点购买一个鱼饵 (信用点不足)

English: Awesome! I don't have much credits I can give you but I'll tell my people about your help and maybe I can teach you a few things about fishing.\nYour current fish skill is: {QuestFishChance}
Chinese (simplified): 太棒了! 虽然能给你的钱不多,但是我可以向人们讲述你对我的帮助,也许还能教你几手钓鱼的技巧.\n你当前的钓鱼技能为: {QuestFishChance}

English: Here is 1 Fish (-1 Fish. +100 Talon Reputation.)
Chinese (simplified): 这有一条鱼 (-1 鱼. +100 泰隆声望.)

English: Here is 1 Fish (-1 Fish. Improve fishing skill by +5%.)
Chinese (simplified): 这有一条鱼 (-1 鱼. 增加钓鱼技能 +5%.)

English: @d0<color=#ffff00>You have already performed research at this lab.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>You must find a different research vessel to turn in your research reports.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffff00>你已经在这个实验室进行过研究了.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>你必须在另一艘研究船上提交研究报告.</color>

English:
@q0@d0The POIs found on this planet may be <color=#ffff00>normal POIs</color> instead of the easier <color=#00ff00>starting POIs</color>. This gives an experience closer to the alpha versions of the game where you could find full abandoned POIs and Zirax bases to fight.
This means they may be much harder, and more rewarding, than your typical starting planet POI.

<color=#ffff00>These POIs may be challenging for a starting planet. It is highly recommended that you do not attempt to attack these POIs unless you are prepared for them.</color>
<color=#ffff00>You can easily lose your ship or find yourself in a bad spot. Play on this planet at your own risk.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 这颗星球上能找到的POI可能是 <color=#ffff00>普通 POI</color> 而非更加简单的 <color=#00ff00>起始 POI</color>. 这样你的体验会比较接近游戏的Alpha版本,能找到大量的废弃POI以及兹瑞克斯基地来对抗.
这意味着它们相较于一般的初始星球来说难度会更高,奖励也会更多.

<color=#ffff00>对于初始星球来说这些POI也许有些过于困难了. 强烈建议在准备好之前都不要贸然攻击.</color>
<color=#ffff00>你多半会丢掉自己的船或是处于重重包围之中. 游玩该星球风险自负.</color>

English: @q0@d0 <size=200%><color=#ff8000>STORY MISSIONS NOT AVAILABLE ON THIS STARTING PLANET</color></size>\n<size=150%>See the PDA (F1) if you have questions</size>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <size=200%><color=#ff8000>主线任务在该星球上不可用</color></size>\n<size=150%>如果有更多问题请查阅 PDA(F1) </size>

English: <color=#00ff00>I understand and will check the PDA.</color>
How do I start the story missions?
Chinese (simplified): 我该如何开启主线任务?

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 您确定要退出邮件系统吗?\n如果您这样做,邮件将被删除。</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
Chinese (simplified): 我改变主意了。 带我回到主菜单。

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>The message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>@d0 欢迎 {PlayerName} 来到t星系信息网邮件系统. 你有一条未读消息.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>发信人将其设置为如果不立刻读就会销毁. 您现在要读一读吗?</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.

@d0You scanned this sector <color=#00ff00>{DeltaTimeToString(GetGameTimeInSec() - Eden_ScanDate)}</color> ago.\nYour scanners do not pick up any additional anomalies that can be scanned. Try another sector.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你在 <color=#00ff00>{DeltaTimeToString(GetGameTimeInSec() - Eden_ScanDate)}</color> 之前扫描了这个星区.\n你的扫描器没有发现任何可扫描的异常. 换一个星区试试.

English:
@d0Name: <color=#00ffff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Site type: <color=#00ff00>{Eden_SiteType}</color>
Difficulty: <color=#ff0000>{Eden_SiteDifficulty}</color>
Undiscovered anomalies detected: <color=#ffff00>{Eden_AnomalyBonus + Eden_DummyValue}</color>
<color=#ff0000></color>Required probes: <color=#ffffff>{Eden_ProbeCount}</color> <color=#00ff00>{Eden_ProbeTypeLoc}</color>
Anomalous signatures detected. Launch probes to begin the scanning process. Probes must be in personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 Name: <color=#00ffff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
区域类型: <color=#00ff00>{Eden_SiteType}</color>
难度: <color=#ff0000>{Eden_SiteDifficulty}</color>
检测到未探明的异常: <color=#ffff00>{Eden_AnomalyBonus + Eden_DummyValue}</color>
<color=#ff0000></color>需要探针数量以及类型: <color=#ffffff>{Eden_ProbeCount}</color> <color=#00ff00>{Eden_ProbeTypeLoc}</color>
检测到异常信号,发射探针以开始扫描程序,探针必须置于背包中.

English: <color=#ff0000>I don't have enough probes on me.</color>
@q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>Scan complete.</color>\n<color=#00ff00></color><color=#34934c>Scan results placed in personal inventory or connected container.</color>\n<color=#34934c></color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ff00>扫描完成.</color>\n<color=#00ff00></color><color=#34934c>扫描结果已存入背包或连接的容器中.</color>\n<color=#34934c></color>

English:
@d0Scanner X: <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ProbePositionX}</color>
Scanner Y: <color=#00afff>{Eden_ProbePositionY}</color>
Scanner Z: <color=#34934c>{Eden_ProbePositionZ}</color>
Variance: <color=#ffff00>{Eden_ProbeDifference}</color>
<color=#ffff00></color>
Adjust the <color=#00ffff>X</color>, <color=#00afff>Y</color>, and <color=#34934c>Z</color> coordinates of your scan area up or down until the variance equals zero.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 Scanner X: <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ProbePositionX}</color>
Scanner Y: <color=#00afff>{Eden_ProbePositionY}</color>
Scanner Z: <color=#34934c>{Eden_ProbePositionZ}</color>
Variance: <color=#ffff00>{Eden_ProbeDifference}</color>
<color=#ffff00></color>
Adjust the <color=#00ffff>X</color>,<color=#00afff>Y</color>,and <color=#34934c>Z</color> coordinates of your scan area up or down until the variance equals zero.

English: @q0@d0<size=150%><color=#ffca0a>Are you sure you want to abandon your current expedition and lose all progress?</color></size>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <size=150%><color=#ffca0a>你确定要放弃远征吗,所有进度均会丢失?</color></size>

English: You are not currently on an expedition.
@d0@d0Welcome {PlayerName}.\nYour active expedition is {Eden_ExpeditionName}.\nYou can resume an active expedition, start a new one, or abandon your current one.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @d0 欢迎 {PlayerName}.\n您当前激活的远征是 {Eden_ExpeditionName}.\n你可以回到激活的远征中,开始新的远征,或放弃当前远征.

English: @d0You must abandon or complete your current expedition before you can start a new one.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 在开始新的远征之前你必须完成或放弃当前远征.

English: @d0Place the expedition report in your personal inventory and select an expedition to start it.\nStarting an expedition will consume the expedition report. You will not be able to start another expedition until you complete or abandon your current one.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 将远征报告置于背包中并选择一个远征以开始.\n开始一场远征会消耗远征报告. 在完成或放弃当前远征之前你都无法开启新的远征.
完成远征 (最好先连接到一个容器)

English:
Mission complete.
Use a science station to continue the expedition.
Chinese (simplified):
任务完成.
使用科学站以继续远征.

English: Hello! I don't currently do much around here. I am waiting for my orders and for that engineer Ravien to finish our scanning system.\nIn the future I may buy and sell various exploration supplies, but for now my stock is somewhat limited while we wait for him to stop slacking off.
Chinese (simplified): 你好! 我现在在这里没什么可做的.我正在等我的订单送到,以及工程师Ravien完成我们的扫描系统.\n将来我可能会收购或出售各种探索用补给品,但是在他摸鱼期间我的存货非常有限.

English: Do you have anything to trade?
Mission complete.\nUse a science station to complete the expedition and collect your report.
Chinese (simplified): 任务完成.\n使用科学站以完成远征并获取报告.

English: Your final expedition report has been added to your inventory or connected container.
Chinese (simplified): 您最终的远征报告已添加至你的背包或连接的容器.

English: @d0All mission progress has been cleared.\nYou are now free to start another expedition.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 所以任务进度均已清空.\n你可以开始其他的远征了.

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>Expedition final report added to your inventory or connected container.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>最终的远征报告已添加至你的背包或连接的容器.</color>

English: @d0This strange flower has grown considerably larger than the others.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这朵奇怪的花比其他花长得大得多.

English: How may this humble guardian aid you?
Chinese (simplified): 我这个谦卑的守护者可以如何帮助您?

English: I found this strange flower. Are you able to make use of it?
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了这朵奇怪的花,你能用上它吗?

English: Ah you have found a rare Solarium flower! These are quite useful. Please take this payment as gratitude.
Chinese (simplified): 啊,你发现了一朵稀有的日耀之花!这东西可太珍贵了,给,拿好你的报酬.

English: You have already taken a sample.
You are an enemy of our people and I will not speak with you.
Chinese (simplified): 你是我们的敌人,我拒绝和你交流.

English: Greetings, traveler. How may this humble brewmaster serve you on this fine day?
Chinese (simplified): 你好啊,旅行者. 多美好的一天啊,我这个谦卑的酿酒师能为您做些什么?

English: @d0A hive of flying insects. They look like they can sting. Probably not a good idea to mess with it unless you know what you're doing. Or go ahead and mess with them. It's a free galaxy, after all.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 一个满是飞虫的巢穴. 看起来就很能咬. 除非你头脑清醒否则最好不要去动他。又或者直接上手就完事了, 毕竟这个星系里一切都是自由的,不是吗.

English: Attempt to capture some of the stinging insects. <color=#ff0000>(Bad choice)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 试着去抓一些奇怪的虫子. <color=#ff0000>(并不是什么好选择)</color>

English: Leave the stinging alien bugs alone. (Safe choice)
Chinese (simplified): 远离那些奇怪的虫子. (安全的选择)

English: @d0Sticking your untrained hands into the hive was not a good idea. <color=#ff0000>You suffered several stings due to your incompetence.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 把你白嫩的小手伸进虫巢很明显不是什么好事. <color=#ff0000>由于你的无能,手被蛰了一堆包.</color>

English: Slowly back away from the hive. (safe choice)
Chinese (simplified): 慢慢远离虫巢. (安全的选择)

English: Attempt to capture some of the insects. <color=#ff0000>(Don't you learn?)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 再次尝试抓虫. <color=#ff0000>(不长记性是吧?)</color>

English: I gathered some insects for you.
Chinese (simplified): 我为你抓来了一些虫子.

English: If you have any more insects I will take them off your hands.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你还有虫子,我可以帮你把他们从手上拔下来.

English: Here. Take them, they look mean!
Chinese (simplified): 看,拿去吧,他们也太狠了了!

English: Never mind. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 没事了,我还想问点别的.

English:
Yes, friend, I could use your help.
As part of the fermentation process we rely on a species of insects native only to this planet. Recently we have lost most of our current stock from an unknown illness and could use replacements.
You can find them in caves scattered across this planet. Search the cave until you come across a small hive.
Be warned, friend, I will need to show you how to safely capture them.
Chinese (simplified):
没错我的朋友,我确实需要你的帮助.
为了进行发酵,我们需要本星球特有的一种原生昆虫. 最近由于某种未知的病原体我们失去了大部分的存货,因此急需补充.
你可以在星球上散布的洞穴里找到. 在洞穴里搜索,直到你找到虫巢.
注意看,我的朋友,我得告诉你怎么才能安全地抓住他们.

English: Please show me how to capture them safely.
Chinese (simplified): 请向我演示如何安全地抓住虫子

English: I already know how to capture them.
No thank you. I prefer not to get stung to death today.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢不用了. 我今天还没有准备好被蜇成猪头.

English: Watch carefully as I demonstrate.\n\nThe brewmaster demonstrates how to capture the insects from a hive without suffering stings.
Chinese (simplified): 好好看,好好学.\n\n酿造师演示了一下抓虫子而不被咬的过程.

English: Thank you. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你. 我想问点别的.

English: Thank you for showing me. I will bring you back some insects.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你的指导,我这就去帮你抓虫子.

English: Use your training to safely capture some of the insects.
Chinese (simplified): 利用你学到的方法抓虫子.

English: Don't shoot! I'm friendly! Please, I'm not with the XCorp anymore. We got a new director and he stole credit for my ideas and tried to have me killed!
Chinese (simplified): 别开枪! 自己人! 求你了,我已经不是XCorp的人了. 我们的新董事试图窃取我的点子还想把我做掉!

English:
When I learned that the director put me on a hit list I fled to this secret lab.
I want revenge. Perhaps we can help each other? I have developed a nasty computer virus that will rapidly spread among the XCorp subspace network and scramble their computer systems for weeks, but I do not dare show my face to install it myself.
If you were to take this virus and install it into a console on a XCorp Mainframe or XCorp Lab on this moon and return to me, I will reward you for your time.
What do you say, Terran?
Chinese (simplified):
当我意识到董事把我列入刺杀名单的时候,我就躲到了这个秘密实验室里.
我想要复仇. 也许我们可以互相帮助?我开发了一种令人超级恶心的病毒,它可以在XCorp子空间网络中迅速传播,并扰乱他们的计算机系统数周,但我可没有胆子不敢亲自露面安装它.
如果你把这种病毒安装到这个月球上的XCorp主机或 XCorp实验室的控制台中回来向我报告,我会好好报答你.
怎么说,地球人?

English: I thought Zirax were supposed to be loyal?
Chinese (simplified): 我还以为兹瑞克斯人都很忠诚?

English: Loyalty is to the empire. XCorp is ran by outsiders and deserve no respect!
Chinese (simplified): 忠诚那也是对帝国的,XCorp由外人经营,不值得尊重!

English: Here is a data chip with the computer virus. Install it and then get back to me. Kill anyone who gets in your way.\nOh and if you happen to run into the director, feel free to kill him too.
Chinese (simplified): 这个数据芯片里就是病毒了,去把他安上然后回来找我,把挡路的全干掉.\n哦对,如果你碰到那个董事,顺带也把他做掉吧.

English: Thank you for your help. I have been monitoring their communications and the panic and chaos is glorious! This will set back their research efforts for weeks.
Chinese (simplified): 非常感谢你的帮助,我一直在监视他们的通讯,真是完美的恐惧与混乱! 这会让他们的研究倒退好几周.
这并不意味着我们是朋友了.

English: Ah, you survived. Good. I believe this reward will be appropriate.
Chinese (simplified): 啊,你还活着. 很好,我觉得这些奖励应该够了.

English: This is all? Fine, goodbye then.
Chinese (simplified): 就这些了吗? 行吧,再见.

English: I see. I will help you.
Traitors deserve no help. You're on your own.
Chinese (simplified): 叛徒不配得到帮助,你自生自灭吧.

English: You have no idea what the passcode is.

<size=27px><color=#00ff00>Terminal Onl</color><color=#ff0000>ine. ERROR. ERROR. Subsystem stack overflow. </color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>Warning! Warning! Stack.tracenet.substack.//file.system.subtrace.XCorp.exe corrupted. Begin data purge? Yes/no. Yes. Purge begun. WARNING: all data will be purged from system. Continue?</color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>ALERT: substack.io.XCorp(filesysadmin).exe corrupt. Using backup!</color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>Warning: Error detected in previous error log. Delete database? Yes/No.</color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>Database deletion in progress. ERROR. ERROR. ERROR.</color></size>
Chinese (simplified):
<size=27px><color=#00ff00>终端在</color><color=#ff0000>线. 错误. 错误. 子系统堆栈溢出. </color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>Warning! Warning! Stack.tracenet.substack.//file.system.subtrace.XCorp.exe corrupted. Begin data purge? Yes/no. Yes. Purge begun. WARNING: all data will be purged from system. Continue?</color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>ALERT: substack.io.XCorp(filesysadmin).exe corrupt. Using backup!</color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>Warning: Error detected in previous error log. Delete database? Yes/No.</color></size>
<size=50%><color=#ff0000>Database deletion in progress. ERROR. ERROR. ERROR.</color></size>

English: Oh that's one nasty computer virus.

@d0<color=#00ffff>Message to U.C.H. High Command:</color>

Dear Mom and Pa, I'm loving it here. It's a bit boring at times but we don't have to worry about Zirax attacks or Polaris politics.
I've been reading some science books
Doctor Chan let me borrow to pass the time. I hope once I'm done with this assignment I could train to become a science officer. And after I get over this cold. With love, Avy
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00ffff>发往U.C.H.最高指挥部:</color>

亲爱的爸妈,我太喜欢这了.虽然有点无聊,但我们不必担心兹瑞克斯的攻击或极星的各种政策.
我最近读了点科学书籍
Chan博士借给我打发时间用的. 我希望一旦完成这项任务,就可以接受培训成为一名科学官员,当然还得熬过这次感冒之后。爱你们,Avy

English:
@d0<size=150%><color=#00ffff>Log 13:</color></size>
'See new worlds' they said.
'Discover ancient secrets' they said.
Now I'm stuck on some backwater ice dwarf, locked in my quarters for 'our safety'.
When U.C.H. said we'd be colonizing new planets, I expected some nice tropical paradise, not a frozen wasteland.
Project Eden? More like Project Freezin'!
@p9 @d0<size=150%><color=#00ffff>Log 14:</color></size>
Feel really sick. Like, really bad. I've called Dr. Chan but he hasn't answered. Been locked in my quarters for 8 hours now. Wait.
I just heard a scream outside my door. It sounded like Avi. What is going on?
I told them we should have left those alien ruins alone.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <size=150%><color=#00ffff>Log 13:</color></size>
他们说'放眼新世界' .
他们还说'发掘古老的秘密' .
现在可倒好,我被困在这个鸟不拉屎的冰矮星上,为了“安全起见”被锁在房间里.
之前U.C.H.说我们要殖民某个星球,我还以为是什么热带天堂,而不是这种冰冻废土.
伊甸园计划?不如叫急冻计划算了'!
@p9 @d0 <size=150%><color=#00ffff>Log 14:</color></size>
病得不轻,就,特别糟糕那种. 我给Dr. Chan打了电话但是他没回我.已经被锁在宿舍里8小时了,只能干等.
我刚刚听到门外有人尖叫,听起来像是Avi. 究竟发生了什么?
我早就告诉他们应该别管那些外星遗迹的.

English:
@d0<color=#00ffff>Commander Strickland's Log:</color>
I have confined the rest of the crew to their quarters both for their own safety and mine. They have begun acting irrational and violent ever since the 'incident' in the lab. One of our researchers fell ill and was transported via shuttle to the colony ship. We lost communication with the ship 2 days later. That was 5 days ago.
@p9 @d0<color=#00ff00>Access code required...</color>
<color=#ffffff>1947</color>
<color=#00ff00>Access code accepted. Command?</color>
<color=#ffffff>Initiate program Lockdown A-2</color>
<color=#00ff00>Lockdown program A-2 initiated...</color>
<color=#ffffff>Send message to UCHN-New Horizons.</color>
<color=#ff0000>Unable to establish communications link with ship. Please try again later...</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00ffff>Commander Strickland's Log:</color>
为了大家和我自身的安全,我把所有船员都关在了自己的房间里.自从实验室发生了“那件事”,他们的行为就开始变得没有理性且暴力. 我们的一位研究员病倒了,现在已经被送到殖民飞船上接受治疗. 2天之后我们就和殖民船失去了联络. 这已经是5天之前的事了.
@p9 @d0 <color=#00ff00>Access code required...</color>
<color=#ffffff>1947</color>
<color=#00ff00>访问码已接受. 指令?</color>
<color=#ffffff>Initiate program Lockdown A-2</color>
<color=#00ff00>Lockdown program A-2 initiated...</color>
<color=#ffffff>Send message to UCHN-New Horizons.</color>
<color=#ff0000>无法与飞船建立通讯. 请稍后重试...</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>Logs downloaded to data chip and placed into personal or connected inventory.</color>\nCommand?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>日志已下载至数据芯片并放入个人或连接的库存中.</color>\n指令?

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>Logs downloaded to data chip and placed into personal or connected inventory.</color>\nCommand?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>日志已下载至数据芯片并放入个人或连接的库存中.</color>\n指令?

English: @d0Captain's Log: Dr Weston, the nightmare he became, escaped in our shuttle. He was last seen warping to the nearby trade station. The civilians on board the station have no idea the pathogen he's carrying. He must be stopped.\n@p9 @d0There's something I must get off my chest. This is all my fault. U.C.H Command's fault. They didn't pick this planet as a colony site because of any strategic or industrial value. No, they picked it because of the alien ruins they knew were here. They knew of the existence of the alien virus. Called it The Infested. They knew what it was capable of and they wanted it for themselves.\n@p9 @d0I don't know if they were going to use it as a weapon or for medical research. All I know is they ordered me to risk the lives of those under my command and to keep it a secret.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 舰长日志:Weston博士,他逃出了穿梭机,成为了所有人的噩梦。最后一次看到他时,他正在翘曲到附近的贸易站。该站上的平民对他携带的病原毫不知情,我们必须必须阻止他.\n@p9 @d0 有件事我必须说出来。这都是我的错U.C.H 指挥部的错. 他们选择这个星球作为殖民地并不是因为有任何战略或工业价值。不,他们选择它是因为他们知道这里有外星遗迹。他们知道外星病毒的存在并称其为感染者。他们知道这东西有什么能力,他们自己也想得到它.\n@p9 @d0 我不知道他们是要把它用作武器还是用于医学研究。我只知道他们命令我冒着手下人的生命危险也要保守秘密.

English: @d0When the colonists found those alien pods frozen in the snow, I was the one who ordered them brought in to study. We came to Eden to start a new life, but all we've done here is release an ancient evil upon it.\n@p9 @d0Do not hold Project Eden responsible. Doctor Smith and the other project leaders didn't know our plan. I don't have much time left. Before I turn, there's something else you must know about our initial hyperspace jump into the Andromeda galaxy. Not everything is as it seems. The darkness we unleashed from the frozen tomb below doesn't just threaten our chances to colonize Eden. It threatens the very survival of the Terran civilization.\n@p9 @d0The ship computer analyzed the data from our initial hyperspace jump when we left Terra. It found... abnormalities. My mind clouds. I hear them now. The whispers. I feel my skin changing. My cells rip from each other. I don't remember what I was supposed to tell you. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. There's only one thing left to do now...
Chinese (simplified): @d0 当殖民者发现那些冰冻在雪中的外星荚舱时,就是我下令把它们带回来研究的。我们来到伊甸本是为了开始新的生活,但实际上我们的所作所为释放了这股古老的邪恶力量.\n@p9 @d0 这并不是伊甸园计划的问题。Smith博士和其他项目负责人并不知道我们的计划。我的时间不多了。在我转变之前,你必须明白关于我们最初进入仙女座星系的那次超空间跳跃的事情,并非一切都像看上去的那样。我们从冰冻坟墓中释放出的黑暗不仅威胁着我们殖民伊甸园的机会,还威胁着人类文明的生存.\n@p9 @d0 当我们离开地球时,飞船计算机分析了我们最初的超空间跳跃的数据。它发现了……某种异常。我已经神志不清了。我能听见它们,低语。我感觉我的皮肤在变化,细胞在互相撕裂,我不知道不记得我应该告诉你什么。对不起,我很抱歉,现在只剩下一件事要做...

English: This technician appeared to have died of blood loss. In his hands is a data pad with the following written on it:\n\nThey're in the vents! In the ceiling! Don't use your jetpacks and get too close to them or they come out!
Chinese (simplified): 这名技术人员似乎是失血过多而死,他的手里拿着一个数据板,上面写着以下内容:\n\n它们在通风口!在天花板里面!不要使用喷气背包靠近他们,否则它们会出来!

English: This cargo container appears to have been damaged by weapons fire.
Chinese (simplified): 这个集装箱似乎已被武器损坏.

English: This data pad shows a plan of attack on the station by a Zirax strike force.\nIt seems a significant battle took place here but there are no Zirax among the dead. Where did they go?
Chinese (simplified): 这个数据板显示了兹瑞克斯突击部队对空间站的攻击计划.\n这里似乎发生了一场惨烈的战斗,但死者中没有兹瑞克斯,他们去哪了?

English: The command section is locked with two officer level command codes.
Chinese (simplified): 指挥部被两个军官级指挥代码锁定.

English: A Terran patient came in today complaining of headache, fever, muscle pains, and an uncontrollable urge to murder.\nI prescribed him two Galaxynol and told him to call me in the morning if symptoms do not improve.
Chinese (simplified): 一个地球人病患来抱怨头疼,发烧,肌肉疼痛,同时伴随有无法控制的谋杀欲望.\n我给他开了两剂星系宁,告诉他如果明天还没有好点再联络我

English:
You find two entries of note in the database, one for the chief medical officer and one for the chief engineer.
It appears the medical officer was last seen in the medical bay, while the chief engineer was last seen in his quarters.

Perhaps searching those two areas of the station will allow you to override the lockout.
Chinese (simplified):
你在数据库中找到了两个记录条目,一个为首席医疗官,另一个是总工程师.
看上去医疗官最后一次出现在医疗舱,而总工程师最后一次出现在他的住处.

也许搜索站点的这两个区域可以让您解除锁定。

English: @d0This is currently the end of the mission.\nMore content is planned later.\nPlease make sure you have plenty of storage space in your personal inventory before collecting your reward.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 当前版本的任务到这里就结束了.\n以后可能会添加更多内容.\n在领取奖励之前,请确保您的个人背包中有足够的存储空间.

English: @d0The console does not respond to your touch.\n<color=#ff0000>(You must be on the last step of the story mission The Progenitors - Part 1 to access this console)</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 控制台对您的触摸没有反应.\n<color=#ff0000>(请确保自己处于任务:先祖 - 第一部分的结尾以访问控制台)</color>

English: @d0This appears to be the communications console for the station.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这似乎是站点的通讯日志.

English:
@d0<color=#ffffff>Communications log entry 17423-A78:</color>
<color=#ffca0a>STATION:</color> Station control to Terran shuttle, you do not have clearance to dock. Change course and hold position.
<color=#ffca0a>STATION:</color> Station control to Terran shuttle, repeat, hold position!
<color=#00afff>TERRAN SHUTTLE:</color> Sickness... Spreading...
<color=#ffca0a>STATION:</color> Station control to medical bay, get a team down to the hangar ASAP! Today is going to be one of those days.
<color=#ffffff>END LOG</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#ffffff>通讯日志条目 17423-A78:</color>
<color=#ffca0a>站点:</color> 站点管控呼叫地球人飞船,你无权进行停靠,立刻停止前进并改变航向.
<color=#ffca0a>站点:</color> 站点管控呼叫地球人飞船,重复一遍,停止移动!
<color=#00afff>地球飞船!:</color> 病痛... 传播...
<color=#ffca0a>站点:</color> 站台控制到医疗区,尽快派小队前往机库! 今天多半是那种日子了.
<color=#ffffff>END LOG</color>

English:
@d0<color=#ffffff>Communications log entry 17445-D8:</color>
<color=#ffca0a>STATION:</color> Station control to unknown Zirax vessel, you are in violation of the Civilian Free Trade Agreement. Withdraw to a distance of 10,000 meters and state your purpose.
<color=#ff0000>UNKNOWN ZIRAX:</color> We are a vessel from house Abyssal of the Zirax Empire. We will be conducting a scan of your station. Any interference will result in immediate destruction of your station.
<color=#ffca0a>STATION:</color> Negative. You have no authority here. The CFTA clearly-
<color=#ff0000>UNKNOWN ZIRAX:</color> It is you who are in violation. Our scans have detected an infection of Terran origin on board your station. You are to cease all traffic in and out of your station and institute a lock down effective immediately or we will open fire.
@p9 @d0<color=#ffca0a>STATION:</color> We are a lawful civilian trading station. Please, we have no weapons. We will enact a medical quarantine!
<color=#ff0000>UNKNOWN ZIRAX:</color> It is too late. We will board and purify your station. You will pay for your mistake to help the Terran with your lives.
<color=#ffffff>END LOG.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#ffffff>通讯日志条目 17445-D8:</color>
<color=#ffca0a>站点:</color> 站点管控呼叫未知兹瑞克斯飞船,你违反了平民自由贸易协定. 后退至10,000米以外并表明来意.
<color=#ff0000>未知兹瑞克斯:</color> 我们是隶属于兹瑞克斯帝国阿比赛尔家族的飞船. 我们会对你们的空间站进行扫描. 任何干扰行为都将导致空间站的毁灭.
<color=#ffca0a>站点:</color> 拒绝,你在这里没有执法权. CFTA 明确-
<color=#ff0000>未知兹瑞克斯:</color> 违反协定的是你. 我们的扫描显示你方空间站里有来自地球的感染者. 您必须停止所有进出站点的交通,并立即实施封锁,否则我们将开火.
@p9 @d0 <color=#ffca0a>站点:</color> 我们只是个守法的平民空间站. 请不要开火,我们没有武器. 我们会进行医学隔离!
<color=#ff0000>未知兹瑞克斯:</color> 太迟了.我们会登上并净化你们的空间站.你会为了帮助地球人这个错误付出生命的代价.
<color=#ffffff>日志结束.</color>

English: @d0Communications log entry 17447-A2: STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY APPROACH OR DOCK. STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY APPROACH OR DOCK. STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY APPROACH OR DOCK. STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY- @p9 @d0The signal appears to cut off and be replaced by a new one containing only a single word: Awaken The signal seems to be transmitted on a high frequency subspace band directed at a star system called Hades.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 通讯日志条目 17447-A2: 站点: 警告所有附近船只:站点正在进行隔离. 禁止任何飞船靠近或入港. 站点: 警告所有附近船只:站点正在进行隔离. 禁止任何飞船靠近或入港. 站点:警告所有附近船只:站点正在进行隔离. 禁止任何飞船靠近或入港. 站点: 警告所有附近船只:站点正在进行隔离. 禁止任何飞船- @p9 @d0 信号似乎被切断并被一个只包含一个词的新信号取代: 觉醒吧 该信号似乎是在一个高频亚空间频带上传输的,指向一个名为哈迪斯的恒星系.

English: @d0The encrypted station communication log has been placed in your personal or connected inventory.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 加密的站点通信日志已放置在您的个人的背包或连接的容器中.

English: @d0Fire suppression systems have been disabled. Lockdown lifted. Difficulty set to 1 player. Difficulty increases number of enemies but has no effect on rewards. Difficulty in COOP mode is set 1 higher due to a technical issue.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 灭火系统已禁用. 解除封锁. 难度设置为 1 玩家. 难度影响敌人数量但不影响奖励. 合作模式的难度由于技术原因会自动+1.

English: @d0Fire suppression systems have been disabled. Lockdown lifted. Difficulty set to 2 players. Difficulty increases number of enemies but has no effect on rewards. Difficulty in COOP mode is set 1 higher due to a technical issue.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 灭火系统已禁用. 解除封锁. 难度设置为 2 玩家. 难度影响敌人数量但不影响奖励. 合作模式的难度由于技术原因会自动+1.

English: @d0Fire suppression systems have been disabled. Lockdown lifted. Difficulty set to 3+ players. Difficulty increases number of enemies but has no effect on rewards. Difficulty in COOP mode is set 1 higher due to a technical issue.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 灭火系统已禁用. 解除封锁. 难度设置为 3+ 玩家. 难度影响敌人数量但不影响奖励. 合作模式的难度由于技术原因会自动+1.

English: @d0This cargo container may contain valuable goods.\nMake sure you are connected via logistics to a storage container with plenty of free space.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个货物容器可能含有高价值货物.\n确保你连接到了有充足空间的容器.

English: @d0This console controls the fire suppression system that is keeping the inner hangar doors closed.\nDisabling it should allow access to the rest of the station.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 该控制台控制着保持内部机库门关闭的灭火系统.\n禁用后可以获准访问站点的其余部分.

English: Play Alexander Jordan - A New Beginning.
Chinese (simplified): 播放 Alexander Jordan - A New Beginning.

English: @d0This controls the ambient music played throughout the ship.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个装置可以控制整个船上播放的环境音乐.

English: @d0This controls the video played on the briefing room screen.\n\nNote: internet access required for some video.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个装置可以控制简报室屏幕上播放的视频.\n\n注意: 有些视频可能需要网络.
@d0 这个装置可以控制全息显示

English: Some schematics you can purchase from me.\nOthers you may rarely find in valuable containers, from mission rewards, or other traders.
Chinese (simplified): 你可以从我这购买一些图纸\n其他的你得从高价值的容器,任务奖励,或是其他商人那里获取

English: I want to ask something else.
@d0This organism looks delicate. Taking a sample may destroy it.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这些组织看起来十分纤细. 取样可能会直接毁掉它.

English: @d0There is nothing more to find here.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这里没有什么要找的了

English: @d0The scanner appears to be calibrated for biological samples.\nPerhaps presenting it with an interesting sample will open the door? You might find a suitable sample somewhere in this cave.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 看起来这个扫描器专门为生物组织进行了校准.\n也许放入某种样本可以打开这扇门?你也许可以在洞穴中某处找到合适的样本.
放入奇特的生物荧光组织

English: @d0The scanner appears interested in the sample you presented and opens the door.\nIn the process of scanning the sample was destroyed.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 扫描仪对您展示的样本表现出兴趣,并打开了门。\n在扫描样本的过程中,样本被销毁了。

English: @d0The scanner does not appear interested in what you offered.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 扫描器似乎对你放入的东西没有反应

English: Offer a drop of your own blood. <color=#ff0000>(-5hp)</color>

@d0TO DO LIST:
- Clean airshaft 4.
- Wipe down conduits.
- Clean bathroom floor.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 待办事项列表:
- 清理4号通风井.
- 擦拭管道.
- 洗厕所.

English: @d0<color=#ffca0a>I don't know how they expect us to keep working like this. We have been pulling double and even triple shifts for weeks. The men are exhausted. Someone is going to make a mistake.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffca0a>我不知道他们怎么认为我们能这样工作下去,我们一周要干两班甚至三班的活。这些人已经累坏了,肯定有人会出错.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ffca0a>It has happened. There was a containment breach and the bean counters in the control room activated the fail safe.</color>\n<color=#ffca0a>The robotic guards activated and have been hunting down anything that moves. I fear I may be next.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffca0a>终于还是发生了,收容被突破了,控制室里的管理员启动了失效保险.</color>\n<color=#ffca0a>机器人卫兵现在会猎杀一切会动的东西. 我估计就是下一个了.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Control Station is in lock down mode. Security key required.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>控制站处于封锁模式,需要安全密钥.</color>

English: \n@d0Work order request for worker 53958430489-B9:The ventilator in ventilation shaft 7 is making a funny noise and interrupting worker sleep. Please repair or replaced as needed.Security access code is {SecurityKey}. Do not give this key to anyone.
Chinese (simplified): \n@d0 工作指令已下达至工作人员53958430489-B9:七号通风井中的换气扇会发出奇怪的声音,非常影响工作人员的睡眠,请按需求进行维修或者替换.安全访问码 {SecurityKey}. 请勿告诉任何其他人.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 1:\nToday was a good day. We got the operation up and running much faster than expected. We should be ready to extract the first cryo pod by the end of the week.\nI cannot foresee any complications.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 首席科学家日志 1:\n今天是个好日子. 我们的行动进展远快于预期,估计这周结束前就可以提取第一个冷冻藏了.\n我完全看不出来任何难度.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 2:\nThere were minor power fluctuations in the grid earlier today. Probably due to a power conduit being out of alignment.\nI have assigned a technician to do a full diagnostic on the grid. The last thing we need is a power failure in the middle of our extraction process.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 首席科学家日志2:\n今天稍早的时候,电网中出现了小幅度的能量波动,也许是能量通路有点失准.\n我已经安排了一个技师去对整个网络进行诊断,发掘过程中最糟糕的事莫过于停电了.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 3:\nI have instituted mandatory double shifts for all employees. We fell behind schedule after several members of the team stayed in their bunks after complaining of being sick.\nWe do not have any medical facilities so if they want to be good for nothing lazy bums they can wait for the next transport back to a station.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 首席科学家日志3:\n我已经为所有雇员制订了强制性两班制. 自从几名成员说自己生病卧床不起之后,我们已经远远落后于计划了.\n我们没有医疗设施,所以如果他们甘愿成为一无是处的懒惰流浪汉,就去坐下一班运输机回空间站吧.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 4:\nThe power fluctuations have gotten worse. And to make a bad situation even worse our chief engineer has quit after complaining of being too sick to work.\nI have put the entire team on mandatory triple shifts. If they don't like it they can take it up with the contract they signed.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 首席科学家日志4:\n能量波动更加严重了;雪上加霜的是我们的首席工程师因为病重退出了团队.\n我不得不让整个团队三班倒. 就算他们不喜欢这样,也得看看自己签的合同.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 5: The cryo pod we have been attempting to safely extract for the past month was dropped and cracked open. I can only assume the entire facility has been compromised and have ordered the code black emergency protocol. The employee handbook mentions this is to be used only in the case of containment failure. Strangely this protocol activated our security droids. I am not sure how much help they will be dealing with a biological hazard like this but I supp The message was abruptly cut short.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 首席科学家日志5: 我们这个月一直试图安全提取的冷冻舱摔烂了. 我不得不假设整个设施都暴露并启动了黑色紧急协议. 员工手册有提到这个协议只能用于收容失效. 奇怪的是它启动了我们的安保机器人.我不好说他们对处理生物灾害有什么帮助不过我猜 信息被中断.

English: @d0This door seems to be controlled by a scanner.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这扇门似乎受到扫描器控制

English: @d0Activating this beacon will signal a UCH Research Vessel to warp in to this sector 1000 meters away from your current position.\nMake sure you are far away from any space stations, asteroids, or other obstacles to lower the risk of collision.\nBeacons are one time use. Are you sure you want to activate the beacon?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 激活这个信标将会向UCH研究船发出信号,使其在您当前位置1000米外的这个扇区进行翘曲。请确保您远离任何空间站、小行星或其他障碍物,以降低碰撞的风险。信标是一次性使用的。您确定要激活信标吗?

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>A UCH Research Vessel was already called to this sector.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>UCH研究船已经被召唤到这个星区。</color>

English:
@d0<color=#00afff>Hi J, </color>
<color=#00afff>I know you were critical about that whole cult thing, but believe me I was right! There are incredible opportunities for us here!</color>
<color=#00afff>I am standing in front of a machine that can do all sorts of chemical magic to that 'people goo' they are so obsessed with! I am sure I can reconfigure it to create some really hot stuff for our illustrious clients. That will make us rich in no time!</color>
<color=#00afff>Just have to figure out how that thing works...</color>
<color=#00afff>Until we meet again,</color>
<color=#00afff>K</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00afff>Hi J, </color>
<color=#00afff>我知道你对邪教的事持批判态度,但是相信我没错的! 这里有绝佳的机会在等着我们!</color>
<color=#00afff>我现在面前这台机器就能对他们特别痴迷的“人酱”产生各种神奇的化学效应! 我确信我可以进行重新配置,为我们尊贵的的客户创造一些炙手可热的东西. 用不了多久我们就发财啦!</color>
<color=#00afff>我要做的仅仅是搞清楚它是怎么运作的...</color>
<color=#00afff>回见,</color>
<color=#00afff>K</color>

English: @d0This beacon is a short range radio repeater meant to receive signals and relay it to other locations in the system. It's likely part of a chain of such repeaters.\nIt may be possible to trace the signal back to its source if you activate this beacon, though this will also alert whomever is monitoring the radio network.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 该信标是一个短程无线电中继器,用于接收信号并将其传递到星系中的其他位置. 它可能是一系列中继器链中的一部分.\n如果您激活此信标,则有可能可以追溯信号的来源, 尽管这样做也会惊动任何正在监视无线电网络的人。

English: @d0This is another short range radio repeater. You can use it to trace the signal to the next beacon.\nIt appears the generators are rigged to blow if any tampering is detected.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这是另一个短程无线电中继器。你可以用它来追踪信号至下一个信标.\n看起来发电机被设定为为在检测到任何篡改时爆炸.

English: @d0This beacon seems to be the last of the radio repeaters. Activating it will pinpoint the source of the signal and the generators will probably explode like the last one.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个信标似乎是最后一个无线电中继器。激活它将指明信号源,发电机可能会像上一个一样爆炸

English: @d0You cannot access this console. There may be a beacon somewhere in this sector you need to activate first.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你无法访问这个控制台. 需要首先激活该区域某处的信标

English: @d0You were able to obtain the unlock codes for the stash.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你得以获取了藏匿处的密码。

English: @d0@q0Before you can disable the fire suppression system you should check the dead worker's data pad for any information about what's going on.\nPerhaps it will also contain vitally important tactical information that will help you explore the station. You really should read it.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @q0 在禁用灭火系统之前,你应该检查死去工人的数据平板以获取有关当前事件的任何信息.\n 也许它还会包含 非常重要 的战术信息,有助于你探索空间站. 最好还是读一下.

English: <color=#00ff00>Read the worker's data pad. (You might live)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>阅读工人的数据平板. (你大概还有的活)</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Do not read it. (You will probably die horribly)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>就不读. (你大概会死的很难看)</color>

English: @d0@q0Typed on the worker's data pad is the following warning: They're in the vents! In the ceiling! Do not use your jetpack and get too close to them or they will come out of the vents! They are never-ending! I killed hundreds and they just kept coming! They only stopped when I landed back on the floor. @p9 @d0@q0The place is filled with egg sacs and alien nests! He's taken over the main control room. For some reason, those who tried to fight just outside of the room where he was were just overrun with those creatures! Heed my advice, and if you choose to face him, stay in the room you fight him in! If you must leave, travel back to the upper hangar! Don't stay just outside his room! @p9 @d0@q0-Be careful using your jetpack. It can keep you out of range of melee enemies but may attract the attention of ranged spiders from the vents. It might be safer to leave your jetpack off. -When facing whomever is in the control room, stay inside the room they are in. If you must retreat, do so all the way back to the upper hangar. -If you see alien eggs or nests, destroy them before they can spawn additional creatures. -The schematics of the station show several repair stations. Make use of them to keep your armor repaired as armor loses protection based on it's durability level and double check you're using the right boosts! -You must kill the boss with a player weapon otherwise the boss fight will bug.
<color=#00ff00>I understand, IDA, and will follow your tactical advice.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我明白了,IDA,我会听从你的战术建议.</color>

English: @d0@q0IDA:\nAre you sure you want to skip reading the worker's data pad, Commander? I cannot guarantee your safety if you don't let me analyze it for tactical information. You will be walking in blind and will probably die. Horribly. And slowly. And probably painfully. Don't worry, I will still be here when you wake up in a fresh clone.\nAre you sure you want to skip reading the extremely important data pad?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @q0 IDA:\n指挥官,您确定要跳过堆工人数据平板的读取吗?如果你不让我分析它以获取战术信息,我无法保证你的安全。你有可能会漫无目地冲进去,然后以极其缓慢但恐怖的方式死去。而且可能非常痛苦。不过别担心,当你在全新的克隆躯体中醒来时,我仍会在这里等着。\n 您确定要跳过阅读极其重要的数据板吗?

English: <color=#00ff00>Fine. I will read it. Because I don't like dying.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>好的。我会读读看,我可没兴趣送死.</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>I don't need to read. Let me go in blind and die.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>我不需要读什么东西。让我冲上去送就完了.</color>

English: @d0This is the primary communications console for the station. Best to leave it alone if you don't know what you're doing.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这里是空间站的主要通信控制台.如果您不知道自己在做什么的时候最好不要自己瞎搞.

English: @d0This is the primary communications console for the station.\nYou should probably contact Traders Guild security and report what happened.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这是该站的主要通信控制台.

English: @d0@q0This is Security, what is going on over there?\nYou explain what happened.\nThat is quite the story. Thank you for taking care of the situation. The Traders Guild will happily reimburse you for your time. Please accept this reward of 50,000 credits deposited directly to your account.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @q0 这里是安全中心,那里到底发生了什么?\n你解释了一下发生了什么.\n这真是个有趣的故事。感谢您伸出援手.贸易商会很乐意补偿您损失的时间.并存入您账户的50,000积分作为奖励,请接收.

English: @d0This seems to be the bandit commander's data pad.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这似乎是劫掠者指挥官的数据平板.

English: View contents of the data pad.
I have been waiting for this loader android to get this pallet hooked to the crane forever!\nThese robotic assistants were cheap but they've been giving us nothing but problems since day 1!
