Chinese (simplified): 我一直在等这个装载机机器人把这个托盘挂在起重机上!\n这些机器人助手很便宜,但从第一天起就一直给我们带来麻烦!

English: I guess you get what you pay for.
Chinese (simplified): 你出多少钱我给你多少东西.

English: Greetings. I am Robotic Loading Assistant RLA-{Eden_NPCName}.\nPlease excuse me as I am currently performing intense mathematical calculations to determine the best weight distribution pattern to lift this cargo pallet with the most efficiency possible according to the known laws of physics.
Chinese (simplified): 问候.我是机器人装载助理RLA-{Eden_NPCName}.\n请原谅,我目前正在进行密集的数学计算,以确定最佳的重量分布模式,以根据已知的物理定律以最高的效率抬起这个货物托盘.

English: Thank you, meat bag-I mean, carbon based life form.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你,肉袋,我是说碳基生命形式.

English: I've been waiting in line for 2 hours! 2 hours! How long does it take someone to go to the bathroom?\nI'm about to call security...
Chinese (simplified): 我已经排了两个小时的队了!2小时!一个人上厕所要花多长时间?\n我要呼叫安保人员了…

English: I'm terribly sorry to hear that.
Chinese (simplified): 听到这个消息我非常难过.

English: I heard someone stole the bathroom key. Can you believe it?\nWhat is the galaxy coming to...
Chinese (simplified): 我听说有人偷了浴室钥匙.你能相信吗?\n银河系怎么变成这副德行了?
很遗憾听到这个消息.再见.

English: Yes! Or so I heard! From one of the loader androids, who heard it from a dockworker. I think they overheard two officers talking about it and...\nWell you get the point. I bet some smuggler stole it and stashed it somewhere on the station.\n@p9Say, my boss is an influential manager at PentaCorp. If you happen to find the bathroom key lying around somewhere and bring it to me, I'll put in a good word for you, help out your reputation with Polaris. It could be anywhere on this station. What do you say?
Chinese (simplified): 是的!至少我是这么听说的!一个装填机器人,从一个码头工人那里听到的.我想他们无意中听到两个警官在谈论这件事,然后…\n你明白我的意思了.我打赌是某个走私犯偷了它藏在车站的某个地方.\n@p9 嘿,我的老板是PentaCorp一位很有影响力的经理.如果你碰巧在什么地方找到浴室的钥匙,把它带给我,我会为你美言几句,帮你在极星的名声.这玩意可能在这个空间站的任何地方.你说呢?

English: <color=#00ff00>Is this the key you are looking for? </color><color=#00ff00>(+150 Polaris Rep)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>这是您要找的钥匙吗?</color><color=#00ff00>(+150极星声望)</color>

English: Yes! YES! This is it!\nNow I just have to wait for these other people to leave the line so I can go in without them noticing otherwise it's going to be a mad stampede!\nDon't you worry I will make sure to tell my boss about your heroic deed today.
Chinese (simplified): 是的!是的!就是这东西!\n现在我只需要等其他人离开队伍,这样我就可以在他们不注意的情况下进去,否则会发生疯狂的踩踏事件!别担心,我一定会把你今天的英勇事迹告诉我的老板.

English: Uggghhhh. I really have to go!
Sorry to hear that. Perhaps you should see a doctor about that.
Chinese (simplified): 很遗憾听到这个消息.也许你应该去看医生.

English: Wait, didn't I already get you the bathroom key?
Chinese (simplified): 等等,我不是已经给你浴室钥匙了吗?

English: The alien leans in to whisper.\nGot to keep up appearances you know. Can't let them know that I have it.\nKeep it between us, yes?
Chinese (simplified): 外星人俯身低语.\n你知道的,得装模作样.不能让他们知道我拿到了.别让别人知道,好吗?

English: Got it. Well, not really, but I got it.
Chinese (simplified): 明白了.虽然我有点楞逼,但我懂了.

English: Oh these blue barrels next to me? Deuterium straight from the Solitude region.\nUsed to power all kinds of advanced mining equipment.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,我旁边的这些蓝色木桶?这是来自无人区的氘.\n用于驱动各种先进的采矿设备.

English: Deuterium? How do you mine that?
Deu-what? Too science sounding for me. I'm leaving now.
Chinese (simplified): 你说什么?对我来说太科学了.我现在要走了.

English: Easy with some ice mining drills from the Free Colonists. Picked a pair up at one of their scrapyards in a hot star system, or I think there's someone who might sell a schematic to create your own.\nYou will need a heavy duty mining ship with a lot of cargo space however so best go prepared.
Chinese (simplified): 用一些自由殖民者的冰采集钻头就可以了.去高温恒星系统的拆解船坞里弄一套,或者我想有人可能会卖一个示意图让你自己建造一套.\n为了做好准备,你还需要一艘重型采矿船,有很多货物空间的那种.

English: Have any tips for ice mining?
Chinese (simplified): 对冰矿采集有什么建议吗?

English: Fascinating, but I really must be going.
Chinese (simplified): 真有意思,但我真的得走了.

English: Thank you for the advice. Good luck to you as well.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的建议.也祝你好运.

English: Easy... Easy... Just a few centimeters to the left. No, the other left!\nOh, what do you want? Can't you see that I'm busy?
Chinese (simplified): 小心……小心……向左边移动几厘米处.不,是另一边!\n混蛋,你想要什么?你没看见我很忙吗?

English: Are you sure it's safe to stand there?
Chinese (simplified): 你确定站在那里安全吗?

English: I will leave you alone then.
It's YOUR safety you'll need to worry about if you don't mind your own business!\nNow get lost before I have them drop this barrel on your head!
Chinese (simplified): 多管闲事,你需要担心的是你的安全!在我让他们用枪管砸你的头之前快滚开!

English: It's hard work but the pay is decent.
Chinese (simplified): 这工作很辛苦,但薪水还不错.

English: Watch where you're going!\nSheesh. They'll let just anybody in these days.
Chinese (simplified): 你要看路!现在谁都可以进去.

English: ...The Setesh guard's nose drips. Ha ha ha ha ha ha! Hah hauah!
Chinese (simplified): …这是塞特什守卫的鼻涕.哈哈哈哈哈哈哈!哈hauah !

English: I worry about all the bandit recent bandit attacks.
Chinese (simplified): 我担心最近的劫掠者袭击.

English: These new androids are worthless! They break down every other day.
Chinese (simplified): 这些新的机器人毫无价值!它们每隔一天就会出故障.

English: I heard your kind has research vessels scattered throughout the galaxy. I want to visit one someday.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说你们的研究船散布在银河系各处.我想有一天去参观.

English: If I have to listen to my boss complain one more time I am going to throw myself out an airlock!
Chinese (simplified): 如果我再听老板抱怨一次,我就把自己扔出气闸!

English: Freighter captains are so impatient.\nThe alien glares at you.
Chinese (simplified): 货轮舰长都很不耐烦.\n这位外星人在盯着你看.

English: The last ship I worked on was raided by bandits. I was the only survivor.\nThe manager of this station took me on and gave me a job when everyone else had given up.
Chinese (simplified): 我工作的最后一艘船遭到了海盗的袭击.我是唯一的幸存者.当别人都放弃的时候,这个空间站的管理者看中了我,给了我一份工作.

English: If you want to work for Polaris take my advice and don't. The pay might be good but you work long hours and get very few days off.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你想为极星公司工作,那就听我一句劝.薪水可能不错,但你工作时间很长,休息时间很少.

English: I love working for Polaris. The pay is good but you do have to work a lot.\nI am saving up to retire on a small moon by the time I'm 140.
Chinese (simplified): 我喜欢为极星公司工作.薪水不错,但你得干很多活.我正在攒钱,准备在140岁的时候在一个小月球上退休.

English: Last week a freighter came in with an infestation of space snakes.\nWhat? Don't look at me like that. Space snakes are totally a thing. No, I haven't seen one.
Chinese (simplified): 上周一艘货轮来了一群太空蛇.\n什么?别那样看着我.太空蛇确实存在.不,我没见过.

English: I heard The Syndicate has been hiding supply caches all throughout neutral space.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说联合会把补给藏在了中立空间.

English: My job here is simple. Make sure everybody else does their job.
Chinese (simplified): 我在这里的工作很简单.确保其他人各司其职.

English: My job is to help coordinate space traffic. If you'll excuse me I should get back to it.
Chinese (simplified): 我的工作是帮助协调太空交通.如果你不介意的话,我该回去了.

English: Freighter 6573-A, slow your speed! Repeat, slow your speed! Don't make me tell you again!
Chinese (simplified): 6573-A货轮,减速!重复,减速!别逼我再说一遍!

English: I can't give you a tour of operations right now, sorry.
Chinese (simplified): 抱歉,我现在不能带你参观工厂.

English: Working in command comes with some nice benefits, such as being able to tell nosy customers like yourself to get lost.
Chinese (simplified): 指挥工作有一些好处,比如可以告诉像你这样爱管闲事的顾客走开.

English: If one more freighter captain calls asking what's their ETA I am going to lose it!
Chinese (simplified): 如果再有货轮舰长打电话问他们的预计到达时间,我就要失去理智了!

English: Cargo Shuttle Nomad Aspen, you are now clear for docking. Enjoy your stay.\nOh, hi. What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy?
Chinese (simplified): 货运飞船游牧阿斯彭号,现在可以对接了.祝您住得愉快.\n剧,嗨.你想要什么?你没看见我很忙吗?

English: Someone really needs to find that bathroom key or just cut open the door.
Chinese (simplified): 真的需要有人找到浴室钥匙或者直接把门打开.

English: Another freighter got hit by bandits yesterday. That makes 4 in the last week.
Chinese (simplified): 昨天又有一艘货船被海盗袭击了.上周已经有四次了.

English: You there! Run down to the dock and find out what's taking them so long!\nOh, you're not my employee. My apologies.
Chinese (simplified): 那边的那位!跑到码头去,看看他们怎么花了这么长时间!不,你不是我的雇员.我的歉意.
机器人注视着你的一举一动..

English: Scanning... No contraband detected. Have a pleasant day.
Chinese (simplified): 扫描……未发现违禁品.祝您愉快.

English: All visitors are required to follow station policy.
Chinese (simplified): 所有访客必须遵守空间站政策.

English: Small talk protocol active.\nWhat is for lunch? Did you see the game? How about that weather.\nSmall talk protocol complete.
Chinese (simplified): 闲聊协议生效.午饭吃什么?你看比赛了吗?那天气怎么样?\n闲聊协议完成.

English: @d0Welcome to the Project Eden personal settings menu.\nIn this menu you can change certain personal settings within the scenario. If you have an admin access card you may also access global scenario settings.\nPlease note that if your player character data is wiped (such as using the chatbot to reset your character data on a server) these options will also be reset.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到Project Eden的个人设置菜单.\n在此菜单中,您可以更改场景中的某些个人设置.如果你有管理员权限卡,那么你也可以访问场景的全局设定\n请注意,如果你的玩家角色数据被擦除(比如用聊天机器人重置服务器上的角色数据),这些选项也将被重置.

English: @d0This setting can disable some of the random NPC flavor text that shows at the top of the screen when looking at certain NPCs.\nThis will only affect some of the flavor dialog in the Project Eden POIs. It will not affect non-Project Eden POIs or older dialog.\nSome flavor text does give hints and might be useful.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个设置可以禁用一些随机NPC风格的文本,当看到某些NPC时,这些文本会显示在屏幕顶部.这只会影响Project Eden POI中的一些风格对话框.它不会影响非伊甸园项目poi或旧的对话框.\n一些风格文本给出了很有用的提示.
<color=#00ffff>访问全局设置菜单(仅限管理员)</color>

English: If you're interested in some cash and reputation try taking out some of the local bandits.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你对现金和名誉感兴趣,那就干掉当地的海盗吧.

English: I left Polaris to join the Free Colonists and it was the best decision I ever made. I am my own boss now.
Chinese (simplified): 我离开极星加入了自由殖民者这是我做过的最好的决定.我现在是自己的老板了.

English: I left Polaris to join the Free Colonists and it was the best decision I ever made. I am my own boss now.
Chinese (simplified): 我离开极星加入了自由殖民者这是我做过的最好的决定.我现在是自己的老板了.

English: The Traders Guild is greedy. Polaris exploits their workers. And the empire is oppressive. Better to strike out on your own.
Chinese (simplified): 贸易行会很贪婪.极星公司剥削他们的工人.帝国是压迫性的.最好还是自己闯荡吧.

English: Be careful if you go exploring the galaxy's edge. Many ships never return.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你去探索银河系的边缘,一定要小心.许多船一去不复返.

English: You can sometimes pick up passengers at orbital habitats who are willing to pay for a ride.
Chinese (simplified): 你有时可以在轨道栖息地搭载愿意付费的乘客.

English: These bandit attacks are getting worse and worse. Just heard my cousin's ice freighter was almost caught in a warp disruption field last week. Barely escaped.
Chinese (simplified): 这些海盗的袭击越来越严重了.我刚听说我表哥的冰船上周差点被曲速干扰力场困住.勉强逃脱了.

English: Somebody needs to hunt down all those bandits.
Chinese (simplified): 得有人去追捕那些海盗.

English: I heard there's someone on a Polaris Distribution Center that has a prototype schematic for powerful mining devices.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说极星配送中心有人有一个强大采矿设备的原型图.

English: Be on the lookout for strange anomalies.
Chinese (simplified): 要注意奇怪的异常现象.

English: I am glad I came to {Player.PlayfieldName} to look for work. I had a rough first few months but I am starting to get things together.
Chinese (simplified): 我很高兴我来到了{Player.PlayfieldName}找工作.刚开始的几个月我过得很艰难,但现在我开始振作起来了.

English: @d0You must successfully breach the security for both the left and right consoles before you may use this console.
Chinese (simplified): 在使用这个控制台之前,您必须成功地攻破左侧控制台和右侧控制台的安全锁.

English: Welcome to our humble home among the stars. I am the manager of this home away from home here in {Player.PlayfieldName}. How may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们在星星间的简陋的家.我是{Player.PlayfieldName}这个故乡之外的新家的管理者.我能为您做些什么?

English: No I am afraid not. Maybe try another habitat.
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕没有.也许可以试试别的栖息地.

English: Thank you for checking. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢您的查询.我想问点别的.

English: Yes I do have a crew looking for passage to a factory.\nYou will need to be connected via logistics to a cargo hold with at least {Eden_TokenVolume} free space.\nThe receiving station will pay you back for your time. What do you say?
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我的船员正在寻找前往工厂的方法.\n您需要通过物流连接到至少有{Eden_TokenVolume}空闲空间的货舱.接收站将会补偿你浪费的时间.你说呢?

English: They will have to find another ship to carry them.
Chinese (simplified): 他们得找另一艘船来运载他们.

English: I'd rather not chat right now, if it's all the same to you.
Chinese (simplified): 不好意思,我现在不想聊天.

English: Had a long day at work and I just want to relax and watch the news.
Chinese (simplified): 工作了一整天,我只想放松一下,看看新闻.

English: {Player.PlayfieldName} has a lovely view of the galaxy, don't you think? I could stare out these windows for hours.
Chinese (simplified): {Player.PlayfieldName}是一个欣赏银河系的好地方,你不觉得吗?我可以盯着窗外看几个小时.

English: It is way past my bed time...
Did you see another scrapyard was attacked by raiders? Be careful if you go visit one, you never know when more raiders will show up!
Chinese (simplified): 你看到另一个废品场被海盗袭击了吗?如果你去参观一定要小心,你永远不知道什么时候会有更多的海盗出现!

English: The mining opportunities here in {Player.PlayfieldName} are going to dry up sooner or later. I should look into moving.
Chinese (simplified): 在{Player.PlayfieldName}这里的采矿机会迟早会枯竭。我应该考虑搬家。

English: Check in with the manager if you're looking for crew to hire or transport.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你需要雇佣或运输船员,请与经理联系.

English: The companies have had us working double shifts to get all these new orbital factories up and running. It's wearing me out. I may ask for some time off to visit my family.
Chinese (simplified): 这些公司让我们两班倒,让所有这些新的轨道工厂启动和运行.它让我筋疲力尽.我可能会请一段时间假去看望我的家人.

English: I heard the Traders Guild is building new orbital waste processing facilities in Tranquility.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说贸易商协会正在宁静星域(Tranquility)建造新的轨道废物处理设施.

English: Polaris Megacorp has commissioned the construction of 200 new orbital alloy smelteries! That's a lot of freight that will need to be moved! Are you a freighter captain?
Chinese (simplified): 极星巨型企业已委托建设200个新的轨道合金冶炼厂!有很多货物需要运输!你是货轮舰长吗?

English: The Free Colonists might not be the wealthiest, or most powerful, but they make up for it with determination and resourcefulness.
Chinese (simplified): 自由殖民者可能不是最富有的,也不是最强大的,但他们的决心和足智多谋弥补了这一点.

English: My shuttle to take me to work is late. Again. Try telling that to my boss though!
Chinese (simplified): 我上班的班车迟到了.我正试着和我的老板沟通!

English: These quarters are a bit cramped, but the view is nice after a long day at work.
Chinese (simplified): 这些宿舍有点狭窄,但在漫长的一天工作后,视野很好.

English: Heard there might be a crew here looking for transportation to an orbital factory. You should check in with the manager.
Chinese (simplified): 听说这里可能有船员在找前往轨道工厂的交通工具.你应该向经理报到.

English: I really don't think it's a good idea to colonize so close to the Dronelands. Most ships that enter that region of space are never heard from again.
Chinese (simplified): 我真的不认为在离蜂巢无人机地这么近的地方殖民是个好主意.大多数进入这一区域的飞船从此杳无音信.

English: The Traders Guild is considering increasing taxes again! This is outrageous!
Chinese (simplified): 贸易商协会又在考虑增税了!这太离谱了!

English: @d0These two are involved in a rather heated conversation.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这两个人卷入了一场相当激烈的争吵.

English: All I'm saying is maybe we shouldn't have come to {Player.PlayfieldName}. We're parents now. We have to think of more than just ourselves.
Chinese (simplified): 我想说的是也许我们不应该来{Player.PlayfieldName}.我们现在是父母了.我们必须考虑的不仅仅是我们自己.

English: We needed the money. We talked about this. I was stuck in a dead end job barely making ends meet on a backwater world. And I never got to see you or our child!
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要钱.我们讨论过这个.我被困在一份没有出路的工作里,在一个闭塞的世界里勉强维持生计.我从没见过你和我们的孩子!

English: It's getting too dangerous. There's bandits and raiders everywhere. Even the local scrapyards aren't safe anymore. Money won't matter if we're dead.\nWhat about X'Chekve? You mentioned he had a lead on a mining job deep inside the Forge? Some kind of new mining tech that can drill rich asteroids?
Chinese (simplified): 太危险了.到处都是强盗和强盗.就连当地的废品场也不安全了.如果我们死了钱就不重要了.X'Chekve呢?你说过他有熔炉深处采矿工作的线索?某种新的采矿技术可以在富含资源的小行星上钻探?

English: We don't have the money for transportation! The cheapest transports are asking for 10,000 credits to get anywhere close to the Forge.\n\nThey notice you standing nearby and cut their conversation short.
Chinese (simplified): 我们没钱付交通费!最便宜的交通工具需要1万积分才能接近轨道熔炉.\n\n他们注意到你站在旁边,就中断了他们的谈话.

English: Maybe I can help you out. Here's 10,000 credits from my bank account, no strings attached.
Chinese (simplified): 也许我能帮你.这是我银行账户里的一万块钱,没有任何附加条件.

English: Oh thank you, kind stranger!\nWe have no way to repay you but we will tell others in the Free Colonists of your kindness.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,谢谢你,好心的陌生人!我们没有办法报答你,但我们会告诉其他自由殖民者你的善良.

English: Thank you again for your help! With the money you gave us, we should be able to book a transport out of here.
Chinese (simplified): 再次感谢您的帮助!用你给我们的钱,我们应该能订到离开这里的交通工具.

English: I want my money back! <color=#ff0000>(-200 Colonists rep)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 我要拿回我的钱! <color=#ff0000>(-200 殖民者声望)</color>

English: Fine, take it. We don't want any trouble. I will transfer it back into your account but I will tell everyone what a scoundrel you are!\nYou're no longer wanted here!
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,拿去吧.我们可不想惹麻烦.我会把钱转回你的账户,但我会告诉大家你是一个多么卑鄙的人!\n这里不再需要你了!
走开. <color=#00ff00>(+10000 积分, +100 海盗声望)</color>

English: These two individuals stop talking once they notice you.
Chinese (simplified): 这两个人一注意到你就不说话了.

English: Have you heard of a planet called Raeu... Raeeourer... Raeourrrar... Raerouae... Raeoureeru? Darnit! I can't pronounce the name and we're supposed to deliver a large shipment of food to them.
Chinese (simplified): 你听说过一个叫Raeu的星球吗?Raeeourer……Raeourrrar……Raerouae……Raeoureeru吗?Darnit !我不会念那个名字我们要给他们送一大批食物.

English: Thank you again for your assistance.
Please, take this bank account transfer of 50000 credits.\nI will also speak highly of you to any other Polaris or Colonist mining vessels I encounter in my travels.
Chinese (simplified): 请拿着这5万的银行转账.我也会向我在旅途中遇到的任何其他极星或殖民采矿船高度赞扬你们.

English: Our ship has lost power. There's no way we can make it to the meeting in time now.\nYou best be on your way. There's nothing more you can do.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的船失去动力了.现在我们不可能及时赶到开会了.\n你最好还是上路吧.你也无能为力了.

English: @q0Thank you for saving our hides! Here, take this payment of 250000 credits as a reward.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 谢谢你救了我们!在这里,把这25万积分作为奖励.

English: Hello. Do you have a question?
What are you doing out here?

I am a member of the executive board for the Traders Guild. Specifically, my job is to open up new trade routes throughout neutral territory to facilitate the flow of goods and services throughout the galaxy.\nAs part of this role I have been working with members of the Free Colonists in a joint effort to increase security in the face of increased pirate activity.
Chinese (simplified): 我是贸易商协会执行委员会的成员. 具体来说,我的工作是在中立地区开辟新的贸易路线,以促进整个银河系的货物和服务流动. 作为这个角色的一部分,我一直在与自由殖民者的成员合作,共同努力加强安全,以应对日益增加的海盗活动.

English: I want to ask something else.

These colonists were escorting us to an important meeting to formalize a new trade agreement that would allow Traders Guild freighters to run supplies for their new fuel refineries.\nIt cannot be understated just how important it is for this new trade agreement to be signed.
Chinese (simplified): 这些殖民者正护送我们去参加一个重要的会议,以正式确定一项新的贸易协议,该协议将允许贸易协会的货船为他们的新炼油厂提供物资. 不能低估签署这项新贸易协定的重要性.

English: I want to ask something else.
Do you know why anyone would intend you harm?
Chinese (simplified): 你知道为什么有人想伤害你吗?

English: I want to ask something else.

Part of this new trade agreement is an aggressive defense initiative to combat increased criminal activity.
I can only imagine someone learned about this and decided to take me off the board.
@p9We opted to let the Colonists escort our ship, as a Traders Guild escort would draw more attention.
In hindsight I probably should have opted for using our own ships, but the Colonists ships are still quite formidable, if a little old.
Chinese (simplified): 这项新贸易协定的一部分是一项积极的防御倡议,以打击日益增加的犯罪活动. 我只能想象有人知道了这件事,决定把我从董事会除名.\n@p9 我选择让殖民者护送我们的船,因为贸易公会的护送会吸引更多的注意力. 事后看来,我可能应该选择使用我们自己的船,但殖民者的船仍然相当强大,就是有点陈旧.

English: I am not ready for payment yet.
The Refinery has lost power. You did what you could.
Chinese (simplified): 精炼厂断电了. 你已经尽力了.

你好,我是这个空间站的管理者. 我们最近失去了所有的远程通讯. 我们相信我们被卡住了,我们随时可能受到攻击. 如果你能帮助保卫我们的空间站免受攻击,我将代表极星巨型公司亲自确保你得到适当的奖励
@p9 @q0 <color=#ffff00>警告:一旦接受,任务将自动开始,不能在此星区重新设置或再次完成. </color>
<color=#ffff00>只有一个人可以接受这个任务. </color>
<color=#ffff00>你必须在任务期间留在精炼厂附近,否则任务将失败. 
n当你准备好了才开始任务. </color>

English: I'm sorry but I don't have the time. Best of luck!
Chinese (simplified): 对不起,我没有时间. 祝你好运!

English: @q0Thank you for your assistance defending our station. Polaris is in your debt, and as promised I will transfer 500000 credits to your bank account.\nWe also towed in some valuable wreckage from the battle you may be interested in.\n<color=#ffff00>Make sure you are connected via logistics to a storage container with enough free space to accept it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 感谢你帮助我们维护本站. 极星公司欠你的债,我答应过你我会把50万转到你的银行账户上. 我们还拖来了一些有价值的战斗残骸,你可能会感兴趣? \n<color=#ffff00>请确保您通过物流连接到有足够可用空间的存储容器. </color>

English: I am not ready to take payment yet.
Chinese (simplified): 我还没有准备好接受付款.

English: @d0You cannot obtain any more useful information from this console.
Chinese (simplified): 您无法从这个控制台中获得任何有用的信息.

English: @d0Whomever deployed this mine made sure to scrub the mine's computer of any potentially useful information as to their identity.\nHowever they did not delete the mine's manufacturer information. This mine appears to be of Polaris design so perhaps you can find someone on a Polaris Distribution Center that might know more about its origins if you were to bring them the data.
Chinese (simplified): 无论谁部署了这个地雷,都确保清除了地雷的计算机上任何关于他们身份的潜在有用信息. 然而,他们没有删除矿山的制造商信息. 这个矿似乎是极星设计的,所以也许你可以找到极星配送中心的人,如果你把数据带给他们,他们可能会知道更多关于它的来源.

English: <color=#00ff00>Download data to a mobile data chip.</color>
@d0You download the data onto a data chip that has been placed in your personal or connected inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 您将数据下载到已放置在您个人或相关库存中的数据芯片上.

English: Can you tell me anything about this mine?
Chinese (simplified): 你能告诉我关于这个矿井的情况吗?

English: Hand it over and I will take a look.

Interesting. Korvax? Hmm. You said you found this where? It disabled a high end VIP transport for the Traders Guild?
Very interesting. I don't know why anyone would have wanted that VIP dead, but Korvax is a well known name among the less civilized.
All I can tell you is if you're looking for trouble you are on the right path. Here, take these platinum cards for your time.
Bank transfers can be tracked, hence the cards.
Chinese (simplified): 有趣,这是一个Korvax?嗯.你说你在哪儿找到这玩意的?你说它关闭了贸易公会的高端VIP运输?\n非常有趣.我不知道为什么会有人想让那个要人死,但科瓦克斯在不文明的人中是很有名的.我只能告诉你,如果你是想自找麻烦,那你走对了路.给,拿着这些白金卡吧.银行转账可以被跟踪,因此有了信用卡.

English: Wait, I want to ask something else.
No thanks, keep your money. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 不用了,谢谢,留着你的钱吧.再见.

English: @d0Please make your selection.\nSelect <color=#ff00ff>mission actions</color> if a mission is asking you to access the science station.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 请做出你的选择。\n如果任务要求你访问科学站,请选择<color=#ff00ff>任务行动</color>。

English: Please make a selection below.\n(This feature is not yet in)
Chinese (simplified): 请在下面选项做出选择.\n(此功能尚未发布)

English: @d0Greetings. How may I be of assistance?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 很荣幸见到你.我能为您做些什么?

English: I would like to turn in insignias.
@d0Handing in insignias will reward credits and reputation.\nWhat type and quantity of insignia would you like to turn in?
Chinese (simplified): 提交徽章将奖励积分和声誉.您要交什么种类和数量的徽章?

English: @d0<color=#ffff00>I'm sorry, you did not have the required insignias.\nMake sure the insignias are in your personal inventory and that you did not try to turn in more than you had.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffff00>很抱歉,你没有我们要求的徽章.请确保你的个人库存中有徽章,并且你没有试图交出数量超过你拥有的.</color>

English: @d0You turned in <color=#00ffff>{Count}</color> insignias.\nYou received <color=#00ff00>{CreditReward * Count}</color> credits and <color=#00afff>{ReputationReward * Count}</color> reputation with <color=#ffffff>{FactionType}</color>.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你已经上交了 <color=#00ffff>{Count}</color> 徽章.\n你收到了<color=#00ff00>{CreditReward * Count}</color> 积分和 <color=#00afff>{ReputationReward * Count}</color> <color=#ffffff>{FactionType}</color>的相关荣誉 .

English: I don't have any insignias. Goodbye.
<color=#00ff00>Turn in ALL of my insignias! </color><color=#ffff00>(experimental feature)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>交出我所有的徽章! </color><color=#ffff00>(实验特性)</color>

English: @q0@d0You turned in all of your insignias.\nYou received a total of <color=#00ff00>{LoopCredit}</color> credits and <color=#00afff>{LoopReputation}</color> reputation with <color=#ffffff>{FactionType}</color>.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你把你所有的徽章都交上来了.\n您总共收到了<color=#00ff00>{LoopCredit}</color>积分和<color=#00afff>{LoopReputation}</color> 声望以及<color=#ffffff>{FactionType}</color>.

English: I want to ask something else.
I want to sell old style insignias.
Our work here is sensitive, I cannot discuss it with you.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里的工作很敏感,我不能和你讨论.

English: I am concerned about the recent increase in raider attacks. It's almost like they are coordinated now.
Chinese (simplified): 我很担心最近袭击事件的增加.他们现在几乎是协调一致的.

English: Our job is to maintain local security and coordinate with other sectors.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的工作是维护当地安全并与其他部门协调.

English: If you have any insignias to turn in you should speak with the federation security officer near the hangar.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你有任何徽章要上交你应该和机库附近的联邦安全官员谈谈.

English: If you're looking for bounties, check sectors with a high amount of subspace radio signals.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你想要赏金,检查有大量子空间无线电信号的区域.

English: A Polaris refinery was just attacked by raiders! Someone needs to stop them.
Chinese (simplified): 极星炼油厂刚刚被突袭者袭击了!必须有人阻止他们.

English: There's rumors that some bandit officers are carrying around sealed containers with valuables inside.
Chinese (simplified): 有传言说,一些土匪带着密封的容器到处走,里面装着贵重物品.

English: Bounty hunting is dangerous work but pays well.
Chinese (simplified): 赏金狩猎是一项危险的工作,但报酬丰厚.

English: The security officer back by the hangar will accept insignias.
Chinese (simplified): 机库后面的安保人员会接受徽章.

English: Have you seen these new raiders vessels? They are bigger and far more heavily armed than the ones you might be used to.
Chinese (simplified): 你看到这些新的突袭船了吗?他们比你想象中的更大,并且全副武装.

English: We received a priority distress call on a federation emergency channel but the signal source was too far away for us to send any ships to assist.
Chinese (simplified): 我们收到联邦紧急频道发来的优先求救信号,但信号源太远,我们无法派出任何船只前去救援.

English: Thank you for helping me! You have no idea how much it means to me.\n\nThe alien begins crying. At least you think those are tears.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的帮助!你不知道这对我有多重要.\n\n外星人开始哭泣.至少你认为那是眼泪.

English: ...Well if you won't let me see them at least give them this note! Please I am begging you! @p9The alien seems startled by your presence. Oh, hello. I'm sorry sob about this sob. I have been trying to see my partner who was wrongly imprisoned but they won't let me! Maybe you can help me?
Chinese (simplified): ...如果你不让我见他们,至少把这张纸条给他们!求求你了! @p9 外星人似乎被你的出现吓了一跳. 噢, 你好.我很抱歉 哭泣关于这个sob. 我一直想去看我那个被错误监禁的搭档,但他们不让我去! 也许你能帮助我?

English: What can I do to help?
I don't get involved with criminals.

My partner was running freight when he was stopped by federation customs agents. They seized his freighter and took him into custody. He's being held here in one of the cells.\nThey won't let me see him and they won't give him my note. Maybe you can convince one of the station's crew to do it? I need him to know how much I love him.
Chinese (simplified): 我的搭档在运货时被联邦海关拦下了.他们扣押了他的货船并将他拘留.他被关在这里的一间牢房里.他们不让我见他,也不给他我的纸条.也许你能说服空间站的工作人员去做?我要让他知道我有多爱他.

English: I will try. Give me the note.
Sounds illegal. I won't help you.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来是非法的.我不会帮你的.

English: That's... Okay. I understand. Thank you anyway. Sob
Chinese (simplified): 这是……好吧.我明白了.不管怎样,谢谢你. 呜咽

English: @q0Thank you! Thank you so much! You have no idea how much this means to me! They told me he is being held in cell 7.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 Thank你!非常感谢!你不知道这对我有多重要!他们告诉我他被关在7号牢房.

English: You're welcome. I will make sure he gets your note.
Chinese (simplified): 不客气我会确保他收到你的留言.

English: Please find someone who will give my partner my note!\nI am sure there is somebody here who would do that.
Chinese (simplified): 请找个人把我的纸条给我的搭档!我相信这里有人会这么做的.
我的时间很宝贵。你想要什么?

English: Have you heard of our lord and savior Hamster?
Chinese (simplified): 你听说过我们的救世主仓鼠吗?

English: Hamsters are illegal. Cute, but illegal.
Chinese (simplified): 仓鼠是非法的.可爱,但违法.

English: I want to ask something else.
You could help me with something.
Oh yeah, and what could that possibly be?
Chinese (simplified): 哦,是的,那可能是什么呢?

English: I need you to pass this note to the prisoner in cell 7.
Chinese (simplified): 我要你把这张纸条交给七号牢房的犯人.

English: And why would I do a thing like that?
Because there might be a little something in it for you.
Chinese (simplified): 因为你可能会从中得到一些好处.

English: And what kind of something did you have in mind? Maybe... 5000 of a little something?
Chinese (simplified): 你想要什么样的东西?也许……5000块的小东西?

English: I will give you 5000 credits. Cash.
If you wait a moment, I will go to an ATM and get you 5000 credits in cash.
Chinese (simplified): 如果您稍等一下,我去自动取款机给您取5000个信用卡的现金.

English: Never mind. The whole thing is too shady for me.
Chinese (simplified): 不要紧.整件事对我来说太可疑了.

English: @q0Thank you thank you thank you!\nHere, please, take these credits. It should more than make up for whatever you had to use to bribe the guard.\nMy clan will be in your debt.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢,谢谢,谢谢!给,请收下这些学分.这应该比你用来贿赂警卫的钱还多.我的家族会欠你人情的.

English: You got a death wish or something?
<color=#ff0000>Let's fight. (your body can't take another punch)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>让我们战斗.(你的身体承受不了另一拳)</color>

English: Oh sorry, my bad. I will be going.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,对不起,我的错.我要走了.

English: I don't want to talk to you right now.
Oh sorry. I will leave you alone then.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,抱歉.那我就不打扰你了.

English: Did you find someone to bribe? What happened to your face?
Chinese (simplified): 你找到可以贿赂的人了吗?你的脸怎么了?

English: Bad news. A guard beat me up and took your note.
Chinese (simplified): 坏消息.一个警卫打了我,还拿走了你的纸条.

English: Oh, I see your bloody nose.\nWell, I don't have another copy of the note. Thank you anyway.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,我看到你流着血的鼻子了.嗯,我没有另一份笔记.不管怎样,谢谢你.

English: I was given this suspicious note.
Chinese (simplified): 有人给了我这张可疑的纸条.

English: @q0The security chief listens as you explain how you obtained the note.\n@p9 @q0Ah yes, we have had our eyes on them for awhile now. They are, obviously, not partners. At least not in the romantic sense.\nThey are most definitely partners in crime. I would be most grateful on behalf of the Trade Federation if you were to hand this note over to me.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 安全主管听你解释你是如何得到这张纸条的.\n@p9 @q0 啊,是的,我们已经注意他们一段时间了. 显然,他们不是合作伙伴. 至少不是在浪漫的意义上.\n他们绝对是犯罪伙伴. 如果您能把这张纸条交给我,我代表贸易联盟将不胜感激.

English: On second thought, I think I will keep it.
Chinese (simplified): 仔细一想,我还是留着吧.
很乐意帮忙. (递给对方纸条)

English: @q0Thank you. You will find that being a friend to the federation will open many doors for you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 谢谢. 你会发现成为联盟的朋友会为你打开许多大门.

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>This radio transmitter has been shut down.\nThere is nothing more you can do here.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>无线电发射机已关闭.\n你在这也做不了什么了.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Shutdown sequence has already been initiated by another user.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>关机顺序已被其他用户启动.</color>

English: @d0This old long range subspace radio transmitter appears to have been hijacked by bandits and is now being used to coordinate attacks on local shipping lanes.\nShutting it down would help secure the local system but will undoubtedly attract the attention of whomever has been using the transmitter.\n<color=#ffff00>Once the shutdown sequence is started leaving the sector will fail the mission.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个旧的远程子空间无线电发射机似乎被强盗劫持了,现在被用来协调对当地航线的攻击.关闭它将有助于确保当地系统的安全,但无疑会引起使用发射机的人的注意.\n<color=#ffff00>一旦关机程序启动,离开扇区将导致任务失败.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You have initiated a shutdown sequence.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>See PDA for current objectives.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>您已经启动了关机程序.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>查看PDA当前目标.</color>

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>Shutdown sequence ready to complete.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Make sure you have free space in your personal inventory or connected container.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ff00>停机程序准备完成.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>请确保您的个人库存或相关容器中有空闲空间.</color>

English:
@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Ready</color>
Power Output: <color=#ff0000>None</color>
Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#ff0000>Unknown</color>
Planet must be surveyed for viability before a geological core sample can be taken.
Surveying requires a <color=#00ff00>Basic System Survey Probe</color> in your personal inventory that will be used up to perform the survey.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 状态: <color=#00ff00>Ready</color>
能量输出: <color=#ff0000>None</color>
行星名字: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
地热活动: <color=#ff0000>未知</color>
在采集地质岩心样本之前,必须对行星的生存能力进行调查.
调查需要一个<color=#00ff00>基础星系调查探针</color>在您的个人库存中,将用于执行调查.

English: @d0Launch a survey probe to determine if the planet can support geothermal power generation.
Chinese (simplified): 发射一个调查探测器,以确定这个星球是否可以支持地热发电.

English: I don't have any probes on me.

@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Ready</color>
Power Output: <color=#ff0000>None</color>
<color=#00ff00></color>Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#00ff00>High</color>
Planet is deemed suitable for geothermal power generation.
Core sample required to activate a geothermal generator. Connect to a container on your base with at least 32000 available volume.
<color=#ffff00>Warning: core samples are too heavy to lift via ship and will require storage in a base. Core samples will quickly cool into unusable rock.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 状态: <color=#00ff00>就绪</color>
能量输出: <color=#ff0000>无</color>
<color=#00ff00></color>行星名称:<color=#00fff >{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
地热活动: <color=#00ff00>High</color>
行星被认为适合地热发电.
核心样本需要激活地热发电机.连接到基地上至少有32000个可用空间的容器.
<color=#ffff00>警告:岩心样品太重,无法通过飞船运输,需要储存在基地.岩心样品会迅速冷却成无法使用的岩石.</color>

English: @d0Geological core sample will be deposited into a connected container on a BASE with at least 32000 available volume. While connected to the container that has the core sample, use the upgrade function of a multitool to activate a geothermal generator. There is a maximum to the number of active geothermal generators per base. The core sample will quickly cool into unusable rock. If this happens you will need to obtain another core sample. Note: connect to a BASE cargo container ONLY. Do not use a ship as it can overload the generators.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 地质岩心样品将储存到连接的容器中,容器需要放置在 基地内 且容量至少为32000 . 当你连接至装有岩心样本的容器时,用多功能枪的升级功能来启动地热发电机. 每个基地使用的地热发电机的数量是有上限的. 岩心样品将迅速冷却成不可用的岩石.如果发生这种情况,您将需要获得另一个核心样本. 注意: 请务必只连接至 基地 内的容器. 不要使用飞船,不然发电机会过载.

English: @q0 @d0Survey complete.\n<color=#00ff00>This planet is suitable for geothermal power generation.</color>\nCore samples can now be obtained from geothermal generators on this planet.
Chinese (simplified): 调查完成.\n<color=#00ff00>这个星球适合地热发电.</color>\n核心样本现在可以从这个星球上的地热发电机获得.

English: @q0 @d0Survey complete.\n<color=#ffff00>This planet is not suitable for geothermal power generation.</color>
Chinese (simplified): 调查完成.\n<color=#ffff00>这个星球不适合地热发电.</color>

English:
@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Ready</color>
Power Output: <color=#ff0000>None</color>
<color=#00ff00></color>Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#ff0000>Minimal</color>
This planet is not suitable for geothermal power generation.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 状态: <color=#00ff00>就绪</color>
能量输出: <color=#ff0000>无</color>
<color=#00ff00></color>行星名称:<color=# 00fff >{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
地热活动:<color=#ff0000>极小</color>
这个星球不适合地热发电.

English:
@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Active</color>
Power Output: <color=#00ff00>Optimal</color>
Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#00ff00>High</color>
This geothermal generator is currently reducing your base's power usage.
Base will still require at least one standard generator and fuel tank or solar power to run.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 状态:<color=#00ff00>活跃</color>
功率输出:<color=#00ff00>最佳</color>
星球名称:<color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
地热活动:<color=#00ff00>高</color>
这台地热发电机目前正在减少你基地的电力消耗。
基地仍然需要至少一个标准发电机和燃料箱或太阳能来运行。

English: @d0Basic System Survey Probes can be crafted in the decoration tab of a constructor.\nYou must place the probe in your personal inventory to use.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 基础型星系探针可以在构造器的装饰选项卡中制作.您必须将探针放置在您的个人物品栏中才能使用.

English: <color=#00ff00>Drill core sample and deposit into connected container.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>钻取岩心样品,并沉积到相连的容器中.</color>

English: I do not need any assistance at this time.\nNow, if you'll excuse me, I am very busy.
Chinese (simplified): 我现在不需要任何帮助.现在,如果你不介意的话,我很忙.

English: My targeting scanners are still being jammed. Have you destroyed enough of the crystals I've asked you to?\nWhy are you talking to me instead of out using that fancy drill of yours?
Chinese (simplified): 我的目标扫描仪仍然被卡住了.你按我说的销毁了足够的水晶了吗?你为什么要跟我说话,而不是在外面用你那花哨的电钻?

English:
Thank you for speaking with me. I am trying to mine these rich asteroids but there is too much EM interference for my targeting systems to work properly.
I believe the interference is coming from those crystals you see scattered around the area.
@p9If you would take out some of those crystals using a handheld or vessel mounted drill, I think I would be able to continue mining.
I will pay you some credits plus give you a small amount of the ore I have mined so far.
You can keep whatever you find in those crystals.
Also if you have any friends helping you make sure they speak to me as well before you mine out any crystals.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你和我谈话.我正试图开采这些丰富的小行星,但电磁干扰太大,我的瞄准系统无法正常工作.我相信干扰来自于你看到的散布在这个区域的晶体.\n@p9 If你可以用手持式或船上安装的钻头取出一些晶体,我想我可以继续采矿.我会付给你一些积分,再给你一小笔钱

English: I am sad to inform you that without enough crystals I cannot offer you payment.\nYou can deactivate the mission in your PDA. Perhaps you can find another miner in need.\nNow leave me be.
Chinese (simplified): 我很遗憾地通知你,没有足够的水晶,我无法向你付款。你可以在你的PDA中取消任务。也许你能找到另一个需要帮助的矿工。现在离我远点。

English: My targeting systems are working now but it wouldn't hurt if you destroy a few more crystals.
Chinese (simplified): 我的目标系统现在开始工作了但如果你再摧毁一些水晶也不会有什么坏处。

English: I will return once I've destroyed more crystals.
Chinese (simplified): 我摧毁更多水晶后就会回来。

English:
@q0The interference has cleared up considerably. A job well done.
As promised, I will transfer 25000 credits to your bank account.
I will also give you an assortment of ore I have found.
<color=#ffff00>Make sure you are connected to a storage container with enough free volume.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 干扰已大大消除. 干得好.\n跟承诺的一样, 我将把25000个积分转到你的银行账户.我也会给你一些我找到的矿石.\n<color=#ffff00>请确保您已连接到具有足够空闲容量的存储容器.</color>

English: @d0There is still too much interference.\nFind and remove the source of the interference. Check near the center of the mined out asteroid.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 仍然有太多的干扰.找出并消除干扰源.在被挖出的小行星中心附近检查一下.

English: @d0This communication beacon appears to be operating normally.\nThere is nothing that needs to be done here.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 通信信标运行正常了.\n这里没有什么需要做的.

English: @d0Warning: Signal strength poor.\nLocal radiation source detected.\nUnable to establish link to subspace communications network.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 警告:信号强度差.\n检测到局部辐射源.无法建立与子空间通信网络的连接.

English: <color=#00ff00>I hear you. I fixed the beacon.</color>
@q0 @d0Subspace link established.\n\nHello? Is this thing working? Can anyone hear me?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 子空间链接已建立.\n\n喂?这东西好用吗?有人能听到我吗?

English: @d0Radiation source detected near center of nearby asteroid shell.\nRemoving the source of radiation may improve signal strength.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 在附近小行星壳中心附近检测到辐射源.去除辐射源可以提高信号强度.

English:
@q0 @d0Oh thank you! We lost contact with this beacon and I was tasked with troubleshooting it.
I suppose some kind of payment is due. Please, take this for your troubles.
It looks like the beacon has captured some spare ore, so feel free to take that as well.
<color=#ffff00>Make sure you are connected to a storage container with enough free volume.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 哦,谢谢你!我们与这个信标失去了联系,我的任务是排除故障.
我想应该支付某种款项来补偿给你带来的麻烦.
看起来信标已经捕获了一些多余的矿石,所以也可以随意拿走.
<color=#ffff00>请确保您已连接到具有足够空闲容量的存储容器.</color>

English:
<color=#ff8000>Mining caches</color> can be obtained from Mining Sites.
Contents of the cache will be placed into your connected container.
Mining caches typically contain various ores and rarely mining related equipment.
<color=#ffff00>Place the caches into your personal inventory then connect to a cargo container with plenty of free volume.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff8000>采矿奖励箱</color>可以通过开采区域获得.\n奖励箱的内容将被发放至您连接的容器中.采矿奖励箱通常包含各种矿石和很少与采矿相关的设备.\n<color=#ffff00>将奖励盒放入您的个人库存中,然后连接到具有大量空闲容量的货物集装箱.</color>

English:
<color=#ff0000>Combat caches</color> can be obtained from Combat Sites.
Contents of the cache will be placed into your connected container.
Combat caches typically contain various stolen goods and military equipment.
<color=#ffff00>Place the caches into your personal inventory then connect to a cargo container with plenty of free volume.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>战斗奖励箱</color>可以从战斗区域获得.奖励盒的内容将被放置在您连接的容器中.战斗奖励箱通常包含各种失窃的物品和军用设备.\n<color=#ffff00>将奖励盒放入您的个人库存中,然后连接到具有大量空闲容量的货物集装箱.</color>

English: Thank you for your earlier assistance. Our clients will be very happy.\nWe will finish up here then be on our way.\nBy chance are you interested in purchasing any of our ore?
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你之前的帮助。我们的客户会非常满意。\n我们将在这里完成然后离开。\n顺便问一下,你是否有兴趣购买我们的矿石?

English: Welcome to our mining command vessel.\nAre you interested in some work?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的采矿指挥舰.你对什么工作感兴趣吗?

English: What kind of work did you have in mind?

We were sent here to mine Chromite from this asteroid field but our miners went on strike and warped off, leaving us all alone here!
If you were to mine the Chromite for us and bring us 5 Chromite Ore Shipments we would pay you very well.
@p9You can find Chromite asteroids scattered throughout this asteroid field.
You can craft a Chromite Ore Shipment in the decoration tab of your constructor.
Then place 5 shipments in your personal inventory and speak with me again.
Chinese (simplified): 我们被派来开采这颗小行星上的铬铁矿但是我们的矿工罢工了,离开了!\n留下我们在这里!如果你愿意为我们开采铬铁矿,并给我们运来5船铬铁矿,我们会给你很好的报酬.\n@p9 You可以发现铬铁矿小行星散落在这个小行星区.你可以在构造器的装饰选项卡中制作铬铁矿运输.那就在你的个人库存里放5批货,然后再跟我说.

English: No thanks. Best of luck to you.

Excellent! Polaris thanks you for your assistance.\nAs promised, here is your reward of 500000 credits. And for such a job well done here is a little bonus for you as well.\nIf you're interested in purchasing ore, just let me know.
Chinese (simplified): 太棒了!Polaris感谢你的帮助。\n如承诺的,这是你500000信用点的奖励。对于如此出色的工作,这里还有一个小小的额外奖励。\n如果你有兴趣购买矿石,只需告诉我。

English:
@d0Occasionally during hacks I may detect a security vulnerability in the system that you can choose to exploit later. If such an option is available to you it will show up on the hacking menu.
<color=#00ffff>Security Resets:</color> These give you additional hacking attempts.
<color=#00ffff>Codebreakers:</color> Available when your guess is close to the actual code. Instantly hacks the system.
<color=#00ffff>High or Low Frequency Code Scanners:</color> Adjusts the maximum or minimum code range to be closer to the actual code. Only available when the difference between the code range and code is large enough.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 偶尔在黑客攻击期间,我可能会检测到系统中的安全漏洞,您可以选择稍后利用.如果这样的选项是可用的,它将显示在黑客菜单上.
<color=#00ffff>安全重置:</color>这些会给你额外的黑客攻击尝试.
<color=#00ffff>Codebreakers:</color>当您的猜测接近实际代码时可用.立即入侵系统.
<color=#00ffff>高频或低频代码扫描器:</color>调整最大或最小代码范围以更接近实际代码.仅在代码范围和代码之间的差异足够大时可用.

English:
@d0If you have any <color=#00ffff>hacking software</color> in your personal inventory, I can use it to find a random security vulnerability by overloading the system.
The hacking software will be used up and each type of hacking software may only be used once per terminal before the system adapts to it.
<color=#00ffff>Hacking Software: Overclock:</color> Finds a random security vulnerability. Once per terminal.
<color=#00ffff>Hacking Software: Fortify: </color>Finds a random security vulnerability. Once per terminal.
<color=#00ffff>Hacking Software: Spam: </color>Finds a random security vulnerability. Once per terminal.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 如果您的个人库存中有任何<color=#00ffff>黑客软件</color>,我可以使用它通过超载系统来查找随机安全漏洞.黑客软件将被消耗掉,每种黑客软件在每个终端只能使用一次,然后系统会进行适应.
<color=#00ffff>黑客软件:超频:</color>查找随机安全漏洞.每个终端一次.
<color=#00ffff>黑客软件:巩固: </color>查找随机安全漏洞.每个终端一次.
<color=#00ffff>黑客软件:垃圾讯息: </color>查找随机安全漏洞.每个终端一次.

English: @d0When you successfully hack a firewall in a multi-firewall system you increase your <color=#00ffff>hacking skill</color> up to a maximum amount.\n<color=#00ffff>Hacking skill</color> slightly reduces the initial variance between the minimum and maximum code range making it slightly easier to hack.\nYou currently get a {Eden_PlayerHackingSkill} reduction in the code variance due to your hacking skill.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 当你成功破解多次安全系统中的防火墙时,你可以将你的<color=#00ffff>黑客技能</color>提高到最大值.\n<color=#00ffff>黑客技能</color>稍微减少了最小和最大代码范围之间的初始方差,使其更容易被黑客攻击.由于你的黑客技能.你目前得到一个{Eden_PlayerHackingSkill}减少代码方差.

English: Do you have any mining contracts available?

I am sorry, I do not currently have any contracts for you.\nI will be getting a new order of mining contracts in {DeltaTimeToString(System.Math.Abs(Eden_Timer + Eden_Global_ContractMineTimer - GetGameTimeInSec()))}
Chinese (simplified): 很抱歉,我目前没有任何合同给你.\n我会在{DeltaTimeToString(System.Math.Abs(Eden_Timer + Eden_Global_ContractMineTimer - GetGameTimeInSec()))}中获得一个新的挖矿合约

English: I want to ask something else.
Thank you, I will check back then.
I am sorry, but the UIM does not currently offer contracts for {Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}.
Chinese (simplified): 我很抱歉,但UIM目前不提供{Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}的合同.

English: I want to ask something else.
Yes I do have a mining contract available for {Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我确实有一个可用于{Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}的挖矿合约.

English: Yes I do have a mining contract for {Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我确实有一个{Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}的挖矿合约.

English: I want to ask something else.
No thanks. Keep your mining contract.
Chinese (simplified): 不,谢谢.保留你的挖矿合同.

English: @q0Here is a mining contract. You should find it in your personal inventory or connected container.\nIt has instructions on how to complete it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 这是一份采矿合同.您应该在您的个人库存或相关容器中找到它.它有关于如何完成它的说明.

English: @q0Here is a mining contract. You should find it in your personal inventory or connected container.\nIt has instructions on how to complete it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 这是一份采矿合同.您应该在您的个人库存或相关容器中找到它.它有关于如何完成它的说明.

English: @d0This looks like the remote control for the television screen.
Chinese (simplified): 这看起来像是电视屏幕的遥控器.

English: Change channel to Colonist News Network.
Chinese (simplified): 换频道到殖民者新闻网.

English: Change channel to Polaris News Agency.
Change channel to Federation Trade Network.
Change channel to Market News Daily.
Chinese (simplified): 换频道到每日市场新闻.

English: Hello and welcome to this Federation Security Headquarters.\nHow may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): 大家好,欢迎来到联邦安全总部.我能为您做些什么?

English: I collect popular and obscure music from around the galaxy.\nIf there's a universal language, music would be it.\nHave you heard any good tracks lately?
Chinese (simplified): 我收集银河系中流行的和不知名的音乐.如果有一种世界通用的语言,那一定是音乐.你最近听过什么好听的歌吗?

English: Unless you got a Syndicate Access Card or were invited by the boss himself you best keep walking friend.
Chinese (simplified): 除非你有联合会通行证或者被老板亲自邀请,否则你最好还是做个行走的朋友.

English: I know I can beat him! Just waiting on him to make the first move then he's mine!
Chinese (simplified): 我知道我能打败他!只要等他主动,他就是我的了!

English: We've both been at a standstill for hours, waiting for the other to make the first move.\nBut I know he will flinch and make a mistake. That will be my chance to take him down.
Chinese (simplified): 我们都停滞了好几个小时,等着对方迈出第一步.但我知道他会退缩,会犯错误.这是我扳倒他的机会.

English: We paid good money for VIP access and so far these two haven't made a single move!\nBoring!
Chinese (simplified): 我们花了很多钱买VIP,但到目前为止,这两个人动都没动一下!

English: Maybe you two should play the next round.
Chinese (simplified): 也许你们两个应该下一轮再来玩.

English: You know what? That's actually a great idea! I think we will do just that, thank you.
Chinese (simplified): 你知道吗?这真是个好主意!我想我们会这么做的,谢谢.

English: @d0The alien is too focused on his game to respond to you.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 外星人太专注于他的游戏而没有回应你.

English: He and I are fairly evenly matched. It's really a tossup which one of us will win each time.\nI love it!
Chinese (simplified): 他和我实力相当.每次我们谁赢都很难说.我喜欢!

English: I you don't mind I really need to concentrate on the game.\nI can't let him beat me. Again.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你不介意的话,我真的需要专注于比赛.我不能让他打我.再一次.

English: HAH! Take that you slime ball! What's that? You going to go cry to someone? Hah!
Chinese (simplified): 哈!拿去吧,你这个讨厌鬼!那是什么?你要去找谁哭诉吗?哈!

English: This novice thinks he has a chance against me! Take a listen to his little insults! Hah!
Chinese (simplified): 这个新手认为他有机会赢我!来听听他的小侮辱吧!哈!

English: Ah, welcome to the VIP section of this freeport.\nI hope the hospitality of the Syndicate has treated you well?
Chinese (simplified): 啊,欢迎来到这个自由港的VIP区。我希望联合会的热情好客对你有好处?

English: It has, but now I must be going.

Yes. Surely you have heard of our organization?
Here in the badlands different powers struggle for dominance.
My organization is just one such power, though we are the strongest.
@p9We focus on entertainment. We absolutely do not smuggle weapons, despite whatever rumors you may have heard.
We are a legitimate business and seek only to turn an honorable profit.
Chinese (simplified): 是的。你一定听说过我们公司吧?在这片荒地上,不同的力量在争夺统治地位。我的组织就是这样一种力量,虽然我们是最强大的.\n@p9 我们专注于娱乐。我们绝对不会走私武器,不管你听到过什么谣言。我们是一家合法的企业,只寻求赚取可观的利润。

English: I want to ask something else.

A freeport is a free port of call where all are welcome.
The only rules here are no weapons and no killing.
@p9Some make this their home, selling their wares or services, while others are merely passing through.
The Syndicate constructed freeports such as these throughout the badlands as a gesture of goodwill to the various colonists and pirate clans that call the Badlands home.
@p9I would be lying if our goals were entirely... Selfless. We do this because it helps align others with the goals of the Syndicate.
After all, what good is power without friends to share it with?
Now if you excuse me, I have an important shipment of stolen weapons, I mean recovered medical supplies to attend to.
Chinese (simplified): 自由港是一个欢迎所有人的自由停靠港。这里唯一的规则就是没有武器,没有杀戮。\n@p9 Some把这里作为他们的家,出售他们的商品或服务,而其他人只是过客。联合会在荒地上建造了这样的自由港,作为对把荒地称为家园的各种殖民者和海盗部落的友好姿态。\n@p9 I如果我们的目标完全是…无私的。我们这样做是因为它有助于使其他人与联合会的目标保持一致。毕竟,没有朋友分享的权力有什么用呢?失陪一下,我有一批重要的被盗武器要处理,我是说要处理缴获的医疗用品。

English: I want to ask something else.
Why here in a quarantine zone?

You stand in the hollow shell of what was once a small moon.
Centuries ago this moon was mined out by a group of miners that would eventually form Polaris.
Over the following years moon shells such as these became unstable and turned into navigational hazards.
@p9Polaris put up warning beacons to alert passing ships to the danger.
All the ore has since been mined out. No one comes here on purpose and the warning beacons keep away any who accidentally wander into the sector.
It's the perfect sanctuary for those who prefer freedom over the oppressive laws of the other major powers of the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): 你站在一个曾经是小月亮的空壳里。几个世纪前,这颗卫星被一群矿工开采出来,最终形成了极星。在接下来的几年里,像这样的月球炮弹变得不稳定,变成了航行的危险。n@p9 Polaris设置了警告信标,提醒过往船只注意危险。所有的矿石都已开采完。没有人是故意来这里的,警告信标会阻止任何不小心进入这个区域的人。对于那些喜欢自由而不喜欢银河系其他大国的压迫性法律的人来说,这是一个完美的避难所。

English: I want to ask something else.
I like to come up here to think. Sometimes I wonder what they are up to in the VIP section.
Chinese (simplified): 我喜欢到这里来思考。有时我想知道他们在贵宾区干什么。

English: Ah yes, quite the view of... Asteroids.
I will leave you to enjoy the view.
Chinese (simplified): 我先走了,让你欣赏风景。

English: This isn't just any asteroid. This used to be a small moon. Aren't you curious what happened to it? How it became like this, a mere hollow shell of its former glory?\nPerhaps it is a metaphor for our own existence. Do you ever wonder about that?
Chinese (simplified): 这不是普通的小行星。这曾经是一个小卫星。你不好奇它怎么了吗?它是怎么变成现在这个样子的,只是一个昔日辉煌的空壳?也许这是对我们自身存在的一种隐喻。你有没有想过这个问题?

English: Hello. How may I help you?

I see. Well if you come across any interesting music tracks I would be willing to pay to add them to our collection.\nI heard some casinos ran by the Syndicate play some good music. Maybe you could try there?
Chinese (simplified): 我明白了。好吧,如果你遇到任何有趣的音乐曲目,我愿意花钱把它们添加到我们的收藏中。我听到联合会经营的一些赌场播放一些很好的音乐。也许你可以去那里试试?

English: I will keep an ear out. Thank you.
Ah you must be the Terran I was looking for!\nI assume you're here to deliver some wonderful new music samples for my ears?
Chinese (simplified): 你一定是我要找的人族!我猜你是来给我送一些美妙的新音乐样品的吧?

English: <color=#00ff00>Here are some sample tracks from a DJ at the casino.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>这里有一些来自赌场DJ的样轨。</color>

English: How did you know I was coming?

I got a very excited message from a DJ at a Syndicate Casino. He was very happy to tell me that he sent a Terran fitting your description off to hand deliver his newest tracks.\nI would love to take a listen.
Chinese (simplified): 我从联合会赌场的DJ那里收到了一条非常兴奋的信息。他很高兴地告诉我他派了一个符合你长相的人族来亲手送他最新的曲目。我很想听听。

English: Thank you! Here at Underground Music Network we are always seeking the latest and hottest music.\nIf you find any more tracks I would be happy to take them off your hands.\nI have deposited 25000 credits to your bank account, and will put in a good word with any fellow pirate clans I come across.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你!在地下音乐网,我们一直在寻找最新最热的音乐。如果你能找到更多的音轨,我很乐意帮你保管。我已经在你的银行账户里存了25000个银币,我会在遇到任何海盗氏族的时候说几句好话。

English: I want to ask something else.
<color=#00ff00>I have more sample tracks for you.</color>
Could I get a copy of this music?
Chinese (simplified): 能给我一份这首歌的拷贝吗?

English: No, I'm afraid not. However I could promise you some credits.\nHave you heard of the Underground Music Network?\nThey can often be found in Pirate Freeports in the Badlands. If you were to take some of my music samples to them I'm sure they would reward you with some credits and street cred. What do you say?
Chinese (simplified): 不,恐怕没有。不过我可以保证给你一些学分。你听说过地下音乐网吗?他们经常可以在荒地的海盗自由港找到。如果你把我的一些音乐样本给他们,我相信他们会奖励你一些学分和街头信誉。你说呢?

English: Sure, I will take your tracks to them.
Chinese (simplified): 当然,我会把你的踪迹告诉他们。

English: Sorry, I do not have the time.
That's okay, I understand.\nPerhaps you will come by again when you are feeling more generous?
Chinese (simplified): 没关系,我理解。也许等你觉得宽宏大量的时候再来吧?

English: I want to ask something else.

Here you go. Be careful with that, don't lose it! It's my only backup copy.\nTake it to a Pirate Freeport anywhere in the Badlands. You can find them on the solar system map marked with a white station icon within Pirates territory.
Chinese (simplified): 给你。小心点,别弄丢了!这是我唯一的备份。把它带到荒地的海盗自由港。你可以在太阳系地图上找到他们,在海盗的领土上有一个白色的车站图标。

English: @d0This location shows no scannable objects of interest.\nTry a different moon, planet, or sector.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 此位置没有显示感兴趣的可扫描对象。尝试不同的月球、行星或星区。
<color=#00ffff>进行大区域扫描。</color>不适合任务。

English: <color=#ff00ff>Perform narrow band scan or launch probes for a mission.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff00ff>执行窄带扫描或为任务发射探测器。</color>
@d0 扫描到一个 <color=#ffff00>{Eden_AnomalyBonus}</color> 异常现象在 <color=#00ffff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>.

English: Calibrate scanner to scan for additional anomalies.
Chinese (simplified): 校准扫描仪以扫描其他异常。

English: @d0Scanner has been calibrated to scan for additional anomalies.\nReopen the scanner to start a new scan.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 扫描仪已经过校准,可以扫描其他异常.\n重新打开扫描仪以开始新的扫描

English: Additional anomalies detected. Calibrate scanner to scan for additional anomalies.
Chinese (simplified): 检测到更多异常,校准扫描仪以扫描其他异常.

English: @d0You must have <color=#ffffff>{Eden_ProbeCount}</color> <color=#00ff00>{Eden_ProbeTypeLoc}</color> in your personal inventory.\nProbes can be crafted under the decorations tab of a constructor, bought at traders, or found as loot.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你的背包中必须有必须有 <color=#ffffff>{Eden_ProbeCount}</color> <color=#00ff00>{Eden_ProbeTypeLoc}</color>.\n你可以在建造机的装饰栏内制造探针,在商人处购买,又或者是搜刮到探针.

English: @d0Your scanners do not pick up any anomalies that can be scanned.\nIt may be possible to find more by exploring the area,
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您的扫描仪未检测到任何可扫描的异常.\n通过探索该地区也许可以找到更多。

English: Additional anomalies detected. Calibrate scanner to scan for additional anomalies.
Chinese (simplified): 检测到更多异常,校准扫描仪以扫描其他异常.

English: Input new X coordinate of scanner
Chinese (simplified): 向扫描器输入新的X坐标

English: Input new Y coordinate of scanner
Chinese (simplified): 向扫描器输入新的Y坐标

English: Input new Z coordinate of scanner
Chinese (simplified): 向扫描器输入新的Z坐标

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of the Free Colonists.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表自由殖民者所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of the Free Colonists.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 2}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表自由殖民者所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 2}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of the Free Colonists.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 3}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表自由殖民者所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 3}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of the Free Colonists.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 4}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表自由殖民者所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 4}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表极星所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 2}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表极星所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 2}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 3}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表极星所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 3}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 4}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表极星所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 4}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 5}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表极星所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 5}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 20}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表极星所属的独立矿工联盟进行开采.\n按照协议,我们已将 <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 20}</color>信用点汇入您的账户. 这份合约已履行完毕.\n祝你今天过得愉快.

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>The pod has run out of oxygen.</color>\nThere is nothing more you can do for them now. Return to the medical android on the freighter.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>逃生舱氧气耗尽.</color>\n现在你无法为他们做什么了,回到货船上的医疗机器人那里.

English: @d0You have no way of opening this escape pod.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你没办法打开这个逃生舱.

English: Please hurry!\nMy ship's crew has only {DeltaTimeToString(Eden_OxygenTimer - GetGameTimeInSec())} oxygen remaining!
Chinese (simplified): 请快点!\n我的船员只剩下 {DeltaTimeToString(Eden_OxygenTimer - GetGameTimeInSec())} 的氧气了!
非常感谢你的帮助,我一直在监视他们的通讯,真是完美的恐惧与混乱! 这会让他们的研究倒退好几周.

English: @q0The oxygen in the escape pods will have run out by now.\nWhile you were not able to rescue all the crew, I can reward you for those you did save.\nI will transfer {50000 * Eden_CrewCount} credits to your personal bank account as a thank you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 逃生舱里的氧气现在已经耗尽.\n尽管你没能救出所有船员,但我依然会按照你救下的人发放奖励.\n我会将{50000 * Eden_CrewCount}信用点转入你的个人账户以示感谢.

English: @q0The oxygen in the escape pods will have run out by now.\nIt is unfortunate you were not able to rescue any of them.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 逃生舱里的氧气现在已经耗尽.\n很不幸的是你一个都没救出来.

English: @q0Thank you for rescuing all of my crew!\nI will transfer {75000 * Eden_CrewCount} credits to your personal bank account as a thank you.\nI will also transfer some items from the ship's cargo hold to you. Make sure you are connected to a container with plenty of free space available.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 感谢你救下了所有人!\n我会将{75000 * Eden_CrewCount}信用点转入你的个人账户以示感谢.\n同时我也会从船上的货舱转运一些货物给你。确保您已经连接到具有足够可用空间的容器.

English: Hello. I am a medical assist android model T-801. Not to be confused with the older T-800 models.\nMy crew abandoned ship and I seem to have found myself in quite the situation and could use your assistance, should you be willing.
Chinese (simplified): 你好,我是T-801型医疗辅助机器人,请不要与旧版T-800型号混淆.\n我的船员弃船了,我似乎发现自己陷入了困境,如果你愿意的话,我希望你能提供帮助.

English: <color=#00ff00>I am ready to find your missing crew. </color><color=#ffff00>(Starts timer)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我已经准备好寻找你们失踪的船员了. </color><color=#ffff00>(Starts timer)</color>

English: I want to ask something else.

Chinese (simplified): 发生了什么?你的船员呢?

English: What was wrong with the T-800 models?
How do I find the escape pods?
Chinese (simplified): 我怎么才能找到逃生舱?

English: I want to ask something else.

From my limited understanding of scanning techniques, you will want to use a scanning station or Terran equivalent to interface with system probes.
I trust you have a scanning station on board that ship of yours? If not, I'm sure you can create one in your constructor.
You will need to perform a narrow band scan using your scanning station which will then display the position of an escape pod on your HUD.
Rescue the stranded crew, and then perform another scan and repeat the process until you've rescued all the crew.
@p9You will have only a limited time to rescue the crew before they run out of oxygen.
If you can only rescue some of them that is okay. Return to me even if you fail and I will still provide a reward for any crew you did manage to save.
Chinese (simplified):
根据我对扫描技术的有限理解,您将需要使用扫描站或者你们地球人类似的设备来与系统探针进行交互.
我猜你的船上有一个扫描站?如果没有,我认为您可以在建造机中制造一个.
您需要使用扫描站执行窄带扫描,从而在 HUD上显示逃生舱的位置.
营救被困的船员,然后执行另一次扫描并重复该过程,直到营救所有船员.
@p9 在船员耗尽氧气之前,你只有非常有限的时间来营救他们.
如果你只能拯救他们中的一些人那也没关系,即使你失败了,回到我这里,我仍然会为你成功拯救的所有船员提供酬劳.

English: I want to ask something else.
We don't talk about the T-800.
I think I've seen this movie.
Chinese (simplified): 我怎么感觉在电影里见过.

English: Then I want to talk about something else.

I will give you the transponder codes and the password to open the escape pods.
You will have a limited amount of time to rescue my stranded crew from their escape pods once you start the mission.
You will need a scanning station and a large supply of <color=#00ff00>Advanced System Survey Probes</color>.
@p9<color=#ffff00>Be wary of periodic surges from the nebula that may overwhelm your ship's power systems and consider the fact we might not be alone.</color>
Are you ready to begin? Don't forget that you will want <color=#00ff00>Advanced System Survey Probes</color> before you accept this mission.
Chinese (simplified):
我会向你提供应答器代码和打开逃生舱的密码.
一旦你开始任务,你将需要在非常有限的时间从逃生舱中营救被困的船员.
您将需要一个扫描站和多个 <color=#00ff00>先进系统勘测探针</color>.
@p9 <color=#ffff00>警惕星云的周期性电涌,这可能会压垮您飞船的电力系统,并要注意我们可能并不孤单.</color>
你准备好开始了吗?别忘了在任务开始之前准备足够的 <color=#00ff00>先进系统勘测探针</color>.

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>You have successfully completed the hack. Contents retrieved from database.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ff00>您已成功完成黑入,已从数据库中获取内容.</color>

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ff8000>User </color><color=#ffff00>{Player.Name}</color><color=#ff8000> not authorized to access system.</color>\n<color=#ff8000>Security challenge required.</color>\n<color=#ff8000></color><color=#00ff00>Your virus has lost </color><color=#ff0000>{Eden_EventVirus}</color><color=#00ff00> strength.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ff8000>用户 </color><color=#ffff00>{Player.Name}</color><color=#ff8000> 没有被授权访问该系统.</color>\n<color=#ff8000>需要进行安全挑战.</color>\n<color=#ff8000></color><color=#00ff00>你的病毒已经失去了 </color><color=#ff0000>{Eden_EventVirus}</color><color=#00ff00> 强度.</color>
@d0 <color=#ff8000>需要数字序列认知判断.</color>\n<color=#00ff00>{Eden_Event1 + Eden_Event2}, {Eden_Event1 + (Eden_Event2 * 2)}, {Eden_Event1 + (Eden_Event2 * 3)}, </color><color=#ffff00>_ _</color>
输入序列中的下一个数字

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>Security challenge successful.</color>\n<color=#00ff00>Your virus has regained </color><color=#00ffff>{Eden_EventVirus + 3}</color><color=#00ff00> strength.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ff00>安全挑战成功。</color>\n<color=#00ff00>你的病毒已经恢复了</color><color=#00ffff>{Eden_EventVirus + 3}</color><color=#00ff00>力量。</color>

@d0 <color=#ff8000>需要数字序列认知判断.</color>\n<color=#00ff00>{(Eden_Event1 + Eden_Event2 + (Eden_Event3 + 3 * 1))}, {(Eden_Event1 + Eden_Event2 + (Eden_Event3 + 4 * 2))}, {(Eden_Event1 + Eden_Event2 + (Eden_Event3 + 5 * 3))}</color> <color=#ffff00>_ _</color>

English: <color=#00ffff>Chief Engineer's Log:</color>\n<color=#ff8000>I don't understand why the generators won't start.While most of our fuel was lost when we were pulled into the nebula, we were able to scrape together enough spare fuel to get us out of the nebula at sublight but nothing is working.</color>\n@p9 @d0<color=#ff8000>We've detected several power surges coming from the nebula. I believe this may have been responsible for at least some of the damage to the ship. The captain will draw the lottery within the hour to determine who gets to use the escape pods. I asked him to take my name off the list. I will keep working on the ship as long as I can to buy us as much time as possible.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>总工程师日志:</color>\n<color=#ff8000>我无法理解为什么发电机不能启动。虽说当我们被拉入星云时,我们的大部分燃料都丢失了,但我们能够凑齐足够的备用燃料,让我们在亚光速下离开星云,但就是不行.</color>\n@p9 @d0 <color=#ff8000>我们检测到了几次来自星云的电涌。我推测这至少可能是造成该船部分损坏的原因。舰长将在一小时内抽签决定谁有资格使用逃生舱,我请他把我的名字从名单上删除,好让我尽可能长时间地在船上工作,为所有人争取尽可能多的时间.</color>

English: @d0This console appears to be getting a small amount of power from somewhere though the data being displayed is scrambled beyond recognition.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 尽管显示的数据混乱到无法识别,但该控制台似乎从某处获得了少量电力.

English: Take a copy of the message.
I have a message for delivery to someone on this station.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一条消息要交给给此空间站上的某个人.

English: Here let me see. Ah yes, I am familiar with the recipient. They are currently away from the station but I will make sure they get the message.\nThis was kind of you to do for them. The Trade Federation will appreciate your efforts. I have transferred 50000 credits to your bank account for your time.
Chinese (simplified): 拿来让我看看,啊没错,我和收件人很熟,但他们目前不在空间站,但我保证会让他们收到消息.\n你做的真是太好了,贸易联盟将感谢您的贡献. 我已经将50000信用点汇入您的账户.

English:
Thank you for bringing this back. Here at Polaris Megacorp we care about all our employees.
I will make sure the intended recipient receives their message.

As thanks I have transferred 35000 credits to your account. On behalf of Polaris Megacorp, I offer you my sincerest thanks.
Chinese (simplified):
谢谢你把这个带回来,在极星巨型企业,我们关心所有员工.
我会确保收件人收到他们的消息.

作为感谢,我已将 35000信用点转入您的帐户. 我谨代表极星巨型企业向您致以诚挚的谢意.

English: Yeah I know the individual this message is meant for. Thank you for bringing it back to us, I will send it over to them as soon as possible. As thanks I have moved 25000 credits to your bank account.
Chinese (simplified): 没问题,我知道这条消息该发给谁谁的,感谢您将其带回给我们,我会尽快投递给他们.作为感谢,我已将25000信用点汇入您的账户.

English: I have a message for delivery to someone on this station.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一条消息要交给给此空间站上的某个人.

English: I have a message for delivery to someone on this station.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一条消息要交给给此空间站上的某个人.

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>This data vault will no longer allow access from user {PlayerName}.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>此数据库将不再允许该用户访问 {PlayerName}.</color>
@d0 <color=#ff0000>用户{PlayerName}无法识别.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>Access denied.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>激活防火墙: </color><color=#ffff00>{4 - Eden_HackQuantity}</color>

English: Ask IDA to analyze firewall system.

<color=#00ffff>Analyzing firewall. Please stand by...</color>
@w3 <color=#00ffff>...</color>
@w3 <color=#00ffff>...</color>
@w3 <color=#00ffff>Analysis complete. View results?</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#00ffff>正在分析防火墙,请稍候...</color>
@w3 <color=#00ffff>...</color>
@w3 <color=#00ffff>...</color>
@w3 <color=#00ffff>分析完成,是否要查看结果?</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>The computer system of this structure is protected by 4 separate firewalls operated by remote structures within the sector.\nIt will be necessary to first disable the firewalls of those structures to gain access to this structure.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>Use your detector to find additional data structures within this sector and hack into them to disable the firewalls, then return to this structure.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>该建筑的计算机系统受到星区内远程建筑操作的四个独立防火墙的保护.\n必须首先关闭这些结构的防火墙才能访问该结构.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>使用您的探测器查找该扇区中的其他数据结构并侵入它们以关闭防火墙,然后再返回到该结构.</color>

English: Ask IDA to analyze the purpose of this structure.
Chinese (simplified): 请IDA分析一下这个结构的用途.

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>This structure appears to collect data about the anomaly from nearby scanners in the sector.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>While the files are encrypted and cannot be accessed, my scans indicate large quantities of Progenitor data are stored within the data banks of this structure.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>Accessing the structure is one time only per user, so while multiple users can access the same repository, a single user can never access the same repository more than once.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>该结构的用途是从在该区域附近的扫描仪收集有关异常的数据.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>虽然文件已加密且无法访问,但我的扫描表明此结构的数据库中存储了大量的先祖数据.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>每个用户只能访问该结构一次,因此虽然多个用户可以访问同一个存储库,但单个用户不能多次访问同一个存储库.</color>

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ffc6>User {PlayerName} recognized.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Access granted.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Ensure user has free inventory space available before data retrieval.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ffc6>用户{PlayerName}已认证.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Access granted.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>确保用户在回收数据之前有可用的可用库存空间.</color>

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ffc6>Data has been placed onto data chips and given to user.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ffc6>数据已写入芯片并交给用户.</color>

English: @d0Crew Member's log:\nOn this data pad you find an unsent, encrypted message.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 船员日志:\n你在此数据板上会发现一条未发送的加密消息.

English: @d0Crew Member's log:\nYou have already retrieved the message from this pad.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 船员日志:\n您已经从此平板获取过消息了.

English:
@d0Hacking software can be used to apply various benefits.
Each software may only be used once per hacking attempt and will be consumed in the process.
Use <color=#ff0000>Hacking Software: Spam</color> to prevent the activation of randomized security challenges.
Use <color=#00ff00>Hacking Software: Overclock</color> to deactivate a firewall.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 黑客软件可用来获取各种增益.
每次黑入尝试只能使用一个软件,并且会在此过程中被消耗.
使用 <color=#ff0000>黑客软件:垃圾消息</color>来防止随机安全挑战激活.
使用<color=#00ff00>黑客软件:超频</color>来停用防火墙.

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>Your </color><color=#ff0000>Hacking Software: Spam</color><color=#00ff00> has prevented a security challenge. +3 Virus Strength.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>你的</color><color=#ff0000>黑客软件:垃圾消息</color><color=#00ff00>避免了一个安全挑战,+3病毒强度.</color>

English: Greetings. How may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): 您好,我要怎么才能帮上你呢?

English: Unfortunately our records show you are not well known enough to the Trade Federation for us to do business together.\nCome back when you have improved your reputation to at least friendly.
Chinese (simplified): 不幸的是,我们的记录显示您在贸易联盟中的知名度不足以让我们一起开展业务.\n当你的声望提高到至少友好时再回来.

English: I sell trading frequencies to several types of factories. You can use those frequencies to initiate continuous scans for a specific factory, alerting you if the factory you are looking for is on the same planet or moon as yourself. These do not pinpoint the exact location but will let you know if it's worth exploring the planet or if it's better to move on to another planet.\n@p9You will also need to use a system survey probe to initiate the scan and will need to maintain at least friendly reputation with the Trade Federation.
Chinese (simplified): 我这里出售多种类型的工厂交易频段,您可以使用这些频段来启动对特定工厂的连续扫描,如果您正在寻找的工厂与您位于同一个行星或月球上,就会收到提醒.它不会指出确切的位置,但会让您知道这个星球是否值得探索,又或是应该转移到另一个星球.\n@p9 您还需要使用系统勘测探针来启动扫描,并且需要至少与贸易联盟保持友好的声望.

English: I want to ask something else.
I want to ask something else.
Can you tell me about bulk trading?
Chinese (simplified): 你能告诉我有关大宗交易的信息吗?

English:
Bulk trading involves ferrying extremely large trade goods from one galactic region to another to make a profit.
You will need a competent freighter with plenty of cargo space and the engines to move it to get the most out of each trip.
It will also help to be honored with the factions you are trading with as you may get a better price.
@p9There are two types of bulk trading: Sealed packages and factory goods.
Sealed packages can be purchased from Trade Federation distribution headquarters in Tranquility and are then delivered to the distribution center of another faction. The size of sealed packages you can purchase will depend on your reputation.
Factory goods can be purchased from various orbital bulk factories in one region and sold to the orbital bulk factories of another region.
Chinese (simplified):
大宗贸易涉及将超大量的贸易货物从一个银河区域运送到另一个以获取利润.
您需要一艘性能强大的货船,拥有足够的货舱空间和发动机来运载货物,以便充分利用每次旅行.
这也将有助于获得与你交易的派系的尊重,从获得更好的价格.
@p9 T这里有两种类型的大宗贸易:密封包裹和工厂货物.
密封包裹可以从贸易联邦位于宁静星区的配送总部购买,然后运送到其他阵营的配送中心。您可以购买的密封包装的大小取决于您的声望.
工厂货物可以从一个地区的各个轨道工厂购买,并出售给另一地区的轨道工厂.

English: I want to ask something else.

Head to a Distribution Headquarters in a Trading Station sector inside Trade Federation territory in Tranquility.
Trading Station sectors show up on the solar system map as a white station symbol.
Speak to the traders there for the faction you want to deliver to and pay any collateral that is asked.
@p9Then head to a Distribution Center in a Trading Station sector in the territory of the faction you are delivering to. Sell it to them to get back your collateral plus a small fee for your services.
@p9A certain reputation level is required before you are allowed to fulfill delivery contracts.
Small packages require neutral with the Trade Federation.
Medium packages require friendly.
Large packages require honored.
You will also need to be neutral, friendly, or honored with the faction you are delivering to, so double check your reputation before accepting a delivery contract.
Chinese (simplified):
前往位于宁静星域贸易联盟领地内的交易站区域的分销总部.
交易站星区在太阳系星图上显示为白色的空间站符号.
与您想要交付的派系的交易员交谈并支付所要求的任何抵押品.
@p9 T然后前往您要送货的派系领土内交易站区域的配送中心。将其卖给他们以取回您的抵押品并获取少量的服务报酬.
@p9 在您被允许履行交付合同之前,需要达到一定的声望级别.
小包裹需要与贸易联盟有中立以上的声望.
中型包裹需要友好.
大型包裹需要尊敬的.
您还需要和您要交付的派系保持中立、友好或尊重,因此在接受交付合同之前请仔细检查您的声望.

English: How do I trade sealed packages?
Chinese (simplified): 我该如何交易封装的包裹

English: I want to ask something else.

Chinese (simplified): @d0 你已经搜刮过这个容器了.
@q0 @d0 这个容器可能装有高价值物品

English: @q0 @d0Items have been added to your personal or connected inventory.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 物品已添加至你的个人背包或连接的容器.

English: @d0The console is locked. Perhaps you need to destroy some of the hacked communication beacons before you can access this.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 控制台已锁定. 你也许需要破坏一些被黑入的通讯信标才能访问这里.

English: @d0This console controls the hangar door of the station.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 该控制台可以控制空间站机库门的开关.

English: @d0This test dialogue is for testing new ship warping features. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. To use: -Fully restart the game (back to windows desktop) if you have changed playfields at all in the current game session. -Sit in a ship. You MUST sit in the pilot seat of a ship. -Activate one of the options below.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这条测试对话是用来测试新的飞船翘曲特性的. 使用后果自负. 如何使用: -如果你当前游戏进程的Playfield产生了任何变化,请完全重启游戏 (也就是关闭游戏进程). -坐在船里. 你必须坐在驾驶座上. -激活以下选项之一.

English: Initiate warp to the Decay side of the gate.
Chinese (simplified): 开始折跃至星门的衰变星团一侧.

English: Initiate warp to the Andromeda side of the gate.
Chinese (simplified): 开始折跃至星门的仙女座一侧.

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>You have obtained a random schematic in your personal inventory or connected container.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>您获得了一张随机图纸,已置于背包或连接的容器内.</color>

English: @d0If you have any <color=#00ff00>encrypted schematics</color> in your personal inventory you may use this console to decrypt them and obtain a random schematic.\nYou can find encrypted schematics sometimes as rare loot.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 如果你的背包内有任意 <color=#00ff00>加密的图纸</color> 那你就可以用这个控制台进行解密并获得一张随机蓝图.\n图纸可以作为稀有战利品找到.
