English: @d0Welcome to the self help menu.\nThe lock code for this device is set to {Eden_Password}.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到自助菜单.\n该设备的锁定码设置为 {Eden_Password}.
<color=#646464>选择资源类型. (不可用-请参阅警告)</color>

English: @d0Welcome to the Industrial Water Extractor Version 2.0 setup wizard! I will guide you on your journey to setting up your very own industrial grade water extractor! Would you like to use the setup wizard, or do you want to do it on your own? Note: When you perform the survey, you will need to be connected to a BASE cargo container, NOT a ship's.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到工业水提取器2.0版安装向导!\n将指导您在您的旅程中建立自己的工业级水提取器!您是要使用安装向导,还是要自己完成??\n注意:当您进行检验时,您需要连接到 基地 的货箱, 而不是飞船的.

English: <color=#00ff00>I already know what to do. Start the survey.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我已经知道该怎么做了. 开始调查.</color>

English: @d0It appears you are already on the survey.\nIf you wish to cancel the survey, you may do so in the PDA > Tutorials > Survey > Water Survey.\nDo you need help completing the survey?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 看来你已经在调查中了.\n如果你想取消调查,你可以在PDA > 教程 > 调查 > 水资源.\n你需要帮助完成调查吗?

English: @q0 @d0Are you sure you want to fully reset this industrial water extractor?\n<color=#ffff00>You will lose all fuel, cargo, and upgrades.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 您确定要完全重置这个工业水提取器吗?\n<color=#ffff00>你会失去所有的燃料,货物和升级.</color>

English: <color=#ffff00>Yes. Perform a full reset. (CANNOT BE UNDONE)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>是的. 执行完全重置. (无法中断)</color>

English: @d0Lock code bypassed with Project Eden Admin Access Card.\nYou now have access to the debug menu of this device.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 锁码绕过伊甸园项目管理访问卡.\n现在您可以访问该设备的调试菜单.

English: @d0Now I will walk you through step by step instructions to activate your new Industrial Water Extractor. Step 1: Make sure your base is within logistics range of a biome called either Lake (English client) or Water (non-localized). You can see your current biome in the upper right corner of your on-screen HUD. Lake biomes are typically found near large bodies of deeper water, possible a couple hundred meters from shoreline. This can vary from planet to planet. Don't confuse it with an actual lake, the lake biome can be found in the ocean too. @p9 @d0You can use the Connect to Base option in the build menu (N) to place wireless extenders along the ocean floor to increase the range of your logistics so that you can remain within logistics range while entering a Lake biome even if your base is along the shore. Go ahead and make sure you have wireless reach to a Lake biome now and then come back once you are ready for step 2.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 现在我将引导您通过一步一步的说明来激活您的新工业水提取器. 步骤 1: 确保你的基地的 物流范围 覆盖一个生物聚落被称为 湖泊 (English client) 或者 水域 . 你可以在屏幕HUD的右上角看到你当前的生物群落. 湖泊生物群落通常在较深的大型水体附近发现, 可能距离海岸线几百米. 这可能因行星而异。不要把它和真正的湖泊混淆, 湖泊生物群落也可以在海洋中找到. @p9 @d0 您可以使用 链接到基地 选项来打开建筑菜单 (N)放置无线扩展器沿着海底增加你的物流范围, 这样你可以把湖泊生物群落保持在基地的物流范围内, 即使你的基地是海岸边缘建设的. 继续操作, 确保你现在的基地有无线连接到湖泊生物群落, 然后在你准备好步骤 2时回来.

English: @d0Step 2: Next you will need to connect via logistics to a cargo container on your base with at least 32000 free volume capacity. A standard cargo container won't be large enough so make sure you use a container controller with several container extenders. If you are unsure how to connect to containers using the logistics menu, there are tutorials online. Once you are able to connect to a logistics menu in a location where you enter a Lake biome, you may continue the setup wizard. Note: Do not attempt to connect to a ship's cargo container. The water report may overload your ship's generators. You may be flying a ship to perform the survey, but make sure you are connected to the cargo on a BASE.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 步骤 2: 接下来,您需要通过物流连接到 基地 内的集装货箱,并且确保拥有至少 32000 立方的空间容量. 一个标准的货物集装箱肯定是不会大的, 所以请确保您使用一个集装箱控制器与几个集装箱扩展器互相组合. 如果你不确定如何使用物流菜单连接到集装箱, 网上有教程. 一旦您能够连接到您进入湖泊生物群落的位置的物流菜单, 您可以继续安装向导. 提醒: 不要 不要试图连接飞船上的货物集装箱.水文报告样品可能会使你船上的发电机超负荷.您可能会驾驶一艘船进行试验, 但请确保您也能连接到 基地.

English:
@d0<color=#00ffff>Step 3:</color> Now it's time to perform a survey which gives you the water report you'll need to upgrade this extractor.
Equip an <color=#00ff00>Advanced Multitool</color> in your personal toolbar, you will need to use this to upgrade the extractor.
Make sure you are connected to the cargo container, and that your personal toolbar is active.
Are you ready to proceed?
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00ffff>步骤3:</color>现在是时候执行调查来获得一份水文报告,你需要用这个东西来升级提取器。
装备一个<color=#00ff00>高级多功能工具</color>在您的个人工具栏中,您需要使用它来升级提取器.
请确保您已连接到货物集装箱,并且您的个人工具栏处于活动状态.
你准备好继续了吗?

English:
@d0<color=#00ffff>Step 4:</color> You now need to perform a water survey to make sure you are in a valid build location for the extractor.
Once you activate the survey, a new PDA mission will start.
To complete the mission, you need to cross into a Lake biome from a different biome.
You can cross from Deep Water to Lake, or Shallow Water to Lake, or any other combination as long as you are going from any other biome, into a Lake biome.
@p9 @d0The moment you cross the threshold, a water report will be deposited into your connected container.
Return to the extractor and use the upgrade function of your multitool to upgrade the extractor to an active version.
You must do this within 2 minutes of receiving the report or it will spoil.
If you miss it don't worry! You can always activate the survey again.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00ffff>步骤 4:</color> 你现在需要执行一次水文调查, 请确保你的提取器是在一个有效的位置构建.
一旦你激活调查,一个新的PDA任务将开始.
要完成任务,你需要从一个不同的生物群落穿越到一个湖泊生物群落.
你可以从深水区穿越到湖泊,或从浅水区穿越到湖泊, 或任何其他组合, 只要你从任何其他生物群落进入湖泊生物群落就可以.
@p9 @d0 当您越过边界时,一份水报告将被存入您连接的容器中.
返回到提取器边上,并使用多工具的升级功能将提取器升级到激活版本.
你必须在收到报告后两分钟内完成,否则报告就会过期.
如果你错过了,别担心!您随时可以再次激活调查.

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Step 5:</color> After upgrading your extractor, interact with it and follow the on-screen instructions to finish setting up your extractor.\nThis will make that extractor your <color=#00ff00>primary extractor</color> where you will manage your extractor fuel, production, and any upgrades.\nEnjoy!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>步骤 5:</color> 升级提取器后, 与它交互并按照屏幕上的说明完成提取器的设置.\n这将使该提取器成为您的 <color=#00ff00>主要提取器</color> 您将在其中管理提取器燃料, 生产和任何升级.\n玩的开心!

English: @d0<color=#ffff00>You must pause extraction and empty all cargo before you can access the upgrade menu.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffff00>在进入升级菜单之前你必须暂停提取并清空所有货物.</color>

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>Extractor is currently in upgrade mode.</color>
You currently have <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UpgradeCount} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> Industrial Water Extractors in your network.
This is the primary controller for the network.
Interact with your other extractors to add them to the extractor network then return to this one to initialize the network.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 <color=#00ff00>萃取器当前处于升级模式.</color>
你目前有 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UpgradeCount} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> 工业水提取器在你的网络.
这是网络的主控制器.
与其他提取器交互,将它们添加到提取器网络中,然后返回到此提取器网络初始化.
<color=#00ff00>使用 </color><color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader}</color>将<color=#00ff00> 提取器</color><color=#00ff00>进行网络连接.</color>

English:
@q0 @d0You may add additional Industrial Water Extractors to form an <color=#00ff00>extraction network</color>, upgrading the whole system.
Note: the additional extractors must be kept 'inactive' so do not upgrade them via multitool.
Enable <color=#00ff00>upgrade mode</color> and walk around and interact with the additional extractors to add them as child extractors.
When you are finished, return to the primary extractor and the upgrades will be applied to the extraction network.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 可额外添加工业水萃取器形成 <color=#00ff00>萃取器网络</color>, 使整个系统升级.
提醒: 额外的提取器必须保持 '非激活' 所以不要使用多功能工具升级他们.
打开 <color=#00ff00>升级模式</color> 并四处走动并与其他提取器交互以将它们添加为子提取器.
完成后, 返回到主提取器, 升级将应用于提取网络.

English: @q0 @d0You currently have <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> extractors in the network.\nAdd this extractor to the network for 1 <color=#00ff00>Small Optronic Matrix</color>.\nManage your extraction network from your <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color>.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你目前有 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> 萃取机在网络中.\n花费1 <color=#00ff00>小光电矩阵</color>将此提取器添加到网络中.\n管理您的提取网络从您的<color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color>.

English: @q0 @d0Extractor added to extraction network.\nYou currently have <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> extractors in the network.\nInteract with additional extractors to add them to the network, or return to the <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color> to complete or cancel the upgrade process.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 提取器已经被添加到提取网络中.\n你目前拥有 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> 提取器在网络中.\n与其他提取器交互以将它们添加到网络中, 或返回到<color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color> 以完成或取消升级过程.

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>Extractor added to extraction network.</color>\nYou currently have <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> extractors in the network.\nInteract with additional extractors to add them to the network, or return to the <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color> to complete or cancel the upgrade process.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ff00>提取器已经被添加到提取网络中.</color>\n你目前拥有 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> 提取器在网络中.\n与其他提取器交互以将它们添加到网络中, 或返回到 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color> 以完成或取消升级过程.

English: <color=#00ff00>Add extractor to network for 1 Small Optronic Matrix.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>花费1个小光电矩阵将提取器将入网络中.</color>

English:
@d0<color=#00ff00>This extractor has already been added to the network.</color>
You currently have <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> extractors in the network.
<color=#00ff00></color>Note: before exiting upgrade mode, first interact with all extractors to make sure they are all added to the network.
You can cancel upgrade mode if needed.
Interact with additional extractors to add them to the network, or return to the <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color> to complete or cancel the upgrade process.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00ff00>此提取器已添加到网络中.</color>
你目前拥有 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> 提取器在网络中.
<color=#00ff00></color>注意:在退出升级模式之前, 首先与所有提取器交互以确保它们都已添加到网络中. 如果需要, 您可以取消升级模式.
与其他提取器交互以将它们添加到网络中, 或返回到 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color> 以完成或取消升级过程.

English:
@d0<color=#ff0000>You can only have a max of {Eden_Global_WaterMax} extractors in a network.</color>
You currently have <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> extractors in the network.
<color=#00ff00></color>Note: before exiting upgrade mode, first interact with all extractors to make sure they are all added to the network.
You can cancel upgrade mode at the primary extractor if needed.
Manage your extraction network from your <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color>.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#ff0000>一个网络中最多只能有{Eden_Global_WaterMax}个提取器.</color>
你目前拥有 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_Upgrader} / {Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> 提取器在网络中.
<color=#00ff00></color>注意:在退出升级模式之前, 首先与所有提取器交互以确保它们都已添加到网络中.
如果需要您可以在主提取器上取消升级模式.
管理您的提取网络从您的 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color>.

English: @q0 @d0This will remove all <color=#ff0000>{Eden_UpgradeCount}</color> extractors from the network and remove any fuel in excess of {Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax}. You will lose <color=#ff0000>{Math.Clamp((Eden_Fuel - Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax), 0, Eden_Fuel)}</color> fuel if you do not withdrawal the excess first through fuel management.\nYou will need to reconnect all extractors with upgrade mode afterwards.\nDo you want to proceed?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 这将会从网络中移除所有的 <color=#ff0000>{Eden_UpgradeCount}</color> 提取器并且删除所有超过{Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax}的燃料. 您将失去 <color=#ff0000>{Math.Clamp((Eden_Fuel - Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax), 0, Eden_Fuel)}燃料</color> .如果需要您可以在主提取器上取消升级模式.\n您可以在重置后用升级模式重新连接所有提取设备.\n你想继续吗?
<color=#ffff00>移除所有 {Eden_UpgradeCount - 1 + Eden_WaterController} 连接的提取器.</color>

English: @d0Changing this option will allow you to control your extractor network from your <color=#00ff00>science station</color> instead of your primary extractor.\nThis will remove all <color=#ff0000>{Eden_UpgradeCount}</color> extractors from the network and remove any fuel in excess of <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax}</color>. You will lose <color=#ff0000>{Math.Clamp((Eden_Fuel - Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax), 0, Eden_Fuel)}</color> fuel if you do not withdrawal the excess first through fuel management.\nYou will need to reconnect all extractors with upgrade mode afterwards.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 更改此选项将允许您将您的 <color=#00ff00>科学研究站</color> 代替你的主提取器.\n这将从网络中删除所有 <color=#ff0000>{Eden_UpgradeCount}</color> 提取器并删除所有超过 <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax}</color>的燃料. 你将会损失 <color=#ff0000>{Math.Clamp((Eden_Fuel - Eden_Global_WaterGenFuelMax), 0, Eden_Fuel)}</color> 的燃料 如过你不通过燃料管理器提取多余的燃料.\n在那之后你需要用升级模式重新连接所有提取器.

English: <color=#00ff00>Enable science station control and reset network.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>激活科学站控制器并重置网络.</color>

English: <color=#ff8000>Disable science station control and reset network.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff8000>关闭 科学站控制器并重置网络.</color>

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ff0000>There was a problem detected with your extractor network.</color>\nYour network needs to be reset.\nPlease enter upgrade mode then reconnect all your extractors.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ff0000>检测到您的提取器网络存在问题.</color>\n您的网络需要重置.\n请进入升级模式,然后重新连接所有提取器.

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ffff00>Are you sure you want to remove this extractor from the network and be refunded the upgrade cost?</color>\n<color=#ffff00>You will need to reset the rest of your network and may lose any progress towards the next batch of goods.</color>\nManage your extraction network from your <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color>.<color=#ffff00></color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ffff00> 您确定要从网络中删除此提取器并退还升级费用吗?</color>\n<color=#ffff00> 您将需要重置网络的其余部分,并且可能会丢失下一批货物的任何进度。</color>\n从 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color>.<color=#ffff00> 管理提取网络</color>

English:
@d0<color=#00ff00>This extractor is currently part of your extractor network of </color><color=#00ffff>{Eden_UpgradeCount}</color><color=#00ff00> extractors and is contributing towards overall production and storage.</color>
You can remove this extractor from the network to be refunded the upgrade cost.
Manage your extraction network from your <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo}</color>.
If you need to upgrade a secondary extractor to a new primary extractor you can perform another survey.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00> 此提取器目前是您的 </color><color=#00ffff>{Eden_UpgradeCount}</color><color=#00ff00> 提取器网络的一部分,正在为整体生产和存储做出贡献。</color>\n您可以从网络中删除此提取器以获得升级费用的退款。n从 <color=#00ffff>{Eden_ControlInfo} 管理提取网络</color>.\n如果需要将辅助提取器升级到新的主提取器,可以执行另一次调查。

English: Take me to the survey menu.
<color=#ff8000>Remove this extractor from the extraction network.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff8000>从提取网络中删除此提取器.</color>

English: @d0This extractor is currently not part of the network. Enable upgrade mode on your {Eden_ControlInfo} to add this extractor to the network. Or you can perform another survey if you need to upgrade a Primary Industrial Water Extractor again. Note for multiplayer: this extractor may have already been added to the network by another player.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 此提取器当前不是网络的一部分. 在 {Eden_ControlInfo} 上启用升级模式以将此提取器添加到网络. 或者,如果需要再次升级主工业水萃取器,可以执行另一次调查. 多人游戏注意事项:此提取器可能已被其他玩家添加到网络中.

English: Take me to the survey options.

@d0This extractor is currently in network mode but not enabled and therefor not contributing. Enable upgrade mode on your {Eden_ControlInfo} to add this extractor to the network. Or you can perform another survey if you need to upgrade a Primary Industrial Water Extractor again. Note for multiplayer: this extractor may have already been added to the network by another player.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 此提取器当前处于网络模式,但未启用,因此没有贡献. 在你的{Eden_ControlInfo}上添加这台提取器进入网络. 或者,如果需要再次升级主工业水萃取器,可以执行另一次调查. 多人游戏注意事项:此提取器可能已被其他玩家添加到网络中.

English: <color=#ff8000>Remove this extractor from the extraction network.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff8000>从提取网络中删除此提取器.</color>

English: Take me to the survey options.

Chinese (simplified): @d0 初始化提取器需要 1 个小光电矩阵.
<color=#00ff00>用 1 个小光电矩阵初始化提取器.</color>

English: I don't have a Small Optronic Matrix on me.
Chinese (simplified): 我身上没有一个小光电矩阵.
@d0 此菜单具有各种调试功能.

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ffff>Fuel:</color> {Eden_Fuel} / {Eden_FuelMax} - <color=#ffffff>{DeltaTimeToString((Eden_Fuel * Eden_FuelRate) / Eden_UpgradeCount)}</color>\nAllows you to remove fuel in the form of Large Fuel Packs.\nMake sure you are connected to a container via logistics before taking fuel out.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ffff>燃料:</color> {Eden_Fuel} / {Eden_FuelMax} - <color=#ffffff>{DeltaTimeToString((Eden_Fuel * Eden_FuelRate) / Eden_UpgradeCount)}</color>\n允许您以大型燃料包的形式回收燃料.\n在取出燃料之前,请确保您已通过物流连接到集装箱.
<color=#646464>提取燃料. (不可用,请先暂停提取)</color>

English: Use the <color=#00ff00>primary extractor</color> to control the network.
Chinese (simplified): 使用<color=#00ff00>初级提取器</color>来管理网络.

English: Use a <color=#00ff00>science station</color> to control the network.
Chinese (simplified): 使用<color=#00ff00>科学研究站</color>来管理网络.

English: @q0 @d0Congratulations! Setup of your primary extractor is now complete!\nYour extractor network will be controlled through your <color=#00ff00>primary extractor</color>.\nThe first step will be to enable upgrade mode to connect any additional extractors (up to a maximum of <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> total extractors including your primary) that you may wish to add to the network before adding fuel or selecting a resource type.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 恭喜! 现在,您的主要提取器的设置已完成!\n你的提取器网络将会通过你的<color=#00ff00>主提取器</color>进行连接.\n第一步将是启用升级模式连接任何其他提取器 (最多可以连接<color=#ffffff>{Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> 提取器,也包括你的主提取器) .

English: @q0 @d0You have chosen to use a <color=#00ff00>science station</color> to control your extractor network instead of your primary extractor.\nYou will need to place a science station on your base if you do not already have one. Science stations can be crafted in large or advanced constructors.\nYou will also need to connect your extractors to the extraction network.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你可以选择使用一个<color=#00ff00>科学研究站</color>来代替你的主提取器控制提取网络.\n如果附近没有科学研究站你需要放置一个.科学研究站可以通过大型或者先进建造机来建造.\n当然你也需要把提取器链接到网络.

English: @q0 @d0First place any additional extractors that you want, up to <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color> total including your primary extractor. These additional extractors do not need a water survey performed to use.\nThen interact with each extractor to add them to the network. You will need a <color=#00ff00>Small Optronic Matrix</color> for each one.\nWhen you have added all of them to the network, use your <color=#00ff00>science station</color> to initialize your network, add fuel, and start extracting.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 首先放置您想要的任何提取器, 最多<color=#ffffff>{Eden_Global_WaterMax}</color>包括你的主提取器. 新加入的提取器不需要水文调查报告就能使用.\n与每个提取器进行交互以将其添加到网络中. 每一台提取器都需要一个 <color=#00ff00>小型光电矩阵</color>.\n将所有这些添加到网络中后,请使用<color=#00ff00>科学研究站</color> 来初始化网络,添加燃料并开始提取.
<color=#ffffff>Hide 科学研究站 from main menu.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Show 科学研究站 on main menu.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Research points:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color>\n<color=#00ffff>Description:</color> The Progenitor Translation Matrix grants access to Progenitor computer terminals. Required to access the core system controls on Progenitor Cores and other Progenitor computer systems.\n<color=#00ffff>Cost:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> research points.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>研究点:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color>\n<color=#00ffff>Description:</color>先祖传送矩阵给与访问先祖计算机的权限. 需要访问先祖核心和其他的先祖计算机的核心控制系统 .\n<color=#00ffff>Cost:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> 研究点.

English: Create a Progenitor Translation Matrix for <color=#00ff00>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> research points.
Chinese (simplified): 用<color=#00ff00>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> 研究点创建一个先祖传送矩阵.

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Research points:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color>\n<color=#00ffff>Description:</color> Decode the Encrypted Schematic to obtain a random schematic by using a schematic computer on board a UCH Research Vessel or your science station.\n<color=#00ffff>Cost:</color> <color=#ffffff>50</color> research points.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>研究点:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color>\n<color=#00ffff>描述:</color>解码加密示意图以获得一个随机的原理图,使用UCH研究船上的原理图计算机的或使用您的科学研究站来解码.\n<color=#00ffff>需要:</color> <color=#ffffff>50</color> 研究点.

English: Create an Encrypted Schematic for <color=#00ff00>50</color> research points.
Chinese (simplified): Create an 加密示意图 for <color=#00ff00>50</color> 研究点.

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Research points:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color>\n<color=#00ffff>Description:</color> A data pad containing navigational data on the Andromeda galaxy. Allows you to plot safer and more efficient warp jumps. Increases the maximum range you can warp while piloting any ship. Turn in to Research Computers on UCH Research Vessels to increase the base range you can plot a warp jump. Increases base warp range by 1 light year.\n<color=#00ffff>Cost:</color> <color=#ffffff>50</color> research points.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>研究点:</color> <color=#ffffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color>\n<color=#00ffff>描述:</color>一个包含仙女座星系导航数据的数据板. 允许您绘制更安全,更有效的曲速跳跃路线. 增加你在驾驶任何船只时可以弯曲的最大距离.通过UCH研究船上的研究计算机来增加你的基础跳跃距离. 增加范围差不多1光年.\n<color=#00ffff>需要:</color> <color=#ffffff>50</color> 研究点.

English: Create Navigational Data for <color=#00ff00>50</color> research points.
Chinese (simplified): 用<color=#00ff00>50</color> 研究点创造导航数据.
@d0 数据平板上什么都没有.

English: @d0Gerald was here.\nThere appears to be an access card contained within this data pad.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 Gerald 在这里.\n此数据板中似乎包含一张访问卡.

English: Hello and welcome to the ship! It sure is a beautiful day here in {Player.PlayfieldName} wouldn't you say?\nKeep your eyes out for anything suspicious. We've had some weird things happening lately.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到飞船!在{Player.PlayfieldName}这里今天天气真是不错,你不觉得吗?\n注意任何可疑的事物。最近发生了一些奇怪的事情。

English: Wait, there's no day or night in space.
Chinese (simplified): 等等, 太空中是没有白天黑夜的.

English: I suppose you could say it's always day, unless you're in deep space where there's not much light then it's eternal night.
Chinese (simplified): 我觉得你应该说它是永恒的白天,除非您是在永恒之夜那样没有太多光亮的深空.

English: Okay... I want to talk about something else. Anything else.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧...我想谈谈其他事情.还有别的要说吗.

English: You're weird and I'm leaving now.
Chinese (simplified): 你很奇怪,我现在要离开了.

English: Supplies going missing. Reports of strange noises in maintenance shafts. A locked cargo box nobody seems to have the access card to.\nI am starting to think we have a stowaway. If you find anything of interest please bring it to me.
Chinese (simplified): 补给品丢失了. 报告说维护管道里有奇怪的噪音. 有个货柜锁住了,似乎没人可以使用.\n我认为我们可能有一个偷渡客. 如过你发现了什么有意思的东西就汇报给我.

English: I will keep an eye out.

Ah hah! I knew it! We do have a stowaway!
From your description of the room you found it seems they are long gone now, though I wonder how this Gerald kept hidden from us.
From what little I can make out from this log, Gerald has been going from research vessel to research vessel.
Perhaps if you visit any other research vessels you should search them for anything suspicious as well.
If you find enough logs we may be able to reconstruct it.
Chinese (simplified):
啊哈! 我就知道! 我们船上有一个偷渡客!
从你对发现对方的房间的描述来看, 他们大概早就跑了, 所以我现在想知道这个Gerald是如何在我们眼皮子地下躲起来的.
从这份日志中我所能了解到的一点情况来看,Gerald 从一艘科考船到另一艘科考船之间不断转移.
也许如果你访问其他的研究船你也应该搜索一下它们是否有可疑之处.
如果你能找到足够的日志,我们也许能弄清楚是怎么回事.

English: I want to ask something else.
I want to talk about something else.

Here we go. I've reconstructed a small part of the log. Seems it contained the access code to the cargo container we've been trying to open. How lucky!
There, I've copied the access code to a new key card that should open the container, but I don't know where it's been moved to.

Should be somewhere on the ship. You can keep whatever weird stuff you find inside.
Chinese (simplified):
让我们开始吧. 我恢复了一部分日志数据. 里面好像有我们一直想打开的那个集装箱的密码. 多么的幸运!
来, 我把密码复制到了一张新的钥匙卡上可以打开集装箱, 但我不知道它被转移到哪里了.

应该在船上的某个地方。你可以把你发现的奇怪的东西藏在里面.

English: Thank you. I will look for it.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢. 我会去找找它.

English: @d0The cargo container is locked.\nConnect to a cargo container before opening it.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个集装箱货柜是锁住的.\n打开集装箱前用物流系统连接一个容器.

English: @d0As soon as you insert the key card into the locking mechanism on the cargo container, the display starts flashing with red warning lights.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 一旦将钥匙卡插入货物容器上的锁定机构中,显示器就会开始使用红色警告灯闪烁.

English: @d0It seems Gerald never finished wiring the explosive device up to the timer. At least this time his incompetence saved your life, for once.\nAh well, you may as well take his loot while you're here.\nMake sure you're connected to a cargo container first.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 Gerald似乎从未完成将爆炸装置的接线到计时器. 至少这一次他的无能挽救了一次您的命.\n嗯,你可以顺带带走他留在这里的战利品.\n确保您先连接到任何货物容器里.

English: Leave, just in case it still explodes.
Chinese (simplified): 离开,以防万一它还是爆炸了.

English: @d0Hello, I can explain to you what teleporters do and how to make use of them.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您好,我可以向您解释传送阵的用途以及如何使用它们.

English: What restrictions are there on using teleporters?
Chinese (simplified): 使用传送器有什么限制?

English: How do I craft a teleporter?
Don't they use a lot of power?
I don't have any questions. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有任何疑问. 再见.

English: @d0It's simple! Just walk to the <color=#00ff00>teleporter</color>, interact with it, select a valid destination, and press the <color=#00ff00>Teleport</color> button and you'll be beamed off to your destination!\nTeleporters on <color=#ffff00>capital vessels</color> can only teleport within a sector <color=#ffffff>(Planet>Orbit, Planet>Moon, etc)</color>, while teleporters on <color=#ff0000>bases</color> can teleport much further.\nCheck the tooltips on the teleporter block for details.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 简单!只需步行到 <color=#00ff00>传送器</color>, 与之互动,选择一个有效的目的地,然后按<color=#00ff00>传送器</color> 按钮,然后将您传送向目的地!\n安装在<color=#ffff00>主力舰</color> 上的传送器只能在星区内传送 <color=#ffffff>(Planet>Orbit, Planet>Moon, etc)</color>,当传送器安装在<color=#ff0000>基地</color>内的时候可以传送的更远.\n检查传送器块上的工具提示以获取详细信息.

English: @d0You can only teleport TO a structure that is owned by <color=#00ff00>you</color> or a <color=#00ffff>friendly NPC faction</color>.\nYou also cannot teleport FROM a structure that has been <color=#ff8000>recently attacked</color>  or that has an <color=#ff8000>active shield</color>.\nThere is also no guarantee that the teleporter on the other end will be active, so you should only teleport to destinations you know are powered and safe.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你只能传送到 <color=#00ff00>你</color> 或者<color=#00ffff>友好的NPC势力</color>拥有的建筑中.\n你不能在 <color=#ff8000>最近被攻击</color> 或者<color=#ff8000>护盾激活</color>的建筑中传送.\n另外也不能保证另一端的传送器会处于活动状态,因此您只能传送到您所知的而且安全的目的地.

English: @d0First you must unlock the respective teleporter in the <color=#00ff00>Tech Tree</color> then craft it in an <color=#00ff00>advanced constructor</color>.\n<color=#ff0000>Bases</color> and <color=#ffff00>Capital Vessels</color> require different teleporters.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 首先你要在<color=#00ff00>科技树</color>中解锁传送器它可以在<color=#00ff00>高级建造机</color>中建造.\n<color=#ff0000>基地</color> 和 <color=#ffff00>主力舰</color> 需要不一样的传送器.

English: Welcome. I am the lead researcher here. How may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎. 我是这里的首席研究员. 我能为您做些什么??

English: <color=#00ff00>I have survey reports to turn in.</color>

Ah, thank you for completing those surveys. They have been in the backlog for awhile now.\nHere, I have some supplies that may be useful.\nMake sure you connect to a container via logistics before turning in the reports, wouldn't want your new supplies to go scattering across the lab!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你完成这些调查. 它们已经积压了一段时间了.\n这里,我有一些可能有用的用品.\n在提交报告之前,确保你通过物流连接到一个集装箱,不想让你的新物资散落在实验室里!

English: <color=#00ff00>Turn in Alpha, Beta, Delta, and Epsilon surveys.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>上交Alpha, Beta, Delta和Epsilon的调查报告.</color>

English: I want to ask something else.
I have some questions about your mission here.
Chinese (simplified): 我对你的任务有些疑问.

English: <color=#00ff00>Do you have any exploration rumors for me?</color>

Sure, there are a few exploration rumors you could follow up on.
These are not missions, so they won't be tracked in your <color=#00ff00>PDA</color>. Instead they are sightings made by members of our team or rumors from outside sources.
You simply have to find what it is and go from there.
Here's a list. Any of these sound interesting?
Chinese (simplified):
当然, 有一些探索的传闻你可以跟进.
这些不是任务, 所以他们不会在你的<color=#00ff00>PDA</color>里标记. 相反它们是我们团队成员的目击事件或来自外部来源的谣言.
你只需要找到它是什么然后从那里开始.
这是一张单子. 这些听起来有趣吗?
Rogue 星系中的神秘物体.
温带行星上奇怪的雕像.
太空中的外星人数据缓存.

English: I want to ask something else.

We've discovered a mysterious object in the Rogue System. We do not know much about it except that it's of Progenitor origin.\nYou could go there and investigate it. You can find it by searching the galaxy map for Object 82 or for Rogue System.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在游荡星系发现了一个神秘物体. 我们对它所知不多,只知道它起源于先祖.\n你可以去那里调查一下. 你可以通过在星系地图上搜索Object 82或Rogue星系找到它.

English: Several of our teams have reported finding strange statues of Tal'on origin on some temperate planets.\nThey report they are well hidden and only show up on the detector within 3000 meters. Perhaps you can investigate them if you happen to come across any in your travels.\nThey are most likely only found where you would normally find Tal'on settlements, so don't go looking in the middle of Zirax territory or anything like that.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的几个小组报告说,在一些温带行星上发现了起源于Tal'on的奇怪雕像\n他们说他们隐藏得很好,只在探测器3000米内显示出来.如果在你的旅行你碰巧遇到 也许你可以调查一下. \n它们很可能只在你通常会发现Tal'on人定居点的地方被发现,所以不要去Zirax领土中央区域或类似的地方寻找.

English:
We've found secure data caches believed to be of Progenitor origin in orbits and exploration sites in cold systems such as around M, D, or N class stars.
The data caches are impervious to all of our weapons so don't even bother trying to brute force your way in.
You will need to interface with their computer systems and hack them in order to gain any of the Progenitor data locked within.
The Research Computer here on this ship can accept the data you find from these caches.
Chinese (simplified):
我们已经在M、D或N类恒星周围的低温系统的轨道和探索地点发现了被认为是先祖的安全数据缓存.
数据缓存不受我们所有武器的影响,所以不要试图强行进入.
你将需要与他们的计算机系统连接并入侵它们,以便获得锁定在其中的任何先祖数据.
这艘船上的研究电脑可以接受你从这些缓存中找到的数据.

English: I want to talk about something else.
I don't have any more questions. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有其他问题了. 再见.

English: We are researching the remnants of an advanced civilization that lived here thousands of years ago. We call them the Progenitors, but they go by many names depending on who you ask.\nBy recovering enough information from the network of data caches, relays, and mainframes left behind by the Progenitors, we can create a translation matrix that allows access to their computer systems.\nIt's our hope that this will lead to scientific breakthroughs allowing us to find a new home for Humanity.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在研究几千年前生活在这里的先进文明的遗迹。我们称他们为先祖,但他们有很多名字,这取决于你问谁.\n通过从“先祖”留下的数据缓存、中继和主机网络中恢复足够的信息,我们可以创建一个翻译矩阵,从而可以访问他们的计算机系统.\n我们希望这将带来科学突破,让我们为人类找到一个新的家园.

English: Hello and welcome to our ship!\nWe are currently studying the nearby gas giant of Alpha I.\nShe's a beauty, isn't she?
Chinese (simplified): 你好,欢迎来到我们的飞船!\n我们目前正在研究附近的气体巨星Alpha I。\n她很美,不是吗?

English: If there are any new missions you can help with, they will be listed below.\nMissions that you have already accepted can be found in your PDA under <color=#00ff00>Solo Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>Project Eden Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color> and will not show up here.
Chinese (simplified): 如果有任何新的任务你可以帮助,他们将在下面列出。你已经接受的任务可以在你的PDA下方 <color=#00ff00>单人任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>伊甸园计划任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color>而且会一直保持.

English: I want to ask something else.

We've been so busy trying to set up these gas observatories that we haven't had a chance to complete our survey of the Alpha system.
Who knew that measuring hydrogen and water vapor levels required such sensitive and temperamental equipment?
If you were to complete the survey for us, I would be most appreciative.
I can download the details to your PDA for tracking.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一直在忙着在这些气体行星建立天文台,以至于我们没有机会完成对阿尔法星系的调查.\n谁知道测量氢气和水蒸气的水平需要如此灵敏和有气质的设备?如果你能帮我们完成这项调查,我将不胜感激. \n我可以下载详细资料到你的PDA进行追踪.
激活任务: <color=#00ff00>调查Alpha 星系.</color>

English: I want to ask something else.

Welcome board. I am captain Terrie Elck.\nI hope you take a minute to admire the view from up here. We are studying the tidal forces between these two stars.\nFascinating stuff, though I'm afraid most of it is way over my head.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎登舰.我是Terrie Elck指挥官.\n我希望你能花点时间欣赏一下这里的景色. 我们正在研究这两颗恒星之间的潮汐力.\n这个景象十分有趣,虽然我恐怕我不能理解大部分原理.

English: If there are any new missions you can help with, they will be listed below.\nMissions that you have already accepted can be found in your PDA under <color=#00ff00>Solo Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>Project Eden Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color> and will not show up here.
Chinese (simplified): 如果有任何新的任务你可以帮助,他们将在下面列出。你已经接受的任务可以在你的PDA下方 <color=#00ff00>单人任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>伊甸园计划任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color>而且会一直保持.

English: I want to ask something else.

We've been lagging behind schedule for days now. Trying to adjust our sensors to account for the gravimetric shear between these two stars has taken up far too much of our time. We haven't had a chance to complete our survey of the rest of this system yet.\nIf you were to complete the survey for us, I would be most appreciative.\nI can download the details to your PDA for tracking.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经落后计划好几天了. 我们试图调整我们的传感器来解释这两颗恒星之间的重力剪切,但是这已经占用了我们太多的时间。我们还没有机会完成对这个系统其余部分的调查. \n如果你能帮我们完成这项调查,我将不胜感激. \n我可以下载详细资料到你的PDA进行追踪.

English: I want to ask something else.

Ah, you've returned from your survey of the Alpha system. Are you ready to submit your findings?\nWe have some supplies you can have. Probably best if you <color=#ffff00>connect to a cargo container via logistics</color> before you turn the survey in.\nI will also give you a copy of the report you can hang on to until you've surveyed all 4 nearby systems. Don't lose it, I won't be able to replace it for you.
Chinese (simplified): 啊,你已经完成了对阿尔法星系的勘测.准备好提交你的发现了吗?\n我们有一些物资可以给你.在你提交勘测报告之前,最好先<color=#ffff00>通过物流连接到一个货物集装箱</color>.\n我也会给你一份报告的副本,你可以保留直到你勘测完所有4个附近的星系.不要弄丢它,我无法为你替换.

English: Not yet. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 还没有. 我想问点别的.

English: Ah, you've returned from your survey of the Beta system. Are you ready to submit your findings?\nWe have some supplies you can have. Probably best if you <color=#ffff00>connect to a cargo container via logistics</color> before you turn the survey in.\nI will also give you a copy of the report you can hang on to until you've surveyed all 4 nearby systems. Don't lose it, I won't be able to replace it for you.
Chinese (simplified): 啊,你从Beta星系调查回来了。你准备好提交调查结果了吗?\n我们有一些用品可以给你。如果您在提交调查报告之前最好<color=#ffff00>通过物流连接到货物集装箱</color>. \n我也会给你一份报告的副本,你可以一直拿着,直到你调查了所有附近的4个系统. 别弄丢了,我没办法替你换.

English: Not yet. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 还没有. 我想问点别的.

English: Welcome to the UCHN Odyssey, and our fantastic view of the Delta star!\nWe are making short range scans of the star's surface features.\nAnything I can do for you?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到UCHN奥德赛号,和我们一起欣赏Delta恒星的美景!我们正在对这颗恒星的表面特征进行短程扫描.\n我能为你做点什么吗?

English: If there are any new missions you can help with, they will be listed below.\nMissions that you have already accepted can be found in your PDA under <color=#00ff00>Solo Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>Project Eden Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color> and will not show up here.
Chinese (simplified): 如果有任何新的任务你可以帮助,他们将在下面列出。你已经接受的任务可以在你的PDA下方 <color=#00ff00>单人任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>伊甸园计划任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color>而且会一直保持.

English: I want to ask something else.

We are still studying the local star so we haven't had a chance to survey the rest of the system yet.\nIf you are able to complete a survey for us I would be most thankful.\nI can download the details to your PDA for tracking.
Chinese (simplified): 我们还在研究本地恒星,所以我们还没有机会调查星系的其他部分.\n如果您能帮我们完成一份调查,我将不胜感激.\n我可以下载详细资料到你的掌上电脑进行追踪.

English: I want to ask something else.

Ah, you've returned from your survey of the Delta system. Are you ready to submit your findings?\nWe have some supplies you can have. Probably best if you <color=#ffff00>connect to a cargo container via logistics</color> before you turn the survey in.\nI will also give you a copy of the report you can hang on to until you've surveyed all 4 nearby systems. Don't lose it, I won't be able to replace it for you.
Chinese (simplified): 啊,你从Delta星系调查回来了。你准备好提交调查结果了吗?\n我们有一些用品可以给你。如果您在提交调查报告之前最好<color=#ffff00>通过物流连接到货物集装箱</color>. \n我也会给你一份报告的副本,你可以一直拿着,直到你调查了所有附近的4个系统. 别弄丢了,我没办法替你换.

English: Not yet. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 还没有. 我想问点别的.

English: If there are any new missions you can help with, they will be listed below.\nMissions that you have already accepted can be found in your PDA under <color=#00ff00>Solo Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>Project Eden Missions</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color> and will not show up here.
Chinese (simplified): 如果有任何新的任务你可以帮助,他们将在下面列出。你已经接受的任务可以在你的PDA下方 <color=#00ff00>单人任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>伊甸园计划任务</color> > <color=#00ff00>UCH</color>而且会一直保持.

English: I want to ask something else.

We're still trying to recharge our power grid after the battle, so we haven't even begun our survey of this system yet.\nIf you could complete it for us I will make sure you get a reward from our supplies stash.\nI can download the details to your PDA for tracking.
Chinese (simplified): 我们还在试着在战斗结束后给我们的电网充电,所以我们还没有开始对这个星系进行调查.\n如果你能帮我们完成它,我保证你会从我们的储备物资中得到奖励.\n我可以下载详细资料到你的掌上电脑进行追踪.

English: I want to ask something else.

Ah, you've returned from your survey of the Epsilon system. Are you ready to submit your findings?\nWe have some supplies you can have. Probably best if you <color=#ffff00>connect to a cargo container via logistics</color> before you turn the survey in.\nI will also give you a copy of the report you can hang on to until you've surveyed all 4 nearby systems. Don't lose it, I won't be able to replace it for you.
Chinese (simplified): 啊,你从Epsilon星系调查回来了。你准备好提交调查结果了吗?\n我们有一些用品可以给你。如果您在提交调查报告之前最好<color=#ffff00>通过物流连接到货物集装箱</color>. \n我也会给你一份报告的副本,你可以一直拿着,直到你调查了所有附近的4个系统. 别弄丢了,我没办法替你换. <color=#00ff00>递交调查报告.</color>

English: Not yet. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 还没有. 我想问点别的.

English:
We recently got out of a battle with a Zirax battlecarrier. We didn't take much damage but the fight drained our fuel reserves.
We're here trying to get back some power via an experimental solar panel setup, but so far haven't had much luck.
Plus being between a star and a gas giant seems like a pretty good hiding spot.
We might be short on supplies but I'm sure there's a few we could spare for you if you check in with the quartermaster.
Chinese (simplified):
我们最近刚和一艘Zirax战斗母舰打了一场仗。我们没有受到多大损失,但战斗耗尽了我们的燃料储备.
我们在这里试图通过一个实验性的太阳能电池板装置恢复一些电力,但到目前为止运气不算太好.
在恒星和气态巨行星之间似乎是一个很好的藏身之处.
我们的物资可能会短缺,但我相信如果你和军需官确认一下,我们可以为你预留一些

English: Sure. Tell me all about hydroponics bays.
Chinese (simplified): 确定。告诉我所有关于水培的事.

English: Sounds boring. I'll leave you to your plant stuff.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来无聊。我不打扰你处理植物的事了.

English:
Hydroponics bays are advanced farming units that allow you to grow the equivalent of 9 crops in each bay.
The advantage is that it requires less manual effort to harvest because you only have to harvest once instead of 9 times for standalone crops.

They do not offer any yield or grow time benefit over planting 9 individual crops and they are more expensive to craft, so they are better for large scale farming operations where you might have to harvest dozens of bays.

@p9They are costly to unlock and require fertilizer which can only be purchased from traders, but the benefits are well worth it for the time you'll save during your harvests of large farms.

The size of your farm will determine if these bays are worth it for you.

@p9They will still require a grow light placed above them and a single hydroponics unit placed below them to function, and they do not protect your crops from any environmental hazards. If the crops inside die, you'll be left with an empty hydroponics bay and will have to craft a new one in an advanced constructor of the type of crop you want to plant.

Treat them just like you would any other crop.
Chinese (simplified):
水培容器是先进的农业单位,允许你在每个容种植相当于9个单位的作物. 
优点是它需要较少的人工收获,因为你只需要收获一次,而不是9次独立的作物. 
与种植单独的作物相比,它们没有任何产量或生长时间上的好处,而且它们的制作成本更高,所以它们更适合大规模的农业经营,你可能需要收获几十个谷地. 

@p9 解锁这个科技是十分昂贵的,它们还需要化肥,只能从商人那里购买,但好处是非常值得的,你将节省你的大型农场的收获时间. 
所以你的农场的大小将决定这些水培容器是否值得你使用.

@p9 你仍然需要在它们上面放置一个生长灯,在它们下面放置一个水培装置来发挥作用,它们不能保护你的作物免受任何环境危害。如果里面的作物死了,你就会留下一个空的水培舱,你必须用你的高级建造机制作一个新的想种植的作物类型的水培舱

所以像对待其他作物一样对待它们.
感谢您的信息。 我必须得走了。

English: Hello. How may I help you?

Chinese (simplified): 最近听到什么谣言了吗?

English: Yes. I heard about some mysterious objects found in space near the edges of the galaxy. Giant, ancient structures.
Chinese (simplified): 是的. 我听说在银河系边缘附近的太空中发现了一些神秘的物体. 巨大而古老的建筑.

English: Do you know what their purpose might be?
Chinese (simplified): 你知道他们的目的是什么吗?

English: Thank you for the information. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你提供的信息. 再见.

English: Heard they might be part of a larger puzzle, but no one has found a way in any of them.\nSome believe them to be built by a race called the Progenitors.
Chinese (simplified): 听说它们可能是一个更大谜团的一部分, 但没有人找到任何一个方法.\n有些人认为它们是由一个叫做先祖的种族建造的.

English: Heard House Rados found a large Pentaxid asteroid and built a mining station on it.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说House Rados 发现了一颗巨大的五边形小行星,并在上面建了一个采矿站.

English: They said they contracted out to House Xenu to provide powerful defense satellites, but knowing the Xenu they keep control over the defense satellites from a remote location. Wish I could strike it rich by finding an asteroid of my own!
Chinese (simplified): 有人说他们外包给Xenu议院提供强大的防御卫星, 经了解Xenu他们从一个偏远的地方控制防御卫星. 真希望我能找到一颗属于我自己的小行星,从而发家致富!

English: I'm sure you will one day. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 我相信总有一天你会的. 再见.
我的时间很宝贵。你想要什么?

English: Overheard some very loud pirates bragging a little too loudly about the next heist they were planning.\nSomething about raiding an abandoned tomb on a Desert Oasis class planet. Personally I think it's a bad idea, just because it's abandoned doesn't mean nothing lives there. Bad luck I tell you!
Chinese (simplified): 我无意中听到一些很大声的海盗在吹嘘他们计划的下一次抢劫.\n关于突袭沙漠绿洲级星球上的一座废弃坟墓的. 就我个人而言,我认为这是个坏主意,因为它被遗弃了并不意味着那里没有生命. 那里一定有啥倒霉的事情要发生!

English: Surely you don't believe in curses?
I didn't survive this long by going into creepy places. No thank you!
Chinese (simplified): 我就是靠不去那些诡异的地方才活这么久的. 当然不,谢谢!

English: You should try it sometime. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 你应该找个时间试试. 再见.
最近听到什么谣言了吗?

English: Some UCH scientist was telling me they are looking for Data Chips from Data Caches. Said he'd pay well for them too.
Chinese (simplified): 一些UCH 科学家告诉我,他们正在从数据缓存中寻找数据芯片. 他说他也会出高价买.

English: Yes. Ancient caches found in space in cold systems. Tougher than Xenosteel. You can't force your way in, you have to hack it.
Chinese (simplified): 是的. 在寒冷系统中发现的古代贮藏物. 比异种钢更坚固. 你不能强行进入,你得黑进去.

English: I'll keep an eye out for them. Thank you.
Chinese (simplified): 我会留意他们的. 谢谢.

English: Hi. May I help you with anything?
Chinese (simplified): 嗨.我能为您做点什么吗?
看到什么有趣的事了吗?

English: I was heading out to do some mining in a rogue asteroid field when I came across a damaged Zirax patrol vessel being torn apart by strange drones. Never seen anything like it! I turned straight around and came back here.
Chinese (simplified): 我正要去一个流浪小行星区采矿,突然看到一艘损坏的Zirax巡逻舰被奇怪的无人机撕成碎片. 我从来没见过这样的东西!我直接掉头回到了这里.

English: What do you think they are?
I don't know what they are. All I know is anything capable of taking out a Zirax patrol cruiser is something I want to stay far away from.
Chinese (simplified): 我不知道它们是什么. 我只知道任何能干掉Zirax巡洋舰的东西我都不想碰.

English: Sounds frightening. Glad you made it back safely. Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来可怕. 很高兴你安全回来了. 再见.
看到什么有趣的事了吗?

English: Have you seen any... wait, I am supposed to be the one to ask you, not the other way around!
Chinese (simplified): 你见过... 等等,应该是我来问你, 而不是你来问我!

English: Well, have you? You tell me something, I will tell you something. Nothing is free around here.
Chinese (simplified): 是吗?你告诉我, 我也会告诉你.这里没有免费的东西.

English: I saw some strange stuff in space and stuff. Really strange stuff. In space.
Chinese (simplified): 我在太空中看到了一些奇怪的东西. 这东西真的很奇怪. 在太空中.

English: I heard we might live in a virtual reality and our fate is not our own.
Chinese (simplified): 我听说我们可能生活在虚拟现实中,我们的命运不是我们自己的.

English: Okay! Okay! Fine I will tell you something. A friend was part of a salvage operation on a dead planet. She said they found an old emergency broadcast there. Wonder what else could be found?
Chinese (simplified): 好吧!好吧!好吧,我告诉你. 我的一个朋友参加了一场在一颗死气沉沉的星球上进行的打捞行动. 她说他们在那里发现了一个旧的紧急广播. 想知道还能找到什么?

English: That was not so hard, was it?
Overheard some Polaris corporate officers complaining about some settlers on Arid Mesa planets blocking their mining rights.
Chinese (simplified): 无意中听到一些极星公司的高管抱怨说,干旱梅萨星球上的一些定居者阻碍了他们的采矿权.

English: Let me stop you right there.
I overheard some Zirax captains talking about an ancient warp gate they had discovered.
Chinese (simplified): 我无意中听到一些Zirax舰长在谈论他们发现的一个古老的跃迁星门.

English: Did they mention where this gate was?
Chinese (simplified): 他们有提到这扇门在哪里吗?

English: Hmm... No, they didn't mention the exact location, only that it was somewhere near a place called Decay and that it was currently unpowered and they couldn't translate the alien language to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): 嗯... 不,他们没有提到确切的位置, 只说它在一个叫Decay的地方附近, 而且它目前没有能量, 他们无法翻译外星人的语言来激活它.

English: Thank you. Perhaps I will find this gate and succeed where they failed.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢. 也许我会找到这扇门,在他们失败的地方取得成功.

English: Hey. Do you have any astronomy books?
Chinese (simplified): 嘿. 你有天文学的书吗??

English: Ever since I was a child the stars fascinated me. I've been trying to get my hands on any books that I can to keep my mind engaged. Did you know that type M1Ia luminous red supergiants have an abundance of lava planets?
Chinese (simplified): 从我还是个孩子的时候起,星星就使我着迷. 我一直在努力找一些能让我保持清醒的书. 你知道M1Ia型发光的红超巨星有大量的熔岩行星吗?

English: Fascinating. Thank you for that information. Good luck on your studies.
Chinese (simplified): 令人着迷. 谢谢你提供的信息. 祝你学习顺利.

English: I'm sorry, I was only kidding! I'm interested in what you have to say.
Chinese (simplified): 对不起, 我只是在开玩笑!我对你要说的很感兴趣.

English: Yeah, one of those who is too busy! Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 是啊, 就是那种太忙的人!再见.

English: Before you go, I've been working on a small guide to star classes.\nWould you like a draft copy to read?
Chinese (simplified): 在你走之前, 我一直在写一个关于星级的小指南.\n你想要一份草稿来读吗?

English: Sure I would love one! Hand it over!

Chinese (simplified): 不, 谢谢, 我不读书.

English: A few of my friends have been searching for gravimetric sectors looking for ore. They said they can show up in space and what you find there can vary by the type of star!
Chinese (simplified): 我的一些朋友一直在寻找重力部门寻找矿石. 他们说他们可以出现在太空中,你在那里发现的东西会因恒星的类型而异!

English: Sounds like a good source of ore. Thank you.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来是个不错的矿石来源. 谢谢.

English: Be careful where you warp to. I was drunk on Talon wine when I decided it was a good idea to warp into a sector with a high amount of radio chatter. Bad idea. Barely got out with half my ship left!
Chinese (simplified): 要小心你要去的地方.我在喝了魔爪酒之后觉得去一个有大量无线电信号的区域是个好主意.后面才发现这可是个坏主意.船还剩一半的时候我才勉强逃出来!

English: Sounds right up my alley. I've been looking for a good fight.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来正合我意.我一直在找机会好好打一架.

English: I'll make sure to avoid those sectors.
Chinese (simplified): 我会确保避开那些区域的.

English: These aren't your typical bandit hideouts. They were more organized, and even called in reinforcements.\nI hope I don't find your ship in a scrapyard.
Chinese (simplified): 这些不是普通的强盗藏身处.他们更有组织, 甚至还叫来了援军.\n我希望我不会在废料场找到你的船.

English: I'm not afraid of some puny bandits.
Hello stranger. How may I help thee?
Chinese (simplified): 你好陌生人. 我能为您效劳吗?

English: Why are you talking like that?
One of my old friends has been making lots of money seeking out subspace signals in space. Best part he says is there's rarely any fighting involved.
Chinese (simplified): 我的一个老朋友在太空中寻找子空间信号赚了很多钱. 他说最好的一点是很少有打斗.

English: Oh now you talk normal... Thanks for the information.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,现在你说话正常了…谢谢你提供的信息.

English: How DARE thou maketh funeth of thy speech! Curse you! Curse you to the Legacy!
Chinese (simplified): 你竟敢拿你的话开玩笑!诅咒你!诅咒你变成遗留者!

English: I'm sorry! Has thou heard any news, fine sir?
Chinese (simplified): 我很抱歉!你有什么消息吗, 先生?

English: You know what? Forget about it.
Welcome to the briefing room.\nI don't currently have any missions for you.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到简报室.\n我现在没有任何任务给你.

English: Hello. Are you interested in learning about hydroponics bays?\nNot to be confused with hydroponic units, which hold only a single crop at a time.\nI can tell you all about them! I just love plants and these bays make farming them a little easier.
Chinese (simplified): 你好. 你有兴趣了解水培吧吗?\n不要与水培单位混淆,水培单位一次只能种植一份作物.\n我可以告诉你关于他们的一切! 我只是喜欢植物,这些水培吧让种植它们更容易一些.

English: @q0 @d0You can only see strings of unintelligible characters.\nYou cannot interface with the computer system of this ancient warp gate.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你只能看到无法理解的字符串.\n你无法与这远古时空之门的计算机系统连接.

English: @q0 @d0You can only see strings of unintelligible characters.\nYou can use your translation matrix to interface with the computer system of this ancient warp gate.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你只能看到无法理解的字符串.\n你可以用你的翻译矩阵与这个古老的曲速门的计算机系统进行交互.

English: @q0 @d0Activating translation matrix... Please stand by... @d3 @w2... @w2... @w2 ...\n@w4 @d0Translation matrix active.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 激活传送矩阵... 请等待...@d3 @w2 ...@w2 ...@w2 ...\n@w4 @d0 传送矩阵激活.

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ffc6>Warp gate status: Offline</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Core power sources active in galaxy: {Eden_ProgCoreCount} of 9</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>Error: Insufficient power to operate. Warp gate cannot be brought online until all core power sources are active.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ffc6>跳跃门状态:离线</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>星系中的有效核心能源: {Eden_ProgCoreCount} 9</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>错误: 能源不足.在所有核心电源激活之前,跳跃门无法联网.</color>

English:
@q0 Greetings commander.
I have been analyzing the data from the warp gate's memory banks and I believe I have found a clue where to find these power sources mentioned.
It appears there are subspace links between this gate and 9 locations along the outer rim of the Andromeda galaxy.
Perhaps you could begin your search there?
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 你好指挥官.
我一直在分析跳跃门记忆库的数据,我相信我已经找到了找到这些能量来源的线索.
看来在这扇门和仙女座星系外缘的9个地点之间有子空间连接.
也许你可以从那里开始找?

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#00ffc6>Warp gate status: Online</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Core power sources active in galaxy: {Eden_ProgCoreCount} of 9</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Warp gate online and configured for personal travel. Enter portal to travel to destination.</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Warp gate not configured for transportation of ships.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ffc6>跳跃门状态:在线</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>星系中的有效核心能源: {Eden_ProgCoreCount} 9</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>跳跃门在线并配置为个人旅行,进入跳跃门前往目的地.</color>

English: IDA, I'm stuck. What do I do here?
Chinese (simplified): IDA, 我被困住了. 我在这里能做什么?

English:
@q0 I can see that.
Well, if you already completed the mission here in Decay then you are free to do whatever you want, I suppose.
But if you did not receive the mission to explore Decay in your PDA then I can grant it to you now.
Of course, this won't work if you've already completed the mission or if it's already in your PDA. I hope you would know that, commander.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 我看得出来.
嗯, 如果你已经完成了《Decay》的任务,那么我想你可以自由地做任何你想做的事情.
但是如果你没有在你的PDA中收到探索衰变的任务 那么我现在可以把它授予你.
当然, 如果你已经完成了任务, 或者它已经在你的PDA中,这就行不通了. 我希望你能明白, 指挥官

English: <color=#00ff00>Please upload the mission to my PDA.</color>

@q0 @d0<color=#00ffc6>Warp gate status: Offline</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Core power sources active in galaxy: {Eden_ProgCoreCount} of 9</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Power levels are sufficient to bring warp gate online.</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Begin activation sequence?</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ffc6>跳跃门状态:离线</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>星系中的有效核心能源: {Eden_ProgCoreCount} 9</color>能量水平足以使星门联机.</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>开始激活程序?</color>
存放 {Eden_StackSize} 翘曲水晶(精炼).

English: @q0 @d0You can only see strings of unintelligible characters.\nYou cannot interface with the computer system of this installation.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你只能看到无法理解的字符串.\n您无法与此安装的计算机系统进行交互.

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#00ffc6>Core status: Active</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Cores active in galaxy: {Eden_ProgCoreCount}</color><color=#00ffc6>
Power level: 100%</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Subspace link destination: Andromeda-Decay Warp Gate</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Subspace link coordinates: 680,120,-20</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 <color=#00ffc6>核心状态: 激活</color>
<color=#00ffc6>银河系中激活的核心数量: {Eden_ProgCoreCount}</color><color=#00ffc6>
能量水平: 100%</color>
<color=#00ffc6>亚空间连接目的地:衰变仙女座跃迁之门</color>
<color=#00ffc6>亚空间连接坐标: 680,120,-20</color>

English: @q0 @d0You can only see strings of unintelligible characters.\nYou cannot interface with the computer system of this installation.\nThis core appears to already be activated.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你只能看到无法理解的字符串.\n您无法与此安装的计算机系统进行交互.\n这个核心似乎已经被激活了.

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ffff00>WARNING: Activation of core will burn out your translation matrix. You will be unable to use it to activate additional cores and will have to create another.</color>\nA burned out translation matrix can still be used for later missions but will not activate cores.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ffff00>警告:激活核心将过载烧毁你的传送矩阵. 您将无法使用它来激活额外的核心,不得不创建另一个.</color>\n一个烧毁的翻译矩阵仍然可以用于以后的任务,但不会激活核心.

English: @q0 @d0You can only see strings of unintelligible characters.\nYou cannot interface with the computer system of this installation using a depleted translation matrix.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你只能看到无法理解的字符串.\n使用耗尽的传送矩阵您无法与此安装的计算机系统进行交互.

English: Welcome to our town. How can I be of service?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的小镇. 我能为您做些什么?

English: Why did you colonize this planet?
Chinese (simplified): 你们为什么要殖民这个星球?

English: We chose {Player.PlayfieldName} because it's so desolate. Some of the Terrans and aliens you see here were fed up with war or politics. Others have a past they'd rather leave behind. We keep to ourselves and life is simple here. That is, until that warlord showed up.
Chinese (simplified): 我们选择{Player.PlayfieldName}因为这里太荒凉了. 你在这里看到的一些人族和外星人厌倦了战争和政治. 有些人宁愿把过去抛在脑后. 我们保持自我,这里的生活很简单. 直到那个军阀出现.

English: Warlord? Why would a warlord come to a planet like {Player.PlayfieldName}?
Chinese (simplified): 军阀?为什么一个军阀会来到一个像{Player.PlayfieldName}这样的星球?

English: Why does any warlord do anything? Power. During our trades with the local Talon we heard rumors of an ancient relic they had discovered and kept secret. Perhaps this warlord is after the same thing?
Chinese (simplified): 什么事情会让军阀做任何事情?当然是力量. 在我们和当地的塔隆人交易的过程中,我们听到传言说他们发现了一件古老的遗物,并一直保密. 也许这个军阀也是这么想的?

English: I want to ask something else.

As a matter of fact, I do. We've lived on this planet without much incident but recently a Zirax warlord moved in, attacking a Talon village and building a fortress. I'm worried he will turn his eyes on us soon.
Chinese (simplified): 事实上,我知道. 我们一直生活在这个星球上,没有发生什么意外,但最近一个齐拉克斯的军阀来了, 袭击了一个Talon人的村庄,并建立了一座堡垒. 我担心他很快就会把目光转向我们.

English: Sounds easy. I've destroyed plenty of Zirax fortresses.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来很容易.我摧毁了很多齐拉克斯的堡垒.

English: You haven't taken on one like this before. It's made out of some kind of special alloy. Completely impenetrable to normal weapons. But there is a way in. They set up a teleporter in the village they destroyed. It's encrypted but I have a plan to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): 你以前没接遇到过这样的对手. 它是由某种特殊合金制成的. 普通武器完全无法穿透. 但是有一条路可以进去. 他们在被摧毁的村庄里设置了传送器. 它是加密的,但我有一个激活它的计划. How do I activate the teleporter?

English: How do I activate the teleporter?

When we first colonized the planet we set up an array of com relays along the mountain ranges. It's possible they picked up some of the Zirax transmissions. If you were to obtain some of the communication logs from the relays, I might be able to decipher the password used on the teleporter. 3 communications logs should be enough.
Chinese (simplified): 当我们第一次殖民这个星球时,我们沿着山脉建立了一系列通讯中继.有可能他们接收到了一些Zirax的信号.如果你能从中继器上拿到一些通讯记录,我也许能破译传送器上的密码. 3个通信日志就足够了.

English: I will bring you 3 communications logs.
Chinese (simplified): 我会给你带来三份通讯记录.

English: I want to ask something else.
I want to ask something else.
I want to ask something else.

Yes, there is enough data here to decrypt the password for the teleporter... @w4There we go. Here is an access key that you can use to power up the teleporter. You can find the Ruined Village on the planet. Good luck.
Chinese (simplified): 是的, 这里有足够的数据来解密传送器的密码...@w4 好了. 这里有一把钥匙,你可以用它来启动传送器.你可以在这个星球上找到废墟村.祝你好运.

English: I want to ask something else.

I'm terribly sorry but it appears your PDA is bugged and I cannot complete this mission for you.\nI've already given you the reward for turning in this mission, so you can go ahead and deactivate this mission and ignore it. It won't interfere with any of your other missions or cause you any problems in the future.\nYou can blame our PDA engineer Ravien for that.
Chinese (simplified):
非常抱歉,你的PDA似乎被窃听了,我无法为你完成这个任务.
我已经给了你完成这个任务的奖励,所以你可以继续取消这个任务,忽略它.
它不会干扰你的任何其他任务,也不会在未来给你带来任何问题.
你可以怪我们的PDA工程师拉维恩.

English: Well okay then I will blame him!
I want to ask something else.
You cannot harm me through my shield, so don't even try.
Chinese (simplified): 你无法透过我的护盾伤害我,所以别想了.

English: I have come to end your reign!
End it? Hahahahaha. My reign has just begun! You cannot even imagine the powers that will soon be at my command! You will die, just like those insects did in the village.
Chinese (simplified): 结束了吗?Hahahahaha. 我的统治才刚刚开始!你甚至无法想象我即将掌握的力量!你会死的, 就像村子里的那些虫子一样.

English: Why did you attack that village? They posed you no threat!
Chinese (simplified): 你为什么要袭击那个村庄?他们对你没有威胁!

English: They had something that I needed. Something... Valuable.
Chinese (simplified): 他们有我需要的东西.某物... 有价值的.

English: What could be so valuable here on this desolate rock?
Chinese (simplified): 在这块荒凉的岩石上有什么如此珍贵的东西?

English: I discovered part of a key. And I discovered it held a great power known as VOID. The little Talon were sitting right on top of it! They never knew what power laid just beneath their feet. Power of teleportation! With this artifact, I can teleport soldiers to anywhere! Including this room...
Chinese (simplified): 我发现了一把钥匙的一部分.我发现它拥有一种叫做虚空的强大力量.。小小的泰隆部落正在它上面!他们从不知道脚下的力量是什么.传送的力量!有了这个神器,我可以传送士兵到任何地方!包括这个房间...

English: I will stop you now, no matter how many soldiers you send! <color=#ff0000>(Begin fight)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 我现在就会阻止你,不管你派多少兵来!<color=#ff0000>(开始战斗)</color>

English: I am done talking to you.
I am done talking to you.
I am done talking to you.
I will leave you be... For now.
Oh, you're still alive. Go, take your reward and leave me be. The door on the other side of the room should open momentarily. But know this, they are coming for you. They are coming for us all.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,你还活着.去吧,拿着你的报酬,别管我.房间另一边的门马上就会打开.但你要知道,他们会来找你的.他们是冲着我们来的.

English: I will leave you here in defeat.
You should focus on defending yourself, not on talking to me.
Chinese (simplified): 你应该专心防御好自己,而不是跟我说话.

English: @d0If you have any <color=#00ff00>encrypted schematics</color> in your personal inventory you may use this console to decrypt them and obtain a random schematic.\nYou can find encrypted schematics sometimes as rare loot.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 如果你的背包内有任意 <color=#00ff00>加密的图纸</color> 那你就可以用这个控制台进行解密并获得一张随机蓝图.\n图纸可以作为稀有战利品找到.

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>You have obtained a random schematic in your personal inventory or connected container.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>您获得了一张随机图纸,已置于背包或连接的容器内.</color>

English: @d0This computer console contains several log entries.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个计算机控制台包含几个日志条目.

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Log #13:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>We won the war. At least that's what they tell us. Does anyone truly win nuclear war?\nOxygen is running low so the rest of the survivors went into cryosleep while I stayed awake to keep an eye on things. A transport should be coming to pick us up in a few days and take us to the Ark.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>日志 #13:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>我们赢得了战争. 至少他们是这么告诉我们的. 有人能真正赢得核战争吗?\n氧气快用完了,所以其余的幸存者都进入了低温睡眠状态,而我则保持清醒,密切关注事态的发展. 过几天会有一艘运输船来接我们,带我们去方舟.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Log #14:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>It's been a week and no transport has shown up. When I asked how long it will be I was told another 24 hours.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>日志 #14:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>已经一周了,没有运输工具出现.当我问还有多长时间时,我被告知还有24小时.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Log #15:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>It's been 3 weeks. A few days ago I stopped receiving any signals from the Ark or from UCH Command. I fear the worst.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>日志 #15:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>已经三个星期了。几天前,我不再接收到任何来自方舟或联合司令部的信号.我担心最坏的情况.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Log #16:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>I made the decision to brave the radiation and venture outside. It's been 3 months and there is no more food here. Perhaps I can scavenge for something in the nearby ruins.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffff>日志 #16:</color>\n<color=#ff0000>我决定冒着辐射出去冒险.已经三个月了,这里没有食物了.也许我可以在附近的废墟中寻找一些东西.</color>

English: @d0Planetary scans complete.\nReports ready to review.\nYou notice a key card is still in the console.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 行星扫描完成。\n报告已准备好供您审阅。\n您注意到一个关键卡仍然插在控制台上。

English: @d0Tactical Report: Ripper Dog and Drone patrols active. Makeshift Outposts under construction near areas of strategic importance. All drone carriers have crash landed on the planet or nearby moons. Remaining convoy ships in orbit heavily damaged and in need of repair. Emergency signal unable to send.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 战术报告: 撕裂狗和无人机巡逻活跃. 在战略要地附近建造临时前哨. 所有无人机母舰都坠毁在星球或附近的卫星上. 轨道上剩余的护卫舰严重受损,需要维修. 无法发送紧急信号.

English:
@d0<color=#00ffff>Geographical Report:</color>
Designation: {Player.PlayfieldName}.<color=#00ffff></color>
Rough terrain with steep cliffs and mountainsides. Iron ore detected along some canyon walls.
Low temperatures, high ambient radiation, and hotspots of geological activity detected.
Scans detect several small cave systems, possible hiding areas of escaped prisoners.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00ffff>地理报告:</color>
指定目标: {Player.PlayfieldName}.<color=#00ffff></color>
在一些峡谷壁上发现了铁矿. 
探测到低温、高环境辐射和地质活动热点. 
扫描发现了几个小洞穴系统,可能是逃犯的藏身之处.

English:
@d0<color=#00ff00>Biological Report:</color>
Several life forms have been detected living on the surface or underground.
<color=#ff00ff>Sandworms:</color> <color=#00ffff>Passive</color>. Potential source of food. Detected on most areas of the planet's surface.
<color=#ff00ff>Argos:</color> <color=#ff0000>Hostile</color>. Potential source of food. Detected on most areas of the planet's surface.
<color=#ff00ff>Gigas:</color> <color=#ff0000>Hostile</color>. Potential source of resources. Detected on some areas of the planet's surface.
<color=#ff00ff>Wood Walkers:</color> <color=#ff0000>Hostile</color>. Potential source of wood and plant fiber. Found in some areas, most often during night.
<color=#ff00ff>Dead Wood:</color> <color=#00ff00>Not hostile</color>, we hope. Potential source of wood and plant fibers. Detected on top of mountains.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 <color=#00ff00>生物报告:</color>
在地表或地下检测到几种生命形式。
<color=#ff00ff>沙虫:</color> <color=#00ffff>被动</color>。潜在的食物来源。在星球表面的大部分区域检测到。
<color=#ff00ff>阿戈斯:</color> <color=#ff0000>敌对</color>。潜在的食物来源。在星球表面的大部分区域检测到。
<color=#ff00ff>巨人:</color> <color=#ff0000>敌对</color>。潜在的资源来源。在星球表面的一些区域检测到。
<color=#ff00ff>木行者:</color> <color=#ff0000>敌对</color>。潜在的木材和植物纤维来源。在某些区域发现,通常在夜间。
<color=#ff00ff>枯木:</color> <color=#00ff00>非敌对</color>,我们希望如此。潜在的木材和植物纤维来源。在山顶检测到。

English: @d0Damage Report:\nShip heavily damaged. Main engineering section missing. Emergency transmitters destroyed. Exterior weapons systems offline.\nWARNING: Prison cell security compromised!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 损伤报告:\n飞船严重损坏。主要工程部分缺失。紧急发射器被毁。外部武器系统离线。\n警告: 监狱牢房安全受到威胁!

English: My... My name is Commander Johnson. Maria Johnson. I was stationed on a UCHN Frigate when we were attacked by Zirax.
Chinese (simplified): 我…我是约翰逊指挥官。玛丽亚·约翰逊. 当我们被齐拉克斯袭击时,我驻扎在海军护卫舰上.

English: Before they attacked they hailed us and told us if we surrendered 5 of our crew, they'd let the rest go. Mentioned something about a bounty from House Abyssal.
Chinese (simplified): 在他们袭击我们之前, 他们向我们打招呼, 说如果我们交出5名船员,他们就放了其余的人.他们提到深渊家族的赏金.

English: After I was captured, one of the Zirax officers took me down here where an Abyssal scientist performed experiments on me.\nThey kept injecting me with something they called Infection Strain 127-B. Then they'd draw my blood. Over and over again.
Chinese (simplified): 我被俘后,一个齐拉克斯军官把我带到这里一个深海科学家在我身上做实验.\n他们不停地给我注射他们称之为感染菌株127-B的东西. 然后他们会抽我的血. 一遍又一遍.

English: Don't worry, we'll get out of here.

No no no, it's too late for me! I'm too sick and trapped in a stasis field. You'll never get these doors open in time. Go and save yourself. The rest of the Humans in Andromeda must hear what happened here. They must be warned, the Abyssal are after us!
Chinese (simplified): 不不不,对我来说太晚了!我病得太重了,被困在停滞力场里.你不可能及时打开这些门的.去救你自己吧.仙女座的其他人类一定是听到什么发生在这里.必须警告他们, 深渊在追我们!

English: Wait, before you go I have something that will help you. In the crash the Abyssal scientist dropped his Blue KeyCard and I was able to grab it. Here, take it. Maybe it can be of some use to you.
Chinese (simplified): 等等,在你走之前我有东西可以帮助你。在坠机中,深渊科学家掉落了他的蓝色钥匙卡,我设法抓住了它。给你,也许它对你有用。

English: I will make sure they pay.
Chinese (simplified): 我会让他们付出代价的.

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Medical lock down on crew quarters in effect.</color>
<color=#00ff00>Lift medical lock down on crew quarters.</color>
@d0<color=#00ff00>Medical lock down lifted. Crew quarters are now accessible.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ff00>解除医疗封锁船员宿舍现在可以进入.</color>
查看首席医疗官的日志.

English: You are an enemy of our people and I will not speak with you! Now begone from our sacred temple!
Chinese (simplified): 你是我们人民的敌人,我不会和你说话的!现在滚出我们的圣殿!

English: Welcome to our temple, traveler. Please help us! Filthy Zirax pirates have raided our sacred tomb and our ancient relics are in danger! If you were to retrieve the Relic of the Sun, we would be in your debt.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的寺庙, 旅行者.请帮助我们!肮脏的Zirax 海盗袭击了我们神圣的坟墓,我们的古代文物处于危险之中!如果你能找回太阳圣物,我们就欠你人情了.

English: Thank you for your help recovering our sacred relic from our tomb.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮助我们从坟墓中找到圣物.
告诉我关于这个坟墓的事.

English: The tomb is where we buried many of our most holy artifacts, but it fell into disarray long ago. Both clans had placed their most holy relics inside the tomb for safekeeping, but with the Zirax pirates trying to get in they are no longer safe. The tomb is guarded by many traps and creatures, and will take cunning and skill to make it out alive.
Chinese (simplified): 这座坟墓是我们埋葬许多最神圣的文物的地方,但它很久以前就陷入了混乱. 两个部族都把他们最神圣的遗物放在坟墓里保管,但由于齐拉克斯海盗试图进入, 他们不再安全. 坟墓被许多陷阱和生物守卫着,需要狡猾和技巧才能活着出来.

English: What is the significance of these relics?
Chinese (simplified): 这些文物的意义是什么?

English: They have been passed down by our ancestors ever since we first settled on this world. Every year, we bring them out of the tomb to recharge our temples on the holy day of Osarius before returning them to their resting place. But with the Zirax at the tomb, we have been unable to retrieve our relics!
Chinese (simplified): 自从我们第一次在这个世界上定居下来,它们就被我们的祖先传下来了. 每年,我们都会在奥萨里乌斯圣日把它们从坟墓里拿出来,给我们的寺庙补充能量,然后再把它们放回它们的安息之地. 但由于齐拉克斯在坟墓里,我们无法取回我们的圣物!

English: I was not aware Tal'on possessed advanced technology.
Chinese (simplified): 我不知道Tal'on拥有先进的技术.

English: Long ago, our ancestors came to this world fleeing a great war. They built these temples. While their secrets have become lost to the sands of time, we still honor their great migration and keep the temples powered.
Chinese (simplified): 很久以前,我们的祖先为了躲避一场大战来到这个世界.他们建造了这些寺庙.虽然他们的秘密已经消失在时间的沙滩上,但我们仍然尊重他们的伟大迁徙,并保持寺庙的嫩远.

English: You've found it! You've found the Relic of the Sun! Thank you. Now our temple's power will be restored. As a token of our gratitude, I shall give you a fragment of our holy relic. Hold on to it, you might find use for it.
Chinese (simplified): 你找到了!你找到了太阳圣物!谢谢. 现在我们神殿的力量将被恢复. 为了表示我们的感激之情,我将给你一块圣物的碎片. 拿着它,你可能会找到用得上的.

English: Never mind. I'm going to keep it for now.
Chinese (simplified): 别介意. 我现在要留着它.

English: You are an enemy of our people and I will not speak with you! Now begone from our sacred temple!
Chinese (simplified): 你是我们人民的敌人,我不会和你说话的!现在滚出我们的圣殿!

English: Thank you for your help recovering our sacred relic from our tomb.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮助我们从坟墓中找到圣物.
告诉我关于这个坟墓的事.

English: What is the significance of these relics?
Chinese (simplified): 这些文物的意义是什么?

English: I was not aware Tal'on possessed advanced technology.
Chinese (simplified): 我不知道Tal'on拥有先进的技术.

English: Welcome to our temple, traveler. Please help us! Filthy Zirax pirates have raided our sacred tomb and our ancient relics are in danger! If you were to retrieve the Relic of the Moon, we would be in your debt.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的寺庙,旅行者。请帮助我们!肮脏的Zirax海盗袭击了我们神圣的坟墓,我们的古代文物处于危险之中!如果你能找回月之圣物, 我们就欠你人情了.

English: The tomb is where we buried many of our most holy artifacts, but it fell into disarray long ago. Both clans had placed their most holy relics inside the tomb for safekeeping, but with the Zirax pirates trying to get in they are no longer safe. The tomb is guarded by many traps and creatures, and will take cunning and skill to make it out alive.
Chinese (simplified): 这座坟墓是我们埋葬许多最神圣的文物的地方,但它很久以前就陷入了混乱. 两个部族都把他们最神圣的遗物放在坟墓里保管,但由于齐拉克斯海盗试图进入, 他们不再安全. 坟墓被许多陷阱和生物守卫着,需要狡猾和技巧才能活着出来.

Every year, we bring them out of the tomb to recharge our temples on the holy day of Osarius before returning them to their resting place. But with the Zirax at the tomb, we have been unable to retrieve our relics!
Chinese (simplified): 自从我们第一次在这个世界上定居下来,它们就被我们的祖先传下来了. 每年,我们都会在奥萨里乌斯圣日把它们从坟墓里拿出来,给我们的寺庙补充能量,然后再把它们放回它们的安息之地. 但由于齐拉克斯在坟墓里,我们无法取回我们的圣物!

English: Long ago, our ancestors came to this world fleeing a great war. They built these temples. While their secrets have become lost to the sands of time, we still honor their great migration and keep the temples powered.
Chinese (simplified): 很久以前,我们的祖先为了躲避一场大战来到这个世界.他们建造了这些寺庙.虽然他们的秘密已经消失在时间的沙滩上,但我们仍然尊重他们的伟大迁徙,并保持寺庙的嫩远.

English: You've found it! You've found the Relic of the Moon! Thank you. Now our temple's power will be restored. As a token of our gratitude, I shall give you a fragment of our holy relic. Hold on to it, you might find use for it.
Chinese (simplified): 你找到了!你找到了月之圣物!谢谢. 现在我们神殿的力量将被恢复. 为了表示我们的感激之情,我将给你一块圣物的碎片. 拿着它,你可能会找到用得上的.

English: Never mind. I'm going to keep it for now.
Chinese (simplified): 别介意. 我现在要留着它.

English:
