<color=#00ffc6>Attempting connection...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Initiating handshake...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Sending initial codebreaker package...</color> <color=#ffff00>Failed!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Sending secondary codebreaker package...</color> <color=#ffff00>Failed!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Sending backup codebreaker package...</color> <color=#ffff00>Failed!</color><color=#ffff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Releasing cache...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color><color=#ffff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Rewriting machine learning platform...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Initiating machine learning platform...</color> <color=#ffff00>Unspecified warning!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Releasing cache...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color><color=#ffff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Rewriting machine learning platform attempt 2...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>Initiating machine learning platform...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>System ready check...</color> <color=#00ff00>Success!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d1 <color=#00ffc6>检测接口协议....</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color>
<color=#00ffc6>尝试连接...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color>
<color=#00ffc6>发起握手协议...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color>
<color=#00ffc6>发送初始破码器包...</color> <color=#ffff00>失败!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>发送二级破码器包...</color> <color=#ffff00>失败!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>发送备份密码破解包...</color> <color=#ffff00>失败!</color><color=#ffff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>释放缓存...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color><color=#ffff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>重写机器学习平台...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>启动机器学习平台...</color> <color=#ffff00>未知警告!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>释放缓存...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color><color=#ffff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>重写机器学习平台尝试 2...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>启动机器学习平台...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color><color=#00ff00></color>
<color=#00ffc6>系统就绪检查...</color> <color=#00ff00>成功!</color><color=#00ff00></color>

English: <color=#00ff00>Authenticating user...</color> @w2<color=#00ff00>User {PlayerName} recognized.</color>\n@w4<color=#00ff00>Full systems access granted.</color>\n@w4<color=#00ff00>Welcome back, sir. Would you like to view your last log entry?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>验证用户...</color>@w2 <color=#00ff00>用户 {PlayerName} 被识别.</color>\n@w4 <color=#00ff00>完整系统数据访问权限.</color>\n@w4 <color=#00ff00>欢迎回来,先生。您想查看上次的日志记录吗?</color>

English: Yes please. Show me my log.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,请. 给我看看我的日志.

English: Not right now, I don't need another reminder of what happened. In fact delete it.
Chinese (simplified): 现在不行,我不需要再提醒我发生了什么。事实上,删除它.

English: @q0 @d0You can only see strings of unintelligible characters.\nYou cannot interface with the computer system of this ancient warp gate.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你只能看到无法理解的字符串.\n你无法与这远古时空之门的计算机系统连接.

English: @q0 @d0Activating translation matrix... Please stand by... @d3 @w2... @w2... @w2 ...\n@w4 @d0Translation matrix active.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 激活传送矩阵... 请等待...@d3 @w2 ...@w2 ...@w2 ...\n@w4 @d0 传送矩阵激活.

English: @d0A barely functioning escape pod. It is impossible to tell what is inside without opening it.\nMake sure you are connected to a container via logistics in case the contents are too large to fit in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 逃生舱几乎失灵. 不打开它是不可能知道里面是什么东西的.\n确保您通过物流连接到集装箱,以防内容物太大而无法放入您的个人库存.

English: @q0 @d0<color=#00ffff>Current Lock Code:</color> {Eden_Password}\nEnter new lock code. Set to <color=#00ff00>0000</color> for public access.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#00ffff>当前锁定密码码:</color> {Eden_Password}\n输入一个新的锁定密码. 设置为<color=#00ff00>0000</color>来允许公共访问.

English: @q0 @d0You have entered an invalid lock code. The lock code must be a positive number.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 您输入了无效的锁定密码. 锁定密码必须为正数.

English: @d0This wreck is on the verge of a critical failure at any moment.\nYou may be able to stabilize the systems by hacking into this diagnostic computer.\nIf you fail the hack, or if you get too close the wreck may explode.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这艘沉船随时处于严重故障的边缘.\n你可以侵入这台诊断计算机,使系统稳定下来.\n如果你没有成功,或者你靠得太近,残骸可能会爆炸.

English: @d0The core of the beacon has been destroyed. There is nothing that can be done with it now.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 信标核心已被摧毁.现在已经没有什么办法了.

English: @d0This beacon is damaged and in need of repair before it can be fully activated. Once active you can use it to contact the owners of the beacon.\nBringing it fully online will require {Eden_RepairItemCount} {Loc(Eden_RepairItemType)}.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个信标损坏了,需要在完全激活之前进行修复。一旦激活,您可以使用它来联系信标的所有者。将其完全在线需要 {Eden_RepairItemCount} {Loc(Eden_RepairItemType)}.

English: @d0The beacon has been activated and is now transmitting at full power and ready for 2-way communication.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 信标已经启动,现在正全速发射,准备进行双向通信.

English: Thank you for contacting the Polaris MegaCorp customer support center.\nI am representative number {Random(500,20000)}, how may I assist you today?
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您联系极星巨型企业客户支持中心.\n我是代表号码{Random(500,20000)}, 今天我能为您做些什么?

English: <color=#00ff00>I am sending you the coordinates to one of your distress beacons.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我把你们其中一个遇险信标的坐标发给你们.</color>

English:
Polaris MegaCorp thanks you for your assistance.
We will dispatch a salvage and recovery specialist to recover whatever wreckage remains.
I have been authorized to transfer 10000 credits to your account.
Was there anything else I can assist you with today?
Chinese (simplified):
极星巨型企业感谢您的协助e.
我们将派遣一名打捞和恢复专家来打捞残骸.
我已被授权向您的账户转账10000个积分e.
今天还有什么需要我帮忙的吗?
没有 谢谢. 再见.

English: <color=#646464>You do not have the required materials to repair this beacon.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#646464>你们没有修理这个信标所需的材料.</color>

English:
@q0Commander, IDA here.
I have scanned the beacon and noticed something odd.
It appears someone has tampered with the beacon and changed its transmission frequency to one frequently used by bandits and raiders.
If you activate this beacon there's a chance whoever tampered with it will come back, thinking you easy prey.
I would only activate it if you are ready for a fight.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 指挥官,我是IDA.
我已经扫描了信标,发现了一些奇怪的事情.
看来有人对信标动了手脚,把它的发射频率改成了强盗和突袭者常用的频率.
如果你激活了这个信标不管是谁动的,都有可能回来,以为你很容易下手.
我只会在你准备好战斗时激活它.

English: <color=#ff0000>I look forward to a fight. Activate the beacon.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>我期待着一场战斗.启动信标.</color>

English: Best to leave it alone then.
You have reached the local Trade Federation Logistics Support Hotline.\nPlease state the reason for your call.
Chinese (simplified): 您已拨打当地贸易联合会物流支持热线.\n请说明打电话的原因.

English: <color=#00ff00>I found one of your distress beacons. I am sending you the coordinates to it now.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我发现了一个你的求救信标.我现在把坐标发给你.</color>

English: This is a Free Colonist secure channel. How did you get this frequency?
Chinese (simplified): 这是自由殖民者的安全频道. 你怎么得到这个频率的?

English: <color=#00ff00>I found an emergency beacon belonging to someone in the Free Colonists.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我发现了一个属于自由殖民者的紧急信标.</color>

English:
Received, thank you.
Ah yes, we did have a few shipments go missing around that sector. I will make sure that the wreckage is towed back and the families of those lost are contacted.
The Trade Federation owes you a debt, and to pay it I transferred 15000 credits into your account.
Have a nice day and thank you for choosing the Trade Federation.
Chinese (simplified): 收到,谢谢.\n噢,是的,我们确实有几批货在那个区域丢失了。我将确保将飞机残骸拖回来,并与遇难者家属取得联系.贸易联盟欠你一笔,为了补偿,我把一万五千元转到你的账户上.\n祝您有愉快的一天,并感谢您选择贸易联合会.

English: Ah thank you. That must be the crew that went missing some time ago.\nHere, it's not much but I sent you 10000 credits. Please let us know if you find any more emergency beacons belonging to a member of the Free Colonists.
Chinese (simplified): 啊谢谢. 那一定是前一段时间失踪的船员.\n给你,虽然不多,但我给你寄了10000个积分. 如果你发现任何属于自由殖民者成员的紧急信标,请通知我们.

English: I will keep an eye out. Goodbye.

Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>好吧,说得够多了.让我们结束这一切.</color>

English: @q0NO. Don't make me tell you again!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 不. 别逼我再说一遍!
杰拉尔德?杰拉尔德,是你吗?

English: Gerald, I can see you through the viewscreen you know.
Chinese (simplified): 杰拉德,我可以透过屏幕看到你.

English: @q0What? I thought I turned that off! Ugh, no matter. There's nothing you can say to get yourself out of this one, Spanj.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 什么?我以为我把它关了!呃,没关系, 你说什么也救不了自己, 斯潘.

English: <color=#ff0000>I am sad it has to be this way, Gerald, but you leave me no choice.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>我很难过必须这样,杰拉尔德,但你让我别无选择.</color>

English: @q0Commander, I am unable to fix the tampering on the beacon.\nI recommend you deactivate it to prevent anyone else from falling victim to this trap.\nI also found something that may be of value that was in the wreckage of one of the bandit ships.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 指挥官,我无法修复对信标的篡改.\n我建议你关闭它,以防止其他人成为这个陷阱的受害者.\n我还在其中一艘盗船的残骸中发现了一些可能有价值的东西.

English: @d0The logs have been downloaded to your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 日志已经下载到你的PDA上了.

English: @d0The logs have been downloaded to your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 日志已经下载到你的PDA上了.

English: @d0The logs have been downloaded to your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 日志已经下载到你的PDA上了.

English: @d0The logs have been downloaded to your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 日志已经下载到你的PDA上了.

English: @d0The logs have been downloaded to your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 日志已经下载到你的PDA上了.

English: @d0The logs have been downloaded to your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 日志已经下载到你的PDA上了.

English: @d0You have already opened this escape pod.
@d0The escape pod was empty. Either there was never anyone inside, or they were rescued and the pod sealed back up for some reason.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 逃生舱是空的. 要么里面根本就没人,要么他们被救出来了,因为某种原因,舱体又被封起来了.

English: @d0The occupant of the escape pod was alive!\nThey've been placed in your connected container.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 逃生舱里的人还活着!\n它们已经放在你连接的容器里了.

English: @d0The occupant sadly passed away but they left behind some personal belongings.\nPerhaps you could take them to a GIN console to get them delivered to their next of kin.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 里面的人不幸去世了,但他们留下了一些私人物品.\n也许你可以把它们带到GIN控制台,交给他们的亲人.

English: @d0Sadly the occupant did not survive but they left some supplies you may as well take.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 不幸的是,居住者没有活下来,但他们留下了一些补给品,你不妨带上.

English: @d0Sadly the occupant did not survive. On them you find a data pad with an unfulfilled contract.\nPerhaps you can honor them by fulfilling the contract.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 不幸的是,乘客没有活下来。你可以在上面找到一个数据平板,上面有一份未履行的合同.\n也许你们可以履行合同来兑现他们的承诺.

English: @d0<color=#ff8000>Welcome to the Diagnostic and Repair Console 6000.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>WARNING:</color> <color=#ff8000>Storage tank integrity breached. Catastrophic failure imminent.</color>\n<color=#ff8000>Recommend stabilization protocols be enacted immediately.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff8000>欢迎来到诊断与维修控制台6000.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>警告:</color> <color=#ff8000>储罐完整性破坏. 灾难性的泄露迫在眉睫.</color>\n<color=#ff8000>建议立即制定稳定协议.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff8000>The Diagnostic and Repair Console 6000 system is currently not available.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff8000>诊断与维修控制台6000系统目前无法使用.</color>

English: What is the Diagnostic and Repair Console 6000?
Chinese (simplified): 什么是诊断与维修控制台6000?

English: @d0<color=#ff8000>The Diagnostic and Repair Console 6000 (or DRC6k) is a complete and almost totally automated repair system that can be fitted to anything from a small drone to large space stations and capital vessels.\nFrom fuel leaks and air supply issues to warp core breaches and damaged thrusters, the DRC6k is capable of carrying out almost 2000 types of common repairs. The DRC6k is the leading repair system in the galaxy, trusted by over 400 corporations and factions.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff8000>诊断和维修控制台6000(或DRC6k)是一个完整的,几乎完全自动化的维修系统,可以安装到任何东西,从小型无人机到大型空间站和主要船只.\n从燃料泄漏和空气供应问题到曲芯断裂和推进器损坏,DRC6k能够进行近2000种类型的常见维修. DRC6k是银河系中领先的修复系统, 受到400多家公司和派系的信任.</color>

English:
<color=#ff8000>Beginning scanning procedure... </color><color=#00ff00>Done.</color>
<color=#ff8000>Interpreting data... </color><color=#00ff00>Done.</color>
<color=#ff8000>Analyzing damage... </color><color=#00ff00>Done.</color>
<color=#ff8000>Extrapolating optimum repair procedure... </color><color=#00ff00>Done.</color>
<color=#ff8000>Configuring on board systems for repair procedures... </color><color=#00ff00>Done.</color>
<color=#ff8000>Bringing repair systems online... </color><color=#00ff00>Done.</color>
<color=#ff8000>Initiating stabilization protocols... </color><color=#00ff00>Done.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ff8000>开始扫描程序… </color><color=#00ff00>完成.</color>
<color=#ff8000>解读数据... </color><color=#00ff00>完成.</color>
<color=#ff8000>分析损伤... </color><color=#00ff00>完成.</color>
<color=#ff8000>计算最佳修复方案... </color><color=#00ff00>完成.</color>
<color=#ff8000>为舰桥系统配置维修程序... </color><color=#00ff00>完成.</color>
<color=#ff8000>维修系统上线... </color><color=#00ff00>完成.</color>
<color=#ff8000>Initiating stabilization protocols... </color><color=#00ff00>完成.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff8000>The requested repairs have been completed.\nThe area is now safe to approach. Have a nice day.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff8000>要求的修理工作已经完成.\n该地区现在可以安全接近了。祝你一天愉快.</color>

English: The ritual is complete. Hand over the Corrupted Shard of the Stars and I will give you a cleansed version.
Chinese (simplified): 仪式完成了.把腐化的星辰碎片交出来我就给你一个净化过的.

English: Hand over the Corrupted Shard of the Stars.
I want to ask something else.
This shard is just one part of three. Find the other two, and you may be able to combine them.
Chinese (simplified): 这个碎片只是三个碎片中的一个.找到另外两个,你也许可以把它们结合起来.

English: I want to ask something else.
The ritual will be done in a moment. Talk to me again when the light fades.
Chinese (simplified): 仪式马上就要开始了.当光芒褪去,再跟我说话.

English: You carry a relic of our past on you, traveler. I can perform a ritual of cleansing on your Corrupted Shard of the Stars, drawing out the corrupted energies contained within and allowing you to unlock its true potential. It will take only a minute to perform.
Chinese (simplified): 你身上带着我们过去的遗物,旅行者.我可以对你的腐化的星之碎片进行净化仪式,抽出里面的腐化能量让你释放它真正的潜能.仪式只需要一分钟.

English: I want to talk about something else.
Please wait a minute. Speak to me again once the lights have faded and I shall give you your cleansed relic back.
Chinese (simplified): 请稍等.等光芒消失再跟我说话我就给你洁净的圣物返回.

English: Thank you. I shall wait for you to finish.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢. 我将等你完成.

English: Greetings, traveler. Have you come to contemplate the universe?
Chinese (simplified): 你好,旅行者. 你是来观察宇宙的吗?

English: Magic? Hahah. No, kind traveler. It is merely knowledge, lost to the ages. I come from an ancient people who traveled the stars long before your kind even knew what the stars were.\nAnd fought in a war, more terrible than you could imagine.
Chinese (simplified): 魔法吗?哈哈哈. 不,善良的旅行者. 它只是知识,随着时代的流逝而消失了. 我来自一个古老的民族,在你们知道星星是什么之前很久,他们就在星星之间旅行了.\n最后还参加了一场比你想象的还要可怕的战争.

English: That, too, has been lost with time. We fled our homeworld to escape the great war and split into 4 clans. The Sun Clan, the Moon Clan, the Star Clan, and The Enlightened. I myself am of the Star Clan. We have had contact with the Sun and Moon clans but haven't been able to find anyone from The Enlightened. My people still wander the galaxy searching for them.
Chinese (simplified): 这一点也随着时间的推移而消失了, 为了躲避大战, 我们逃离了母星,分裂成4个氏族.太阳派,月亮派,星星派,还有开明派。我自己就是星族的.我们已经和日月氏族联系过了但还没能找到任何来自开明的人.我的人还在银河系里四处寻找他们.

English: Nobody knows. They built shrines such as these in places of spiritual importance, but they haven't been seen or heard from in many of your Terran years.\nSome believe they went in search of 3 ancient relics of our people, but were never seen agian.
Chinese (simplified): 没有人知道. 他们在具有重要精神意义的地方建造了这样的神殿,但在你们人族出现的许多年里,他们没有被看到或听到过.\n有些人认为他们是去寻找我们民族的3件古代遗物,但再也没有出现过.

English: Nobody knows exactly what they are for, but I believe that by finding all 3 relics they can be combined into a single one that will show the way to finding our lost people.
Chinese (simplified): 没人知道它们到底是干什么用的,但我相信找到这三件遗物后,它们可以合在一起,为我们找到失踪的人指明道路.

English: I will see what I can do. Thank you for your time, wise Talon. I hope you find the rest of your people.
Chinese (simplified): 我看看我能做些什么. 谢谢你抽出时间,睿智的Talon. 我希望你能找到你的族人.

English: Ah yes we did find something interesting. So very interesting! UCH Command thanks you for your service, Captain Rick!
Chinese (simplified): 啊,是的,我们确实发现了一些有趣的东西. 非常有趣!UCH司令部感谢你的服务,瑞克上尉!

English: Oh yes of course, Captain Rick {PlayerName}. How could I forget you.
Chinese (simplified): 哦,是的,当然,舰长里克{PlayerName}.我怎能忘记你.

English: For the last time... MY NAME IS NOT RICK!
Chinese (simplified): 最后说一次……我的名字不是瑞克!

English: It's... Never mind. What did you find in the data?
Chinese (simplified): 这是……别介意. 你在数据中发现了什么?

English: How DARE you speak to a commanding officer with that tone! Apologize immediately or I shall have you reprimanded, captain!
Chinese (simplified): 你怎么敢用那种语气和指挥官说话!马上道歉不然我就训斥你,舰长!

English: I apologize, sir. What did you find in the data?
Chinese (simplified): 抱歉,长官,你在数据里发现了什么?

English: I am Grand Admiral {PlayerName}, leader of the Terran Navy in Andromeda. I will forgive your disobedience for now...
Chinese (simplified): 我是海军大将{PlayerName},仙女座人族海军的领袖. 我暂时原谅你的不服从...

English: Thank you, Grand Admiral {PlayerName}. Funny, we have the same last name.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你,海军上将{PlayerName}.真有趣,我们姓一样.

English: We found something important hidden in the data you sent to us. It appears that The Creators were trying to build something you Terrans call a Dyson Sphere. We need you to find out if they were successful.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在你发给我们的数据里发现了一些重要的东西.似乎造物主试图建造你们人族称之为戴森球的东西.我们需要你查出他们是否成功了.

English: Why did you call them The Creators? Why are you talking like that?
Chinese (simplified): 你为什么称他们为造物主? 你为什么那样说?

English: I'm familiar with a Dyson Sphere. Something that large should be easy enough to find.
Chinese (simplified): 我对戴森球很熟悉.这么大的东西应该很容易找到.

English: A Dyson Sphere is a large superstructure built around a star. In theory, such a structure would allow nearly unlimited energy to the civilization that constructed it. Such an undertaking would likely take thousands, if not millions of years. We need you to find out if they had built such a structure and if it's possible to get inside.
Chinese (simplified): 戴森球是围绕恒星建造的大型上层建筑.理论上,这样的结构可以为建造它的文明提供几乎无限的能量.这样的任务可能需要数千年,甚至数百万年.我们需要你去查一下他们是否建了这样一个建筑以及是否有可能进入里面.

English: Why did you call them The Creators? Why are you talking like that?
Chinese (simplified): 你为什么称他们为造物主? 你为什么那样说?

English: Something that large should be easy enough to find.
Chinese (simplified): 我对戴森球很熟悉.这么大的东西应该很容易找到.

English: What do you mean? I am talking like a perfectly normal Terrrrrran of average age and health. There is nothing suspicious about my speech. You are being a Kripthar!
Chinese (simplified): 你是什么意思?我说的是一个完全正常的terrrrran,年龄和健康状况都是正常的. 我的演讲没有什么可怀疑的. 你正在成为 Kripthar!

English: I'm familiar with a Dyson Sphere. Something that large should be easy enough to find.
Chinese (simplified): 我对戴森球很熟悉.这么大的东西应该很容易找到.

English: It's like a Charrloop, but frecklier.
Excellent! Now in order to-\n@d0(The signal is suddenly interrupted by another transmission)
Chinese (simplified): 太好了!现在为了-\n@d0 (信号突然被另一个传输中断)

English: Hello? Can you hear-zrrrkk-me? This is UCH Command. Do you hav-crrrkkkwpp-data? Were you succes-zzzhhchc
Chinese (simplified): 你好?你能听到-zrrrkk-我? 这里是UCH指挥部. 你有-crrrkkkwpp-数据? 你成-zzzhhchc

English: Wait... Who was I just talking to?
Chinese (simplified): 什么?那我刚刚跟谁说话?

English: @d0<color=#00ffc6>◓  ◑  ◓  ◐  ●  ◎  ◓</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>You have not proven yourself, little one.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffc6>? ? ? ? ● ◎ ?</color>\n<color=#00ffc6>你还没有证明你自己, 小朋友.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ffc6>You... What have you done? Do you not know what doom awaits you?</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffc6>你……你做了什么? 你不知道等待你的是什么厄运吗?</color>

English: I demand that you activate the portals right now!
Chinese (simplified): 我要求你马上启动传送门!

English: I don't have time for your nonsense! I demand that you activate the portals right now!
Chinese (simplified): 我没时间听你胡说八道!我要求你立即启动传送门!

English: That doesn't answer my question. Will you please activate the portals?
Chinese (simplified): 这没有回答我的问题。请你激活传送门好吗?

English: Well, that tells me a lot... Not.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧, 这告诉了我一些... 不.

English: @d0<color=#00ffc6>I have spent a million years watching over this sphere. I have kept it safe from our children's children, and you safe from it.</color>\n@p9 @d0<color=#00ffc6>I have tried to warn you, tried to stop you, and you have recklessly pursued your own destruction. So be it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00ffc6>我花了一百万年的时间守护这个星球.我保证了它不会被我们孩子的孩子发现,也不会被你发现.</color>\n@p9 @d0 <color=#00ffc6>我试图警告你, 试图阻止你, 而你却不顾一切地自寻灭亡. 那就这样吧.</color>

English: I'm not afraid of you. Activate these portals right now!
Chinese (simplified): 我不怕你. 马上激活这些传送门!

English: I have done as you asked, but it will come with a price in time.
Chinese (simplified): 我已经照你说的做了,但这是要付出代价的.

English: I will pay it when the time comes.
@d0<color=#ff8000>This digit of the code is </color><color=#ff0000>lower</color><color=#ff8000> than your guess.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff8000>密码数字</color><color=#ff0000>低于</color><color=#ff8000> 你的猜测.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff8000>This digit of the code is </color><color=#ffff00>higher</color><color=#ff8000> than your guess.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff8000>密码数字</color><color=#ffff00>高于</color><color=#ff8000> 你的猜测.</color>
@d0 <color=#ffff00>这个控制终端已经被黑入了.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff00ff>This console has been reset for debugging.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff00ff>这个控制终端已经被调试模式重置.</color>

English:
@q0Greetings, commander.
I have analyzed the data structure of this computer system so that I can give you a brief rundown.
This system is simple enough that even you should be able to hack it.
@p9 @q0It is protected by a code that is split up into {Eden_CodeLength} separate digits.
Each digit of the code can range between a value of 0 and 9 and you will need to guess each digit individually.
After each guess I will be able to tell you whether the code is higher or lower than your guess.
You will have limited attempts before being locked out of the system, so choose the numbers you guess wisely.
Thank you IDA, that was extremely helpful.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你IDA, 这非常有帮助.

English: Are you here from maintenance to finally fix my light? It's driving my guests away and giving me a headache!
Chinese (simplified): 你是从维修部来修我的灯的吗?它赶走了我的客人,让我头疼!

English: Ummm... What? I mean, yes, I'm here to fix your light.
Chinese (simplified): 嗯……怎么啦?我是说,是的,我是来修你的灯的.

English: Finally! About time one of you showed up. The maintenance hatch is in the bar behind me. Go inside and get my light fixed! And don't touch anything you're not supposed to. Last tech who went in there blew out half the casino's security system!
Chinese (simplified): 终于!你们其中一个也该出现了。维修舱口在我身后的酒吧里。进去把我的灯修好!不要碰任何你不该碰的东西。上次进去的技术人员炸毁了赌场一半的安保系统!

English: Right away sir! Wait, I seem to have forgotten my maintenance access code. What is it again?
Chinese (simplified): 马上,先生!等等,我好像忘了我的维护访问码。什么来着?

English: Consider it done. That troublesome light won't be bothering you anymore.
Chinese (simplified): 就当它完成了。那盏烦人的灯不会再打扰你了.

English: What do you mean, you forgot your access code? The code is 8544, but don't tell anyone I told you or I could get called up to the manager's office on the top floor. Just get that light fixed!
Chinese (simplified): 你说你忘了密码是什么意思?密码是8544,但别告诉别人是我告诉你的不然我就会被叫去顶楼经理办公室。快把灯修好!

English: What's taking you so long? The light still isn't fixed! In fact I think it's gotten worse!\nWhat are they paying you people for? Get into that maintenance tunnel behind my bar and get to work!
Chinese (simplified): 你怎么这么久才来?灯还没修好!事实上,我认为情况变得更糟了!他们付钱给你们干什么?到我酒吧后面的维修通道里去干活!

English: I umm, seem to have forgotten my access code.
I forgot my access code. Again.
Chinese (simplified): 我忘记输入密码了.再一次.

English: I will get right on it!
Again? I already told you what it was! You incompetent buffoon!\nYour code is 8544, go get my light fixed or I'll serve your head as our lunch special!
Chinese (simplified): 一遍吗?我已经告诉你是什么了!你这个无能的小丑!你的代码是8544,去把我的灯修好,否则我就把你的头当特价午餐!

English: You are an enemy of my people and I will not speak with you.
Chinese (simplified): 你是我人民的敌人,我不和你说话.

English: Thank you for your help recovering the eggs from my prized crawler!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你帮我从我珍贵的爬行动物中取出鸡蛋!

English: Please traveler, you have to help me!
Chinese (simplified): 求你了,旅行者,你得帮帮我!

English: The last batch of eggs from my prized Crawler were stolen in the night! I would be forever in your debt if you were to return them to me unharmed.\nPlease, recover them. They are special to me.\nYou may be able to find them in the forests nearby.
Chinese (simplified): 我的爬行者的最后一批珍贵的蛋在夜里被偷了!如果你能毫发无损地把它们还给我,我就欠你一辈子了。请把它们找回来。他们对我来说很特别.\n你也许能在附近的森林里找到它们.

English: I will recover these special eggs for you.
Chinese (simplified): 我会帮你找回这些特殊的鸡蛋.

English: No thanks. Get your own eggs back, you lazy bum! <color=#ff0000>(-10 reputation)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 不,谢谢.自己把你的蛋拿回来,你这个懒鬼! <color=#ff0000>(-10 声望)</color>

English: Thank you, traveler. Exactly 5 eggs were stolen, please return once you have found all 5.\n\n@d0His eggs have most likely already been eaten, but perhaps you can obtain eggs from the local raptors or Triceratops and he won't know the difference.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你,旅行者.一共5个鸡蛋被偷了,找到后请全部归还\n\n@d0 他的蛋很可能已经被吃掉了,但也许你可以从当地的迅猛龙或三角龙那里得到蛋,他不会知道其中的区别.

English: I will return with your precious eggs.
Chinese (simplified): 我会带着你珍贵的蛋回来的.

English: You found them! My prized Crawler eggs! Larry, Harry, Barry...
Chinese (simplified): 你找到他们了!我珍贵的爬虫蛋!拉里,哈里,巴里...

English: <color=#00ff00>Here are your eggs. Where's my reward?</color>
I am not ready to hand them over yet.
Chinese (simplified): 我还没准备好交出他们.

English: @d0This mission has already been activated. There is nothing of further value to be found here.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个任务已经被激活.在这里找不到更有价值的东西了.

English: @d0Subspace Antenna online.\n<color=#ff0000>ERROR:</color> <color=#ffff00>Subspace frequency not selected.</color>\nSelect a frequency to perform a scan.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 超空间天线在线.\n<color=#ff0000>错误:</color> <color=#ffff00>超空间频率未选择.</color>\nSelect a frequency to perform a scan.

English: Set frequency to 9.9989.91 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为9.9989.91启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 2.9500.13 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为2.9500.13启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 1.0010.56 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为1.0010.56启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 4.6626.15 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为4.6626.15启动超空间扫描.

English: Scanning... @w4Scanning... @w4Scanning...\n@p4<color=#00ffff>Signal match detected! Strength 0.018.</color><color=#00ffff> Distance unknown. Heading unknown.</color>\n@p9 @d0<color=#00ff00>Scan complete. This matches the frequency you are looking for.</color>
Chinese (simplified): 扫描中...@w4 扫描中...@w4 扫描中...\n@p4 <color=#00ffff>检测到讯号! 强度0.018.</color><color=#00ffff> 距离未知. 方向未知.</color>\n@p9 @d0 <color=#00ff00>扫描完成。这与您正在寻找的频率匹配.</color>
选择不同的频率. 快.

English: @d0Subspace Antenna online.\n<color=#ff0000>ERROR:</color> <color=#ffff00>Subspace frequency not selected.</color>\nSelect a frequency to perform a scan.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 超空间天线在线.\n<color=#ff0000>错误:</color> <color=#ffff00>超空间频率未选择.</color>\nSelect a frequency to perform a scan.

English: Scanning... @w4Scanning... @w4Scanning...\n@p4<color=#00ffff>Signal match detected!</color><color=#00ffff> Strength 0.045.</color><color=#00ffff></color><color=#00ffff>Distance unknown. Heading unknown.</color>\n@p9 @d0<color=#00ff00>Scan complete. This matches the frequency you are looking for.</color>
Chinese (simplified): 扫描中...@w4 扫描中...@w4 扫描中...\n@p4 <color=#00ffff>检测到讯号!</color><color=#00ffff> 强度 0.045.</color><color=#00ffff></color><color=#00ffff>距离未知. 方向未知. </color>\n@p9 @d0 <color=#00ff00>扫描完成. 这与您正在寻找的频率匹配.</color>

English: Insult their mother then select a different frequency.
Chinese (simplified): 那就侮辱他们的母亲吧选择不同的频率.
选择一个不那么恐怖的频率.

English: Set frequency to 3.8245.65 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为3.8245.65启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 8.8960.37 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为8.8960.37启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 4.6626.15 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为4.6626.15启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 4.7772.83 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为4.7772.83启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 4.6626.15 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为4.6626.15启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 4.4747.68 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为4.4747.68启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 0.0000.01 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为0.0000.01启动超空间扫描.

English: Set frequency to 7.6468.57 and initiate subspace scan.
Chinese (simplified): 设置频率为7.6468.57启动超空间扫描.

English: Scanning... @w4Scanning... @w4Scanning...\n@p4<color=#00ffff>Signal match detected!</color><color=#00ffff> Strength 0.219.</color><color=#00ffff></color><color=#00ffff>Distance unknown. Heading unknown.</color>\n@p9 @d0<color=#00ff00>Scan complete. This matches the frequency you are looking for.</color>
Chinese (simplified): 扫描中...@w4 扫描中...@w4 扫描中...\n@p4 <color=#00ffff>检测到讯号!</color><color=#00ffff> 强度 0.219.</color><color=#00ffff></color><color=#00ffff>距离未知. 方向未知. </color>\n@p9 @d0 <color=#00ff00>扫描完成. 这与您正在寻找的频率匹配.</color>

English: @d0Subspace Antenna online.\n<color=#ff0000>ERROR:</color> <color=#ffff00>Subspace frequency not selected.</color>\nSelect a frequency to perform a scan.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 超空间天线在线.\n<color=#ff0000>错误:</color> <color=#ffff00>超空间频率未选择.</color>\nSelect a frequency to perform a scan.

English: @d0You do not know how to operate this terminal.\n\nYou must be on the mission The Dead Chapter 2 to access this terminal.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您不知道如何操作这个终端.\n\n你必须完死亡之章2的任务才能进入这个终端.

English: @d0This technology is ancient, perhaps thousands of years old. Some instructions are left behind that your computer can translate.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这项技术很古老,也许有几千年的历史了.有些指令被留下,你的电脑可以翻译.

English: Activating the neural interface...\n@p6Interface activated. You may enter when ready.
Chinese (simplified): 激活神经接口...\n@p6 接口激活. 你准备好了就可以进去.

English: You're awake. @w3 Good.\n@w3We were worried the procedure didn't work. I'm glad to see you pulled through, Korvas. There's a lot to do and not a lot of time to do it.
Chinese (simplified): 你是醒着的.@w3 Good.\n@w3 我们担心这个程序不会起作用。很高兴看到你挺过来了,科瓦斯。有很多事情要做,但时间不多.What happened?

English: You don't remember? Not entirely unexpected.\nYou volunteered for an important mission to keep the memory of our species alive. We implanted a chip in you to record your memories of this event, so maybe one day someone in the future can see that we existed and we didn't go without a fight. This memory chip is currently active and streaming your memories to the vault, but the central database is not yet active.
Chinese (simplified): 你不记得了?并非完全出乎意料.\n你自愿承担了一项重要的任务来保存我们物种的记忆。我们在你体内植入了一个芯片来记录你对这件事的记忆,所以也许未来的某一天有人可以看到我们的存在,我们并没有放弃战斗。这个内存芯片目前处于激活状态并将你的记忆传输到保险库,但中央数据库还没有激活.

English: What's going on? Who are we fighting?
Chinese (simplified): 这是怎么呢?我们在和谁战斗?

English: What, not who. A force more powerful than anything we've ever faced before. We've seen them destroy countless worlds beyond our own, but now they are on our doorstep.\n@p9 @d3We don't know where they came from. Everything we throw at them just bounces off their hull. They seem to have only one weak point, the glowing energy spheres that are on the outside of their structures. Even then, destroying those merely slows them down.
Chinese (simplified): 是什么,不是谁。一种比我们之前遇到的任何力量都强大的力量。我们看到他们摧毁了无数个地球之外的世界,但现在他们来到了我们的家门口.\n@p9 @d3 我们不知道它们是从哪里来的。我们扔给他们的东西都会被他们的船体反弹。它们似乎只有一个弱点,那就是它们结构外部的发光能量球。即便如此,摧毁它们也只会减慢它们的速度.

English: We don't. There's no way out of this for any of us. Our only hope is that future civilizations learn from our mistakes. Do not release it. Don't let it out! Don't try to use it. If you find it, keep it frozen, buried forever beneath the ice and forget you ever saw it.
Chinese (simplified): 我们没有。我们谁都逃不掉了。我们唯一的希望就是未来的文明能从我们的错误中吸取教训。不要释放它。别让它出来!不要试图使用它.如果你找到了,就把它冻起来,永远埋在冰下,忘记你见过它.

English: We are almost out of time. Report to the captain just outside the front door! Make sure your armor is in good shape, soldier!
Chinese (simplified): 我们快没时间了。向前门外的指挥官报告!确保你的盔甲完好无损,士兵!

English:
You there! You're one of the ones with the neural implant, aren't you?
I have a great idea... How about you show those in the future how we blow stuff up! Our artillery bunker to the north was overrun by the enemy. Go there and clear it out of hostiles. You'll also need to grab some of the artillery shells from the cargo boxes outside of the artillery bunker and load up the ammo controller inside.
@p9 @d3When you've secured the artillery station, man the gun and destroy one of the green spheres below the enemy's command spheres!
Make sure to aim carefully, as you'll only get a couple of shots before needing to reload.
Chinese (simplified): 你在那里!你是植入了神经系统的人之一,对吧?\n我有一个好主意……不如你让未来的人看看我们是怎么炸东西的!我们在北方的炮兵掩体被敌人攻占。去那里把敌人清除出去。你还需要从火炮掩体外的货物箱中抓取一些炮弹,并在里面装载弹药控制器.\n@p9 @d3 当你已经攻占得了炮兵基地,操作火炮摧毁敌人的指挥球下面的绿色球体之一!一定要小心瞄准,因为在需要重新装填之前,你只能打几炮

English: Yo-@w2 You haa-aa-@w2 ave to get out of here! @w2 Go! @w2 Run!\n\n@d0The soldier is clearly shaken by whatever he experienced. You need to find a way to bring him out of it if you're going to get a useful report.
Chinese (simplified): 你-@w2 你啊啊啊-啊-@w2 必须离开这里!@w2 走!@w2 跑!\n\n@d0 这名士兵显然被他所经历的一切所震撼。如果你想要得到一份有用的报告,你就得想办法把他拉出来.

English: Tell me what happened or I'll drag you off!
Chinese (simplified): 告诉我发生了什么,不然我把你拖走!

English: We can still beat this! We have a plan but we're counting on your report.
Chinese (simplified): 我们还是可以战胜它的!我们有个计划,但就看你的报告了。

English: @d0The soldier begins to cry. What you said clearly upset him. Try again.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 那个士兵哭了. 你到底做了什么把他吓成这样. 再试一次.

English: Tell me what happened or I'll drag you off!
Chinese (simplified): 告诉我发生了什么,不然我把你拖走!

English: We can still beat this! We have a plan but we're counting on your report.
Chinese (simplified): 我们还是可以战胜它的!我们有个计划,但就看你的报告了。

English: @d0The soldier, still visibly shaking, points towards the east and hands you a data pad with his orders without making eye contact.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个士兵还是忍不住的颤抖, 指了指东面,然后把写有命令的数据平板递给了你,甚至都没有发生眼神接触.

English:
@d0<color=#00ffc6>===============================================================</color>
<color=#00ffc6>The western power station is destroyed.</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Divert power to the Ark from the eastern power station.</color>
<color=#00ffc6>Complete this mission at any cost.</color>
<color=#00ffc6>===============================================================</color>
The facility does not have enough power to charge the shield! Head to the Eastern Outpost and divert power!
Chinese (simplified): 这座设施的电力不足以为护盾供能! 去东边的前哨把电力导过来!

English: Prepare yourself. The enemy is upon us! You must hold off the enemy long enough for the Ark's shield to become fully charged. For our people!
Chinese (simplified): 做好准备,敌人就在眼前! 你必须在方舟护盾完全充能之前拖住敌人. 为了我们人民!

English: I need more time to prepare.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要花更多时间来准备

English: @d0You have already obtained the key card from this security console.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经从这个安全控制台获取了钥匙卡。

English: @d0This security console has a key card inside of it.
Chinese (simplified): 这个安全控制台里面有一张钥匙卡。

English: @d0This security console has a key card inside of it.
Chinese (simplified): 这个安全控制台里面有一张钥匙卡。

English: <color=#fafe10>I know what's going on. You can skip the introduction.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#fafe10>我知道发生了什么。你可以跳过介绍。</color>

English: @q0 @d0[ IDA ]\n@d3Commander, @w3You're finally awake. @w2You hit your head there pretty good in the crash.\n@w2Are you feeling alright? @w2Do you remember what happened?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 [ IDA ]\n@d3 指挥官,@w3 你终于醒了。@w2 你在坠毁时头部受了重击。\n@w2 你感觉还好吗?@w2 你记得发生了什么吗?

English: @q0 @d0[ IDA ]\n@d3Based on the current state of your prison cell, @w2I assume we... @w2Crashed.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 [ IDA ]\n@d3 根据你囚室的当前状态,@w2 我猜我们...@w2 坠毁了。

English: <color=#00ff00>Time to get the hell out of here.</color>
@d0This appears to be where your equipment may be stored but it's protected by a lock.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这似乎是存放你装备的地方,但是被锁保护着。

English: @d0Rummaging around you manage to find a few spare supplies that you missed the first time.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 翻找时,你设法找到了一些你第一次错过的备用物资。
<color=#00ff00>我早些时候已经取回了我的设备。</color>

English: Since when do AI have guesses?
Chinese (simplified): 人工智能什么时候开始有猜测了?
我以前面对过更糟糕的几率。

English: @q0 @d0This appears to be a Zirax satellite placed here to monitor the nearby wormhole.\nPerhaps IDA has an idea of what to do here.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 这似乎是一个兹瑞克斯放置在这里监视附近虫洞的卫星。\n也许IDA知道在这里该怎么做。

English: <color=#00ff00>Please interface with the satellite so I can attempt to hack into it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>请与卫星接口,以便我尝试入侵它。</color>

English: <color=#ffff00>I already know what to do. Hack the satellite.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>我已经知道该怎么做了。入侵卫星。</color>

English: <color=#646464>I already know what to do. Hack the satellite. (Already hacked)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#646464>我已经知道该怎么做了。入侵卫星。(已经入侵了)</color>

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ff0000>Warning: damage detected to suit internal systems.</color>\n<color=#ff8000>Recommended to run diagnostics to assess damage.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ff0000>警告:检测到套装内部系统损坏。</color>\n<color=#ff8000>建议运行诊断以评估损坏。</color>

English: <color=#ffff00>Skip the diagnostics. I already know what's wrong.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>跳过诊断。我已经知道问题所在。</color>

English: View detailed assessment on Power Failure error
Chinese (simplified): 查看电力故障错误的详细评估

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ffff00>Damage to</color> <color=#00ffff>I.D.A - Integrated Data Algorithm</color> <color=#ffff00>power regulator subsystem connector.</color>\nRepair requires 2 <color=#00ff00>{Loc(Item1)}</color>.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ffff00>损坏到</color> <color=#00ffff>I.D.A - 集成数据算法</color> <color=#ffff00>电力调节器子系统连接器。</color>\n修复需要 2 <color=#00ff00>{Loc(Item1)}</color>。
<color=#00ff00>修复动力调节器子系统连接器。</color>

English: <color=#00ff00>I shall find you some cores then, IDA.</color>

@q0 @d0<color=#ffff00>Damage to</color> <color=#00ffff>I.D.A - Integrated Data Algorithm</color> <color=#ffff00>power regulator subsystem connector.</color>\nRepair requires 2 <color=#00ff00>{Loc(Item1)}</color>.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ffff00>损伤到</color> <color=#00ffff>I.D.A - 集成数据算法</color> <color=#ffff00>动力调节器子系统连接器。</color>\n修复需要2 <color=#00ff00>{Loc(Item1)}</color>。

English: @q0 @d0[ IDA ]\n@d3Your assumption would be correct, @w2 Commander. @w3 Find more ruins and destroy Alien Cores, and that will give me the data I need to begin reconstructing crafting schematics for you via the Tech Tree. @w2 The more cores you are able to destroy, @w1 the more XP, @w1 or eXtrapolated Plans, @w1 you will gain and the higher tech level that you will be able to unlock.\n@w3Also, @w2 I may be able to gleam a small amount of data if you were to break apart any surface rocks, @w1 dead trees, @w1 or other terrain features you find on the planet, in case you have difficulty finding ruins.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 [ IDA ]\n@d3 你的假设是正确的,@w2 指挥官。@w3 找到更多的废墟并摧毁外星核心,这将给我提供我需要的数据,通过技术树为你重建制作蓝图。@w2 你摧毁的核心越多,@w1 你就会获得更多的经验值,@w1 或外推计划,@w1 你将获得,解锁的技术水平也会越高。\n@w3 另外,@w2 如果你分解任何地表岩石,@w1 枯树,@w1 或你在星球上发现的其他地形特征,我可能能获得少量数据,以防你难以找到废墟。

English: @q0 @d0[ IDA ]\n@d3Greetings, @w2Commander {PlayerName}. @w2 I am IDA, the Integrated Data Algorithm, @w2 but you can call me IDA.\n@w2How may I assist you?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 [ IDA ]\n@d3 问候,@w2 指挥官 {PlayerName}。@w2 我是 IDA,集成数据算法,@w2 但你可以叫我 IDA。\n@w2 我该如何协助您?

English: How do you know my name?
Chinese (simplified): 你怎么知道我叫什麼名字?

English: @q0 @d0[ IDA ]\n@d3As I am integrated into your suit, I have access to your PDA and service history so as to better assist you.\n@w2I would be a fairly useless AI if I didn't.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 [ IDA ]\n@d3 因为我集成在你的服装中,我可以访问你的 PDA 和服务历史,以便更好地协助你。\n@w2 如果我不知道,我会是一个相当无用的人工智能。

English: <color=#00ff00>Can you help me get off this planet?</color>

@q0 @d0[ IDA ]\n@d3Certainly, Commander. @w2 Unfortunately the damage to your suit has wiped your crafting schematics.\n@w3Fortunately for you, I carry a limited number of basic survival schematics in my memory banks that should be enough to help you survive your first few days. @w2 However, there is another problem.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 [ IDA ]\n@d3 当然,指挥官。@w2 不幸的是,你的服装损坏已经清除了你的制作蓝图。\n@w3 幸运的是,我的存储库中有数量有限的基本生存蓝图,应该足够帮助你度过最初的几天。@w2 然而,还有另一个问题。

English: <color=#00ff00>Can you help me get off this planet?</color>
I assume you need me to find more Alien Cores?
Chinese (simplified): 我假设你需要我找到更多的外星核心?

English: <color=#ffff00>I don't need your help. I already know what to do.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>我不需要你的帮助。我已经知道该怎么做了。</color>

English: @d0The console is dead. It appears the crew of this barge abandoned it in a hurry.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 控制台已经失效。看起来这艘驳船的船员匆忙中弃船了。

English: @d0Based on the navigational logs and other notes, it appears these smugglers were looking for a nearby sunken village that they believed was full of treasure, but were forced to abandon ship due to a Zirax patrol.\nSuch ruins would likely not show up on scanners except at a close distance, but may be in the immediate vicinity.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 根据航行日志和其他笔记,这些走私者似乎在寻找附近一个他们认为藏有宝藏的沉没村庄,但因为兹瑞克斯巡逻队而被迫弃船。\n这样的遗迹在扫描器上可能只有在近距离才会显示,但可能就在附近。

English: @q0 @d0[ IDA ]\n@d3It appears the bandits have fled. I don't think there's anything more you can do here.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 [ IDA ]\n@d3 看起来那些强盗已经逃跑了。我认为你在这里没有更多的事情可做了。

English: @d0Bookmarks have been added to your galaxy map for each major region in the galaxy.\nAs a reminder, you can go to the galaxy map and select the bookmarks tab to manage your bookmarks.\nYou can edit each one to remove them from showing on the HUD or delete them if necessary.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 已在您的银河地图上为银河中每个主要区域添加了书签。\n作为提醒,您可以前往银河地图并选择书签标签来管理您的书签。\n您可以编辑每一个书签,以从HUD上移除它们或必要时删除它们。

English:
@d0Bookmarks can be added to your galaxy map to aid in quick navigation on the map screen.
Choosing to do this will a new bookmark to your galaxy map screen for each of the major regions of the galaxy.. These bookmarks can be clicked on in the galaxy map's map markers tab to quickly zoom your camera to that location.
It is recommended you go through and manually edit each added bookmark to remove the show on hud options.
<color=#ff0000>Only do this if you know how to manage bookmarks on the galaxy map.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 可以在您的银河地图上添加书签,以帮助在地图屏幕上快速导航。
选择这样做将在您的银河地图屏幕上为银河的每个主要区域添加一个新的书签。这些书签可以在银河地图的地图标记标签上点击,以快速将您的摄像机缩放到该位置。
建议您逐一手动编辑每个添加的书签,以从HUD上移除显示选项。
<color=#ff0000>只有在您知道如何在银河地图上管理书签时才这样做。</color>

English: <color=#ffff00>Yes, add the bookmarks to the galaxy map.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>是的,将书签添加到银河地图上。</color>

English: @d0Are you sure you want to do this? Only do this if you know how to manage bookmarks on the galaxy map, as they will default to showing on your HUD galaxy wide which may not be ideal. You will need to go in and manually edit each one on the galaxy map to remove the show on hud options. Do you still want to proceed?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你确定要这样做吗? 只有在您知道如何在银河地图上管理书签时才这样做,因为它们默认会显示在您的HUD上,这可能不是理想的。 您需要进入并手动编辑银河地图上的每一个书签,以移除显示在HUD上的选项。 你仍然想要继续吗?

English: @d0This supply cache may contain useful survival supplies and materials.\n<color=#ffff00>Make sure you have at least 150 free volume in your personal inventory to avoid dropping things on the ground.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个补给储藏箱可能包含有用的生存物资和材料。\n<color=#ffff00>确保你的个人背包至少有150的空闲容量,以避免将物品掉落在地上。</color>

English: @d0This container is labeled as Essential Survival Supplies.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个容器标记为基本生存物资。

English: @d0Rummaging around you manage to find a few spare supplies that you missed the first time.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你在搜寻时设法找到了一些第一次遗漏的备用物资。

English: @d0Welcome to the CryoVault Technologies Mainframe Interface.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 欢迎来到CryoVault Technologies主框架界面。

English: @d0Lockdown in effect. Lift to level 2 not accessible.
@d0Outer door status: <color=#00ff00>UNLOCKED</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Warning: Outer doors are set to never open from the outside. Once you leave the bunker you cannot re-enter.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 外门状态:<color=#00ff00>已解锁</color>\n<color=#ffff00>警告:外门设置为永不从外部打开。一旦你离开掩体,你将无法重新进入。</color>

English: @d0Outer door status: <color=#ff0000>LOCKED</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Warning: Outer doors are set to never open from the outside. Once you leave the bunker you cannot re-enter.</color><color=#ff0000></color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 外门状态:<color=#ff0000>已锁定</color>\n<color=#ffff00>警告:外门设置为永不从外部打开。一旦你离开掩体,你将无法重新进入。</color><color=#ff0000></color>

English:
@d0Facility status critical.
Low power energy signatures detected.
Minimal life detected.
Hostile atmospheric conditions detected.
Extreme caution is advised.
Tech tree library corruption detected.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 设施状态危急。
检测到低功率能量信号。
检测到最低生命迹象。
检测到敌对大气条件。
建议采取极端谨慎措施。
检测到技术树图书馆损坏。

English: @d0Energy Signature Report:\nNumerous low power energy signatures are detected on the planet's surface. Possible sources could include emergency beacons for supply caches or technologically advanced ruins.\nThese could be a source of much needed survival equipment and resources.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 能量信号报告:\n在星球表面检测到许多低功率能量信号。可能的来源包括补给储藏箱的紧急信标或技术先进的遗迹。\n这些可能是急需的生存装备和资源的来源。

English: @d0Life Signs Report:\nNo signs of local fauna detected.\nLocal flora consists of inedible plant life or dead trees.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 生命迹象报告:\n未检测到当地动物生命迹象。\n当地植物群由不可食用的植物生命或枯树组成。

English: @d0Atmospheric Report: Atmosphere is toxic to Humans. A sealed environmental suit and oxygen supply is required to survive on the surface. Long periods of exposure to planet's surface will result in a buildup of body radiation. Temperatures are too low for standard issue Light Amor to reliably counteract.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 大气报告: 大气对人类有毒。需要密封的环境服和氧气供应才能在地表生存。 长时间暴露在行星表面将导致体内辐射积累。 温度过低,标准发行的轻型护甲无法可靠地抵消。

English: @d0Tech Tree Report:\nTechnology database corrupted. Crafting recipes unavailable.\nPossible to obtain higher tech tree levels through retrieving survival equipment from survival caches on planet surface to aid in unlocking lost crafting recipes.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 技术树报告:\n技术数据库损坏。无法使用制作配方。\n可以通过从行星表面的求生补给箱中检索求生装备来获得更高级别的技术树,以帮助解锁丢失的制作配方。
@d0 <color=#00ffff>冷冻舱1</color>\n居住者姓名:J. Sheppard\n状态:<color=#ff0000>已故</color>
查看最后一条日志条目。
@d0 <color=#00ffff>冷冻舱2</color>\n居住者姓名:S. Carter\n状态:<color=#ff0000>已故</color>
查看最后一条日志条目。
@d0 <color=#00ffff>冷冻舱3</color>\n居住者名称:{Player.Name}\n状态:<color=#00ff00>存活</color>
查看最后一条日志条目。
@d0 <color=#00ffff>冷冻舱4</color>\n居住者姓名:J. Monroe\n状态:<color=#ff0000>已故</color>
查看最后一条日志条目。
@d0 <color=#00ffff>冷冻舱5</color>\n居住者姓名:N. Nagata\n状态:<color=#ff0000>已故</color>
查看最后一条日志条目。
@d0 <color=#00ffff>冷冻舱6</color>\n居住者姓名:T. Nichols\n状态:<color=#ff0000>已故</color>
查看最后一条日志条目。

English:
What can I say? @w2 We were screwed from the start. What were we thinking, choosing a planet with an already existing civilization to be a colony site?
I voiced my concerns along with John but we were ignored by our expedition leader, Dr Weston.
He had just brought on some new recruit named {Player.Name} last week. I feel sorry for them. They were probably excited to help colonize a new planet and now they are stuck in this bunker with us.
@p9Dr Weston has ordered us all to enter cryosleep to save on resources while he leaves to go get help. I don't trust him.
If I never wake up, please find this Dr Weston and hold him accountable for this.
Chinese (simplified):
我能说什么呢?@w2 我们从一开始就陷入了困境。我们怎么会选择一个已经有文明存在的星球作为殖民地呢?
我和约翰都表达了我们的担忧,但我们的探险队领袖,韦斯顿博士,忽略了我们。
他上周刚招募了一个名叫{Player.Name}的新兵。我为他们感到遗憾。他们可能对帮助殖民一个新星球感到兴奋,现在却和我们一起被困在这个地堡里。
@p9 韦斯顿博士命令我们所有人都进入冷冻睡眠以节省资源,而他则离开去寻求帮助。我不信任他。
如果我再也醒不过来,请找到这个韦斯顿博士,让他为这一切负责。

English: I didn't come two and a half million lightyears just to die in this hole in the ground!\nI haven't told the others, but this was all Dr Weston's fault. He escalated tensions between the locals and started a nuclear war that has devastated the surface of this world. This planet used to be called Shining Sky by the aliens who lived here. Now this is nothing more than our Purgatory.\nI go to sleep now. Our medical assistant tells us our odds of survival are only about 1 in 6. I hope I am one of the ones that survives, but if not then I hope someone remembers us.
Chinese (simplified): 我不是为了死在这个地下洞里而跋涉了两百五十万光年的!\n我没有告诉其他人,但这一切都是Dr Weston的错。他加剧了当地人之间的紧张关系,并引发了一场核战争,摧毁了这个世界的表面。这个星球以前被居住在这里的外星人称为Shining Sky。现在这不过是我们的炼狱。\n我现在去睡觉了。我们的医疗助理告诉我们,我们的生存几率只有六分之一。我希望我是存活下来的人之一,如果不是,那么希望有人记得我们。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Log entries for {Player.Name} are classified.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>Please input valid credentials.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>玩家{Player.Name}的日志条目已分类。</color>\n<color=#ff0000>请输入有效的凭证。</color>

English: @d0It appears someone has classified your own personal logs.\nIf only you could remember what you had said.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 看起来有人把你自己的个人日志归类了。\n要是你能记起自己说过什么就好了。

English:
Our supplies are running low. Fuel and oxygen are approaching critical levels. If we don't get into these cryopods soon we will die for sure.
I miss my family. I miss Earth. Why did we have to leave?
An automated lockdown was just initiated, sealing this section off from the rest of the vault and there was a cave-in during the last bomb drop preventing us from reaching the auxiliary control room on this level.
Like it or not, we're stuck here. Only one option remains, and that is to sleep until rescue comes.
Chinese (simplified):
我们的补给即将耗尽。燃料和氧气接近临界水平。如果我们不尽快进入这些冷冻舱,我们肯定会死。
我想念我的家人。我想念地球。我们为什么非得离开?
自动封锁刚刚启动,将这个区域与金库的其余部分隔离开来,上一次炸弹投放期间发生了塌方,阻止我们到达这一层的辅助控制室。
不管你喜不喜欢,我们都被困在这里了。只剩下一个选择,那就是等待救援到来时睡觉。

English:
An automated lockdown was initiated, sealing off this entire section from the rest of the vault.
We are cut off from the outside world, and worse yet is that everyone else is cut off from the vault.
I pray for the survivors on the surface. May they find shelter and somehow survive.
I do not know what kind of world we will wake up to, if we wake up at all.
Chinese (simplified):
自动封锁启动,将整个区域与金库的其余部分隔离。
我们与外界隔绝,更糟糕的是,其他人也与金库隔绝了。
我为地面上的幸存者祈祷。愿他们找到避难所,设法生存。
我不知道我们将醒来面对一个什么样的世界,如果我们真的能醒来的话。

English: Nothing left to do but take a long nap, I guess.
Chinese (simplified): 看来除了睡个长觉,别无选择。

English: @d0Facility Report: Power Level: Critical Oxygen Level: Critical Water Level: Critical Supply inventory: Critical Structural integrity: Poor
Chinese (simplified): @d0 设施报告: 电力水平:临界 氧气水平:临界 水位:临界 供应库存:临界 结构完整性:差

English: According to my business records we are not permitted to do business with you.
Chinese (simplified): 根据我的商业记录,我们不被允许与您做生意。

English: Forgive me but I do not have time for idle chatter.\nWe are far behind schedule on this mining job. If you're looking to purchase ore I'm afraid I'm far too busy to accommodate you.
Chinese (simplified): 请原谅我没有时间闲聊。\n我们在这个采矿工作上严重落后于计划。如果你想购买矿石,恐怕我太忙了,无法满足你。

English:
As a matter of fact, I do need some help.
One of our mining ships could use some more supplies to complete their mining job.
If you were to bring me <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Quantity}</color> <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Type)}</color> I would make it well worth your time.
How does <color=#ffffff>{Eden_RewardCredit}</color> galactic standard credits sound as a payment? This is well above market value as we are working on a mining contract for an important customer and can't afford to be late.
Chinese (simplified):
事实上,我确实需要一些帮助。
我们的一艘采矿船需要更多的补给来完成他们的采矿工作。
如果你能带给我 <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Quantity}</color> <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Type)}</color> 我会让你觉得花时间是值得的。
作为报酬,<color=#ffffff>{Eden_RewardCredit}</color> 银河标准信用点怎么样?这远远高于市场价值,因为我们正在为一个重要客户工作采矿合同,不能迟到。

English: With these supplies we will be able to complete our mining job on time, thank to you.
Chinese (simplified): 有了这些补给,我们将能够按时完成我们的采矿工作,多亏了你。

English: Thank you for assisting us. As promised, <color=#ffffff>{Eden_RewardCredit}</color> galactic credits have been transferred to your bank account.\nI have also given you a spare mining contract that I don't have time to complete.\nPerhaps you could make use of it.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你的帮助。如承诺的,<color=#ffffff>{Eden_RewardCredit}</color> 银河信用点已转入你的银行账户。\n我还给你一个我没有时间完成的备用采矿合同。\n也许你可以利用它。

English: Do you have the <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Quantity}</color> <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Type)}</color> that I asked for?\nRemember, there's <color=#ffffff>{Eden_RewardCredit}</color> credits waiting for you.
Chinese (simplified): 你有我要求的 <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Quantity}</color> <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Type)}</color> 吗?\n记住,有 <color=#ffffff>{Eden_RewardCredit}</color> 信用点在等着你。

English: I do but I am not ready to turn them over just yet.
Chinese (simplified): 我有,但我还没有准备好把它们交出去。

English: @q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 10}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 感谢您代表Polaris独立矿工联盟。\n按照约定,我们已经向您的银行账户转账<color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 10}</color>信用点。这份合同现已履行完毕。\n祝您今天愉快。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You require both a </color><color=#ffffff>Project Eden Admin Access Card</color><color=#ff0000> and a </color><color=#ffffff>{Loc(RequiredItem)}</color><color=#ff0000> in your personal inventory to access the Spawn Patrol Vessel menu.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>您需要在个人库存中同时拥有</color><color=#ffffff>伊甸园计划管理员访问卡</color><color=#ff0000>和</color><color=#ffffff>{Loc(RequiredItem)}</color><color=#ff0000>才能访问生成巡逻飞船菜单。</color>

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#ff0000>THE SPAWN PATROL VESSEL ADMIN MENU IS ONLY FOR GAME ADMINS FOR TESTING.</color>
<color=#ff0000>SPAWNING EXCESSIVE PATROL VESSELS MAY LEAD TO PERFORMANCE ISSUES INCLUDING GAME CRASHES AND SAVE GAME CORRUPTION.</color>
<color=#ff0000>BY PROCEEDING YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND ACCEPT ALL RISKS AND AGREE TO THE DISCLAIMER. SAVE YOUR BLUEPRINTS AND BACK UP YOUR SAVE GAME.</color>
<color=#ff0000>IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THESE RISKS OR YOU ARE NOT A GAME ADMIN, DO NOT PROCEED.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 <color=#ff0000>生成巡逻飞船管理员菜单仅供游戏管理员进行测试使用。</color>
<color=#ff0000>生成过多的巡逻飞船可能会导致性能问题,包括游戏崩溃和存档损坏。</color>
<color=#ff0000>继续操作即表示您了解并接受所有风险,并同意免责声明。请保存您的蓝图并备份您的游戏存档。</color>
<color=#ff0000>如果您不接受这些风险或您不是游戏管理员,请不要继续。</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Agree and proceed at your OWN RISK.</color>

@q0 @d0Spawn Patrol Vessel Disclaimer Section 1 of 4.
<color=#ffff00>YOU MUST READ THIS DISCLAIMER IN FULL IN ORDER TO PROCEED.</color>
<color=#ffff00>IF YOU DO NOT FULLY UNDERSTAND, AGREE WITH, AND TAKE ON ALL RISKS EITHER KNOWN OR UNKNOWN, DO NOT PROCEED.</color>
<color=#ffff00>DO YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE TO EVERYTHING IN THIS SECTION OF THE DISCLAIMER?</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 生成巡逻飞船免责声明第1部分,共4部分。
<color=#ffff00>您必须完整阅读此免责声明才能继续。</color>
<color=#ffff00>如果您不完全理解、同意并承担所有已知或未知的风险,请不要继续。</color>
<color=#ffff00>您是否理解并同意此部分免责声明中的所有内容?</color>

English: I do NOT understand or do NOT agree.

@q0 @d0Spawn Patrol Vessel Disclaimer Section 2 of 4.\n<color=#ffff00>SPAWNING PATROL VESSELS CAN HAVE KNOWN AND UNKNOWN PERFORMANCE IMPACTS, INCLUDING SEVERE FPS REDUCTION, GAME CRASHES, SAVE GAME CORRUPTION, SERVER CRASHES, AND OTHER KNOWN OR UNKNOWN IMPACTS.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>DO YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE TO TAKE ON ANY AND ALL RISKS, KNOWN OR NOT?</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 生成巡逻飞船免责声明第2部分,共4部分。\n<color=#ffff00>生成巡逻飞船可能会有已知和未知的性能影响,包括严重的帧率下降、游戏崩溃、存档损坏、服务器崩溃以及其他已知或未知的影响。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>您是否理解并同意承担所有已知或未知的风险?</color>

English: I do NOT understand or do NOT agree.

@q0 @d0Spawn Patrol Vessel Disclaimer Section 3 of 4.\n<color=#ffff00>SPAWNING PATROL VESSELS IS ONLY FOR GAME ADMINS. IF YOU ARE NOT AN AUTHORIZED ADMIN ON THE SERVER YOU ARE PLAYING ON, DO NOT PROCEED. IF YOU HAVE ACCESS TO THIS MENU WITHOUT BEING A SERVER ADMIN, REPORT THIS TO YOUR SERVER ADMIN.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>DO YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT YOU ARE AN AUTHORIZED ADMIN ON THIS SERVER?</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 生成巡逻飞船免责声明第3部分,共4部分。\n<color=#ffff00>生成巡逻飞船仅限于游戏管理员。如果您不是您正在玩的服务器上的授权管理员,请不要继续。如果您在不是服务器管理员的情况下访问此菜单,请向您的服务器管理员报告。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>您是否理解并同意您是此服务器的授权管理员?</color>

English: I do NOT understand or do NOT agree.

@q0 @d0Spawn Patrol Vessel Disclaimer Section 4 of 4.
<color=#ffff00>SPAWNING PATROL VESSELS IS ONLY FOR TESTING. THIS IS NOT TO BE USED FOR NORMAL SURVIVAL GAME PLAY.</color>
<color=#ffff00>SPAWNED PATROL VESSELS MAY HAVE UNPREDICTABLE BEHAVIOR AND MAY FIRE UPON AND DAMAGE OR DESTROY PLAYER OR NPC SHIPS IN THIS PLAYFIELD.</color>
<color=#ffff00>DO NOT SPAWN WITHOUT SAVING ALL BLUEPRINTS AND BACKING UP YOUR SAVE GAME. SPAWN ONLY IN A TEST SAVE. DO NOT USE ON A LIVE SERVER.
DO YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT YOU HAVE SAVED YOUR BLUEPRINTS, BACKED UP YOUR SAVE GAME, AND ARE USING A TEST SAVE?</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 生成巡逻飞船免责声明第4部分,共4部分。
<color=#ffff00>生成巡逻飞船仅用于测试。不要将其用于正常的生存游戏玩法。</color>
<color=#ffff00>生成的巡逻飞船可能有不可预测的行为,可能会向玩家或NPC飞船开火并造成损害或摧毁。</color>
<color=#ffff00>在生成之前请保存所有蓝图并备份您的游戏存档。仅在测试存档中生成。不要在实时服务器上使用。
您是否理解并同意您已保存蓝图,备份了游戏存档,并正在使用测试存档?</color>

English: I do NOT understand or do NOT agree.

Chinese (simplified): @d0 选择一个巡逻飞船进行生成,将在短暂的倒计时后在您面前生成。\n这应该仅在太空中使用。\n在生成任何巡逻飞船之前,请确保阅读并同意免责声明。
<color=#ff0000>土匪</color>和<color=#ff0000>掠夺者</color>轨道巡逻飞船。

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ffff00>A HIGH NUMBER OF PATROL VESSELS HAVE BEEN SPAWNED IN THIS PLAYFIELD SINCE YOU HAVE REVIEWED THE DISCLAIMER LAST.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>YOU ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND AGREE TO THE DISCLAIMER AGAIN.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>REMINDER THAT TOO MANY PATROL VESSEL SPAWNS CAN CAUSE PERFORMANCE ISSUES AND IMPACT SAVE GAME STABILITY.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 <color=#ffff00>自您上次查看免责声明以来,这个游戏场地已经生成了大量巡逻飞船。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>您需要再次查看并同意免责声明。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>提醒:生成过多的巡逻飞船可能会导致性能问题,并影响游戏存档的稳定性。</color>

English: Never mind. I will move to a new playfield.
Chinese (simplified): 没关系。我会转移到一个新的游戏场地。
伊甸园计划生成巡逻飞船

English: <color=#ff0000>Warp in Tier 1 Zirax orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>翘曲进入1级兹瑞克斯轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: @d0Orbital patrol vessels available to spawn for <color=#ff0000>Zirax</color> faction.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 轨道巡逻舰可用于<color=#ff0000>兹瑞克斯</color>派系的生成。

English: <color=#ff0000>Warp in Tier 2 Zirax orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>翘曲进入2级兹瑞克斯轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Warp in Tier 3 Zirax orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>翘曲进入3级兹瑞克斯轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Warp in Tier 4 Zirax orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>翘曲进入4级兹瑞克斯轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Warp in Tier 0 Zirax orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>翘曲进入0级兹瑞克斯轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: @d0Orbital patrol vessels available to spawn for <color=#ff0000>Bandit</color> and <color=#ff0000>Raider</color> factions.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 轨道巡逻飞船可用于为<color=#ff0000>强盗</color>和<color=#ff0000>掠夺者</color>派系生成。

English: <color=#00ffc6>Warp in Tier 1 Legacy orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>翘曲进入1级遗留者轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: <color=#00ffc6>Warp in Tier 2 Legacy orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>翘曲进入2级遗留者轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Warp in Tier 1 Bandit orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>翘曲进入1级强盗轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Warp in Tier 1 Raider orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>翘曲进入1级掠夺者轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: @d0Orbital patrol vessels available to spawn for the <color=#00ffc6>Legacy</color> faction.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 为<color=#00ffc6>遗留者</color>派系提供的轨道巡逻舰可供生成。

English: <color=#00ffc6>Warp in Tier 3 Legacy orbital patrol vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffc6>翘曲进入3级遗留者轨道巡逻舰。</color>

English: Welcome to our freighter. I must apologize, we were recently attacked by bandits so I'm afraid there's not much we can do to help you.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的货船。我必须道歉,我们最近遭到了强盗的袭击,所以我恐怕我们没有太多能帮助你的。

English: Thank you for your assistance in saving our ship, and our lives.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮助我们拯救了我们的船只和生命。

English:
Thank you for defending our ship! By my count you helped take out {Eden_Score} bandit ships!
We don't have much equipment to reward you with, but I do have a few things that may interest you.
Polaris Megacorp has also authorized a one time payment to your account of <color=#ffffff>{((Eden_Score * 2) * Eden_G_BanditRewardT1)}</color> credits.
<color=#ffff00>I suggest making sure you are connected to a container with plenty of free space so we can transfer the items to your possession.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
感谢你保卫了我们的船只!据我统计,你帮助我们击毁了{Eden_Score}艘强盗船只!
我们没有太多的装备来奖赏你,但我确实有一些可能对你感兴趣的东西。
极星集团还授权了一次性支付到你的账户<color=#ffffff>{((Eden_Score * 2) * Eden_G_BanditRewardT1)}</color>信用点。
<color=#ffff00>我建议你确保你连接到一个有足够空闲空间的容器,这样我们就可以把这些物品转移到你的名下。</color>

English: <color=#00ff00>Sounds good to me. I accept the payment.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>听起来不错。我接受这笔付款。</color>

English: I'm not ready to accept payment yet.
Chinese (simplified): 我还没有准备好接受付款。

English: I want to ask something else.
@d0You've already retrieved everything you can from this console.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您已经从这个控制台检索了所有可以检索的内容。

English: @d0You retrieve the contents of the compartment.
@q0I hope you enjoyed your tour of our research vessel.\nDo you still need a brief refresher of what services we offer?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 希望你享受了我们研究船的参观。\n你是否还需要对我们提供的服务进行简要的复习?

English: <color=#00ff00>No thank you. I am ready to continue.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>不,谢谢。我已经准备好继续了。</color>

English: Please go over what services UCH Research Vessels offer.
Chinese (simplified): 请概述UCH研究飞船提供的服务。

English: @q0{Player.Name}, @w2 due to the dangerous nature of this mission and the high risk of combat I am only authorized to brief those who have <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color> unlocked in their tech tree. While this is an exploratory mission, I cannot in good conscious send in someone who is not prepared.\n@w2Come back when you are better prepared with a capital vessel equipped for heavy combat. @w2You're really going to need the CPU upgrades.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 {Player.Name},@w2 由于这个任务的危险性质和高战斗风险,我只被授权向那些在他们的科技树中解锁了<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color>的人进行简报。虽然这是一个探索性任务,但我不能在良心上派遣一个没有准备的人。\n@w2 当你用一艘装备了重型战斗装备的主力舰回来时,你将更加准备好。@w2 你真的需要CPU升级。

English: I'm not ready to be briefed now.
Chinese (simplified): 我现在还没有准备好接受简报。

English: @q0Before we get started, I need to make one thing clear. @w1This mission is @w1highly @w1classified. @w2Nothing said leaves this com channel, @w1do I make myself clear {Player.Name}?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 在我们开始之前,我需要明确一点。@w1 这个任务是@w1 高度@w1 机密的。@w2 在这个通信频道里说的任何话都不能泄露出去,@w1 我表达清楚了吗 {Player.Name}?

English: @q0Understandable. @w2When you are ready to take this mission, @w1open up this com channel again via your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 可以理解。@w2 当你准备好接受这个任务时,@w1 通过你的PDA再次打开这个通信频道。

English: And you want me to find out who might have attacked them?
Chinese (simplified): 你希望我找出谁可能攻击了他们?

English: I don't want to do this mission at this time.
Chinese (simplified): 我现在不想做这个任务。

English: @q0A few weeks ago we lost contact with an expedition we had sent to the Dronelands in search of potential Progenitor technology.\n@w2The research vessel leading the expedition was the UCHN Copernicus. @w1I know the captain. @w2He is a capable commander who would not have taken unnecessary risks with his crew.\n@p9 @d3I had reached out to our contacts in the Free Colonists region of Prosperity to see if anyone had seen or heard anything that could help us locate the Copernicus. @w2A few days ago I received a message from a deuterium miner who had come across some unfamiliar wreckage with blast damage and scorch marks consistent with that of UCH weaponry.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 几周前,我们失去了与一个探险队的联系,我们派他们去Dronelands寻找潜在的Progenitor技术。\n@w2 领导这次探险的研究船是UCHN Copernicus。@w1 我认识舰长。@w2 他是一个有能力的指挥官,不会无故拿他的船员冒险。\n@p9 @d3 我联系了Prosperity自由殖民者地区的联系人,看看是否有人看到或听到任何可以帮助我们找到Copernicus的消息。@w2 几天前,我从一个氘矿工那里收到消息,他发现了一些不熟悉的残骸,上面的爆炸损伤和烧焦痕迹与UCH武器一致。

English: Just how dangerous is this mission?
Sounds like too much work right now.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来现在工作量太大了。

English: On second thought, I am not prepared.
<color=#ffff00>You can skip the briefing. I already know what to do.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>你可以跳过简报。我已经知道该怎么做了。</color>

English: Maybe. Maybe. For you, anything.\nI've heard of you. You've helped us colonists out many times before. So I will give you the coordinates to the wreckage free of charge.
Chinese (simplified): 也许。也许。对你来说,任何事情。\n我听说过你。你以前多次帮助过我们殖民者。所以我将免费给你残骸的坐标。

English: Maybe. @w2Maybe. @w2But it will cost you. @w2Information ain't free you know. @w2I spent my own pentaxid to fly all the way out there!\n@w3<color=#ffffff>50,000</color> standard galactic credits. @w2Bank transfer only.
Chinese (simplified): 也许。@w2 也许。@w2 但这将花费你。@w2 信息不是免费的,你知道。@w2 我花了我自己的翘曲水晶飞到那里!\n@w3 <color=#ffffff>50,000</color>标准银河信用点。@w2 仅限银行转账。

English: I don't have that many credits in my bank account.
Chinese (simplified): 我的银行账户里没有那么多信用点。

English: I would also be willing to trade the information in exchange for either a <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color> or a <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item2)}</color>.\n@w3Or you could still pay <color=#ffffff>50,000</color> credits. @w2Up to you. @w2But you ain't getting it for free!
Chinese (simplified): 我也愿意用信息交换,换取一个<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color>或者一个<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item2)}</color>。\n@w3 或者你仍然可以支付<color=#ffffff>50,000</color>信用点。@w2 由你决定。@w2 但你别想免费得到它!

English: I need time to think about it.
Yes yes, @w1I understand.\n@w2Come back to me if you change your mind. @w2Don't take too long, someone else might outbid you. @w2Hah!
Chinese (simplified): 是的,是的,@w1 我明白了。\n@w2 如果你改变主意,回来找我。@w2 别拖太久,别人可能会出价比你高。@w2 哈哈!

English: I don't have any of those on me.

Chinese (simplified): 听起来像是个@w1 你@w1 的问题!

English: The coordinates of the wreck are at -3500, 2375, -4025 in an asteroid field in the system of Syntrax, @w2just on the edge of Free Colonists territory.\n@w2You can search your galaxy map for the system name.\n@w2Don't worry about remembering the coordinates, @w1I will upload them to your PDA. @w2Good luck.
Chinese (simplified): 残骸的坐标在Syntrax星系的小行星带中,坐标为-3500, 2375, -4025,就在自由殖民者领土的边缘。\n@w2 你可以在你的星系地图中搜索星系名称。\n@w2 不用担心记住坐标,@w1 我会上传到你的PDA上。@w2 祝你好运。

English: @d0This strange storage container seems to have circular slots for components to plug into. One of the slots contains a small component plugged into it. The rest of the slots are empty. If you choose to remove the component, it will be placed into your personal inventory or into a connected container. The mission item must be in your personal inventory to complete this part of the mission. If you lose the mission item you can return here to obtain another one.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个奇怪的存储容器似乎有圆形插槽供组件插入。 其中一个插槽插入了一个小组件。其余的插槽都是空的。 如果你选择移除组件,它将被放入你的个人库存或连接的容器中。任务物品必须在你的个人库存中才能完成任务的这一部分。 如果你丢失了任务物品,你可以回到这里获得另一个。

English: @d0You don't currently have a mission active that requires use of the science station.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你目前没有活跃的任务需要使用科研站。

English: @d0You seem to have forgotten the Broken Drone Processor you're supposed to be analyzing.\nGet it out of your cargo and put it into your personal inventory.\nIf you lost it you can go back to the asteroid field in Syntrax to obtain another one.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 你似乎忘记了你本应该分析的损坏的无人机处理器。\n把它从你的货物中拿出来,放入你的个人库存中。\n如果你丢失了它,你可以回到Syntrax的小行星场去获得另一个。

English: <color=#00ff00>Place the Broken Drone Processor on the science station.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>将损坏的无人机处理器放置于科学站上。</color>

English: @d0Science Station ready to analyze item: Broken Drone Processor.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 科学站准备分析物品:损坏的无人机处理器。

English: @q0Glad to hear from you, {Player.Name}. @w2For a minute there we were worried you had met the same fate as the Copernicus.\n@w3Anything new to report?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 很高兴收到你的消息,{Player.Name}。@w2 有那么一会儿我们担心你遇到了和哥白尼号一样的命运。\n@w3 有什么新情况要报告吗?

English: <color=#00ff00>I met with the deuterium miner. His information checked out.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>I与重氢矿工会面了。他的信息经过了核实。</color>

English: @q0Did the wreckage have blast marks consistent with UCH weapons?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 残骸上有与UCH武器一致的爆炸痕迹吗?

English: It did. And there was a section of hull plating from a UCH research vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 确实有。还有一块来自UCH研究船的船体装甲板。

English: @q0That's concerning, but means that was the Copernicus.\n@w2Did you find anything else at the wreckage site?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 这令人担忧,但这意味着那就是哥白尼号。\n@w2 你在残骸现场还发现了什么吗?

English: There was a strange structure being built into an asteroid.
Chinese (simplified): 有一个奇怪的结构正在被建在小行星上。

English: @q0Hmm. @w2Curious. @w4The researcher seems to pause to think@w3 . @w3 . @w3 .\n@w5This might be part of something larger. @w3Did you recover anything of interest from the site? @w3And were you able to trace any warp signatures?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 嗯。@w2 好奇。@w4 研究员似乎停下来思考@w3 。@w3 。@w3 。\n@w5 这可能是更大事物的一部分。@w3 你从现场回收了什么有趣的东西吗?@w3 你能追踪到任何翘曲信号吗?

English: Yes to both. I recovered a broken processor but was unable to make heads or tails of it.
Chinese (simplified): 两个问题的回答都是肯定的。我回收了一个损坏的处理器,但无法理解其用途。

English: Relay your findings to the researcher and skip the dialogue.
Chinese (simplified): 将你的发现传达给研究员并跳过对话。

English: Should I go after whomever attacked the Copernicus?
Chinese (simplified): 我应该去追查攻击哥白尼号的人吗?

English: @q0Not yet. @w2We still do not know where the Copernicus is, nor why it was this far out or who they were fighting.\n@w3Picking a fight with this new faction without understanding their capabilities or motivations will only end in disaster. @w2You need to be prepared with knowledge.\n@w3Especially... @w2With these new @w2reports... @w2I have seen.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 还不到时候。@w2 我们仍然不知道哥白尼号在哪里,也不知道它为什么会这么远,或者它们在和谁战斗。\n@w3 在不了解这个新派系的能力或动机的情况下挑起战斗,只会以灾难告终。@w2 你需要用知识来准备。\n@w3 特别是...@w2 鉴于这些新的@w2 报告...@w2 我看到的。

English: @q0For many years there have been reports of strange sightings along the outer edge of the galaxy.\n@w3Freighters going missing, @w2science vessels picking up strange binary subspace signals, @w2even military vessels reporting something just at the edge of their sensors.\n@w2Mostly these were thought to be mere rumors. @w2Now though, @w1I wonder if there was truth to at least some of them.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 多年来,一直有关于银河系外缘奇怪目击事件的报告。\n@w3 失踪的货船,@w2 科学船捕捉到奇怪的二进制亚空间信号,@w2 甚至军用船只报告在他们的传感器边缘有东西。\n@w2 这些通常被认为是谣言。@w2 但现在,@w1 我想知道至少其中一些是否有真实性。

English: @q0You need to find out where the Copernicus is and learn more about who attacked them.\n@w2Carefully go into the Dronelands and launch probes to scout several types of systems.\n@w2The probes will collect sensor and visual data to look for the Copernicus and search for unknown ships and structures. @w2We'll be able to see a hint of what's going on out there. @w2As long as you don't venture away from the stars you should be safe to let the probes do the work.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你需要找出哥白尼号在哪里,更多地了解谁攻击了它们。\n@w2 谨慎地进入无人机之地,发射探测器去侦察几种类型的系统。\n@w2 探测器将收集传感器和视觉数据,寻找哥白尼号,搜索未知的船只和结构。@w2 我们将能够看到那里发生了什么的线索。@w2 只要你不远离星星,让探测器去做工作,你应该就是安全的。

English: @d0No scans are required at this time.

@d0Scanning <color=#ffff00>{SystemType}</color> class systems will require <color=#ffffff>{ProbeCount} {Loc(ProbeType)}</color>.\nProbes must be in your personal inventory to be launched.\nYou can construct probes under the decoration tab of a constructor or purchase them from UCH Research Vessels.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 扫描<color=#ffff00>{SystemType}</color>类系统将需要<color=#ffffff>{ProbeCount} {Loc(ProbeType)}</color>。\n探测器必须在你的个人库存中才能发射。\n你可以在建造机的装饰标签下构建探测器,或从UCH研究船购买它们。
将探测器装载到扫描仪中。
<color=#646464>将探测器装载到扫描仪中。(缺少探测器)</color>

English: @d0<color=#ffffff>{ProbeCount} {Loc(ProbeType)}</color> loaded into scanner and ready to launch.\nTarget star classes: <color=#ffff00>{SystemType}</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffffff>{ProbeCount} {Loc(ProbeType)}</color> 已装载到扫描仪中,准备发射。\n目标恒星类型: <color=#ffff00>{SystemType}</color>

English: @d0You have already scanned this specific star. Warp to a different star system.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您已经扫描过这个特定的恒星。翘曲到不同的星系。
@d0 正在进行探测器扫描。\n初步数据已可用。
查看探测器的扫描数据。

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#00ffff>Systems scanned:</color> 13
<color=#00ffff>Objects of interest detected:</color> 2079
<color=#00ffff>Asteroids:</color> 1387, <color=#00ffff>gas and dust clouds:</color> 215, <color=#00ffff>small moving vessels:</color> 319, <color=#00ffff>large moving vessels:</color> 28, <color=#00ffff>stationary objects:</color> 130
<color=#ff00ff>Anomalies identified:</color> Binary subspace transmissions, low power distress calls, higher than average dust density.
<color=#1083fe>UCH signals detected:</color> 0
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 <color=#00ffff>已扫描系统:</color> 13
<color=#00ffff>发现感兴趣的物体:</color> 2079
<color=#00ffff>小行星:</color> 1387, <color=#00ffff>气体和尘埃云:</color> 215, <color=#00ffff>小型移动物体:</color> 319, <color=#00ffff>大型移动物体:</color> 28, <color=#00ffff>静止物体:</color> 130
<color=#ff00ff>识别的异常:</color> 二进制亚空间传输,低功率求救信号,高于平均的尘埃密度。
<color=#1083fe>检测到的UCH信号:</color> 0

@q0 @d0<color=#00ffff>Systems scanned:</color> 13
<color=#00ffff>Objects of interest detected:</color> 2079
<color=#00ffff>Asteroids:</color> 1387, <color=#00ffff>gas and dust clouds:</color> 215, <color=#00ffff>small moving vessels:</color> 319, <color=#00ffff>large moving vessels:</color> 28, <color=#00ffff>stationary objects:</color> 130

<color=#00ffff>小行星:</color> 1387, <color=#00ffff>气体和尘埃云:</color> 215, <color=#00ffff>小型移动物体:</color> 319, <color=#00ffff>大型移动物体:</color> 28, <color=#00ffff>静止物体:</color> 130
