English: @q0Good to hear from you again {Player.Name}.\n@w2Have your probes found any signs of the Copernicus or who attacked them?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 很高兴再次听到你的消息 {Player.Name}。\n@w2 你的探测器有没有发现哥白尼号的任何迹象,或者是谁攻击了他们?

English: Let me send you the probe data so you can help make sense of it.
Chinese (simplified): 让我把探测器数据发送给你,这样你可以帮忙理解它。

English: <color=#ffff00>I'll send you the data and we skip the talk.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>我会发送数据给你,我们跳过谈话。</color>

English: @q0It's coming through now. Give me a moment to review it. @w4Hmm... @w5Hmmnn. @w5I see. @w3That's... @w3Interesting. @w6 ...\n@w5Well, @w3that's certainly different.\n@w4Those structures and ships from your probe footage don't look consistent with Progenitor tech.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 现在数据正在传输。给我一点时间来审阅它。@w4 嗯...@w5 嗯嗯。@w5 我明白了。@w3 那是...@w3 有趣的。@w6 ...\n@w5 好吧,@w3 那确实不同寻常。\n@w4 那些从你的探测器录像和扫描中看到的结构和飞船看起来与Progenitor技术不一致。

English: @q0At first glance, @w1they are drones. @w1Much larger and more complex than your standard issue Polaris or Zirax drones, @w1but drones nonetheless.\n@w2Based on the probe footage and scans you provided, I have broken them down into several categories to give you a brief overview of what to expect. @w2I have already downloaded the data into your PDA systems so your HUD will be able to properly identify these things for you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 乍一看,@w1 它们是无人机。@w1 比你的标准Polaris或Zirax无人机要大得多,复杂得多,@w1 但仍然是无人机。\n@w2 根据你提供的探测器录像和扫描,我已经将它们分成几个类别,给你一个简要的概述,告诉你可以期待什么。@w2 我已经将数据下载到你的PDA系统中,这样你的HUD就能正确识别这些东西了。

English: <color=#ffff00>I don't need an overview, just tell me what I need to do.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>我不需要概述,只要告诉我需要做什么。</color>

English: What's the next type of drone?
Chinese (simplified): 下一种无人机是什么类型的?

English: @q0There are larger drones with heavier weapons and shields. @w2These seem to be the guard drones and so far I have identified two types I have classified as Nullifier or Guardian.\n@w2These should be avoided unless you are in a heavy combat vessel.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 还有更大,武装更重,护盾更坚固的无人机。@w2 这些似乎是守卫无人机,到目前为止我已经识别出两种,我将它们分类为消磁者或守护者。\n@w2 除非你驾驶的是重型战斗飞船,否则应该避免它们。

English: @q0Not by the standard definition of life, no. @w2They are not organic in origin and don't seem to fly any faction flag.\n@w3The behavior of these drones does seem consistent with the strange reports I have seen from near your location of {Player.PlayfieldName}.\n@w2They also do not appear to be related to the Progenitors or Legacy.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 按照生命标准定义,不,它们不是。@w2 它们不是有机起源,也似乎不飞任何派系旗帜。\n@w3 这些无人机的行为似乎与我在你的位置附近看到的奇怪报告一致,即{Player.PlayfieldName}。\n@w2 它们似乎也与先驱者或遗留者无关。

English: Can we go over all of this again? I wasn't listening.
Chinese (simplified): 我们可以再过一遍所有这些吗?我没在听。

English: Wait, can we go over this again?
Chinese (simplified): 等等,我们可以再过一遍这个吗?

English: @q0You're still alive! @w1I mean I knew you would be fine. @w2I have a theory about the drone processors.\n@w2I have been working on a design for a chassis that will allow them to network together amongst themselves but I need your help to test it.\n@w2First you need those materials I had asked you to gather earlier. @w1 10 Salvaged Drone Processors, @w1 20 palladium ingots, @w1 and 50 carbon substrate.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你还活着!@w1 我的意思是我知道你会没事的。@w2 我有一个关于无人机处理器的理论。\n@w2 我一直在研究一个设计,将允许它们在它们自己之间建立网络,但我需要你的帮助来测试它。\n@w2 首先你需要我早些时候要求你收集的那些材料。@w1 10个回收无人机处理器,@w1 20个钯锭,@w1 以及50个碳复合材料。

English: <color=#ffff00>I know the drill. Skip the explanation please.</color>

@q0You're going to make a chassis to hold the salvaged drone processors and allow them to interact with each other.\n@w2I know what you're going to say, @w2IT'S DANGEROUS! @w3Don't worry, they won't be able to access any other part of your ship.\n@w2Collect the materials needed into your personal inventory and use your science station to construct the chassis and start plugging processors into it to see what happens.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你将制作一个底盘来装载回收的无人机处理器,并让它们彼此交互。\n@w2 我知道你要说什么,@w2 这很危险!@w3 别担心,它们无法访问你飞船的其他部分。\n@w2 将所需材料收集到你的个人库存中,并使用你的科研站来构建底盘,然后开始将处理器插入其中,看看会发生什么。

English: I don't have enough salvaged drone processors.
Chinese (simplified): 我没有足够的回收无人机处理器。

English: @q0I hate to ask you to do this, but you're going to have to get out there and destroy some of those drones.\n@w2I suggest trying to find some lone scouts or harvesters or a budding structure and keep your eye on your radar.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 我很不情愿让你去做这个,但你将不得不出去摧毁一些那些无人机。\n@w2 我建议尝试找到一些孤独的侦察兵或收割者或正在成长的结构,并注意你的雷达。

English: I have the salvaged drone processors.
Chinese (simplified): 我有回收的无人机处理器。

English: @q0Then as long as you have the palladium and plastic material you should be all set to access your science station and get started.\n@w3Oh, @w1do make sure you are in a safe area before starting. @w2Wouldn't want any unexpected company to show up. @w2Keep an eye out just in case.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 只要你有钯和塑料材料,你应该就可以使用你的科研站开始工作了。\n@w3 哦,@w1 在开始之前确保你在安全区域。@w2 我们不希望任何不速之客出现。@w2 保持警惕,以防万一。

English: @q0It's our only lead to the Copernicus, unless your probes detect something.\n@w2I have uploaded the chassis design to your science station. @w1It's built in microconstructor can fabricate it for you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 这是我们找到哥白尼号的唯一线索,除非你的探测器发现了什么。\n@w2 我已经将底盘设计上传到你的科学站。@w1 它内置的微型构造器可以为你制造它。

English: Can we go over this again?

@d0You do not have all the required items for testing in your personal inventory.
Items needed:
<color=#ffffff>10 Salvaged Drone Swarm Processor</color>
<color=#ffffff>20 {Loc(Item2)}</color>
<color=#ffffff>50 {Loc(Item3)}</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 你的个人库存中没有所有必需的测试物品。
所需物品:
<color=#ffffff>10 回收无人机群处理器</color>
<color=#ffffff>20 {Loc(Item2)}</color>
<color=#ffffff>50 {Loc(Item3)}</color>

English: @q0 @d0Please make a selection.\n<color=#ff0000>Warning: testing with alien components may have unpredictable and dangerous results. Your ship may be put at risk.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 请选择。\n<color=#ff0000>警告:使用外星组件进行测试可能会产生不可预测和危险的结果。你的飞船可能会处于风险之中。</color>
@q0 @d0 微型构造器上线。\n可用图纸:实验网络底盘。

English: <color=#00ff00>Install the 1st processor into the chassis and start monitoring.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>将第一块处理器安装到机架中并开始监控。</color>

English: @q0 @d0There is a momentary surge of power as you pull out the processors.\nYour ship's systems are overloading!

<color=#00ff00>将另一个处理器安装到机架中。</color>

@q0 @d0<color=#00ffff>Systems scanned:</color> 42
<color=#00ffff>Objects of interest detected:</color> 7989
<color=#00ffff>Asteroids:</color> 5014, <color=#00ffff>gas and dust clouds:</color> 681, <color=#00ffff>small moving vessels:</color> 774, <color=#00ffff>large moving vessels:</color> 219, <color=#00ffff>stationary objects:</color> 1301
<color=#ff00ff>Anomalies identified:</color> Binary subspace transmissions, low power distress calls, higher than average dust density.
<color=#1083fe>UCH signals detected:</color> 6
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 <color=#00ffff>系统扫描:</color> 42
<color=#00ffff>发现感兴趣的对象:</color> 7989
<color=#00ffff>小行星:</color> 5014, <color=#00ffff>气体和尘埃云:</color> 681, <color=#00ffff>小型移动船只:</color> 774, <color=#00ffff>大型移动船只:</color> 219, <color=#00ffff>静止物体:</color> 1301
<color=#ff00ff>识别出的异常:</color> 二进制亚空间传输,低功率求救信号,高于平均水平的尘埃密度。
<color=#1083fe>检测到UCH信号:</color> 6
@q0 探测器找到了哥白尼号吗?

English: Yes, and some of the crew are in escape pods.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,一些船员在逃生舱中。

English: What the hell happened with that experiment?
Chinese (simplified): 那次实验到底发生了什么?

English: @q0I did not expect the processors to begin amplifying each others processing power. @w2I had no idea that was going to happen!\n@w3I think I know why the captain of the Copernicus came out here. @w1If just a few of these drone processors were able to do this, imagine what ten or twenty times as many could do! @w2In a carefully controlled setting they could augment a ship's CPU power past the current known limit.\n@w2This would be a game changer for power in this galaxy and give the UCH a bargaining chip in galactic negotiations.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 我没有预料到处理器会开始相互放大处理能力。@w2 我完全不知道会发生这种情况!\n@w3 我想我知道哥白尼号的舰长为什么会来到这里。@w1 如果这些无人机处理器中的几个能做到这一点,想象一下如果有十倍或二十倍的数量会有什么效果!@w2 在一个严格控制的环境中,它们可以增强飞船的CPU能力,超过目前已知的限制。\n@w2 这将是这个星系力量的变革者,并为UCH在银河系谈判中提供筹码。

English: What's the plan to rescue the crew?
Chinese (simplified): 救援船员的计划是什么?

English: <color=#ffff00>Just skip to where you tell me what to do.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>直接跳到你告诉我该怎么做的地方。</color>

English: @q0From your probe's footage it appears the drones have hauled the Copernicus off to a young drone nest in the Calandras system to be broken down for raw materials. @w2They took the escape pods along with them but I guess they aren't as tempting as the ship right now.\n@w2This gives us an opportunity while most of the harvester drones are distracted working on the Copernicus to go in and rescue the crew from the escape pods. After you've destroyed the nearby drone structure, you can open each pod and rescue the crewmember inside.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 从你的探测器画面来看,无人机把哥白尼号拖到了卡拉德拉斯星系的一个年轻的无人机巢穴,准备分解成原材料。@w2 他们把逃生舱也带走了,但我猜它们现在没有飞船那么诱人。\n@w2 这给了我们一个机会,当大多数收割无人机忙于处理哥白尼号时,我们可以进去从逃生舱中救出船员。在你摧毁了附近的无人机结构后,你可以打开每个舱并救出里面的船员。

English: @q0You'll still have to deal with that drone structure as the pods are too close to it. @w2It will likely deal too much damage for you to rescue the crew while under fire. @w2I recommend taking it on in direct combat, as it will be mostly unguarded except for the defense drones.\n@w2Eventually those drones will finish with the Copernicus and then the escape pods will be next on the menu. @w2I somehow doubt these drones care about whether they are still occupied or not when they begin their salvaging so you better act fast.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你仍然需要处理那个无人机结构,因为逃生舱离它太近了。@w2 在你受到攻击的同时,它可能会造成太多伤害,让你无法救援船员。@w2 我建议直接进行战斗,因为它除了防御无人机外,大部分时间都是无人守卫的。\n@w2 最终,那些无人机会完成对哥白尼号的攻击,然后逃生舱将成为下一个目标。@w2 我有些怀疑这些无人机在开始打捞时是否会关心它们是否仍然有人居住,所以你最好快点行动。

English: <color=#00ff00>Setting a course for the Calandras system.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>正在设定前往卡兰德拉星系的航线。</color>

English: Can we go over this again?
Chinese (simplified): 我们可以再讨论一遍吗?

English: @d0<color=#00fbff>This escape pod has a crewmember trapped inside.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Connect to a cargo container on board your ship before rescuing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00fbff>这个逃生舱内有一名被困的船员。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>在救援前,请连接到你飞船上的货柜。</color>

English: @d0<color=#00fbff>This escape pod has a crewmember trapped inside.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Connect to a cargo container on board your ship before rescuing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00fbff>这个逃生舱内有一名被困的船员。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>在救援前,请连接到你飞船上的货柜。</color>

English: @d0<color=#00fbff>This escape pod has a crewmember trapped inside.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Connect to a cargo container on board your ship before rescuing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00fbff>这个逃生舱内有一名被困的船员。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>在救援前,请连接到你飞船上的货柜。</color>

English: @d0<color=#00fbff>This escape pod has a crewmember trapped inside.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Connect to a cargo container on board your ship before rescuing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00fbff>这个逃生舱内有一名船员被困。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>在救援之前,请将其连接到你飞船上的货柜。</color>

English: @d0<color=#00fbff>This escape pod has a crewmember trapped inside.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Connect to a cargo container on board your ship before rescuing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#00fbff>这个逃生舱内有一名船员被困。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>在救援之前,请将其连接到你飞船上的货柜。</color>

English: @q0Well, @w1that must have been quite the adventure.\n@w2It is sad about the loss of the Copernicus and her captain but it is fortunate you were able to rescue some of the crew.\n@w3Their sacrifice was not in vain however.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 嗯,@w1 那一定是一次相当冒险的经历。\n@w2 对于哥白尼号及其舰长的损失感到悲伤,但幸运的是你能救出一些船员。\n@w3 他们的牺牲并非徒劳。

English: <color=#ffff00>I'm not interested. Just give me my reward.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>我不感兴趣。只给我我的奖励。</color>

English: @q0With the data you recorded during your experiment with the drone processors, @w1the data from your probes, @w1and your own experiences with these drones I was able to make a breakthrough.\n@w2I believe I have designed a chassis able to hold the drone processors in a low power state to keep them under control while still allowing them to network with the rest of a ship's CPU systems. @w2In theory, @w1an array of drone processors could supplement a ship's CPU systems by acting as a sort of auxiliary CPU extender.\n@w2This would increase a ship's CPU limit past what it could normally have.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 有了你在无人机处理器实验中记录的数据,@w1 你的探测器数据,@w1 以及你自己与这些无人机的经历,我取得了突破。\n@w2 我相信我已经设计出了一种底盘,能够在低功耗状态下容纳无人机处理器,以保持它们的控制,同时仍然允许它们与飞船的其余CPU系统联网。@w2 理论上,@w1 一群无人机处理器可以通过充当某种辅助CPU扩展器来补充飞船的CPU系统。\n@w2 这将增加飞船的CPU限制,超出它通常可能拥有的范围。

English: @q0It means our position in the Andromeda galaxy is safer. @w1We could use this technology as a bargaining chip for trades or alliances.\n@w2Unfortunately I am not sure the Project Eden leadership will agree. @w1Our primary mission is to research the Progenitors and these drones do not seem to be related. @w2They may reassign me away from continuing my research on the drones. @w1That's where you come in.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 这意味着我们在仙女座星系的位置更安全。@w1 我们可以使用这项技术作为交易或联盟的筹码。\n@w2 不幸的是,我不确定伊甸园计划的领导层会同意。@w1 我们的主要任务是研究先驱者,而这些无人机似乎与之无关。@w2 他们可能会重新分配我,让我继续研究无人机。@w1 这就是你的作用。

English: @q0You could continue researching the drones. @w1Perhaps you can find a way to use the processors to create more powerful versions of other devices in the future.\n@w2There's also the potential threat the drones pose to the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你可以继续研究无人机。@w1 也许你可以找到一种方法,使用处理器在未来创造出更强大的其他设备版本。\n@w2 还有无人机对星系构成的潜在威胁。

English: You believe these drones are planning an attack?
Chinese (simplified): 你认为这些无人机正在计划攻击?

English: @q0Not planning, @w1no. @w1They seem concerned only with defending their territory and collecting resources.\n@w2And that's the problem. @w1While you have been searching for the Copernicus I have been in contact with representatives of the Free Colonists, Polaris Megacorp, the Trade Federation, and even a few pirates. @w2Even though there are reports that could be tied to these drones going back years no one seems concerned about them.\n@w2Until there is a clear and immediate danger I fear the major powers of the galaxy will ignore the threat until it's too late.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 不是计划,@w1 不。@w1 它们似乎只关心保卫自己的领土和收集资源。\n@w2 而这就是问题所在。@w1 当你在寻找哥白尼号时,我一直在与自由殖民者、极星大公司、贸易联盟的代表,甚至一些海盗接触。@w2 尽管有报告可能与这些无人机有关,可以追溯到几年前,但似乎没有人对它们感到担忧。\n@w2 除非有一个明确和直接的危险,否则我担心银河系的主要力量会忽视这个威胁,直到为时已晚。

English: Well these drones are pretty far away. What risk do they actually pose?
Chinese (simplified): 嗯,这些无人机相当遥远。它们实际上构成什么风险?

English: @q0What worries me isn't the strength of their ships but that they are being ignored.\n@w2Once these drones have consumed all the resources on the outer rim, @w1where do you think they will go next?\n@w2By that time these drones will have grown into a terrifying swarm that will be impossible to stop. @w1They may be confined to the outer edges of the galaxy for now but you and I both know that they are coming. @w2Maybe not tomorrow, @w1but sooner than we'd like.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 让我担心的不是它们的船只实力,而是它们被忽视了。\n@w2 一旦这些无人机消耗了外缘的所有资源,@w1 你认为它们接下来会去哪里?\n@w2 到那时,这些无人机将成长为一个可怕的群落,将无法阻止。@w1 它们现在可能被限制在银河系的边缘,但你和我都清楚,它们正在来临。@w2 也许不是明天,@w1 但比我们希望的要早。

English: So what do we do now?
Chinese (simplified): 那么我们现在该做什么呢?

English: @q0You can continue to fight this drone swarm for more processors. Perhaps you can use them to make your ship more capable.\n@w2I have downloaded designs to your science station for new auxiliary CPU extenders for both small and large ships. @w1Access your science station to unlock them in your tech tree.\n@w2I also included a few other things as thanks. @w2Without your help we may have never known what became of the Copernicus and more people would have died. @w2I will mourn the captain and crew that were lost.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你可以继续对抗这些无人机群,以获取更多的处理器。或许你可以使用它们来提升你的飞船的能力。\n@w2 我已经将新的设计下载到你的科研站,用于解锁小型和大型飞船的辅助CPU扩展器。@w1 访问你的科研站,在你的科技树中解锁它们。\n@w2 我还添加了一些其他的东西作为感谢。@w2 如果没有你的帮助,我们可能永远不会知道哥白尼号发生了什么,更多的人将会死去。@w2 我将为失去的舰长和船员哀悼。

English: <color=#00ff00>Their loss will not be in vain.</color>
Can we go over this again?

@d0New package available from UCH Researcher: Tech Tree Unlocks: Small Auxiliary CPU Core, Large Auxiliary CPU Core Items: 3 Ultra Rare Alien Cache, 5 Navigational Data Credits: 250,000 Make sure you are connected to a cargo container with plenty of free volume.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 UCH研究员提供的新包裹: 科技树解锁:小型辅助CPU核心,大型辅助CPU核心 物品:3个超稀有外星宝箱,5个导航数据 信用点:250,000 确保你连接到一个有足够空闲空间的货柜。
<color=#00ff00>完成任务以获得减少的奖励。 </color><color=#ffffff>(之前已完成)</color>

English:
<color=#ff00ff>Alien caches</color> can be obtained from some missions.
Contents of the cache will be placed into your connected container.
Alien caches contain the same rewards as the equivalent alien loot container found in a POI.
<color=#ffff00>Place the caches into your personal inventory then connect to a cargo container with plenty of free volume.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ff00ff>外星宝箱</color>可以通过一些任务获得。
宝箱的内容将放入你连接的容器中。
外星宝箱包含与POI中发现的相应外星战利品容器相同的奖励。
<color=#ffff00>将宝箱放入你的个人库存,然后连接到一个有足够空闲空间的货柜。</color>
打开 <color=#ff0000>非常稀有外星宝库</color>

English: I don't know what you're talking about. @w1I haven't found any wreckage lately.\n@w2You must have me confused with someone else. @w2Maybe the person you're looking for is at a different faction's distribution center?
Chinese (simplified): 我不知道你在说什么。@w1 我最近没有发现任何残骸。\n@w2 你可能把我和别人搞混了。@w2 也许你要找的人在不同派系的分配中心?

English: I will contact you once I meet the requirements.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦我满足条件,我会联系你。

English: @q0Unfortunately {Player.Name}, @w2you do not meet the requirements for this mission.\n@w2You must be at least neutral with Polaris Megacorp and have 3,000,000 credits in your account. @w2We need to make sure you'll be able to make the trade on our behalf.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 不幸的是 {Player.Name},@w2 你不符合这个任务的要求。\n@w2 你必须至少与北极星超级企业保持中立关系,并且你的账户里有3,000,000信用点。@w2 我们需要确保你能代表我们进行交易。

English: @q0I have arranged a meeting with a Polaris representative on a Polaris Distribution Center. @w2You can find Distribution Centers in Polaris Trading Station sectors inside Polaris territory. @w1They show up on the solar system map as a white station icon.\n@w2I cannot understate the importance of the UCH obtaining this technology. @w2If you can cut a deal to purchase it from them, @w1do so. @w2But if they refuse, @w1you may have to resort to... @w2Other @w1means of obtaining the schematic.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 我已经安排了在Polaris分配中心与Polaris代表的会面。@w2 你可以在Polaris贸易空间站星区内找到分配中心,这些星区位于Polaris领土内。@w1 它们在太阳系地图上显示为白色空间站图标。\n@w2 我不能过分强调UCH获取这项技术的重要性。@w2 如果你能达成协议从他们那里购买它,@w1 就这么做。@w2 但如果他们拒绝,@w1 你可能不得不诉诸于...@w2 其他@w1 手段来获取图纸。

English: I'm not ready to do this mission.
Chinese (simplified): 我还没有准备好执行这个任务。

English: @q0As we work on rebuilding our fleet we find ourselves short on resources. @w2Let's face it, @w1we are alone here and our current mining fleets just can't obtain enough ore fast enough. @w1That's where you come in.\n@w2We want you to go to the region of the galaxy known as The Forge and arrange a deal with Polaris Megacorp to buy the schematic to their prototype Automated Industrial Mining Rig. @w2This new rig of theirs is able to mine a planetary ore deposit for far longer before needing to be refueled or emptied than a standard auto mining device.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当我们努力重建我们的舰队时,我们发现自己资源不足。@w2 让我们面对现实,@w1 我们在这里是孤立的,我们目前的采矿舰队无法快速获得足够的矿石。@w1 这就是你的作用所在。\n@w2 我们希望你前往银河系的锻造区域,并与Polaris Megacorp达成协议,购买他们原型自动化工业采矿设备的图纸。@w2 他们的这个新设备能够在需要加油或清空之前,比标准自动采矿设备挖掘更长时间的行星矿石。

English: <color=#ffff00>You can skip the briefing, I know what to do.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>你可以跳过简报,我知道该怎么做。</color>

English: @d0<color=#ffff00>The Ancient Warp Gate and the Decay region is not yet setup in Reforged Eden 2.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>It will be added in a later update.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffff00>古老的翘曲门和衰败区域尚未在Reforged Eden 2中设置。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>它将在稍后的更新中添加。</color>

English: You're not a known pirate and I have no guarantee that you won't just kill us.\n@w2Either finish the job, or get off my ship!
Chinese (simplified): 你不是一个已知的海盗,我没有任何保证你不会杀了我们。\n@w2 要么完成工作,要么离开我的飞船!

English: I've already given you everything I can! What more do you want?
Chinese (simplified): 我已经给了你我能提供的一切!你还想怎样?

English: We are adrift without power and with no hope of repairing our ship or calling for help! We're good as dead and I will not make any deals with you!\nYou'll have to destroy this ship if you want anything valuable.
Chinese (simplified): 我们没有动力,没有希望修理我们的船或寻求帮助!我们和死人没两样,我不会和你做任何交易!\n如果你想得到任何有价值的东西,你必须摧毁这艘船。

English: What do you want?\n\n@d0Make sure you are connected to a container via logistics before demanding ransom.
Chinese (simplified): 你想要什么?\n\n@d0 在要求赎金之前,请确保你通过物流连接到一个容器。

English: Power down your ship and transfer funds to my account! <color=#00ff00>({SuccessChance}% chance)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 关闭你的飞船动力,并将资金转移到我的账户! <color=#00ff00>({SuccessChance}%的几率)</color>

English: Power down your ship and hand over any secret cargo you're carrying! <color=#00ff00>({SuccessChance}% chance)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 关闭你的飞船动力,交出你携带的任何秘密货物! <color=#00ff00>({SuccessChance}%的几率)</color>

English: Power down your ship and I will take one of your crew! <color=#00ff00>({SuccessChance}% chance)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 关闭你的飞船动力,我会带走你的一名船员! <color=#00ff00>({SuccessChance}%的几率)</color>

English: I have already given you my answer.\nNow leave me!
Chinese (simplified): 我已经给了你我的答案。\n现在离开我!

English: I will spare your lives this time. You are free to go.
Chinese (simplified): 这次我会饶你们一命。你们可以走了。

English: Hell no! Kill us if you must but I ain't giving you anything!
Chinese (simplified): 绝不!如果你非要杀我们,那就来吧,但我什么也不会给你!

English: Fine! Fine! Just please don't hurt anyone!\nI have powered down our ship and transferred {RewardAmount} credits to your bank account!\nPlease let us go.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧!好吧!请不要伤害任何人!\n我已经关闭了我们的飞船,并将{RewardAmount}信用点转移到了你的银行账户!\n请让我们走。

English: I have powered down our ship as you asked.\nHere is the last of our cargo. Oh my client is going to kill me!\nNow will you leave please?
Chinese (simplified): 我已经按照你的要求关闭了我们的飞船。\n这是我们最后的货物。哦,我的客户会杀了我!\n现在你可以走了吗?

English: Thank you for the donation. I will put it to good use.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你的捐赠。我会好好利用的。
他们将会安全。大部分时间。

English: My crew? But they are like family!\nFine, if it's to save our lives, there is a crew member who is willing to go with you as long as you can guarantee they won't be harmed.
Chinese (simplified): 我的船员?但他们就像家人一样!\n好吧,如果是为了救我们的命,有一个船员愿意跟你走,只要你能保证他们不会受到伤害。

English: I've heard how you've been destroying other freighters recently and I don't trust you!\nYou will get nothing out of me!
Chinese (simplified): 我听说你最近一直在摧毁其他货船,我不信任你!\n你从我这里什么也得不到!

English: @d0The PDA has no useful information on it.
@d0This data pad appears to contain part of a log.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个数据板似乎包含了一部分日志。

English: Please, spare the lives of my crew! Take what you want, just leave us be!
Chinese (simplified): 请饶了我船员的命!拿走你想要的东西,只要放过我们!

English: Perhaps we can come to an arrangement to spare your life.
Chinese (simplified): 也许我们可以达成一个协议来饶你一命。

English: @d0Subject: So you think you're a pirate?\nFrom: Unknown\nTo: {Player.Name}
Chinese (simplified): @d0 主题:那么你认为你是个海盗?\n发件人:未知\n收件人:{Player.Name}

English: <color=#00ff00>Send a reply that you accept the job.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>发送回复表示你接受这份工作。</color>

English: Please, @w2spare the lives of my crew!\n\n@d0Make sure you are connected to a container via logistics before demanding ransom.
Chinese (simplified): 请,@w2 饶了我的船员的生命吧!\n\n@d0 在要求赎金之前,请确保你通过物流连接到一个容器。

English: I'm here to collect your insurance premium. I will also be taking one of your crew.
Chinese (simplified): 我是来收取你的保险费的。我还将带走你的一名船员。

English: Insurance premium? @w2You're with that filthy pirate gang?\n@w2I only have 100,000 credits, @w1not enough to cover the entire payment, @w2but I will give you some of our unregistered cargo to make up for it.\n@w2You can also take one of my officers. @w1Not that I have a choice, @w1but please make sure they keep them safe.
Chinese (simplified): 保险费?@w2 你是那个肮脏的海盗团伙的一员?\n@w2 我只有100,000信用点,@w1 不足以支付全部款项,@w2 但我会给你们一些我们的未注册货物来弥补。\n@w2 你也可以带走我的一名官员。@w1 不是我有选择,@w1 但请确保他们安全。

English: <color=#00ff00>We all have choices. Today you made the right one.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我们都有选择。今天你做出了正确的选择。</color>

English: Don't give me that payment quite yet.
Chinese (simplified): 不要这么快就给我付款。

English: @q0 @d0Subject: We'll make a pirate out of you yet\nFrom: Unknown\nTo: {Player.Name}
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 主题:我们会让你成为一个海盗\n发件人:未知\n收件人:{Player.Name}

English: Contact the Federal Authority from the Trade Federation.
Chinese (simplified): 联系贸易联盟的联邦当局。

English: Contact the Imperial Navy of the Zirax Empire.
Chinese (simplified): 联系兹瑞克斯帝国的帝国海军。

English: Contact the Bounty Hunters of the Pirate Clans.
Chinese (simplified): 联系海盗部落的赏金猎人。

English: @q0 @d0You have sent a message to the chosen representative detailing the events of the battle. No doubt they will be thankful you were able to remove the bandit presence in this sector.\nAmong the wreckage you find a reward cache.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你已经向选定的代表发送了一条消息,详细描述了战斗的事件。毫无疑问,他们会感激你能够清除这个星区的土匪。\n在残骸中,你发现了一个奖励储藏。

English: @q0 @d0You have sent a message to the chosen representative detailing the events of the battle. No doubt they will be thankful you were able to remove the bandit presence in this sector.\nAmong the wreckage you find a reward cache, though less lucrative than expected due to repeated destruction of this bandit outpost.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你已经向选定的代表发送了一条消息,详细描述了战斗的事件。毫无疑问,他们会感激你能够清除这个星区的土匪。\n尽管由于这个土匪前哨站反复被摧毁,你在残骸中发现的奖励储藏比预期的要少。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Local security protocols in effect: {4 - HackCountPOI}\nRemote security protocols in effect: {Math.Clamp((2 - HackCountPF), 0, 2)}\nMainframe not accessible until all local and remote security protocols have been disabled.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>本地安全协议生效:{4 - HackCountPOI}\n远程安全协议生效:{Math.Clamp((2 - HackCountPF), 0, 2)}\n在所有本地和远程安全协议被禁用之前,主控系统无法访问。</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Remote security protocols in effect: {Math.Clamp((2 - HackCountPF), 0, 2)}\nLocal security protocols not accessible until all remote security protocols have been disabled.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>远程安全协议生效:{Math.Clamp((2 - HackCountPF), 0, 2)}\n在所有远程安全协议被禁用之前,本地安全协议无法访问。</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You need the beacon in your inventory to call a UCH Research Vessel.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff0000>你需要在背包中有信标才能召唤UCH研究飞船。</color>

English: @d0This console controls the laser sentry satellites surrounding the mining facility and can be used to remotely shut them down.\n\nThis does not currently work in multiplayer due to a game bug.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个控制台控制着围绕采矿设施的激光哨兵卫星,并且可以用来远程关闭它们。\n\n由于游戏bug,目前这在多人游戏中不起作用。

English: @d0This console controls the rocket sentry satellites surrounding the mining facility and can be used to remotely shut them down.\n\nThis does not currently work in multiplayer due to a game bug.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个控制台控制着围绕采矿设施的火箭哨兵卫星,并且可以用来远程关闭它们。\n\n由于游戏bug,目前这在多人游戏中不起作用。

English: @d0This console controls the plasma sentry satellites surrounding the mining facility and can be used to remotely shut them down.\n\nThis does not currently work in multiplayer due to a game bug.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这个控制台控制着围绕采矿设施的等离子哨兵卫星,并且可以用来远程关闭它们。\n\n由于游戏bug,目前这在多人游戏中不起作用。
@d0 设施电源已断开。哨兵控制失效。
将实验性功能<color=#00ff00>开启</color>。<color=#ffffff>(当前:关闭)</color>
将实验性功能<color=#ff0000>关闭</color>。<color=#ffffff>(当前:开启)</color>

English: @q0 @d0Enables or disables experimental scenario features for testing and feedback purposes. WARNING: These features may be untested and unstable. They may cause server stability problems, blueprint corruption, save game corruption, and other issues. YOU ENABLE THESE FEATURES AT YOUR OWN RISK. SAVE YOUR BLUEPRINTS. BACK UP YOUR SAVE GAME. Default: Off. (There are currently no experimental features available for testing)
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 启用或禁用测试和反馈目的的实验性场景功能。 警告:这些功能可能未经测试且不稳定。它们可能导致服务器稳定性问题、蓝图损坏、保存游戏损坏和其他问题。 您启用这些功能自担风险。保存您的蓝图。备份您的存档游戏。 默认: 关闭。 (目前没有实验性功能可供测试)

English: @d0<color=#ff00ff>Experimental Features</color> must be enabled in the Project Eden Settings menu first.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ff00ff>实验性功能</color>必须首先在伊甸园计划设置菜单中启用。

English: @d0Making a micro warp jump requires <color=#00ff00>1 Refined Pentaxid</color> in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 进行微型翘曲跳跃需要您的个人物品栏中有<color=#00ff00>1个精炼翘曲水晶</color>。

English: What shops are on this station?
Chinese (simplified): 这个空间站上有哪些商店?

English: Welcome to our trading station. @w1I hope you are enjoying your stay in {Player.PlayfieldName}. @w2
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的贸易空间站。@w1 我希望你在我们{Player.PlayfieldName}的逗留愉快。@w2

English: You can find a variety of shops on the station.\n@w2Whether you're looking for mining equipment, @w1armor boosters, @w1weapon modification, @w1or just need a cold relaxing drink, @w1we are sure to have a vendor who can fulfill your needs.
Chinese (simplified): 你可以在空间站上找到各种各样的商店。\n@w2 无论你是在寻找采矿设备,@w1 装甲增强器,@w1 武器改造,@w1 还是只是需要一杯冷饮放松一下,@w1 我们确信有供应商能够满足你的需求。

English: I would be happy to share! @w1It's not often a visitor inquires about the history of stations such as these.\n@w2This station is based on the latest design in the Lambda series of trading stations. The original Lambda design dates back almost 10 years and has gone through several iterations since then. @w1This station is one of the first Lambda stations to be constructed using the updated design and is almost unrecognizable to the original!\n@p9Do not worry if you miss the old design, @w1the Iota trading stations are still in service and feature an almost identical design to the old Lambda stations. @w1Between you and me, @w1this new Lambda station designed by C.L.A.W.S. is far better than the old station.
Chinese (simplified): 我很高兴分享!@w1 访客很少询问像这样的站点的历史。\n@w2 这个空间站是基于最新的Lambda系列贸易空间站设计。原始的Lambda设计可以追溯到近10年前,并且自那时起经历了几次迭代。@w1 这个空间站是第一批使用更新设计建造的Lambda空间站之一,几乎和原始的不一样!\n@p9 如果你怀念旧的设计,@w1 Iota贸易空间站仍在服务中,并且具有几乎与旧的Lambda空间站相同的设计。@w1 我们之间说,@w1 这个由C.L.A.W.S.设计的新Lambda空间站比旧的空间站好得多。

English: I want to ask something else.
I want to ask something else.
Is there a bounty office here?
I want to ask something else.

No, @w1sorry. @w2If you want to turn in insignias you've earned from killing bandits and raiders you will need to visit a bounty office.\n@w2You can find bounty offices in the trade station sectors of most major factions.
Chinese (simplified): 不,@w1 抱歉。@w2 如果你想提交你通过击杀土匪和袭击者获得的徽章,你需要去赏金办公室。\n@w2 你可以在大多数主要派系的贸易空间站星区找到赏金办公室。

English: Where do I find mining jobs?
Chinese (simplified): 我在哪里可以找到采矿工作?

English: Sometimes a vendor will need assistance getting a mining byproduct. @w1You can ask around and see if any of them need help.\n@w2Otherwise your best bet will be to explore various star systems in neutral territory looking for sectors identified on the map as mining sites.\n@w2Another option is traveling to the galactic territory of a major faction and visiting a distribution center to pick up a mining contract from a representative of the Union of Independent Miners.
Chinese (simplified): 有时一个供应商需要帮助获取采矿副产品。@w1 你可以四处打听,看看他们是否需要帮助。\n@w2 否则,你最好的选择是探索各种中立领土的星系,寻找地图上被标识为采矿站点的星区。\n@w2 另一个选择是前往一个主要派系的银河领土,访问一个分配中心,从独立矿工联盟的代表那里领取采矿合同。

English: I want to ask something else.
Do you know of any good trade routes?
Chinese (simplified): 你知道有什么好的贸易路线吗?

English: I want to ask something else.
Welcome to our refinery!\nIf you're looking to sell your ore you came to the right place!\nIf you are looking to purchase ingots please head to the lower hangar.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的炼油厂!\n如果您想出售矿石,您来对地方了!\n如果您想购买锭,请前往下层机库。

English: Do you have any mining contracts available?

I am sorry, I do not currently have any contracts for you.\nI will be getting a new order of mining contracts in {DeltaTimeToString(System.Math.Abs(Eden_Timer + (Eden_Global_ContractMineTimer * 3) - GetGameTimeInSec()))}
Chinese (simplified): 很抱歉,目前我没有合同可以提供给您。\n我会在{DeltaTimeToString(System.Math.Abs(Eden_Timer + (Eden_Global_ContractMineTimer * 3) - GetGameTimeInSec()))}获得新的采矿合同订单

English: I want to ask something else.
I do have a mining contract no one has claimed yet.\nWould you like to do the job?
Chinese (simplified): 我确实有一个没人认领的采矿合同。\n你愿意做这份工作吗?

English: I accept. Give me the contract.
On second thought, mining is boring.
@q0Here is a mining contract. You should find it in your personal inventory or connected container.\nIt has instructions on how to complete it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 这是一份采矿合同.您应该在您的个人库存或相关容器中找到它.它有关于如何完成它的说明.

English: Thank you. I want to ask something else.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你. 我想问点别的.

English: @d0Prototype Micro Jump Drives have been disabled by a server admin.\nIf you are a server admin you can access the Project Eden Settings Menu in the Tutorial tab of the PDA to enable this option.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 原型微型跳跃驱动器已被服务器管理员禁用。\n如果你是服务器管理员,你可以在PDA的教程标签中的伊甸园设置菜单中启用此选项。

English: @d0Making a micro warp jump requires <color=#00ff00>{WarpCost} Refined Pentaxid</color> in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 进行微型翘曲跳跃需要你个人库存中有<color=#00ff00>{WarpCost} 精炼翘曲水晶</color>。

English: @d0Something went wrong!\nError: {ErrorMessage}\nNote: If you have not restarted your game since entering this playfield during this play session, you must first restart your game for the warp jump to work.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 出现问题了!\n错误:{ErrorMessage}\n注意:如果您在本次游戏会话中进入此游戏场地后尚未重新启动游戏,您必须首先重新启动游戏才能使翘曲跳跃正常工作。

English: @d0Prototype Micro Jump Drives have been disabled by a server admin.\nIf you are a server admin you can access the Project Eden Settings Menu in the Tutorial tab of the PDA to enable this option.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 原型微型跳跃驱动器已被服务器管理员禁用。\n如果你是服务器管理员,你可以在PDA的教程标签中的伊甸园设置菜单中启用此选项。

English: @d0Jump distance: {WarpDistance} Refined Pentaxid required: {WarpCost} Cooldown: {JumpCooldown} If you have not restarted your game since entering this playfield during this play session, you must first restart your game for the warp jump to work. If you have not restarted your game since entering this playfield during this play session, you must first restart your game for the warp jump to work.
Chinese (simplified): 跳跃距离:{WarpDistance} 所需精炼翘曲水晶:{WarpCost} 冷却时间:{JumpCooldown} 如果你在本次游戏会话中进入这个星区后没有重启过游戏,你必须首先重启游戏才能使翘曲跳跃工作。 如果你在本次游戏会话中进入这个星区后没有重启过游戏,你必须首先重启游戏才能使翘曲跳跃工作。

English: @d0You cannot initiate a micro jump for another <color=#ff0000>{DeltaTimeToString(System.Math.Abs(Eden_MicroJumpTimer + JumpCooldown - GetGameTimeInSec()))}</color>.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您不能在接下来的<color=#ff0000>{DeltaTimeToString(System.Math.Abs(Eden_MicroJumpTimer + JumpCooldown - GetGameTimeInSec()))}</color>内启动微型跳跃。

English:
@d0Jump distance: <color=#00ffff>{WarpDistance}</color>
Refined Pentaxid required: <color=#ff0000>{WarpCost}</color>
Cooldown: <color=#ff00ff>{JumpCooldown}</color>

<color=#ff0000>If you have not restarted your game since entering this playfield during this play session, you must first restart your game for the warp jump to work.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 跳跃距离:<color=#00ffff>{WarpDistance}</color>
所需精炼翘曲水晶:<color=#ff0000>{WarpCost}</color>
冷却时间:<color=#ff00ff>{JumpCooldown}</color>

<color=#ff0000>如果您在本次游戏会话中进入此游戏场地后没有重启游戏,您必须先重启游戏才能使用翘曲跳跃。</color>

English: I do not understand or do not agree.
<color=#646464>Jump {WarpDistance} meters. (not enough Refined Pentaxid in personal inventory)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#646464>跳跃{WarpDistance}米。(个人库存中没有足够的精炼翘曲水晶)</color>

English: @d0The <color=#ff00ff>Prototype Micro Jump Drive</color> is a new experimental technology developed by NotOats Technology in collaboration with Project Eden.\nAs an experimental technology, there may still be some quirks to be worked out with it.\n@p9 @d0<color=#ff0000>Note that due to a game bug you will need to restart your game before you can use the micro jump drive with any ship that has changed playfields during this play session. For example if you take your ship from planet to orbit, or warp your ship from one sector to another, you will need to restart your game before the micro jump drive will work on that ship.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0<color=#ff00ff>微型跳跃驱动器原型</color>是由NotOats Technology与伊甸园计划合作开发的新型实验技术。\n作为一项实验技术,可能仍存在一些需要解决的奇特问题。\n@p9 @d0<color=#ff0000>请注意,由于游戏漏洞,您需要在本游戏会话中使用过任何改变游戏场地的飞船之前重启游戏,才能使用微型跳跃驱动器。例如,如果您将飞船从行星带到轨道,或者将飞船从一个星区翘曲到另一个星区,您需要在微型跳跃驱动器在该飞船上工作之前重启游戏。</color>

English: [ System-Forge OSv4.2-AV81-0001 ] < Loading personal profiles >@w2 struct group_info *init_groups = .usage = ATOMICinit*2 struct group_info *groups_alloc/int get gridsizeset set strcharinfo1, 5*group_info int nblocks int structblocks=0 nblocks=get.gridsize + NGROUPS_PER_BLOCK -1 / GetTrackingRate get WeaponFiles < Core-1/C-Drive/Drivers/255431 - 27708 > compare .../Drivers/255430 to logs/Drivers get NodeFiles results = match Load WeaponFiles C-Drive/Drivers/... @w1 Loading .../Drivers/255431 verifying 255431 Loading .../Drivers/255442 verifying 255442 Loading .../Drivers/255453 verifying 255453 Loading .../Drivers/255464 verifying 255464 Loading .../Drivers/255475 verifying 255475 Loading .../Drivers/255486 verifying 255486 Loading .../Drivers/255497 verifying 255497 Loading .../Drivers/255508 verifying 255508 < Loading Main Menu >@p1 [ System-Forge OSv4.2-AV81-0001 ] System Status: Normal With this terminal you can use software upgrades to improve weapon performance. Insert valid software into drive to begin recalibration...
Chinese (simplified): [ 系统-锻造 OSv4.2-AV81-0001 ] 加载个人资料@w2 struct group_info *init_groups = .usage = ATOMICinit*2 struct group_info *groups_alloc/int get gridsizeset set strcharinfo1, 5*group_info int nblocks int structblocks=0 nblocks=get.gridsize + NGROUPS_PER_BLOCK -1 / GetTrackingRate get WeaponFiles < 核心-1/C-Drive/驱动程序/255431 - 27708 > 比较 .../驱动程序/255430 至 日志/驱动程序 get NodeFiles 结果 = 匹配 加载 WeaponFiles C-Drive/驱动程序/... @w1 加载 .../驱动程序/255431 验证 255431 加载 .../驱动程序/255442 验证 255442 加载 .../驱动程序/255453 验证 255453 加载 .../驱动程序/255464 验证 255464 加载 .../驱动程序/255475 验证 255475 加载 .../驱动程序/255486 验证 255486 加载 .../驱动程序/255497 验证 255497 加载 .../驱动程序/255508 验证 255508 加载主菜单@p1 [ 系统-锻造 OSv4.2-AV81-0001 ] 系统状态: 正常 使用此终端,您可以使用软件升级来提高武器性能。 插入有效的软件到驱动器开始重新校准...

English: @d0 This terminal can be used to increase the performance of some ship and base weapons through the use of Upgrade Software sourced from higher tier military strongholds and imperial warships. The stronger the base or ship, the higher the probability that it will have proprietary software updates.@p9 Installing software updates requires the Software to be in your inventory and an Optronic Component to install the new software. The size of the Optronic depends on whether the upgrade is for HV/SV or CV/BA weapons. Military Weapon Software: Requires 1 Optronic Bridge Imperial Weapon Software: Requires 1 Optronic Matrix Classified Weapon Software: Requires 1 Quantum Processor@p9 Software updates can be backed up to your suit's datadrive and reloaded on any ship you pilot. Upgrades affecting turrets will only apply while you are sitting in the cockpit as a safety measure against unauthorized use of military property.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 此终端可用于通过使用 升级软件 来提高一些飞船和基地武器的性能,这些软件来源于更高级别的军事要塞和帝国战舰。 基地或飞船越强大,拥有专有软件更新的可能性就越高。@p9 安装软件更新需要软件在您的库存中并且需要一个光电子组件来安装新软件。 光电子组件的大小取决于升级是针对 HV/SV 还是 CV/BA 武器。 军事武器软件:需要 1 个光电子桥 帝国武器软件:需要 1 个光电子矩阵 机密武器软件:需要 1 个量子处理器@p9 软件更新可以备份到您的服装数据驱动器,并在您驾驶的任何飞船上重新加载。 影响炮塔的升级只有在您坐在驾驶舱中时才会应用,作为防止未经授权使用军事财产的安全措施。

English: @d0 Select a Weapon Software in your inventory to install\nAn Optronic Component is also required to load the additional software into
Chinese (simplified): @d0 在您的库存中选择一个武器软件进行安装\n还需要一个光学组件来加载额外的软件
军事武器软件 (需要1个大型光学桥接器)
帝国武器软件 (需要1个大型光学矩阵)
机密武器软件 (需要1个量子处理器)

English: @d0 Standard Military Weapon Software will provide a minor increase to a selected weapon's performance.\nA Large Optronic Bridge will be consumed to apply the update.\nSelect a valid weapon tier to upgrade:
Chinese (simplified): @d0 标准军事武器软件 将为选定武器的性能提供小幅提升。\n使用 大型光学桥接器 将消耗以应用更新。\n选择一个有效的武器等级进行升级:

English: @d0 Select an applicable Light Weapon to apply the software update to: (Effects may vary) You must have at least 1 Large Optronic Bridge in your inventory to access/view upgrade options If an option is not present, then you have reached the maximum efficiency possible with the current system. Upgrades will be applied immediately. There will be no further confirmation.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 选择一个适用的轻型武器来应用软件更新: (效果可能有所不同) 你必须至少有1个大型光子桥在你的库存中,才能访问/查看升级选项 如果选项不存在,则表示你已经达到了当前系统可能的最大效率。 升级将立即应用。不会有进一步的确认。
目标 {CVGatlingTurretT1Accuracy}/100: 轻型加特林炮塔 (CV/BA) +10% 精准度

English: Know this, that the Empire will retake this facility from your control.\nAnd if you should retake this facility in future, there will be no more of these prizes for you here...
Chinese (simplified): 要知道,帝国将会从你的控制中夺回这个设施。\n如果你应该在未来夺回这个设施,这里将不再有这些奖品为你...
军事武器软件 (需要1个小型光电子桥)
帝国武器软件 (需要1个小型光子矩阵)
机密武器软件 (需要1个量子处理器)

English: Yeah, this is Lowerdeck Media.\nWe've got the lowest prices on... stuff. I dunno, trading cards, cartoons and that sort of thing. Are you looking for cards or something?
Chinese (simplified): 是的,这里是 Lowerdeck Media.\n我们有...东西的最低价格。我不知道,交易卡,卡通之类的。你在找卡片还是什么吗?
我来这里是为了完成我的收藏

English: <color=#0088ff>So, how are things here for you?</color>

<color=#ffffff>Look, I just work here. I don't actually care about this crap.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>And I'm not sure what kind of species you are, but if you're underage... for whatever you are, stay out of the Restricted section.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I may not care about what I sell, but I care about my keeping my job.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>听着,我只是在这里工作。我实际上并不在乎这些垃圾。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我也不确定你是什么物种,但如果你是未成年人...不管你是什么,远离限制区域。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我可能不在乎我卖的东西,但我在乎保住我的工作。</color>

English: I'm pretty sure i'm over-age, my dude.
Chinese (simplified): 我很确定我已经超龄了,伙计。

English: You know Grinning Studios?\nThey sell this stuff too. You can get all sorts of things there. But I heard if you bring them a whole set from the Empyrion card games, they'll give you a big reward.\nThey'll pay big if you bring them either of the FULL Location, Entity or Structure card sets.
Chinese (simplified): 你知道 Grinning Studios 吗?\n他们也卖这些东西。你可以在那里得到各种各样的东西。但我听说如果你给他们带来Empyrion纸牌游戏的一整套,他们会给予你丰厚的奖励。\n如果你给他们带来完整的 位置,实体 或 结构 卡片套装,他们会支付大价钱。

English: Sounds like something I should look into.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来像是我应该去了解一下的事情。

English: <color=#ffffff>Booster packs give 3 random cards. No refunds.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I don't care if you didn't get a rare card or got 3 cards the same. It's RNG and I can't control it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>增益包提供3张随机卡片。不予退款。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我不在乎你是否没有得到稀有卡片或者得到了3张相同的卡片。这是随机数生成器,我无法控制。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I've got a special request for a rare card that's no longer in print. There's still a few floating around out there and they'll pay big for them.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Interested?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我有一个特殊请求,寻找一种不再印刷的稀有卡片。外面还有几份流通,人们愿意为此付出大价钱。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>感兴趣吗?</color>

English: Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Amphythos. Now, the card was only worth around 400 credits when it was printed, but it's an older card and they don't print it anymore. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 19,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我现在的请求是寻找交易卡片: Amphythos。 这张牌在印刷时只值大约400信用点,但它是张老卡,现在不再印刷了。 如果你能带给我这张卡,我会给你一半的佣金19,000信用点。

English: I found the card you're looking for
I'll see if I can find one

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Hyozen-Class Frigate. Now, the card is... or was a common card. But there was a misprint on many that called it a Hoyzen. That's a sauce, not a ship. I need the non-misprinted version. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 7,500 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我现在的请求是寻找交易卡片: Hyozen级护卫舰。 现在,这张卡...或者说曾经是一张普通卡。但是很多卡片上有一个错印,称它为Hoyzen。那是一种酱料,不是一艘船。我需要的是没有错印的版本。 如果你能带给我那张,我会给你一半的佣金7,500信用点。

English: I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Cataclysm. I've got a guy, girl actually, trying to get the full Legacy set and they're just missing this one Ultra Rare card. It's one of the rarest in the set! Hell, it's the rarest Legacy ship in the galaxy! You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 25,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我现在的请求是寻找交易卡片: Cataclysm。 我有个客户,是个女孩,她正试图收集完整的遗留者系列,她们就差这张超稀有卡了。这是系列中最稀有的!该死,它是银河系中最稀有的遗留者船! 如果你能带给我那张,我会给你一半的佣金25,000信用点。

English: I've found you that Legacy Cataclysm card
I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Assault Mechanoid. The guy who wants it is a big mecha buff and he's just waiting for the Tesch update to drop, but wants like... 10 of every other mecha card. You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 13,000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我现在的请求是寻找交易卡片: Assault Mechanoid。 想要它的家伙是个大型机甲爱好者,他正等待Tesch更新的发布,但他想要... 每种其他机甲卡片10张。 如果你能带给我那张,我会给你一半的佣金13,000信用点。

English: I have the Assault Mech card for you
I'll keep an eye out for it

Okay, Great!@w2 The current request i've got is for the Trading Card: Sector Command. I don't recommend laying siege to a sector command to get one, you can probably get one from a boosterpack, but your odds are slim... You bring me one of those and i'll give you half the commission of 17,250 credits.
Chinese (simplified): 好的,太棒了!@w2 我现在的请求是寻找交易卡片: Sector Command。 我不建议围攻一个星区指挥部来得到一张,你可能可以从增强包中得到一张,但你的机会很渺茫... 如果你能带给我那张,我会给你一半的佣金17,250信用点。

English: I found the sector command. Both the place and the card.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了星区指挥部。包括地方和卡片。

English: I'll see if I can find someone who'll part with it
Chinese (simplified): 我会看看能否找到愿意放弃它的人

English: <color=#ffffff>Thanks for all your help! That'll keep my customers happy and buying boosterpacks.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I know we didn't agree on this, but here's a few extra credits for the trouble.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>感谢你的所有帮助!这将让我的客户保持快乐并购买增强包。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我知道我们没有达成这个协议,但这是一些额外的信用点作为麻烦的补偿。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>No more special requests.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're looking for more generic cards to sell, we're buying a whole bunch of commons, rares, ultra rares and secret rare cards for their full market price in the catalog.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>没有更多的特殊要求了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你在寻找更多通用的卡片出售,我们正在以目录中全市场价格购买一大堆普通、稀有、超级稀有和秘密稀有的卡片。</color>

English: Booster packs are 750 credits each.\nThey've got 3 random cards (usually). Sometimes there's a misprint, just throw them away. They'll fix that problem when they add more cards to fill in the ID gaps.\nCash only. No refunds if you don't like what you get.
Chinese (simplified): 卡包每个750点信用。。\n它们通常包含3张随机卡片。有时候可能会有印刷错误,直接扔掉就行。当他们添加更多卡片来填补ID间隙时,他们会解决这个问题。\n只收现金。如果你不喜欢你得到的东西,我们不接受退款。

English: Alright. Here's your Booster Pack.\nHope you get a good one...
Chinese (simplified): 好的。这是你的 卡包。\n希望你得到一个好的...

English: Booster packs are 750 credits cash each.\nThey've got 3 random cards (usually). Sometimes there's a misprint, just throw them away. They'll fix that problem when they add more cards to fill in the ID gaps.\nI'm afraid we don't offer refunds for duds, sorry.
Chinese (simplified): 卡包每个750点信用现金。。\n它们通常包含3张随机卡片。有时候可能会有印刷错误,直接扔掉就行。当他们添加更多卡片来填补ID间隙时,他们会解决这个问题。\n恐怕我们不为次品提供退款,抱歉。

English: Alright. Here's your Booster Pack.\nHope you get a good one...
Chinese (simplified): 好的。这是你的 卡包。\n希望你得到一个好的...

English:
<color=#ffffff>Really? You completed the entire set?!</color>
<color=#ffffff>I know I shouldn't be doing this, but would you be willing to part with the set?</color>
<color=#ffffff>I don't have much money, but I have this weird </color><color=#ff0000>data drive</color><color=#ffffff> that a customer left here. I think he was a base commander.</color>
<color=#ffffff>You can have it in exchange for the entire set!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>真的吗?你集齐了整套数据核心?!</color>
<color=#ffffff>我知道我不应该这么做,但你愿意把整套数据核心让给我吗?</color>
<color=#ffffff>我没什么钱,但我有一个奇怪的</color><color=#ff0000>数据驱动器</color><color=#ffffff>,是一个顾客留在这儿的。我觉得他曾经是个基地指挥官。</color>
<color=#ffffff>你可以用整套数据核心来换这个驱动器!</color>

English: No thanks. This is MY collection. I worked hard for it!
Chinese (simplified): 不,谢谢。这是我的收藏。我为之努力工作了!

English: You've got a deal. I'll take hardware over cardware any day!
Chinese (simplified): 成交。我宁愿要硬件也不要那些卡片软件!

English: <color=#ffffff>That's too bad.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you ever change your mind, I'll be waiting!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>那太糟糕了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你改变主意了,我会在这里等着!</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Awesome, Now i've finally got all of this series' Common, Rares and Ultra Rares!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'm gonna go assemble by deck for this weekend's tournament.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Oh, here's that software I promised. Hopefully, the guy who lost it won't come looking for it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>太棒了,我终于集齐了这个系列的普通、稀有和超级稀有卡片!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我这周末要去为锦标赛组装我的牌组。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>哦,这是之前答应给你的软件。希望丢失它的那个人不会找上门来。</color>

English:
<color=#ffffff>Look, I'm gonna be honest here...</color>
<color=#ffffff>You've done me a huge favor by giving me your ENTIRE collection.</color>
<color=#ffffff>I know a bunch of I.T guys that come in here and I asked them for a favor since you seemed to be interested in that processor.@w2</color>
<color=#ffffff>So, uhh... I just wanna say thanks. And the boys were able to source one more quantum processor update for helping me out with all this.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>听着,我要坦白说...</color>
<color=#ffffff>你给了我你的整个收藏,帮了我一个大忙。</color>
<color=#ffffff>我认识一些IT人员,他们经常来这里,我向他们求助,因为你似乎对那个处理器感兴趣。@w2</color>
<color=#ffffff>所以,嗯...我只想说谢谢。那些家伙还能为我搞到一个量子处理器的更新,以帮助你解决这一切。</color>

English:
<color=#ffffff>Really? You completed the entire set?!</color>
<color=#ffffff>I know I shouldn't be doing this, but would you be willing to part with the set?</color>
<color=#ffffff>I don't have much money, but I have these </color><color=#ff0000>sweet guns</color><color=#ffffff> that were part of a cross-promotion with Interweap and the latest Interceptor Movie.</color>
<color=#ffffff>You can have them in exchange for the entire set!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>真的吗?你完成了整套?!</color>
<color=#ffffff>我知道我不应该这么做,但你愿意放弃这套装备吗?</color>
<color=#ffffff>我没有太多钱,但我有这些</color><color=#ff0000>酷炫的枪械</color><color=#ffffff>,它们是与Interweap和最新的Interceptor电影联合推广的一部分。</color>
<color=#ffffff>你可以用整套装备来交换它们!</color>

English: You've got a deal. I'll take hardware over cardware any day!
Chinese (simplified): 你说得对。我任何时候都选择硬件而不是软件!

English: No thanks. This is MY collection. I worked hard for it!
Chinese (simplified): 不,谢谢。这是我的收藏。我为之努力工作了!

English:
<color=#ffffff>Really? You completed the entire set?!</color>
<color=#ffffff>I know I shouldn't be doing this, but would you be willing to part with the set?</color>
<color=#ffffff>I don't have much money, but I have this </color><color=#00ffaa>quantum processor</color><color=#ffffff> that a customer left here. I think he was a base commander. He never came back for it so I guess it's mine, but I have no idea how to use it.</color>
<color=#ffffff>You can have it in exchange for the entire set!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>真的吗?你完成了整套收藏?!</color>
<color=#ffffff>我知道我不应该这么做,但你愿意放弃这套收藏吗?</color>
<color=#ffffff>我没有太多钱,但我这里有这个</color><color=#00ffaa>量子处理器</color><color=#ffffff>,一个顾客留在这里。我想他是个基地指挥官。他再也没回来取,所以我想它现在是我的,但我不知道该怎么用它。</color>
<color=#ffffff>你可以用整套收藏来交换它!</color>

English: You've got a deal. I'll take a quantum over cards any day!
Chinese (simplified): 成交。我宁愿要量子处理器也不要卡片!

English: No thanks. This is MY collection. I worked hard for it!
Chinese (simplified): 不,谢谢。这是我的收藏。我为之努力工作了!

English: @q0 @d0Sets whether Prototype Micro Jump Drives can be used. Micro Jump Drives allow players to teleport their ships within a space playfield.\n<color=#00ffff>Prototype Micro Jump Drive:</color> Enabling this option allows Prototype Micro Jump Drives to be used. Disabling it prevents them from being accessed. Does not prevent players from crafting or placing them so please communicate to your players if you disable them.\n<color=#ffffff>Default:</color> <color=#00ff00>On</color>.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 设置是否允许使用原型微型跳跃驱动器。微型跳跃驱动器允许玩家在太空游戏区域内传送他们的飞船。\n<color=#00ffff>原型微型跳跃驱动器:</color>启用此选项允许使用原型微型跳跃驱动器。禁用它将阻止它们被访问。不阻止玩家制作或放置它们,所以如果你禁用它们,请与你的玩家沟通。\n<color=#ffffff>默认:</color> <color=#00ff00>开启</color>。

English: Turn Prototype Micro Jump Drive <color=#00ff00>On</color>. <color=#ffffff>(Current: Off)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 将原型微型跳跃驱动器 <color=#00ff00>开启</color>。 <color=#ffffff>(当前:关闭)</color>

English: Turn Prototype Micro Jump Drive <color=#ff0000>Off</color>. <color=#ffffff>(Current: On)</color>
Chinese (simplified): 将原型微型跳跃驱动器 <color=#ff0000>关闭</color>。 <color=#ffffff>(当前:开启)</color>

English: <color=#ff00ff>What's this about a bug requiring a restart?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff00ff>这个关于一个需要重启的bug是什么情况?</color>

English: @d0Note that due to a game bug you will need to restart your game before you can use the micro jump drive with any ship that has changed playfields during this play session. For example if you take your ship from planet to orbit, or warp your ship from one sector to another, you will need to restart your game before the micro jump drive will work on that ship.\n@p9 @d0Note that due to a game bug you will need to restart your game before you can use the micro jump drive with any ship that has changed playfields during this play session. For example if you take your ship from planet to orbit, or warp your ship from one sector to another, you will need to restart your game before the micro jump drive will work on that ship.\n@p9 @d0Note that due to a game bug you will need to restart your game before you can use the micro jump drive with any ship that has changed playfields during this play session. For example if you take your ship from planet to orbit, or warp your ship from one sector to another, you will need to restart your game before the micro jump drive will work on that ship.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 请注意,由于游戏bug,在本次游戏会话期间,如果您的飞船从星球到轨道,或者从一个星区翘曲到另一个星区,您需要在飞船改变场地后重启游戏,才能使用微型跳跃驱动器。例如,如果您将飞船从星球带到轨道,或者将飞船从一个星区翘曲到另一个星区,您需要在微型跳跃驱动器在该飞船上工作之前重启游戏。\n@p9 @d0 请注意,由于游戏bug,在本次游戏会话期间,如果您的飞船从星球到轨道,或者从一个星区翘曲到另一个星区,您需要在飞船改变场地后重启游戏,才能使用微型跳跃驱动器。例如,如果您将飞船从星球带到轨道,或者将飞船从一个星区翘曲到另一个星区,您需要在微型跳跃驱动器在该飞船上工作之前重启游戏。\n@p9 @d0 请注意,由于游戏bug,在本次游戏会话期间,如果您的飞船从星球到轨道,或者从一个星区翘曲到另一个星区,您需要在飞船改变场地后重启游戏,才能使用微型跳跃驱动器。例如,如果您将飞船从星球带到轨道,或者将飞船从一个星区翘曲到另一个星区,您需要在微型跳跃驱动器在该飞船上工作之前重启游戏。

English: I still don't understand. Why isn't my micro jump drive working?
Chinese (simplified): 我还是不明白。为什么我的微型跳跃驱动器不工作?

English: As a matter of fact, @w1there is something you can help us with.
Chinese (simplified): 事实上,@w1 有件事你可以帮我们。

English: @d0Here you can manage the missions obtained from Project Eden Research Vessels.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 在这里你可以管理从伊甸园研究飞船获得的任务。

English: @d0You do not currently have a Project Eden combat mission.\nSpeak with the captain of a UCH Research Vessel outside of the starting systems to obtain a mission.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 您当前没有伊甸园战斗任务。\n请与起始星系外的UCH研究船的舰长交谈以获得任务。

English: I'm afraid we're all sold out of booster packs.\nLooks like you've bought them all. I'm sure we'll get some in next week!
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕我们的增强包都卖完了。\n看起来你已经买光了。我相信我们下周会再进货的!

English: I'm afraid we're all sold out of booster packs.\nLooks like you've bought them all. I'm sure we'll get some in next week!
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕我们的增强包都卖完了。\n看起来你已经买光了。我相信我们下周会再进货的!

English: I know a guy who comes in here sometimes. He's a researcher at some kinda biolab and the way I hear it is that he's lookin' fer a Viral Sample?\nI also hear he's loaded. So how 'bout I outsource that work to you an' we split the pay 50/50?
Chinese (simplified): 我认识一个有时会来这里的家伙。他在某个生物实验室工作,我听说他在寻找病毒样本?\n我还听说他很有钱。那我们把你的工作外包出去,我们五五分成怎么样?

English: Be careful with this, it was a nightmare to get...
Chinese (simplified): 小心这个,得到它真是一场噩梦...

English: Welcome to The Frontier. This here's a peaceful place and we don't want nor like trouble around these parts. I'm in charge of keeping the residents safe and stocked with the things they need to keep themselves safe if spacers come callin' So what can I do for you, stranger?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到边疆。 这里是和平的地方,我们不希望也不欢迎麻烦。 我负责确保居民的安全,并确保他们拥有保护自己所需的物资,以防太空人来访。 那么,陌生人,我能为你做些什么?

English: <color=#0088ff>Anything going on around here I should know about?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这里有没有什么我应该知道的事情?</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Colonies are always in short supply of resources. Either because of not enough supply, too much demand of pirates jacking our shipments.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You can always find a good deal or some work in colonies from the people livin' there.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>殖民地总是资源短缺。要么是因为供应不足,要么是因为海盗劫持我们的货物。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>你总是可以在殖民地从那里的人们那里找到一些好交易或者一些工作。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>There's a lot of </color><color=#00ff00>unfinished colonies</color><color=#ffffff> on some of the most outlying planets. If you can find one and don't mind a little hard work, you can get them up and running and packed full o' colonists.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'm sure there'll be something in it fer ya if you stick yer neck out like that. Not sure what, though.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>在一些最偏远的星球上,有很多</color><color=#00ff00>未完成的殖民地</color><color=#ffffff>。如果你能找到一个并且不介意一些辛苦的工作,你可以让它们运转起来,并且让殖民者们住满。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你像那样冒险,我相信你会从中得到一些东西。不过具体是什么,我就不确定了。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>There's a few special unique weapons and equipment you can only get from helpin' folks out.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Myself? I've got a special piece behind the counter for someone who helps me out big time. It ain't much, but it's the best we've got 'round here.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>有一些特殊的独特武器和装备,你只能通过帮助他人获得。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我自己?我有一个特别的部件放在柜台后面,给那些帮了我大忙的人。虽然不多,但这是这里最好的了。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Ain't no shortage of work on colonies on the frontier.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Applies to me too, stranger. I don't have enough hours in a day so if you're offerin' a hand, I got a job.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>在边疆的殖民地上,工作总是供不应求。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>对我来说也是如此,陌生人。我一天的时间总是不够用,所以如果你愿意帮忙,我有工作给你。</color>

English: We don't get enough shipments out here to fix up our gear to the latest stuff they've got in the settled systems, which can put us a behind spacer scum when they come lookin' fer loot.@p9 In order to compete, I need someone with a fast ship to head out an' get me: 5 Shotgun Upgrade Kits 5 Rifle Upgrade Kits So I can upgrade our current VS-92s to 93s next time we have a problem with unwanted guests. Paying over twice the market price if it means cutting out delivery fees.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里收到的货物补给不够,无法将我们的装备升级到定居星系中的最新型号,这让我们在遇到来找麻烦的太空海盗时处于劣势。@p9 为了竞争,我需要有人驾驶快速飞船出去帮我弄到: 5个霰弹枪升级套件 5个步枪升级套件 这样下次我们遇到不速之客时,我可以把我们目前的VS-92升级到93。如果这意味着可以省去运输费用,我愿意支付超过市场价两倍的价格。
我已经拿到了你想要的套件

English: A mining party just came back and stored their laser cutters with me and half of 'em have seen better days. Probably won't last longer than a week, so I need: 10 Laser Upgrade Kits to get them back in factory-new condition for the next party goin' out tomorrow.
Chinese (simplified): 一个采矿队伍刚回来,把他们的激光切割器存放在我这里,其中一半看起来已经用得很旧了。可能撑不过一周,所以我需要:10个激光升级套件,以便在明天出发的下一个队伍使用前,把它们恢复到全新的工厂状态。

English: I have the laser kits you asked for

The people livin' here are a hard bunch, and we use the same tools every day, and that means that some customizations to make 'em easier to use go a long way. Problem is that places like Auxiliary Augments don't ship out here.@p9\nThink you can get me 5 Commercial Frame mods for the boys? So we don't need to worry about the frame warping and wear and tear... at least for a while longer.
Chinese (simplified): 这里居住的人们都是一群硬汉,我们每天都在使用相同的工具,这意味着一些定制化改动能让它们更易使用,这会有很大的帮助。问题是像辅助增强装置这样的地方不会把货物运送到这里。@p9\n你觉得你能帮我搞到5个商用框架改装件吗?这样我们就不用太担心框架变形和磨损了……至少还能再维持一段时间。

English: I have the tool mods you're after

We're always needing parts out here. Not just replacement parts, but electronics, computers, vids and games. I know, not very frontier-like. But we all need something to do in our downtime and I've got requests for new Tablets for everyone for both recreation and to be used as interfaces on our machines and systems.@p9 You bring me 250 Tablets and I'll pay you back with interest, if it'll keep the folks 'round here from asking every day. Try checking Hostile Apparatus or Gold Standard for them.
Chinese (simplified): 我们总是需要零件。不仅仅是替换零件,还有电子设备、计算机、视频和游戏。 我知道,这不太像是边疆生活。但我们都需要在休息时间做点什么,我已经收到了为大家提供新平板电脑的请求,既可以用于娱乐,也可以用作我们机器和系统的接口。@p9 你带给我250个平板电脑,我会连本带利地回报你,如果这能让周围的人不再每天询问。 尝试检查敌对机器或黄金标准来获取它们。

English: I found those Tablets that you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了你想要的那些平板电脑

English: We've got a team in the field doing mineral surveys right now. They can only stay out there for about 20 minutes before the life support starts failing and I can't spend every day patching those useless suits the Empire sends us.@p9\nThose Polaris Envirosuits would solve all our problems, but they're not on the list of 'Colonist Supplies' they send us.\nJust five of them would cut my workload in half. I'd pay double their market price for just that. Think you can handle that?
Chinese (simplified): 我们有一个团队正在野外进行矿产调查。他们只能在外面待大约20分钟,然后生命维持系统就会开始失效,我不能每天都去修补帝国送来的那些无用的套装。@p9\n那些极星环境套装会解决我们所有的问题,但它们不在他们送来的'殖民者供应品'清单上。\n只需要五套就能让我的工作量减半。我愿意支付双倍的市场价,只要那样。你觉得你能处理吗?

English: I have those suits you asked for
That'll do us nicely for a while. I don't mind forking out a lil' extra pay.\nI might have another job for you if you're interested.
Chinese (simplified): 这将让我们有一段时间的安宁。我不介意多付一点额外的工资。\n我可能还有另一份工作给你,如果你感兴趣的话。

English: <color=#ffffff>That's all the work I've got for you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You've cut my workload down a tonne, so I hope you enjoy that little extra piece I gave you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>这就是我所有的工作了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>你已经大大减少了我的工作量,所以我希望你喜欢我额外给你的那一小部分。</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>You've handled all the jobs I had on the back burner.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I've got a little something special I whipped up back here, I thought you'd like it.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>It's not much use around here, but for someone diving headlong into combat, it'll serve ya well.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你已经处理了我所有的备选工作。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我在这里准备了一些特别的东西,我认为你会喜欢的。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>在这里它没什么用,但对于一个一头扎进战斗的人来说,它会对你很有帮助。</color>

English:
You already have a mission assigned to you.
Are you sure you want to cancel your current mission and be assigned a new one?
If you want to get a different type of mission than one I offer, you can try checking with other UCH research vessels.

You can reactivate your current mission in the PDA under UCH - Project Eden Mission Manager.
Chinese (simplified):
你已经被分配了一个任务。
你确定要取消你当前的任务并被分配一个新任务吗?
如果你想得到与我提供的不同类型的任务,你可以尝试联系其他UCH研究船。

你可以在PDA下的UCH - 伊甸园计划任务管理器中重新激活你当前的任务。

English: Yes, I want to be assigned a new mission.
Chinese (simplified): 是的,我想被分配一个新任务。

English: You currently have a mission active.\nYou must go to the PDA and deactivate your current mission before I can offer you a new mission.
Chinese (simplified): 你目前有一个活跃的任务。\n你必须去PDA并停用你当前的任务,我才能给你提供新的任务。

English: I want to ask something else.
@d0 [FORGE AEROSPACE HAW204 MECHANOID TANK]\nINSTRUCTION MANUAL\nWARNING: Do not lose this datapad, it contains important information relating to the operation of the accompanying mechatank.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [锻造航空航天公司 HAW204 机械坦克]\n说明书\n警告: 不要丢失这个数据板,它包含与伴随的机械坦克操作相关的的重要信息。

English: @d0 [FORGE AEROSPACE HAW204 MECHANOID TANK] Type 204 Mechatank designed and built by Forge Aerospace for ground combat against enemy vehicles. Virtually indestructible while powered down, however due to the size of the internal powerplant and cooling system required to run the system, it has insufficient armor at the center of the chassis where the torso connects to the chassis. Repeated blows to the front plating can expose the powerplant.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [锻造航空航天公司 HAW204 机械坦克] 由锻造航空航天公司设计和建造的204型机械坦克,用于对抗敌方车辆的地面战斗。 在断电状态下几乎不可摧毁,但由于运行系统所需的内部发电机和冷却系统的尺寸,它在底盘中心连接车身的部位装甲不足。 反复打击前装甲可以暴露发电机。

English: @d0 [FORGE AEROSPACE HAW204 MECHANOID TANK] 35mm Phalanx Weapons System Main guns designed to track and engage ground targets. In order to prevent friendly fire against support troops the Mechatank has currently been set to ignore ground personnel. If activated without valid targets, it will fire randomly as long as it detects a threat. @p9 100 Megawatt Laser Cannon Mounted on the HAW204's right shoulder, the laser cannon is intended to neutralize ground personnel and vehicles within the safe firing range of the main guns. @p9 40mm Homing Missile Launcher Mounted on the HAW204's left shoulder, the homing missile launcher is primarily used for striking armored targets and or ground personnel behind cover. At close range, the missiles are unable to achieve maximum speed. @p9 Ground Denial Effect A side effect from the HAW204's oversized powerplant is that it discharges high voltage through its treads into the ground around it, causing damage to anyone in front of the vehicle.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [锻造航空航天HAW204机械坦克] 35毫米方阵武器系统 主炮设计用于追踪和打击地面目标。为了防止对支援部队的友军火力,机械坦克目前被设置为忽略地面人员。 如果没有激活有效目标,只要它检测到威胁,它就会随机开火。 @p9 100MW 激光加农炮 安装在HAW204的右肩上,激光炮旨在在主炮的安全射程内中和地面人员和车辆。 @p9 40毫米寻的导弹发射器 安装在HAW204的左肩上,寻的导弹发射器主要用于打击装甲目标或掩护后的地面人员。在近距离,导弹无法达到最大速度。 @p9 地面拒止效应 HAW204超大功率发电机的一个副作用是,它通过其履带向周围地面放电,对车辆前方的任何人造成伤害。

English: @d0 [FORGE AEROSPACE HAW204 MECHANOID TANK] It is not recommended to activate the HAW204 in confined spaces. Forge Aerospace is not responsible for any damage or injury incurred by the inproper activation of the Mechanoid Tank. The HAW204 Mechanoid Tank is an experimental weapons platform and should only be activated by a qualified professional. The unit referenced by this user manual can be activated with the code: 4030
Chinese (simplified): @d0 [锻造航空航天公司 HAW204 机械坦克] 不建议在狭小空间内激活HAW204。 锻造航空航天公司不承担因不当激活机械坦克而造成的任何损害或伤害。 HAW204机械坦克是一个实验性武器平台,应仅由合格的专业人员激活。 本用户手册中引用的单位可以通过代码:4030激活

English: Weapon: NKK-27 Dual Combat Pistol (NKK-27 Enforcer Custom) Barrel: {PistolT2DualBarrel} ({PistolT2DualBarrelStat}) Grip: {PistolT2DualGrip} ({PistolT2DualGripStat}) Receiver: {PistolT2DualFrame} ({PistolT2DualFrameStat}) Selection is final Modifying this weapon requires two identical modifications. Weapon mods on this weapon gain +50% bonus.
Chinese (simplified): 武器: NKK-27 双持战斗手枪(NKK-27 执法者定制版) 枪管: {PistolT2DualBarrel} ({PistolT2DualBarrelStat}) 握把: {PistolT2DualGrip} ({PistolT2DualGripStat}) 接收器: {PistolT2DualFrame} ({PistolT2DualFrameStat}) 选择是最终的 修改此武器需要两个相同的修改部件。 此武器上的武器模块获得+50%的加成。
枪管: 短高速枪管 (伤害 +15% / 后坐力 +7.5%)
握把: 聚合物手枪握把 (精度 +15% / 后坐力 +7.5%)
握把: 加重手枪握把 (后坐力 -15% / 精度 -7.5%)
握把: 电动工具握把 (装填速度 +30% / 后坐力 +15% / 精度 -15%)
握把: 战术手枪握把 (后坐力 -22.5% / 装填速度 +22.5%)
握把: 神射手手枪握把 (精度 +30% / 后坐力 -30%)
握把: 后坐力补偿手枪握把 (后坐力 -45%)
机匣: 轻型手枪机匣 (精度 +15% / 后坐力 +7.5%)
机匣: 电磁手枪机匣 (伤害 +30% / 后坐力 +15%)

English: Weapon: Super Shotgun (Vulcan-1270 Combat Shotgun) Barrel: {ShotgunSuperBarrel} ({ShotgunSuperBarrelStat}) Stock: {ShotgunSuperGrip} ({ShotgunSuperGripStat}) Receiver: {ShotgunSuperFrame} ({ShotgunSuperFrameStat}) Selection is final This Weapon is not affected by accuracy mods
Chinese (simplified): 武器: 超级霰弹枪 (Vulcan-1270 战斗霰弹枪) 枪管: {ShotgunSuperBarrel} ({ShotgunSuperBarrelStat}) 枪托: {ShotgunSuperGrip} ({ShotgunSuperGripStat}) 机匣: {ShotgunSuperFrame} ({ShotgunSuperFrameStat}) 选择是最终的 此武器不受精度改装影响
枪管: 中型高速枪管 (伤害 +10% / 后坐力 +5%)
枪托: 折叠枪托 (后坐力 -5% / 装填速度 -10%)
枪托: 全尺寸枪托 (伤害 +10% / 装填速度 -10%)
枪托: 战术枪托 (后坐力 -20% / 装填速度 +15%)
枪托: 后坐力补偿枪托 (后坐力 -30%)
机匣: 重型霰弹枪机匣 (后坐力 -10%)
机匣: 自动霰弹枪机匣 (装填速度 +20%)

English: <color=#ffffff>I have no use for this console.</color>

[ {PlayerName} ] Looks like I can use this console to override the signals being sent from the control room to the incinerator now that i've flipped the breaker. This console is used to debug inverted signals inside the incinerator on servers. If signals are not inverted DO NOT USE. Switch breaker to confirm.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来我现在可以使用这个控制台覆盖从控制室发送到焚化炉的信号,因为我已经翻转了断路器。 这个控制台用于调试焚化炉服务器内的反转信号。 如果信号没有反转请不要使用。切换断路器以确认。

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like I can use this console to override the signals being sent from the guard room to the incinerator door. This console is used to debug a lost signal from the intercom to the exit door of the incinerator. If signals are not broken DO NOT USE.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来我可以使用这个控制台覆盖从警卫室发送到焚化炉门的信号。 这个控制台用于调试焚化炉出口门的对讲机丢失的信号。 如果信号没有中断请不要使用。

English:
@d0You can disable most of the Project Eden tutorial messages that automatically appear the first time you perform a certain action.
This affects things such as messages that appear when you first open the map or unlock a specific device. This does not disable all messages and does not disable Reforged Galaxy specific messages.
This does not affect the information you can access at any time in the Empyriopedia.
<color=#ffff00>Once disabled, you cannot re-enable them again so only disable the tutorial messages if you are an experienced player who does not need the reminders.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0你可以禁用首次执行特定操作时自动出现的大多数伊甸园计划教程消息。
这会影响诸如首次打开地图或解锁特定设备时出现的消息。这不会影响所有消息,也不会禁用重铸银河系特定消息。
这不会影响你随时可以在帝国百科中访问的信息。
<color=#ffff00>一旦禁用,你将无法再次启用它们,因此只有在你不需要提醒的情况下,作为经验丰富的玩家才禁用教程消息。</color>

English: @d0Are you sure you want to disable most Project Eden tutorial messages?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Chinese (simplified): @d0你确定要禁用大多数伊甸园计划的教程消息吗?\n此操作无法撤销。

English: Can you go over that again?

@q0 @d0<color=#ffff00>By continuing to play the scenario using modified configuration files, you agree to take on any and all risks and agree to be responsible for fixing any issues that may arise.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>If you agree, select I Agree from the option below.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0<color=#ffff00>继续使用修改后的配置文件玩这个场景,您同意承担任何和所有风险,并同意负责解决可能出现的任何问题。</color>\n<color=#ffff00>如果您同意,请从下面的选项中选择我同意。</color>

English: @q0<color=#ff0000>You must agree by typing </color><color=#ffffff>I Agree</color><color=#ff0000> into the box if you wish to continue playing Reforged Eden 2.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0<color=#ff0000>如果您希望继续玩Reforged Eden 2,您必须在框中输入</color><color=#ffffff>I Agree</color><color=#ff0000>以同意。</color>

English: @d0Thank you for your understanding.\nYou may now continue playing Reforged Eden 2.
Chinese (simplified): @d0感谢您的理解。\n您现在可以继续玩Reforged Eden 2。

English:
@q0 @d0The Survival Kit is an alternative to the Chatbot <color=#ffffff>CB:survival</color> command for dedicated servers.
It allows players to obtain a one time pack of resources and credits to give them a head start in the game.
When you enable it, you will have the chance to customize what it gives.
The Survival Kit is currently: <color=#ffffff>{SurvivalKitName}</color>.
Players will receive <color=#ffffff>{Eden_Admin_KitCredit}</color> credits in their bank account.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0生存包是专用服务器上Chatbot <color=#ffffff>CB:survival</color>命令的替代方案。
它允许玩家一次性获得资源和信用点包,让他们在游戏中获得一个良好的开端。
当您启用它时,您将有机会自定义它提供的内容。
生存包当前为:<color=#ffffff>{SurvivalKitName}</color>。
玩家将在他们的银行账户中收到<color=#ffffff>{Eden_Admin_KitCredit}</color>信用点。

English:
@q0 @d0Select what type of Survival Kit you want players to have. All kits also come with fuel/pentaxid/oxygen/water/food.
<color=#00ffff>Basic Kit</color>: Contains resources up to cobalt and titanium to build a small basic SV.
<color=#00ff00>Intermediate Kit</color>: Contains uncommon resources up to titanium, neodymium, and sathium to build a small basic CV.
<color=#ff0000>Advanced Kit</color>: Contains advanced resources up to gold/zascosium/palladium to build a small advanced CV.
<color=#ff00ff>Custom Kit</color>: Defined at the end of the containers.ecf file in the scenario's configuration folder to let you set exactly what players get.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0选择您希望玩家拥有的生存包类型。所有生存包还包括燃料/翘曲水晶(原料)/氧气/水/食物。
<color=#00ffff>基础包</color>:包含钴和钛等资源,用于建造小型基础SV。
<color=#00ff00>中级包</color>:包含不常见的资源,如钛、钕和钑,用于建造小型基础CV。
<color=#ff0000>高级包</color>:包含高级资源,如金/铡/钯,用于建造小型高级CV。
<color=#ff00ff>自定义包</color>:在场景配置文件夹中的containers.ecf文件末尾定义,让您可以精确设置玩家获得的内容。

English: @q0 @d0Before you enable a Custom Kit, you will need to go to the Reforged Eden 2/Content/Configuration folder on your server and open the containers.ecf file.\nAt the very end of the file you will find a section for the Custom Survival Kit.\nFollow the directions there to configure your custom list of resources. Recommend using a text editor such as Notepad++.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0在你启用自定义工具包之前,你需要去你的服务器上的Reforged Eden 2/Content/Configuration文件夹并打开containers.ecf文件。\n在文件的最后,你会发现自定义生存工具包的部分。\n按照那里的指示配置你的自定义资源列表。建议使用Notepad++等文本编辑器。

English: <color=#00ff00>I have already done that. Continue with setup.</color>

@q0 @d0Specify an amount of free volume that players should have in their connected container.\nThis will display as a warning to players so they know how much free volume they need to have before using the Survival Kit.\nRecommend testing this by using the Survival Kit yourself to see how much total volume your items take up.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0指定玩家连接的容器中应有多少空闲体积。\n这将作为警告显示给玩家,让他们知道在使用生存工具包之前需要有多少空闲体积。\n建议通过自己使用生存工具包来测试这个,看看你的物品总共占用多少体积。

English: @q0 @d0Specify how many credits, if any, should be deposited into a player's bank account balance when using the Survival Kit.\nValues between 0 and 100,000,000 accepted.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0指定当使用生存工具包时,应该有多少信用点存入玩家的银行账户余额。\n接受0到100,000,000之间的值。

English: @q0 @d0Players will receive <color=#ffffff>{Math.Clamp(InputResultAsInt(), 0, 100000000)}</color> credits in their bank account.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0玩家将收到<color=#ffffff>{Math.Clamp(InputResultAsInt(), 0, 100000000)}</color>信用点在他们的银行账户中。

English: @q0 @d0Here you can set an optional short message to display to players when they use the Survival Kit.\nIf you don't want to set a custom message, just leave it blank.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0在这里,你可以设置一个可选的短消息,当玩家使用生存工具包时显示给他们。\n如果你不想设置自定义消息,只需留空。
自定义消息(最多30个字符)

English: @q0 @d0This is how your message will display to players:\n{InputResultAsString()}
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0这是你的信息将如何显示给玩家:\n{InputResultAsString()}

English: @q0 @d0This survival kit has been configured by your server admin to allow you to obtain a one time {SurvivalKitName} Survival Kit of resources to help you get a head start. You will also receive {Eden_Admin_KitCredit} credits in your bank account.\nYou will need to connect to a storage container via logistics with at least {Eden_Admin_KitVolume} volume of free storage and at least 64 free inventory slots.\n{Eden_Admin_KitMessage}
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0这个生存工具包已由你的服务器管理员配置,允许你一次性获得{SurvivalKitName}生存包的资源,帮助你获得一个良好的开端。你还将在你的银行账户中获得{Eden_Admin_KitCredit}信用点。\n你需要通过物流连接到至少有{Eden_Admin_KitVolume}空闲存储空间和至少64个空闲库存槽的存储容器。\n{Eden_Admin_KitMessage}

English: @q0 @d0<color=#ff0000>You have already obtained a survival kit this play through.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>If you require another, contact your server admin for assistance.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0<color=#ff0000>你已经在这个游戏中获得了生存包。</color>\n<color=#ff0000>如果你需要另一个,请联系你的服务器管理员寻求帮助。</color>

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#ff0000>THIS IS A ONE TIME SURVIVAL KIT. ONCE YOU PRESS ACCEPT YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO GET ANOTHER KIT WITHOUT ADMIN INTERVENTION.</color>
<color=#fafe10>Make sure you are connected to a storage container with at least </color><color=#ffffff>{Eden_Admin_KitVolume}</color><color=#fafe10> free volume and </color><color=#ffffff>64</color><color=#fafe10> free inventory slots.</color>
Once you press accept all the items in the survival kit will be deposited into your connected container and any credits deposited into your bank account balance.
If you do not connect to a container with enough storage space, items may be dropped to the ground and/or lost!
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0<color=#ff0000>这是一次性的生存包。一旦你按下接受,没有管理员干预,你将无法获得另一个工具包。</color>
<color=#fafe10>确保你连接到至少有</color><color=#ffffff>{Eden_Admin_KitVolume}</color><color=#fafe10>空闲体积和</color><color=#ffffff>64格</color><color=#fafe10>空闲库存槽的存储容器。</color>
一旦你按下接受,生存包中的所有物品将被存入你连接的容器中,任何信用点将存入你的银行账户余额。
如果你没有连接到足够存储空间的容器,物品可能会掉落到地面和/或丢失!

English: @q0 @d0If you need to reset a player's survival kit to allow them to get another kit, you need to give them a <color=#ffffff>Survival Kit Token</color>.\nYou can either do this by using console command <color=#ffffff>give item Token 6995</color>, or by using EAH or another server managing program to give item with name <color=#ffffff>Token</color> and metadata/ammo <color=#ffffff>6995</color> to the player.\nThey will then be able to access the survival kit in the PDA under Tutorials - Project Eden Settings Menu as long as they have the token in their personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0如果你需要重置玩家的生存包以让他们获得另一个包,你需要给他们一个<color=#ffffff>生存包令牌</color>。\n你可以通过使用控制台命令<color=#ffffff>give item Token 6995</color>来实现,或者使用EAH或其他服务器管理程序给玩家物品名为<color=#ffffff>Token</color>和元数据/弹药<color=#ffffff>6995</color>。\n只要他们的个人库存中有令牌,他们就可以在PDA下的教程 - 伊甸园计划设置菜单中访问生存包。

English: @q0 @d0<color=#fafe10>The Survival Kit is currently in testing and you may encounter issues when using it.</color>\nPlease leave any feedback on the Reforged Eden 2 Workshop page or report issues on the Reforged Eden 2 GitHub.\nThank you!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0<color=#fafe10>生存包目前正在测试中,使用时可能会遇到问题。</color>\n请在Reforged Eden 2 Workshop页面留下任何反馈,或在Reforged Eden 2 GitHub上报告问题。\n谢谢!
