English: I will make contact when I am prepared.

@q0Commander {Player.Name}, @w2 while this mission is a search and rescue mission it may still be extremely dangerous.\n@w2I am only authorized to brief those who have <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color> unlocked in their tech tree.\n@w2Come back when you are better prepared.
Chinese (simplified): @q0指挥官 {Player.Name},@w2 虽然这是一次搜救任务,但仍然可能极其危险。\n@w2 我只被授权向那些在他们的科技树中解锁了<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color>的人简报。\n@w2 当你准备得更充分时再回来。

English: I need to think about it.
<color=#fafe10>Skip the message, just tell me what to do.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#fafe10>跳过消息,直接告诉我该怎么做。</color>

English: <color=#00ff00>I will meet up with them and see what assistance I can offer.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我会和他们见面,看看我能提供什么帮助。</color>
@q0 @d0主题: 协助\n致: UCHN 麦哲伦\n来自: 未知

English:
@q0 @d0Greetings. I will make this short.
I am a high ranking member of the Trade Federation Board of Executives. I only say this to make sure I got your attention.
My brother was tasked to perform an audit on the Zirax bulwark near the Sea of Silence. He has not checked in for several weeks and I have grown concerned.
I have not been able to get any straight information out of either the Zirax Empire nor my own colleagues on the Board of Executives and so I must turn to obtaining outside assistance.
@p9 @d0I would ask for you to send a representative to meet with me in person as this is a highly sensitive matter. If word got out I was asking the UCH for assistance with this matter my career would be over.
I will be waiting in an asteroid field in the binary star system of Trealt.
If you are wondering whether you should help, consider that you would have a ranking member of the Board of Executives in your debt.
Please do not take too long as I cannot stay here forever.
Chinese (simplified):
您好。我会长话短说。
我是贸易联合会执行委员会的高级成员。我这么说只是为了确保我引起了您的注意。
我的兄弟被指派去执行对沉默之海附近的兹瑞克斯堡垒进行审计。他已经好几周没有检查了,我越来越担心。
我无法从兹瑞克斯帝国或我自己在执行委员会的同事那里得到任何直接的信息,所以我必须求助于外部援助。
@p9 @d0我请求您派一名代表亲自与我见面,因为这是一个高度敏感的问题。如果传出我去请求UCH协助处理这个问题,我的职业生涯就完了。
我将在特里尔特双星系统的一个小行星带中等待。
如果您在犹豫是否应该帮助,考虑一下您将会有一个执行委员会的高级成员欠您一个人情。
请不要花太长时间,因为我不能永远待在这里。

English: @q0Now you see why I contacted you about this. @w1If you can meet this Federation Executive in the asteroid field in the Trealt system and help him find his brother, @w1 it could go a long way towards a formal trade agreement between the UCH and the Trade Federation.\n@w2And I'm sure he'll pay... @w2 very well.\n@w2Oh, @w1{Player.Name}, @w1I have a feeling you will want to make sure you have a <color=#ff00ff>Large Prototype Micro Jump Drive</color> installed on your capital vessel for this. @w2It may come in handy.
Chinese (simplified): @q0现在你知道为什么我联系你了。@w1如果你能在特雷尔特星系的小行星带会见这位联邦执行官,并帮助他找到他的兄弟,@w1这可能对UCH和贸易联合会之间的正式贸易协议大有帮助。\n@w2我敢肯定他会支付... @w2非常丰厚的报酬。\n@w2哦,@w1{Player.Name},@w1我有一种感觉,你会想要确保你的主力舰上安装了<color=#ff00ff>大型原型微型跳跃驱动器</color>。@w2它可能会派上用场。

English: @q0Unless you and I have business, @w1 I would appreciate it if you left my ship.
Chinese (simplified): @q0除非你我之间有生意往来,@w1否则我希望你离开我的飞船。

English: @q0You will have to forgive me if I don't offer you my name, given the delicate nature of this matter.
Chinese (simplified): @q0如果我没有告诉你我的名字,请原谅我,鉴于这件事的敏感性。

English: <color=#00ff00>I understand. You have my discretion. How can I help?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我明白。你有我的保密承诺。我能如何帮助?</color>

English: <color=#fafe10>We can skip the talking. Just tell me where to go.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#fafe10>我们可以跳过谈话。直接告诉我去哪里。</color>

English: I will have to come back later.
<color=#00ff00>We have a deal. I will investigate nearby black holes.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我们达成了协议。我将调查附近的黑洞。</color>

English: I want to ask you some more questions.
Why are we meeting out here?
Chinese (simplified): 我们为什么要在这里见面?

English: Why are you in this shuttle and not a proper escort ship?
Chinese (simplified): 你为什么会在这个穿梭机里,而不是一艘正规的护卫舰?

English: As long as it does the job.
I have to go. I think I left the food processor on.
Chinese (simplified): 我得走了。我觉得我忘记关食品处理器了。

English: @q0Ah, @w1so you are the Terran they sent to assist me.
Chinese (simplified): @q0啊,@w1所以你就是他们派来协助我的地球人。

English: <color=#00ff00>Name name is {Player.Name}. I will hear you out.</color>
I don't know what you mean. I must really be going.
Chinese (simplified): 我不知道你是什么意思。我真的得走了。

English: Do you have any leads at all?

@q0I think you should start by investigating any nearby black hole systems in neutral territory. @w1See if you can find anything out of place in them especially if they have any asteroid fields. @w2You may have to check several black hole systems as the flight plan did not specify which systems they visited or what they were looking for.\n@w2Be careful, @w1black holes are typically avoided for a reason. @w1I won't lie and say this will be without danger. @w1And remember I will pay you quite well. @w2Oh and bring along some of your fancy {Loc(Item1)}s. @w1You're going to need them.\n@p9 @d3I will head to The Bulwark. Meet me there when you are finished investigating the black holes.
Chinese (simplified): @q0我认为你应该从调查附近中立领土的黑洞系统开始。@w1看看你能否在其中发现任何不寻常的地方,特别是如果它们有任何小行星场。@w2你可能需要检查几个黑洞系统,因为飞行计划没有指定他们访问了哪些系统或他们在寻找什么。\n@w2小心,@w1黑洞通常有被避开的理由。@w1我不会撒谎说这将没有危险。@w1记住我会付给你很好的报酬。@w2哦,带上一些你的高级{Loc(Item1)}s。@w1你会需要它们的。\n@p9 @d3我会前往The Bulwark。调查完黑洞后在那里见我。

English: @q0Interference from the binary stars combined with the sensor deflecting properties of the dust in this asteroid field make for a perfect hiding place.\n@w2As to who I am hiding from, @w1that's on a need to know basis and you, @w1my new friend, @w1do not yet need to know.
Chinese (simplified): @q0双子星的干扰加上这个小行星场中尘埃的传感器偏转特性,构成了一个完美的藏身之地。\n@w2至于我藏身于谁,@w1那是需要知道的人才知道的事情,而你,@w1我的新朋友,@w1目前还不需要知道。

English: @q0I was able to obtain his ship's flight plan. @w1It's not much but it should be a starting point for your investigation.
Chinese (simplified): @q0我设法获得了他的飞船飞行计划。@w1虽然不多,但应该是你调查的起点。

English: Agreed. Let's go over his flight plan.
Chinese (simplified): 同意。我们来检查他的飞行计划。

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>Registered Flight Plan for</color> <color=#00ffff>Prosperity-Class Cruiser</color> <color=#ffffff>FED-145-AX29</color>
<color=#ffff00>------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</color>
<color=#009600>15-553-1321.7:</color> <color=#1083fe>Delta Sigma 9</color>
<color=#009600>15-623-6435.2:</color> <color=#1083fe>Epsilon Uno 554</color>
<color=#009600>16-432-5351.0:</color> <color=#1083fe>Trading Station Ceries Alpha MP-523433</color>
<color=#009600>16-980-1034.6:</color> <color=#1083fe>Aphis Unero Distribution Center Delta</color>
<color=#009600>17-311-6933.4:</color> <color=#1083fe>Sigma 954 Fueling Station</color>
<color=#009600>20-020-5232.7:</color> <color=#1083fe>Uncharted Black Hole System</color> <color=#ff0000>-DETOUR FROM FLIGHT PLAN</color>
<color=#009600>21-635-0102.5:</color> <color=#1083fe>Uncharted Black Hole System</color> <color=#ff0000>-DETOUR FROM FLIGHT PLAN</color>
<color=#009600>23-434-6034.3:</color> <color=#1083fe>Uncharted Black Hole System</color> <color=#ff0000>-DETOUR FROM FLIGHT PLAN</color>
<color=#009600>24-632-7395.6:</color> <color=#1083fe>The Bulwark</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>已注册飞行计划为</color> <color=#00ffff>繁荣级巡洋舰</color> <color=#ffffff>FED-145-AX29</color>
<color=#ffff00>-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</color>
<color=#009600>15-553-1321.7:</color> <color=#1083fe>Delta Sigma 9</color>
<color=#009600>15-623-6435.2:</color> <color=#1083fe>Epsilon Uno 554</color>
<color=#009600>16-432-5351.0:</color> <color=#1083fe>贸易空间站Ceries Alpha MP-523433</color>
<color=#009600>16-980-1034.6:</color> <color=#1083fe>Aphis Unero分销中心Delta</color>
<color=#009600>17-311-6933.4:</color> <color=#1083fe>Sigma 954加油站</color>
<color=#009600>20-020-5232.7:</color> <color=#1083fe>未标记的黑洞系统</color> <color=#ff0000>-偏离飞行计划</color>
<color=#009600>21-635-0102.5:</color> <color=#1083fe>未标记的黑洞系统</color> <color=#ff0000>-偏离飞行计划</color>
<color=#009600>23-434-6034.3:</color> <color=#1083fe>未标记的黑洞系统</color> <color=#ff0000>-偏离飞行计划</color>
<color=#009600>24-632-7395.6:</color> <color=#1083fe>The Bulwark</color>

English: @q0Most of this looks fairly normal except for those detours to black hole systems. @w2Typically black holes are avoided as navigational hazards, not traveled to on purpose.\n@w2My brother is not an idiot. @w2Well, @w2usually. @w2If he went to those black hole systems he must have had a reason.
Chinese (simplified): @q0除了那些绕道黑洞系统的路线外,大部分看起来都相当正常。@w2通常黑洞被视为航行障碍,而不是故意前往的地方。\n@w2我弟弟不是白痴。@w2嗯,@w2通常不是。@w2如果他去了那些黑洞系统,他一定有他的理由。

English: Can we go over that again?
@d0Scanning station standing by.\nScanning sector requires 1 <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color> in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): @d0扫描站待命。\n扫描星区需要个人库存中有1个<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color>。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You do not have enough survey probes.</color>\nYou need 1 <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color> in your personal inventory to scan this sector.\nYou can craft survey probes in the decoration tab of a constructor or purchase them from UCH Research Vessels.
Chinese (simplified): @d0<color=#ff0000>你没有足够的勘测探测器。</color>\n你需要个人库存中有1个<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color>才能扫描这个星区。\n你可以在建造机的装饰标签下制作勘测探测器,或者从UCH研究舰购买。

English: @q0Agreed, @w1 Commander.\n@w2Head to the Gravimetric Disturbance marked on your HUD in the asteroid field in the black hole system.\n@w2Once you are closer you will be able to launch another probe to get close range scans.
Chinese (simplified): @q0同意,@w1指挥官。\n@w2前往HUD上标记的黑洞系统中的小行星带中的引力扰动点。\n@w2一旦你靠近了,你将能够发射另一个探测器进行近距离扫描。

English: @q0 @d0Probe-6A: Grav Flux: 67 over 80 Quantum Noise Factor: 212 Temporal Tracing: 0.003 zeptoseconds Particle Density: 53/cm3 Neutrino Density: 100% Cosmic Rays: 12 The report goes on for 53 more pages.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0探测器-6A: 引力波动: 67/80 量子噪声因子: 212 时间追踪: 0.003zeptoseconds 粒子密度: 53/cm3 中微子密度: 100% 宇宙射线: 12 报告还有53页。

English: IDA, I don't understand this at all. A little help?
Chinese (simplified): IDA,我完全不懂这个。帮个忙?

English: @q0Of course, @w1Commander {Player.Name}. @w2I would be happy to assist.\n@w2Give me a moment while I analyze the data.\n@w4Analysis complete.
Chinese (simplified): @q0当然,@w1指挥官 {Player.Name}。@w2我很乐意协助。\n@w2给我一点时间分析数据。\n@w4分析完成。

English: What is your expert analysis, IDA?
If the Legacy are entering the galaxy through wormholes we need to find out.
Chinese (simplified): 如果遗留者是通过虫洞进入银河系的,我们需要找出原因。

English: @q0Commander {Player.Name}, @w2this mission is only for those with the most advanced exploration vessels.\n@w2As such, I am only authorized to brief those who have the <color=#ffffff>Large Prototype Micro Jump Drive</color> unlocked in their tech tree and installed on their vessel.\n@w2Come back when you are better prepared.
Chinese (simplified): @q0指挥官 {Player.Name},@w2这个任务只适合那些拥有最先进探索飞船的人。\n@w2因此,我只有权向那些在他们的科技树中解锁了<color=#ffffff>大型原型微型跳跃驱动器</color>并安装在他们的飞船上的人提供简报。\n@w2当你准备得更好时再回来。

English: I will make contact when I am prepared.

@d0You need 1 <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color> in your personal inventory to scan the gravimetric disturbance.\nYou can craft survey probes in the decoration tab of a constructor or purchase them from UCH Research Vessels.
Chinese (simplified): @d0你需要1个<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color>在你的个人库存中扫描引力度量干扰。\n你可以在建造机的装饰标签中制作探测探测器,或者从UCH研究舰购买。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You do not have enough survey probes.</color>\nYou need 1 <color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color> in your personal inventory to scan this sector.\nYou can craft survey probes in the decoration tab of a constructor or purchase them from UCH Research Vessels.
Chinese (simplified): @d0<color=#ff0000>你没有足够的探测探测器。\n你需要1个<color=#ffffff>{Loc(Item1)}</color>在你的个人库存中扫描这个星区。\n你可以在建造机的装饰标签中制作探测探测器,或者从UCH研究舰购买。

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You do not need to perform any scans for a mission at this time.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0<color=#ff0000>目前你不需要为任务进行任何扫描。</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>You do not need to perform any actions for a mission at this time.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0<color=#ff0000>目前你不需要为任务执行任何操作。</color>

English: @q0I have analyzed the data from this newest probe and have confirmed this is a collapsed wormhole.\n@w2I have a plan, @w2of sorts.\n@w2It's... @w3risky.
Chinese (simplified): @q0我已分析了这个最新探测器的数据,并确认这是一个坍塌的虫洞。\n@w2我有一个计划,@w2算是吧。\n@w2它...@w3有风险。
<color=#00ff00>不是一直都是吗?你的计划是什么?</color>

English: <color=#fafe10>I still think science is boring. Just tell me what to do next.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#fafe10>我还是觉得科学很无聊。直接告诉我下一步该做什么。</color>

English: Please go over the plan again.
I need a moment to prepare.
@q0While I have confirmed this is a collapsed wormhole, there is no way to know its origin without going through it.\n@w2Which, @w2being a collapsed wormhole, @w2might be a little difficult.
Chinese (simplified): @q0虽然我已确认这是一个坍塌的虫洞,但没有通过它就无法知道它的起源。\n@w2而作为一个坍塌的虫洞,@w2可能有点困难。

English: So how do we go through a wormhole after it's collapsed?
Chinese (simplified): 那么虫洞坍塌后我们怎么通过呢?

English: @q0Technically, @w1it's not actually fully collapsed. @w1There is still a microscopic connection though it will fully fade in time.\n@w2I'm sure you can fit through.
Chinese (simplified): @q0技术上,@w1它并没有完全坍塌。@w1仍然有一个微观连接,尽管它会随着时间完全消失。\n@w2我肯定你能穿过去。

English: @q0Thank you. @w1I have been working on my humor subroutines.\n@w3I have calculated that a massive influx of gravimetric energy could force the wormhole open for a short time. @w1It won't be large enough for a ship but may be just enough for a probe to slip through to the other side. @w2The probe should be able to send telemetry back through the wormhole giving us an idea what's on the other side.\n@w2Now if only your ship had a gravimetric generator of some kind...
Chinese (simplified): @q0谢谢。@w1我一直在研究我的幽默子程序。\n@w3我计算出,大量的引力度量能量涌入可以在短时间内强行打开虫洞。@w1它不会大到足以让飞船通过,但可能刚好足够让探测器穿过到另一边。@w2探测器应该能够通过虫洞发送遥测数据回来,让我们知道另一边有什么。\n@w2现在如果你的飞船有某种引力度量发生器就好了...

English: Would a prototype micro jump drive be capable of this?
Chinese (simplified): 微型跳跃驱动器原型能做到这一点吗?

English: Too bad we don't have anything like that.
Chinese (simplified): 可惜我们没有那样的东西。

English: @q0Really, @w1Commander? @w2You can't think of a single device on your ship capable of generating gravimetric energy?\n@w2Come on Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0真的,@w1指挥官?@w2你想不到你飞船上有任何能产生引力度量能量的设备吗?\n@w2来吧,指挥官。

English: Hmm... Now that I think about it. What about that prototype micro jump drive?
Chinese (simplified): 嗯...现在我想起来了。那个微型跳跃驱动器原型怎么样?

English: Not a clue, sorry. You're the smart one.
Chinese (simplified): 一点头绪都没有,抱歉。你才是聪明人。

English: @q0Yes, @w1a warp drive would do quite nicely... @w3If your plan is to blow up half the sector.
Chinese (simplified): @q0是的,@w1一个翘曲引擎会非常好... @w3如果你的计划是炸掉半个星区。

English: Could be fun. But what do you suggest?
Chinese (simplified): 可能很有趣。但你有什么建议?

English: @q0What was the one thing the researcher reminded you to install on your ship?
Chinese (simplified): @q0研究人员提醒你在你的飞船上安装的一件事是什么?

English: Wait, you were monitoring my communications?
Chinese (simplified): 等等,你一直在监控我的通讯?

English: @q0I see everything, @w1Commander. @w3 Everything.\n@w2Now care to take another guess?
Chinese (simplified): @q0我看到了一切,@w1指挥官。@w3 一切。\n@w2现在想再猜一次吗?

English: The... Experimental... No, prototype? Mini hop drive? Jump drive? Prototype micro jump drive?
Chinese (simplified): 那个...实验性的...不,原型?微型跳跃驱动器?跳跃驱动器?微型跳跃驱动器原型?

English: @q0According to my calculations, a prototype micro jump drive should produce just enough to do the trick. @w2If we overload it, @w1of course.\n@w2You will need to make sure one is installed on your capital vessel. @w1If you went off on this adventure without doing so then you're going to have to install one and then come back to this sector.
Chinese (simplified): @q0根据我的计算,一个微型跳跃驱动器原型应该刚好足够完成这个任务。@w2如果我们过载它,@w1当然。\n@w2你需要确保你的主力舰上安装了一个。@w1如果你在没有这样做的情况下出发去冒险,那么你必须安装一个然后回到这个星区。

English: I don't have one. Can't we use the warp drive instead?
Chinese (simplified): 我没有那个。我们不能用翘曲引擎代替吗?

English: @q0I suppose I can perform some tweaks to my calculations to make use of a warp drive, @w1but there is a 33.33% chance the drive will implode the wormhole causing a cascade gravimetric inversion, destroying everything within a 15km radius. @w2Yours truly included.\n@w3Let's just pretend you're using a micro jump drive and continue on, @w1shall we?
Chinese (simplified): @q0我想我可以对我的计算做一些调整,以利用翘曲引擎,@w1但有33.33%的几率引擎会导致虫洞内爆,引发级联引力度量反转,摧毁15公里半径内的一切。@w2包括我本人。\n@w3我们就假装你使用的是微型跳跃驱动器,继续进行,@w1好吗?

English: I need some time to prepare.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要一些时间来准备。

English: I am ready. Tell me what to do.
Chinese (simplified): 我准备好了。告诉我该怎么做。

English: <color=#00ff00>I think it's time we meet up with our new friend and get some answers.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ff00>我认为是时候我们和新朋友会面并得到一些答案了。</color>

English:
@q0 @d0<color=#00ffff>Sectors scanned:</color> 1
<color=#00ffff>Objects of interest detected:</color> 202
<color=#00ffff>Asteroids:</color> 57, <color=#00ffff>gas and dust clouds:</color> 119, <color=#00ffff>small moving vessels:</color> 11, <color=#00ffff>large moving vessels:</color> 2, <color=#00ffff>stationary objects:</color> 13
<color=#ff00ff>Anomalies identified:</color> Gravimetric distortions, unknown biological signatures.
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0<color=#00ffff>扫描的星区:</color> 1
<color=#00ffff>探测到的感兴趣对象:</color> 202
<color=#00ffff>小行星:</color> 57, <color=#00ffff>气体和尘埃云:</color> 119, <color=#00ffff>小型移动物体:</color> 11, <color=#00ffff>大型移动物体:</color> 2, <color=#00ffff>静止物体:</color> 13
<color=#ff00ff>识别到的异常:</color> 引力度扭曲,未知生物特征。

English: IDA, were you able to determine where the wormhole led?
Chinese (simplified): IDA,你能够确定虫洞通向哪里吗?

English: <color=#fafe10>Can you just tell me where to go?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#fafe10>你能不能直接告诉我该去哪里?</color>

English: @q0I was able to determine the approximate location of the probe before the wormhole collapsed and cut off the video feed.\n@w2While I cannot determine an exact position, @w1the probe was sent to somewhere within the Sea of Silence.
Chinese (simplified): @q0我能够确定探测器在虫洞坍塌并切断视频信号之前的大致位置。\n@w2虽然我不能确定确切的位置,@w1探测器被发送到了沉默之海的某个地方。

English: Isn't that whole area blockaded by the Zirax Empire to keep out the Legacy?
Chinese (simplified): 那整个区域不是被兹瑞克斯帝国封锁以阻止遗留者进入吗?

English: @q0Indeed it is. @w1This is very concerning. @w1It seems your suspicions of the Legacy using wormholes to bypass the blockade and enter the Andromeda galaxy were correct.
Chinese (simplified): @q0确实如此。@w1这非常令人担忧。@w1看来你对遗留者使用虫洞绕过封锁进入仙女座星系的怀疑是正确的。

English: Question is, why was the brother of a Trade Federation executive looking into the Legacy?
Chinese (simplified): 问题是,为什么贸易联邦的高管兄弟会去调查遗留者?

English: @q0It appeared to be some kind of Legacy nexus. @w1A conduit used to power wormholes, perhaps.\n@w2It's possible there's multiple of these scattered throughout the Sea of Silence. @w1If even a few of them are active it could spell disaster for the Andromeda galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): @q0看起来像是某种遗留者的中心点。@w1可能是用来为虫洞提供动力的通道。\n@w2有可能在沉默之海中散布着多个这样的中心点。@w1如果其中几个是活跃的,那对仙女座星系来说可能是灾难性的。

English: Show me the probe data again.
Chinese (simplified): 再给我看看探测器数据。

English: @q0I have very important matters to attend to.\n@w2Unless you have business with me, @w1I'd appreciate you being on your way.
Chinese (simplified): @q0我有一些非常重要的事务要处理。\n@w2除非你和我有事要谈,@w1我希望你能够离开。

English: Alrighty then, I will leave you on the creepy station.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧,那我会让你留在这个诡异的空间站。

English: @q0Why are you back here? @w2Go get doing what I had told you to do and @w2stop @w2wasting @w2time!\n@w3If you forgot what to do, check your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): @q0你为什么会回到这里?@w2去做我告诉你要做的事情,@w2停止@w2浪费@w2时间!\n@w3如果你忘记了要做什么,检查你的PDA。

English: @q0Ah there you are! @w1What did you find at the black holes? @w1Never mind, @w1we've got no time to go over that now!\n@w1Right now I need your help to get this door open. @w1The left door heads up onto the command deck where my brother most likely would have been. @w1The right door heads into the station proper.\n@w2Only problem is that I can't open the left door from here.
Chinese (simplified): @q0啊,你在这里!@w1你在黑洞那里发现了什么?@w1没关系,@w1我们现在没有时间去讨论那个!\n@w1现在,我需要你的帮助来打开这扇门。@w1左边的门通向指挥甲板,我的兄弟很可能就在那里。@w1右边的门通向空间站主体。\n@w2唯一的问题是我不能从这里打开左边的门。

English: @q0I'm not engineer but from what I can tell power in certain parts of the station is being diverted.\n@w2Repairing the door controls is a 2 person job. @w1I need you to crawl through the ductwork rerouting power while I work the controls here.\n@w2Between the two of us, we should be able to open the door and get to the command deck.
Chinese (simplified): @q0我不是工程师,但从我能看出来的情况来看,空间站某些部分的电力被转移了。\n@w2修理门控制是一个需要两个人的工作。@w1我需要你爬过管道重新路由电力,而我在这里操作控制。\n@w2我们两个人一起,应该能够打开门并到达指挥甲板。

English: <color=#ffff00>Just skip to the part where you tell me what to do.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffff00>直接跳到你告诉我该怎么做的部分。</color>

English: What makes you so sure your brother will be there?
Chinese (simplified): 你为什么这么确定你兄弟会在那里?

English: @q0I''m not, @w1but even if he isn't there the logs will tell us what happened.\n@w2Here, @w2I will patch in to your PDA system so we can communicate. @w1I'll monitor you from here and direct you where you need to go and what you need to do.\n@w2Help me with this and there's 500k in standard galactic credits with your name on it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0我不是,@w1但即使他不在那里,日志会告诉我们发生了什么。\n@w2这里,@w2我会接入你的PDA系统,这样我们就可以通信。@w1我会从这里监控你,并指导你去哪里以及你需要做什么。\n@w2帮我完成这个任务,就有50万标准银河信用点等着你。

English: Can we go over that again?

@d0<color=#ffff00>This mission is currently under construction by Ravien and is not yet ready.</color>\nAssuming you had started your save game in build 26 or later, you may be able to start the mission once it becomes available in a later update.\nIf you still need to start the mission now for testing purposes, you can use a Project Eden Admin Access card to do so.
Chinese (simplified): @d0<color=#ffff00>这个任务目前正在由Ravien建设中,尚未准备好。</color>\n假设你在26版或之后的版本中开始了你的存档游戏,一旦任务在后续更新中变得可用,你可能能够开始这个任务。\n如果你仍然需要现在为了测试目的开始这个任务,你可以使用一张伊甸园计划管理员访问卡来这样做。
